[sujeto(['GATA', proteins, are, transcription, factors, that]), verbo([bind]), complemento(['GATA', 'DNA', elements, through, 'Cys4', structural, 'zinc-binding', domains, and, play, critical, regulatory, roles, in, neurological, and, urogenital, development, and, the, development, of, cardiac, disease])].
[sujeto(['To', evaluate, 'GATA', proteins, as, potential]), verbo([targets]), complemento([for, 'lead,', spectroscopically, monitored, 'metal-binding', titrations, were, used, to, measure, the, affinity, of, 'Pb2+', for, the, 'C-terminal', 'zinc-binding', domain, from, chicken, 'GATA-1', '(', 'CF)', and, the, 'double-finger', domain, from, human, 'GATA-1', '(', 'DF)'])].
[sujeto(['These', studies]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, 'Pb2+', forms, tight, complexes, with, cysteine, residues, in, the, 'zinc-binding', sites, in, 'GATA', 'proteins,', beta1Pb, =, 6.4, '(', +, /, -, 2.0, ')', x, 10, '(', 9, ')', 'M(-1)', for, 'CF', and, beta2, =, 6.3, '(', +, /, -, 6.3, ')', x, 10, '(', 19, ')', 'M(-2)', for, 'Pb(2+)2-DF,', and, within, an, order, of, magnitude, of, the, affinity, of, 'Zn2+', for, these, proteins])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'Pb2+', was, able, to, displace]), verbo([bound]), complemento(['Zn2+', from, 'CF', and, 'DF'])].
[sujeto(['Upon', addition, of, 'Pb2+,', 'GATA', shows, a]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([ability, to, bind, to, 'DNA', and, subsequently, activate, transcription])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', the, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, transcriptional, activity, of, 'GATA', proteins, are, most, likely, to, be, targeted, by, 'Pb2+', in, cells, and, tissues, that, sequester, 'Pb2+', in, 'vivo,', which, include, the, brain, and, the, heart])].
[sujeto(['Vertebrate', 'GATA', proteins]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([processes, that, are, vital, to, 'development,', and, each, possesses, two, tandem, 'GATA', finger, 'domains:', an, 'N-terminal', 'GATA', finger, and, a, 'C-terminal', 'GATA', finger])].
[sujeto(['These', 'GATA', fingers]), verbo([require]), complemento(['Zn(2+)', to, 'fold,', to, bind, 'DNA', recognition, 'elements,', and, to, regulate, transcription])].
[sujeto(['While', the, 'GATA-1', 'C-terminal', finger, is, necessary, and, sufficient, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, single, 'GATA', 'DNA', 'sites,', the, 'N-terminal', finger, interacts, with, 'DNA', such, that, the, double, finger, unit, '(', 'DF', 'domain)', has, a, binding, and, transactivation, profile, that, is, tuned, by, the, 'DNA-binding', site])].
[sujeto(['Co(2+)', was, used, as, a, spectroscopic, probe, in, a, series, of, competition, titrations, to, determine, the, affinity, of, 'Co(2+)', and, 'Zn(2+)', for, the, 'C-terminal', finger, from, chicken, 'GATA-1', and, the, double, finger, from, human, 'GATA-1', '(', referred, to, in, this]), verbo([report]), complemento([as, 'CF', and, 'DF)'])].
[sujeto(['For', 'DF,', these, experiments, yielded, equilibrium, constants, for, the, process, of, two, 'M(2+)']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, form, 'M(2+)(2)-DF', of, 'beta(2)(Co)', =, 2.5, '(', +, /, -, 1.6, ')', x, 10, '(', 14, ')', 'M(-2)', and, 'beta(2)(Zn)', =, 6.3, '(', +, /, -, 2.5, ')', x, 10, '(', 20, ')', 'M(-2)'])].
[sujeto(['A', detailed, analysis, of, these, data]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, the, 'N-terminal', and, 'C-terminal', fingers, of, 'DF', act, as, independent, and, identical, 'Zn(2+)-binding', sites, and, each, finger, binds, 'Zn(2+)', with, an, affinity, equivalent, to, that, of, 'CF'])].
[sujeto(['P3', is, also, the, most, active, promoter, in, tumour, tissues, and, cell, lines]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['IGF-II'])].

[sujeto(['Srv2/CAP', is, a]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['actin-binding', protein, with, important, roles, in, driving, cellular, actin, dynamics, in, diverse, 'animal,', 'fungal,', and, plant, species])].

[sujeto(['Twenty', eight, transcription, factor]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, have, been, identified, by, 'DNase', 'I', footprinting, and, electrophoretic, mobility, shift, assay, '(', 'EMSA)'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([mapped, an, essential, regulatory, region, between, -, 513, to, -, 352, bp, which, causes, a, drastic, decline, of, reporter, activity])].
[sujeto(['This', region, contains, 'CdxA,', 'GATA2', and, 'SRY', transcription, factor]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites])].
[sujeto(['Individual', mutation, of, these, three, sites, showed]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, reporter, activity])].
[sujeto(['Mutation', in, 'SRY', site, '(', -, 403, /, -, 368, ')', showed, maximum]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, reporter, activity, among, these, three, sites])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', we]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'SRY', like, protein, may, be, acting, as, a, strong, repressor, of, 'SMP30', gene, along, with, 'CdxA', and, 'GATA-2'])].
[sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, mutation, of, both, 'Sp1', '(', 172, /, -, 148, 'bp)', and, a, 'C/EBPbeta', '(', -, 190, /, -, 177, 'bp)', transcription, binding, site, located, adjacent, to, each, other, on, 'SMP30', gene, 'promoter,', causes, a, significant, enhancement, in, reporter, activity, than, individual, 'mutation,', thus, may, be, causing, the, repression, of, 'SMP30', promoter, activity])].
[sujeto(['These', studies]), verbo([provide]), complemento([novel, insights, into, the, mechanism, that, regulate, 'SMP30', gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Dof', '(', 'DNA-binding', with, one, 'finger)', proteins, are, plant, transcription, factors, that]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, highly, conserved, 'DNA-binding', 'domain,', called, the, 'Dof', domain])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Dof', 'domain,', which, is, composed, of, 52, amino, acid, 'residues,', is, similar, to, the, 'Cys2/Cys2', zinc, finger, 'DNA-binding', domain, of, 'GATA1', and, steroid, hormone, 'receptors,', but]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, longer, putative, loop, than, that, in, the, case, of, these, zinc, finger, domains])].
[sujeto(['The', 'DNA-binding', function, of, ascorbate, oxidase, gene]), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'AOBP),', a, 'Dof', 'protein,', was, investigated, by, gel, retardation, analysis])].

[sujeto(['Hydrogen', peroxide, '(', 'H2O2)']), verbo([has]), complemento([previously, been, shown, to, inhibit, the, 'DNA', binding, activity, of, hypoxia, inducible, 'factor-1', '(', 'HIF-1),', the, accumulation, of, 'HIF-1alpha', protein, and, erythropoietin, '(', 'Epo)', gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['Epo', gene, expression]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, previously, shown, to, be, 'down-regulated', through, a, 'GATA', binding, site, at, its, promoter, region])].
[sujeto(['Hypoxic', induction, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, inhibited, upon, the, addition, of, 'H2O2,', and, this, effect, could, be, reversed, through, the, addition, of, catalase])].
[sujeto(['Hypoxic', induction, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, suppressed, by, 'co-transfection', with, a, human, 'GATA-2', cDNA, expression, plasmid])].
[sujeto(['Transfection', of, 'Hep3B', cells, with, a, reporter, gene, bearing, a, mutation, at, the, promoter, 'GATA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, was, found, to, be, only, mildly, affected, by, the, addition, of, 'H2O2'])].

[sujeto(['From', these, 'results,', we, conclude, that, 'H2O2']), verbo([increases]), complemento([the, binding, activity, of, 'GATA-2', in, a, specific, 'manner,', thereby, suppressing, the, activity, of, the, 'Epo', promoter, and, thus, inhibiting, 'Epo', gene, expression])].

[sujeto(['The', presynaptic, action, of, 'Bothriopsis', bilineata, smaragdina, '(', forest, 'viper)', venom, and, 'Bbil-TX,', an, 'Asp49', 'PLA2', from, this, 'venom,', was, examined, in, detail, in, mouse, phrenic, 'nerve-muscle', '(', 'PND)', preparations, 'in&nbsp;vitro', and, in, a, neuroblastoma, cell, line, '(', 'SK-N-SH)', in, order, to]), verbo([gain]), complemento([a, better, insight, into, the, mechanism, of, action, of, the, venom, and, associated, 'Asp49', 'PLA2'])].

[sujeto(['HANABA', 'TARANU', '(', 'HAN)', encodes, a, 'GATA3-type', transcription, factor, that, functions, in, floral, organ, 'development,', 'SAM', 'organization,', and, embryo, development, in, 'Arabidopsis,', but, is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, suppressing, bract, outgrowth, and, promoting, branching, in, grass, species])].

[sujeto(['Further,', it, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'CsHAN1', may, regulate, 'SAM', development, through, regulating, the, 'WUSCHEL', '(', 'WUS)', and, 'SHOOT', 'MERISTEMLESS', '(', 'STM)', 'pathways,', and, mediate, leaf, development, through, a, complicated, gene, regulatory, network, in, cucumber])].
[sujeto(['Ribosomal', recruitment, of, cellular, mRNAs, depends, on]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, eIF4F, to, the, 'mRNA\'s', 5, '\'', -, terminal, '\'', 'cap\''])].
[sujeto(['Interferon-induced', proteins, with, tetratricopeptide, repeats, '(', 'IFITs)', are, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([effectors, of, innate, immunity, that, inhibit, viral, replication, by, incompletely, understood, mechanisms])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, investigated, the, ability, of, 'IFIT', family, members, to]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'cap1-,', 'cap0-', and, 5, '\'', 'ppp-', mRNAs, and, inhibit, their, translation])].
[sujeto(['The', 2, '\'', -, 'O-methylation', abrogated, 'IFIT1/mRNA', 'interaction,', whereas, 'IFIT1B']), verbo([retained]), complemento([the, ability, to, bind, 'cap1-mRNA,', albeit, with, reduced, affinity, '(', 'K1/2,app', '∼450', 'nM)'])].
[sujeto(['The', 5, '\'', -, terminal, regions, of, 5, '\'', 'ppp-mRNAs', were]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([by, 'IFIT5', '(', 'K1/2,app', '∼400', 'nM)'])].
[sujeto(['The', activity, of, individual, 'IFITs', in]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento([initiation, on, a, specific, mRNA, was, determined, by, their, ability, to, interact, with, its, 5, '\'', -, terminal, 'region:', 'IFIT1', and, 'IFIT1B', efficiently, outcompeted, eIF4F, and, abrogated, initiation, on, 'cap0-mRNAs,', whereas, inhibition, on, 'cap1-', and, 5, '\'', 'ppp-', mRNAs, by, 'IFIT1B', and, 'IFIT5', was, weaker, and, required, higher, protein, concentrations])].
[sujeto(['Emerging', evidence]), verbo([has]), complemento([shown, that, microRNAs, have, key, roles, in, regulating, various, normal, physiological, 'processes,', whereas, their, deregulated, expression, is, correlated, with, various, diseases])].
[sujeto(['Recent', work, indicated, that, 'miR-146a']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, close, relationship, with, inflammation, and, autoimmune, diseases])].
[sujeto(['miR-146-deficient', mice]), verbo([have]), complemento([developed, some, abnormal, hematopoietic, 'phenotypes,', suggesting, the, potential, functions, of, 'miR-146', in, hematopoietic, development])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'miR-146b', was, consistently, 'up-regulated', in, both, 'K562', and, 'CD34(+)', hematopoietic, 'stem/progenitor', cells, '(', 'HSPCs)', undergoing, either, erythroid, or, megakaryocytic, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['Remarkably,', erythroid, and, megakaryocytic, maturation, of, 'K562', cells, was]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, excess, 'miR-146b', but, inhibited, by, decreased, 'miR-146b', levels])].
[sujeto(['More', 'importantly,', an, mRNA, encoding, receptor, tyrosine, 'kinase,', namely, 'platelet-derived', growth, factor, receptor, α, '(', 'PDGFRA),', was, identified, and, validated, as, a, direct]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, 'miR-146b', in, hematopoietic, cells])].
[sujeto(['miR-146b', could, ultimately, affect, the, expression, of, the, 'GATA-1', 'gene,', which, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'HEY1', '(', 'Hairy/enhancer-of-split', related, with, 'YRPW', motif, protein, 1, ')', ',', a, transcriptional, 'repressor,', via, inhibition, of, the, 'PDGFRA/JNK/JUN/HEY1', pathway])].
[sujeto(['Lentivirus-mediated', gene, transfer, also, demonstrated, that, the, overexpression, of, 'miR-146b']), verbo([promoted]), complemento([erythropoiesis, and, megakaryocytopoiesis, of, 'HSPCs', via, its, regulation, on, the, 'PDGFRA', gene, and, effects, on, 'GATA-1', expression])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', we, confirmed, that, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'GATA-1', to, the, 'miR-146b', promoter, and, induction, of, 'miR-146b', during, hematopoietic, maturation, were, dependent, on, 'GATA-1'])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', 'miR-146b,', 'PDGFRA,', and, 'GATA-1', formed, a, regulatory, circuit, to]), verbo([promote]), complemento([erythroid, and, megakaryocytic, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['GATA1', is, indispensable, for, survival, and, terminal, differentiation, of, 'erythroid,', megakaryocytic, and, eosinophilic, 'progenitors,', whereas, 'GATA2']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([proliferation, and, maintenance, of, hematopoietic, stem, and, progenitor, cells])].
[sujeto(['Expression', levels, of, 'GATA1', and, 'GATA2', are, primarily]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([at, the, transcriptional, level, through, 'auto-', and, reciprocal, regulatory, networks, formed, by, these, 'GATA', factors])].
[sujeto(['The', dynamic, and, strictly, controlled, change, of, expression, from, 'GATA2', to, 'GATA1', during, erythropoiesis]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, referred, to, as, 'GATA', factor, 'switching,', which, plays, a, crucial, role, in, erythropoiesis])].
[sujeto(['The', regulatory, network, comprising, 'GATA1', and, 'GATA2', gives, rise, to, the, 'stage-specific', changes, in, 'Gata1', and, 'Gata2', gene, expression, during, erythroid, 'differentiation,', which]), verbo([ensures]), complemento([specific, expression, of, early, and, late, erythroid, genes, at, each, stage])].
[sujeto(['Recent', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([also, shed, light, on, the, 'genome-wide', binding, profiles, of, 'GATA1', and, 'GATA2,', and, the, significance, of, epigenetic, modification, of, 'Gata1', gene, during, erythroid, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['Although', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, several, miRNAs, that, regulate, erythroid, commitment, and, 'differentiation,', we, do, not, understand, the, mechanism, by, which, the, crucial, erythroid, transcription, 'factors,', 'GATA-1and', 'NF-E2', directly, regulate, and, control, differentiation, via, miRNA, pathways])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', the]), verbo([increase]), complemento([of, 'miR-199b-5p', in, erythroid, cells, occurred, in, a, 'GATA-1-', and, 'NF-E2-dependent', manner, during, erythrocyte, maturation])].
[sujeto(['Both', 'GATA-1', and, 'NF-E2']), verbo([bound]), complemento([upstream, of, the, 'miR-199b', gene, locus, and, activated, its, transcription])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', we, identified, 'c-Kit', as, a, direct]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, 'miR-199b-5p', in, erythroid, cells])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, results, establish, a, functional, link, among, the, erythroid, transcription, factors, 'GATA-1/NF-E2,', 'miR-199b-5p', and, 'c-Kit,', and]), verbo([provide]), complemento([new, insights, into, the, coupling, of, transcription, and, 'post-transcription', regulation, in, erythroid, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['Key', transcriptional, regulators, of, terminal, 'erythropoiesis,', such, as, 'GATA-binding', factor, 1, '(', 'GATA1)', and, 'T-cell', acute, lymphocytic, leukemia, protein, 1, '(', 'TAL1),']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, well, 'characterized,', but, transcription, factors, and, cofactors, and, their, expression, modulations, have, not, yet, been, explored, on, a, global, scale])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, use, global, gene, expression, analysis, to, identify, 28, transcription, factors, and, 19, transcriptional, cofactors]), verbo([induced]), complemento([during, terminal, erythroid, differentiation, whose, promoters, are, enriched, for, binding, by, 'GATA1', and, 'TAL1'])].
[sujeto(['TFDP2', is, a, critical, cofactor]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, proper, cell, cycle, control, and, gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['GATA1', and, 'TAL1', are]), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, the, regulatory, regions, of, 'Tfdp2', and, upregulate, its, expression, and, knockdown, of, 'Tfdp2', results, in, significantly, reduced, rates, of, proliferation, as, well, as, reduced, upregulation, of, many, 'erythroid-important', genes])].
[sujeto(['Loss', of, 'Tfdp2', also, globally]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([the, normal, downregulation, of, many, 'E2F2', target, 'genes,', including, those, that, regulate, the, cell, 'cycle,', causing, cells, to, accumulate, in, 'S', phase, and, resulting, in, increased, erythrocyte, size])].
[sujeto(['Activin', 'A,', a, member, of, the, transforming, growth, factor, '(', 'TGF)-β', 'superfamily,']), verbo([induces]), complemento([the, erythropoiesis, of, hematopoietic, progenitor, cells])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', a, luciferase, reporter, assay, showed, that, 'IFN-γ']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([activin, 'A-induced', 'ζ-globin', promoter, activation, in, 'K562', erythroblast, cells, in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['IFN-γ', also]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([the, activation, of, activin, 'A-induced', 'α-globin', promoter])].
[sujeto(['IFN-γ', reduced, the, mRNA, expression, of, 'α-globin,', 'ζ-globin,', 'NF-E2p45,', and, 'GATA-1']), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, activin, 'A'])].
[sujeto(['The', results, also, showed, that, 'IFN-γ']), verbo([induced]), complemento(['c-Jun', expression, when, 'NF-κBp65', and, 'c-Jun', bound, to, two, 'AP-1-binding', sites, on, the, 'c-Jun', promoter])].
[sujeto(['The', luciferase, activity, of, 'α-globin', and, 'ζ-globin', promoters, were]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([by, 'wild-type', 'c-Jun', and, eliminated, by, 'dominant-negative', '(', 'DN)', 'c-Jun'])].
[sujeto(['The', suppressive, effects, of, 'IFN-γ', on, the, mRNA, expression, of, 'α-globin', and, 'ζ-globin', were, absent, in, cells]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['DN', 'c-Jun'])].
[sujeto(['The', ability, of, 'NF-E2', to]), verbo([enhance]), complemento([activin, 'A-induced', 'ζ-globin', promoter, activation, decreased, when, 'c-Jun', was, 'present,', and, 'IFN-γ', treatment, further, enhanced, the, decreasing, effect, of, 'c-Jun'])].
[sujeto(['Chromatin', immunoprecipitation, revealed, that, 'NF-E2p45']), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, the, upstream, regulatory, element, '(', 'HS-40)', of, the, 'α-globin', gene, cluster, in, response, to, activin, 'A,', whereas, 'c-Jun', eliminated, this, binding])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'IFN-γ', modulates, 'NF-κB/c-Jun', to, antagonize, activin, 'A-mediated', 'NF-E2', transcriptional, activity, on, globin, gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['Elucidation', of, the, genetic, pathways, that, control, red, blood, cell, development]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, a, central, goal, of, erythropoiesis, research, over, the, past, decade])].
[sujeto(['Notably,', data, from, several, recent, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([provided, new, insights, into, the, regulation, of, erythroid, gene, transcription])].
[sujeto(['Transcription', profiling, demonstrates, that, erythropoiesis, is, mainly, controlled, by, a, small, group, of, 'lineage-restricted', transcription, factors, '[', 'Gata']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 1, '(', 'Gata1),', 'T', cell, acute, lymphocytic, leukemia, 1, protein, '(', 'Tal1),', and, 'Erythroid', 'Kruppel-like', factor, '(', 'EKLF;', henceforth, referred, to, as, 'Klf1)]'])].
[sujeto(['Binding-site', mapping, using, 'ChIP-Seq', indicates, that, most, 'DNA-bound', 'Gata1', and, 'Tal1', proteins, are, contained, within, higher, order, complexes, '(', 'Ldb1', 'complexes)', that, include, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([adapters, 'Ldb1', and, 'Lmo2'])].
[sujeto(['Ldb1', complexes]), verbo([regulate]), complemento(['Klf1,', and, 'Ldb1', 'complex-binding', sites, frequently, colocalize, with, 'Klf1', at, erythroid, genes, and, 'cis-regulatory', 'elements,', indicating, strong, functional, synergy, between, 'Gata1,', 'Tal1,', and, 'Klf1'])].
[sujeto(['Together', with, new, data, demonstrating, that, 'Ldb1', can]), verbo([mediate]), complemento(['long-range', 'promoter-enhancer', 'interactions,', these, findings, provide, a, foundation, for, the, first, comprehensive, models, of, the, global, regulation, of, erythroid, gene, transcription])].
[sujeto([1, axis, to, 'explore,', at, the, systems, 'level,', dynamic, relationships, between, transcription, factor, '(', 'TF)']), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, global, gene, expression, programs, as, multipotent, cells, differentiate])].
[sujeto(['Our', analysis]), verbo([reveals]), complemento(['(', 1, ')', differential, complexity, of, sequence, motifs, bound, by, 'GATA1,', 'GATA2,', and, 'PU'])].
[sujeto([1, ;, '(', 2, ')', the, scope, and, interplay, of, 'GATA1', and, 'GATA2', programs, 'within,', and, during, transitions, 'between,', different, cell, 'compartments,', and, the, extent, of, their, 'hard-wiring', by, 'DNA', 'motifs;', '(', 3, ')', the, potential, to, predict, gene, expression, trajectories, based, on, global, associations, between, 'TF-binding', data, and]), verbo([target]), complemento([gene, 'expression;', and, '(', 4, ')', how, dynamic, modeling, of, 'DNA-binding', and, gene, expression, data, can, be, used, to, infer, regulatory, logic, of, 'TF', circuitry])].
[sujeto(['Gata1', hematopoietic, regulatory, domain, '(', 'G1HRD)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, recapitulate, endogenous, 'Gata1', gene, expression, in, transgenic, mouse, assays, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['Mutation', of, 'CP2-binding', sites, also, moderately]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['G1HRD', activity])].
[sujeto(['The', combined, mutation, of, the, 'CP2-binding', sites, and, the, 'GATA-palindrome', motif, resulted, in, complete]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'G1HRD', activity])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, 'GFP', expression, was, aberrantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, the, 'HSCs', and, was, associated, with, decreases, in, 'DNA', methylation, and, abundant, 'GATA2', binding, to, the, transgenic, 'MG-GFP', allele])].
[sujeto(['The', 3.2, -, kb, sequences, interspaced, between, the, 'Gata1', hematopoietic, enhancer, and, the, double, 'GATA-motif', were, able, to]), verbo([recruit]), complemento(['DNA', methyltransferase, 1, ',', thereby, exerting, a, 'cis-repressive', function, in, the, 'HSC-like', cell, line])].
[sujeto(['These', results, indicate, that, the, 3.2, -, kb, interspacing, sequences, inactivate, 'Gata1', by]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento(['DNA-methylation', in, the, 'HSCs'])].
[sujeto(['The', intense, physiologic, demand, to, generate, vast, numbers, of, red, blood, cells]), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, establishment, of, a, complex, genetic, network, by, the, master, regulatory, transcription, factor, 'GATA-1', and, its, coregulators])].
[sujeto(['In', addition, to, the, crucial, 'GATA-1', coregulator, 'Friend', of, 'GATA-1', '(', 'FOG-1),', a, component, of, the, 'Mediator', 'complex,', 'Med1,', facilitates, 'GATA-1-dependent', transcription, at, select]), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, and, controls, erythropoiesis])].
[sujeto(['It', is, not, known, to, what, extent, 'Med1', contributes, to, 'GATA-1', function, or, whether, 'Med1', controls, a, large, or, restricted, cohort, of, genes, that, are, not]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'GATA-1'])].
[sujeto(['Using', a, genetic, complementation, assay, in, 'GATA-1-null', erythroid, 'cells,', we, demonstrate, that, 'Med1', and, another, 'Mediator', 'component,', 'Med25,']), verbo([regulate]), complemento([a, restricted, cohort, of, genes, that, are, predominantly, not, controlled, by, 'GATA-1'])].
[sujeto(['Most', of, these, genes, were, not]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'Med1', in, fibroblasts])].
[sujeto(['Loss-of-function', analyses, with, 'GATA-1-independent', 'Med1']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, indicate, that, 'Rrad,', which, encodes, a, small, 'GTPase', induced, during, human, 'erythropoiesis,', conferred, erythroid, cell, survival])].
[sujeto(['Notch', signaling]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, linked, to, impaired, erythropoietic, and, megakaryopoietic, development, of, 'CD34+', progenitor, 'cells,', but, its, role, in, 'MDS', is, unclear])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([analyzed, the, transcriptional, activity, of, 'Notch', pathway, elements, and, its, association, with, the, key, erythroid, factor, globin, transcription, factor, 1, '(', 'GATA1)', and, the, apoptosis, regulatory, gene, 'B-cell', 'lymphoma-xl', '(', 'BCLxl)', in, 'MDS'])].
[sujeto(['The', methylation, of, 'GATA1', erythroid, promoter, 'CpG', dinucleotides, flanking, 'cis-regulatory', 'elements,', including, an, 'N-box', suppressor]), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, for, 'HES1', and, a, 'GATA-box', binding, 'site,', was, examined, in, normal, and, 'MDS', erythropoiesis])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([generated, a, kinetic, in, vitro, model, of, 'MDS', erythropoiesis, using, 'CD34+', bone, marrow, cells, from, healthy, donors, '(', n, =, 7, ')', and, patients, with, 'MDS', '(', low, 'risk:', 'RA/n', =, 6, ',', 'RARS/n', =, 3, ;, high, 'risk:', 'RAEB/n', =, 4, ',', 'RAEB-T/n', =, 2, ')'])].
[sujeto(['For', the, 'Notch', pathway, 'elements,', no, conclusive, expression, differences, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([between, 'MDS', and, normal, erythropoiesis])].
[sujeto(['But', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([steadily, 'up-regulated', 'RNA', expression, of, 'GATA1', and, of, 'BCLxl', during, late, normal, erythropoietic, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', during, 'MDS,', erythropoiesis, a]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, typical, 'up-regulation', of, 'GATA1', and, 'BCLxl', was, observed])].
[sujeto(['Hypermethylation', of, 'CpG', dinucleotides, flanking, the, repressor, 'HES1']), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, within, the, 5, '\'', region, of, 'GATA1', was, detected, particularly, during, late, 'MDS', erythropoiesis])].
[sujeto(['The', higher, residual, 5, '\'', -, 'GATA1', methylation, values, in, 'MDS', erythropoiesis, but, decremental]), verbo([loss]), complemento([thereof, in, normal, erythropoiesis, suggest, a, gene, dose, effect, for, 'GATA1', during, erythropoiesis, being, finely, tuned, by, 'CpG', methylation])].
[sujeto(['Using', knockdowns, with, morpholinos, and, cell, sorting, analysis, in, transgenic, zebrafish, 'embryos,', we, show, that, 'GATA-1', directly]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'Mfrn1'])].
[sujeto(['Mutagenesis', of, individual, 'GATA-1']), verbo([binding]), complemento([cis, elements, '(', 'GBE)', demonstrated, that, at, least, two, of, the, three, 'GBE', within, this, 'CRM', are, functionally, required, for, 'GATA-mediated', transcription, of, 'Mfrn1'])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([new, insights, into, the, genetic, regulation, of, mitochondrial, function, and, iron, homeostasis, 'and,', more, 'generally,', illustrate, the, utility, of, 'genome-wide', 'ChIP', analysis, combined, with, zebrafish, transgenesis, for, identifying, 'long-range', transcriptional, enhancers, that, regulate, tissue, development])].
[sujeto(['Developmental', control, mechanisms, often, use, multimeric, complexes, containing, transcription, 'factors,', 'coregulators,', and, additional, 'non-DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([components])].
[sujeto(['We', analyzed, the, function, of, components, of, a, complex, containing, master, regulators, of, hematopoiesis, '(', 'GATA-1', and, 'Scl/TAL1)', and, the, 'non-DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([components, 'ETO2,', the, 'LIM', domain, protein, 'LMO2,', and, the, chromatin, looping, factor, 'LDB1'])].
[sujeto(['Surprisingly,', we, discovered, that, 'ETO2', and, 'LMO2']), verbo([regulate]), complemento([distinct, 'target-gene', ensembles, in, erythroid, cells])].
[sujeto(['ETO2', commonly, repressed, 'GATA-1', function, via]), verbo([suppressing]), complemento([histone, 'H3', 'acetylation,', although, it, also, regulated, methylation, of, histone, 'H3', at, lysine, 27, at, select, loci])].
[sujeto(['Prior', studies, defined, multiple, modes, by, which, 'GATA-1']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([target, genes, with, or, without, the, coregulator, 'Friend', of, 'GATA-1', '(', 'FOG-1)'])].
[sujeto(['As', 'LMO2', controls, 'hematopoiesis,', its, dysregulation, is, 'leukemogenic,', and, its, influence, on, 'GATA', factor, function, is, 'unknown,', this, mechanistic, link]), verbo([has]), complemento([important, biological, and, pathophysiological, implications])].
[sujeto(['The', demonstration, that, 'ETO2', and, 'LMO2', exert, qualitatively, distinct, functions, at, endogenous, loci, illustrates, how, components, of, complexes, containing, master, developmental, regulators, can, impart, the, capacity, to]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([unique, cohorts, of, target, 'genes,', thereby, diversifying, complex, function])].
[sujeto(['Suppression', of, programmed, cell, death, is, also, thought, to, be, critical, for, this, 'process;', 'however,', the, link, between, these, two, features, of, erythropoiesis]), verbo([has]), complemento([remained, elusive])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, the, 'POZ-Krüppel', family, transcription, 'factor,', 'LRF', '(', also, known, as, 'Zbtb7a/Pokemon),', is, a, direct]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, 'GATA1', and, plays, an, essential, antiapoptotic, role, during, terminal, erythroid, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, loss, of, 'Lrf', leads, to, lethal, anemia, in, 'embryos,', due, to, increased, apoptosis, of, 'late-stage', erythroblasts])].
[sujeto(['This', programmed, cell, death, is, 'Arf', and, p53, independent, and, is, instead]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, upregulation, of, the, proapoptotic, factor, 'Bim'])].
[sujeto(['In', strong, support, of, this, 'mechanism,', genetic, 'Bim']), verbo([loss]), complemento([delays, the, lethality, of, 'Lrf-deficient', embryos, and, rescues, their, anemia, phenotype])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', our, data, define, a, key, transcriptional, cascade, for, effective, 'erythropoiesis,', whereby, 'GATA-1']), verbo([suppresses]), complemento(['BIM-mediated', apoptosis, via, 'LRF'])].
[sujeto([1]), verbo([bind]), complemento([each, other, on, 'DNA', to, block, transcriptional, programs, of, undesired, lineage, during, hematopoietic, commitment])].
[sujeto([1, are, blocked, at, the, blast, stage, but]), verbo([respond]), complemento([to, molecular, removal, '(', 'downregulation)', of, 'PU'])].
[sujeto([1, or, addition, '(', 'upregulation)', of, 'GATA-1', by]), verbo([inducing]), complemento([terminal, erythroid, differentiation])].
[sujeto([1, in, 'MEL', 'cells,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([conditionally, activated, a, transgenic, 'PU'])].
[sujeto([1, -, dependent, transcriptome, negatively]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'GATA-1', in, 'MEL', 'cells,', including, 'CCAAT/enhancer', binding, protein, alpha, '(', 'Cebpa)', and, 'core-binding', 'factor,', beta, subunit, '(', 'Cbfb),', which, encode, two, key, hematopoietic, transcription, factors])].
[sujeto([1]), verbo([target]), complemento([genes])].
[sujeto([1, and, 'GATA-1']), verbo([involves]), complemento([quantitative, increases, in, a, transcriptionally, active, chromatin, 'mark:', acetylation, of, histone, 'H3K9'])].
[sujeto([1, or, inhibition, of, 'GATA-1', efficiently, reverses, the, transcriptional, block, imposed, by, 'GATA-1', and]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, the, activation, of, a, myeloid, transcriptional, program, directed, by, 'PU'])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([protein, 'FOG-1', binds, transcription, factor, 'GATA-1', to, facilitate, erythroid, and, megakaryocytic, maturation])].
[sujeto(['However,', little, is, known, about, the, function, of, 'FOG-1', during, myeloid, and, lymphoid, development, or, how, 'FOG-1', expression, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([in, any, tissue])].
[sujeto(['Zebrafish', 'FOG-1', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, early, hematopoietic, 'cells,', as, well, as, 'heart,', 'viscera,', and, paraspinal, 'neurons,', suggesting, that, it, has, multifaceted, functions, in, organogenesis])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'FOG-1', is, dispensable, for, endoderm, specification, but, is, required, for, endoderm, patterning, affecting, the, expression, of, 'late-stage', 'T-cell', 'markers,', independent, of, 'GATA-1'])].
[sujeto(['The', suppression, of, 'FOG-1,', in, the, presence, of, normal, 'GATA-1', 'levels,']), verbo([induces]), complemento([severe, anemia, and, thrombocytopenia, and, expands, 'myeloid-progenitor', 'cells,', indicating, that, 'FOG-1', is, required, during, 'erythroid/myeloid', commitment])].
[sujeto(['To', functionally, interrogate, whether, 'GATA-1']), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['FOG-1', in, 'vivo,', we, used, bioinformatics, combined, with, transgenic, assays])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, importance, of, the, 'GC-rich', region, adjacent, to, the, 3, '\'', -, end, of, this, 'GATA', site]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, also, suggested])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, show, that, this, 'GC-rich', region, contains, five, contiguous, deoxyguanosine, residues, '(', 'G(5)', 'string)', that, are]), verbo([bound]), complemento([by, multiple, nuclear, proteins])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', deletion, of, one, deoxyguanosine, residue, from, the, 'G(5)', string, '(', 'G(4)', 'mutant)', specifically, eliminates]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'ZBP-89,', a, 'Krüppel-like', transcription, 'factor,', but, not, to, 'Sp3', and, other, binding, factors])].
[sujeto(['Gel', mobility, shift, assays, and, 'DNA', affinity, precipitation, assays]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, binding, of, 'ZBP-89', to, this, region, is, reduced, in, the, absence, of, 'GATA-1', binding, to, the, 'G1HE'])].
[sujeto(['Luciferase', reporter, assays, demonstrate, that, 'ZBP-89']), verbo([activates]), complemento([the, 'Gata1', enhancer, depending, on, the, 'G(5)', string, sequence])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', transgenic, mouse, studies]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, the, 'G(4)', mutation, significantly, reduced, the, reporter, activity, of, the, 'Gata1', hematopoietic, regulatory, domain, encompassing, an, 8.5, -, kbp, region, of, the, 'Gata1', gene])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([compelling, evidence, that, the, 'G(5)', string, is, necessary, for, 'Gata1', gene, expression, in, vivo, and, 'ZBP-89', is, the, functional, 'trans-acting', factor, for, this, 'cis-acting', region])].
[sujeto(['One', such, signaling, pathway]), verbo([involves]), complemento(['RUNX1,', a, transcription, factor, upregulated, in, megakaryocytes, and, downregulated, in, erythroid, cells])].
[sujeto(['We', develop, a, computational, model, for, the, hematopoietic, 'erythroid-myeloid', lineage, 'decision,', which, is, determined, by, a, genetic, switch]), verbo([involving]), complemento([the, genes, 'PU'])].
[sujeto(['We', therefore]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, new, mechanism, involving, a, cofactor, that, is, regulated, as, well, as, recruited, by, one, of, the, master, genes, to, bind, to, the, antagonistic, partner, that, is, necessary, for, bistability, and, hence, 'switch-like', behavior])].
[sujeto(['An', interesting, fallout, from, this, architecture, is, that, suppression, of, the, cofactor, through, external, means, can]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, a, loss, of, 'cooperativity,', and, hence, to, a, primed, state, for, 'PU'])].
[sujeto([1, -, 'GATA-1', switch, also]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, another, mutually, antagonistic, 'pair,', 'C/EBPalpha-FOG-1'])].
[sujeto(['The', latter, pair, inherits, the, state, of, its, upstream, master, genes, and, further, reinforces, the, decision, due, to, several, feedback, 'loops,', thereby]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, irreversible, commitment])].
[sujeto(['The', genetic, 'switch,', which, handles, the, 'erythroid-myeloid', lineage, 'decision,', is, an, example, of, a, network, that, implements, both, a, primed, and, a, committed, state, by]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([cooperativity, through, recruitment, of, cofactors])].
[sujeto(['Perturbing', the, feedback, between, the, master, regulators, and, downstream]), verbo([targets]), complemento([suggests, potential, reprogramming, strategies])].
[sujeto(['Chromatin', from, different, regions, of, the, genome, frequently, forms, steady, associations, that, play, important, roles, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['Using', 'QACT,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([analyzed, the, chromatin, conformation, of, the, mouse, 'alpha-globin', gene, cluster, and, proved, the, extensive, interaction, between, 'HS26', and, 'alpha-globin', genes])].

[sujeto(['Autophagy', is, a, process, that]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, the, degradation, of, unnecessary, or, dysfunctional, cellular, components, and, 'long-lived', protein, aggregates])].

[sujeto(['The', establishment, and, maintenance, of, cell, 'type-specific', transcriptional, programs]), verbo([require]), complemento([an, ensemble, of, broadly, expressed, chromatin, remodeling, and, modifying, enzymes])].

[sujeto([1, gene]), verbo([targets]), complemento([in, mouse, and, human, erythroid, 'cells,', with, 'GATA1', binding, showing, an, association, with, higher, ribosomal, protein, gene, expression, levels, during, terminal, erythroid, differentiation, in, human, and, mouse])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'RP', gene, expression, and, hence, balanced, ribosome, biosynthesis, may, be, specifically, and, selectively, regulated, by, lineage, specific, transcription, factors, during, 'hematopoiesis,', a, finding, which, may, be, clinically, relevant, to, ribosomopathies])].
[sujeto(['The', spleen, from, 'PMF', patients, contains]), verbo([increased]), complemento([numbers, of, hematopoietic, stem, cells, '(', 'HSC)', and, megakaryocytes])].

[sujeto(['This', hypothesis, was, tested, by, deleting, the, 'P-sel', gene, in, the, myelofibrosis, mouse, model, carrying, the, hypomorphic, 'Gata1(low)', mutation, that]), verbo([induces]), complemento([megakaryocyte, abnormalities, that, recapitulate, those, observed, in, 'PMF'])].

[sujeto(['In', this, 'system,', 'SetD8']), verbo([promoted]), complemento([erythroblast, maturation, and, 'survival,', and, this, did, not, involve, upregulation, of, the, established, regulator, of, erythroblast, survival, 'Bcl-x(L)'])].

[sujeto(['The', unremitting, demand, to, replenish, differentiated, cells, in, tissues]), verbo([requires]), complemento([efficient, mechanisms, to, generate, and, regulate, stem, and, progenitor, cells])].
[sujeto(['Although', master, regulatory, transcription, 'factors,', including, 'GATA']), verbo([binding]), complemento(['protein-2', '(', 'GATA-2),', have, crucial, roles, in, these, 'mechanisms,', how, such, factors, are, controlled, in, developmentally, dynamic, systems, is, poorly, understood])].
[sujeto(['Previously,', we, described, five, dispersed, 'Gata2', locus, 'sequences,', termed, the, -, 77, ',', -, 3.9, ',', -, 2.8, ',', -, 1.8, ',', and, +, 9.5, 'GATA', switch, 'sites,', which, contain, evolutionarily]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['GATA', motifs, occupied, by, 'GATA-2', and, 'GATA-1', in, hematopoietic, precursors, and, erythroid, 'cells,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['Despite', common, attributes, of, transcriptional, 'enhancers,']), verbo([targeted]), complemento([deletions, of, the, -, 2.8, ',', -, 1.8, ',', and, +, 9.5, sites, revealed, distinct, and, unpredictable, contributions, to, 'Gata2', expression, and, hematopoiesis])].

[sujeto(['We', established, a, 'Gata2', 'repression/reactivation', 'assay,', which, revealed, unique, +, 9.5, site, activity, to]), verbo([mediate]), complemento(['GATA', 'factor-dependent', chromatin, structural, transitions])].
[sujeto(['Loss-of-function', analyses]), verbo([provided]), complemento([evidence, for, a, mechanism, in, which, a, mediator, of, 'long-range', transcriptional, control, '[', 'LIM', domain, binding, 1, '(', 'LDB1)]', and, a, chromatin, remodeler, '[', 'Brahma', related, gene, 1, '(', 'BRG1)]', synergize, through, the, +, 9.5, 'site,', conferring, expression, of, 'GATA-2,', which, is, known, to, promote, the, genesis, and, survival, of, hematopoietic, stem, cells])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, demonstrate, on, a, genome, wide, scale, that, the, hematopoietic, 'GATA', factors, 'GATA-1', and, 'GATA-2']), verbo([bind]), complemento([overlapping, sets, of, 'genes,', often, at, distinct, 'sites,', as, a, means, to, differentially, regulate, target, gene, expression, and, to, regulate, the, balance, between, proliferation, and, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, the, 'GATA', 'switch,', which, entails, a, chromatin, occupancy, exchange, between, 'GATA2', and, 'GATA1', in, the, course, of, 'differentiation,', operates, on, more, than, 'one-third', of, 'GATA1', bound, genes])].
[sujeto(['The', switch, is, equally, likely, to]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, transcriptional, activation, or, 'repression;', and, in, 'general,', 'GATA1', and, 'GATA2', act, oppositely, on, switch, target, genes])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', by, comparing, 'GATA1', occupancy, in, erythroid, cells, and, 'megakaryocytes,', we]), verbo([find]), complemento([that, the, presence, of, 'ETS', factor, motifs, is, a, major, discriminator, of, megakaryocyte, versus, red, cell, specification])].
[sujeto(['The', transcription, factor, 'GATA1']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([multiple, genes, in, erythroid, lineage, cells])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, means, by, which, 'GATA1']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, expression, of, target, genes, during, erythropoiesis, remains, to, be, elucidated])].
[sujeto(['Three', mechanisms]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, postulated, for, the, regulation, of, genes, by, 'GATA1'])].
[sujeto(['First,', individual]), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, may, have, multiple, discrete, thresholds, for, cellular, 'GATA1'])].
[sujeto(['GATA1']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, dynamic, expression, profile, during, 'erythropoiesis,', thus, the, expression, of, a, set, of, 'GATA1', target, genes, may, be, triggered, at, a, given, stage, of, differentiation, by, cellular, 'GATA1'])].
[sujeto(['Second,', the, expression, of, 'GATA1']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, may, be, 'modified,', at, least, in, 'part,', by, 'GATA2', occupying, the, 'GATA-binding', motifs])].
[sujeto(['GATA2', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([earlier, in, erythropoiesis, than, 'GATA1,', and, prior, 'GATA2', binding, may, afford, 'GATA1', access, to, 'GATA', motifs, through, epigenetic, remodeling, and, thus, facilitate, target, gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['Third,', other, regulatory, molecules, specific, to, each]), verbo([target]), complemento([gene, may, function, cooperatively, with, 'GATA1'])].
[sujeto(['If', 'GATA1', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, expression, of, such, 'cofactors,', a, regulatory, network, will, be, formed, and, relevant, gene, expression, will, be, delayed])].
[sujeto(['Efforts']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, made, to, understand, how, erythroid, differentiation, is, 'regulated,', and, recent, discoveries, have, clarified, that, 'lineage-specific', transcription, factor, networks, are, essential, for, proper, differentiation, of, erythroid, cells])].
[sujeto(['The', transcription, factors, 'GATA1', and, 'GATA2', are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, such, networks, that, regulate, erythroid, gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['Gata1', and, 'Gata2', genes, are]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, multiple, transcription, 'factors,', including, their, own, products, 'GATA1', and, 'GATA2'])].
[sujeto(['GATA1', and, 'GATA2']), verbo([recognize]), complemento([specific, regulatory, 'GATA', 'motifs,', and, their, expression, levels, change, dynamically, during, erythroid, 'differentiation,', leading, to, diversified, gene, expression, during, erythropoiesis])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, in, transgenic, mouse, analyses, that, 'cis-acting', 'GATA', binding, motifs, are, critical, for, the, expression, of, 'Gata1', and, 'Gata2', genes])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', expression, of, 'Gata1', and, 'Gata2', genes, along, with, a, set, of, erythroid, genes, appeared, to, be]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'GATA', factor, switching])].
[sujeto(['Recent', discoveries]), verbo([have]), complemento([divulged, the, 'GATA', factors, as, central, to, the, genetic, control, of, hematopoiesis])].
[sujeto(['An', advanced, experimental, genetic, approach]), verbo([has]), complemento([provided, evidence, that, abnormalities, in, this, network, may, result, in, a, variety, of, blood, disorders])].
[sujeto(['The', most, striking, new]), verbo([finding]), complemento([is, the, novel, pathogenesis, arising, from, 'GATA-1', dysfunction, that, leads, to, leukemia])].
[sujeto(['HEL', 'cells,', a, human, erythroleukemia, cell, 'line,']), verbo([expressing]), complemento([mainly, the, 'gamma-globin', 'genes,', small, amount, of, 'epsilon-globin', 'gene,', but, not, 'beta-globin', gene])].
[sujeto(['Our', previous, studies, demonstrated, that, 'beta-globin', gene, could, be]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'HEL', cells, induced, by, hydroxyurea])].
[sujeto(['Here', the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([patterns, of, 'GATA', factors, '(', 'GATA-1', and, 'GATA-2)', to, the, regulatory, elements, of, human, 'beta-globin', gene, were, examined, with, the, nuclear, extracts, from, 'hydroxyurea-induced', and, uninduced, 'HEL', cells])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, showed, in, 'EMSA', assay, that, 'GATA', factors, could]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, the, core, sequence, of, 'HS2(-10681', to, -, 10971, 'bp),', the, 3, '\'', flanking, sequence, of, 'HS2', 'core(-10323', to, -, 10680, 'bp)', and, the, promoter, of, human, 'beta-globin', 'gene(+20', to, -, 112, 'bp)'])].
[sujeto(['However,', the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([patterns, between, 'hydroxyurea-induced', and, uninduced, 'HEL', cells, were, different])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', by, using, 'Western-blot', 'analysis,', our, data, showed, that, the, amount, of, 'GATA-2', was]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([in, 'hydroxyurea-induced', 'HEL', cells])].
[sujeto(['In', contrast, to, 'GATA-2,', the, amount, of, 'GATA-1', was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, 'hydroxyurea-induced', 'HEL', cells])].
[sujeto(['GATA-1', may]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento([the, differentiation, of, 'HEL', 'cells,', while, 'GATA-2', can, probably, inhibit, the, differentiation, of, 'HEL', cells])].
[sujeto(['Both', 'GATA-1', and, 'GATA-2', are]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([in, a, 'cell-type-specific', 'manner,', their, expression, being, strictly, controlled, during, the, development, and, differentiation, of, erythroid, cells])].
[sujeto(['Closer', examination, revealed, a, 'cross-regulatory', mechanism, by, which, 'GATA-1', can, control, the, expression, of, 'GATA-2', and, vice, 'versa,', possibly, via, essential, 'GATA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, in, their, 'cis-acting', elements])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', recent, studies, identified, several, human, inherited, hematopoietic, disorders, that, are]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutations, in, 'cis-acting', 'GATA', binding, motifs, or, mutations, in, 'GATA-1', itself])].
[sujeto(['HEL', 'cells,', a, human, erythroleukemia, cell, 'line,', mainly]), verbo([express]), complemento([the, fetal, '(', 'gamma)', globin, gene, and, trace, amount, of, the, embryonic, '(', 'epsilon)', globin, 'gene,', but, not, adult, '(', 'beta)', globin, gene])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, hydroxyurea, '(', 'HU)', can]), verbo([induce]), complemento(['HEL', cells, to, express, adult, '(', 'beta)', globin, gene, and, lead, these, cells, to, terminal, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['Results', showed, in, 'Gel', mobility, shift, assays, that, 'GATA', factors, could, specifically]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, the, regulatory, elements, of, human, 'beta-globin', 'gene,', including, the, proximal, regulatory, element, '(', the, 'beta-promoter)', and, the, distal, regulatory, elements, '(', the, 'DNase', 'I', hypersensitive, sites, in, the, 'LCR,', 'HS2-HS4', core, 'sequences)'])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([patterns, of, 'GATA', factors, were, quite, different, between, 'HU-induced', and, uninduced, 'HEL', cells])].
[sujeto(['Western-blot', analysis, of]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([extracts, from, both, the, uninduced, and, 'HU-induced', 'HEL', cells, revealed, that, the, level, of, 'GATA-2', transcription, factor, 'decreased,', whereas, the, level, of, 'GATA-1', transcription, factor, increased, following, the, time, of, hydroxyurea, induction])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', using, 'RT-PCR', analysis, the, expression, of, human, 'beta-globin', gene, in, 'HU-induced', 'HEL', cells, could, be, blocked, again, when, 'HEL', cells, were, incubated, in, the, presence, of, antisense, oligonucleotides, for, 'hGATA-1,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, the, upregulation, of, 'hGATA-1', transcription, factor, might, be, critical, for, the, expression, of, human, 'beta-globin', gene, in, 'HU-induced', 'HEL', cells])].
[sujeto(['GATA-1', and, 'GATA-2', transcription, factors, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, effective, hematopoiesis])].
[sujeto(['Absence', of, 'GATA-2']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, defective, hematopoiesis, and, an, embryonic, lethal, phenotype])].
[sujeto(['Disruption', of, 'GATA-1', results, in, a, compensatory]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'GATA-2', in, early, erythroid, cells, and, incomplete, erythropoiesis, with, embryos, dying, at, 11.5, days])].
[sujeto(['Stable', 'K562', cell, lines]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([various, levels, of, 'GATA-2', were, generated, using, a, 'GATA-2', expression, plasmid])].
[sujeto(['Cytospin', 'smears,', growth, curve, 'analysis,', 'PCR,', and, flow, cytometry, were, used, to, examine, the, effects, of]), verbo([increased]), complemento([levels, of, 'GATA-2', in, altering, cell, phenotype, and, activation, of, megakaryocytic, markers])].
[sujeto(['K562/GATA-2', cell, lines]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([high, levels, of, 'GATA-2', mRNA, showed, a, marked, decrease, in, proliferation, and, a, shift, in, phenotype, toward, the, megakaryocyte, lineage])].
[sujeto(['In', primary, human, adult, erythroid, cultures, transfected, with, a, 'GATA-2', expression, 'vector,', production, of, total, hemoglobin, and, cell, proliferation]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['GATA-2', plays, an, important, role, in, deciding, cell, lineage, throughout, 'hematopoiesis,', and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, 'GATA-2', determines, megakaryocytic, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['Downregulation', of, 'GATA-2', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, erythroid, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['The', production, of, red, blood, cells, follows, the, sequential, formation, of, proerythroblasts, and, 'basophilic,', polychromatophilic, and, orthochromatic, 'erythroblasts,', and, is]), verbo([promoted]), complemento([by, the, hormone, erythropoietin, '(', 'Epo)', in, response, to, tissue, hypoxia])].
[sujeto(['Death', receptors, are, a, family, of, surface, molecules, that]), verbo([trigger]), complemento([caspase, activation, and, apoptosis, in, a, variety, of, cell, types])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, immature, erythroid, cells]), verbo([express]), complemento([several, death, receptors, whose, ligands, are, produced, by, mature, erythroblasts])].
[sujeto(['Expression', of, a, 'caspase-resistant', 'GATA-1', 'mutant,', but, not, of, the, 'wild-type', 'gene,', completely, restored, erythroid, expansion, and, differentiation, following, the]), verbo([triggering]), complemento([of, death, 'receptors,', indicating, that, there, is, regulatory, feedback, between, mature, and, immature, erythroblasts, through, 'caspase-mediated', cleavage, of, 'GATA-1'])].
[sujeto(['Similarly,', erythropoiesis, blockade, following, 'Epo', deprivation, was, largely]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([by, the, expression, of, 'caspase-inhibitory', proteins, or, 'caspase-resistant', 'GATA-1', in, erythroid, progenitors])].
[sujeto(['In', vitro, studies, on, hematopoietic, control, mechanisms]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, hampered, by, the, heterogeneity, of, the, analyzed, cell, 'populations,', 'ie,', lack, of, lineage, specificity, and, developmental, stage, homogeneity, of, 'progenitor/precursor', cells, growing, in, culture])].
[sujeto(['In', the, culture, system]), verbo([reported]), complemento(['here,', '(', 1, ')', the, growth, factor, '(', 'GF)', stimulus, induces, cord, blood, '(', 'CB)', progenitor, cells, to, proliferate, and, 'differentiate/mature', exclusively, along, the, erythroid, 'lineage;', '(', 2, ')', this, erythropoietic, wave, is, characterized, by, less, than, 4, '%', apoptotic, 'cells;', '(', 3, ')', asymmetric, divisions, are, virtually, 'absent,', 'ie,', nonresponsive, hematopoietic, progenitors, with, no, erythropoietic, potential, are, forced, into, 'apoptosis;', '(', 4, ')', the, system, is, cell, division, controlled, '(', 'cdc),', 'ie,', the, number, of, divisions, performed, by, each, cell, is, monitored])].
[sujeto(['Freshly', isolated, 'CD34(+)', cells]), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['CD34,', 'c-kit,', 'PU'])].
[sujeto([1, ',', and, 'GATA-2', but, did, not]), verbo([express]), complemento(['CD36,', erythropoietin, receptor, '(', 'EpoR),', 'SCL/Tal1,', 'EKLF,', 'NF-E2,', 'GATA-1,', or, glyocophorin, 'A', '(', 'GPA)'])].
[sujeto(['Granule', major, basic, protein, '(', 'MBP)', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([exclusively, in, 'eosinophils,', 'basophils,', and, placental, trophoblasts])].
[sujeto(['To', identify, the, 'cis-elements', and, transcription, factors]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, regulating, 'MBP', 'expression,', we, subcloned, 3.2, kb, of, sequence, upstream, of, the, exon, 9, transcriptional, start, site, '(', 'P2', 'promoter)', and, serial, 5, '\'', deletions, into, the, pXP2, luciferase, reporter, vector])].
[sujeto(['To', identify, transcription, factors, that]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, and, transactivate, through, the, bp, -, 117, to, -, 67, 'region,', we, first, compared, the, upstream, genomic, sequences, of, human, and, murine, 'MBP;', a, potential, 'GATA', binding, consensus, site, was, conserved, in, the, 50, -, bp, region, between, the, two, genes])].
[sujeto(['To', determine, which, 'GATA', proteins]), verbo([bind]), complemento([this, consensus, 'site,', we, performed, electrophoretic, mobility, shift, assays, '(', 'EMSAs),', which, showed, that, both, 'GATA-1', and, 'GATA-2', can, bind, to, this, consensus, site])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', combined, cotransfection, of, 'GATA-1', and, 'GATA-2']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, ability, of, 'GATA-1', to, transactivate, the, 'MBP', promoter, by, approximately, 50, '%'])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([the, first, evidence, for, a, 'GATA-1', target, gene, in, 'eosinophils,', a, negative, regulatory, role, for, 'GATA-2', in, 'MBP', 'expression,', and, possibly, eosinophil, gene, transcription, in, general, during, myelopoiesis])].
[sujeto(['These', two, processes, are, genetically]), verbo([regulated]), complemento(['and,', in, this, 'paper,', 'I', review, the, expression, and, function, of, the, 'GATA', family, of, transcription, factors, as, an, example, of, this, genetic, regulation])].
[sujeto(['GATA', 'cis-acting', elements, are]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, most, of, the, regulatory, regions, of, 'T-lymphoid,', erythrocytic, and, megakaryocytic, restricted, genes])].
[sujeto(['These', 'GATA', motifs, are]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([by, the, members, of, a, family, of, transcriptional, 'regulators:', the, 'GATA', family])].
[sujeto(['Three', members, of, this, 'family,', 'GATA-1,', 2, and, 3, are]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, hematopoietic, cells])].
[sujeto(['One', seemingly, contradictory, aspect, of, 'GATA-1', function, is, 'that,', while, it, is, abundant, in, erythroid, progenitor, cells, prior, to, the, onset, of, overt, 'differentiation,', it, does, not, significantly]), verbo([activate]), complemento([known, 'GATA-1', target, genes, in, those, cells])].
[sujeto(['To', investigate, the, mechanisms, underlying, 'GATA-1', function, during, the, transition, from, early, to, late, 'erythropoiesis,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([examined, its, expression, and, activity, in, normal, avian, erythroid, progenitor, cells, before, and, after, induction, of, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['In', these, primary, progenitor, 'cells,', 'GATA-1', protein, was, predominantly, located, in, the, 'cytoplasm,', while, induction, of, differentiation]), verbo([caused]), complemento([its, rapid, relocalization, to, the, 'nucleus,', suggesting, that, nuclear, translocation, constitutes, an, important, regulatory, step, in, 'GATA-1', activation])].
[sujeto(['As', an, alternative, way, of, addressing, the, same, 'question,', we, also, ectopically]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([a, 'GATA-1/estrogen', receptor, fusion, protein, '(', 'GATA-1/ER)', in, red, blood, cell, 'progenitors,', where, nuclear, translocation, 'of,', and, transcriptional, activation, 'by,', this, hybrid, factor, are, conditionally, controlled, by, estrogen])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'hormone-activated', 'GATA-1/ER', protein, accelerated, red, blood, cell, 'differentiation,', and, concomitantly, suppressed, cell, proliferation])].
[sujeto(['These', phenotypic, effects, were, accompanied, by, a, simultaneous, suppression, of, 'c-myb', and, 'GATA-2', 'transcription,', two, genes, thought, to, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, proliferative, capacity, of, hematopoietic, progenitor, cells])].

[sujeto(['TPA']), verbo([induced]), complemento(['MC3', cells, to, differentiate, to, an, early, stage, of, megakaryocyte, lineage, exhibiting, an, increase, in, the, expression, of, platelet, glycoproteins, '(', 'GP)', 'IIb/IIIa', '(', 'CD41a),', and, an, increase, in, cell, size, and, nuclear, ploidy])].
[sujeto(['TPA', treatment, also]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'GPIIb', 'mRNA,', and, induced, the, expression, of, 'interleukin-6', '(', 'IL-6)', and, its, receptor, 'mRNAs,', while, it, did, not, induce, transcripts, of, the, genes, 'IL-11', and, mpl, 'ligand,', and, further, decreased, the, transcript, of, the, mpl, gene])].
[sujeto(['Consistent', with, these, 'findings,', 'MC3', cells, treated, with, 'TPA', showed, an]), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, 'GATA-1,', but, not, 'GATA-3', 'transcripts,', whereas, those, without, 'TPA', treatment, expressed, only, the, 'GATA-2', transcript])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([an, insight, into, the, study, for, the, regulatory, mechanism, of, megakaryocytopoiesis, and, leukemic, cell, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['The', purpose, of, this, study, was, to, examine, the, gene, expression, profile, of, granulocyte, colony]), verbo([stimulating]), complemento([factor, '(', 'G-CSF)-mobilized', peripheral, blood, '(', 'mPB)-derived', 'progenitors,', used, in, transplantation])].
[sujeto(['Regarding', 'G-CSF', stimulation, the, 'G-CSF', receptor, 'CSF2RB', '(', 1.1, -, 'fold)', was, linked, via, 'STAT3', to, 'erythroid-specific', 'ALAS2', '(', 2.9, -, 'fold)', and, 'GATA2', '(', 1.3, -, 'fold)', 'factors,', all, upregulated, in, 'mPB-derived', erythroid, 'progenitors,', coupled, to, common, upregulated, 'NUDC', gene]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, proliferation, of, erythroid, cells])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([report]), complemento([provides, an, extensive, transcriptional, profile, of, cultured, erythroid, progenitors, and, leads, to, a, better, understanding, of, diversity, among, the, progenitor, sources])].
[sujeto(['Primitive', erythropoiesis, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([in, a, non, 'cell-autonomous', fashion, across, evolution, from, frogs, to, mammals])].
[sujeto(['In', 'Xenopus', 'laevis,', signals, from, the, overlying, ectoderm, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([to, induce, the, mesoderm, to, adopt, an, erythroid, fate])].
[sujeto(['To', identify, 'GATA2']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, in, the, ectoderm, required, for, red, blood, cell, formation, in, the, 'mesoderm,', we, used, microarray, analysis, to, compare, gene, expression, in, ectoderm, from, 'GATA2', depleted, and, wild, type, embryos])].
[sujeto(['GATA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 2, '(', 'GATA2)', is, a, transcription, factor, that, has, essential, roles, in, hematologic, malignancies, and, progression, of, various, solid, tumors])].
[sujeto(['Our', previous, studies]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, high, 'GATA2', expression, is, associated, with, recurrence, of, colorectal, cancer, '(', 'CRC)'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, there, was, no, significant, correlation, between, the, rs2335052, genotypes, and, the, expression, of, 'GATA2'])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, 'Kaplan-Meier', survival, analysis]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, the, carriers, of, the, 'A-allele', of, 'SNP', rs2335052, were, significantly, associated, with, increased, risk, of, recurrence, and, reduced, 'disease-free', survival, '(', 'DFS),', compared, with, those, carrying, the, variant, genotype, of, 'GG', in, rs2335052, '(', 'P', =, 0.021, ')'])].
[sujeto(['The', majority, of, cases, with, severe, pulmonary, alveolar, proteinosis, '(', 'PAP)', are]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, 'auto-antibodies', against, 'GM-CSF'])].
[sujeto(['A', multitude, of, genetic, and, exogenous]), verbo([causes]), complemento([are, responsible, for, few, other, cases])].
[sujeto(['In', children, and, adults, with, severe, 'GM-CSF', negative, 'PAP', a, close, cooperation, between, pneumologists, and, 'hemato-oncologists', is, needed, to, diagnose, the, underlying, 'diseases,', some, of, which, are]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutations, of, transcription, factor, 'GATA2'])].
[sujeto(['Heterozygous', germline, mutations, in, the, zinc, finger, transcription, factor, 'GATA2']), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, been, shown, to, underlie, a, range, of, clinical, 'phenotypes,', including, 'Emberger', 'syndrome,', a, disorder, characterized, by, lymphedema, and, predisposition, to, myelodysplastic, 'syndrome/acute', myeloid, leukemia, '(', 'MDS/AML)'])].
[sujeto(['Despite', 'well-defined', roles, in, 'hematopoiesis,', the, functions, of, 'GATA2', in, the, lymphatic, vasculature, and, the, mechanisms, by, which, 'GATA2', mutations, result, in, lymphedema]), verbo([have]), complemento([not, been, characterized])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([provided, a, molecular, explanation, for, lymphedema, predisposition, in, a, subset, of, patients, with, germline, 'GATA2', mutations])].
[sujeto(['Specifically,', we, demonstrated, that, 'Emberger-associated', 'GATA2', missense, mutations, result, in, complete]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'GATA2', 'function,', with, respect, to, the, capacity, to, regulate, the, transcription, of, genes, that, are, important, for, lymphatic, vessel, valve, development])].
[sujeto(['We', identified, a, putative, enhancer, element, upstream, of, the, key, lymphatic, transcriptional, regulator, 'PROX1', that, is]), verbo([bound]), complemento([by, 'GATA2,', and, the, transcription, factors, 'FOXC2', and, 'NFATC1'])].
[sujeto(['Emberger', 'GATA2', missense, mutants, had, a, profoundly, reduced, capacity, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([this, element])].
[sujeto(['Conditional', 'Gata2', deletion, in, mice, revealed, that, 'GATA2', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, both, development, and, maintenance, of, lymphovenous, and, lymphatic, vessel, valves])].
[sujeto(['Fluid', shear, forces]), verbo([have]), complemento([established, roles, in, blood, vascular, development, and, 'function,', but, whether, such, forces, similarly, influence, the, 'low-flow', lymphatic, system, is, unknown])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, difficult, to, test, the, contribution, of, fluid, forces, in, vivo, because, mechanical, or, genetic, perturbations, that, alter, flow, often, have, direct, effects, on, vessel, growth])].
[sujeto(['Smooth', muscle, cell, coverage, '(', 'SMC', 'coverage)', of, 'CLEC2-deficient', lymphatic, vessels, was, both, premature, and, 'excessive,', a, phenotype, identical, to, that, observed, with]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, the, lymphatic, endothelial, transcription, factor, 'FOXC2'])].

[sujeto(['These', studies]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, lymph, flow, initiates, and, regulates, many, of, the, key, steps, in, collecting, lymphatic, vessel, maturation, and, development])].
[sujeto(['The', 'ETS', transcription, factor, 'ERG']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, as, a, major, regulator, of, both, normal, and, aberrant, hematopoiesis])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, 'FUS-ERG']), verbo([acts]), complemento([in, the, context, of, a, heptad, of, proteins, '(', 'ERG,', 'FLI1,', 'GATA2,', 'LYL1,', 'LMO2,', 'RUNX1', and, 'TAL1)', central, to, proper, expression, of, genes, involved, in, maintaining, a, stem, cell, hematopoietic, phenotype])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', in, 't(16;21)', 'FUS-ERG', 'co-occupies', genomic, regions]), verbo([bound]), complemento([by, the, nuclear, receptor, heterodimer, 'RXR:RARA', inhibiting, target, gene, expression, and, interfering, with, hematopoietic, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['Together,', the, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'FUS-ERG', acts, as, a, transcriptional, repressor, of, the, retinoic, acid, signaling, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Thousands', of, 'cis-elements', in, genomes, are, predicted, to]), verbo([have]), complemento([vital, functions])].
[sujeto(['Although', 'conservation,', activity, in, surrogate, 'assays,', 'polymorphisms,', and, disease, mutations]), verbo([provide]), complemento([functional, 'clues,', deletion, from, endogenous, loci, constitutes, the, 'gold-standard', test])].
[sujeto(['A', 'GATA-2-binding,', 'Gata2', intronic, 'cis-element', '(', +, 9.5, ')']), verbo([required]), complemento([for, hematopoietic, stem, cell, genesis, in, mice, is, mutated, in, a, human, immunodeficiency, syndrome])].
[sujeto(['Because', +, 9.5, is, the, only, 'cis-element', known, to]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([stem, cell, 'genesis,', we, devised, a, strategy, to, identify, functionally, comparable, enhancers, '(', &, 'quot;+9'])].

[sujeto(['Samd14']), verbo([increased]), complemento([hematopoietic, progenitor, 'levels/activity', and, promoted, signaling, by, a, pathway, vital, for, hematopoietic, 'stem/progenitor', cell, regulation, '(', stem, cell, 'factor/c-Kit),', and, 'c-Kit', rescued, 'Samd14', 'loss-of-function', phenotypes])].

[sujeto(['The', transcription, factor, 'GATA2', is, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, hematopoietic, stem, cells, and, is, downregulated, during, lineage, maturation])].

[sujeto(['The', intestinal, 'T', cells, in, 'BATF', 'KO', mice]), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['CCR9', and, α4β7, at, abnormally, low, levels, compared, with, their, 'wild-type', '(', 'WT)', 'counterparts,', and, 'BATF', 'KO', 'CD4(+)', 'T', cells, failed, to, 'up-regulate', the, expression, of, 'CCR9', and, α4β7, to, 'WT', levels, in, response, to, 'RA'])].
[sujeto(['Defective']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'RARα', and, histone, acetylation, at, the, regulatory, regions, of, the, 'CCR9', and, 'Itg-α4', genes, were, observed, in, 'BATF', 'KO', 'T', cells])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, establish, 'BATF', as, a, cellular, factor]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, normal, expression, of, 'CCR9', and, α4β7, and, for, the, homeostasis, and, effector, functions, of, 'T', cell, populations, in, the, intestine])].
[sujeto(['Checkpoints', that, limit, stem, cell, 'self-renewal', in, response, to, 'DNA', damage, can, contribute, to, cancer, protection, but, may, also]), verbo([promote]), complemento([tissue, aging])].
[sujeto(['DNA', damage]), verbo([induces]), complemento(['BATF', in, a, 'G-CSF/STAT3-dependent', manner, resulting, in, lymphoid, differentiation, of, 'HSCs'])].

[sujeto(['Recent', work]), verbo([has]), complemento([identified, a, new, subset, of, 'CD4(+)', 'T', cells, named, as, 'Tfh', cells, that, are, localized, in, germinal, centers, and, critical, in, germinal, center, formation])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, a, constitutively, active, form, of, 'STAT5', effectively, inhibited, 'Tfh', differentiation, by, suppressing, the, expression, of, 'Tfh-associated', factors, '(', 'CXC', 'motif)', receptor, 5, '(', 'CXCR5),', musculoaponeurotic, fibrosarcoma, '(', 'c-Maf),', 'Bcl6,', basic, leucine, zipper, transcription, factor, 'ATF-like', '(', 'Batf),', and, 'IL-21,', and, 'STAT5', deficiency, greatly, enhanced, 'Tfh', gene, expression])].

[sujeto(['The', study, of, exocytosis, protein, expression, showed, that, 'SL', 327, treatment]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, downregulation, of, 'vesicle-associated', membrane, protein, 2, and, synapsin, 'I,', and, accumulation, of, 'synaptosomal-associated', protein, 25, '(', 'SNAP-25)'])].
[sujeto(['The', obtained, data, indicate, that, the, inhibition, of, 'ERK1/2', blocks, seizure, behavior, presumably, by, altering, the, exocytosis, 'machinery,', and, identifies, 'ERK1/2', as, a, potential]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, the, development, of, new, strategies, for, seizure, treatment])].
[sujeto(['Extracellular', 'signal-regulated', kinases, 1, and, 2, '(', 'ERK1/2)', are, one, of, the, factors]), verbo([mediating]), complemento([seizure, development])].

[sujeto(['The', obtained, data, indicate, that, the, inhibition, of, 'ERK1/2', alters, neurotransmitter]), verbo([release]), complemento([by, changing, the, exocytosis, 'machinery,', thus, preventing, seizures])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, reported, that, 'acetyl-CoA', levels, alter, p300, histone, acetylation, in, a, 'site-specific', manner, in, vitro])].

[sujeto(['Here', we, demonstrate, that, the, bromodomain, of, 'CBP']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, histone, 'H3', acetylated, on, lysine, 56, '(', 'K56Ac)', with, higher, affinity, than, to, its, other, monoacetylated, binding, partners])].

[sujeto(['Interestingly,', 'Ac2PIM', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, activate, the, 'SRC-FAK-PYK2-CREB', cascade, via, 'TLR2', to, recruit, 'CBP/P300', at, the, promoters, of, 'miR-150', and, 'miR-143', and, epigenetically, induce, their, expression])].
[sujeto(['Loss-of-function', studies, utilizing, specific, miRNA, inhibitors, establish, that, 'Ac2PIM,', via, the, 'miRNAs,', abrogate, 'NOD2-induced', 'PI3K-PKCδ-MAPK', pathway, to]), verbo([suppress]), complemento(['β-CATENIN-mediated', expression, of, 'COX-2,', 'SOCS-3', and, 'MMP-9'])].
[sujeto(['Our', investigation]), verbo([has]), complemento([thus, underscored, the, negative, regulatory, role, of, 'Ac2PIM-TLR2', signaling, on, 'NOD2', pathway, which, could, broaden, our, understanding, on, vaccine, potential, or, adjuvant, utilities, of, 'Ac2PIM', 'and/or', 'MDP'])].
[sujeto(['The', progressive, neurodegenerative, disorder, 'Alzheimer\'s', disease, '(', 'AD)', manifests, as]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, cognitive, 'functions,', and, finally, leads, to, death, of, the, affected, individual])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Aβ42', plaques]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, disrupt, the, normal, cellular, processes, and, thereby, trigger, abnormal, signaling, which, results, in, the, death, of, neurons])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, 'molecular-genetic', 'mechanism(s)', responsible, for, 'Aβ42']), verbo([mediated]), complemento([neurodegeneration, is, yet, to, be, fully, understood])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([utilized, 'Gal4/UAS', system, to, develop, a, transgenic, fruit, fly, model, for, 'Aβ42', mediated, neurodegeneration])].
[sujeto(['Targeted', misexpression, of, human, 'Aβ42', in, the, differentiating, photoreceptor, neurons, of, the, developing, eye, of, transgenic, fly]), verbo([triggers]), complemento([neurodegeneration])].
[sujeto(['We', identified, a, histone, 'acetylase,', 'CREB', 'Binding', 'Protein', '(', 'CBP),', as, a, genetic, modifier, of, 'Aβ42']), verbo([mediated]), complemento([neurodegeneration])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'gain-of-function', of, 'CBP', rescues, 'Aβ42', mediated, neurodegeneration, by, blocking, cell, death])].
[sujeto(['Misexpression', of, 'Aβ42', affects, the]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([of, axons, from, retina, to, the, brain, but, misexpression, of, full, length, 'CBP', along, with, 'Aβ42', can, restore, this, defect])].
[sujeto(['The', 'CBP', protein]), verbo([has]), complemento([multiple, domains, and, is, known, to, interact, with, many, different, proteins])].
[sujeto(['Our', structure, function, analysis, using, truncated, constructs, lacking, one, or, more, domains, of, 'CBP', 'protein,', in, transgenic, flies, revealed, that, 'Bromo,', 'HAT', and, polyglutamine, '(', 'BHQ)', domains, together, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, neuroprotective, function, of, 'CBP'])].
[sujeto(['This', 'BHQ', domain, of, 'CBP']), verbo([has]), complemento([not, been, attributed, to, promote, survival, in, any, other, neurodegenerative, disorders])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, 'CBP', as, a, genetic, modifier, of, 'Aβ42', mediated, neurodegeneration])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, 'BHQ', domain, of, 'CBP', is, responsible, for, its, neuroprotective, function])].
[sujeto(['These', studies, may]), verbo([have]), complemento([significant, bearing, on, our, understanding, of, genetic, basis, of, 'AD'])].
[sujeto(['Green', anoles, are, seasonally, breeding, lizards, in, which, male, sexual, behavior, is, primarily]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, an, annual, increase, in, testosterone])].

[sujeto(['This', study, is, the, first, description, of, 'CREB']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'CBP)', in, the, reptilian, 'brain,', and, investigates, the, possibility, that, changes, in, 'CBP,', an, androgen, receptor, 'coactivator,', may, facilitate, differences, in, responsiveness, to, testosterone, across, seasons])].
[sujeto(['Similar', to, other, 'vertebrates,', 'CBP', was]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([at, relatively, high, levels, in, 'steroid-sensitive', brain, regions])].
[sujeto(['This', pattern]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, 'CBP', might, influence, 'female-biased', functions, controlled, by, the, ventromedial, 'amygdala,', but, is, not, consistent, with, a, role, in, mediating, seasonal, differences, in, responsiveness, to, testosterone, in, these, areas, associated, with, reproductive, function])].
[sujeto(['The', cyclic, 'AMP', response, 'element-binding', protein, '(', 'CREB)', is, a, 'signal-dependent', transcription, factor, that, exerts, its, positive, effects, on, gene, transcription, of, a, broad, range, of, genes, by]), verbo([recruiting]), complemento(['coactivators,', including, 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP),', its, 'paralog,', 'p300,', and, the, family, of, 'CRTC', '(', 'CREB-regulated', transcriptional, 'coactivators)', proteins])].

[sujeto(['Nuclear', 'factor-κB', '(', 'NF-κB)', is, an, inducible, transcription, factor, that]), verbo([mediates]), complemento([immune, and, inflammatory, responses])].

[sujeto(['Sec6', knockdown]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, expression, of, p90RSKs, and, the, phosphorylation, of, 'ERK', or, p90RSK1, at, 'Ser380', or, 'IκBα', at, 'Ser32'])].

[sujeto(['CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', and, p300, are, transcriptional, coactivators]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, numerous, biological, processes, that, affect, cell, 'growth,', 'transformation,', 'differentiation,', and, development])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, of, the, involvement, of, 'homeodomain-interacting', protein, kinase, 2, '(', 'HIPK2)', in, the, regulation, of, 'CBP', activity])].

[sujeto(['Intrinsically', disordered, proteins, '(', 'IDPs)', frequently, function, in, protein, interaction, networks, that]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([crucial, cellular, signaling, pathways])].
[sujeto(['Many', 'IDPs', undergo, transitions, from, disordered, conformational, ensembles, to, folded, structures, upon]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, their, cellular, targets])].
[sujeto(['Several', possible]), verbo([binding]), complemento([mechanisms, for, coupled, folding, and, binding, have, been, 'identified:', folding, of, the, 'IDP', after, association, with, the, target, '(', &, 'quot;induced', 'fit&quot;),', or, binding, of, a, prefolded, state, in, the, conformational, ensemble, of, the, 'IDP', to, the, target, protein, '(', &, 'quot;conformational', 'selection&quot;),', or, some, combination, of, these, two, extremes])].
[sujeto(['The', interaction, of, the, intrinsically, disordered, phosphorylated, 'kinase-inducible', domain, '(', 'pKID)', of, the, 'cAMP-response', element]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['(', 'CREB)', protein, with, the, 'KIX', domain, of, a, general, transcriptional, coactivator, 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', provides, an, example, of, the, 'induced-fit', mechanism])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, by, 'NMR', relaxation, dispersion, experiments, that, a, different, intrinsically, disordered, 'ligand,', the, transactivation, domain, of, the, transcription, factor, 'c-Myb,']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'KIX', at, the, same, site, as, pKID, but, via, a, different, binding, mechanism, that, involves, elements, of, conformational, selection, and, induced, fit])].
[sujeto(['In', contrast, to, 'pKID,', the, 'c-Myb', activation, domain]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, strong, propensity, for, spontaneous, helix, formation, in, its, 'N-terminal', 'region,', which, binds, to, 'KIX', in, a, predominantly, folded, conformation])].
[sujeto(['The', 'C-terminal', region, of, 'c-Myb', exhibits, a, much, smaller, helical, propensity, and, likely, folds, via, an, 'induced-fit', process, after]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'KIX'])].
[sujeto(['We', propose, that, the, intrinsic, secondary, structure, propensities, of, pKID, and, 'c-Myb', determine, their]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['mechanisms,', consistent, with, their, functions, as, inducible, and, constitutive, transcriptional, activators])].
[sujeto(['The', 'BCNT', '(', 'Bucentaur)', superfamily, is, classified, by, an, uncharacteristic]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([sequence, of, '∼80', amino, acids, '(', 'aa)', at, the, 'C-terminus,', 'BCNT-C', '(', the, conserved, 'C-terminal', region, of, 'Bcnt/Cfdp1)'])].

[sujeto(['Serotonin', '(', 5, -, 'HT)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, to, be, involved, in, cancer, progression, by, stimulating, angiogenesis, and, cell, growth])].
