[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 5, -, 'HTT', gene, is, epigenetically, downregulated, by, 'HDAC1', in, several, types, of, cancer])].
[sujeto(['The', 'RNA', polymerase, 'II', core, promoter, is, the, ultimate]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, a, multitude, of, transcription, factors, that, control, transcription, initiation])].
[sujeto(['Core', promoters, encompass, the, 'RNA', start, site, and, consist, of, functional, elements, such, as, the, 'TATA', 'box,', 'initiator,', and, downstream, core, promoter, element, '(', 'DPE),', which]), verbo([confer]), complemento([specific, properties, to, the, core, promoter])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, discovered, that, 'Drosophila', 'Caudal,', which, is, a, master, regulator, of, genes, involved, in, development, and, 'differentiation,', is, a, 'DPE-specific', transcriptional, activator])].
[sujeto(['To', elucidate, the, mechanism, that, enables, 'Caudal', to, preferentially]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['DPE', 'transcription,', we, performed, 'structure-function', analysis])].
[sujeto(['Using', a, systematic, series, of, deletion, mutants, '(', all, containing, the, intact, 'DNA-binding', 'homeodomain)', we, discovered, that, the, 'C-terminal', region, of, 'Caudal', contributes, to, the, preferential, activation, of, the, fushi, tarazu, '(', 'ftz)', 'Caudal']), verbo([target]), complemento([gene])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', the, region, containing, both, the, homeodomain, and, the, 'C', terminus, of, 'Caudal', was, sufficient, to]), verbo([confer]), complemento([core, 'promoter-preferential', activation, to, the, heterologous, 'GAL4', 'DNA-binding', domain])].
[sujeto(['Strikingly,', dCBP]), verbo([conferred]), complemento([the, ability, to, preferentially, activate, the, 'DPE-dependent', ftz, reporter, to, 'mini-Caudal', proteins, that, were, unable, to, preferentially, activate, ftz, transcription, themselves])].
[sujeto(['Prolonged', arsenic, exposure]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, cause, several, detrimental, effects, in, adults])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'work,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([studied, the, effect, of, arsenic, exposure, on, renal, system, using, human, embryonic, kidney, cells, and, prenatally, exposed, animals, and, identified, 'Interleukin-8(IL-8)', and, its, homologue, '(', 'CINC-1)', as, mediators, of, arsenic, induced, renal, toxicity])].
[sujeto(['We', further, show, that, embryonic, kidney, cells, are, more, responsive, to, arsenic]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, higher, induction, of, 'IL-8', as, compared, to, adult, cells, due, to, 'DNA', methylation, and, histone, acetylation, '(', 'H3', 'acetylation)', changes, in, the, 'IL-8', promoter])].
[sujeto(['Through', bisulfite, analysis, of, the, 'IL-8', 'promoter,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([also, identified, an, arsenic, modulated, 'CpG', site, at, -, 168, bases, upstream, of, transcription, start, site])].
[sujeto(['This', 'CpG', is, associated, with, 'C/EBP', and, 'CREB']), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, in, the, 'IL-8', promoter, and, its, demethylation, by, arsenic, coupled, with, increased, 'H3', histone, acetylation, and, 'CBP/P300', recruitment, could, lead, to, induction, of, 'IL-8'])].
[sujeto(['Our', study, shows, how, epigenetic, modulation, of, 'IL-8', by, arsenic, could, contribute, to]), verbo([increased]), complemento([cell, migratory, and, proliferative, 'capabilities,', cell, cycle, dysregulation, and, renal, toxicity])].
[sujeto(['Due', to, the, 'hyper-activation', of, 'WNT', signaling, in, a, variety, of, cancer, 'types,', there]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, a, strong, drive, to, develop, 'pathway-specific', inhibitors, with, the, eventual, goal, of, providing, a, chemotherapeutic, antagonist, of, 'WNT', signaling, to, cancer, patients])].
[sujeto(['The', canonical, 'WNT', signaling, pathway, initiates, when, 'WNT', ligands]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, 'receptors,', causing, the, nuclear, localization, of, the, 'co-activator', 'β-catenin', '(', 'CTNNB1),', which, leads, to, an, association, of, 'β-catenin', with, a, member, of, the, 'TCF', transcription, factor, family, at, regulatory, regions, of, 'WNT-responsive', genes])].
[sujeto(['The', 'TCF/β-catenin', complex, then]), verbo([recruits]), complemento(['CBP', '(', 'CREBBP)', or, p300, '(', 'EP300),', leading, to, histone, acetylation, and, gene, activation])].
[sujeto(['A', current, model, in, the, field, is, that, 'CBP-driven', expression, of, 'WNT']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, supports, proliferation, whereas, 'p300-driven', expression, of, 'WNT', target, genes, supports, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['The', small, molecule, inhibitor, 'ICG-001']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, 'CBP,', but, not, to, 'p300,', and, competitively, inhibits, the, interaction, of, 'CBP', with, 'β-catenin'])].
[sujeto(['Upon', treatment, of, cancer, 'cells,', this, should, reduce, expression, of, 'CBP-regulated', 'transcription,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, reduced, tumorigenicity, and, enhanced, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([compared, the, 'genome-wide', effects, on, the, transcriptome, after, treatment, with, 'ICG-001', '(', the, specific, 'CBP', 'inhibitor)', versus, 'C646,', a, compound, that, competes, with, 'acetyl-coA', for, the, 'Lys-coA', binding, pocket, of, both, 'CBP', and, p300])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, both, drugs, cause, 'large-scale', changes, in, the, transcriptome, of, 'HCT116', colon, cancer, cells, and, 'PANC1', pancreatic, cancer, cells, and, reverse, some, 'tumor-specific', changes, in, gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['Notably,', 'WNT']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, were, similarly, downregulated, after, treatment, of, 'HCT116', with, 'C646', as, with, 'ICG-001'])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, treatment, with, a, general, 'HAT', inhibitor, causes, similar, effects, on, the, transcriptome, as, does, treatment, with, a, 'CBP-specific', inhibitor, and, that, epigenetic, inhibition, affects, the, 'WNT', pathway, in, 'HCT116', cells, and, the, cholesterol, biosynthesis, pathway, in, 'PANC1', cells])].
[sujeto(['The', discovery, of, functional, crosstalk, between, 'WNT', and]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([factor, κB, '(', 'NF-κB)', signaling, has, established, a, more, complex, role, for, these, two, pathways, in, inflammation, and, cancer])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, 'WNT/β-catenin', signaling, selectively]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([the, expression, of, a, proinflammatory, subset, of, 'IL-1β-induced', 'NF-κB', target, genes])].
[sujeto(['WNT/β-catenin', signaling, does, not, affect]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([translocation, of, the, 'RelA', subunit, of, 'NF-κB', or, its, association, with, 'CBP', '(', also, known, as, 'CREBBP),', but, reduces, 'CBP-mediated', acetylation, and, chromatin, recruitment, of, 'RelA'])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', 'β-catenin', selectively]), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['NF-κB', gene, expression, through, its, negative, effects, on, 'RelA', acetylation])].
[sujeto(['Genome-wide', distribution, of, histone, 'H3K18', and, 'H3K27', 'acetyltransferases,', 'CBP', '(', 'CREBBP)', and, p300, '(', 'EP300),', is, used, to, map, enhancers, and, 'promoters,', but, whether, these, elements, functionally]), verbo([require]), complemento(['CBP/p300', remains, largely, uncertain])].
[sujeto(['ChIP-seq', using, 'CBP-null', cells, as, a, control, revealed, nearby, 'CBP', recruitment, for, 20, '%', of, 'constitutively-expressed', 'genes,', but, 'surprisingly,', 'three-quarters', of, these, genes, were, unaffected, or, slightly]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, dKO, cells])].
[sujeto(['Examining', 'signal-responsive', '(', 'Hypoxia', 'Inducible', 'Factor)', genes, showed, that, 97, '%', were, within, 50, kilobases, of, an, inducible, 'CBP', 'peak,', and, 70, '%', of, these]), verbo([required]), complemento(['CBP/p300', for, full, induction])].
[sujeto(['While', 'CBP/p300', was, needed, for, full, induction, of, some, genes, in, 'single-cells,', for, other, genes, 'CBP/p300']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, probability, of, maximal, expression])].
[sujeto(['Thus,']), verbo([target]), complemento([gene, context, influences, the, transcriptional, requirement, for, 'CBP/p300,', possibly, by, multiple, mechanisms])].
[sujeto(['Many', processes, in, endothelial, cells, including, angiogenic, responses, are]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, microRNAs])].
[sujeto(['However,', there, is, limited, information, available, about, their, complex, 'cross-talk', in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([certain, endothelial, functions])].
[sujeto(['We', here, show, that, 'anti-angiogenic', stimulation, by, transforming, growth, 'factor-beta']), verbo([activates]), complemento([the, 'microRNA-212/132', cluster, by, derepression, of, their, transcriptional, 'co-activator', cAMP, response, 'element-binding', protein, '(', 'CREB)-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', which, is, a, novel, target, of, a, previously, identified, 'pro-angiogenic', miRNA, 'miR-30a-3p', in, endothelial, cells])].
[sujeto(['Surprisingly,', despite, having, the, same, 'seed-sequence,', 'miR-212', and, 'miR-132', exerted, differential, effects, on, endothelial, transcriptome, regulation, and, cellular, functions, with, stronger, endothelial, inhibitory, effects]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, 'miR-212'])].

[sujeto(['Our', results, identify, '(', 'i)', a, novel, 'miRNA-cross-talk']), verbo([involving]), complemento(['miR-30a-3p', and, 'miR-212,', which, led, to, suppression, of, important, endothelial, genes, such, as, 'GAB1', and, 'SIRT1', finally, culminating, in, impaired, endothelial, 'function;', and, '(', 'ii)', microRNAs, may, have, different, biological, roles, despite, having, the, same, seed, sequence])].
[sujeto(['Experience-dependent', gene, transcription, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, nervous, system, development, and, function])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, characterize, the, enhancers, that, function, across, the, genome, to]), verbo([mediate]), complemento(['activity-dependent', transcription, in, mouse, cortical, neurons])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, the, subset, of, enhancers, enriched, for, monomethylation, of, histone, 'H3', 'Lys4', '(', 'H3K4me1)', and, binding, of, the, transcriptional, coactivator, 'CREBBP', '(', also, called, 'CBP)', that, shows, increased, acetylation, of, histone, 'H3', 'Lys27', '(', 'H3K27ac)', after, membrane, depolarization, of, cortical, neurons, functions, to, regulate, 'activity-dependent', transcription])].
[sujeto(['A', subset, of, these, enhancers, appears, to]), verbo([require]), complemento([binding, of, 'FOS,', which, was, previously, thought, to, bind, primarily, to, promoters])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'FOS', functions, at, enhancers, to, control, 'activity-dependent', gene, programs, that, are, critical, for, nervous, system, function, and, provide, a, resource, of, functional, 'cis-regulatory', elements, that, may, give, insight, into, the, genetic, variants, that, contribute, to, brain, development, and, disease])].
[sujeto(['Recent', studies, investigating, 'ligand-mediated', 'Wnt/β-catenin', signaling]), verbo([have]), complemento([highlighted, its, importance, in, pancreatic, cancer, initiation, and, 'progression,', as, well, as, its, potential, as, a, therapeutic, target, in, 'PDAC'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'small-molecule', 'ICG-001']), verbo([binds]), complemento(['cAMP-responsive', element, binding, '(', 'CREB)-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', to, disrupt, its, interaction, with, 'β-catenin', and, inhibit, 'CBP', function, as, a, coactivator, of, 'Wnt/β-catenin-mediated', transcription])].
[sujeto(['Given', its, ability, to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['Wnt/β-catenin-mediated', transcription, in, vitro, and, in, 'vivo,', as, well, as, its, efficacy, in, preclinical, models, of, colorectal, cancer, and, other, 'Wnt-driven', 'diseases,', we, examined, 'ICG-001', and, its, potential, role, as, a, therapeutic, in, 'PDAC'])].
[sujeto(['ICG-001', alone, significantly]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['anchorage-dependent', and, -, independent, growth, of, multiple, 'PDAC', 'lines,', and, augmented, in, vitro, growth, inhibition, when, used, in, combination, with, gemcitabine])].
[sujeto(['ICG-001', had, only, variable, modest, effects, on, 'PDAC', apoptosis, and, instead]), verbo([mediated]), complemento(['PDAC', growth, inhibition, primarily, through, robust, induction, of, 'G₁', 'cell-cycle', arrest])].
[sujeto(['Considerable', evidence, indicates, that, coactivator, of, transcription, and, histone, acetyltransferase, cAMP, response, element]), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'CREB)', binding, protein, '(', 'CBP)', is, critically, required, for, normal, neural, function])].
[sujeto(['CBP', hypofunction]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, severe, psychopathological, symptoms, in, human, and, cognitive, abnormalities, in, genetic, mutant, mice, with, severity, dependent, on, the, neural, locus, and, developmental, time, of, the, gene, inactivation])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', interruption, of, 'CREB', function, in, the, mPFC, also]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, a, deficit, in, auditory, discrimination, of, fearful, stimuli])].
[sujeto(['While', mice, with, deficient, 'CBP/CREB', signaling, in, the, mPFC]), verbo([maintain]), complemento([normal, responses, to, aversive, 'stimuli,', they, exhibit, abnormal, responses, to, similar, but, nonrelevant, stimuli, when, compared, to, control, animals])].
[sujeto(['These', data, indicate, that, improvement, of, fear, memory, accuracy]), verbo([involves]), complemento(['mPFC-dependent', suppression, of, fear, responses, to, nonrelevant, stimuli])].
[sujeto(['Small-molecule', inhibitors, that]), verbo([target]), complemento([bromodomains, outside, of, the, bromodomain, and, 'extra-terminal', '(', 'BET)', 'sub-family', are, lacking])].
[sujeto(['Our', starting, point, was, a, fragment, 'hit,', which, was, optimized, into, a, more, potent, and, selective]), verbo([lead]), complemento([using, parallel, synthesis, employing, 'Suzuki', 'couplings,', 'benzimidazole-forming', 'reactions,', and, reductive, aminations])].
[sujeto(['The', selectivity, of, the]), verbo([lead]), complemento([compound, against, other, bromodomain, family, members, was, investigated, using, a, thermal, stability, 'assay,', which, revealed, some, inhibition, of, the, structurally, related, 'BET', family, members])].
[sujeto(['To', address, the, 'BET', selectivity, 'issue,', 'X-ray', crystal, structures, of, the]), verbo([lead]), complemento([compound, bound, to, the, 'CREB', binding, protein, '(', 'CBP)', and, the, first, bromodomain, of, 'BRD4', '(', 'BRD4(1))', were, used, to, guide, the, design, of, more, selective, compounds])].
[sujeto(['The', crystal, structures, obtained, revealed, two, distinct]), verbo([binding]), complemento([modes])].
[sujeto(['The', optimized, compounds, are, 'cell-active', and]), verbo([have]), complemento([nanomolar, affinity, for, 'CBP/p300;', 'therefore,', they, should, be, useful, in, studies, investigating, the, biological, roles, of, 'CBP', and, p300, and, to, validate, the, 'CBP', and, p300, bromodomains, as, therapeutic, targets])].
[sujeto(['Pituitary-secreted', luteinizing, hormone, '(', 'LH)']), verbo([induces]), complemento([ovulation, by, activating, an, extracellular, regulated, kinase, 1, /, 2, '(', 'ERK1/2)', cascade])].

[sujeto(['Thus,', we, determined, that, 'CITED4', was, a, novel, 'LH', and, 'ERK1/2']), verbo([target]), complemento([for, triggering, ovulation])].
[sujeto(['These', results, support, the, proposition, that, 'LH']), verbo([induces]), complemento(['rapid,', significant, gene, expression, in, 'pre-ovulatory', follicles, by, modulating, histone, acetylation, status])].
[sujeto(['As', a, 'consequence,', global, 'H4', acetylation, '(', 'H4K8ac', and, 'H4K12ac)']), verbo([increases]), complemento([in, 'Ras-transformed', 'cells,', rendering, a, more, decompacted, chromatin, than, in, parental, cells])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', low, levels, of, 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)']), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, hypoacetylation, of, retinoblastoma, 1, '(', 'Rb1)', and, 'cyclin-dependent', kinase, inhibitor, 1, 'B', '(', 'Cdkn1b', or, 'p27Kip1)', tumour, suppressor, gene, promoters, to, facilitate, 'Ras-mediated', transformation])].
[sujeto(['Genistein,', an, isoflavone, present, in]), verbo([soy]), complemento(['products,', has, chemopreventive, effects, on, mammary, carcinogenesis])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([investigated, the, effects, of, genistein, on, phorbol, 'ester-induced', expression, of, 'cyclooxygenase-2', '(', 'COX-2)', that, plays, an, important, role, in, the, pathophysiology, of, 'inflammation-associated', carcinogenesis])].
[sujeto(['Pretreatment', of, cultured, human, breast, epithelial, '(', 'MCF10A)', cells, with, genistein, reduced, 'COX-2', expression]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 12, -, 'O-tetradecanoylphorbol-13-acetate', '(', 'TPA)'])].
[sujeto(['There', are, multiple, lines, of, evidence, supporting, that, the, induction, of, 'COX-2', is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, the, eukaryotic, transcription, factor, 'NF-κB'])].

[sujeto(['Likewise,', pharmacologic, inhibition, or, dominant, negative, mutation, of, 'ERK']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([phosphorylation, of, p65])].
[sujeto(['The', above, 'findings,', taken, 'together,']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, genistein, inhibits, 'TPA-induced', 'COX-2', expression, in, 'MCF10A', cells, by, blocking, 'ERK-mediated', phosphorylation, of, p65, and, its, subsequent, interaction, with, 'CBP', and, 'TBP'])].
[sujeto(['Hypoxia']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, to, regulate, both, stem, cell, maintenance, and, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['In', this]), verbo([report]), complemento([we, reveal, that, human, 'CML', cell, lines, treated, under, hypoxic, conditions, increase, the, percentage, of, leukemia, 'stem/initiating-like', 'cells,', as, judged, by, surface, marker, 'expression,', colony, forming, ability, and, quiescence])].
[sujeto(['We', demonstrate, that, differential, usage, of, the, 'Kat3', 'coactivators,', 'CREBBP/Creb', 'Binding', 'Protein', '(', 'CBP)', and, 'EP300', '(', 'p300)', by, 'catenin,', with]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['CBP/catenin', signaling, at, the, expense, of, 'p300/catenin', 'signaling,', is, mechanistically, correlated, with, the, increase, in, the, leukemia, 'stem/initiating-like', population])].
[sujeto(['A', specific, small, molecule, inhibitor, of, 'CBP/catenin', dependent, 'transcription,', 'ICG-001,', can, reverse, these, effects, further, demonstrating, the, critical, involvement, of, 'CBP/catenin', signaling, in]), verbo([enhancing]), complemento([and, maintaining, the, leukemia, 'stem/initiating-like', cell, population, under, hypoxic, conditions])].
[sujeto(['While', it, is, shown, that, disruption, of, 'ERK3', gene]), verbo([causes]), complemento([neonatal, 'lethality,', cell, 'type-specific', functions, of, 'ERK3', signaling, remain, to, be, explored])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'ERK3', gene, expression, is, upregulated, by, cytokines, through, 'c-Jun', in, endothelial, 'cells;', 'c-Jun', binds, to, the, 'ERK3', gene, and, regulates, its, transcription])].
[sujeto(['We', further]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, new, role, for, 'ERK3', in, regulating, endothelial, cell, 'migration,', proliferation, and, tube, formation, by, upregulating, 'SRC-3/SP-1-mediated', 'VEGFR2', expression])].
[sujeto(['The', underlying, molecular, mechanism]), verbo([involves]), complemento(['ERK3-stimulated', formation, of, a, transcriptional, complex, involving, coactivator, 'SRC-3,', transcription, factor, 'SP-1', and, the, secondary, coactivator, 'CBP'])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, study, identified, a, molecular, regulatory, mechanism, of, 'ERK3', gene, expression, and, revealed, a, previously, unknown, role, of, 'ERK3', in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([endothelial, cell, functions])].
[sujeto(['The', combination, of, p300, and, 'CBP', expression, may, be, useful, in, identifying, patients, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento([risks, of, cancer, recurrence, of, 'SCLC'])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([mediates]), complemento([the, base, excision, repair, '(', 'BER)', of, 'G:T', and, 'G:U', 'DNA', mismatches, arising, from, the, deamination, of, 5, -, methyl, cytosine, '(', 5, -, 'MeC)', and, 'cytosine,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['Recent', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([pointed, at, a, role, of, 'TDG', during, the, active, demethylation, of, 5, -, 'MeC', within, 'CpG', islands])].
[sujeto(['TDG']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, the, histone, acetylase, 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', to, activate, 'CBP-dependent', transcription])].

[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, for, the, existence, of, a, functional, ternary, complex, containing, 'TDG,', 'CBP', and, activated, 'RARα'])].
[sujeto(['Using', global, transcriptome, 'profiling,', we, uncover, a, coupling, of, de, novo, 'methylation-sensitive', and, 'RA-dependent', 'transcription,', which, coincides, with, a, significant, subset, of, 'CBP']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes])].
[sujeto(['The', introduction, of, a, point, mutation, in, 'TDG,', which, neither, affects, overall, protein, structure, nor, 'BER', 'activity,']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, a, significant, loss, in, ternary, complex, 'stability,', resulting, in, the, deregulation, of, 'RA', targets, involved, in, cellular, networks, associated, with, 'DNA', 'replication,', recombination, and, repair])].
[sujeto(['Adult', blood, cell, production, or, definitive, hematopoiesis]), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, transcription, factor, 'c-Myb'])].
[sujeto(['The', closely, related, 'KAT3', histone, acetyltransferases, 'CBP', '(', 'CREBBP)', and, p300, '(', 'EP300)']), verbo([bind]), complemento(['c-Myb', through, their, 'KIX', domains, and, mice, homozygous, for, a, p300, 'KIX', domain, mutation, exhibit, multiple, blood, defects])].
[sujeto(['Perplexingly,', mice, homozygous, for, the, same, 'KIX', domain, mutation, in, 'CBP']), verbo([have]), complemento([normal, blood])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, in, the, context, of, a, p300, 'KIX', 'mutation,', the, 'CBP', 'KIX', domain, mutation, affects, 'platelets,', 'B', 'cells,', 'T', 'cells,', and, red, cells])].
[sujeto(['Gene', interaction, '(', 'epistasis)', analysis]), verbo([provides]), complemento([mechanistic, evidence, that, blood, defects, in, 'KIX', mutant, mice, are, consistent, with, reduced, 'c-Myb', and, 'KIX', interaction])].
[sujeto(['Together', these, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'KIX', domains, of, 'CBP,', and, especially, 'p300,', are, principal, mediators, of, 'c-Myb-dependent', gene, activation, and, repression, that, is, required, for, definitive, hematopoiesis])].
[sujeto(['MicroRNAs', are, extensively]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, pathogenesis, of, major, cardiovascular, diseases, by, suppressing, target, gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['Recent', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([reported, that, 'microRNA-22', '(', 'miR-22)', may, be, implicated, in, 'ischemia-reperfusion', '(', 'I/R)', induced, myocardial, injury])].
[sujeto(['The', rat, myocardial, 'I/R', injury, model, was]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, occluding, the, left, anterior, descending, coronary, artery, for, 30, min, followed, by, 12, h, reperfusion])].
[sujeto(['As', 'predicted,', 'adenovirus-mediated', 'miR-22', overexpression, markedly, reduced, the]), verbo([release]), complemento([of, creatine, kinase, and, lactate, 'dehydrogenase,', infarct, size, and, cardiomyocytes, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 'CREB']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'CBP)', as, a, potential, 'miR-22', target, by, bioinformatics, was, significantly, inhibited, after, 'miR-22', transfection])].
[sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, p53, acetylation, 'activity,', 'pro-apoptotic', related, genes, 'Bax', and, p21, levels, were, all, decreased, associated, with, the, 'down-regulation', of, 'CBP'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', our, data, demonstrate, that, 'miR-22', could]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([apoptosis, of, cardiomyocytes, through, one, of, its, 'targets,', 'CBP'])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', 'miR-22', may, constitute, a, new, therapeutic]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, the, prevention, of, myocardial, 'I/R', injury])].
[sujeto(['Hence,', the, dysfunction, of, p300, may, result, in, the, dysregulation, of, gene, expression]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, the, manifestation, of, many, disorders])].
[sujeto(['The', acetyltransferase, activity, of, 'p300/CREB-binding', protein, is, therefore, considered, as, a]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, new, generation, therapeutics])].
[sujeto(['We', describe, here, a, natural, 'compound,', plumbagin, '(', 'RTK1),', isolated, from, 'Plumbago', rosea, root, 'extract,', that]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([histone, acetyltransferase, activity, potently, in, vivo])].

[sujeto(['RTK1']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([p300, histone, acetyltransferase, activity, in, a, noncompetitive, manner])].
[sujeto(['Docking', studies, and, 'site-directed', mutagenesis, of, the, p300, histone, acetyltransferase, domain]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, a, single, hydroxyl, group, of, 'RTK1', makes, a, hydrogen, bond, with, the, lysine, 1358, residue, of, this, domain])].
[sujeto(['In', agreement, with, 'this,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, indeed, the, hydroxyl, 'group-substituted', plumbagin, derivatives, lost, the, acetyltransferase, inhibitory, activity])].
[sujeto(['This', study, describes, for, the, first, time, the, chemical, entity, '(', hydroxyl, 'group)']), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, inhibition, of, acetyltransferase, activity])].
[sujeto(['The', in, vitro, perfused, rectal, gland, of, the, dogfish, shark, '(', 'Squalus', 'acanthias)', and, 'filter-grown', monolayers, of, primary, cultures, of, shark, rectal, gland, '(', 'SRG)', epithelial, cells, were, used, to, analyze, the, signal, transduction, pathway, by, which, 'C-type', natriuretic, peptide, '(', 'CNP)']), verbo([stimulates]), complemento([chloride, secretion])].

[sujeto(['Gamma(2)-melanocyte-stimulating', hormone, '(', 'γ2MSH)', is, a, peptide, hormone]), verbo([released]), complemento([by, the, pituitary, gland, which, is, thought, to, act, directly, on, the, renal, inner, medulla, to, promote, increased, sodium, excretion, into, urine, '(', 'natriuresis)'])].

[sujeto(['The', rapid, '(', 2, 'min)', nongenomic, effects, of, aldosterone, '(', 'ALDO)', 'and/or', spironolactone, '(', 'MR', 'antagonist),', 'RU', 486, '(', 'GR', 'antagonist),', atrial, natriuretic, peptide, '(', 'ANP)', and, 'dimethyl-BAPTA', '(', 'BAPTA)', on, the, intracellular, pH, recovery, rate, '(', 'pHirr)', via, 'NHE1', '(', basolateral, 'Na⁺/H⁺', exchanger, 'isoform),', after, the, acid, load]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'NH₄Cl,', and, on, the, cytosolic, free, calcium, concentration, '(', '[', 'Ca²⁺](i))', were, investigated, in, the, proximal, 'S3', segment, isolated, from, 'rats,', by, the, probes, 'BCECF-AM', and, 'FLUO-4-AM,', respectively])].

[sujeto(['RU', 486, ',', 'ANP', and, 'BAPTA']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, '[', 'Ca²⁺](i)', and, inhibited, the, stimulatory, effect, of, both, doses, of, 'ALDO'])].

[sujeto(['The']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, atrial, natriuretic, peptide, '(', 'ANP)', to, its, receptor, requires, 'chloride,', and, it, is, chloride, concentration, dependent])].

[sujeto(['The']), verbo([bound]), complemento(['chloride,', 'however,', is, completely, buried, in, the, polypeptide, 'fold,', and, its, functional, role, has, remained, unclear])].

[sujeto(['In', normotensive, 'rats,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, demonstrated, a, role, of, brain, mineralocorticoid, receptors, in, blood, pressure, and, renal, function, control])].
[sujeto([')', administration, of, a, selective, mineralocorticoid, receptor, antagonist, '(', 'RU28318;', 3, ',', 3, -, 'oxo-7', 'propyl-17-hydroxy-androstan-4-en-17yl-propionic', acid, 'lactone)', in, rats, with, hypertension]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, deoxycorticosterone, acetate, '(', 'DOCA)', and, salt])].
[sujeto(['The', rise, in, systolic, blood, pressure]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'DOCA-salt', treatment, was, most, marked, during, the, first, 3, weeks])].

[sujeto([injection, of, 'RU28318', while, the]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([plasma, renin, activity, was, not, affected])].

[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', these, results, demonstrate, that, in, rats, with, hypertension]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'DOCA-salt,', brain, mineralocorticoid, receptor, blockade, affects, renal, function, and, blood, pressure, regulation])].
[sujeto(['Although', considerable, evidence, indicates, a, role, for, atrial, natriuretic, factor, '(', 'ANF)', in, renal, salt, 'regulation,', other, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([found, a, lack, of, natriuretic, response, to, 'high-plasma', 'ANF', under, certain, physiological, and, pathophysiological, conditions])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', it, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'ANF', binding, to, its, receptor, requires, the, presence, of, chloride, and, occurs, in, a, chloride, 'concentration-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['ANF']), verbo([binding]), complemento([was, measured, using, the, purified, recombinant, 'hormone-binding', domain, of, the, 'ANF', receptor, in, the, presence, of, 0.1, 'mol/L', 'NaCl', or, other, selected, salt])].
[sujeto(['High', specific]), verbo([binding]), complemento([was, detected, in, the, presence, of, 'NaCl,', 'KCl,', or, 'NH(4)Cl'])].
[sujeto(['However,']), verbo([binding]), complemento([was, undetectable, when, the, salt, was, replaced, with, 'NaHCO(3),', 'CH(3)COONa,', or, 'CH(3)COONH(4),', indicating, that, binding, requires, the, presence, of, chloride])].
[sujeto(['Chloride', dependence, was, also]), verbo([found]), complemento([with, the, native, receptor, in, bovine, adrenocortical, membrane, preparations])].
[sujeto(['ANF']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, the, recombinant, protein, was, chloride, 'concentration-dependent', over, a, range, from, 0.05, to, 10, 'mmol/L,', and, a, 'half-maximum', binding, was, attained, at, approximately, 0.6, 'mmol/L', equivalent, chloride, concentration])].
[sujeto(['Competitive-binding', assays, at, several, fixed, concentrations, of, 'NaCl', showed, that, lowering, chloride, concentration]), verbo([caused]), complemento([a, decrease, in, maximum, binding, but, did, not, alter, 'K(d)', 'values,', suggesting, that, a, loss, of, chloride, turns, off, 'ANF', binding, rather, than, reducing, affinity, for, 'ANF'])].
[sujeto(['Saturation-binding', studies, showed, that, excess, 'ANF', cannot, overcome]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, binding, caused, by, low, chloride])].
[sujeto(['Chloride-dependent', 'ANF-receptor']), verbo([binding]), complemento([may, function, as, a, 'feedback-control', mechanism, regulating, the, 'ANF-receptor', action, 'and,', 'hence,', renal, sodium, excretion])].
[sujeto(['Sodium', or, chloride, depletion]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([plasma, levels, of, atrial, natriuretic, 'peptide,', increased, plasma, renin, 'activity,', and, induced, extracellular, fluid, volume, contraction])].
[sujeto(['Chloride', depletion]), verbo([induced]), complemento([more, significant, changes, in, extracellular, fluid, volume, contraction, than, sodium, depletion])].
[sujeto(['In', the, subfornical, 'organ,', atrial, natriuretic, peptide, receptor, number, significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['(', 30, '%', ')', after, sodium, 'depletion,', while, chloride, depletion, induced, a, 'smaller,', not, statistically, significant, decrease])].
[sujeto(['Water', deprivation, reversed, the]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, atrial, natriuretic, peptide, receptors, produced, by, sodium, depletion])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, atrial, natriuretic, peptide, receptors, located, in, the, subfornical, 'organ,', and, not, in, the, paraventricular, 'nucleus,', are, selectively, regulated, by, sodium, depletion, and, extracellular, fluid, volume, contraction])].
[sujeto(['Both', atrial, natriuretic, factor, '(', 'ANF)', and, 'GTP', gamma, 'S', synergistically]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([the, guanylate, cyclase, '(', 'GC)', activity, of, 'GC-A/ANF-R', in, a, 'dose-', and, 'time-related', manner])].
[sujeto(['The', saturation]), verbo([binding]), complemento([assay, of, '[', 35, 'S]GTP', gamma, 'S', showed, the, dissociation, constant, '(', 'Kd)', of, 2.3, x, 10, '(', -, 9, ')', 'M', and, the, binding, capacity, '(', 'Bmax)', of, 76, 'pmol/mg', protein, in, the, plasma, membrane, preparations, of, 'MA-10', cells])].
[sujeto(['ANF']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, '[', 35, 'S]GTP', gamma, 'S-binding', 'capacity,', 'however,', without, affecting, its, affinity, constant])].
[sujeto(['Pretreatment', of, plasma, membranes, with, antibodies, against, 'Gs', alpha, subunit, attenuates, the, 'GTP', gamma, 'S-stimulated', 'GC', 'activity,', whereas, antibodies, against, 'Gi', alpha, subunit]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([the, stimulatory, effect, of, 'GTP', gamma, 'S', on, 'GC', catalytic, activity, of, 'GC-A/ANF-R'])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([the, evidence, that, both, 'Gs', and, 'Gi', subunits, of, 'G-proteins', seem, to, be, involved, in, the, regulation, of, 'GC', catalytic, activity, of, 'GC-A/ANF-R', in, the, plasma, membranes, of, 'MA-10', cells])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([increases]), complemento([in, urinary, salt, and, water, excretion, were, also, partially, blocked, by, the, antagonist])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, the, antagonist, is, an, effective, specific, blocker, of, the, 'cardiovascular,', renal, 'hemodynamic,', and, tubular, effects, of, 'ANF,']), verbo([providing]), complemento([a, useful, new, tool, to, elucidate, the, regulatory, roles, of, this, peptide, hormone, system])].
[sujeto(['Intestinal', guanylate, cyclase]), verbo([mediates]), complemento([the, action, of, the, 'heat-stable', enterotoxin, to, cause, a, decrease, in, intestinal, fluid, absorption, and, to, increase, chloride, 'secretion,', ultimately, causing, diarrhea])].
[sujeto(['An', endogenous, ligand, that]), verbo([acts]), complemento([on, this, guanylate, cyclase, has, not, previously, been, found])].
[sujeto(['This', cell, line, selectively]), verbo([responds]), complemento([to, the, toxin, in, a, very, sensitive, manner, with, an, increase, in, intracellular, cyclic, 'GMP'])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we, describe, the, purification, and, structure, of, a, peptide, from, rat, jejunum, that]), verbo([activates]), complemento([this, enzyme])].
[sujeto(['This', 'peptide,', which, we]), verbo([have]), complemento([termed, 'guanylin,', is, composed, of, 15, amino, acids, and, has, the, following, amino, acid, 'sequence,', 'PNTCEICAYAACTGC,', as, determined, by, automated, 'Edman', degradation, sequence, analysis, and, electrospray, mass, spectrometry])].
[sujeto(['Analysis', of, the, amino, acid, sequence, of, this, peptide]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([a, high, degree, of, homology, with, 'heat-stable', enterotoxins])].
[sujeto(['Solid-phase', synthesis, of, this, peptide, confirmed, that, it]), verbo([stimulates]), complemento([increases, in, 'T84', cyclic, 'GMP', levels])].
[sujeto(['Guanylin']), verbo([required]), complemento([oxidation, for, expression, of, bioactivity, and, subsequent, reduction, of, the, oxidized, peptide, eliminated, the, effect, on, cyclic, 'GMP,', indicating, a, requirement, for, cysteine, disulfide, bond, formation])].

[sujeto(['Consistent', with, 'this,', 'PAT4']), verbo([promotes]), complemento(['HCT116', human, colorectal, cancer, cell, proliferation, in, culture, and, tumour, growth, in, xenograft, models])].

[sujeto(['Furthermore,', our, data, predict, that, colorectal, cancer, cells, with, high, 'PAT4', expression, will, be, more, resistant, to, depletion, of, serine, and, 'glutamine,', allowing, them, to, survive, and, outgrow, neighbouring, normal, and, tumorigenic, 'cells,', and, potentially]), verbo([providing]), complemento([a, new, route, for, pharmacological, intervention])].
[sujeto(['Mammalian']), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, '(', 'mTOR)', is, a, 'serine-threonine', kinase, that, acts, downstream, of, the, phosphatidylinositol, 3, -, kinase, signaling, pathway, and, regulates, a, wide, range, of, cellular, functions, including, 'transcription,', 'translation,', 'proliferation,', 'apoptosis,', and, autophagy])].
[sujeto(['Whereas', genetic, alterations, that, result, in, mTOR, activation, are, frequently, present, in, human, 'cancers,', whether, the, mTOR, gene, itself, becomes, an, oncogene, through, somatic, mutation]), verbo([has]), complemento([remained, unclear])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([now, identified, a, somatic, nonsynonymous, mutation, of, mTOR, that, results, in, a, 'leucine-to-valine', substitution, at, amino, acid, position, 2209, in, a, specimen, of, large, cell, neuroendocrine, carcinoma])].
[sujeto(['The', 'mTOR(L2209V)', mutant, manifested, marked, transforming, potential, in, a, focus, formation, assay, with, mouse, 3, 'T3', 'fibroblasts,', and, it]), verbo([induced]), complemento([the, phosphorylation, of, p70, 'S6', 'kinase,', 'S6', ribosomal, 'protein,', and, eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E-binding', protein, 1, in, these, cells])].
[sujeto(['Transforming', mTOR, mutants, were, also]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, promote, 3, 'T3', cell, 'survival,', and, their, oncogenic, activity, was, sensitive, to, rapamycin])].
[sujeto(['Our', data, thus, show, that, mTOR, acquires, transforming, activity, through, genetic, changes, in, 'cancer,', and, they]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, such, tumors, may, be, candidates, for, molecularly, targeted, therapy, with, mTOR, inhibitors])].
[sujeto(['Targeting', 'protein-protein']), verbo([interacting]), complemento([sites, for, potential, therapeutic, applications, is, a, challenge, in, the, development, of, 'inhibitors,', and, this, becomes, more, difficult, when, these, interfaces, are, relatively, 'planar,', as, in, the, eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E', '(', 'eIF4E)', protein])].
[sujeto([eIF4E, is, an, oncogene, that, is, overexpressed, in, numerous, forms, of, 'cancer,', making, it, a, prime]), verbo([target]), complemento([as, a, therapeutic, molecule])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, the, presence, of, a, cryptic, pocket, at, the, 'protein-binding', interface, of, 'eIF4E,', which, opens, transiently, during, molecular, dynamics, simulations, of, the, protein, in, solvent, water, and, is, observed, to, be, stable, when, solvent, water, is, mixed, with, benzene, molecules])].
[sujeto(['The', accessibility, of, the, pocket, is, gated, by, the, 'side-chain', transitions, of, an, evolutionarily]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([tryptophan, residue])].
[sujeto(['It', is]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, feasible, for, accommodating, clusters, of, benzene, 'molecules,', which, signify, the, plasticity, and, ligandability, of, the, pocket])].
[sujeto(['We', also, observe, that, the, newly, formed, cavity]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, favorable, binding, environment, for, interaction, of, a, 'well-recognized', small, molecule, inhibitor, of, eIF4E])].
[sujeto(['The', occurrence, of, this, transiently, accessible, cavity, highlights, the, existence, of, a, more, pronounced]), verbo([binding]), complemento([groove, in, a, region, that, has, traditionally, been, considered, to, be, planar])].
[sujeto(['Together,', the, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, an, alternate, binding, cavity, exists, on, eIF4E, and, could, be, exploited, for, the, rational, design, and, development, of, a, new, class, of, lead, compounds, against, the, protein])].
[sujeto(['The', results, showed, 'LMP1', was, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'SNK-6', cells, compared, with, control, groups])].

[sujeto(['HPV', 'E7']), verbo([induced]), complemento([eIF4E, gene, over, transcription, which, might, be, a, new, marker, for, 'CC'])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([finding]), complemento([broadens, the, understanding, of, the, 'CC', carcinogenesis])].
[sujeto(['The', eukaryotic, initiation, factor, '4E', '(', 'eIF4E)']), verbo([recognizes]), complemento([the, mRNA, cap, structure, 'and,', together, with, eIF4G, and, 'eIF4A,', form, the, eIF4F, complex, that, regulates, translation, initiation, in, eukaryotes])].
[sujeto(['In', 'trypanosomatids,', two, eIF4E, homologues, '(', 'EIF4E3', and, 'EIF4E4)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, be, part, of, 'eIF4F-like', complexes, with, presumed, roles, in, translation, initiation])].
[sujeto(['Both', proteins, possess, unique, 'N-terminal', 'extensions,', which, can, be]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([for, phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([novel, insights, on, the, 'Leishmania', infantum, 'EIF4E4', function, and, regulation])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, 'EIF4E4', is, constitutively]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([throughout, the, parasite, development, but, is, preferentially, phosphorylated, in, exponentially, grown, promastigote, and, amastigote, life, 'stages,', hence, correlating, with, high, levels, of, translation])].
[sujeto(['Phosphorylation']), verbo([targets]), complemento([multiple, 'serine-proline', or, 'threonine-proline', residues, within, the, 'N-terminal', extension, of, 'EIF4E4', but, does, not, require, binding, to, the, 'EIF4E4\'s', 'partner,', 'EIF4G3,', or, to, the, cap, structure])].
[sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'EIF4E4', interacts, with, 'PABP1', through, three, conserved, boxes, at, the, 'EIF4E4&nbsp;N-terminus', and, that, this, interaction, is, a, prerequisite, for, efficient, 'EIF4E4', phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['EIF4E4', is, essential, for, 'Leishmania', growth, and, an, 'EIF4E4', null, mutant, was, only, obtained, in, the, presence, of, an, ectopically]), verbo([provided]), complemento([wild, type, gene])].
[sujeto(['Complementation', for, the]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'EIF4E4', with, several, 'EIF4E4', mutant, proteins, affecting, either, phosphorylation, or, binding, to, mRNA, or, to, 'EIF4E4', protein, partners, revealed, 'that,', in, contrast, to, other, 'eukaryotes,', only, the, 'EIF4E4-PABP1', interaction, but, neither, the, binding, to, 'EIF4G3', nor, phosphorylation, is, essential, for, translation])].
[sujeto(['These', studies, also, demonstrated, that, the, lack, of, both, 'EIF4E4', phosphorylation, and, 'EIF4G3']), verbo([binding]), complemento([leads, to, a, 'non-functional', protein])].
[sujeto(['Since', that, 'time,', numerous, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, performed, with, the, three, proteins, specifically, required, for, the, translation, initiation, of, natural, 'mRNAs,', 'eIF4A,', 'eIF4B,', and, eIF4F])].
[sujeto(['These']), verbo([have]), complemento([involved, enzymatic, and, structural, studies, of, the, proteins, and, a, number, of, 'site-directed', mutagenesis, studies])].
[sujeto(['The', regulation, of, translation, exhibited, through, the, mammalian]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, '(', 'mTOR)', pathway, is, predominately, seen, as, the, phosphorylation, of, '4E-BP,', an, inhibitor, of, protein, synthesis, that, functions, by, binding, to, the, cap, binding, subunit, of, eIF4F, '(', 'eIF4E)'])].
[sujeto(['A', hypothesis, that]), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, disassembly, of, eIF4F, during, translation, initiation, to, yield, free, subunits, '(', 'eIF4A,', 'eIF4E,', and, 'eIF4G)', is, presented])].
[sujeto(['The', regulator, of, 'G', protein, signaling, 10, '(', 'RGS10)', protein, is, a, 'GTPase']), verbo([activating]), complemento([protein, that, accelerates, the, hydrolysis, of, 'GTP', and, therefore, canonically, inactivates, 'G', 'proteins,', ultimately, terminating, signaling])].
[sujeto(['Rheb', is, a, small, 'GTPase', protein, that, shuttles, between, its, 'GDP-', and, 'GTP-bound', forms, to]), verbo([activate]), complemento([mTOR])].
[sujeto(['Following', 'RGS10', suppression, in, 'serum-free', 'conditions,', phosphorylation, of, 'mTOR,', the, eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 1, '(', '4E-BP1),', p70S6K, and, 'S6', 'Ribosomal', 'Protein', appear])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,']), verbo([suppressing]), complemento(['RGS10', increases, activated, 'Rheb,', suggesting, 'RGS10', antagonizes, mTOR, signaling, via, the, small, 'G-protein'])].
[sujeto(['The', effects, of, 'RGS10', suppression, are]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([after, stimulating, cells, with, the, growth, 'factor,', lysophosphatidic, 'acid,', and, reduced, with, mTOR, 'inhibitors,', temsirolimus, and, 'INK-128'])].
[sujeto(['Suppression', of, 'RGS10']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, an, increase, in, cell, 'proliferation,', even, in, the, presence, of, etoposide])].
[sujeto(['In', 'summary,', the, 'RGS10', suppression]), verbo([increases]), complemento(['Rheb-GTP', and, mTOR, signaling, in, ovarian, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'RGS10', could, serve, in, a, 'novel,', and, previously, 'unknown,', role, by, accelerating, the, hydrolysis, of, 'GTP', from, 'Rheb', in, ovarian, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['The', eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E', '(', 'eIF4E),', which, is, the, main, composition, factor, of, eIF4F, translation, initiation, 'complex,', influences, the, growth, of, tumor, through]), verbo([modulating]), complemento(['cap-dependent', protein, translation])].
[sujeto(['Previous', studies]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, ribavirin, could, suppress, 'eIF4E-controlled', translation, and, reduce, the, synthesis, of, 'onco-proteins'])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, showed, that, ribavirin, had, 'anti-proliferation', 'effect;', it, 'down-regulated', the, phosphorylation, levels, of, 'Akt,', 'mTOR,', '4EBP1,', and, eIF4E, proteins, in, the, 'mTOR/eIF4E', signaling, 'pathway,', and, 'MEK,', 'ERK,', 'Mnk1', and, eIF4E, proteins, in, 'ERK/Mnk1/eIF4E', signaling, 'pathway;', reduced, the, expression, of, 'Mcl-1', '(', a, translation, substrates, of, eIF4F, translation, initiation, 'complex)', at, protein, synthesis, level, not, mRNA, transcriptional, 'level;', and]), verbo([induced]), complemento([cell, apoptosis, in, both, 'SUP-B15', and, 'K562'])].
[sujeto([7, -, 'Methyl-guanosine', cap, affinity, assay, further, demonstrated, that, ribavirin, remarkably]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, eIF4E, binding, to, '4EBP1', and, decreased, the, combination, of, eIF4E, with, 'eIF4G,', consequently, resulting, in, a, major, inhibition, of, eIF4F, complex, assembly])].
[sujeto(['The', combination, of, ribavirin, with, imatinib]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([antileukemic, effects, mentioned, 'above,', indicating, that, two, drugs, have, synergistic, 'anti-leukemic', effect])].
[sujeto(['Previous', studies]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, 'CsA', induces, autophagy, and, that, chronic, treatment, with, 'CsA', results, in, accumulation, of, autophagosomes, and, reduced, autophagic, clearance])].
[sujeto(['Autophagy', is, a, prosurvival, process, that]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([recovery, from, acute, kidney, injury, by, degrading, misfolded, proteins, produced, in, the, kidney])].
[sujeto(['When', exposed, to, 'CsA,', the, 'TMBIM6', cells]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([autophagy, activity, by, preventing, autophagosome, accumulation])].
[sujeto(['With', regard, to, 'signaling,', 'PRKKA/AMPK', phosphorylation, and, mechanistic]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, '(', 'serine/threonine', 'kinase)', complex, 1, '(', 'MTORC1)', expression, and, its, downstream, target, 'TFEB', '(', transcription, factor, 'EB),', a, lysosome, biogenesis, 'factor,', were, regulated, in, the, 'TMBIM6', cells])].
[sujeto(['Lysosomal', activity, was, highly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([or, stably, maintained, in, the, presence, of, 'TMBIM6'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', treatment, of, 'tmbim6(-/-)', mice, with, 'CsA', resulted, in]), verbo([increased]), complemento([autophagosome, formation, and, decreased, lysosome, formation, and, activity])].
[sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'tmbim6(-/-)', mice, were, susceptible, to, 'CsA-induced', kidney, injury])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, results, indicate, that, 'TMBIM6', protects, against, 'CsA-induced', nephrotoxicity, both, in, vitro, and, in, vivo, by]), verbo([inducing]), complemento([autophagy, and, activating, lysosomes])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, in, murine, 'models,', deletion, of, the, tuberous, sclerosis, complex, protein, 1, '(', 'Tsc1)', in, renal, proximal, tubules, induced, strikingly, enlarged, 'kidneys,', with, minimal, cystogenesis, and, occasional, microscopic, tumorigenesis])].
[sujeto(['Signaling', studies, revealed, hyperphosphorylation, of, eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E-binding', protein, 1, '(', '4E-BP1)', and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([phosphorylation, of, ribosomal, protein, 'S6', '(', 'rpS6)', in, activated, renal, tubules])].
[sujeto(['Notably,', knockin, of, a, nonphosphorylatable, rpS6, in, these, 'Tsc1-mutant', mice, exacerbated, cystogenesis, and]), verbo([caused]), complemento([drastic, nephron, damage, and, renal, 'fibrosis,', leading, to, kidney, failure, and, a, premature, death, rate, of, 67, '%', by, 9, weeks, of, age])].
[sujeto(['Mechanistic', studies, revealed, persistent, activation, of, mammalian]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, complex, 1, '(', 'mTORC1)', signaling, causing, hyperphosphorylation, and, consequent, accumulation, of, '4E-BP1,', along, with, greater, cell, 'proliferation,', in, the, renal, tubules, of, 'Tsc1', and, rpS6, 'double-mutant', mice])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', pharmacologic, treatment, of, 'Tsc1', 'single-mutant', mice, with, rapamycin, reduced, hyperphosphorylation, and, accumulation, of, '4E-BP1', but, also]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([phosphorylation, of, rpS6])].
[sujeto(['Rapamycin', also, exacerbated, cystic, and, fibrotic, lesions, and, impaired, kidney, function, in, these, 'mice,', consequently]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, a, premature, death, rate, of, 40, '%', within, 2, weeks, of, 'treatment,', despite, destroying, tumors, and, decreasing, kidney, size])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, indicate, that, 'Tsc1']), verbo([prevents]), complemento([aberrant, renal, growth, and, tumorigenesis, by, inhibiting, mTORC1, 'signaling,', whereas, phosphorylated, rpS6, suppresses, cystogenesis, and, fibrosis, in, 'Tsc1-deleted', kidneys])].
[sujeto(['CycG', mutants]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, reduced, body, size, and, weight, and, show, signs, of, starvation, accompanied, by, a, disturbed, fat, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['InR/TOR', signaling, activity, is, impaired, in, cycG, 'mutants,', combined, with, a, reduced, phosphorylation, status, of, the, kinase, 'Akt1', and, the, downstream, factors, 'S6-kinase', and, eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', '4E-BP)'])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, metabolic, defects, and, weight]), verbo([loss]), complemento([in, cycG, mutants, were, rescued, by, overexpression, of, 'Akt1', specifically, in, the, fat, body, and, by, mutants, in, widerborst, '(', 'wdb),', the, 'B\'-subunit', of, the, phosphatase, 'PP2A,', known, to, downregulate, 'Akt1', by, dephosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['Together,', our, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'CycG', acts, at, the, level, of, 'Akt1', to, regulate, growth, and, metabolism, via, 'PP2A', in, 'Drosophila'])].
[sujeto(['Eukaryotic', translation, initiation, factor, '4E-binding', protein, 1, '(', '4E-BP1)', is, an, important, factor]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([protein, translation])].
[sujeto(['The', aim, of, this, study, was, to, investigate, the, relationship, between, '4E-BP1', and, human, immune, 'status,']), verbo([recognizing]), complemento([immunomodulatory, molecules, involved, in, the, overexpression, of, '4E-BP1'])].
[sujeto(['The', expression, level, of, '4E-BP1']), verbo([increased]), complemento([significantly, after, lentivirus, infection, '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')'])].
[sujeto(['Most', of, the]), verbo([increases]), complemento([were, observed, at, the, seventh, day])].
[sujeto(['The', variation, trend, of, 'IL-10,', cell, division, cycle, protein, 2, ',', proliferating, cell]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['antigen,', and, phosphatase, and, tensin, homolog, was, not, clear])].
[sujeto(['Overexpression', of, '4E-BP1', altered, immune, status, by, upregulating, the, expression, of, a, series, of, immunomodulatory, 'molecules,', indicating, that, '4E-BP1', could, serve, as, a, potential, therapeutic]), verbo([target]), complemento([against, cancer])].
[sujeto(['However,', as]), verbo([reported]), complemento(['FOXO', accounts, for, only, a, portion, of, the, observed, longevity, 'benefit,', suggesting, there, are, additional, outputs, of, 'IIS', to, mediate, aging])].

[sujeto(['Reduced', 'TORC1', activity, is]), verbo([reported]), complemento([to, slow, 'aging,', whereas, reduced, 'IIS', is, reported, to, repress, 'TORC1', activity])].
[sujeto(['The', eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', '4E-BP)', is, repressed, by, 'TORC1,', and, activated, '4E-BP', is, reported, to, increase, 'Drosophila', lifespan])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, use, genetic, epistasis, analyses, to, test, whether, longevity, assurance, mutants, of, 'chico,', the, 'Drosophila', insulin, receptor, substrate, 'homolog,']), verbo([require]), complemento(['Drosophila', d4eBP, to, slow, aging])].

[sujeto(['Altered', 'IRS', function, within, the, 'IIS', pathway, of, 'Drosophila', appears, to]), verbo([have]), complemento(['partial,', conditional, capacity, to, regulate, aging, through, an, unconventional, interaction, with, '4E-BP'])].
[sujeto(['Exacerbated', mRNA, translation, during, brain, development]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, linked, to, autism, spectrum, disorders, '(', 'ASDs)'])].
[sujeto(['Deletion', of, the, eukaryotic, initiation, factor, '4E', '(', 'eIF4E)-binding', protein, 2, gene, '(', 'Eif4ebp2),', encoding, the, suppressor, of, mRNA, translation, initiation, '4E-BP2,']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, an, imbalance, in, 'excitatory-to-inhibitory', neurotransmission, and, 'ASD-like', behaviors])].
[sujeto(['Augmented', hippocampal, 'mGluR-induced', 'long-term', depression, '(', 'LTD;', or, chemically]), verbo([induced]), complemento(['mGluR-LTD)', in, 'Eif4ebp2(-/-)', mice, was, rescued, by, mGluR1, or, mGluR5, antagonists])].

[sujeto(['Synaptically']), verbo([induced]), complemento(['LTD', was, deficient, in, 'Eif4ebp2(-/-)', 'mice,', and, this, deficit, was, not, rescued, by, group, 'I', mGluR, antagonists])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([substantive, evidence, that, the, inhibition, of, 'mGluR1/mGluR5', is, an, effective, treatment, for, physiological, and, behavioral, alterations, caused, by, exacerbated, mRNA, translation, initiation])].
[sujeto(['We', recently, demonstrated, that, the, deletion, of, a, negative, regulator, of, mRNA, translation, 'initiation,', the, eukaryotic, initiation, factor, '4E-binding', protein, 2, ',']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, 'ASD-like', behaviors, and, increased, excitatory, synaptic, activity])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, demonstrated, that, autistic, behavioral, and, electrophysiological, phenotypes, can, be, treated, in, adult, mice, with, antagonists, of, group, 'I', metabotropic, glutamate, receptors, '(', 'mGluRs),', which]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, previously, used, in, other, 'ASD', models, '(', i])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, support, the, use, of, group, 'I', mGluR, antagonists, as, a, potential, therapy, that, extends, to, autism, models]), verbo([involving]), complemento([exacerbated, mRNA, translation, initiation])].
[sujeto(['The', kinase, mTOR, '(', mammalian]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, 'rapamycin)', promotes, translation, as, well, as, cell, survival, and, proliferation, under, 'nutrient-rich', conditions])].
[sujeto(['Whereas', mTOR]), verbo([activates]), complemento([translation, through, ribosomal, protein, 'S6', kinase, '(', 'S6K)', and, eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E-binding', protein, '(', '4E-BP),', how, it, facilitates, cell, proliferation, has, remained, unclear])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([now, identified, 'p19(Arf),', an, inhibitor, of, cell, cycle, 'progression,', as, a, novel, substrate, of, 'S6K', that, is, targeted, to, promote, cell, proliferation])].
[sujeto(['Serum', stimulation]), verbo([induced]), complemento([activation, of, the, 'mTOR-S6K', axis, and, consequent, phosphorylation, of, 'p19(Arf)', at, 'Ser(75)'])].
[sujeto(['Phosphorylated', 'p19(Arf)', was, then]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([by, the, 'F-box', protein, 'β-TrCP2', and, degraded, by, the, proteasome])].
[sujeto(['Ablation', of, 'β-TrCP2', thus]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, the, arrest, of, cell, proliferation, as, a, result, of, the, stabilization, and, accumulation, of, 'p19(Arf)'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'β-TrCP2', paralog, 'β-TrCP1', had, no, effect, on, 'p19(Arf)', 'stability,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, phosphorylated, 'p19(Arf)', is, a, specific, substrate, of, 'β-TrCP2'])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, mTOR, pathway, promotes, cell, proliferation, via, 'β-TrCP2-dependent', 'p19(Arf)', degradation, under, 'nutrient-rich', conditions])].
[sujeto(['Elevated', levels, of, eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E', '(', 'eIF4E)']), verbo([enhance]), complemento([translation, of, many, 'malignancy-related', 'proteins,', such, as, vascular, endothelial, growth, factor, '(', 'VEGF),', 'c-Myc', and, osteopontin])].
[sujeto(['In', 'non-small-cell', lung, cancer, '(', 'NSCLC),', levels, of, eIF4E, are, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([compared, with, normal, lung, tissue])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, used, an, antisense, oligonucleotide, '(', 'ASO)', to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([the, expression, of, eIF4E, in, 'NSCLC', cell, lines])].
[sujeto(['Treatment', of, 'NSCLC', cells, with, the, '4EASO', resulted, in]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['cap-dependent', complex, 'formation,', decreased, cell, proliferation, and, increased, sensitivity, to, gemcitabine])].
[sujeto(['At', the, molecular, 'level,', repression, of, eIF4E, with, 'ASO', resulted, in]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([expression, of, the, oncogenic, proteins, 'VEGF,', 'c-Myc', and, 'osteopontin,', whereas, expression, of, 'β-actin', was, unaffected])].
[sujeto(['Using', in, utero, electroporation, during, 'corticogenesis,', we, show, that]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([mTORC1, activity, accelerates, axon, growth, without, multiple, axon, formation])].
[sujeto(['This', was]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([by, counteracting, mTORC1, signaling, through, p70S6Ks, '(', 'S6K1/2)', or, eukaryotic, initiation, factor, '4E-binding', protein, '(', '4E-BP1/2),', which, both, regulate, translation])].
[sujeto(['In', addition, to]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([translational, 'targets,', 'S6K1', indirectly, signals, through, 'GSK3β,', a, regulator, of, axogenesis])].

[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([the, contribution, of, translational, and, 'non-translational', downstream, effectors, such, as, 'GSK3β', to, abnormal, axon, growth, in, neurodevelopmental, mTORopathies, and, open, new, therapeutic, options, for, restoring, 'long-range', connectivity])].
[sujeto(['At', the, end, of, the, feeding, 'trial,', the, results, indicated, that, hepatopancreas, 'weight,', hepatosomatic, 'index,', hepatopancreatic, protein, 'content,', intestinal, 'weight,', intestosomatic, index, and, intestinal, protein, content]), verbo([increased]), complemento([with, increasing, dietary, 'Thr', levels, up, to, 1, '·58&nbsp;%', and, thereafter, decreased, '(', 'P&lt;&nbsp;0·05)'])].
[sujeto(['The', activities, of, 'chymotrypsin,', 'trypsin,', amylase, and, lipase, elevated, as, dietary, 'Thr', levels]), verbo([increased]), complemento([up, to, 1, '·58&nbsp;%', '(', 'P&lt;&nbsp;0·05),', while, these, activities, decreased, in, most, cases, after, 1, '·58&nbsp;%', dietary, 'Thr', except, for, chymotrypsin, and, trypsin, in, the, hepatopancreas, '(', plateau, 1, '·58-2·08&nbsp;%', 'Thr)'])].
[sujeto(['The', relative, gene, expression, levels, of, 'chymotrypsin,', 'trypsin,', 'amylase,', 'lipase,']), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, and, 'insulin-like', growth, 'factor-I', were, 'up-regulated,', and, the, highest, values, were, observed, with, 1, '·58&nbsp;%', dietary, 'Thr', or, 1, '·58', and, 2, '·08&nbsp;%', dietary, 'Thr,', whereas, the, relative, gene, expression, levels, of, eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E-binding', protein, 2, gradually, decreased, '(', 'P&lt;&nbsp;0·10)', as, dietary, 'Thr', levels, increased, up, to, 1, '·58&nbsp;%', and, thereafter, significantly, increased, '(', 'P&lt;&nbsp;0·05),', which, could, explain, that, about, 1, '·58&nbsp;%', dietary, 'Thr', could, improve, the, growth, and, development, of, digestive, organs, and, activities, of, digestive, enzymes, of, juvenile, blunt, snout, bream])].
[sujeto(['The', eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '(', 'eIF-4E)']), verbo([has]), complemento([recently, been, cloned, from, 'human,', 'mouse,', and, yeast])].
[sujeto(['This', polypeptide, is, the, 'rate-limiting', component, of, the, eukaryotic, translation, apparatus, and, is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, 'mRNA-ribosome', binding, step, of, eukaryotic, protein, synthesis])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([designed, oligonucleotide, primers, to, the, 3, '\'', untranslated, region, of, the, gene, encoding, 'eIF-4E', and, specifically, amplified, the, human, gene, in, 'human/rodent', somatic, cell, hybrids, using, the, polymerase, chain, reaction])].
[sujeto(['By', this, 'method,', one, of, the, human, 'eIF-4E', genes, '(', 'EIF4EL1,', eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E-like', 1, ')']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, mapped, to, human, chromosome, 4, 'qter-4p15'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([localized, a, second, 'eIF-4E', gene, '(', 'EIF4EL2,', eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E-like', 2, ')', to, human, chromosome, 20, by, 'Southern', blot, analysis, of, mapping, panels, established, from, 'human/rodent', somatic, cell, hybrids])].
[sujeto(['This', study, demonstrated, the, feasibility, and, benefit, of, an, 'antibody-based', experimental, approach, to, identify, microRNA, functional]), verbo([targets]), complemento([from, hundreds, of, predicted, genes, using, 'miR-206', as, an, example])].
[sujeto(['Using', a, receptor, tyrosine, kinase, '(', 'RTK)', antibody, 'array,', we, identified, 7, phosphorylated, 'RTKs', that, were, significantly, differentially]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([after, 'miR-206-mimic', transfection])].
[sujeto(['Luciferase', and, 'Western-blot', assays, indicated, that, 'EIF4E', was, a, direct]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, 'miR-206'])].
[sujeto(['eIF4E,', the, major, 'cap-binding', 'protein,']), verbo([has]), complemento([long, been, considered, limiting, for, translating, the, mammalian, genome])].
[sujeto(['By', generating, an, 'Eif4e', haploinsufficient, 'mouse,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, a, 50, '%', reduction, in, eIF4E, 'expression,', while, compatible, with, normal, development, and, global, protein, 'synthesis,', significantly, impeded, cellular, transformation])].
[sujeto(['Genome-wide', translational, profiling, uncovered, a, translational, program]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, oncogenic, transformation, and, revealed, a, critical, role, for, the, dose, of, 'eIF4E,', specifically, in, translating, a, network, of, mRNAs, enriched, for, a, unique, 5, '\'', 'UTR', signature])].
[sujeto(['In', 'particular,', we, demonstrate, that, the, dose, of, eIF4E, is, essential, for]), verbo([translating]), complemento([mRNAs, that, regulate, reactive, oxygen, 'species,', fueling, transformation, and, cancer, cell, survival, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings, indicate, eIF4E, is]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([at, levels, in, excess, for, normal, development, that, are, hijacked, by, cancer, cells, to, drive, a, translational, program, supporting, tumorigenesis])].
[sujeto(['We', 'determined,', using, immortalized, human, breast, epithelial, 'cells,', that, elevated, expression, of, eIF4E, translationally]), verbo([activates]), complemento([the, transforming, growth, factor, β, '(', 'TGF-β)', 'pathway,', promoting, cell, 'invasion,', a, loss, of, cell, 'polarity,', increased, cell, 'survival,', and, other, hallmarks, of, early, neoplasia])].
[sujeto(['This', receptor, complex, acutely, sensitizes, nonmalignant, breast, epithelial, cells, to, activation, by, typically, substimulatory, levels, of]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['TGF-β'])].
[sujeto(['TGF-β', can]), verbo([promote]), complemento([cellular, differentiation, or, invasion, and, transformation])].
[sujeto(['As', a, translational, coactivator, of, 'TGF-β,', eIF4E]), verbo([confers]), complemento([selective, mRNA, 'translation,', reprogramming, nonmalignant, cells, to, an, invasive, phenotype, by, reducing, the, set, point, for, stimulation, by, activated, 'TGF-β'])].
[sujeto(['The', mammalian]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, complex, 1, '(', 'mTORC1)', is, a, critical, regulator, of, protein, synthesis])].
[sujeto(['The', best, studied]), verbo([targets]), complemento([of, mTORC1, in, translation, are, the, eukaryotic, initiation, 'factor-binding', protein, 1, '(', '4E-BP1)', and, ribosomal, protein, 'S6', kinase, 1, '(', 'S6K1)'])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, identify, the, 'La-related', protein, 1, '(', 'LARP1)', as, a, key, novel]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, mTORC1, with, a, fundamental, role, in, terminal, oligopyrimidine, '(', 'TOP)', mRNA, translation])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'LARP1', functions, as, a, key, repressor, of, 'TOP', mRNA, translation, downstream, of, mTORC1])].
[sujeto(['Our', data, show, the, 'following:', '(', 'i)', 'LARP1', associates, with, mTORC1, via, 'RAPTOR;', '(', 'ii)', 'LARP1']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'TOP', mRNAs, in, an, 'mTORC1-dependent', 'manner;', '(', 'iii)', 'LARP1', binds, the, 5, '\'', 'TOP', motif, to, repress, 'TOP', mRNA, 'translation;', and, '(', 'iv)', 'LARP1', competes, with, the, eukaryotic, initiation, factor, '(', 'eIF)', 4, 'G', for, 'TOP', mRNA, binding])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, a, 'light-', and, circadian, 'clock-regulated', 'MAPK/MNK', pathway, led, to, phosphorylation, of, the, 'cap-binding', protein, eIF4E, in, the, mouse, suprachiasmatic, nucleus, of, the, 'hypothalamus,', the, locus, of, the, master, circadian, clock, in, mammals])].
[sujeto(['Phosphorylation', of, eIF4E, specifically]), verbo([promoted]), complemento([translation, of, 'Period', 1, '(', 'Per1)', and, 'Period', 2, '(', 'Per2)', mRNAs, and, increased, the, abundance, of, basal, and, inducible, 'PER', 'proteins,', which, facilitated, circadian, clock, resetting, and, precise, timekeeping])].
[sujeto(['The', eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E', '(', 'eIF4E)', plays, an, important, role, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([gene, expression, because, eIF4E, binding, to, the, mRNA, cap, is, a, control, point, for, translation])].
[sujeto(['Dinoflagellate', eIF4E, diversity, could]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, mechanism, for, dinoflagellates, to, regulate, gene, expression, in, a, 'post-transcriptional', manner])].
[sujeto(['The', eIF4E, family, members, from, heterokonts, and, dinoflagellates, segregated, into, three, 'clades,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([at, least, three, eIF4E, cognates, were, present, in, their, common, ancestor])].
[sujeto(['Six', of, the, 'sub-clades', included, at, least, one, member, from, all, eleven, core, dinoflagellate, 'species,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([duplication, in, their, shared, ancestor])].
[sujeto(['Conservation', within, 'sub-clades', 'varied,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([different, selection, pressures])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, diverse, eIF4E, family, in, core, dinoflagellates, may, provide, a, toolkit, to, enable, selective, translation, as, a, strategy, for, controlling, gene, expression, in, these, enigmatic, eukaryotes])].
[sujeto(['Herein,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([a, previously, unidentified, 'cell-autonomous', 'Stat1', 'function,', which, is, its, ability, to, exhibit, both, antiproliferative, and, prosurvival, properties, by, facilitating, translation, of, mRNAs, encoding, for, the, 'cyclin-dependent', kinase, inhibitor, 'p27(Kip1)', and, antiapoptotic, proteins, 'X-linked', inhibitor, of, apoptosis, and, 'B-cell', lymphoma, xl])].
[sujeto(['Translation', of, the, select, mRNAs]), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, transcriptional, function, of, 'Stat1,', resulting, in, the, 'up-regulation', of, the, p110γ, subunit, of, phosphoinositide, 3, -, kinase, '(', 'PI3K)', class, 'IB', and, increased, expression, of, the, translational, repressor, translation, initiation, factor, '4E', '(', 'eIF4E)-binding', protein, 1, '(', '4EBP1)'])].

[sujeto(['As', 'such,', 'Stat1']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([cell, proliferation, but, also, renders, cells, increasingly, resistant, to, antiproliferative, effects, of, pharmacological, inhibitors, of, 'PI3K', 'and/or', mammalian, target, of, rapamycin])].
[sujeto(['4E']), verbo([binding]), complemento([proteins, '(', '4E-BPs)', play, an, important, role, in, the, regulation, of, translation, by, binding, to, eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E', '(', 'eIF4E)', and, inhibiting, assembly, of, the, eIF4F, complex])].
[sujeto(['While', phosphorylation, of, '4E-BPs', is, known, to, disrupt, their]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'eIF4E,', the, mechanism, by, which, this, occurs, has, been, unclear])].
[sujeto(['Retroviruses']), verbo([cause]), complemento([immunodeficiency, and, cancer, but, also, are, used, as, vectors, for, the, expression, of, heterologous, genes])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, transfection, into, mammalian, cells, of, lentiviral, or, gammaretroviral, 'vectors,', including, those, with, specific, 'shRNAs,']), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, a, cotransfected, gene, relative, to, standard, plasmid, vectors])].

[sujeto(['Thus,', retroviral, 'DNA']), verbo([increased]), complemento([translation, of, cointroduced, genes, in, trans, by, an, 'mTOR-independent', signaling, mechanism])].
[sujeto(['Our', experiments]), verbo([have]), complemento([broad, applications, for, the, design, of, retroviral, vectors, for, 'transfections,', 'DNA', 'vaccines,', and, gene, therapy])].
[sujeto(['Translation', is, a, complex, process]), verbo([involving]), complemento([diverse, cellular, 'proteins,', including, the, translation, initiation, factor, 'eIF4E,', which, has, been, shown, to, be, a, protein, that, is, a, point, for, translational, regulation])].

[sujeto(['Activity-dependent', neuroprotective, protein, '(', 'ADNP)', is, a, most, frequent, autism, spectrum, disorder, '(', 'ASD)-associated', gene, and, the, only, protein, significantly]), verbo([decreasing]), complemento([in, the, serum, of, 'Alzheimer\'s', disease, '(', 'AD)', patients])].
[sujeto(['The', hippocampal, transcript, for, apolipoprotein, 'E', '(', the, major, risk, gene, for, 'AD)', was, doubled, in, female, mice, compared, with, 'males,', and, further, doubled, in, the, 'ADNP(+/-)', 'females,', contrasting, a]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, 'ADNP(+/-)', males])].
[sujeto(['Previously,', overexpression, of, the, eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E', '(', 'eIF4E)']), verbo([led]), complemento([to, 'ASD-like', phenotype, in, mice])].

[sujeto(['Furthermore,', hippocampal, eIF4E, expression, was, specifically]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, young, 'ADNP(+/-)', male, mice])].
[sujeto(['The', synthesis, and, in, vitro, and, in, vivo, antibreast, and, antiprostate, cancers, activities, of, novel, 'C-4', heteroaryl, 13, -, 'cis-retinamides', that]), verbo([modulate]), complemento(['Mnk-eIF4E', and, 'AR', signaling, are, discussed])].
[sujeto(['Modifications', of, the, 'C-4', heteroaryl, substituents]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, the, 1, 'H-imidazole', is, essential, for, high, anticancer, activity])].
[sujeto(['In', these, cell, 'lines,', the, compounds]), verbo([induce]), complemento(['Mnk1/2', degradation, to, substantially, suppress, eIF4E, phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['In', 'PC', 'cells,', the, compounds]), verbo([induce]), complemento([degradation, of, both, 'full-length', androgen, receptor, '(', 'fAR)', and, splice, variant, 'AR', '(', 'AR-V7)', to, inhibit, 'AR', transcriptional, activity])].
[sujeto(['More', 'importantly,', 'VNHM-1-81']), verbo([has]), complemento([strong, in, vivo, antibreast, and, antiprostate, cancer, 'activities,', while, 'VNHM-1-73', exhibited, strong, in, vivo, antibreast, cancer, 'activity,', with, no, apparent, host, toxicity])].
[sujeto(['Clearly,', these]), verbo([lead]), complemento([compounds, are, strong, candidates, for, development, for, the, treatments, of, human, breast, and, prostate, cancers])].
[sujeto(['In', an, 'RNA', interference, '(', 'RNAi)', screen, for, '(', 'de)ubiquitinases', and, sumoylases]), verbo([modulating]), complemento([the, apoptotic, response, of, embryonic, stem, '(', 'ES)', cells, to, 'DNA', 'damage,', we, identified, the, 'E3', ubiquitin, 'ligase/ISGylase,', ariadne, homologue, 1, '(', 'ARIH1)'])].
[sujeto(['Expression', of, 'wild-type', but, not, 'ubiquitinase-defective', 'ARIH1', constructs]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([sensitization, caused, by, 'ARIH1', knockdown])].
