[sujeto(['Genotoxic', stress]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, an, enrichment, of, 'ARIH1', in, 'perinuclear,', 'ribosome-containing', regions, and, triggered, '4EHP', association, with, the, mRNA, 5, '\'', cap, as, well, as, mRNA, translation, arrest, in, an, 'ARIH1-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', restoration, of, 'DNA', 'damage-induced', translation]), verbo([arrest]), complemento([in, 'ARIH1-depleted', cells, by, means, of, an, eIF2, inhibitor, was, sufficient, to, reinstate, resistance, to, genotoxic, stress])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, identify, 'ARIH1', as, a, potent, mediator, of, 'DNA', 'damage-induced', translation]), verbo([arrest]), complemento([that, protects, stem, and, cancer, cells, against, genotoxic, stress])].
[sujeto([eIF4E, is, overexpressed, in, a, variety, of, human, 'malignancies,', but, whether, it]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, role, in, melanoma, remains, obscure])].
[sujeto(['We', hypothesized, that, eIF4E]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([melanoma, cell, proliferation, and, facilitates, the, development, of, acquired, resistance, to, the, 'BRAF', inhibitor, vemurafenib])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', in, 'BRAF(V600E)', melanoma, cell, 'lines,', vemurafenib]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['4E-BP1', 'phosphorylation,', thus, promoting, its, binding, to, eIF4E])].
[sujeto(['Conversely,', in, cells, with, acquired, resistance, to, 'vemurafenib,', there, is, an]), verbo([increased]), complemento([dependence, on, eIF4E, for, 'survival;', '4E-BP1', is, highly, phosphorylated, and, thus, 'eIF4E-4E-BP1', associations, are, impeded])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,']), verbo([increasing]), complemento([eIF4E, activity, by, silencing, '4E-BP1/2', renders, 'vemurafenib-responsive', cells, more, resistant, to, 'BRAF', inhibition])].
[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', these, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, therapeutically, targeting, eIF4E, may, be, a, viable, means, of, inhibiting, melanoma, cell, proliferation, and, overcoming, vemurafenib, resistance])].
[sujeto(['Although', the, 'MAP', 'kinase-interacting', kinases, '(', 'MNKs)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, known, for, &, 'gt;15', 'years,', their, roles, in, the, regulation, of, protein, synthesis, have, remained, obscure])].
[sujeto(['Using', a, combination, of, pharmacological, and, genetic, 'approaches,', we, show, that, 'BDNF-induced', upregulation, of, protein, synthesis]), verbo([requires]), complemento(['MEK/ERK', signaling, and, the, downstream, 'kinase,', 'MNK1,', which, phosphorylates, eukaryotic, initiation, factor, '(', 'eIF)', '4E'])].
[sujeto(['Translation', initiation, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, the, interaction, of, eIF4E, with, the, 'm(7)GTP', cap, of, mRNA, and, with, eIF4G])].
[sujeto(['The', latter, interaction, is]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, the, interactions, of, eIF4E, with, partner, 'proteins,', such, as, 'CYFIP1,', which, acts, as, a, translational, repressor])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, 'BDNF', induces, the, release, of, 'CYFIP1', from, 'eIF4E,', and, that, this, depends, on, 'MNK1'])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', this, subset, of, 'MNK1-sensitive', proteins, is, enriched, for, functions]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, neurotransmission, and, synaptic, plasticity])].
[sujeto(['Additionally,', we]), verbo([find]), complemento([significant, overlap, between, our, subset, of, proteins, whose, synthesis, is, regulated, by, 'MNK1', and, those, encoded, by, known, 'FMRP-binding', mRNAs])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'article,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, a, pharmacologic, inhibitor, of, eIF4E, 'function,', 'ribavirin,', safely, and, potently, suppresses, breast, tumor, formation])].
[sujeto(['Mechanistically,', eIF4E, silencing, or, blockade, reduced, the, invasiveness, and, metastatic, capability, of, breast, cancer, cells, in, a, manner, associated, with]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([activity, of, matrix, metalloproteinase, '(', 'MMP)-3', and, 'MMP-9'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', eIF4E, silencing, or, ribavirin, treatment]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([features, of, 'epithelial-to-mesenchymal', 'transition,', a, process, crucial, for, metastasis])].
[sujeto(['Cap-dependent', translation, is, a, potential, 'cancer-related']), verbo([target]), complemento(['(', 'oncotarget)', due, to, its, critical, role, in, cancer, initiation, and, progression])].
[sujeto(['4EGI-1']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['cap-dependent', translation, initiation, by, impairing, the, assembly, of, the, 'eIF4E/eIF4G', 'complex,', and, therefore, is, a, potential, 'anti-cancer', agent])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, '4EGI-1', also, inhibits, mTORC1, signaling, independent, of, its, inhibitory, role, on, 'cap-dependent', translation, initiation])].
[sujeto(['The', inhibition, of, mTORC1, signaling, by, '4EGI-1']), verbo([activates]), complemento(['Akt', due, to, both, abrogation, of, the, negative, feedback, loops, from, mTORC1, to, 'PI3K', and, activation, of, mTORC2])].
[sujeto(['We', further, validated, that, mTORC2, activity, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, '4EGI-1-mediated', 'Akt', activation])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([activated]), complemento(['Akt', counteracted, the, anticancer, effects, of, '4EGI-1'])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, a, combination, of, '4EGI-1and', 'Akt', inhibitor, is, a, rational, approach, for, the, treatment, of, cancer])].
[sujeto(['Consequently,', they, compete, with, eIF4G, for]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'eIF4E,', thereby, inhibiting, translation, initiation])].
[sujeto(['Mextli', '(', 'Mxt)', is, an, unusual, '4E-BP', that]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([translation, by, also, interacting, with, eIF3])].
[sujeto(['The', structures]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([unexpected, evolutionary, plasticity, in, the, 'eIF4E-binding', 'mode,', with, a, classical, bipartite, interface, for, 'Ce', 'Mxt', and, a, novel, tripartite, interface, for, 'Dm', 'Mxt'])].
[sujeto(['In', contrast, to, the, eIF4G, and, 'Ce', 'Mxt', 'complexes,', the, 'Dm', 'eIF4E-Mxt', complexes, are, resistant, to, competition, by, bipartite, '4E-BPs,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, 'Dm', 'Mxt', can, bind, eIF4E, when, eIF4G, binding, is, inhibited])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, uncovered, unexpected, diversity, in, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([modes, of, '4E-BPs,', resulting, in, eIF4E, complexes, that, display, differential, sensitivity, to, '4E-BP', regulation])].
[sujeto(['The', small, molecule, '4EGI-1,', a, potent, inhibitor, of, translation, initiation, through, disrupting, 'eIF4E/eIF4G', 'interaction,']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, exert, 'anti-cancer', effects, in, human, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, '4EGI-1', impaired, the, assembly, of, the, eIF4F, 'complex,', and, inhibited, proliferation, of, 'U251', cells, via, inducing, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['4EGI-1', treatment]), verbo([induced]), complemento([collapse, of, mitochondrial, membrane, potential, '(', 'MMP)', and, production, of, intracellular, reactive, oxygen, species, '(', 'ROS),', which, were, prevented, by, the, 'ROS', scavenger, 'N-acetyl-cysteine', '(', 'NAC)'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', '4EGI-1']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([mitochondrial, 'ATP', synthesis, via, suppressing, complex, 'I', 'activity,', but, had, no, effects, on, mitochondrial, biogenesis])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([a, significant, decrease, in, optic, atrophy, type, 1, '(', 'Opa-1)', and, mitofusin, 1, '(', 'Mfn-1)', related, to, fusion, proteins, as, well, as, an, increase, in, fission, protein, 'dynamin-related', protein, 1, '(', 'Drp-1)'])].
[sujeto(['These', data, indicate, that, the, use, of, inhibitors, that, directly]), verbo([target]), complemento([the, translation, initiation, complex, eIF4F, could, represent, a, potential, novel, approach, for, human, glioma, therapy])].
[sujeto(['Our', previous]), verbo([report]), complemento([suggests, that, 'up-regulation', of, receptor, for, activated, 'C-kinase', 1, '(', 'RACK1)', in, 'HSCs', is, critical, for, liver, fibrogenesis])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'RACK1', promoted, macrophage, conditioned, medium, '(', 'MCM)-induced', assembly, of, eIF4F, and, phosphorylation, of, eIF4E, in, primary, 'HSCs'])].
[sujeto(['RACK1']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([the, translation, and, expression, of, 'pro-fibrogenic', factors, collagen, 1, 'α1,', snail, and, cyclin, 'E1', induced, by, 'MCM'])].
[sujeto(['Administration', of, 'PP242', or, 'knock-down', of, eIF4E]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['RACK1-stimulated', collagen, 1, α1, 'production,', proliferation, and, migration, in, primary, 'HSCs'])].

[sujeto(['Deregulated', mRNA, translation]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, disease, development, and, in, part, is, controlled, by, a, eukaryotic, initiation, complex, eIF4F, '(', composed, of, 'eIF4E,', eIF4G, and, 'eIF4A)'])].
[sujeto(['We', demonstrate, here, that, the, cap]), verbo([bound]), complemento([fraction, from, lymphoma, cells, was, enriched, with, eIF4G, and, eIF4E, indicating, that, lymphoma, cells, exist, in, an, activated, translational, state])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 77, '%', '(', 110, /, 142, ')', of, diffuse, large, 'B', cell, lymphoma, tumors]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([eIF4E, and, this, was, associated, with, an, inferior, event, free, survival])].
[sujeto(['Over-expression', of, 'wild-type', eIF4E, '(', 'eIF4E(WT))', but, not, 'cap-mutant', eIF4E, '(', 'eIF4E(cap', 'mutant))']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, activation, of, the, eIF4F, complex])].
[sujeto(['Treatment', with, the, 'active-site', dual, mTOR, inhibitor, 'CC214-1', reduced, the, level, of, the, eIF4F, complex, by]), verbo([decreasing]), complemento([the, cap, bound, fraction, of, eIF4G, and, increasing, the, levels, of, '4E-BP1'])].
[sujeto(['CC214-1']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([both, the, cap, dependent, and, global, protein, translation])].

[sujeto(['Inhibition', of, eIF4E, with, shRNA, further]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, 'CC214-1', induced, inhibition, of, the, eIF4F, 'complex,', 'c-Myc,', cyclin, 'D3', 'translation,', and, colony, formation])].
[sujeto(['These', studies, demonstrate, that, the, eIF4F, complex, is, deregulated, in, aggressive, lymphoma, and, that, dual, mTOR, therapy]), verbo([has]), complemento([therapeutic, potential, in, these, patients])].
[sujeto(['Initiation', is, a, highly]), verbo([regulated]), complemento(['rate-limiting', step, of, mRNA, translation])].

[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([addressed, the, mechanisms, that, determine, genesis, of, the, correct, numbers, of, neurons, during, 'development,', focusing, on, the, embryonic, cortex])].

[sujeto(['Hypoxia']), verbo([promotes]), complemento([tumor, evolution, and, 'metastasis,', and, 'hypoxia-inducible', 'factor-1α', '(', 'HIF-1α)', is, a, key, regulator, of, 'hypoxia-related', cellular, processes, in, cancer])].

[sujeto(['Here,', trypanosome, 'PABP1', and, 'PABP2']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, further, characterised])].

[sujeto(['Eukaryotic', translation, initiation, factor, '4E', '(', 'eIF4E)']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, the, 'm(7)GTP', of, capped, mRNAs, and, is, an, essential, component, of, the, translational, machinery, that, recruits, the, 40, 'S', small, ribosomal, subunit])].

[sujeto(['Two', related, eukaryotic, initiation, 'factor-4E']), verbo([binding]), complemento([proteins, '(', '4E-BP1', and, '4E-BP2)', were, recently, characterized, for, their, capacity, to, bind, specifically, to, eIF4E, and, inhibit, its, function])].

[sujeto(['The', results, indicated, that, compared, with, optimal, 'PA', 'supplementation,', 'PA', deficiency, '(', 1.31, &, 'nbsp;mg/kg', 'diet)']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([gill, interleukin, 10, ',', transforming, growth, factor, 'β1,', inhibitor, of, κBα, '(', 'IκBα),', 'eIF4E-binding', protein, 2, ',', 'Claudin', b, and, 'ZO-1', mRNA, 'levels;', 'anti-superoxide', anion, 'activity,', and, activities, and, mRNA, levels, of, 'copper/zinc', superoxide, 'dismutase,', manganese, superoxide, 'dismutase,', glutathione, 'peroxidase,', glutathione, reductase, and, 'NF-E2-related', factor, '(', 'P&nbsp;&lt;&nbsp;0'])].

[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', 'Exodus-1,', -, 2, ',', and, -, 3, did, not, affect, the, cytolytic, activity, of, resting, or]), verbo([activated]), complemento([peripheral, blood, 'NK', cells])].

[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, results, indicate, that, 'Exodus-2', and, -, 3, can]), verbo([participate]), complemento([in, the, recruitment, and, proliferation, of, activated, 'NK', cells])].
[sujeto(['Exodus-2', and, -, 3, may]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([interactions, between, 'T', cells, and, 'NK', cells, that, are, crucial, for, the, generation, of, optimal, immune, responses])].
[sujeto(['Chemokines', are, a, family, of, related, proteins, that]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([leukocyte, infiltration, into, inflamed, tissue, and, play, important, roles, in, disease, processes])].
[sujeto(['However,', chemokines, that]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([normal, progenitors, rarely, inhibit, proliferation, of, hematopoietic, progenitors, from, patients, with, chronic, myelogenous, leukemia, '(', 'CML)'])].
[sujeto(['These', 'chemokines,', 'Exodus-1/LARC/MIP-3alpha,', 'Exodus-2/SLC/6Ckine/TCA4,', and, 'Exodus-3/CKbeta11/MIP-3beta,', were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, inhibit, proliferation, of, normal, human, marrow, progenitors])].
[sujeto(['The', study, described, here]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, these, chemokines, also, inhibited, the, proliferation, of, progenitors, in, every, sample, of, marrow, from, patients, with, 'CML', that, was, tested])].
[sujeto([2000, ;, 95, :, 1506, -, 1508, ')', 'Chemokines']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, hypothesized, to, contribute, to, the, selectivity, of, lymphocyte, trafficking, not, only, as, 'chemoattractants,', but, also, by, triggering, 'integrin-dependent', sticking, '(', 'arrest)', of, circulating, lymphocytes, at, venular, sites, of, extravasation])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, 'T', cells, roll, on, most, 'Peyer\'s', patch, high, endothelial, venules, '(', 'PP-HEVs),', but, preferentially]), verbo([arrest]), complemento([in, segments, displaying, high, levels, of, luminal, secondary, lymphoid, tissue, chemokine, '(', 'SLC)', '(', 6, 'Ckine,', 'Exodus-2,', 'thymus-derived', chemotactic, agent, 4, '[', 'TCA-4])'])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([arrest]), complemento([is, selectively, inhibited, by, functional, deletion, '(', 'desensitization)', of, 'CC', chemokine, receptor, 7, '(', 'CCR7),', the, receptor, for, 'SLC', and, for, macrophage, inflammatory, protein, '(', 'MIP)-3beta', '(', 'EBV-induced', molecule, 1, ligand, chemokine, '[', 'ELC]),', and, does, not, occur, in, mutant, 'DDD/1', mice, that, are, deficient, in, these, 'CCR7', ligands])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', pertussis, 'toxin-sensitive', 'B', cell, sticking, does, not]), verbo([require]), complemento(['SLC', or, 'MIP-3beta', 'signaling,', and, occurs, efficiently, in, 'SLC(low/-)', 'HEV', segments, in, 'wild-type', 'mice,', and, in, the, 'SLC-negative', 'HEVs', of, 'DDD/1', mice])].
[sujeto(['Remarkably,', sites, of, 'T', and, 'B', cell, firm, adhesion, are, segregated, in, 'PPs,', with, 'HEVs', supporting, 'B', cell, accumulation, concentrated, in, or, near, 'follicles,', the]), verbo([target]), complemento([domain, of, most, 'B', cells, entering, 'PPs,', whereas, 'T', cells, preferentially, accumulate, in, interfollicular, 'HEVs'])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, fundamental, difference, in, signaling, requirements, for, 'PP-HEV', recognition, by, 'T', and, 'B', 'cells,', and, describe, an, unexpected, level, of, specialization, of, 'HEVs', that, may, allow, 'differential,', segmental, control, of, lymphocyte, subset, recruitment, into, functionally, distinct, lymphoid, microenvironments, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['After', initial, tethering, and, rolling, via, 'L-selectin,', firm, adhesion, of, 'T', cells]), verbo([requires]), complemento([rapid, upregulation, of, lymphocyte, 'function-associated', antigen, 1, '(', 'LFA-1)', adhesiveness, by, a, previously, unknown, pathway, that, activates, a, 'Galpha(i)-linked', receptor])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, used, intravital, microscopy, of, murine, 'PLNs', to, study, the, role, of, 'thymus-derived', chemotactic, agent, '(', 'TCA)-4', '(', secondary, lymphoid, tissue, 'chemokine,', 6, 'Ckine,', 'Exodus-2)', in, homing, of, adoptively, transferred, 'T', cells, from, 'T-GFP', 'mice,', a, transgenic, strain, that]), verbo([expresses]), complemento([green, fluorescent, protein, '(', 'GFP)', selectively, in, naive, 'T', lymphocytes, '(', 'T(GFP)', 'cells)'])].

[sujeto(['TCA-4', protein, was, not, detected, on, the, luminal, surface, of, 'PLN', 'HEVs', in, 'plt/plt', 'mice,', which]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, congenital, defect, in, 'T', cell, homing, to, 'PLNs'])].
[sujeto(['Accordingly,', 'T(GFP)', cells, rolled, but, did, not]), verbo([arrest]), complemento([in, 'plt/plt', 'HEVs'])].

[sujeto(['The', chemokine, receptor, 'CCR-7', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'T,', 'NK,', and, dendritic, cells, in, a, 'time-ordered', and, 'stimulus-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Thorough', analyses, of, the, pharmacological, profiles, of, the, recombinant, ligands, for, 'CCR-7,', 'MIP-3beta/ELC/CK-beta', 11, ',', and, 'SLC/Exodus-2/TCA4/6C-kine,', using, 'CCR-7-expressing', 'HEK-293E', transfectants, determine, that, ligands, both]), verbo([bind]), complemento([with, a, 'K(d)', in, the, 100, pM, 'range-10-', to, 100, -, fold, greater, affinities, than, published, 'K(d)', values])].

[sujeto(['The', 'CC', chemokine, known, as, 6, 'Ckine', '(', 'SLC,', 'Exodus-2,', or, 'TCA4)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, identified, as, a, ligand, for, 'CCR7'])].
[sujeto(['Mouse', 6, 'Ckine']), verbo([has]), complemento([also, been, shown, to, signal, through, mouse, 'CXCR3', and, share, some, of, the, activities, of, 'IFN-gamma', inducible, protein, 10, and, monokine, induced, by, 'IFN-gamma'])].
[sujeto(['Nonetheless,', human, 6, 'Ckine']), verbo([has]), complemento([not, been, shown, to, bind, 'CXCR3', receptor, or, have, angiostatic, activity])].

[sujeto(['The', attachment, of, leukocytes, to, the, endothelium, is, a, multistep, process, that, depends, upon, a, very, rapid]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, the, adhesive, activity, of, leukocyte, integrins])].
[sujeto(['A', pertussis, 'toxin-sensitive', pathway]), verbo([stimulates]), complemento(['integrin-dependent', lymphocyte, adhesion, to, 'Peyer\'s', patch, high, endothelial, venules, in, 'vivo,', but, the, factors, responsible, for, activating, this, pathway, have, not, been, identified, previously])].

[sujeto(['Immobilized', 'SLC']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, adhesion, of, 'HUT-78', 'T', cells, and, human, 'PBLs', to, mucosal, addressin, cell, adhesion, 'molecule-1,', a, protein, that, is, expressed, on, 'Peyer\'s', patch, and, mesenteric, lymph, node, high, endothelial, venules])].

[sujeto(['Similar', responses, were, obtained, with, 'EBI1', ligand, chemokine, '(', 'ELC),', and, sequential, stimulation, with, both, chemokines]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, 'cross-desensitization,', suggesting, that, 'SLC', acts, via, the, 'ELC', 'receptor,', 'CCR7'])].
[sujeto(['This', was, confirmed, using, murine, 'pre-B', cells, stably, transfected, with, 'CCR7', which]), verbo([bound]), complemento(['SLC', with, high, affinity, and, showed, chemotaxis, and, 'Ca2+', mobilization, in, response, to, both, 'SLC', and, 'ELC'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'T', lymphocytes, 'PHA', and, 'IL-2,', which]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([chemotactic, 'responsiveness,', also, markedly, enhanced, 'CCR7', expression])].
[sujeto(['The', beta, chemokine, known, as, 6, -, 'C-kine,', secondary, 'lymphoid-tissue', chemokine, '(', 'SLC),', 'TCA4,', or, 'Exodus-2', '(', herein, referred, to, as, 6, 'CK/SLC)', can]), verbo([trigger]), complemento([rapid, 'integrin-dependent', arrest, of, lymphocytes, rolling, under, physiological, shear, and, is, highly, expressed, by, high, endothelial, 'venules,', specialized, vessels, involved, in, lymphocyte, homing, from, the, blood, into, lymph, nodes, and, 'Peyer\'s', patches])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 6, 'CK/SLC', and, 'MIP-3beta', attract, the, same, major, populations, of, circulating, 'lymphocytes,', including, naive, and, memory, 'T', cells, &, 'gt;', 'B', cells, '(', but, not, natural, killer, 'cells);', desensitization, to, 'MIP-3beta']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([lymphocyte, chemotaxis, to, 6, 'CK/SLC', but, not, to, the, alpha, chemokine, 'SDF-1', '(', stromal, 'cell-derived', 'factor);', and, 6, 'CK/SLC', competes, for, 'MIP-3beta', binding, to, resting, mouse, lymphocytes])].

[sujeto(['SDF-1', '(', also, called, 'PBSF),', 6, -, 'C-kine', '(', also, called, 'Exodus-2),', and, 'MIP-3beta', '(', also, called, 'ELC', or, 'Exodus-3)']), verbo([induced]), complemento([adhesion, of, most, circulating, 'lymphocytes,', including, most, 'CD4+', 'T', 'cells;', and, 'MIP-3alpha', '(', also, called, 'LARC', or, 'Exodus-1)', triggered, adhesion, of, 'memory,', but, not, 'naïve,', 'CD4+', 'T', cells])].

[sujeto(['Although', the, mechanisms, are, 'unknown,', we]), verbo([find]), complemento([that, the, chemokine, 'CCL21', '(', also, known, as, 'TCA4,', 'SLC,', 6, 'Ckine),', a, ligand, for, the, chemokine, receptor, 'CCR7,', can, regulate, homeostasis, of, 'CD4', '(', but, not, 'CD8)', 'T', cells])].
[sujeto(['Ag-specific', 'CD4', 'T', cells, transferred, into, 'Ag-expressing', mice, proliferated, and]), verbo([induced]), complemento([autoimmunity, only, in, lymphopenic, recipients])].

[sujeto(['To', test, whether, accumulation, of, naive, lymphocytes, is, sufficient, to]), verbo([trigger]), complemento([lymphoid, 'development,', we, generated, mice, with, islet, expression, of, the, chemokine, 'TCA4/SLC'])].

[sujeto(['Chemokines']), verbo([induce]), complemento([chemotaxis, of, hematopoietic, progenitor, cells, '(', 'HPC),', and, suppress, their, proliferation])].
[sujeto(['In', this, study, we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'SLC/', 'Exodus2/6Ckine/TCA4', '(', hereafter, termed, 'SLC)', is, a, chemoattractant, for, human, 'CD34+', 'HPC'])].
[sujeto(['SLC', mainly]), verbo([induces]), complemento([preferential, chemotaxis, of, macrophage, progenitors])].

[sujeto(['It', was, hypothesised, that, lymphangiogenesis, is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, pathophysiology, of, 'HP', via, cell, transport])].
[sujeto(['BALF', 'VEGF-C', and, 'CCL21', levels, were]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, patients, with, 'HP', compared, to, healthy, 'volunteers,', but, not, patients, with, 'IPF'])].
[sujeto(['According', to, the, immunohistochemical, 'analyses,', 'CCL21', was]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, lymphatic, endothelium, in, both, conditions, and, 'CCR7(+)', cells, were, aggregated, around, lymphatics, in, patients, with, 'HP,', but, not, in, patients, with, 'IPF'])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['BALF', 'VEGF-D', levels, were, associated, with, lymphatic, alveolitis, 'intensity,', and, 'CCL21', with, lung, function, impairment])].
[sujeto(['CsCCL21', contains, two]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['N-terminal', cysteine, residues, in, a, 'NCCL', motif, and, is, phylogenetically, related, to, the, 'CCL19/21/25', subgroup, of, 'CC', chemokines])].
[sujeto(['CsCCL21', was, constitutively]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, nine, tissues, and, significantly, upregulated, by, bacterial, and, viral, infection])].
[sujeto(['The', recombinant, 'CsCCL21', '(', 'rCsCCL21)']), verbo([induced]), complemento([migration, of, peripheral, blood, leukocytes])].
[sujeto(['When', the, two]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([cysteine, residues, in, the, 'NCCL', motif, were, 'mutated,', the, chemotactic, activity, of, rCsCCL21, was, abolished])].
[sujeto([rCsCCL21]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([the, resistance, of, tongue, sole, against, bacterial, 'infection,', but, the, mutant, protein, with, 'NCCL', mutation, lacked, this, antibacterial, effect])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'CsCCL21', is, a, functional, 'CC', chemokine, with, the, ability, to, recruit, leukocytes, and, is, involved, in, antibacterial, immunity, in, a, manner, that, requires, the, conserved, 'NCCL', motif])].
[sujeto(['The', 'CC-chemokine', 'CCL21', 'is,', via, its, receptor, 'CCR7,', one, of, the, key, regulators, of, inflammation, and, immune, cell, 'recruitment,']), verbo([participates]), complemento([in, various, inflammatory, 'disorders,', including, cardiovascular, ones])].
[sujeto(['Neutralization', of, 'CCL21', by, intravenous, injection, of, 'anti-CCL21', monoclonal, antibody, reduced, infarct, size, after, 'AMI,']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([serum, levels, of, neutrophil, and, monocyte, chemo, attractants, post, 'AMI,', diminished, neutrophil, and, macrophage, recruitment, in, infarcted, 'myocardium,', and, suppressed, 'MMP-9', and, total, collagen, content, in, myocardium])].
[sujeto(['Our', study, indicated, that, 'CCL21', was]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, cardiac, remodeling, post, infarction, and, 'anti-CCL21', strategies, might, be, useful, in, the, treatment, of, 'AMI'])].
[sujeto(['Type', 1, diabetes, mellitus, '(', 'T1D)', is, a, chronic, autoimmune, disease]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, the, selective, destruction, of, pancreatic, β, 'cells,', followed, by, 'hyperglycemia,', oxidative, stress, and, the, subsequent, extensive, impairment, of, immune, cell, 'functions,', a, phenomenon, responsible, for, the, development, of, chronic, diabetic, complications])].
[sujeto(['First,', the, induction, of, diabetes, in, mice, was, associated, with, hyperglycemia, and, significant]), verbo([decreases]), complemento([in, the, insulin, level, and, the, lymphocyte, count])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'context,', diabetic, mice, exhibited, severe, diabetic, 'complications,', as, demonstrated, by, a, significant]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, the, levels, of, 'IL-2,', 'IL-4', and, 'IL-7,', prolonged, elevation, of, the, levels, of, 'pro-inflammatory', cytokines, '(', 'IL-1β,', 'IL-6', and, 'TNF-α)', and, reactive, oxygen, species, '(', 'ROS)', and, altered, lipid, profiles, compared, with, control, 'non-diabetic', mice])].
[sujeto(['Most', 'importantly,', compared, with, untreated, diabetic, 'mice,', diabetic, mice, treated, with, propolis, exhibited, significantly]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([lymphocyte, proliferation, and, chemotaxis, towards, 'CCL21', and, 'CXCL12'])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([the, potential, 'immuno-modulatory', effects, of, 'propolis,', which, acts, as, a, natural, antioxidant, to, enhance, the, function, of, immune, cells, during, diabetes])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'Ag', recognition, at, the, effector, site, reduced, the, tissue, egress, of, proinflammatory, 'Th1', cells, in, a, mouse, model, of, delayed, hypersensitivity])].
[sujeto(['Transgenic', expression, of, &, 'quot;tissue', exit, 'receptor&quot;', 'CCR7']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([lymphatic, egress, of, 'Ag-sequestered', 'Th1', cells, from, the, inflamed, site, and, alleviated, inflammation])].

[sujeto(['The', chemokine, 'C', receptor, 7, '(', 'CCR7)', is, a, 'G-protein-coupled', heptahelical, receptor, '(', 'GPCR)', that, is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([on, a, wide, variety, of, cells, including, memory, 'T', 'cells,', 'B', 'cells,', mature, dendritic, 'cells,', and, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['Our', 'ChIP', assays, further, show, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'Sp-1,', 'Sp-3', and, 'NFAT-1', transcription, factors, to, their, potential, binding, sites, in, the, 1, 'Kb', promoter, region, with, the, later, found, to, inhibit, whilst, 'Sp-1,', and, 'Sp-3', were, found, to, stimulate, 'CCR7', expression, as, demonstrated, by, transfection, assays])].
[sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', in, addition, to, the, known, 'let-7', regulation, of, 'CCR7,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento(['miR-21', to, have, a, highly, conserved, target, region, in, 'CCR7', 3, '\'', 'UTR', and, to, be, significantly, 'down-regulated', during, the, course, of, dendritic, cell, 'maturation,', allowing, for, high, expression, of, 'CCR7'])].
[sujeto(['Apoptosis-inducing', 'factor,', 'mitochondrion-associated', 2, '(', 'Aifm2),', is, a, 'DNA-binding', oxoreductase, protein, that]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['MEL', cells, were, transfected, with, siRNA]), verbo([targeting]), complemento(['Aifm2', for, 24, h, and, evaluated, by, cell, 'counting,', flow, cytometry, with, annexin, 'V', and, 'PI', staining, and, gene, expression, analysis])].
[sujeto(['However,', 'Aifm2', knockdown, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, the, erythropoietic, transcription, factor, 'Klf1', '(', 2.9, '±0'])].
[sujeto([5, ')', and]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['α-', and, 'β-globin', expression, '(', 0.6, '±0'])].
[sujeto(['Erythropoiesis,', in, which, committed, progenitor, cells, generate, millions, of, erythrocytes, 'daily,']), verbo([involves]), complemento([dramatic, changes, in, the, chromatin, structure, and, transcriptome, of, 'erythroblasts,', prior, to, their, enucleation])].
[sujeto(['While', the, involvement, of, the, 'master-regulatory', transcription, factors, 'GATA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 1, '(', 'GATA-1)', and, 'GATA-2', in, this, process, is, 'established,', the, mechanistic, contributions, of, many, 'chromatin-modifying/remodeling', enzymes, in, red, cell, biology, remain, enigmatic])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'system,', 'SetD8']), verbo([promoted]), complemento([erythroblast, maturation, and, 'survival,', and, this, did, not, involve, upregulation, of, the, established, regulator, of, erythroblast, survival, 'Bcl-x(L)'])].
[sujeto(['Elevating', 'GATA-2', levels, in, erythroid, precursors, yielded, a, maturation, block, comparable, to, that]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'SetD8', downregulation])].
[sujeto(['As', lowering, 'GATA-2', expression, in, the, context, of, 'SetD8', knockdown, did, not, rescue, erythroid, 'maturation,', we, propose, that, 'SetD8', regulation, of, erythroid, maturation]), verbo([involves]), complemento([multiple, target, genes])].
[sujeto(['These', results, establish, 'SetD8', as, a, determinant, of, erythroid, cell, maturation, and]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, framework, for, understanding, how, a, broadly, expressed, 'histone-modifying', enzyme, mediates, 'cell-type-specific', 'GATA', factor, function])].
[sujeto(['The', normal, expression, of, 'β-globin', protein, in, mature, erythrocytes, is, critically, dependent, on, 'post-transcriptional', events, in, erythroid, progenitors, that]), verbo([ensure]), complemento([the, high, stability, of, 'β-globin', mRNA])].
[sujeto(['Previous', work]), verbo([has]), complemento([revealed, that, these, regulatory, processes, require, 'AUF-1', and, 'YB-1,', two, 'RNA-binding', proteins, that, assemble, an, mRNP, 'β-complex', on, the, 'β-globin', 3, '\'', 'UTR'])].

[sujeto(['Autophagy', is, a, process, that]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, the, degradation, of, unnecessary, or, dysfunctional, cellular, components, and, 'long-lived', protein, aggregates])].
[sujeto(['Here,', the, modulators, of, autophagy, that]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([erythroid, differentiation, were, 'summarized,', including, 'autophagy-related', '(', 'Atg)', 'genes,', the, 'B-cell', lymphoma, 2, '(', 'Bcl-2)', family, member, 'Bcl-2/adenovirus', 'E1B', 19, kDa, interacting, protein, 3, -, like, '(', 'Nix/Binp3L),', transcription, factors, globin, transcription, factor, 1, '(', 'GATA1)', and, forkhead, box, 'O3', '(', 'FoxO3),', intermediary, factor, 'KRAB-associated', protein1, '(', 'KAP1),', and, other, 'modulators,', such, as, focal, adhesion, kinase, 'family-interacting', protein, of, 200, -, kDa, '(', 'FIP200),', 'Ca2+', and, 15, -, lipoxygenase])].
[sujeto(['The', 'CD71/Ter119', combination]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, widely, used, to, reflect, dynamic, maturation, of, erythrocytes, in, vivo])].

[sujeto(['Growth', factor, independence, 1, '(', 'Gfi-1)', is, a, part, of, the, transcriptional, network, that]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, development, of, adult, hematopoietic, stem, and, progenitor, cells])].

[sujeto(['Emerging', evidence]), verbo([has]), complemento([shown, that, microRNAs, have, key, roles, in, regulating, various, normal, physiological, 'processes,', whereas, their, deregulated, expression, is, correlated, with, various, diseases])].
[sujeto(['Recent', work, indicated, that, 'miR-146a']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, close, relationship, with, inflammation, and, autoimmune, diseases])].

[sujeto(['Although', master, regulatory, transcription, 'factors,', including, 'GATA']), verbo([binding]), complemento(['protein-2', '(', 'GATA-2),', have, crucial, roles, in, these, 'mechanisms,', how, such, factors, are, controlled, in, developmentally, dynamic, systems, is, poorly, understood])].
[sujeto(['Previously,', we, described, five, dispersed, 'Gata2', locus, 'sequences,', termed, the, -, 77, ',', -, 3.9, ',', -, 2.8, ',', -, 1.8, ',', and, +, 9.5, 'GATA', switch, 'sites,', which, contain, evolutionarily]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['GATA', motifs, occupied, by, 'GATA-2', and, 'GATA-1', in, hematopoietic, precursors, and, erythroid, 'cells,', respectively])].

[sujeto(['Loss-of-function', analyses]), verbo([provided]), complemento([evidence, for, a, mechanism, in, which, a, mediator, of, 'long-range', transcriptional, control, '[', 'LIM', domain, binding, 1, '(', 'LDB1)]', and, a, chromatin, remodeler, '[', 'Brahma', related, gene, 1, '(', 'BRG1)]', synergize, through, the, +, 9.5, 'site,', conferring, expression, of, 'GATA-2,', which, is, known, to, promote, the, genesis, and, survival, of, hematopoietic, stem, cells])].
[sujeto(['Although', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, several, miRNAs, that, regulate, erythroid, commitment, and, 'differentiation,', we, do, not, understand, the, mechanism, by, which, the, crucial, erythroid, transcription, 'factors,', 'GATA-1and', 'NF-E2', directly, regulate, and, control, differentiation, via, miRNA, pathways])].

[sujeto(['Here,', we, use, global, gene, expression, analysis, to, identify, 28, transcription, factors, and, 19, transcriptional, cofactors]), verbo([induced]), complemento([during, terminal, erythroid, differentiation, whose, promoters, are, enriched, for, binding, by, 'GATA1', and, 'TAL1'])].
[sujeto(['TFDP2', is, a, critical, cofactor]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, proper, cell, cycle, control, and, gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['GATA1', and, 'TAL1', are]), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, the, regulatory, regions, of, 'Tfdp2', and, upregulate, its, expression, and, knockdown, of, 'Tfdp2', results, in, significantly, reduced, rates, of, proliferation, as, well, as, reduced, upregulation, of, many, 'erythroid-important', genes])].
[sujeto(['Loss', of, 'Tfdp2', also, globally]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([the, normal, downregulation, of, many, 'E2F2', target, 'genes,', including, those, that, regulate, the, cell, 'cycle,', causing, cells, to, accumulate, in, 'S', phase, and, resulting, in, increased, erythrocyte, size])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, high, plasticity, regions, '(', 'HPRs)', can, be, divided, into, two, functionally, and, mechanistically, distinct, 'subsets,', which, correspond, to, 'CpG', island, '(', 'CGI)', proximal, or, distal, 'regions,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', we, predicted, and, experimentally, validated, that, the, principal, hematopoietic, regulator, 'T-cell', acute, lymphocytic, 'leukemia-1', '(', 'TAL1)', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, regulating, 'H3K27me3', variations, in, collaboration, with, the, transcription, factor, growth, factor, independent, 1, 'B', '(', 'GFI1B),', providing, fresh, insights, into, the, 'context-specific', role, of, 'TAL1', in, erythropoiesis])].
[sujeto(['Activin', 'A,', a, member, of, the, transforming, growth, factor, '(', 'TGF)-β', 'superfamily,']), verbo([induces]), complemento([the, erythropoiesis, of, hematopoietic, progenitor, cells])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', a, luciferase, reporter, assay, showed, that, 'IFN-γ']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([activin, 'A-induced', 'ζ-globin', promoter, activation, in, 'K562', erythroblast, cells, in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['IFN-γ', also]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([the, activation, of, activin, 'A-induced', 'α-globin', promoter])].

[sujeto(['Chromatin', immunoprecipitation, revealed, that, 'NF-E2p45']), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, the, upstream, regulatory, element, '(', 'HS-40)', of, the, 'α-globin', gene, cluster, in, response, to, activin, 'A,', whereas, 'c-Jun', eliminated, this, binding])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'IFN-γ', modulates, 'NF-κB/c-Jun', to, antagonize, activin, 'A-mediated', 'NF-E2', transcriptional, activity, on, globin, gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['The', lack, of, powerful, genetic, associations]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, heritability, is, not, entirely, attributable, to, gene, variations])].
[sujeto(['Elucidation', of, the, genetic, pathways, that, control, red, blood, cell, development]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, a, central, goal, of, erythropoiesis, research, over, the, past, decade])].
[sujeto(['Notably,', data, from, several, recent, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([provided, new, insights, into, the, regulation, of, erythroid, gene, transcription])].
[sujeto(['Transcription', profiling, demonstrates, that, erythropoiesis, is, mainly, controlled, by, a, small, group, of, 'lineage-restricted', transcription, factors, '[', 'Gata']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 1, '(', 'Gata1),', 'T', cell, acute, lymphocytic, leukemia, 1, protein, '(', 'Tal1),', and, 'Erythroid', 'Kruppel-like', factor, '(', 'EKLF;', henceforth, referred, to, as, 'Klf1)]'])].
[sujeto(['Binding-site', mapping, using, 'ChIP-Seq', indicates, that, most, 'DNA-bound', 'Gata1', and, 'Tal1', proteins, are, contained, within, higher, order, complexes, '(', 'Ldb1', 'complexes)', that, include, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([adapters, 'Ldb1', and, 'Lmo2'])].

[sujeto(['unc-115', mutants]), verbo([have]), complemento([defects, in, a, subset, of, 'axons,', particularly, as, the, affected, axons, change, environments, during, outgrowth])].
[sujeto(['The', 'unc-115', gene, encodes, a, putative, 'actin-binding', protein, that, is, similar, to, the, human, 'actin-binding', protein, 'abLIM/limatin;', it]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, villin, headpiece, domain, and, three, 'LIM', domains, that, could, mediate, protein, interactions])].
[sujeto(['unc-115', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, neurons, during, their, development, and, is, required, 'cell-autonomously', in, certain, neurons, for, normal, axon, guidance])].
[sujeto(['We', propose, that, 'UNC-115']), verbo([modulates]), complemento([the, growth, cone, actin, cytoskeleton, in, response, to, signals, received, by, growth, cone, receptors])].
[sujeto(['LIM', 'domains,']), verbo([found]), complemento([in, over, 60, 'proteins,', play, key, roles, in, the, regulation, of, developmental, pathways])].
[sujeto(['They', were, first, identified, as, 'cysteine-rich', motifs]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, the, three, proteins, 'Lin-11,', 'Isl-1,', and, 'Mec-3'])].
[sujeto(['LIM', proteins, frequently, contain, 'DNA-binding', 'homeodomains,', allowing, these, proteins, to]), verbo([activate]), complemento([transcription])].
[sujeto(['LIM', domains, also, function, as, 'protein-binding', 'interfaces,']), verbo([mediating]), complemento([specific, 'protein-protein', interactions])].
[sujeto(['Limatin', is, a, novel, 'LIM', protein, that]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, actin, filaments, via, a, domain, that, is, homologous, to, erythrocyte, dematin])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, murine, and, human, chromosomal, localizations, of, limatin, '(', 'LIMAB1)'])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', 10, q25, is, a, region, of, frequent]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, heterozygosity, in, human, 'tumors,', thus, identifying, limatin, as, a, candidate, tumor, suppressor, gene])].
[sujeto(['Chronic', stress]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([cognitive, impairment, and, dendritic, spine, loss, in, hippocampal, neurons])].
[sujeto(['In', this, animal, model, of, 'depression,', spine]), verbo([loss]), complemento([probably, involves, a, weakening, of, the, interaction, between, 'pre-', and, postsynaptic, cell, adhesion, 'molecules,', such, as, 'N-cadherin,', followed, by, disruption, of, the, cytoskeleton])].
[sujeto(['Via', their, effector, 'LIM', kinase, '(', 'LIMK),', 'RhoA', and, 'ras-related', 'C3', botulinum, toxin, substrate, 1, '(', 'RAC)', 'GTPases', phosphorylate, and]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['cofilin,', an, 'actin-depolymerizing', 'molecule,', favoring, spine, growth])].
[sujeto(['Some', 'micro-RNAs', negatively, control, the, translation, of, specific, mRNAs]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'Rho', 'GTPase', signaling])].
[sujeto(['For', 'example,', 'miR-138', indirectly]), verbo([activates]), complemento(['RhoA,', and, 'miR-134', reduces, 'LIMK1', 'levels,', resulting, in, spine, 'shrinkage;', in, 'contrast,', 'miR-132', activates, 'RAC1,', promoting, spine, formation])].
[sujeto(['Although', the, stress, did, not, modify, the, 'RAC-LIMK-cofilin', signaling, 'pathway,', we, observed]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['phospho-MYPT1', 'levels,', probably, mediated, by, 'RhoA-ROCK', activation])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, a, dysregulation, of, 'RhoA-ROCK', activity, by, chronic, stress, could, potentially, underlie, spine, loss, in, hippocampal, neurons])].
[sujeto(['Lipoma', preferred, partner, '(', 'LPP)', is, a, 'LIM', domain, 'protein,', which]), verbo([has]), complemento([multiple, functions, as, an, 'actin-binding', protein, and, a, transcriptional, 'coactivator,', and, it, has, been, suggested, that, 'LPP', has, some, roles, in, cell, migration, or, 'invasion,', 'however,', its, role, in, cancer, cells, remains, to, be, elucidated])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, showed, that, 'LPP', degraded, 'N-cadherin', in, lung, 'cancer,', 'PC14PE6', cells, via]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([the, expression, of, matrix, metalloproteinase, 15, '(', 'MMP-15),', and, 'loss-of-LPP', increases, collective, cell, migration, '(', 'CCM)', and, dissemination, consequently])].
[sujeto(['Knockdown', of, 'LPP', and, its, functional, 'partner,', 'Etv5,', markedly, restores, the, 'full-length', 'N-cadherin', and]), verbo([increases]), complemento(['cell-cell', adhesion])].
[sujeto(['We', investigated, the, common]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, 'LPP', and, 'Etv5,', and, found, that, 'MMP-15', is, transcribed, as, their, direct, transcriptional, target])].
[sujeto(['LPP', knockdown, in, 'PC14PE6', cells]), verbo([increases]), complemento(['N-cadherin-dependent', 'CCM', in, the, 'three-dimensional', collagen, gel, invasion, 'assays,', and, promoted, the, dissemination, of, cancer, cells, when, they, were, orthotopically, implanted, in, nude, mice])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'loss-of-LPP,', 'Etv5', or, 'MMP-15', can, be, a, prognostic, marker, of, increasing, malignancy])].
[sujeto(['Chronic', stress]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([cognitive, impairment, and, dendritic, spine, loss, in, hippocampal, neurons])].
[sujeto(['In', this, animal, model, of, 'depression,', spine]), verbo([loss]), complemento([probably, involves, a, weakening, of, the, interaction, between, 'pre-', and, postsynaptic, cell, adhesion, 'molecules,', such, as, 'N-cadherin,', followed, by, disruption, of, the, cytoskeleton])].
[sujeto(['Via', their, effector, 'LIM', kinase, '(', 'LIMK),', 'RhoA', and, 'ras-related', 'C3', botulinum, toxin, substrate, 1, '(', 'RAC)', 'GTPases', phosphorylate, and]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['cofilin,', an, 'actin-depolymerizing', 'molecule,', favoring, spine, growth])].

[sujeto(['For', 'example,', 'miR-138', indirectly]), verbo([activates]), complemento(['RhoA,', and, 'miR-134', reduces, 'LIMK1', 'levels,', resulting, in, spine, 'shrinkage;', in, 'contrast,', 'miR-132', activates, 'RAC1,', promoting, spine, formation])].

[sujeto(['Thyroid', 'receptor-interacting', protein, 6, '(', 'Trip6),', a, multifunctional, protein, belonging, to, the, zyxin, family, of, 'LIM', 'proteins,', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, various, physiological, and, pathological, 'processes,', including, cell, migration, and, tumorigenesis])].

[sujeto(['Furthermore,', phosphorylation, of, 'GRIP1(956T)', by, 'AKT1']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([the, interaction, between, 'GRIP1', and, myosin, 'VI,', but, facilitates, 'GRIP1', binding, to, 14, -, 3, -, 3, 'protein,', which, is, required, for, regulating, 'F-actin', organization, and, dendritic, morphogenesis])].

[sujeto(['Here,', we, demonstrate, that, 'PINCH-1', '(', also, known, as, 'Lims1)', gene, ablation, in, the, epidermis, of, mice]), verbo([caused]), complemento([epidermal, detachment, from, the, basement, 'membrane,', epidermal, hyperthickening, and, progressive, hair, loss])].
[sujeto(['Given', that, the, low, 'PINCH-1', levels, in, 'ILK-deficient', keratinocytes, were, sufficient, to]), verbo([recruit]), complemento(['EPLIN', to, integrin, 'adhesions,', our, findings, suggest, that, 'PINCH-1', regulates, 'integrin-mediated', adhesion, of, keratinocytes, through, the, interactions, with, 'ILK', as, well, as, 'EPLIN'])].
[sujeto(['In', the, 25, 'years,', as, the, first, of, the, syndecan, family, was, 'cloned,', interest, in, these, transmembrane, proteoglycans]), verbo([has]), complemento([steadily, increased])].
[sujeto(['The', 'syndecans,', 'therefore,']), verbo([have]), complemento([a, long, evolutionary, 'history,', indicative, of, important, roles])].
[sujeto(['However,', these, roles]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, elusive])].
[sujeto(['The', knockout, in, the, worm]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, developmental, neuronal, 'phenotype,', while, knockouts, of, the, syndecans, in, the, mouse, are, mild, and, mostly, limited, to, 'post-natal', rather, than, developmental, effects])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', their, association, with, 'high-affinity', 'receptors,', such, as, 'integrins,', growth, factor, 'receptors,', frizzled, and, 'slit/robo,']), verbo([have]), complemento([led, to, the, notion, that, syndecans, are, 'coreceptors,', with, minor, roles])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([has]), complemento([provided, impetus, to, understanding, syndecan, roles, in, more, detail])].
[sujeto(['It', emerges, that, while, the, cytoplasmic, domains, of, syndecans, are, 'small,', they]), verbo([have]), complemento([clear, interactive, 'capabilities,', most, notably, with, the, actin, cytoskeleton])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', through, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, activation, of, signalling, 'molecules,', it, is, likely, that, syndecans, are, important, receptors, in, their, own, right])].
[sujeto(['Glomerular', podocytes, are, highly, specialized, terminally, differentiated, cells, that]), verbo([act]), complemento([as, a, filtration, barrier, in, the, kidney])].
[sujeto(['We', demonstrate, here, that, stable, knockdown, of, 'ACTN4', in, podocytes, significantly, reduces, 'TNFα-mediated', induction, of, 'NF-κB']), verbo([target]), complemento(['genes,', including, 'IL-1β', and, 'NPHS1,', and, activation, of, an, 'NF-κB-driven', reporter, without, interfering, with, p65, nuclear, translocation])].

[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', an, 'FSGS-linked', 'ACTN4', 'mutant,', 'K255E,', which]), verbo([has]), complemento([increased, actin, binding, activity, and, is, predominantly, 'cytoplasmic,', fails, to, potentiate, 'NF-κB', activity])].
[sujeto(['In', response, to, 'TNFα,', both, 'NF-κB', subunits, p65, and, p50, translocate, to, the, 'nucleus,', where, they]), verbo([bind]), complemento([and, recruit, 'ACTN4', to, their, targeted, 'promoters,', 'IL-1β', and, 'IL-8'])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', this]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([function, of, 'ACTN4', is, independent, of, its, actin, binding, activity, in, the, cytoplasm])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'LASP1', is, overexpressed, in, pancreatic, ductal, adenocarcinoma, '(', 'PDAC)', where, it, promotes, invasion, and, metastasis])].

[sujeto(['Overall,', our, results, defined, 'LASP1', as, a, direct]), verbo([target]), complemento([gene, for, 'HIF1α', upregulation, that, is, critical, for, metastatic, progression, of, 'PDAC'])].
[sujeto(['LtxA']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, the, receptor, known, as, lymphocyte, function, associated, 'antigen-1', '(', 'LFA-1),', a, β2, integrin, expressed, only, on, the, surface, of, 'WBCs'])].

[sujeto(['Cofilin', is, a, ubiquitous, 'actin-binding', protein, known, to]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([actin, dynamics, and, is, regulated, by, 'LIM', kinase, '(', 'LIMK)-mediated', phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['LtxA-mediated', cofilin, dephosphorylation, was, dependent, on, 'LFA-1', and, cofilin, dephosphorylation, did, not, occur, when, 'LFA-1']), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, its, natural, 'ligand,', 'ICAM-1'])].
[sujeto(['Treatment', of, cells, with, an, inhibitor, of, 'LIMK', '(', 'LIMKi)', also]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, cofilin, dephosphorylation, and, enhanced, killing, by, 'LtxA'])].

[sujeto(['Myotonic', dystrophy, 'kinase-related', 'Cdc42-binding', kinase, '(', 'MRCK)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, localize, to, the, lamella, of, mammalian, cells, through, its, interaction, with, an, adaptor, 'protein,', leucine, repeat, adaptor, protein, 35, a, '(', 'LRAP35a),', which, links, it, with, myosin, 18, 'A', '(', 'MYO18A)', for, activation, of, the, lamellar, actomyosin, network, essential, for, cell, migration])].

[sujeto(['LIM', '(', 'Lin-11,', 'Isl-1', and, 'Mec-3', 'domains)', genes]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported, to, trigger, the, formation, of, actin, 'bundles,', a, major, 'higher-order', cytoskeletal, 'assembly,', in, higher, 'plants;', 'however,', the, stress, resistance, related, functions, of, these, genes, are, still, not, well, known])].
[sujeto(['Upon', sequence, analysis, these, genes, were, confirmed, as, 'LIM', genes, and]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, have, a, high, degree, of, homology, with, 'LIM', genes, of, other, species])].
[sujeto(['These', genes, showed, distinct, clusters, when, compared, to, other]), verbo([recognized]), complemento(['LIM', proteins, upon, phylogenetic, analysis])].
[sujeto(['Additionally,', organ, specific, expression, of, these, genes, was, observed, in, 'Chinese', cabbage, 'plants,', with, 'BrPLIM2a,', 'b,', 'c,', 'BrDAR1,', 'BrPLIM2e,', f, and, g, only, being]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, flower, buds])].
[sujeto(['The', remaining, genes, were]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, almost, all, organs, tested])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'BrWLIM2c', and, 'BrDAR4']), verbo([responded]), complemento([to, 'Fusarium', oxysporum, f])].
[sujeto([conglutinans, 'infection,', while, commonly, two, 'BrDARs', and, eight, 'BrLIMs']), verbo([responded]), complemento([to, 'cold,', 'ABA', and, pH, '(', 'pH5,', pH7, and, 'pH9)', stress, treatments, in, 'Chinese', cabbage, plants])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', the, results, of, this, study, indicate, that, 'BrLIM', and, 'BrDAR', genes, may, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, resistance, against, biotic, and, abiotic, stresses, in, 'Brassica'])].
[sujeto(['Folate,', an, important, nutrient, in, the, human, 'diet,']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, 'cancer,', but, its, role, in, metastasis, is, not, established])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, previously, that, the, withdrawal, of, medium, folate, leads, to, the, inhibition, of, migration, and, invasion, of, 'A549', lung, carcinoma, cells])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([demonstrated, that, medium, folate, regulates, the, function, of, 'Rho', 'GTPases', by, enabling, their, carboxyl, methylation, and, translocation, to, plasma, membrane])].
[sujeto(['Conversely,', the, lack, of, folate]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, the, retention, of, these, proteins, in, endoplasmic, reticulum])].
[sujeto(['Folate', also]), verbo([promoted]), complemento([the, switch, from, inactive, '(', 'GDP-bound)', to, active, '(', 'GTP-bound)', 'GTPases,', resulting, in, the, activation, of, downstream, kinases, 'p21-activated', kinase, and, 'LIM', kinase, and, phosphorylation, of, the, 'actin-depolymerizing', factor, cofilin])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([further, demonstrated, that, in, 'A549', cells, two, 'GTPases,', 'RhoA', and, 'Rac1,', but, not, 'Cdc42,', are, immediate, sensors, of, folate, 'status:', the, siRNA, silencing, of, 'RhoA', or, 'Rac1', blocked, effects, of, folate, on, cofilin, phosphorylation, and, cellular, migration, and, invasion])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([finding]), complemento([that, folate, modulates, metastatic, potential, of, cancer, cells, was, confirmed, in, an, animal, model, of, lung, cancer, using, tail, vein, injection, of, 'A549', cells, in, 'SCID', mice])].
[sujeto(['A', 'folate-rich', diet]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([lung, colonization, and, distant, metastasis, to, lymph, nodes, and, decreased, overall, survival, '(', 35, versus, 63, days, for, mice, on, a, 'folate-restricted', 'diet)'])].
[sujeto(['High', folate, also]), verbo([promoted]), complemento(['epithelial-mesenchymal', transition, in, cancer, cells, and, experimental, mouse, tumors])].
[sujeto(['Our', study]), verbo([provides]), complemento([experimental, evidence, for, a, mechanism, of, metastasis, promotion, by, dietary, folate, and, highlights, the, interaction, between, nutrients, and, 'metastasis-related', signaling])].
[sujeto(['Metabolic', stress, primes, monocytes, for, accelerated, 'chemokine-mediated', 'adhesion,', 'migration,', and, recruitment, into, vascular, lesions, by]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([actin, remodeling])].
[sujeto(['The', mechanism, linking, metabolic, stress, to, accelerated, actin, turnover, and]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([monocyte, migration, was, not, known])].
[sujeto(['We', tested, the, hypothesis, that, in, metabolically, primed, 'monocytes,', the, acceleration, of, monocyte, chemoattractant, 'protein-1-induced', chemotaxis, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, the, hyperactivation, of, cofilin])].
[sujeto(['Metabolic', priming, was]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, exposing, human, 'THP-1', monocytes, to, diabetic, 'conditions,', that, 'is,', human, native, 'low-density', lipoprotein, plus, high, glucose, concentrations])].
[sujeto(['In', healthy, 'monocytes,', monocyte, chemoattractant, 'protein-1']), verbo([induced]), complemento([the, phosphorylation, and, inactivation, of, cofilin])].
[sujeto(['However,', metabolic, priming]), verbo([increased]), complemento([3.8, -, fold, the, 'S-glutathionylation', of, the, 'Slingshot-1L-binding', protein, 14, -, 3, -, 3, ζ, '(', 'zeta),', resulting, in, its, 'caspase-dependent', degradation])].
[sujeto(['Glutaredoxin', 1, overexpression]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['low-density', lipoprotein, plus, high, 'glucose-induced', 'S-glutathionylation', and, degradation, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, ζ])].
[sujeto(['The', 'C25S', mutant, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, ζ, was, resistant, to, both, 'S-glutathionylation', and, degradation]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'low-density', lipoprotein, plus, high, glucose])].
[sujeto(['Overexpression', of, the, 'C25S', mutant, restored, monocyte, chemoattractant, 'protein-1-induced', cofilin, phosphorylation, and]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([accelerated, migration, of, metabolically, stressed, 'monocytes,', suggesting, that, loss, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, ζ, increases, the, pool, of, free, 'Slingshot-1L', 'phosphatase,', thereby, preventing, the, phosphorylation, and, deactivation, of, cofilin, in, response, to, chemokine, activation])].
[sujeto(['By']), verbo([preventing]), complemento([the, inactivation, of, 'cofilin,', metabolic, 'stress-induced', degradation, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, ζ, promotes, the, conversion, of, blood, monocytes, into, a, 'hypermigratory,', proatherogenic, phenotype])].
[sujeto(['Although', many, 'DNA', aberrations, in, melanoma]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, well, 'characterized,', including, focal, amplification, and, deletions, of, oncogenes, and, tumor, 'suppressors,', broad, regions, of, chromosomal, gain, and, loss, are, less, well, understood])].
[sujeto(['One', possibility, is, that, these, broad, events, are, a, consequence, of, collateral, damage, from]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([single, loci])].
[sujeto(['Another', possibility, is, that, the]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, large, regions, permits, the, simultaneous, repression, of, multiple, tumor, suppressors, by, broadly, decreasing, the, resident, gene, dosage, and, expression])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, test, this, hypothesis, in, a]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([fashion, using, 'RNA', interference, to, suppress, multiple, candidate, residents, in, broad, regions, of, loss])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, loss, of, chromosome, regions, 6, 'q,', 10, ',', and, 11, 'q21-ter', is, correlated, with, broadly, decreased, expression, of, most, resident, genes, and, that, multiple, resident, genes, impacted, by, broad, regional, loss, of, chromosome, 10, are, tumor, suppressors, capable, of, affecting, tumor, growth, 'and/or', invasion])].
[sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([provide]), complemento([additional, functional, support, for, 'Ablim1', as, a, novel, tumor, suppressor])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, support, the, hypothesis, that, multiple, cancer, genes, are]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([by, regional, chromosome, copy, number, aberrations])].
[sujeto(['Most', of, the, mutations, disrupt, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([localization, signal, which, strongly, suggests, a, 'loss-of-function', 'pathomechanism,', supported, by, cytoplasmic, inclusions])].
[sujeto(['FUS-positive', neuronal, cytoplasmic, inclusions, are, also]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, a, subset, of, patients, with, frontotemporal, lobar, degeneration, '(', 'FTLD)'])].
[sujeto(['Several', groups]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, 'FUS', binds, broadly, to, many, transcripts, in, the, brain, and, have, also, identified, a, plethora, of, putative, splice, 'targets;', 'however,', only, 'ABLIM1,', 'BRAF,', 'Ewing', sarcoma, protein, 'R1', '(', 'EWSR1),', 'microtubule-associated', protein, tau, '(', 'MAPT),', 'NgCAM', cell, adhesion, molecule, '(', 'NRCAM),', and, netrin, 'G1', '(', 'NTNG1)', have, been, identified, in, at, least, three, of, four, studies])].

[sujeto(['An', 'ACT', is, scored, from, 0, to, 9, ',', with, a, higher, score, correlating, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento([malignancy])].

[sujeto(['Recent', clinical, trials, aimed, at, improved, treatment, of, 'AML', by, administration, of, vitamin, 'D', derivatives, showed, unremarkable, 'results,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([development, of, vitamin, 'D', resistance, in, 'patients\'', 'AML', blasts])].

[sujeto(['Genetic', epistasis, and, immunofluorescence, in, differentiating, sensory, organs]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, 'Ral', activity, suppresses, 'c-Jun', 'N-terminal', kinase, '(', 'JNK)', activation, and, induces, p38, 'mitogen-activated', protein, '(', 'MAP)', kinase, activation])].

[sujeto(['Programmed', cell, death, 4, '(', 'Pdcd4)']), verbo([suppresses]), complemento([neoplastic, transformation, by, inhibiting, the, activation, of, 'c-Jun', and, consequently, 'AP-1-dependent', transcription])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'Pdcd4', blocks, 'c-Jun', activation, by, inhibiting, the, expression, of, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, kinase, kinase, kinase, 1, '(', 'MAP4K1)/hematopoietic', progenitor, kinase, 1, ',', a, kinase, upstream, of, 'Jun', 'N-terminal', kinase, '(', 'JNK)'])].

[sujeto(['Bam32', is, an, adaptor, protein]), verbo([recruited]), complemento([to, the, plasma, membrane, upon, 'B', cell, receptor, '(', 'BCR)', crosslinking, in, a, phosphoinositol, 3, -, kinase, '(', 'PI3K)-dependent', 'manner;', 'however,', its, physiologic, function, is, unclear])].
