[sujeto(['The', 'serine/threonine', kinase, 'HPK1', is, a, member, of, the, germinal, center, kinase, '(', 'GCK)', family, that]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, the, regulation, of, 'MAP', kinase, pathways])].
[sujeto(['Subsequent', analysis, revealed, that, 'Src', and, 'Syk/ZAP-70', tyrosine, kinases, and, the, adaptor, proteins, 'LAT,', 'SLP-76,', 'BLNK,', 'Grb2,', and, 'Grap', are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'HPK1', activation])].
[sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'HPK1']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['TCR', activation, of, 'AP-1', and, 'ERK2,', whereas, the, 'kinase-inactive', mutant, of, 'HPK1', potentiated, these, responses])].
[sujeto(['Transforming', growth, factor, beta, '(', 'TGF-beta)-activated', kinase, '(', 'TAK1)', is, known, for, its, involvement, in, 'TGF-beta', signaling, and, its, ability, to]), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, 'p38-mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'MAPK)', pathway])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([report]), complemento([shows, that, 'TAK1', is, also, a, strong, activator, of, 'c-Jun', 'N-terminal', kinase, '(', 'JNK)'])].
[sujeto(['Both', the, 'wild-type', and, a, constitutively, active, mutant, of, 'TAK1']), verbo([stimulated]), complemento(['JNK', in, transient, transfection, assays])].
[sujeto(['Mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, kinase, 4, '(', 'MKK4)/stress-activated', protein, 'kinase/extracellular', 'signal-regulated', kinase, '(', 'SEK1),', a, 'dual-specificity', kinase, that, phosphorylates, and]), verbo([activates]), complemento(['JNK,', synergized, with, 'TAK1', in, activating, 'JNK'])].
[sujeto(['Conversely,', a, 'dominant-negative', '(', 'MKK4/SEK1', mutant]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['TAK1-induced', 'JNK', activation])].
[sujeto(['A', kinasedefective, mutant, of, 'TAK1', effectively]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([hematopoietic, progenitor, 'kinase-1', '(', 'HPK1)-induced', 'JNK', activity, but, had, little, effect, on, germinal, center, kinase, activation, of, 'JNK'])].
[sujeto(['However,', because, the, 'dominant-negative', mutants, of, 'MEKK1', and, 'MLK3', did, not]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['TAK1-induced', 'JNK', 'activity,', we, conclude, that, activation, of, 'JNK1', by, 'TAK1', is, independent, of, 'MEKK1', and, 'MLK3'])].
[sujeto(['In', addition, to, 'TAK1,', 'TGF-beta', also]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento(['JNK', activity])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, also]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([the, potential, roles, of, 'TAK1', not, only, in, the, 'TGF-beta', pathway, but, also, in, the, other, 'HPK1/JNK1-mediated', pathways])].
[sujeto(['The', 'c-Jun', 'N-terminal', kinase, '(', 'JNK),', or, 'stress-activated', protein, kinase, plays, a, crucial, role, in, cellular, responses]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([by, environmental, stress, and, proinflammatory, cytokines])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, mechanisms, that]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, the, activation, of, the, 'JNK', pathway, have, not, been, elucidated])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([isolated, a, cDNA, encoding, a, novel, protein, kinase, that, has, significant, sequence, similarities, to, human, germinal, center, kinase, '(', 'GCK)', and, human, hematopoietic, progenitor, kinase, 1])].
[sujeto(['The', novel, 'GCK-like', kinase, '(', 'GLK)']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, nucleotide, sequence, that, encodes, an, 'ORF', of, 885, amino, acids, with, 11, kinase, subdomains])].
[sujeto(['Endogenous', 'GLK', could, be]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, 'UV', radiation, and, proinflammatory, cytokine, tumor, necrosis, factor, alpha])].
[sujeto(['When', transiently]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 293, 'cells,', 'GLK', specifically, activated, the, 'JNK,', but, not, the, 'p42/44(MAPK)/extracellular', 'signal-regulated', kinase, or, p38, kinase, signaling, pathways])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', deletion, of, amino, acids, 353, -, 835, in, the, putative, 'C-terminal', regulatory, 'region,', or, mutation, of, 'Lys-35', in, the, putative, 'ATP-binding', 'domain,', markedly, reduced, the, ability, of, 'GLK', to]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['JNK'])].
[sujeto(['This', result, indicates, that, both, kinase, activity, and, the, 'C-terminal', region, of, 'GLK', are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, maximal, activation, of, 'JNK'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'GLK-induced', 'JNK', activation, could, be]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, a, 'dominant-negative', mutant, of, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, kinase, kinase, 1, '(', 'MEKK1)', or, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, kinase, 4, /, 'SAPK/ERK', kinase, 1, '(', 'SEK1),', suggesting, that, 'GLK', may, function, upstream, of, 'MEKK1', in, the, 'JNK', signaling, pathway])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([cloned, a, novel, protein, 'kinase,', termed, hematopoietic, progenitor, kinase, 1, '(', 'HPK1),', that, is, expressed, predominantly, in, hematopoietic, 'cells,', including, early, progenitor, cells])].
[sujeto(['Expression', of, 'HPK1']), verbo([activates]), complemento(['JNK1', 'specifically,', and, it, elevates, strongly, 'AP-1-mediated', transcriptional, activity, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['HPK1']), verbo([binds]), complemento([and, phosphorylates, 'MEKK1', 'directly,', whereas, 'JNK1', activation, by, 'HPK1', is, inhibited, by, a, 'dominant-negative', 'MEKK1', or, 'MKK4/SEK', mutant])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', unlike, 'PAK65,', 'HPK1', does, not, contain, the, small, 'GTPase', 'Rac1/Cdc42-binding', domain, and, does, not]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, either, 'Rac1', or, 'Cdc42,', suggesting, that, 'HPK1'])].
[sujeto(['In', response, to, 'stimulation,', 'LATS1/2', phosphorylate, and]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['YAP/TAZ,', the, main, effectors, of, the, 'Hippo', pathway])].
[sujeto(['Accumulating', evidence]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, 'MST1/2', are, not, required, for, the, regulation, of, 'YAP/TAZ'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, 'MAP4K', family, 'members-Drosophila', 'Happyhour', homologues, 'MAP4K1/2/3', and, 'Misshapen', homologues, 'MAP4K4/6/7-as', direct, 'LATS1/2-activating', kinases])].
[sujeto(['Combined', deletion, of, 'MAP4Ks', and, 'MST1/2,', but, neither, 'alone,']), verbo([suppresses]), complemento([phosphorylation, of, 'LATS1/2', and, 'YAP/TAZ', in, response, to, a, wide, range, of, signals])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, demonstrate, that, 'MAP4Ks']), verbo([act]), complemento([in, parallel, to, and, are, partially, redundant, with, 'MST1/2', in, the, regulation, of, 'LATS1/2', and, 'YAP/TAZ,', and, establish, 'MAP4Ks', as, components, of, the, expanded, 'Hippo', pathway])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([activation, of, 'NFkappaB', transcription, factors, by, 'HPK1', that, was, independent, of, 'SAPK/JNK', activation])].
[sujeto(['Overexpression', of, a, 'dominant-negative', 'SEK1', significantly]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['SAPK/JNK', 'activation,', whereas, 'NFkappaB', stimulation, by, 'HPK1', remained, unaffected])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', activation, of, 'NFkappaB']), verbo([required]), complemento([the, presence, of, 'full-length,', 'kinase-active', 'HPK1,', whereas, the, isolated, kinase, domain, of, 'HPK1', was, sufficient, for, activation, of, 'SAPK/JNK'])].
[sujeto(['We', also, demonstrate, that, overexpression, of, a, 'dominant-negative', 'IKKbeta', blocks, 'HPK1-mediated', 'NFkappaB', activation]), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, 'HPK1', acts, upstream, of, the, 'IkappaB', kinase, complex])].
[sujeto(['In', apoptotic, myeloid, progenitor, cells, 'HPK1', was, cleaved, at, a, 'DDVD', motif, resulting, in, the]), verbo([release]), complemento([of, the, kinase, domain, and, a, 'C-terminal', part])].
[sujeto(['Although', expression, of, the, isolated, 'HPK1', kinase, domain]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, 'SAPK/JNK', 'activation,', the, 'C-terminal', part, inhibited, 'NFkappaB', activation])].
[sujeto(['This', 'dominant-negative', effect, was, not, only, restricted, to, 'HPK1-mediated', but, also, to, 'NIK-', and, tumor, necrosis, factor, 'alpha-mediated', 'NFkappaB', 'activation,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([an, impairment, of, the, 'IkappaB', kinase, complex])].
[sujeto(['Thus', 'HPK1']), verbo([activates]), complemento([both, the, 'SAPK/JNK', and, 'NFkappaB', pathway, in, hematopoietic, cells, but, is, converted, into, an, inhibitor, of, 'NFkappaB', activation, in, apoptotic, cells])].
[sujeto(['As', a, member, of, the, 'MAP4K', 'family,', 'MAP4K1', is, closely, associated, with, various, adaptor, proteins, such, as, caspase, recruitment, domain, family, member, 11, '(', 'CARD11),', hematopoietic, 'cell-specific', protein, 1, '(', 'HS1),', 'HPK1-interacting', protein, of, 55, kD, '(', 'HIP-55),', growth, factor, 'receptor-bound', protein, 2, '(', 'GRB2)', 'family,', the, linker, for]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['T-cells', '(', 'LAT),', 'SH2', domain, containing, leukocyte, protein, of, 76, kD, '(', 'SLP-76)', 'family,', homologues, of, the, 'v-crk', oncogene, product, '(', 'CRK)', 'family,', the, 'B-cell', adaptor, molecule, of, 32, kD, '(', 'BAM32),', etc])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', 'MAP4K1', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, autoimmune, diseases, and, plays, a, key, role, in, tumor, and, inflammatory, reaction])].
[sujeto(['This', study]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([that, 'actin-binding', protein, 1, '(', 'Abp1/HIP-55/SH3P7)', is, a, negative, regulator, of, 'BCR', signaling, and, links, actin, to, negative, regulatory, pathways, of, the, 'BCR'])].
[sujeto(['Upon', 'activation,', surface, 'BCR', clustering, is]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([and, 'B-cell', contraction, delayed, in, 'Abp1(-/-)', 'B', 'cells,', concurrent, with, slow, but, persistent, increases, in, 'F-actin', at, 'BCR', signalosomes])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'BCR', signaling, is]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([in, 'Abp1(-/-)', 'B', cells, compared, with, 'wild-type', 'B', 'cells,', including, 'Ca(2+)', flux, and, phosphorylation, of, 'B-cell', linker, 'protein,', the, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, kinase, 'MEK1/2,', and, 'ERK,', coinciding, with, reductions, in, recruitment, of, the, inhibitory, signaling, molecules, hematopoietic, progenitor, kinase, 1, and, 'SH2-containing', inositol, 5, -, phosphatase, to, 'BCR', signalosomes])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, indicate, that, 'Abp1', negatively]), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['BCR', signaling, by, coupling, actin, remodeling, to, 'B-cell', contraction, and, activation, of, inhibitory, signaling, 'molecules,', which, contributes, to, the, regulation, of, peripheral, 'B-cell', development, and, antibody, responses])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'HIP-55', is, 'up-regulated', or, 'down-regulated', in, several, types, of, tumor, tissues, in, patients])].
[sujeto(['To']), verbo([gain]), complemento([full, insight, into, the, function, of, 'HIP-55', in, lung, 'cancer,', microarray, assay, was, performed, using, 'Affymetrix', 'U133', 'Plus', 2.0, expression, arrays, in, both, 'HIP-55', knockdown, and, scramble, control, 'A549', cells])].
[sujeto(['Functional', analysis, strongly]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, 'HIP-55', may, be, involved, in, cancer, cell, survival, and, cell, 'death,', which, was, then, confirmed, by, further, experimentation])].
[sujeto(['Experimental', results, showed, that, downregulation, of, 'HIP-55']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, viability, and, increased, the, apoptosis, of, 'A549', cells, treated, with, the, anticancer, agent, etoposide])].
[sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, 'HIP-55', may, be, a, newly, discovered, regulatory, node, in, the, growth, signaling, network, and, a, new, target, for, therapeutic, interventions, in, proliferative, disorders])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, mechanism, of, 'HPK1']), verbo([loss]), complemento([has, not, been, defined])].
[sujeto(['The', aims, of, this, study, are, to, identify, the, ubiquitin, ligase, and, to, examine, the, mechanisms, that]), verbo([targets]), complemento(['HPK1', degradation])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, 'CUL7/Fbxw8', ubiquitin, ligase, targeted, 'HPK1', for, degradation, via, the, 26, 'S', proteasome])].
[sujeto(['The', ubiquitination, of, 'HPK1']), verbo([required]), complemento([its, kinase, activity, and, autophosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['Wild-type', protein, phosphatase, 4, '(', 'PP4),', but, not, the, 'phosphatase-dead', 'PP4', 'mutant,', 'PP4-RL,']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([the, interaction, of, 'Fbxw8', with, 'HPK1', and, 'Fbxw8-mediated', ubiquitination, of, 'HPK1'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we, showed, that, 'Thr-355', of, 'HPK1', is, a, key, 'PP4', dephosphorylation, 'site,', through, which, 'CUL7/Fbxw8', ubiquitin, ligase, and, 'PP4']), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['HPK1', stability])].
[sujeto(['Knockdown', of, 'Fbxw8', restores, endogenous, 'HPK1', protein, expression, and]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([cell, proliferation, of, pancreatic, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['Our', study, demonstrated, that]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([degradation, of, 'HPK1', by, the, 'CUL7/Fbxw8', ubiquitin, ligase, constitutes, a, 'negative-feedback', loop, to, restrain, the, activity, of, 'HPK1', and, that, 'CUL7/Fbxw8', ubiquitin, ligase, promotes, pancreatic, cancer, cell, proliferation])].
[sujeto(['In', this, issue, of, 'Blood,', 'Jakob', et, al]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, hematopoietic, progenitor, kinase, 1, '(', 'HPK1)', participates, during, signaling, of, neutrophil, recruitment, by, acting, as, a, regulator, of, the, adhesiveness, of, the, 'b2-integrin', lymphocyte, 'function-associated', antigen, 1, '(', 'LFA-1)', during, acute, inflammation])].
[sujeto(['Recently,', the, mammalian, 'actin-binding', protein, 1, '(', 'mAbp1)', was, identified, as, an, important, adaptor, protein]), verbo([regulating]), complemento(['PMN', trafficking, downstream, of, β2, integrins])].
[sujeto(['Accordingly,', 'CXCL1-mediated', induction, of, 'high-affinity', 'LFA-1']), verbo([required]), complemento(['HPK1,', but, macrophage, antigen, 1, '(', 'Mac-1)', affinity, regulation, was, independent, of, 'HPK1'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'summary,', our, results, indicate, that, 'HPK1', is, critically]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'LFA-1-mediated', 'PMN', trafficking, during, acute, inflammation])].
[sujeto(['Crystal', and, 'NMR', structures, of, 'SH3', domains, complexes, with, 'Pro-rich', peptides, show, that, the, peptide, ligands, are]), verbo([bound]), complemento([over, a, range, of, up, to, seven, residues, in, a, 'PPII', helix, conformation])].
[sujeto(['Short', 'proline-rich', peptides, usually, adopt, little, or, no, ordered, secondary, structure, before]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['interactions,', and, consequently, their, association, with, the, 'SH3', domain, is, characterized, by, unfavorable, binding, entropy, due, to, a, loss, of, rotational, freedom, on, forming, the, 'PPII', helix])].
[sujeto(['The', interactions, of, 'P2', analogues, with, the, 'SH3', domain, of, cortactin, '(', 'SH3(m-cort))', were, analyzed, by, circular, dichroism, 'spectroscopy,', while, 'CD', thermal, transition, experiments]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, used, to, determine, their, propensity, to, adopt, a, 'PPII', helix, conformation])].
[sujeto(['Results', show, that, the, introduction, of, three, residues, of, 'Hyp', efficiently, stabilizes, the, 'PPII', helix, 'conformation,', while, it, does, not, improve, the, affinity, towards, the, 'SH3', 'domain,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, additional, 'forces,', e])].
[sujeto([',', electrostatic, 'interactions,', are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, 'SH3(m-cort)', substrate, recognition])].
[sujeto(['Caspase', function, is, known, to, be, essential, for, cell, death, by, 'apoptosis,', but, it, is, now, increasingly]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([that, these, proteases, also, play, important, roles, in, other, cellular, events])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([for, the, first, time, that, inhibition, of, cellular, caspase, activity, can, induce, differentiation, of, 'AML', 'blasts,', and, can, enhance, vitamin, 'D-induced', cell, differentiation, of, these, cells])].
[sujeto(['Differentiation']), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 1, 'α,25-dihydroxyvitamin', 'D3', '(', 1, ',', 25, 'D)', or, its, analogs, 'PRI-1906', and, 'PRI-2191', was, enhanced, by, 'QVD', to, a, varying, 'degree,', depending, on, the, subtype, of, the, leukemia])].
[sujeto(['QVD', and, 1, ',', 25, 'D-induced', differentiation, was, accompanied, by]), verbo([increased]), complemento([signaling, by, 'Hematopoietic', 'Progenitor', 'Kinase', 1, '(', 'HPK1),', and, the, expression, of, transcription, factors, known, to, be, involved, in, monocytic, differentiation, was, increased])].
[sujeto(['Identifying', the, appropriate, drug]), verbo([targets]), complemento([for, the, development, of, a, novel, 'anti-tumor', immunotherapy, is, one, of, the, most, risky, steps, in, the, drug, development, cycle])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, a, hematopoietic, 'cell-restricted', 'serine/threonine', 'kinase,', hematopoietic, progenitor, kinase, 1, '(', 'HPK1),', as, a, possible, target, for, therapeutic, intervention])].
[sujeto(['Targeted', disruption, of, 'HPK1', alleles]), verbo([confers]), complemento(['T', cells, with, an, elevated, 'Th1', cytokine, production, in, response, to, 'TCR', engagement])].
[sujeto(['Also,', the]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'HPK1', from, dendritic, cells, '(', 'DCs)', endows, them, with, superior, antigen, presentation, 'ability,', enabling, 'HPK1', '(', -, /, -, ')', 'DCs', to, elicit, a, more, potent, 'anti-tumor', immune, response, when, used, as, cancer, vaccine])].
[sujeto(['It', is, probable, that, blocking, the, 'HPK1', kinase, activity, with, a, small, molecule, inhibitor, may]), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, superior, 'anti-tumor', activity, of, both, cell, 'types,', resulting, in, a, synergistic, amplification, of, 'anti-tumor', potential])].
[sujeto(['Given', that, 'HPK1', is, not]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, any, major, 'organs,', it, is, less, likely, that, an, inhibitor, of, 'HPK1', kinase, activity, would, cause, any, serious, side, effects])].
[sujeto(['Hematopoietic', progenitor, kinase, 1, '(', 'HPK1)', is, a, 'Ste20-like', 'serine/threonine', kinase, that]), verbo([suppresses]), complemento([immune, responses, and, autoimmunity])].
[sujeto(['B', cell, receptor, '(', 'BCR)', signaling]), verbo([activates]), complemento(['HPK1', by, inducing, 'BLNK/HPK1', interaction])].
[sujeto(['Whether', 'HPK1', can, reciprocally]), verbo([regulate]), complemento(['BLNK', during, 'BCR', signaling, is, unknown])].
[sujeto(['HPK1', attenuates, 'BCR-induced', cell, activation, via]), verbo([inducing]), complemento(['BLNK', threonine, 152, 'phosphorylation,', which, mediates, 'BLNK/14-3-3', binding])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', threonine, 152, -, phosphorylated, 'BLNK', is, ubiquitinated, at, lysine, residues, 37, ',', 38, ',', and, 42, ',']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, attenuation, of, 'MAPK', and, 'IκB', kinase, activation, in, 'B', cells, during, 'BCR', signaling])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, novel, negative, feedback, regulation, of, 'BCR', signaling, by, 'HPK1-mediated', 'phosphorylation,', 'ubiquitination,', and, subsequent, degradation, of, the, activated, 'BLNK'])].
[sujeto(['Antigen', recognition, within, immunological, synapses]), verbo([triggers]), complemento([and, sustains, 'T', cell, activation, by, nucleating, protein, microclusters, that, gather, 'T', cell, receptors, '(', 'TCRs),', 'kinases,', and, adaptors])].
[sujeto(['Dissipation', of, these, microclusters, results, in, signal, 'termination,', but, how, this, process, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([is, unclear])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'paper,', we]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, release, of, the, adaptors, 'SLP76', and, 'GADS', from, signaling, microclusters, is, induced, by, the, 'serine/threonine', protein, kinase, 'HPK1', and, that, phosphorylation, of, 'GADS', plays, a, major, role, in, this, process])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'HPK1', was, recruited, into, microclusters, and, triggered, their, dissipation, by, inducing, the, phosphorylation, of, a, 'threonine-containing', motif, of, 'GADS,', together, with, the, previously, described, serine, phosphorylation, of, 'SLP76'])].
[sujeto(['These', events]), verbo([induced]), complemento([the, cooperative, binding, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, proteins, to, 'SLP76-GADS', 'complexes,', leading, to, their, uncoupling, from, the, transmembrane, adaptor, 'LAT', and, consequently, reducing, microcluster, persistence, and, 'activation-induced', gene, transcription])].
[sujeto(['Hematopoietic', progenitor, kinase, 1, '(', 'HPK1,', also, called, 'MAP4K1)', negatively]), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['T', 'cell-mediated', immune, responses])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, role, of, 'HPK1', and, the, mechanisms, that]), verbo([regulate]), complemento(['HPK1', expression, in, 'SLE', remain, poorly, understood])].
[sujeto(['Using', chromatin, immunoprecipitation, '(', 'ChIP)', microarray, 'data,', we, identified, markedly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([histone, 'H3', lysine, 27, trimethylation, '(', 'H3K27me3)', enrichment, at, the, 'HPK1', promoter, of, 'SLE', 'CD4+', 'T', cells, relative, to, 'controls,', and, confirmed, this, observation, using, 'ChIP', and, 'real-time', 'PCR', experiments])].
[sujeto(['We', further]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'HPK1', mRNA, and, protein, levels, were, significantly, decreased, in, 'CD4+', 'T', cells, of, patients, with, 'SLE,', and, that, this, decrease, was, not, caused, by, exposure, to, standard, 'SLE', medications])].
[sujeto(['Consistent', with, these, 'findings,', overexpressing, 'HPK1', in, 'SLE', 'CD4+', 'T', cells]), verbo([caused]), complemento([a, significant, decrease, in, 'T', cell, reactivity])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we, observed, a, striking]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, jumonji, domain, containing, 3, '(', 'JMJD3)', 'binding,', but, no, marked, change, in, enhancer, of, zeste, homolog, 2, '(', 'EZH2)', 'binding,', at, the, 'HPK1', promoter, region, in, 'SLE', 'CD4+', 'T', cells, compared, to, healthy, controls])].
[sujeto(['SiRNA', knock, down, of, 'JMJD3', in, healthy, 'CD4+', 'T', cells]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, decreased, 'JMJD3', binding, and, increased, 'H3K27me3', enrichment, at, the, 'HPK1', promoter, 'region,', thus, inhibiting, the, expression, of, 'HPK1'])].
[sujeto(['Concordantly,', 'plasmid-induced', overexpression, of, 'JMJD3', in, 'SLE', 'CD4+', 'T', cells]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, increased, 'JMJD3', 'binding,', decreased, 'H3K27me3', 'enrichment,', and, 'up-regulated', 'HPK1', expression])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, show, for, the, first, time, that]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['HPK1', expression, in, 'SLE', 'CD4+', 'T', cells, is, associated, with, loss, of, 'JMJD3', binding, and, increased, 'H3K27me3', enrichment, at, the, 'HPK1', 'promoter,', contributing, to, 'T', cell, overactivation, and, 'B', cell, overstimulation, in, 'SLE'])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'HPK1', may, serve, as, a, novel, target, for, effective, 'SLE', therapy])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'hsa-miR-96', is, expressed, at, higher, levels, in, human, bladder, urothelial, carcinomas, compared, to, normal, tissues])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'hsa-miR-96', increased, invasion, and, differentiation, of, human, bladder, 'T24', cells, and, promoted, their, growth])].
[sujeto(['Altogether,', these, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'hsa-miR-96', may, affect, the, growth, of, bladder, cancer, cells, by, 'up-regulating', 'IRS1', and, 'MAP4K1', 'levels,', functioning, as, a, promising, diagnostic, marker, in, human, bladder, urothelial, carcinomas])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([a, novel, role, for, 'HPK1', in, regulating, the, activation, of, the, adhesion, molecule, leukocyte, 'function-associated', 'antigen-1', '(', 'LFA-1)'])].
[sujeto(['Upon', 'TCR', 'stimulation,']), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, binding, of, adhesion, and, degranulation, promoting, adaptor, protein, '(', 'ADAP)', to, 'SLP-76,', a, ternary, complex, composed, of, 'ADAP/55-kDa', src, kinase, associated, phosphoprotein, '(', 'SKAP-55)', and, 'RIAM', translocates, to, the, membrane, and, causes, membrane, recruitment, of, the, active, small, 'GTPase', 'Ras-related', protein, 1, '(', 'Rap1)'])].

[sujeto(['In', this, systematic, study]), verbo([involving]), complemento(['Xenopus', laevis, oocytes, and, 'Madin-Darby', canine, kidney, epithelia, expression, systems, and, ex, vivo, preparations, from, 'wild-type', and, knockout, 'mice,', we, identified, the, neutral, and, dibasic, amino, acids, exchanger, '(', 'antiporter)', 'b(0,+)AT-rBAT', '(', 'SLC7A9-SLC3A1)', as, the, luminal, intestinal, 'l-DOPA', transporter])].

[sujeto(['Lysinuric', protein, intolerance, '(', 'LPI)', is, an, inherited, aminoaciduria]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, recessive, mutations, in, the, 'SLC7A7', gene, encoding, 'y+L', amino, acid, transporter, 1, '(', 'y+LAT1),', which, combines, with, 4, 'F2hc', to, generate, an, active, transporter, responsible, for, the, system, 'y+L', amino, acid, transport])].

[sujeto(['This']), verbo([finding]), complemento([has, prompted, us, to, study, whether, the, difference, in, localization, is, due, to, the, inability, of, the, structurally, altered, mutant, 'y+LAT1', proteins, to, heteromerize, with, 4, 'F2hc'])].

[sujeto([4, 'F2hc', is, a, ubiquitous, protein, whose, overexpression]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, related, to, tumor, development, and, progression])].
[sujeto(['Stable', silencing, of, 4, 'F2hc', in, 'HeLa', cells, using, an, artificial, miRNA, impairs, in, vivo, tumorigenicity, and]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, an, ineffective, proliferation, response, to, mitogens])].

[sujeto(['Furthermore,', cell, motility, is, compromised, after, protein, 'silencing,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, 4, 'F2hc', is, related, to, tumor, invasion, by, facilitating, cell, motility])].

[sujeto(['This']), verbo([involves]), complemento([factors, such, as, the, cell, adhesion, receptors, integrins, and, amino, acid, transporters])].
[sujeto(['CD98hc', '(', 'SLC3A2),', a, heterodimeric, amino, acid, 'transporter,']), verbo([modulates]), complemento([integrin, signaling, in, vitro])].

[sujeto(['We', also, demonstrate, that, 'CD98hc', absence, in, vivo]), verbo([induces]), complemento([defects, as, early, as, 'integrin-dependent', 'Src', activation])].
[sujeto(['We', decipher, the, molecular, mechanisms]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, vivo, by, revealing, a, crucial, role, of, the, 'CD98hc/integrins/Rho', guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factor, '(', 'GEF)', 'leukemia-associated', 'RhoGEF', '(', 'LARG)/RhoA', pathway, in, skin, homeostasis])].
[sujeto(['The', macrophage, functions, such, as, the, 'antigen-presenting,', 'phagocytic,', and, fusion, 'activities,']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported, to, decrease, in, 'CD98hc-deficient', peritoneal, macrophages])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', when, the, 'CD98hc', deficient, macrophages, were]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([with, either, 'IFN-γ/LPS', or, 'IL-4,', the, production, of, 'NO(2)', or, 'arginase-I', decreased, in, comparison, to, that, observed, in, the, control, macrophages])].
[sujeto(['We', used, an, in, vitro, mixed, leukocyte, reaction, assay, and, a, cardiac, transplantation, model, to, evaluate, the, mechanisms, of, 'CD98hc', in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([alloimmune, responses])].
[sujeto(['A', chemotaxis, assay, revealed, the, migration, of, 'CD98hc-deficient', lymphocytes, to]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, the, presence, of, 'CCL5', compared, with, 'wild-type', cells])].

[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, data, indicate, that, 'T', 'cell-specific', deficiency, in, 'CD98hc', can, contribute, to, cardiac, allograft, permanent, acceptance, correlating, with, the, attenuation, of, lymphocyte, migration, and, by]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([the, generation, of, regulatory, 'T', cells])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, are, expected, to, make, it, possible, to, develop, novel, approaches, for, treating, allograft, rejection, and]), verbo([promoting]), complemento([transplantation, tolerance])].
[sujeto(['The', interplay, of, 'CD4(+)', and, 'CD8(+)', 'T', cells]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([autoantigens, is, responsible, for, the, progression, of, a, number, of, autoimmune, 'diseases,', including, type, 1, diabetes, mellitus, '(', 'T1D)'])].
[sujeto(['Understanding', the, molecular, mechanisms, that]), verbo([regulate]), complemento(['T', cell, activation, is, crucial, for, designing, effective, therapies, for, autoimmune, diseases])].
[sujeto(['We', probed, a, panel, of, 'Abs', with, 'T', 'cell-modulating', activity, and, identified, a, mAb, specific, for, the, 'H', chain, of, 'CD98', '(', 'CD98hc)', that, was, able, to]), verbo([suppress]), complemento(['T', cell, proliferation])].
[sujeto(['The', 'anti-CD98hc', mAb, also]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['Ag-specific', proliferation, and, the, acquisition, of, effector, function, by, 'CD4(+)', and, 'CD8(+)', 'T', cells, in, vitro, and, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['Injection', of, the, 'anti-CD98hc', mAb, completely]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([the, onset, of, 'cyclophosphamide-induced', diabetes, in, 'NOD', mice])].

[sujeto(['These', data, indicate, that, strategies]), verbo([targeting]), complemento(['CD98hc', might, have, clinical, application, for, treating, 'T1D', and, other, 'T', 'cell-mediated', autoimmune, diseases])].
[sujeto(['The', multifunctional, protein, 'CD98', heavy, chain, '(', 'CD98hc,', 'Slc3a2)', associates, with, integrin, β1, through, its, cytoplasmic, and, transmembrane, domains, and, the, 'CD98hc-mediated', integrin, signaling, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, maintenance, of, 'ES', cell, proliferation])].

[sujeto(['Analyses', of, 'PST080', 'ES', cells, as, well, as, reconstituted, frog, oocytes, demonstrated, that, 'ΔCD98hc-β', geo, fusion, protein, preserved, its, ability, to]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, integrin, β1, although, this, mutant, protein, was, hardly, localized, on, the, cell, surface])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'ΔCD98hc-β', geo, protein, can, mediate, integrin, signaling, but, cannot, support, amino, acid, transport, through, 'LATs'])].

[sujeto([4, 'F2hc', '(', 'CD98hc)', is, a, multifunctional, type, 'II', membrane, glycoprotein]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, several, functions, as, amino, acid, 'transport,', cell, 'fusion,', 'β1-integrin-signaling', and, transformation])].
[sujeto([4, 'F2hc', ectodomain]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, crystallized, and, its, 'three-dimensional', structure, determined])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([carried, out, a, 'spectroscopical/structural', characterization, of, the, recombinant, ectodomain, in, order, to, obtain, information, on, its, dynamic, structure, in, solution, and, on, its, ability, to, form, homodimers, by, itself, in, the, absence, of, the, transmembrane, helix, and, of, the, potential, interactions, with, the, plasma, membrane])].
[sujeto(['The', secondary, structure, determined, by, 'far-UV', circular, dichroism, '(', 'CD)', spectroscopy, '(', around, 30, '%', 'α-helix', and, 20, '%', 'β-sheets,', 12, '%', antiparallel, and, 8, '%', 'parallel)']), verbo([reveals]), complemento([a, compact, and, thermally, stable, structure, with, a, high, melting, temperature, '(', 57, -, 59, °, 'C)'])].
[sujeto(['Tryptophan', residues, are, mainly, buried, and, immobilized, in, the, hydrophobic, core, of, the, protein, as]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([by, 'near-UV', 'CD', 'spectrum,', the, position, of, the, 'Trp', maximum, fluorescence, emission, '(', 323, 'nm)', and, from, the, acrylamide, quenching, constant, '(', 2.6, 'M(-1))'])].
[sujeto(['Urea', unfolding, equilibrium]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, studied, by, 'far-UV', 'CD', and, fluorescence, spectroscopy, to, gain, information, on, the, 'folding/unfolding', process, of, the, ectodomain])].
[sujeto(['The', analyses]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([the, existence, of, two, intermediate, states, as, reported, for, other, 'TIM', 'barrel-containing', proteins, rather, than, an, independent, unfolding, of, each, domain, '[', 'A,', '(', 'βα)(8)', 'barrel;', 'C,', antiparallel, 'β(8)', 'sandwich]'])].
[sujeto(['Adhesion', of, keratinocytes, is, crucial, for]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento([the, integrity, of, the, 'skin,', as, demonstrated, by, the, number, of, dermatological, disorders, of, genetic, origin, that, are, associated, with, a, defect, of, basal, keratinocyte, adhesion])].
[sujeto(['Integrins', are, the, main, component, of, the, molecular, networks]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, this, 'phenomenon,', but, there, are, many, others])].

[sujeto(['All', these, data, strongly]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, 'CD98hc', is, involved, in, integrin, trafficking, and, by, 'consequence,', in, keratinocyte, adhesion, and, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['Hence,', selectively]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([activated, 'VSMCs', is, a, potential, strategy, against, 'vaso-occlusive', disorders, such, as, 'in-stent', 'restenosis,', 'vein-graft', 'stenosis,', and, transplant, vasculopathy])].

[sujeto(['CD98hc']), verbo([mediates]), complemento([integrin, signaling, and, localizes, amino, acid, transporters, to, the, plasma, membrane])].

[sujeto(['Especially', in, renal, cell, cancer, '(', 'RCC),', tyrosine, 'kinase-inhibitors']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, established, as, useful, and, highly, effective, therapy])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', the, identification, of, novel, cell, surface, markers, is, 'sought,', which, might]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, novel, diagnostic, and, therapeutic, strategies, in, cancer])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([increased, 'CD98hc', expression, in, different, types, of, malign, 'RCCs,', among, them, clear, cell, '(', 'cc)RCC,', papillary, '(', 'p)RCC', and, chromophobe, '(', 'ch)RCC,', but, lack, of, expression, in, the, benign, renal, oncocytoma])].

[sujeto(['From', these, 'data,', we, conclude, that, 'CD98hc', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'RCCs,', whereby, the, extent, of, expression, is, likely, to, correlate, directly, with, grade, of, malignancy])].
[sujeto(['CD98hc', was, not]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, biosynthesis, of, cellular, 'Fn', or, the, maintenance, of, the, repertoire, or, affinity, of, cellular, 'Fn', binding, 'integrins,', which, are, important, contributors, to, 'Fn', assembly])].
[sujeto(['Instead,', 'CD98hc', was]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, 'cell\'s', ability, to, exert, force, on, the, matrix, and, did, so, by, dint, of, its, capacity, to, interact, with, integrins, to, support, downstream, signals, that, lead, to, activation, of, 'RhoA', small, 'GTPase'])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', we, identify, 'CD98hc', as, a, membrane, protein, that, enables, matrix, assembly, and, establish, that, it, functions, by]), verbo([interacting]), complemento([with, integrins, to, support, 'RhoA-driven', contractility])].
[sujeto(['In', 'mammals,', beta1, integrin, adhesion, receptors, generate, signals, that]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([cell, 'spreading,', 'migration,', 'proliferation,', and, survival])].
[sujeto(['CD98,', a, heterodimeric, transmembrane, 'protein,', physically, associates, with, certain, integrin, beta, subunit, cytoplasmic, domains, '(', 'tails)', via, its, heavy, 'chain,', 'CD98hc', '(', 'SLC3A2),', and]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'CD98hc', impairs, integrin, signaling])].

[sujeto(['We', then, identified, point, mutations, in, the, beta3, 'C', terminus, '(', 'T755K', and, 'T758M)', that, abolish, 'CD98hc', association, and, a, double, mutation, in, the, corresponding, residues, in, the, betaPS, tail, '(', 'K839T,M842T),', which, resulted, in]), verbo([gain]), complemento([of, 'CD98hc', interaction])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', the]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, function, 'beta3(T755K)', mutation, or, the, gain, of, function, 'beta3/betaPS(K839T,M842T)', led, to, a, loss, or, gain, of, 'integrin-mediated', cell, 'spreading,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, critical, integrin, residues, required, for, 'CD98hc', interaction, and, in, doing, so, have, shown, that, 'CD98c', interaction, with, the, integrin, beta, tail, is, required, for, its, ability, to, mediate, integrin, signaling])].
[sujeto(['These', studies, also]), verbo([provide]), complemento([new, insights, into, how, 'CD98hc', may, cooperate, with, other, cytoplasmic, domain, binding, proteins, to, modulate, integrin, functions, and, into, the, evolution, of, integrin, signaling])].
[sujeto(['Integrins']), verbo([regulate]), complemento([cellular, behaviors, through, signaling, 'pathways,', including, 'Rho', 'GTPases', and, kinases])].
[sujeto(['CD98', 'heterodimers,', comprised, of, a, heavy, chain, '(', 'CD98hc,', 'SLC3A2)', and, one, of, several, light, 'chains,']), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, integrins, through, 'CD98hc'])].

[sujeto([beta1, integrins, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, pathogenesis, of, certain, cancers])].

[sujeto(['These', results, explain, how, high, expression, of, 'CD98hc', in, human, cancers, contributes, to, 'transformation;', 'furthermore,', the, transmembrane, association, of, 'CD98hc', and, 'beta(1)', integrins, may]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, new, target, for, cancer, therapy])].
[sujeto(['The', uniporter, 'TAT1', '(', 'Slc16a10)']), verbo([mediates]), complemento([the, facilitated, diffusion, of, aromatic, amino, acids, '(', 'AAAs)', across, basolateral, membranes, of, 'kidney,', small, intestine, and, liver, epithelial, 'cells,', and, across, the, plasma, membrane, of, 'non-epithelial', cells, like, skeletal, myocytes])].
[sujeto(['Its', role, for, body, 'AA', homeostasis]), verbo([has]), complemento([now, been, investigated, using, newly, generated, 'TAT1', '(', 'Slc16a10)', defective, mice, '(', 'tat1(-/-))'])].
[sujeto(['Histological', analysis, did, not]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([abnormalities, and, there, is, no, compensatory, change, in, any, tested, 'AA', transporter, mRNA])].
[sujeto(['TAT1', null, 'mice,', 'however,', display]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['plasma,', muscle, and, kidney, 'AAA', concentration, under, both, normal, and, high, protein, 'diet,', although, this, concentration, remains, normal, in, the, liver])].
[sujeto(['A', major, aromatic, aminoaciduria, and, a, smaller, urinary]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, all, substrates, additionally, transported, by, 'l-type', 'AA', antiporter, 'Lat2-4F2hc', '(', 'Slc7a8)', were, revealed, under, a, high, protein, diet])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([an, epithelial, transport, defect, as, also, shown, by, the, accumulation, of, intravenously, injected, '(', 123, ')', 'I-2-I-l-Phe', in, kidney, and, 'l-[(3)H]Phe', in, ex, vivo, everted, gut, sac, enterocytes])].

[sujeto(['Additionally,', it, facilitates, the]), verbo([release]), complemento([of, 'AAAs', across, the, basolateral, membrane, of, small, intestine, and, proximal, kidney, tubule, epithelial, 'cells,', thereby, allowing, the, efflux, of, other, neutral, 'AAs', presumably, via, 'Lat2-4F2hc'])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([established, 'HEK293', cell, lines, stably, expressing, high, levels, of, human, 'LAT1', and, 'LAT2', forming, heterodimers, with, native, human, 4, 'F2hc', of, the, cells])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([found, that, 'L-[(14)C]alanine', is, an, appropriate, substrate, to, examine, the, function, of, 'LAT2,', whereas, 'L-[(14)C]leucine', is, used, for, 'LAT1'])].
[sujeto(['By', using, 'L-[(14)C]alanine', on, 'LAT2,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([for, the, first, time, directly, evaluated, the, function, of, human, 'LAT2', expressed, in, mammalian, cells, and, obtained, its, reliable, kinetics])].

[sujeto([4, 'F2hc', '(', 'CD98)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, associated, with, tumor, 'growth,', and, is, highly, expressed, in, various, tumors])].

[sujeto(['The', expression, of, 4, 'F2hc', expression, tended, to]), verbo([increase]), complemento([from, 'low-grade', to, 'high-grade', pulmonary, 'NE', tumors])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 4, 'F2hc', may, play, a, significant, role, in, tumor, 'progression,', hypoxic, conditions, and, poor, outcome, in, patients, with, pulmonary, 'NE', tumors])].
[sujeto(['This', transporter, is, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([along, the, basolateral, membranes, of, absorptive, epithelia, in, kidney, and, small, 'intestine,', but, is, also, abundant, in, the, brain])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([in, the, present, paper, that, targeted, inactivation, of, 'Slc7a8', leads, to, increased, urinary, loss, of, small, neutral, amino, acids])].
[sujeto(['Development', and, growth, of, 'Slc7a8(-/-)', mice, appears, 'normal,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([functional, compensation, of, neutral, amino, acid, transport, by, alternative, transporters, in, 'kidney,', intestine, and, placenta])].
[sujeto(['Since', arginine, 'metabolites,', such, as, nitric, oxide, and, 'polyamines,', influence, the, expression, of, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, erythroid, 'differentiation,', the, transport, of, the, cationic, amino, acid, may, play, an, important, role, in, erythroid, cells])].
[sujeto(['In', 'K562', 'cells,', 'N-ethylmaleimide,', a, known, inhibitor, of, 'CAT', transporters, '(', system, 'y(+)),']), verbo([suppresses]), complemento([only, a, fraction, of, arginine, influx, corresponding, to, 'leucine-insensitive', uptake])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', in, 'Xenopus', oocytes, coexpressing, 4, 'F2hc', and, 'y(+)LAT2,', leucine, exerts, a, marked, inhibition, of, arginine, 'transport,', partially, dependent, on, 'sodium,', while, no, inhibition, is, seen, in, oocytes]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['CAT1'])].
[sujeto(['Selected', polymorphisms, in, the, common, heavy, chain, of, both, 'transporters,', the, protein, 4, 'F2hc', '(', 'SLC3A2),', were, analysed, by, single, nucleotide]), verbo([primer]), complemento([extension])].
[sujeto(['From', all, 'variants,', only, five, were, in, the, coding, region, and, only, one, heterozygous, 'non-synonymous', polymorphism, '(', 'Ala94Thr)', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, 'LAT2'])].
[sujeto(['Numerous', polymorphisms, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, the, 'LAT1', and, 'LAT2', 5, '\'', -, flanking, regions, but, did, not, correlate, with, expression, of, the, respective, genes])].
[sujeto(['Genetic', variation, in, 4, 'F2hc,', 'LAT1,', and, 'LAT2', does, not, appear, to, be, a, major]), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, 'inter-individual', variability, in, pharmacokinetics, and, of, adverse, reactions, to, melphalan])].
[sujeto(['Using', the, 'Xenopus', laevis, oocytes, expression, 'system,', we, show, that, 'L-glutamine', is]), verbo([released]), complemento([from, oocytes, into, an, 'amino-acid-free', medium, only, when, both, transporters, are, coexpressed])].
[sujeto(['High-performance', liquid, chromatography, analysis]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([that, several, other, neutral, amino, acids, are, released, as, well])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', the, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, aromatic, amino, acid, diffusion, pathway, 'TAT1', can, control, neutral, amino, acid, efflux, via, neighboring, exchanger, 'LAT2-4F2hc,', by, recycling, its, aromatic, influx, substrates])].
[sujeto(['SLC7A11', '(', 'xCT),', together, with, 'SLC3A2', '(', 4, 'F2hc),', encodes, the, heterodimeric, amino, acid, transport, system, 'x(c)-,', which]), verbo([mediates]), complemento(['cystine-glutamate', exchange, and, thereby, regulates, intracellular, glutathione, levels])].
[sujeto(['This', further, resulted, in]), verbo([increased]), complemento([potency, of, 'geldanamycin,', with, no, effect, on, 17, -, 'AAG'])].
[sujeto(['The', inhibitor, of, 'gamma-glutamylcysteine', 'synthetase,', buthionine, 'sulfoximine,', also]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([intracellular, glutathione, levels, and, enhanced, potency, of, 'geldanamycin,', but, did, not, affect, 'L-alanosine'])].
[sujeto(['These', results, indicate, that, 'SLC7A11']), verbo([mediates]), complemento([cellular, uptake, of, 'L-alanosine', but, confers, resistance, to, geldanamycin, by, supplying, cystine, for, glutathione, maintenance])].
[sujeto(['SLC7A11', expression, could, serve, as, a, predictor, of, cellular, response, to, 'L-alanosine', and, 'glutathione-mediated', resistance, to, 'geldanamycin,', yielding, a, potential]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, increasing, chemosensitivity, to, multiple, drugs])].
[sujeto(['Genome-wide', association, studies, '(', 'GWAS)']), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, several, single, nucleotide, polymorphisms, '(', 'SNPs)', that, correlated, with, 'hyper-tension', in, large, samples])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, genetic, mutations]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, hypertension, might, differ, among, various, 'populations,', as, they, have, 'dif-ferent', origins, and, are, subjected, to, different, environmental, pressures])].
[sujeto(['However,', in, the, 'Mongolian', ethnic, 'group,', these, 'SNPs', were, not, associated, with, the, incidence, of, 'hyperten-sion,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([population, heterogeneity, for, the, genetic, factors, that, contribute, to, hypertension])].
[sujeto(['By']), verbo([modulating]), complemento([the, level, of, 'NPs,', 'NPR3', plays, an, important, role, in, cardiovascular, homeostasis])].
[sujeto(['Although', the, physiological, functions, of, 'NPR3']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, 'explored,', little, is, known, about, its, regulation, in, health, or, disease])].
[sujeto(['NPR3', was]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([while, 'NPR1', was, increased, by, hypoxia, at, mRNA, and, protein, levels, in, 'HCMa'])].
[sujeto(['From', microRNA, microarray, analyses, and, microRNA]), verbo([target]), complemento([predictive, 'databases,', 'miR-100', was, selected, as, a, candidate, regulator, of, 'NPR3', expression])].
[sujeto(['Antagomir-based', silencing, of, 'miR-100']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['NPR3', expression, in, 'HCMa'])].
[sujeto(['Results', from, this, study, point, to, a, role, for, 'miR-100', in, the, regulation, of, 'NPR3', 'expression,', and]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, possible, therapeutic, target, for, modulation, of, 'NP', bioactivity, in, heart, disease])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, suggested, that, medulloblastomas, be, categorized, into, 4, distinct, molecular, 'subgroups-', 'WNT', '(', 'DKK1),', 'SHH', '(', 'SFRP1),', 'Group', 3, '(', 'NPR3),', or, 'Group', 4, '(', 'KCNA1)-since', each, subgroup, is, distinct, and, there, is, no, overlap])].
[sujeto(['The', authors]), verbo([report]), complemento([on, a, 13, -, 'year-old', boy, with, medulloblastoma])].

[sujeto(['C-type', natriuretic, peptide, '(', 'CNP)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, demonstrated, in, human, and, mouse, models, to, play, critical, roles, in, cartilage, homeostasis, and, endochondral, bone, formation])].
[sujeto(['Indeed,']), verbo([targeted]), complemento([inactivation, of, the, genes, encoding, 'CNP', results, in, severe, dwarfism, and, skeletal, defects, with, a, reduction, in, growth, plate, chondrocytes])].

[sujeto(['The', chondroprotective, effects, were, shown, to, be]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, natriuretic, peptide, receptor, '(', 'Npr)2', and, enhanced, synthesis, of, cyclic, 'guanosine-3\',5\'-monophosphate', '(', 'cGMP)', production])].

[sujeto(['Evidence', indicates, that]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['CNP', signalling, may, prevent, growth, retardation, and, protect, cartilage, in, patients, with, inflammatory, joint, disease])].

[sujeto(['NPR3', plays, an, important, role, in, the, clearance, of, 'NPs', and, through, direct, signaling, mechanisms]), verbo([modulates]), complemento([smooth, muscle, cell, function, and, cardiac, fibroblast, proliferation])].

[sujeto(['There', was, no, significant, difference, in, 'NPs', levels, between, the, 2, groups]), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, the, clearance, function, of, the, receptor, was, not, affected])].

[sujeto(['Natriuretic', peptides, '(', 'NP)']), verbo([regulate]), complemento([cardiovascular, homeostasis, and, have, multiple, metabolic, properties])].
[sujeto(['We', hypothesized, that, insulin, acutely]), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['NP', receptor, expression, in, adipose, tissue])].
[sujeto(['NPRC', gene, expression, was, 'up-regulated', in, 'SAT', during, both, 'euglycemic-', and, 'hyperglycemic-hyperinsulinemic', clamps, '(', 'P', =, 0.038, and, 'P', =, 0.048, ',', 'respectively),', and, was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, high, glucose, and, insulin, treatment, in, monocytes, '(', 70.2, '%', ;, 'P', =, 0.01, ')', ',', but, not, in, mature, macrophages])].
[sujeto(['Insulin']), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, 'NPRC', in, 'SAT', independently, of, circulating, glucose, concentrations])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', insulin, might]), verbo([suppress]), complemento([circulating, 'NP', via, 'up-regulation', of, 'NPRC', expression, in, 'obesity,', providing, a, novel, link, between, hyperinsulinemia, and, obesity])].
[sujeto(['Activation', of, 'β-adrenergic', receptors, '(', 'β-ARs)', can]), verbo([induce]), complemento([a, functional, &, 'quot;brown-like&quot;', adipocyte, phenotype])].
[sujeto(['As', cardiac, natriuretic, peptides, '(', 'NPs)', and, 'β-AR', agonists, are, similarly, potent, at]), verbo([stimulating]), complemento([lipolysis, in, human, 'adipocytes,', we, investigated, whether, 'NPs', could, induce, human, and, mouse, adipocytes, to, acquire, brown, adipocyte, 'features,', including, a, capacity, for, thermogenic, energy, expenditure, mediated, by, uncoupling, protein, 1, '(', 'UCP1)'])].
[sujeto(['In', human, 'adipocytes,', atrial, 'NP', '(', 'ANP)', and, ventricular, 'NP', '(', 'BNP)']), verbo([activated]), complemento(['PPARγ', 'coactivator-1α', '(', 'PGC-1α)', and, 'UCP1', 'expression,', induced, 'mitochondriogenesis,', and, increased, uncoupled, and, total, respiration])].
[sujeto(['At', low, 'concentrations,', 'ANP', and, 'β-AR', agonists, additively]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([expression, of, brown, fat, and, mitochondrial, markers, in, a, p38, 'MAPK-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Mice', exposed, to, cold, temperatures, had]), verbo([increased]), complemento([levels, of, circulating, 'NPs', as, well, as, higher, expression, of, 'NP', signaling, receptor, and, lower, expression, of, the, 'NP', clearance, receptor, '(', 'Nprc)', in, brown, adipose, tissue, '(', 'BAT)', and, white, adipose, tissue, '(', 'WAT)'])].
[sujeto(['Infusion', of, 'BNP', into, mice, robustly]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['Ucp1', and, 'Pgc-1α', expression, in, 'WAT', and, 'BAT,', with, corresponding, elevation, of, respiration, and, energy, expenditure])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'NPs', promote, &, 'quot;browning&quot;', of, white, adipocytes, to, increase, energy, 'expenditure,', defining, the, heart, as, a, central, regulator, of, adipose, tissue, biology])].
[sujeto(['Endogenous', 'peptides,', such, as, vasoactive, intestinal, polypeptide, '(', 'VIP),', 'C-type', natriuretic, peptide, '(', 'CNP),', and, bradykinin, '(', 'BK),']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, proposed, to, play, a, role, in, the, female, sexual, arousal, response, by, exerting, relaxation, of, 'clitoral,', 'labial,', and, vaginal, smooth, muscle])].
[sujeto(['While', the, effects, of, endogenous, peptides, on, the, human, male, erectile, tissue]), verbo([have]), complemento([already, been, 'described,', only, very, few, studies, have, been, conducted, to, investigate, the, peptidergic, control, of, female, genital, 'tissues,', including, the, vagina])].
[sujeto(['To', elucidate, the, expression, of, mRNA, specifically, encoding, for, peptide, receptors, in, the, human, vagina, and, the, effects, of, 'VIP,', 'CNP,', and, 'BK', on, the, tension]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'endothelin-1', '(', 'ET-1)', of, isolated, human, vaginal, wall, smooth, muscle])].
[sujeto(['Using', the, organ, bath, 'technique,', the, effects, of, 'VIP,', 'CNP,', and, 'BK', '(', 0.1, nM, to, 1, 'µM)', on, the, tension]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 0.1, µM, 'ET-1', of, human, vaginal, strips, were, investigated])].
[sujeto(['Characterize', the, expression, of, peptide, receptors, in, the, human, vagina, and, measure, the, relaxation, exerted, by, 'BK,', 'CNP,', and, 'VIP', on, the, contraction]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'ET-1', of, isolated, human, vaginal, tissue])].
[sujeto(['The', tension]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'ET-1', was, reversed, by, the, peptides, with, the, following, rank, order, of, 'efficacy:', 'BK', '(', 21.7, '%', ')', &, 'gt;', 'VIP', '(', 20.9, '%', ')', &, 'gt;', 'CNP', '(', 13.3, '%', ')'])].
[sujeto(['The', relaxing, effects, of, 'VIP', and, 'BK', were, paralleled, by, a, 4.8, -, fold, and, fivefold]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'cAMP,', while, the, production, of, cGMP, was, stimulated, 38, -, fold, and, 119, -, fold, in, the, presence, of, 'CNP', or, 'BK,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['Previous', investigations]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, the, plasma, levels, of, the, cardiac, hormone, brain, natriuretic, peptide, '(', 'BNP)', increase, during, acute, cardiac, allograft, rejection, as, diagnosed, by, endomyocardial, biopsy])].
[sujeto(['Successful', immunosuppressant, treatment]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([plasma, 'BNP', 'levels,', suggesting, a, role, for, 'BNP', in, transplantation, immunity])].
[sujeto(['BN', lymphocytes, were, 'gamma-irradiated', to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['DNA', synthesis])].
[sujeto(['MLR']), verbo([induced]), complemento([an, increase, in, relative, receptor, abundance, as, 'follows:', 'NPRA', &, 'gt;', 'NPRB', &, 'gt;', 'NPRC'])].
[sujeto(['ANF', and, 'BNP', significantly]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([up, to, approximately, 50, '%', lymphocyte, proliferation, in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner, in, the, range, of, 10, '(', -, 11, ')', to, 10, '(', -, 6, ')', 'mol/liter,', whereas, 'CNP', significantly, decreased, lymphocyte, proliferation, only, modestly, '(', approximately, 20, '%', ')', at, 10, '(', -, 8, ')', 'mol/liter', and, at, 10, '(', -, 6, ')', 'mol/liter'])].
[sujeto(['Both', 'ANF', and, 'BNP']), verbo([have]), complemento([immunomodulatory, 'functions,', although, the, response, to, cardiac, rejection, observed, clinically, involves, increases, in, plasma, levels, of, 'BNP', only])].
[sujeto(['This', is, likely, related, to, 'BNP', gene, promoter, sequences, previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([to, be, responsive, to, specific, cytokines, and, related, substances])].
[sujeto(['The', modulation, of, the, 'MLR', by, 'NP']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([a, possible, clinical, use, of, these, peptides, in, transplantation, immunity])].
[sujeto(['Atrial', natriuretic, peptide, '(', 'ANP)', is, a, known, vascular, antipermeability, and, antiangiogenic, 'factor,', but, its, possible, alteration, during, the, early, stages, of, diabetic, retinopathy]), verbo([has]), complemento([not, yet, been, explored])].
[sujeto(['The', present, study, sought, to, investigate, the, expression, of, 'ANP', and, its, receptors, using, a, model, of, streptozotocin, '(', 'STZ)']), verbo([induced]), complemento([diabetes, in, the, rat])].
[sujeto(['Diabetes', was]), verbo([induced]), complemento([in, male, 'Wistar', rats, by, an, intraperitoneal, injection, of, 'STZ'])].
[sujeto(['Diabetes']), verbo([caused]), complemento([the, downregulation, of, 'ANP', protein, expression, in, the, layers, of, the, retina, at, 3, months, after, the, induction, of, diabetes])].
[sujeto(['The', downregulation, of, 'ANP', and, 'NPRC', in, retinas, of, diabetic, rats]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([a, role, for, this, peptide, in, experimental, diabetic, retinopathy])].
[sujeto(['Three', types, of, natriuretic, peptides, '(', 'NP)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, 'isolated:', atrial, natriuretic, peptide, '(', 'ANP),', brain, natriuretic, peptide, '(', 'BNP),', and, 'C-type', natriuretic, peptide, '(', 'CNP)'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'NP', family, elicits, a, number, of, 'vascular,', renal, and, endocrine, effects, that, help, to]), verbo([maintain]), complemento([blood, pressure, and, extracellular, fluid, volume])].
[sujeto(['These', effects, are]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, the, specific, binding, of, 'NP', to, cell, surface, receptors, that, have, been, 'characterized,', purified, and, cloned, from, cells, of, the, 'vasculature,', 'kidney,', adrenal, gland, and, brain])].
[sujeto(['NPRA', and, 'NPRB', are, guanylyl, cyclase, 'receptors,', and, their, activation]), verbo([increases]), complemento([cGMP, levels])].
[sujeto(['Human', 'NPRA']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, high, structural, homology, with, human, 'NPRB,', and, contains, a, 'highly-conserved', guanylyl, cyclase, domain])].
[sujeto(['ANP', and, 'BNP']), verbo([bind]), complemento([primarily, to, 'NPRA,', which, is, found, in, the, 'vasculature,', causing, vasodilation, and, inhibition, of, vascular, smooth, muscle, cell, proliferation])].
[sujeto(['Atrial', natriuretic, peptide, '(', 'ANP)', and, brain, natriuretic, peptide, '(', 'BNP)', are, 'loop-shaped', peptidic, hormones, that]), verbo([have]), complemento([multiple, actions, on, body, fluid, homeostasis])].
[sujeto(['Their', physiological, effects, are]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([through, the, activation, of, their, 'receptor,', natriuretic, peptide, receptor, 'A', '(', 'NPRA)'])].
[sujeto(['To', map, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, of, human, 'NPRA,', we, applied, the, methionine, proximity, assay, method, to, this, receptor])].
[sujeto(['We', photolabeled, 'NPRA', 'mutants,', presenting, a, single, methionine, in, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([domain, of, the, 'receptor,', and, used, 'benzoylphenylalanine-', '(', 'Bpa-)', substituted, peptides, at, positions, 0, ',', 3, ',', 18, ',', 26, ',', and, 28, of, the, ligand])].
[sujeto(['We', identified, that, the, 'N-terminus', of, the, peptide, is]), verbo([interacting]), complemento([with, the, region, between, 'Asp(177)', and, 'Val(183)', of, the, receptor])].
[sujeto(['Arg(3)', is]), verbo([interacting]), complemento([in, the, vicinity, of, 'Phe(172)'])].
[sujeto(['Leu(18)']), verbo([binds]), complemento([close, to, 'Val(116)'])].
[sujeto(['Phe(26)']), verbo([binds]), complemento([in, the, vicinity, of, 'His(195),', and, the, 'C-terminal', 'Tyr(28)', is, located, close, to, 'Met(173)'])].
[sujeto(['We', next, proceeded, with, photolabeling, of, a, dual, 'Bpa-substituted', peptide, and, showed, that, the, 'N-terminus', and, 'Leu(18)']), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, opposite, receptor, subunits])].
[sujeto(['On', the, basis, of, our, 'results,', a, molecular, model, of, 'peptide-bound', 'NPRA', was, developed, by, homology, modeling, with, the, 'C-type', natriuretic, 'peptide-', '(', 'CNP-)']), verbo([bound]), complemento([natriuretic, peptide, receptor, 'C', '(', 'NPRC)', crystal, structure])].
[sujeto(['The', model]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, validated, by, molecular, dynamics, simulations])].
[sujeto(['Our', work]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, rational, basis, for, interpreting, and, predicting, natriuretic, peptide, binding, to, the, human, 'NPRA'])].
[sujeto(['We', investigated, whether, natriuretic, 'peptides,']), verbo([acting]), complemento(['locally,', modify, conduit, artery, distensibility, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['A71915']), verbo([increased]), complemento([iliac, 'PWV', from, 2.97, +, /, -, 0.13, to, 3.06, +, /, -, 0.13, 'm/s;', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.01])].
[sujeto(['Neither', 'CNP', nor, cANF, altered, 'PWV,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, the, 'NPRB', and, 'NPRC', receptors, do, not, acutely, influence, distensibility, in, vivo])].
[sujeto([298, 'patients,', diagnosed, as, having, essential, hypertension, according, to, 24, -, hour, ambulatory, blood, pressure, '(', 'BP)', measurements, '(', mean, daytime, diastolic, 'BP&gt;', 90, mm, 'Hg)', whilst, off, 'medication,', and, 278, normotensive, control, subjects, of, a, similar, 'African', 'ancestry,', were, genotyped, for, polymorphic, markers, in, intron, 2, '(', which, is, in, complete, linkage, disequilibrium, with, a, potentially, functional, exon, 1, 'variant)', and, exon, 3, '(', which]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, the, extension, of, 'ANP', by, two, additional, 'arginines)', of, the, 'ANP', gene])].
[sujeto(['The', results, of, the, present, study]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'ANP,', but, not, the, 'NPRC', locus, contributes, to, 'BP', in, subjects, of, 'African', ancestry])].
[sujeto(['To']), verbo([ensure]), complemento([that, our, observations, were, spleen, 'specific,', a, similar, protocol, was, repeated, in, the, hindquarters])].
[sujeto(['Rat', 'ANF(1-28),', infused, into, the, splenic, artery, of, anaesthetized, male, 'rats,']), verbo([caused]), complemento([a, 'dose-dependent', '(', 0.3, -, 59, pmol, 'min(-1))', increase, in, microvascular, pressure, from, 11.3, +, /, -, 0.7, to, 14.9, +, /, -, 0.5, mmHg, and, in, 'post-capillary', resistance, from, 7.2, +, /, -, 0.6, to, 10.1, +, /, -, 1.1, mmHg, 'ml(-1)'])].
[sujeto(['Intrasplenic', 'ANF', '(', 6.5, pmol, 'min(-1))']), verbo([caused]), complemento([a, sustained, increase, in, intrasplenic, fluid, efflux, from, 0.1, +, /, -, 0.1, to, 0.3, +, /, -, 0.1, ml, 'min(-1),', and, in, capillary, filtration, coefficient, '(', 'Kf)', from, 1.2, +, /, -, 0.5, to, 2.4, +, /, -, 0.6, ml, 'mmHg-1', 'min-1', '(', 100, g, 'tissue)-1'])].
[sujeto(['Mechanical', elevation, of, splenic, intravascular, pressure, '(', from, 11.3, +, /, -, 0.7, to, 22.4, +, /, -, 0.2, 'mmHg)', significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([intrasplenic, fluid, extravasation, '(', from, 0.4, +, /, -, 0.3, to, 1.4, +, /, -, 0.3, ml, 'min(-1))'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'ANF', antagonist, 'A71915', '(', 8.3, and, 83, pmol, 'min-1),', which, blocks, 'ANF-stimulated', cGMP, production, via, natriuretic, peptide, 'receptor-A', '(', 'NPRA),']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, 'ANF-induced', changes, in, splenic, microvascular, pressure, and, 'post-capillary', resistance])].
[sujeto(['It', is, concluded, that, 'ANF']), verbo([enhances]), complemento([the, extravasation, of, isoncotic, fluid, from, the, splenic, vasculature, both, by, raising, intrasplenic, microvascular, pressure, '(', increased, 'post-capillary', 'resistance)', and, by, increasing, filtration, area])].
[sujeto(['The', constrictive, activity, of, 'ANF', on, the, splenic, vasculature, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([through, 'NPRA'])].
[sujeto(['The', clearance, receptor, for, natriuretic, peptides, '(', 'NPRC),', a, candidate, gene, for, essential, 'hypertension,', is, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, adipose, 'tissue,', where, is, nutritionally, regulated])].
[sujeto(['Using', polymerase, chain, reaction, '(', 'PCR)', and, direct, automated, 'sequencing,', a, biallelic, '(', 'A/C)', polymorphism, was, detected, at, position, -, 55, in, a]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([promoter, element, named, 'P1'])].
[sujeto(['In', a, random, sample, of, 232, white, 'Caucasians', the, 'C(-55)', allele, was, more, commonly]), verbo([found]), complemento(['(', 81.7, '%', of, all, 'alleles)', with, 155, 'CC', '(', 66.8, '%', ')', ',', 69, 'AC', '(', 29.7, '%', ')', and, only, eight, 'AA', '(', 3.5, '%', ')', genotypes])].
[sujeto(['The', 'C(-55)', 'variant,', in, the, presence, of]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['adiposity,', might, reduce, plasma, 'ANP', through, increased, 'NPRC-mediated', 'ANP', 'clearance,', contributing, to, higher, blood, pressure])].
[sujeto(['Natriuretic', peptide, receptors]), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, been, distinguished, on, the, basis, of, their, differential, affinity, for, peptide, fragments, and, 'analogues;', 'however,', most, of, the, available, ligands, are, not, fully, selective])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([used, the, specific, guanylyl, 'cyclase-linked', receptor, 'antagonist,', 'HS-142-1,', to, investigate, the, differential, distribution, of, natriuretic, peptide, receptor, subtypes, in, the, 'human,', bovine, and, rat, kidney])].
[sujeto(['Specific,', high, affinity, 3, -, '(', '[', 125, 'I]-iodotyrosyl)-rat-ANP-(1-28)([125I]-rANP1-28)']), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, were, identified, in, all, three, 'species,', localized, to, 'glomeruli,', inner, 'medulla,', intrarenal, arteries, and, regions, in, the, outer, medulla, corresponding, to, vasa, recta, bundles])].
[sujeto(['In', the, 'rat,', '[', 125, 'I]-rANP1-28']), verbo([binding]), complemento([was, inhibited, by, unlabelled, peptide, sequences, with, a, rank, order, of, potency, '(', 'rANP1-28', &, 'gt;', 'pCNP1-22', &, 'gt;', 'C-ANP4-23)'])].
[sujeto(['The', glomeruli, exhibited, a, heterogeneous, population, of]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['sites,', 'C-ANP4-23', and, 'pCNP1-22', producing, a, significantly, better, fit, to, a, two, component, inhibition, curve, compared, to, the, single, component, curve, for, 'rANP1-28'])].
[sujeto(['Competitive', inhibition, experiments, with, the, receptor, selective, 'ligands,', 'C-ANP4-23', and, 'HS-142-1,']), verbo([suggested]), complemento(['that,', like, the, 'rat,', human, and, bovine, glomeruli, possessed, a, heterogeneous, population, of, binding, 'sites,', whilst, those, in, the, inner, medulla, and, intrarenal, arteries, of, all, three, species, represented, a, homogeneous, population])].
[sujeto(['Rat', glomeruli, exhibited, a, high, proportion, '(', &, 'gt;80%)', of, the, 'NPRc', receptor, subtype, whereas, in, human, and, bovine, glomeruli, this, receptor, represented, less, than, 20, '%', of, the, total, 'population,', the, majority, of]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, being, 'HS-142-1-sensitive'])].
[sujeto(['C-ANP4-23', exhibited, a, significantly, higher, inhibitory, potency, for]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, in, rat, glomeruli, compared, to, those, in, human, and, bovine, kidney, whilst, 'HS-142-1', was, significantly, more, potent, in, the, rat, and, bovine, kidney, compared, to, man])].
[sujeto(['No', evidence, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, suggest, the, presence, of, a, renal, 'NPRBreceptor', subtype])].
[sujeto(['Natriuretic', peptides, '(', 'NPs),', mainly, produced, in, heart, '[', atrial, '(', 'ANP)', and, 'B-type', '(', 'BNP)],', brain, '(', 'CNP),', and, kidney, '(', 'urodilatin),']), verbo([decrease]), complemento([blood, pressure, and, increase, salt, excretion])].
[sujeto(['These', functions, are]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, natriuretic, peptide, receptors, 'A', and, 'B', '(', 'NPRA', and, 'NPRB)', having, cytoplasmic, guanylyl, cyclase, domains, that, are, stimulated, when, the, receptors, bind, ligand])].
[sujeto(['A', more, abundantly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([receptor, '(', 'NPRC', or, 'C-type)', has, a, short, cytoplasmic, domain, without, guanylyl, cyclase, activity])].
[sujeto(['NPRC', is, thought, to]), verbo([act]), complemento([as, a, clearance, 'receptor,', although, it, may, have, additional, functions])].
[sujeto(['Heterozygotes', and, homozygotes]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, progressively, reduced, ability, to, concentrate, 'urine,', exhibit, mild, 'diuresis,', and, tend, to, be, blood, volume, depleted])].
[sujeto(['These', results, are, consistent, with, the, sole, 'cardiovascular/renal', function, of, 'NPRC', being, to, clear, natriuretic, 'peptides,', thereby]), verbo([modulating]), complemento([local, effects, of, the, natriuretic, peptide, system])].
[sujeto(['Unexpectedly,', 'Npr3', -, /, -, homozygotes]), verbo([have]), complemento([skeletal, deformities, associated, with, a, considerable, increase, in, bone, turnover])].
[sujeto(['The', phenotype, is, consistent, with, the, bone, function, of, 'NPRC', being, to, clear, locally, synthesized, 'CNP', and]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([its, effects])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, 'NPRC']), verbo([modulates]), complemento([the, availability, of, the, natriuretic, peptides, at, their, target, 'organs,', thereby, allowing, the, activity, of, the, natriuretic, peptide, system, to, be, tailored, to, specific, local, needs])].
[sujeto(['Recent', 'genome-wide', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, new, loci, influencing, blood, pressure, '(', 'BP)', in, 'populations,', but, their, impact, on, 'OH', remains, unknown])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento(['Bonferroni', adjusted, '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.0016, ')', significant, evidence, for, association, between, 'OH', and, the, 'EBF1', locus, '(', 'rs11953630,', 'per-minor-allele', odds, 'ratio,', 95, '%', confidence, 'interval:', 0.9, ',', 0.85, -, 0.96, ;, 'P', =, 0.001, ')', ',', and, nominal, evidence, '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')', for, 'CYP17A1', '(', 'rs11191548:', 0.85, ',', 0.75, -, 0.95, ;, 'P', =, 0.005, ')', ',', and, 'NPR3-C5orf23', '(', 'rs1173771:', 0.92, ',', 0.87, -, 0.98, ;, 'P=', 0.009, ')', loci])].
[sujeto(['Among', subjects, not, taking, 'BP-lowering', 'drugs,', three, 'SNPs', within, the, 'NPPA/NPPB', locus, were, nominally, associated, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento([risk, of, 'OH', '(', 'rs17367504:', 1.13, ',', 1.02, -, 1.24, ;, 'P', =, 0.02, ',', 'rs198358:', 1.1, ',', 1.01, -, 1.2, ;, 'P', =, 0.04, ',', and, 'rs5068:', 1.22, ',', 1.04, -, 1.43, ;, 'P', =, 0.01, ')'])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'OH', and, resting, 'BP', share, few, genetic, components])].
[sujeto(['Over', one, billion, people, worldwide]), verbo([have]), complemento([hypertension, '(', '≥140', mm, 'Hg', systolic, blood, pressure, or, '≥90', mm, 'Hg', diastolic, blood, 'pressure)'])].
[sujeto(['Even', small, increments, in, blood, pressure, are, associated, with, an]), verbo([increased]), complemento([risk, of, cardiovascular, events])].
[sujeto(['This', 'genome-wide', association, study, of, systolic, and, diastolic, blood, 'pressure,', which, used, a, 'multi-stage', design, in, 200, ',', 0, individuals, of, 'European', 'descent,', identified, sixteen, novel, 'loci:', six, of, these, loci, contain, genes, previously, known, or, suspected, to]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([blood, pressure, '(', 'GUCY1A3-GUCY1B3,', 'NPR3-C5orf23,', 'ADM,', 'FURIN-FES,', 'GOSR2,', 'GNAS-EDN3);', the, other, ten, provide, new, clues, to, blood, pressure, physiology])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([provide]), complemento([new, insights, into, the, genetics, and, biology, of, blood, 'pressure,', and, suggest, potential, novel, therapeutic, pathways, for, cardiovascular, disease, prevention])].
[sujeto(['We', examined, the, effects, of, natriuretic, peptides, on, cGMP, formation, and, 125, 'I-labelled-ANP']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, cultured, cells, derived, from, ciliary, body, 'epithelium,', the, site, of, aqueous, humour, formation, in, the, eye])].
[sujeto(['ANP,', brain, natriuretic, peptide, '(', 'BNP)', and, 'C-natriuretic', peptide, '(', 'CNP)', at, 1, microM]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([cGMP, formation, 8.2, '(', +, /, -, 1.2, ')', -, 'fold,', 4.8, '(', +, /, -, 0.6, ')', -, fold, and, 87.3, '(', +, /, -, 12.1, ')', -, fold, respectively])].
[sujeto([125, 'I-ANP']), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, intact, cells, at, a, single, 'site,', with, a, dissociation, constant, 'KD=0'])].
[sujeto([125, 'I-ANP']), verbo([binding]), complemento([was, displaced, &, 'gt;95%', by, 'c-ANP,', a, specific, ligand, for, natriuretic, peptide, 'C', receptors, '(', 'NPR-C)'])].

[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, protein, kinase, 'C', '(', 'PKC)', 'down-regulates', both, 'NPR-B', and, 'NPR-C'])].
