[sujeto(['Cambogin', is, a, polycyclic, polyprenylated, acylphoroglucinol, '(', 'PPAP)', from, the, 'Garcinia', 'genus,', which]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, used, traditionally, for, cancer, treatment, across, 'Southeastern', 'Asia'])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, cambogin, inhibited, breast, cancer, cell, proliferation, and, induced, cell, apoptosis, in, vitro])].
[sujeto(['Cambogin']), verbo([induced]), complemento([the, activation, of, the, 'caspase-independent', mitochondrial, apoptotic, 'pathway,', as, indicated, by, an, increase, in, the, ratio, of, 'Bax/Bcl-2', and, the, nuclear, translocation, of, apoptosis, inducing, factor, '(', 'AIF)'])].
[sujeto(['Two-dimensional', gel, electrophoresis, and, mass, spectrometry, revealed, that, the, expression, of, proteins]), verbo([involving]), complemento([in, the, radical, oxygen, species, '(', 'ROS)', pathway, was, among, the, most, affected, upon, cambogin, treatment])].
[sujeto(['Cambogin']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([cellular, 'ROS', 'production,', and, induced, the, activation, of, the, 'ASK1-MKK4/MKK7-JNK/SAPK', signaling, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', cambogin, treatment]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, the, activation, of, activating, transcription, 'factor-2', '(', 'ATF-2)', and, the, trimethylation, of, histone, 'H3K9', in, the, activator, protein, 1, '(', 'AP-1)', binding, region, of, the, 'Bcl-2', gene, promoter])].
[sujeto(['Taken', in, 'conjunction,', the, present, study, indicates, that, cambogin, can]), verbo([induce]), complemento([breast, adenocarcinoma, cell, apoptosis, and, therefore, represents, therapeutic, potential, for, cancer, treatment])].
[sujeto(['PLK', '(', 'Polo-like', 'kinase)', 'inhibitors,', such, as, 'BI-2536,']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported, to, suppress, 'IFNB', '(', encoding, 'IFNβ,', interferon, 'β)', gene, transcription, induced, by, ligands, that, activate, 'TLR3', '(', 'Toll-like', receptor, 3, ')', and, 'TLR4'])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'BI-2536', is, likely, to, exert, this, effect, by, preventing, the, interaction, of, the, transcription, factors, 'IRF3', '(', 'interferon-regulatory', factor, 3, ')', and, 'c-Jun', with, the, 'IFNB', 'promoter,', but, without, affecting, the, 'TBK1', '{', 'TANK', '[', 'TRAF', '(', 'tumour-necrosis-factor-receptor-associated', 'factor)-associated', nuclear, factor, κB, 'activator]-binding', kinase, 1, '}', -, catalysed, phosphorylation, of, 'IRF3', at, 'Ser³⁹⁶,', the, dimerization, and, nuclear, translocation, of, 'IRF3', or, the, phosphorylation, of, 'c-Jun', and, 'ATF2', '(', activating, transcription, factor, 2, ')'])].
[sujeto(['Although', 'BI-2536']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([few, other, kinases, 'tested,', it, interacts, with, 'BET', '(', bromodomain, and, 'extra-terminal)', family, members, and, displaces, them, from, acetylated, lysine, residues, on, histones])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'BET', inhibitors, that, do, not, inhibit, 'PLKs', phenocopied, the, effect, of, 'BI-2536', on, 'IFNB', gene, transcription])].
[sujeto(['Similarly,', 'BET', inhibitors, blocked, the, interaction, of, 'IRF5', with, the, 'IFNB', promoter, and, the, secretion, of, 'IFNβ']), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'TLR7', or, 'TLR9', ligands, in, the, human, plasmacytoid, dendritic, cell, line, 'GEN2'])].
[sujeto([2, ',', but, without, affecting, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([translocation, of, 'IRF5'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, 'BET', family, member, 'BRD4', '(', 'bromodomain-containing', protein, 4, ')', was, associated, with, the, 'IFNB', promoter, and, that, this, interaction, was, enhanced, by, 'TLR3-', or, 'TLR4-ligation', and, prevented, by, 'BI-2536', and, other, 'BET', inhibitors])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, establish, that, 'BET', family, members, are, essential, for, 'TLR-stimulated', 'IFNB', gene, transcription, by, permitting, transcription, factors, to]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, the, 'IFNB', promoter])].
[sujeto(['They', also, show, that, the, interaction, of, the, 'IFNB', promoter, with, 'BRD4', is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'TLR', ligation, and, that, 'BI-2536', is, likely, to, suppress, 'IFNB', gene, transcription, by, targeting, 'BET', family, members])].
[sujeto(['Interleukin', 18, '(', 'IL-18)', is, a, pleiotropic, cytokine, and, capable, of]), verbo([stimulating]), complemento([proliferation, of, certain, cell, types])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', recombinant, rat, 'IL-18', '(', 'rrIL-18)', at, dosages, 5, -, 10, 'ng/ml']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, cell, viability, compared, to, untreated, cells, '(', with, medium, 'only)', at, 24, and, 48, h, '(', 'P&lt;0'])].
[sujeto(['At', the, same, 'time,', the, percentage, of, 'BrdU-labeling', cells, was, also, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['(', 'P&lt;0'])].
[sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', knockdown, of, 'IL-18', expression, with, short, interference, 'RNA', '(', 'siRNA),', the, cell, viability, began, to, decline, at, 24, h, and, significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([compared, to, negative, control, '(', 'NC)', at, 48, and, 72, h, after, transfection, '(', 'P&lt;0'])].
[sujeto(['Further,', after, treatment, with, 'rrIL-18', '(', 5, 'ng/ml),', 'IL-18', and, its, receptor, subunit, 'IL-18Rα']), verbo([increased]), complemento([both, at, mRNA, and, protein, levels])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', the, expression, levels, of, adaptor, molecule, 'MyD88,', transcription, factor, 'NF-κB', and, its, downstream]), verbo([targets]), complemento([cyclin, 'B1', and, cyclin, 'B2', were, remarkably, enhanced, in, 'BRL-3A', cells, stimulated, by, 'rrIL-18'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', transcription, factor, 'ATF2', and, its]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([genes, cyclin, 'A2,', 'Bcl-2', were, also, markedly, increased, after, treatment, with, 'rrIL-18'])].
[sujeto(['These', results, demonstrated, that, 'IL-18', can, augment, cell, proliferation, via, 'NF-κB', and, 'p38/ATF2', pathway, by]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([cyclin, 'B1,', cyclin, 'B2,', cyclin, 'A2', and, 'Bcl-2', in, 'BRL-3A', rat, liver, cells])].
[sujeto(['The', crucial, functions, of]), verbo([activating]), complemento([transcription, 'factor-2', '(', 'ATF2)', in, the, development, and, therapeutic, resistance, of, melanoma, have, been, previously, 'reported,', although, the, precise, underlying, mechanisms, remain, unclear])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([a, protein, kinase, 'C-ɛ', '(', 'PKCɛ)-', and, 'ATF2-mediated', mechanism, that, facilitates, resistance, by, transcriptionally, repressing, the, expression, of, 'interferon-β1', '(', 'IFNβ1)', and, downstream, 'type-I', 'IFN', signaling, that, is, otherwise, induced, upon, exposure, to, chemotherapy])].
[sujeto(['Treatment', of, 'early-stage', melanomas]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([low, levels, of, 'PKCɛ', with, chemotherapies, relieves, 'ATF2-mediated', transcriptional, repression, of, 'IFNβ1,', resulting, in, impaired, 'S-phase', 'progression,', a, 'senescence-like', phenotype, and, increased, cell, death])].
[sujeto(['This', response, is, lost, in, 'late-stage', metastatic, melanomas]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([high, levels, of, 'PKCɛ'])].
[sujeto(['Notably,']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['ATF2', and, low, expression, of, 'IFNβ1', in, melanoma, tumor, samples, correlates, with, poor, patient, responsiveness, to, biochemotherapy, or, neoadjuvant, 'IFN-α2a'])].
[sujeto(['Expression', of, 'brain-specific', phenotypes]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, all, trans, retinoic, acid, '(', 'ATRA)-induced', neural, differentiation, of, mouse, 'P19', embryonal, carcinoma, cells])].
[sujeto(['Among', these, 'phenotypes,', expression, of, class, 'IVa', 'β-tubulin', isotype, '(', 'TUBB4a)', was, particularly]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([in, neural, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['Transient', transfection, assays, employing, a, reporter, construct]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'ATRA-mediated', regulatory, region, of, the, 'TUBB4a', gene, lay, in, the, region, from, -, 83, nt, to, +, 137, nt, relative, to, the, +, 1, transcription, start, site])].
[sujeto(['Site-directed', mutagenesis, in, the, 'AP-1']), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, at, -, 29, /, -, 17, suggested, that, the, 'AP-1', binding, site, was, a, critical, region, for, 'ATRA-mediated', 'TUBB4a', expression])].
[sujeto(['Chromatin', immunoprecipitation, experiments]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([participation, of, 'JunD', and, activating, transcription, 'factor-2', '(', 'ATF2)', in, 'TUBB4a', expression])].
[sujeto(['Additionally,', exogenous, induction, of, the, 'dominant-negative', '(', 'dn)', type, of, 'JunD', canceled, 'ATRA-induced', upregulation, of, 'TUBB4a,', and, the, dn, type, of, 'ATF2']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([even, the, basal, activity])].
[sujeto(['Further', immunoblot, study, revealed, an, 'ATRA-mediated']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'JunD', 'protein,', while, a, significant, amount, of, 'ATF2', protein, was, constantly, produced])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'differentiation-mediated', activation, of, 'JunD', results, in, enhanced, 'TUBB4a', expression])].
[sujeto(['Unlike', other, 'defensins,', expression, of, 'HBD9', at, the, ocular, surface, is, reduced, during, microbial, 'infection,', but, activation, of, 'toll-like', receptor, 2, '(', 'TLR2)', in, corneal, epithelial, cells]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, 'up-regulate', 'HBD9'])].
[sujeto(['Our', purpose, was, to, test, the, hypothesis, that, 'TLR2']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, key, role, in, the, signalling, 'pathway(s)', involved, in, the, overexpression, or, underexpression, of, 'HBD9,', and, 'accordingly,', different, pathogens, would, induce, a, different, expression, pattern, of, 'HBD9'])].
[sujeto(['The', in, vitro, 'RNAi', silencing, method, and, response, to, dexamethasone, were, used, to, determine, key, molecules]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, signalling, pathways, of, 'HBD9', in, immortalized, human, corneal, epithelial, cells])].
[sujeto(['This', study, demonstrates, that, 'TLR2']), verbo([induces]), complemento(['HBD9', mRNA, and, protein, expression, in, a, 'time-', and, 'dose-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Transforming', growth, 'factor-β-activated', kinase, 1, '(', 'TAK1)', plays, a, central, role, in, 'HBD9', induction, by, 'TLR2,', and, transcription, factors, 'c-JUN', and]), verbo([activating]), complemento([transcription, factor, 2, are, also, involved])].
[sujeto(['TLR2-mediated', 'MKPs', and]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['factor-κB', signalling, pathways, are, involved, in, 'HBD9', expression])].
[sujeto(['These', molecules, can, be, potentially]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([to, modulate, 'HBD9', expression])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'endothelin-1', signalling, reduced, the, generation, and, enhanced, the, repair, of, ultraviolet, radiation, '(', 'UV)-induced', 'DNA', 'photoproducts,', and, inhibited, apoptosis, of, human, 'melanocytes,', without, increasing, cAMP, 'levels,', melanin, content, or, proliferation])].
[sujeto(['Treatment', with, 'endothelin-1']), verbo([activated]), complemento([the, 'MAP', kinases, 'JNK', and, 'p38,', as, evidenced, by, phosphorylation, of, their, 'target,', activating, transcription, 'factor-2', '(', 'ATF-2)'])].
[sujeto(['Endothelin-1', also]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([the, phosphorylation, of, 'JNK,', p38, and, 'ATF-2', by, 'UV'])].
[sujeto(['The', effects, of, 'endothelin-1', were, dependent, on]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([intracellular, calcium, mobilization, by, endothelin, 'B', receptor, signalling])].
[sujeto(['Activation', of, both, 'JNK', and, p38, was]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, reducing, 'DNA', 'photoproducts,', but, only, 'JNK', partially, contributed, to, the, survival, effect, of, 'endothelin-1'])].
[sujeto(['ATF-2', activation, depended, mainly, on, 'JNK,', yet, was, not, sufficient, for, the, effect, of, 'endothelin-1', on, 'UV-induced', 'DNA', 'damage,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([the, requirement, for, other, 'JNK', and, p38, targets, for, this, effect])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, underscore, the, significance, of, 'endothelin-1', and, endothelin, 'B', receptor, signalling, in, reducing, the, genotoxic, effects, of, 'UV', via]), verbo([activating]), complemento(['JNK', and, 'p38,', hence, restoring, genomic, stability, of, melanocytes])].
[sujeto(['Twist1', is, a, transcription, factor, that]), verbo([induces]), complemento(['EMT,', including, 'E-cadherin', suppression, and, cancer, cell, migration, and, 'invasion;', hence, it, promotes, cancer, metastasis])].
[sujeto(['Twist1', directly, or, indirectly]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, expression, of, various, genes, and, cellular, functions, involved, in, cancer, progression])].
[sujeto(['In', human, cancer, 'cells,', 'Twist1', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, directly, upregulate, transcription, of, the, mesenchymal, gene, integrin, α5, in, an, 'E-box-independent,', but, activating, 'protein-1', '(', 'AP-1)', 'element-dependent,', manner])].
[sujeto(['Twist1']), verbo([activated]), complemento([the, integrin, α5, promoter, by, interacting, with, and, activating, the, transcription, factor, 'AP-1,', composed, of, 'c-Jun', and, activating, transcription, 'factor-2', '(', 'ATF-2);', it, also, enhanced, the, nuclear, presence, of, 'ATF-2'])].
[sujeto(['AP-1', was, critical, for, 'Twist1-induced', cancer, cell, 'invasion,', primarily, through, the, induction, of, integrin, 'α5,', which]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['c-Jun', 'N-terminal', kinase, and, focal, adhesion, 'kinase-signaling', activities])].
[sujeto(['Using', data, from, 'The', 'Cancer', 'Genome', 'Atlas,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'Twist1', expression, positively, correlates, with, integrin, α5, expression, in, human, colorectal, cancers])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, cooperation, between, 'Twist1', and, 'AP-1', represents, a, novel, mechanism, for, 'EMT', and, tumor, invasiveness])].
[sujeto(['The', steroid, pregnenolone, sulfate]), verbo([activates]), complemento([the, transcription, factor, activator, 'protein-1', '(', 'AP-1)', via, stimulation, of, transient, receptor, potential, 'melastatin-3', '(', 'TRPM3)', channels])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, the, signaling, pathway]), verbo([requires]), complemento([an, influx, of, 'Ca(2+)', ions, into, the, cells, and, a, rise, in, the, intracellular, 'Ca(2+)', levels])].
[sujeto(['The', upregulation, of, 'AP-1', was, attenuated, in, cells, that, overexpressed, mitogen]), verbo([activated]), complemento([protein, kinase, 'phosphatase-1,', indicating, that, 'Ca(2+)', ions, prolong, the, signaling, cascade, via, activation, of, mitogen, activated, protein, kinases])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', stimulation, of, 'TRPM3', channels]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, transcriptional, activation, potential, of, the, basic, region, leucine, zipper, protein, 'ATF2'])].
[sujeto(['Inhibition', of, 'ATF2']), verbo([target]), complemento([gene, expression, via, expression, of, a, 'dominant-negative', mutant, of, 'ATF2', or, expression, of, an, 'ATF2-specific', short, hairpin, 'RNA', interfered, with, 'TRPM3-mediated', stimulation, of, 'AP-1'])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', 'c-Jun,', 'ATF2,', and, 'TCFs', are]), verbo([required]), complemento([to, connect, the, intracellular, signaling, cascade, elicited, by, activation, of, 'TRPM3', channels, with, enhanced, transcription, of, 'AP-1-regulated', genes])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, pregnenolone, 'sulfate-induced', 'TRPM3', channel, activation, changes, the, gene, expression, pattern, of, the, cells, by]), verbo([activating]), complemento([transcription, of, 'c-Jun-,', 'ATF2-,', and, 'TCF-controlled', genes])].
[sujeto(['Cell', apoptosis]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, endoplasmic, reticulum, '(', 'ER)', stress, appears, to, be, one, of, the, main, causes, of, myocardial, necrosis, following, myocardial, 'ischemia/reperfusion', '(', 'MI/R)'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'C/EBP', homologous, protein, '(', 'CHOP)', pathway, is, the, main, pathway, through, which, apoptosis, is]), verbo([induced]), complemento([during, 'ER', stress])].
[sujeto(['Glucose-regulated', protein, 78, '(', 'GRP78)', is, an, important, protein]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, 'CHOP', pathway])].
[sujeto(['The', present, study, investigated, the, hypothesis, that, 'MI/R']), verbo([activates]), complemento([the, 'CHOP', pathway, through, signaling, via, a, pathway, involving, 'PKR-like', 'ER', kinase, '(', 'PERK),', 'α-subunit', of, eukaryotic, initiation, factor, 2, '(', 'eIF2α)', and, activating, transcription, factor, 2, '(', 'ATF2)'])].
[sujeto(['Immunohistochemical', staining, of, the, heart, tissues, from, spontaneously, hypersensitive, rats, indicated, that, 'MI/R', injury]), verbo([increases]), complemento(['CHOP', and, 'GPR78', protein, expression, levels])].
[sujeto(['To', further, analyze, the, mechanism, by, which, 'MI/R', injury]), verbo([induces]), complemento([apoptosis, by, 'ER', 'stress,', the, expression, levels, of, five, marker, proteins, involved, in, the, hypothetical, 'PERK-eIF2α-ATF2', pathway, were, 'detected,', namely, 'PERK,', phosphorylated, 'PERK', '(', 'P-PERK),', 'eIF2α,', phosphorylated, eIF2α, '(', 'P-eIF2α)', and, 'ATF2'])].
[sujeto(['An']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, the, collective, expression, levels, of, these, proteins, would, indicate, that, apoptosis, was, induced, by, this, signaling, pathway])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'MI/R', activates, the, 'CHOP', pathway, during, 'ER', stress, by, activating, the, 'PERK-eIF2α-ATF2', pathway, and, that, hypertension, does, not, affect, this, signaling, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Activating', transcription, factor, 2, '(', 'ATF2)', and, its, homolog, 'ATF7', are, phosphorylated, at, 'Thr-69/Thr-71', and, at, 'Thr-51/Thr-53,', 'respectively,', by, 'stress-activated', 'MAPKs']), verbo([regulating]), complemento([their, transcriptional, functions, in, 'G1', and, 'S', phases])].
[sujeto(['Knockdown', of, 'ATF2', or, 'ATF7']), verbo([decreases]), complemento([the, rate, of, cell, proliferation, and, the, number, of, cells, in, 'M-phase'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'particular,', the, knockdown, of, 'ATF7', severely]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([cell, proliferation, and, 'G2/M', progression])].
[sujeto(['The', inducible, expression, of, a, mitotically, nonphosphorylatable, version, of, 'ATF7']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['G2/M', progression, despite, the, presence, of, endogenous, 'ATF7'])].
[sujeto(['We', also, show, that, mitotic, phosphorylation, of, 'ATF7']), verbo([promotes]), complemento([the, activation, of, 'Aurora', 'kinases,', which, are, key, enzymes, for, early, mitotic, events])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'Cdk1-mediated', phosphorylation, of, 'ATF7', facilitates, 'G2/M', 'progression,', at, least, in, 'part,', by, enabling, 'Aurora', signaling])].
[sujeto(['Only', a, few, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([explored, the, molecular, mechanism, of, 'KRG-mediated', 'anti-inflammatory', activity])].
[sujeto(['PPD-SF', 'dose-dependently', diminished, the]), verbo([release]), complemento([of, inflammatory, mediators, '[', nitric, oxide, '(', 'NO),', tumor, necrosis, 'factor-α,', and, prostaglandin, 'E2],', and, downregulated, the, mRNA, expression, of, their, corresponding, genes, '(', inducible, 'NO', 'synthase,', tumor, necrosis, 'factor-α,', and, 'cyclooxygenase-2),', without, altering, cell, viability])].
[sujeto(['The', 'PPD-SF-mediated', suppression, of, these, events, appeared, to, be]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, a, blockade, of, 'p38,', 'c-Jun', 'N-terminal', kinase, '(', 'JNK),', and, 'TANK', '(', 'TRAF', family, 'member-associated', 'NF-kappa-B', 'activator)-binding', kinase, 1, '(', 'TBK1),', which, are, linked, to, the, activation, of, activating, transcription, factor, 2, '(', 'ATF2)', and, interferon, regulatory, transcription, factor, 3, '(', 'IRF3)'])].
[sujeto(['These', results, strongly]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'anti-inflammatory', action, of, 'PPD-SF', could, be, mediated, by, a, reduction, in, the, activation, of, 'p38-,', 'JNK2-,', and, 'TANK-binding-kinase-1-linked', pathways, and, their, corresponding, transcription, factors, '(', 'ATF2', and, 'IRF3)'])].
[sujeto(['We', previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([the, decreased, expression, of, 'WWOX', in, 'EHCC', 'samples,', but, the, underlying, mechanism, remained, unclear])].
[sujeto(['WWOX']), verbo([interacted]), complemento([with, 'P38', and, modulated, its, 'sub-cellular', 'localization,', leading, to, the, cytoplasmic, retention, of, 'P38'])].
[sujeto(['WWOX', 'over-expression']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, phosphorylation, of, 'ATF2', and, 'eIF-4E,', while, exogenous, 'P38', reversed, this, reduction, in, phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['Ectopic', expression, of, 'WWOX', in, 'EHCC', cells]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, inhibited, proliferation, and, stimulated, apoptosis, in, a, 'P38', 'MAPK-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([a, negative, association, of, 'WWOX', with, nuclear, localization, of, 'P38', and, expression, of, phosphorylated, 'ATF2', in, 'EHCC', samples])].
[sujeto(['Our', data, demonstrated, the, role, of, 'WWOX', in, 'EHCC', 'progression,']), verbo([revealed]), complemento([the, potential, of, 'WWOX/p-ATF2', as, a, novel, diagnostic, and, prognostic, 'marker,', and, therapeutic, target, for, 'EHCC'])].
[sujeto(['P38', 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'MAPK)', is, a, 'pro-apoptotic', and, 'pro-inflammatory', protein, that, is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, response, to, cellular, stress])].
[sujeto(['While', p38, is, known, to, be]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, response, to, cerebral, 'ischemia,', the, precise, role, of, p38, and, its, isoforms, in, 'ischemia-induced', neuronal, apoptosis, remains, unclear])].
[sujeto(['GCI']), verbo([induced]), complemento([biphasic, activation, of, total, p38, in, the, hippocampal, 'CA1,', with, peaks, at, 30, min, and, 1, day, after, 10, -, min, 'ischemia-reperfusion'])].
[sujeto(['Further', study, demonstrated, that]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['p38α,', but, not, 'p38β,', translocated, to, the, nucleus, 30, min, and, 3, h, post, 'reperfusion,', and, that, this, event, coincided, with, increased, phosphorylation, of, activating, transcription, factor, 2, '(', 'ATF2),', a, p38, target, protein])].
[sujeto(['Intriguingly,']), verbo([activated]), complemento([p38α, was, also, enhanced, in, mitochondrial, fractions, of, 'CA1', neurons, 1, day, after, 'GCI,', and, there, was, loss, of, mitochondrial, membrane, 'potential,', as, well, as, enhanced, cytochrome, c, release, and, 'caspase-3', cleavage, at, 2, days, post, 'GCI'])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', 'E2']), verbo([prevented]), complemento([the, biphasic, activation, of, 'p38,', as, well, as, both, nuclear, and, mitochondrial, translocation, of, p38α, after, 'GCI,', and, these, findings, correlated, with, attenuation, of, mitochondrial, dysfunction, and, delayed, neuronal, cell, death, in, the, hippocampal, 'CA1'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', administration, of, a, p38, inhibitor, was, able, to, mimic, the, neuroprotective, effects, of, 'E2', in, the, hippocampal, 'CA1', region, by]), verbo([preventing]), complemento([nuclear, and, mitochondrial, translocation, of, 'p38α,', loss, of, mitochondrial, membrane, 'potential,', and, neuronal, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['As', a, 'whole,', this, study]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, changes, in, subcellular, localization, of, the, activated, p38α, isoform, are, required, for, neuronal, apoptosis, following, 'GCI,', and, that, 'E2', exerts, robust, 'neuroprotection,', in, 'part,', through, dual, inhibition, of, activation, and, subcellular, trafficking, of, p38α])].
[sujeto(['JNK', and, p38, phosphorylate, a, diverse, set, of, substrates, 'and,', 'consequently,', can]), verbo([act]), complemento([in, a, 'context-dependent', manner, to, either, promote, or, inhibit, tumor, growth])].

[sujeto(['To', analyze, the, effects, of, a, single, 'JNK', isoform, on, neuronal, cell, death, and, 'differentiation,', we, transfected, 'PC12', 'cells,', which, normally]), verbo([express]), complemento([only, 'JNK1', and, 'JNK2,', with, 'JNK3-p54'])].
[sujeto(['Transfected', 'JNK3', significantly]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([cell, death, after, 'UV', irradiation, '(', 0.5, -, 6, 'J/cm(2))', and, 'paclitaxel/taxol', treatment, '(', 1, -, 10, 'microm)'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', in, the, context, of, nerve, growth, 'factor-induced', '(', 10, or, 50, 'ng/ml)', differentiation, of, 'PC12', 'cells,', 'JNK3', expression, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, number, and, length, of, neurites])].
[sujeto(['This', functional, dichotomy, of, 'JNK3', was, mirrored, by, differential, activation, and, induction, of]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['JNK', 'substrates;', although, activating, transcription, 'factor-2', phosphorylation, was, enhanced, by, death, signaling, in, response, to, 'UV', and, 'taxol,', 'c-Jun', protein, expression, and, 'N-terminal', phosphorylation, were, increased, during, nerve, growth, 'factor-induced', differentiation])].
[sujeto(['The', absence, of, significant, 'JNK', activation, or]), verbo([target]), complemento([phosphorylation, in, response, to, 'H(2)O(2)', '(', 60, 'microm)', further, supports, the, hypothesis, that, 'JNK', isoforms, are, not, merely, 'injury-', or, 'stress-specific', kinases, but, also, have, 'context-specific', physiological, functions])].
[sujeto(['The', 'JNK', protein, kinase, is, a, member, of, the, 'MAP', kinase, group, that, is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, response, to, dual, phosphorylation, on, threonine, and, tyrosine])].
[sujeto(['Treatment', of, cells, with, 'interleukin-1', '(', 'IL-1)']), verbo([caused]), complemento([activation, of, the, 'JNK', isoforms])].
[sujeto(['Comparison', of, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([activity, of, the, 'JNK', isoforms, demonstrated, that, the, 'JNK', proteins, differ, in, their, interaction, with, 'ATF2,', 'Elk-1', and, 'Jun', transcription, factors])].
[sujeto(['Individual', members, of, the, 'JNK', group, may, therefore, selectively]), verbo([target]), complemento([specific, transcription, factors, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['In', this]), verbo([report]), complemento([we, described, the, isolation, of, transcription, factor, 'E4BP4', by, lambda, gt11, expression, cloning, using, a, probe, containing, the, 'CRE/ATF-like', sequence, located, between, -, 2764, bp, and, -, 2753, bp, in, the, upstream, regulatory, region, for, the, human, 'IL-1', beta, gene])].
[sujeto(['DNaseI', 'protection,', gel, mobility, shift, 'analysis,', and, cotransfection, studies, were, performed, to, investigate, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, functional, properties, of, 'E4BP4', using, 'IL-1', beta, promoter, sequences])].
[sujeto(['Competition', experiment, by, gel, shift, assay, indicated, that, 'E4BP4']), verbo([bound]), complemento([specifically, to, 'CRE/ATF-like', 'site,', not, 'NF', kappa, 'B-like', site])].
[sujeto(['In', cotransfection, 'studies,', 'E4BP4', repressed, promoter, activity, and, this, repression, was]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([through, the, 'CRE/ATF-like', site])].
[sujeto(['Mutational', analysis, of, 'E4BP4']), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, the, 'DNA', binding, as, well, as, repression, activities, required, leucine, heptad, repeat, domain])].
[sujeto(['Analysis', of, 'E4BP4', produced, in, 'Escherichia', coli, and, 'Sf9', cells, infected, with, recombinant, baculovirus, indicated, that, baculovirus, produced, protein, showed]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([binding, to, the, 'CRE/ATF-like', site, compared, to, the, 'E'])].
[sujeto(['Analysis', of, posttranslational, modifications, indicated, that, 'E4BP4', produced, in, 'Sf9', cells, was, phosphorylated, and, this, phosphorylation, was, important, for, the, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([activity, of, 'E4BP4'])].
[sujeto(['In', solid, 'tumors,', resistance, to, therapy, inevitably, develops, upon, treatment, with, cytotoxic, drugs, or, molecularly]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([therapies])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, describe, a, system, that, enables, pooled, shRNA, screening, directly, in, mouse, hepatocellular, carcinomas, '(', 'HCC)', in, vivo, to, identify, genes, likely, to, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, therapy, resistance])].
[sujeto(['Using', a, focused, shRNA, library]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([genes, located, within, focal, genomic, amplifications, of, human, 'HCC,', we, screened, for, genes, whose, inhibition, increased, the, therapeutic, efficacy, of, the, multikinase, inhibitor, sorafenib])].
[sujeto(['Both', 'shRNA-mediated', and, pharmacological, silencing, of, 'Mapk14', '(', 'p38α)', were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, sensitize, mouse, 'HCC', to, sorafenib, therapy, and, prolong, survival, by, abrogating, 'Mapk14-dependent', activation, of, 'Mek-Erk', and, 'Atf2', signaling])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, a, combination, of, sorafenib, and, 'Mapk14', blockade, is, a, promising, approach, to, overcoming, therapy, resistance, of, human, 'HCC'])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'way,', we, chemically, recapitulated]), verbo([triggering]), complemento([of, a, relevant, segment, of, the, 'MAPK-signaling', pathway, in, vitro])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', a, survey, of, kinase, inhibition, using, inhibitors, with, different, '(', 'Type', 'I/II)', modes, '(', including, therapeutically, 'relevant)', revealed, unambiguously, that, 'Type', 'II', inhibitors]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([phosphorylated, p38α, and, allowed, discovery, of, a, predictive, kinetic, analysis, based, on, cooperativity, to, distinguish, 'Type', 'I', vs, 'II'])].
[sujeto(['The', models, confirmed, the, reaction, 'order,', revealed, processivity, in, the, phosphorylation, of, 'MEK6', by, 'ASK1,', and]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, the, order, of, phosphorylation, is, dictated, by, both, binding, and, catalysis, rates])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([synthesized, 'γ-[(18)O4]-ATP', and, used, it, to, develop, a, 'non-radioactive', and, multiplex, method])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, novel, 'pro-survival', role, for, mammalian, p38α, in, response, to, 'H(2)O(2),', which, involves, an, 'up-regulation', of, antioxidant, defenses])].
[sujeto(['The', presence, of, p38α]), verbo([increases]), complemento([basal, and, 'H(2)O(2)-induced', expression, of, the, antioxidant, 'enzymes:', 'superoxide-dismutase', 1, '(', 'SOD-1),', 'SOD-2,', and, catalase, through, different, 'mechanisms,', which, protects, from, reactive, oxygen, species, '(', 'ROS)', accumulation, and, prevents, cell, death])].
[sujeto([p38α, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, regulate, '(', 'i)', 'H(2)O(2)-induced', 'SOD-2', expression, through, a, direct, regulation, of, transcription, mediated, by, activating, transcription, factor, 2, '(', 'ATF-2)', and, '(', 'ii)', 'H(2)O(2)-induced', catalase, expression, through, regulation, of, protein, stability, and, mRNA, expression, 'and/or', stabilization])].
[sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, this, 'p38α-dependent', antioxidant, response, allows, 'WT', cells, to, maintain, an, efficient, activation, of, the, 'mTOR/p70S6K', pathway])].
[sujeto(['Accordingly,', the]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, p38α, leads, to, 'ROS', accumulation, in, response, to, 'H(2)O(2),', which, causes, cell, death, and, inactivation, of, 'mTOR/p70S6K', signaling])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', our, results]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, novel, homeostatic, role, for, p38α, in, response, to, oxidative, 'stress,', where, 'ROS', removal, is, favored, by, antioxidant, enzymes, 'up-regulation,', allowing, cell, survival, and, 'mTOR/p70S6K', activation])].
[sujeto(['The', 'stress-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'SAPK)', p38, can]), verbo([induce]), complemento(['apoptosis,', and, its, inhibition, facilitates, mammary, tumorigenesis])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, during, mammary, acinar, morphogenesis, in, 'MCF-10A', cells, grown, in, 'three-dimensional', 'culture,', detachment, of, luminal, cells, from, the, basement, membrane, stimulated, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'MAPK)', kinases, 3, and, 6, '(', 'MKK3/6)', and, p38α, signaling, to, promote, anoikis])].
[sujeto([p38α, signaling]), verbo([increased]), complemento([transcription, of, the, 'death-promoting', protein, 'BimEL', by, phosphorylating, the, activating, transcription, factor, 2, '(', 'ATF-2)', and, increasing, 'c-Jun', protein, 'abundance,', leading, to, cell, death, by, anoikis, and, acinar, lumen, formation])].
[sujeto(['Inhibition', of, p38α, or, 'ATF-2']), verbo([caused]), complemento([luminal, filling, reminiscent, of, that, observed, in, ductal, carcinoma, in, situ, '(', 'DCIS)'])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, p38α, is, crucial, for, the, development, of, hollow, ducts, during, mammary, gland, 'development,', a, function, that, may, be, crucial, to, its, ability, to]), verbo([suppress]), complemento([breast, cancer])].
[sujeto(['In', 'steady-state', kinetics, 'experiments,', 'CMPD1', was, observed, to]), verbo([prevent]), complemento([the, 'p38alpha-dependent', phosphorylation, '(', 'K(i)(app)', =, 330, 'nM)', of, the, splice, variant, of, 'mitogen-activated', protein, 'kinase-activated', protein, kinase, 2, '(', 'MK2a)', that, contains, a, docking, domain, for, p38alpha, and, 'p38beta,', but, it, did, not, prevent, the, phosphorylation, of, 'ATF-2', '(', 'K(i)(app)', &, 'gt;', 20, 'microM)'])].
[sujeto(['While', isothermal, titration, calorimetry, analysis, indicated, that, 'CMPD1']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, 'p38alpha,', 'CMPD1', was, not, observed, to, compete, with, 'ATP', for, 'p38alpha,', nor, was, it, able, to, interrupt, the, binding, of, p38alpha, to, 'MK2a', observed, by, surface, plasmon, resonance])].
[sujeto(['CMPD1', inhibitory, 'complex,', to]), verbo([provide]), complemento([new, insight, into, the, mechanism, of, substrate, selective, inhibition])].
[sujeto([active, site]), verbo([binding]), complemento([inhibitor, complex])].
[sujeto(['Alterations', in, the, 'DXMS', behavior, of, both, p38alpha, and, 'MK2a', were, observed, upon, complex, 'formation,', including, but, not, limited, to, the, interaction, between, the, 'carboxy-terminal', docking, domain, of, 'MK2a', and, its]), verbo([binding]), complemento([groove, on, p38alpha])].
[sujeto(['Alterations', in, the, 'D(2)O', exchange, of, p38alpha, produced, by, 'CMPD1']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, substrate, selective, inhibitor, binds, in, the, vicinity, of, the, active, site, of, 'p38alpha,', resulting, in, perturbations, to, regions, containing, nucleotide, binding, pocket, 'residues,', docking, groove, residues, '(', 'E160', and, 'D161),', and, a, 'Mg(2+)', ion, cofactor, binding, residue, '(', 'D168)'])].
[sujeto(['Although', the, exact, mechanism, of, substrate, selective, inhibition, by, this, novel, inhibitor]), verbo([has]), complemento([not, yet, been, 'disclosed,', the, results, suggest, that, 'CMPD1', binding, in, the, active, site, region, of, p38alpha, induces, perturbations, that, may, result, in, the, suboptimal, positioning, of, substrates, and, cofactors, in, the, transition, 'state,', resulting, in, selective, inhibition, of, p38alpha, activity])].
[sujeto(['Mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'MAPK)', pathways, are, central, signaling, 'elements,', which]), verbo([translate]), complemento([and, integrate, stimuli, from, cell, surface, receptors, into, cytoplasmic, and, transcriptional, responses])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, systematically, compare, the, role, of, 'MAPKs', in, the, nerve, growth, 'factor-induced', 'long-term', differentiation, of, 'PC12', cells, and, show, the, persistent]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([and, 'dose-dependent', cytoplasmic, activation, of, extracellular, 'signal-regulated', kinases, 1, and, 2, '(', 'ERK1/2)', and, the, increasing, nuclear, and, cytoplasmic, activation, of, 'c-Jun', 'N-terminal', kinases, '(', 'JNKs)'])].

[sujeto(['Scanning', of, the, genome, for, selection, signatures, between, breeds, may, play, important, role, in, understanding, the, underlie]), verbo([causes]), complemento([for, observable, phenotypic, variations])].

[sujeto(['The', p38c, gene, is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, midgut, and, upregulated, upon, intestinal, infection])].

[sujeto(['Interestingly,', p38c, deficient, flies, accumulate, lipids, in, the, intestine, while]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([higher, levels, of, antimicrobial, peptide, and, metabolic, genes])].

[sujeto(['It', also]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([that, many, roles, initially, attributed, to, p38a, are, in, fact, mediated, by, p38c])].

[sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, that, 'KRG', exhibits, a, lot, of, different, biological, actions, such, as, 'anti-aging,', 'anti-fatigue,', 'anti-stress,', 'anti-atherosclerosis,', 'anti-diabetic,', 'anti-cancer,', and, 'anti-inflammatory', activities])].

[sujeto(['The', vascular, endothelium, is, specifically, sensitive, to, oxidative, 'stress,', and, this, is, one, of, the, mechanisms, that]), verbo([causes]), complemento([widespread, endothelial, dysfunction, in, most, cardiovascular, diseases, and, disorders])].

[sujeto(['The', 'ILK,', 'PINCH,', 'Parvin', '(', 'IPP)', complex]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([adhesion, and, migration, via, binding, of, 'ILK', to, β1, integrin, and, 'α-parvin', thus, linking, focal, adhesions, to, actin, cytoskeleton])].

[sujeto(['The', depletion, of, 'Rsu1']), verbo([caused]), complemento([significant, reduction, in, 'PINCH1', implying, that, 'Rsu1', may, function, in, part, by, regulating, levels, of, 'PINCH1'])].

[sujeto(['Zfat,', which, is, a]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([protein, harboring, an, 'AT-hook', domain, and, 18, -, repeats, of, 'C2H2', 'zinc-finger', 'motif,', is, highly, expressed, in, 'immune-related', 'tissues,', including, the, thymus, and, spleen])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'Zfat-deficient', 'DP', thymocytes, in, 'Zfat(f/f)-LckCre', mice, were, susceptible, to, apoptosis, both, at, an, unstimulated, state, and, in, response, to, 'T', cell, receptor, '(', 'TCR)-stimulation'])].

[sujeto(['Histone', deacetylases, '(', 'HDACs)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, found, implicated, in, fibrogenesis])].

[sujeto(['Stress-activated', protein, 'kinase-3', '(', 'SAPK3),', a, recently, described, 'MAP', kinase, family, member, with, a, 'wide-spread', tissue, 'distribution,', was, transfected, into, several, mammalian, cell, lines, and, shown, to, be]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, response, to, cellular, 'stresses,', 'interleukin-1', '(', 'IL-1)', and, tumour, necrosis, factor, '(', 'TNF)', in, a, similar, manner, to, 'SAPK1', '(', also, termed, 'JNK)', and, 'SAPK2', '(', also, termed, 'p38,', 'RK,', 'CSBP', and, 'Mxi2)'])].

[sujeto(['Our', previous, studies, show, that, morphine, disrupts, the, 'IL-23/IL-17']), verbo([mediated]), complemento([pulmonary, mucosal, host, defense, and, increases, susceptibility, to, 'Streptococcus', pneumoniae, lung, infection])].

[sujeto(['Assembly', of, 'interferon-beta', enhanceosome, from, its, individual, protein, components, and, of, enhancer, 'DNA']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, studied, in, solution, using, a, combination, of, fluorescence, 'anisotropy,', 'microcalorimetry,', and, 'CD', titration])].

[sujeto(['The', orientation, of]), verbo([bound]), complemento(['NF-kappaB', is, also, predetermined, by, the, asymmetry, of, the, 'PRDII', site, and, is, the, opposite, of, that, found, in, the, crystal, structure])].

[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', bone, 'marrow-derived', '(', 'BMM)', and, splenic, macrophages, '(', 'SPM)', from, 'SJL/J', 'mice,', susceptible, to, autoimmune, demyelinating, disease, following, 'Theiler\'s', virus, '(', 'TMEV)', 'infection,']), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['IL-23', in, response, to, 'TMEV'])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([investigated, beta, interferon, '(', 'IFN-beta)', and, 'IFN-alpha4', gene, expression, and, activation, of, related, transcription, factors, in, mouse, cytomegalovirus, '(', 'MCMV)-infected', fibroblasts])].

[sujeto(['Using', an, 'MCMV', mutant, lacking, 'pM27,', a, signal, transducer, and, activator, of, transcription, '(', 'STAT)', 2, -, specific, inhibitor, of, 'Jak/STAT', 'signalling,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, initial, phase, of, 'IFN', induction, and, the, subsequent, inhibition, does, not, depend, on, the, 'positive-IFN', feedback, loop])].

[sujeto(['Using', human, 'monocyte-derived', 'macrophages,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, an, infection, with, a, 'wild-type', 'strain,', but, not, a, listeriolysin, 'O-deficient', 'strain,', of, the, 'Gram-positive', bacterium, 'L'])].
[sujeto([monocytogenes]), verbo([induces]), complemento([expression, of, 'IFN-beta', and, a, bioactive, type, 'I', 'IFN', response])].

[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', vesicular, stomatitis, virus, and, 'LPS']), verbo([triggered]), complemento(['IRF3', activation, and, signaling])].
[sujeto(['Evidence', against, the, possibility, that, 'IRF7']), verbo([acts]), complemento([in, place, of, 'IRF3', is, provided])].
[sujeto([monocytogenes]), verbo([induced]), complemento([an, 'IFN-beta', response, in, human, macrophages, and, propose, that, this, response, involves, p38, 'MAPK', and, activating, transcription, factor, 2])].
[sujeto(['Using', various, 'stimuli,', we, show, that, 'IRF3', is, differentially]), verbo([activated]), complemento([during, type, 'I', 'IFN', responses, in, human, macrophages])].
[sujeto(['The', type, 'I', interferon, '(', 'IFN)', response]), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, coordinated, activation, of, the, latent, transcription, factors, 'NF-kappaB,', interferon, regulatory, factor, 3, '(', 'IRF-3),', and, 'ATF-2,', which, in, turn, activate, transcription, from, the, 'IFN-beta', promoter])].
[sujeto(['Synthesis', and, subsequent, secretion, of, 'IFN-beta']), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, 'Jak/STAT', signaling, 'pathway,', resulting, in, the, transcriptional, induction, of, the, full, spectrum, of, antiviral, gene, products])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento(['that,', although, 'RV14', infection, results, in, altered, levels, of, a, wide, variety, of, host, 'mRNAs,', induction, of, 'IFN-beta', mRNA, or, activation, of, the, 'Jak/STAT', pathway, is, not, seen])].
[sujeto(['Prior', work]), verbo([has]), complemento(['shown,', and, our, results, have, 'confirmed,', that, 'NF-kappaB', and, 'ATF-2', are, activated, following, infection])].
[sujeto(['Since', many, viruses, are, known, to]), verbo([target]), complemento(['IRF-3', to, inhibit, the, induction, of, 'IFN-beta', 'mRNA,', we, analyzed, the, status, of, 'IRF-3', in, infected, cells])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', prior, infection, of, cells, with, 'RV14']), verbo([prevented]), complemento([the, induction, of, 'IFN-beta', mRNA, following, treatment, with, 'double-stranded', 'RNA,', indicating, that, 'RV14', encodes, an, activity, that, specifically, inhibits, this, innate, host, defense, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Collectively,', these, results, indicate, that, 'RV14', infection]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([the, host, type, 'I', interferon, response, by, interfering, with, 'IRF-3', activation])].
[sujeto(['Transcriptional', activation, of, the, 'interferon-beta', '(', 'IFN-beta)', gene]), verbo([requires]), complemento([assembly, of, an, enhanceosome, containing, the, transcription, factors, 'ATF-2/c-Jun,', 'IRF-3/IRF-7,', 'NF-kappaB', and, 'HMGI(Y)'])].
[sujeto(['These', factors, cooperatively]), verbo([bind]), complemento([a, composite, 'DNA', site, and, activate, expression, of, the, 'IFN-beta', gene])].
[sujeto(['The', 'structure,', together, with, in, vitro]), verbo([binding]), complemento([studies, and, protein, 'mutagenesis,', shows, that, 'protein-protein', interactions, are, not, critical, for, cooperative, binding])].
[sujeto(['Because', the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, overlap, on, the, 'enhancer,', the, unit, of, recognition, is, the, entire, nucleotide, 'sequence,', not, the, individual, subsites])].
[sujeto(['Heterodimeric', transcription, 'factors,', including, the, basic, 'region-leucine', zipper, '(', 'bZIP)', protein, 'ATF-2-c-jun,', are, 'well-characterized', components, of, an, enhanceosome, that]), verbo([mediates]), complemento([virus, induction, of, the, human, beta, interferon, '(', 'IFN-beta)', gene])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, within, the, 'IFN-beta', enhanceosome, the, 'ATF-2-c-jun', heterodimer, binds, in, a, specific, 'orientation,', which, is, required, for, assembly, of, a, complex, between, 'ATF-2-c-jun', and, interferon, regulatory, factor, 3, '(', 'IRF-3)'])].
[sujeto(['We', demonstrate, that, correct, orientation, of, the, 'ATF-2-c-jun']), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, is, required, for, virus, induction, of, the, 'IFN-beta', gene, and, for, 'IRF-3-dependent', activation, of, a, composite, 'ATF-2-', 'c-jun-IRF', site, in, the, 'IFN-beta', promoter])].
[sujeto(['We', also, show, that, in, vitro, the, 'DNA-bound', 'ATF-2-c-jun', heterodimer, adopts, a, fixed, orientation, upon, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'IRF-3', at, an, adjacent, site, in, the, 'IFN-beta', enhancer, and, that, the, 'DNA-binding', domain, of, 'IRF-3', is, sufficient, to, mediate, this, effect])].
[sujeto(['Strikingly,', in, vivo, chromatin, immunoprecipitation, experiments, with, 'IFN-beta', reporter, constructs]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, recruitment, of, 'IRF-3', to, the, 'IFN-beta', promoter, upon, virus, infection, is, dependent, on, the, orientation, of, the, 'ATF-2-c-jun', heterodimer, binding, site])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, a, 'virus-activated', factor, '(', 'VAF)', that, binds, to, a, regulatory, element, shared, by, different, 'virus-inducible', genes])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, 'VAF', contains, two, members, of, the, interferon, regulatory, factor, '(', 'IRF)', family, of, transcriptional, activator, proteins, '(', 'IRF-3', and, 'IRF-7),', as, well, as, the, transcriptional, coactivator, proteins, p300, and, 'CBP'])].
[sujeto(['Remarkably,', 'VAF,', as, well, as, recombinant, 'IRF-3', and, 'IRF-7', 'proteins,']), verbo([binds]), complemento([very, weakly, to, the, 'interferon-beta', '(', 'IFN-beta)', gene, promoter, in, vitro])].
[sujeto(['However,', in, 'virus-infected', 'cells,', both, proteins, are]), verbo([recruited]), complemento([to, the, endogenous, 'IFN-beta', promoter, as, part, of, a, protein, complex, that, includes, 'ATF-2/c-Jun', and, 'NF-kappa', 'B'])].
[sujeto(['These', observations]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, unique, example, of, the, coordinate, activation, of, multiple, transcriptional, activator, proteins, and, their, highly, cooperative, assembly, into, a, transcriptional, enhancer, complex, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['We', propose, two, viral, 'triggers,', viral, capsid, and, viral, 'DNA,', are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'APC', activation])].
[sujeto(['Endosomal', escape, and, presentation, of, cytosolic, rAdV, 'DNA']), verbo([induces]), complemento([phosphorylation, of, 'TANK-binding', kinase, 1, '(', 'TBK1)', at, serine, 172, but, does, not, induce, 'IkappaB', kinase, epsilon, activity, as, determined, by, in, vitro, kinase, assays])].
[sujeto(['A', second, later, phase, of, 'JNK', activity, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([to, coordinate, phosphorylation, of, 'JNK-dependent', transcription, factors, '(', 'c-Jun/ATF2)', with, activated, 'IRF3', in, the, induction, of, primary, 'IRF3-responsive', transcripts])].
[sujeto(['By']), verbo([requiring]), complemento([multiple, viral, triggers, and, type, 'I', 'IFN', autocrine, 'regulation,', 'APCs', have, an, inherent, 'fail-safe', mechanism, against, inappropriate, activation, and, maturation])].
[sujeto(['Kaposi\'s', 'sarcoma-associated', herpesvirus, encodes, numerous, regulatory, proteins, capable, of]), verbo([modulating]), complemento([viral, and, cellular, gene, expression, and, affecting, host, cell, functions])].
[sujeto(['One', described, function, of, the, 'K-bZIP']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([protein, is, to, interact, with, and, repress, 'RTA-mediated', transactivation, of, viral, 'promoters,', including, that, of, the, 'K8', gene])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'work,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, the, expression, of, 'K-bZIP', results, in, the, activation, of, the, 'ifn-beta', gene])].
[sujeto(['Of', 'interest,', 'ifn-beta', gene, activation, by, 'K-bZIP', is, independent, of, interferon, '(', 'IFN)-responsive', factor, 3, '(', 'IRF-3)', and]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([factor, kappaB, '(', 'NF-kappaB)', activation])].
[sujeto(['Using', a, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([affinity, assay, and, electromobility, shift, 'assay,', we, report, that, 'K-bZIP', binds, efficiently, to, the, 'PRDIII-I', region, of, the, beta, 'IFN', '(', 'IFN-beta)', 'promoter,', 'and,', in, doing, 'so,', it, prevents, the, attachment, of, activated, 'IRF-3', but, not, that, of, 'NF-kappaB', or, 'ATF2/c-Jun', to, the, 'IFN-beta', promoter, sequence])].
[sujeto(['K-bZIP', also]), verbo([prevents]), complemento([the, activation, of, 'RANTES', and, 'CXCL11,', whose, promoters, are, also, regulated, by, 'IRF-3'])].
[sujeto(['Lysine', 158, '(']), verbo([target]), complemento([for, 'SUMO', 'conjugation),', threonine, 111, ',', and, serine, 167, '(', targets, for, 'phosphorylation)', mutants, of, 'K-bZIP', were, equally, effective, as, 'wild-type', 'K-bZIP', in, mediating, the, repression, of, 'TBK-1-activated', 'ifn-beta', gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['Lastly,', the, overexpression, of, 'CREB']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, could, not, reverse, the, 'K-bZIP', repression, of, 'TBK-1-activated', 'ifn-beta', gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['In', 'all,', our, results, indicate, that, 'K-bZIP']), verbo([binds]), complemento([directly, to, the, 'PRDIII-I', region, of, the, 'IFN-beta', promoter, 'and,', as, a, 'consequence,', causes, a, low, level, of, 'ifn-beta', gene, transcription])].
[sujeto(['In', doing, 'so,', 'K-bZIP']), verbo([prevents]), complemento(['IRF-3', from, binding, to, the, 'IFN-beta', promoter, and, precludes, the, formation, of, the, 'enhanceosome,', which, is, required, for, maximal, 'ifn-beta', gene, transcription])].
[sujeto(['A', new, role, for, 'K-bZIP', as, a, protein]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, immune, evasion, is, therefore, uncovered])].
[sujeto(['ADAR1,', the, interferon, '(', 'IFN)-inducible', adenosine, deaminase]), verbo([acting]), complemento([on, 'RNA,', catalyzes, the, 'C-6', deamination, of, adenosine, '(', 'A)', to, produce, inosine, '(', 'I)', in, 'RNA', substrates, with, a, 'double-stranded', character])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['IFN-β', 'transcript-inducing', capacity, of, the, 'WT', and, 'V(ko)', viruses, seen, in, 'ADAR1-deficient', cells, correlated, with, the, enhanced, activation, of, 'PKR,', 'IFN', regulatory, factor, 'IRF3,', and, activator, of, transcription, 'ATF2,', reaching, levels, similar, to, those, seen, in, 'C(ko)', 'virus-infected', cells])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, level, of, 'IFN-β', protein, produced, was, not, proportional, to, the, level, of, 'IFN-β', 'RNA', but, rather, correlated, inversely, with, the, level, of]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['PKR'])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'ADAR1', functions, as, an, important, suppressor, of, 'MV-mediated', 'responses,', including, the, activation, of, 'PKR', and, 'IRF3', and, the, induction, of, 'IFN-β', 'RNA'])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings, further, implicate, a, balanced, interplay, between, 'PKR', and, 'ADAR1', in]), verbo([modulating]), complemento(['IFN-β', protein, production, following, virus, infection])].
[sujeto(['Streptococcus', pneumoniae, is, a, pathogen, that]), verbo([causes]), complemento([serious, respiratory, disease, and, meningitis, in, the, immunocompromised, drug, abuse, population])].
[sujeto(['Impairment', of, early, 'IL-23/IL-17', production]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, morphine, treatment, was, associated, with, delayed, neutrophil, migration, and, decreased, pneumococcal, clearance])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', morphine, treatment, significantly]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, 'S'])].
[sujeto(['T-cell', receptor, delta, '(', 'TCRdelta)-deficient', mice, showed, a]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, 'IL-17', production, and, a, severely, weakened, capacity, to, clear, lung, 'S'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', morphine, treatment]), verbo([causes]), complemento([a, dysfunction, in, 'IL-23-producing', dendritic, cells, and, macrophages, and, 'IL-17-producing', gammadeltaT, lymphocytes, in, response, to, 'S'])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, diminished, release, of, antimicrobial, 'S100A8/A9', 'proteins,', compromised, neutrophil, 'recruitment,', and, 'more-severe', infection])].
[sujeto(['Small', molecules, that]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([specific, protein, functions, are, valuable, tools, for, dissecting, complex, signaling, pathways])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, identified, a, small, molecule, that]), verbo([induces]), complemento([the, assembly, of, the, 'interferon-beta', '(', 'IFN-beta)', enhanceosome, by, stimulating, all, the, 'enhancer-binding', activator, 'proteins:', 'ATF2/c-JUN,', 'IRF3,', and, 'p50/p65', of, 'NF-kappaB'])].
[sujeto(['This', compound]), verbo([stimulates]), complemento(['mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, kinase, kinase, 1, '(', 'MEKK1),', which, is, a, member, of, a, family, of, proteins, involved, in, 'stress-mediated', signaling, pathways])].
[sujeto(['Consistent', with, 'this,', 'MEKK1']), verbo([activates]), complemento(['IRF3', in, addition, to, 'ATF2/c-JUN', and, 'NF-kappaB', for, the, assembly, of, the, 'IFN-beta', enhanceosome])].
[sujeto(['MEKK1']), verbo([activates]), complemento(['IRF3', through, the, 'c-JUN', 'amino-terminal', kinase, '(', 'JNK)', pathway, but, not, the, p38, and, 'IkappaB', kinase, '(', 'IKK)', pathway])].
[sujeto(['Taken', together, with, previous, 'observations,', these, results, implicate, 'that,', for, the, assembly, of, an, 'IFN-beta', 'enhanceosome,', 'MEKK1', can]), verbo([induce]), complemento(['IRF3', and, 'ATF2/c-JUN', through, the, 'JNK', 'pathway,', whereas, it, can, induce, 'NF-kappaB', through, the, 'IKK', pathway])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', specific, 'MEKK', family, proteins, may, be, able, to, integrate, some, of, multiple, signal, transduction, pathways]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, the, specific, activation, of, the, 'IFN-beta', enhanceosome])].
[sujeto(['Reduced', phagocytic, clearance, in, systemic, lupus, erythematosus, '(', 'SLE)']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, prolonged, exposure, of, nuclear, autoantigen, to, the, immune, system])].
[sujeto(['Mer', receptor, expression, was, significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([on, 'JSLE', monocytes, compared, to, healthy, controls])].
[sujeto(['Plasma', 'sMer,', sTyro, and, sAxl, were, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, 'JSLE', patients, compared, to, controls, '(', p, &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')'])].
[sujeto(['Adult', healthy, control, macrophages, had, significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([phagocytosis, of, 'E'])].
[sujeto(['JSLE', patients]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, decreased, phagocytosis, due, to, both, serum, and, 'cell-derived', factors])].

[sujeto(['Chronic', inflammation, is]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, patients, with, chronic, kidney, disease, '(', 'CKD)', and, contributes, to, cardiovascular, morbidity, and, mortality])].
[sujeto(['Specific', immune, mechanisms, and, pathways, that, drive, and]), verbo([maintain]), complemento([chronic, inflammation, in, 'CKD', are, not, well, described])].
[sujeto(['The', 'TAM', ligands, '(', 'Gas6', and, protein, 'S)', and, receptors, '(', 'Axl', and, 'Mer)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, recently, recognized, as, playing, a, prominent, role, in, immune, regulation])].
[sujeto(['The', receptors, exist, in, both, soluble, and, 'cell-bound', 'forms;', the, soluble, receptors, '(', sAxl, and, 'sMer)', are, believed, to, compete, with, the]), verbo([bound]), complemento([receptors, and, thus, inhibit, their, function])].

[sujeto(['After', 'ingestion,', the, intensity, of, pHrodo, fluorescence]), verbo([increases]), complemento([because, of, the, pH, changes, inside, the, liposome])].
[sujeto(['Additionally,', we, examined, whether, 'TUDCA', could]), verbo([promote]), complemento([phagocytic, function])].
[sujeto(['The', intensity, of, pHrodo, light, emission]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, a, 'time-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Tauroursodeoxycholic', acid]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([phagocytosis, of, 'POS', and, protected, against, 'H2O2-induced', phagocytic, dysfunction])].
[sujeto(['It', also]), verbo([promoted]), complemento([phagocytic, function, via, activation, of, 'Mer', tyrosine, kinase, receptor, '(', 'MerTK),', which, is, known, to, have, a, key, role, in, the, physiological, renewal, of, 'POS'])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'TUDCA', activates, 'MerTK,', which, is, important, for, phagocytosis, of, 'POS'])].
[sujeto(['Proteomic', and, transcriptomic, investigations, revealed, that, 'IL-37', used, 'IL-1R8', to, harness, the, 'anti-inflammatory', properties, of, the, signaling, molecules, 'Mer,', 'PTEN,', 'STAT3', and, 'p62(dok)', and, to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([the, kinases, 'Fyn', and, 'TAK1', and, the, transcription, factor, 'NF-κB,', as, well, as, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinases])].

[sujeto(['The', aim, of, this, study, was, to, test, the, hypothesis, whether, 'MERTK,', which, is, 'up-regulated', in, human, 'DCs', treated, with, immunosuppressive, 'agents,', is, directly]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, modulating, 'T', cell, activation])].
[sujeto(['MERTK', is, a, member, of, the, 'TAM', family, and, contributes, to]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([innate, immune, response, to, 'ACs', by, inhibiting, 'DC', activation, in, animal, models])].
[sujeto(['However,', whether, 'MERTK']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([directly, with, 'T', cells, has, not, been, addressed])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, 'MERTK', is, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([on, 'dex-induced', human, 'tol-DCs', and, participates, in, their, tolerogenic, effect])].

[sujeto(['Additionally,', we, identify, a, previously, unrecognized, 'noncell-autonomous', regulatory, function, of, 'MERTK']), verbo([expressed]), complemento([on, 'DCs'])].

[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', this]), verbo([report]), complemento([identified, 'MERTK', as, a, potent, suppressor, of, 'T', cell, response])].
[sujeto(['Ectopic', expression, of, 'Mer', and, 'Axl', receptor, tyrosine, kinases, '(', 'RTKs)', are, frequently]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, various, cancers, as, known, to, promote, oncogenesis, by, activating, antiapoptotic, signaling, pathways])].

[sujeto(['Ligand-dependent', 'Mer', or, 'Axl', activation]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, an, increase, in, phosphorylated, 'ERK1/2,', 'AKT', and, 'FAK', indicating, roles, for, these, 'RTKs', in, multiple, oncogenic, processes])].

[sujeto(['Phagocytosis', of, apoptotic, cells, by, macrophages, and, spent, photoreceptor, outer, segments, '(', 'POS)', by, retinal, pigment, epithelial, '(', 'RPE)', cells]), verbo([requires]), complemento([several, 'proteins,', including, 'MerTK', receptors, and, associated, 'Gas6', and, protein, 'S', ligands])].
[sujeto(['In', the, 'retina,', 'POS', phagocytosis, is, 'rhythmic,', and, 'MerTK', is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([promptly, after, light, onset, via, the, αvβ5, integrin, receptor, and, its, ligand, 'MFG-E8,', thus, generating, a, phagocytic, peak])].
[sujeto(['The', phagocytic, burst, is, limited, in, 'time,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([a, 'down-regulation', mechanism, that, limits, its, duration])].
[sujeto(['Our', previous, data, showed, that, 'MerTK', helps, control, 'POS']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, integrin, receptors, at, the, 'RPE', cell, surface, as, a, negative, feedback, loop])].
[sujeto(['Our', present, results, show, that, a, soluble, form, of, 'MerTK', '(', 'sMerTK)', is]), verbo([released]), complemento([in, the, conditioned, media, of, 'RPE-J', cells, during, phagocytosis, and, in, the, interphotoreceptor, matrix, of, the, mouse, retina, during, the, morning, phagocytic, peak])].
[sujeto(['In', contrast, to, 'macrophages,', the, two, cognate, 'MerTK', ligands]), verbo([have]), complemento([an, opposite, effect, on, phagocytosis, and, sMerTK, 'release,', whereas, the, integrin, ligand, 'MFG-E8', markedly, increases, both, phagocytosis, and, sMerTK, levels])].
[sujeto([sMerTK]), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, a, decoy, receptor, blocking, the, effect, of, both, 'MerTK', ligands])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', stimulation, of, sMerTK]), verbo([release]), complemento([decreases, 'POS', binding])].

[sujeto(['MER', receptor, tyrosine, kinase, '(', 'MERTK)', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([by, monocytes, and, macrophages, and, contributes, to, 'down-regulation', of, innate, immune, responses])].

[sujeto(['The', 'apopto-phagocytic', gene, expression, patterns, during, clearance, of, dying, cells, in, the, retina, and, the, effect, of, triamcinolone, '(', 'TC)', upon, these, processes]), verbo([have]), complemento([relevance, to, development, of, 'age-related', macular, degeneration, '(', 'AMD)'])].

[sujeto(['Neural', stem, 'cells,', whose, major, reservoir, in, the, adult, mammalian, brain, is, the, subventricular, zone, '(', 'SVZ),']), verbo([ensure]), complemento(['neuropoiesis,', a, process, during, which, many, generated, cells, die])].

[sujeto(['We', show, also, that, 'SVZ', cell, phagocytic, activity, is, an, active, 'process,', which, depends, both, on, cytoskeleton, dynamic, and, on, recognition, of, phosphatidylserine, 'eat-me', 'signal,', and, is]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([by, the, vitamin, 'K-dependent', factor, protein, 'S', '(', 'ProS)'])].

[sujeto(['Neutralization', of, 'IL-17', in, 'C57BL/6', mice]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['MerTK+', cells, but, did, not, dramatically, shift, the, disease, response])].
[sujeto(['The', 'TAM', receptor, tyrosine, kinases, 'Tyro3,', 'Axl,', and, 'Mer']), verbo([regulate]), complemento([key, features, of, cellular, 'physiology,', yet, the, differential, activities, of, the, 'TAM', ligands, 'Gas6', and, 'Protein', 'S', are, poorly, understood])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([used, biochemical, and, genetic, analyses, to, delineate, the, rules, for, 'TAM', 'receptor-ligand', engagement, and, find, that, the, 'TAMs', segregate, into, two, groups, based, on, ligand, 'specificity,', regulation, by, 'phosphatidylserine,', and, function])].
[sujeto(['Tyro3', and, 'Mer', are]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, both, ligands, but, only, 'Gas6', activates, 'Axl'])].

[sujeto(['Here,', we, test, the, hypothesis, that, reversal, of, hypoxia, in, atherosclerotic, plaques, by, breathing, hyperoxic, carbogen, gas, will]), verbo([prevent]), complemento([atherosclerosis])].
[sujeto(['Compared', with, 'air,', carbogen]), verbo([increased]), complemento([arterial, blood, pO2, 5, -, fold, in, 'LDLR(-/-)', mice, and, reduced, plaque, hypoxia, in, advanced, plaques, of, the, aortic, root, '(', -, 32, '%', ')', and, arch, '(', -, 84, '%', ')'])].
[sujeto(['Carbogen', reduced, plaque, hypoxia, '(', -, 40, '%', ')', ',', necrotic, core, size, '(', -, 37, '%', ')', ',', and, 'TUNEL(+)', '(', terminal, uridine, 'nick-end', labeling, 'positive)', apoptotic, cell, content, '(', -, 50, '%', ')', and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([efferocytosis, of, apoptotic, cells, by, cluster, of, differentiation, 107, 'b(+)', '(', 'CD107b,', 'MAC3)', macrophages, '(', +, 36, '%', ')', in, advanced, plaques, of, the, aortic, root])].
[sujeto(['Carbogen', restored, murine, plaque, oxygenation, and]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([necrotic, core, expansion, by, enhancing, 'efferocytosis,', likely, via, 'Mer', tyrosine, kinase])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, 'TAM', receptor, tyrosine, kinases, 'Axl', and, 'Mer', had, distinct, roles, as, phagocytic, receptors, in, these, two, 'settings,', in, which, they, exhibited, divergent, 'expression,', regulation, and, activity])].
[sujeto(['Mer']), verbo([acted]), complemento([as, a, tolerogenic, receptor, in, resting, macrophages, and, during, immunosuppression])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', 'Axl', was, an, inflammatory, response, receptor, whose, expression, was]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, proinflammatory, stimuli])].
[sujeto(['These', differences, 'notwithstanding,', phagocytosis, by, either, protein, was, strictly, dependent, on, receptor, activation]), verbo([triggered]), complemento([by, bridging, of, 'TAM', 'receptor-ligand', complexes, to, the, '\'', 'eat-me\'', signal, phosphatidylserine, on, the, surface, of, apoptotic, cells])].
[sujeto(['Myeloma', cells, closely]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, the, 'BM', 'stroma,', which, secretes, soluble, factors, that, foster, myeloma, progression, and, therapy, resistance])].
[sujeto(['Growth', 'arrest-specific', gene, 6, '(', 'Gas6)', is, produced, by, 'BM-derived', stroma, cells, and, can]), verbo([promote]), complemento([malignancy])].
[sujeto(['Gas6', showed]), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, in, sorted, 'BMPCs', of, myeloma, patients, compared, with, healthy, controls])].
[sujeto(['The', fraction, of, 'Mer(+)', 'BMPCs', was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, myeloma, patients, in, comparison, with, healthy, controls, whereas, 'Axl', and, 'Tyro3', were, not, expressed, by, 'BMPCs', in, the, majority, of, patients])].
[sujeto(['Downregulation', of, 'Gas6', and, 'Mer']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, proliferation, of, different, myeloma, cell, 'lines,', whereas, knocking, down, 'Axl', or, 'Tyro3', had, no, effect])].
[sujeto(['Inhibition', of, the, 'Gas6', receptor, 'Mer', or, therapeutic]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([of, 'Gas6', by, warfarin, reduced, myeloma, burden, and, improved, survival, in, a, systemic, model, of, myeloma])].
[sujeto(['TYRO3,', 'AXL,', and, 'MER', receptors, '(', 'TAMs)', are, three, homologous, type, 'I', 'receptor-tyrosine', kinases, that, are]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, endogenous, 'ligands,', protein, 'S', '(', 'PROS1)', and, growth, 'arrest-specific', gene, 6, '(', 'GAS6)'])].
[sujeto(['These', ligands, can, either]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['TAMs', as, soluble, 'factors,', 'or,', in, 'turn,', opsonize, phosphatidylserine, '(', 'PS)', on, apoptotic, cells, '(', 'ACs)', and, serve, as, bridging, molecules, between, 'ACs', and, 'TAMs'])].
[sujeto(['Abnormal', expression, and, activation, of, 'TAMs']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, implicated, in, promoting, proliferation, and, survival, of, cancer, 'cells,', as, well, as, in, suppressing, 'anti-tumor', immunity])].
[sujeto(['To', study, 'ligand-mediated', activation, of, 'TAMs,', we, generated, a, series, of, reporter, cell, lines]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([chimeric, 'TAM', receptors])].
[sujeto(['Using', this, 'system,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, each, 'TAM', receptor, has, a, unique, pattern, of, interaction, with, and, activation, by, 'GAS6', and, 'PROS1,', which, is, also, differentially, affected, by, the, presence, of, 'ACs,', 'PS-containing', lipid, vesicles, and, enveloped, virus])].
[sujeto(['We', also, demonstrated, that, 'γ-carboxylation', of, ligands, is, essential, for, the, full, activation, of, 'TAMs', and, that, soluble, 'immunoglobulin-like', 'TAM', domains]), verbo([act]), complemento([as, specific, ligand, antagonists])].
[sujeto(['Complement', component, 'C1q', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, efficient, engulfment, of, apoptotic, cells, '(', 'efferocytosis),', and, 'C1q', deficiency, leads, to, the, development, of, lupus])].
[sujeto(['C1q', elicited, the, expression, of, 'Mer', tyrosine, kinase, '(', 'Mer),', a, receptor, that]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([efficient, efferocytosis, and, prevention, of, autoimmunity])].

[sujeto(['Although', recent, therapeutic, advances]), verbo([have]), complemento([prolonged, patient, 'survival,', the, prognosis, remains, dismal])].
[sujeto(['C-MER', 'proto-oncogene', tyrosine, kinase, '(', 'MERTK)', is, a, receptor, tyrosine, kinase, with, oncogenic, properties, that, is, often, overexpressed, or]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, various, malignancies])].

[sujeto(['We', previously, identified, a, set, of, human, microRNAs, '(', 'miRNAs)', that, robustly]), verbo([suppress]), complemento([breast, cancer, metastasis, to, lung, and, bone, and, which, display, expression, levels, that, predict, human, metastasis])].

[sujeto(['Our', work, further]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([endothelial, recruitment, and, endothelial, interactions, in, the, tumour, microenvironment, to, be, critical, features, of, metastatic, breast, cancer])].

[sujeto(['Interleukin-6', '(', 'IL-6)', is, a, macrophage, secretory, product, that, is, abundantly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, atherosclerotic, plaques, but, whose, precise, role, in, atherogenesis, is, unclear])].

[sujeto(['The', 'Y867', residue, in, the, 'CDMer', receptor]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([the, binding, of, 'Grb2,', which, recruited, the, p85, phosphatidylinositol, 3, -, kinase, '(', 'PI', 3, -, 'kinase)'])].
[sujeto(['Despite', the, difference, in, promotion, of, 'proliferation,', both, the, 'CDMer', and, mutant, 'F867', receptors]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['Erk', in, transfected, cells])].
[sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, both, transcriptional, activation, of, 'NF-kappaB', and, activation, of, 'PI', 3, -, kinase, were, significantly, suppressed, with, the, 'F867', mutant, 'receptor,', suggesting, that, the, activation, of, antiapoptotic, pathways, is, the, major, mechanism, for, the, observed, phenotypic, difference])].
[sujeto(['Consistent', with, this, 'notion,', apoptosis]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'IL-3', withdrawal, was, strongly, prevented, by, 'CDMer', but, not, by, the, 'F867', mutant, receptor])].
[sujeto(['Human', 'Gas6', was, recently, shown, to]), verbo([act]), complemento([as, a, ligand, for, both, human, 'Rse', '(', 'Godowski', et, al])].
[sujeto(['The', 'G', domains, are, related, to, those]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, sex, 'hormone-binding', globulin, and, to, those, utilized, by, laminin, and, agrin, for, binding, to, the, dystroglycan, complex])].
[sujeto(['A', series, of, 'Gas6', variants, were, tested, for, their, ability, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, 'Rse', and, 'Ax1'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Gla', domain, and, epidermal, growth, 'factor-like', repeats, were, not]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, receptor, 'binding,', as, deletion, variants, of, 'Gas6', which, lacked, these, domains, bound, to, the, extracellular, domains, of, both, 'Rse', and, 'Axl'])].
[sujeto(['A', deletion, variant, of, 'Gas6', containing, just, the, 'G', domain, region, was, shown, to]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['Rse', phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, 'G', domains, can, act, as, signaling, molecules, by, activating, transmembrane, receptor, tyrosine, kinases])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', they]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, structural, link, between, the, activation, of, cell, adhesion, related, receptors, and, the, control, of, cell, growth, and, differentiation, by, the, 'G', 'domain-containing', superfamily, of, proteins])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([cloned, the, putative, mouse, homologue, of, the, human, 'c-mer', receptor, tyrosine, kinase, 'proto-oncogene'])].
[sujeto(['Comparison', of, the, mouse, and, human, 'c-mer', amino, acid, sequences]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([an, overall, identity, of, 88, '%'])].
[sujeto(['Our', analysis, of, the, 'Axl', family, identifies, eight, different, regions, of, amino, acid, consensus, that]), verbo([have]), complemento([residues, characteristic, of, this, and, no, other, tyrosine, kinase, 'family;', six, of, the, eight, are, within, tyrosine, kinase, subdomains])].
[sujeto(['Northern', analysis, of, adult, tissues]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, the, mouse, 'c-mer,', although, expressed, in, many, 'tissues,', has, an, expression, pattern, unique, among, 'Axl', family, members])].
[sujeto(['In', normal, adult, hematopoietic, cells, 'c-mer', seems, to, be]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([predominantly, if, not, exclusively, in, the, monocytic, lineage])].
[sujeto(['Mouse', 'c-mer', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([during, 'most,', if, not, 'all,', stages, of, embryological, development, beginning, in, the, morula, and, blastocyst, and, progressing, through, the, yolk, sac, and, fetal, liver, stages])].
[sujeto(['The', embryonic, expression, profile, of, 'c-mer']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, this, tyrosine, kinase, may, play, an, important, function, in, the, developing, mouse])].
[sujeto(['The', novel, tyrosine, kinase, was, not]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, normal, 'B-', and, 'T-lymphocytes', 'but,', unlike, 'axl,', was, expressed, in, numerous, neoplastic, 'B-', and, 'T-cell', lines])].
[sujeto(['Since', the, ryk, designation]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, used, to, name, another, tyrosine, kinase, and, an, analysis, of, 'RNA', expression, demonstrated, that, this, novel, human, kinase, is, expressed, in, monocytes, and, tissues, of, epithelial, and, reproductive, 'origin,', we, have, designated, our, novel, protooncogene, 'c-mer'])].

[sujeto(['Retinitis', pigmentosa, is, a, major]), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, visual, impairment, and, 'blindness,', affecting, millions, of, people, worldwide])].

[sujeto(['This', aptamer, could]), verbo([suppress]), complemento([cancer, cell, motility, in, vitro])].
[sujeto(['Photobiomodulation', is, the, treatment, with, light, in, the, 'far-red', to, 'near-infrared', region, of, the, spectrum, and]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, to, have, beneficial, effects, in, various, animal, models, of, 'disease,', including, an, 'age-related', macular, degeneration, '(', 'AMD)', mouse, model])].

[sujeto(['The', 'Mer', '(', 'Nyk', and, 'c-Eyk)', receptor, tyrosine, kinase, '(', 'Mertk)', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, two, aspects, of, apoptotic, cell, clearance, by, acting, as, a, receptor, for, 'Gas6,', a, 'gamma-carboxylated', 'phosphatidylserine-binding', protein, that, bridges, apoptotic, and, viable, cells])].

[sujeto(['Herpes', simplex, encephalitis, '(', 'HSE)', in, children]), verbo([has]), complemento([previously, been, linked, to, defects, in, type, 'I', interferon, '(', 'IFN)', production, downstream, of, 'Toll-like', receptor, 3])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, describe, a, novel, genetic, etiology, of, 'HSE', by, identifying, a, heterozygous, 'loss-of-function', mutation, in, the, 'IFN', regulatory, factor, 3, '(', 'IRF3)', 'gene,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, autosomal, dominant, '(', 'AD)', 'IRF3', deficiency, by, 'haploinsufficiency,', in, an, adolescent, female, patient, with, 'HSE'])].

[sujeto(['The', accessory, 'HIV', protein, 'Vpu']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([a, number, of, cellular, pathways, that, trigger, host, innate, restriction, mechanisms])].

[sujeto(['However,', the, role, of, 'HIV', 'Vpu', in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([the, type, 1, interferon, response, to, viral, infection, by, degradation, of, the, interferon, regulatory, factor, 3, '(', 'IRF3)', has, been, subject, of, conflicting, reports])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, that, 'HIV', 'Vpu', failed, to, degrade, 'IRF3', in, infected, primary, cells])].
[sujeto(['Mutation', of, two, serines, '(', positions, 52, and, 56, ')']), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, binding, of, 'NL4'])].
[sujeto([3, 'Vpu', to, the, βTrCP, ubiquitin, ligase, abolishes, its, ability, to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['NF-κB', activity])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'HIV', 'Vpu', regulates, antiviral, innate, response, in, primary, human, cells, by, acting, specifically, on, the, 'NF-κB', pathway])].
[sujeto(['HIV', 'Vpu', plays, a, pivotal, role, in]), verbo([enhancing]), complemento(['HIV', infection, by, counteraction, of, 'Tetherin'])].
[sujeto(['However,', 'Vpu', also]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([host, response, to, 'HIV', infection, by, hampering, the, type, 1, interferon, response])].
[sujeto(['The', molecular, mechanism, by, which, 'Vpu']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([the, interferon, response, is, still, controversial])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'Vpu', affects, interferon, expression, by, inhibiting, 'NF-κB', activity, without, affecting, 'IRF3', levels, or, activity])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'Vpu', facilitates, 'HIV', infection, by, regulating, 'NF-κB', transcription, to, levels, sufficient, for, viral, transcription, while, limiting, cellular, responses, to, infection])].
[sujeto(['Upon', sensing, of, viral, 'RNA', and, 'DNA,', 'IRF3', is, phosphorylated, and]), verbo([recruits]), complemento([coactivators, to, induce, type, 'I', interferons, '(', 'IFNs)', and, selected, sets, of, 'IRF3-regulated', 'IFN-stimulated', genes, '(', 'ISGs)', such, as, those, for, 'ISG54', '(', 'Ifit2),', 'ISG56', '(', 'Ifit1),', and, viperin, '(', 'Rsad2)'])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, used, 'wild-type,', glycogen, synthase, kinase, 3, α, knockout, '(', 'GSK-3α(-/-)),', 'GSK-3β(-/-),', and, 'GSK-3α/β', 'double-knockout', '(', 'DKO)', embryonic, stem, '(', 'ES)', 'cells,', as, well, as, 'GSK-3β(-/-)', mouse, embryonic, fibroblast, cells, in, which, 'GSK-3α', was, knocked, down, to, demonstrate, that, both, isoforms, of, 'GSK-3,', 'GSK-3α', and, 'GSK-3β,', are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, this, antiviral, immune, response])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', the, use, of, two, selective, 'small-molecule', 'GSK-3', inhibitors, '(', 'CHIR99021', and, 'BIO-acetoxime)', or, 'ES', cells, reconstituted, with, the, catalytically, inactive, versions, of, 'GSK-3', isoforms, showed, that, 'GSK-3', activity, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, optimal, induction, of, antiviral, innate, immunity])].
