[sujeto(['Scavenger', receptor, 'A', '(', 'SRA)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, the, processes, of, tumor, invasion, and, acts, as, an, immunosuppressor, during, therapeutic, cancer, vaccination])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, identification, and, characterization, of, a, small, molecule, 'SRA', inhibitor, rhein])].
[sujeto(['Rhein', also]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['SRA', ligand, 'polyinosinic:polycytidylic', acid, '(', 'poly(I:C))', induced, activation, of, transcriptional, 'factors,', including, interferon, regulatory, factor, 3, '(', 'IRF3)', and, signal, transducer, and, activator, of, transcription, 1, '(', 'STAT1)'])].

[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento(['ubiquitin-specific', protease, '(', 'USP)', 15, is, involved, in, regulation, of, the, retinoic, 'acid-inducible', gene, 'I', '(', 'RIG-I)-dependent', type, 'I', 'IFN', induction, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'USP15']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, transcription, of, 'IFN-β'])].

[sujeto(['The', stimulator, of, interferon, genes, '(', 'STING)']), verbo([induces]), complemento([the, activation, of, interferon, regulatory, factor, 3, '(', 'IRF3)', in, response, to, intracellular, viral, 'double-stranded', '(', 'ds)', 'DNA'])].

[sujeto(['FC-98,', a, synthesized, benzenediamine, 'derivate,', was]), verbo([reported]), complemento([to, regulate, 'Toll-like', receptor, 9, -, induced, activation, of, dendritic, cells, in, our, previous, study])].

[sujeto(['It', was, observed, to]), verbo([enhance]), complemento([the, survival, 'rate,', inhibit, 'pro-inflammatory', mediator, 'production,', improve, organ, injuries, and, suppress, bacterial, propagation])].

[sujeto(['Toll-like', receptors, '(', 'TLRs)']), verbo([recognize]), complemento([distinct, 'pathogen-associated', molecular, patterns, and, play, a, critical, role, in, innate, immune, responses])].

[sujeto(['Compound', of, 'Designation', red, 10]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['(', 'CDr10b)', was, synthesized, to, investigate, its, role, in, neuroinflammatory, diseases])].

[sujeto(['However,', the, mechanisms, for, control, and, regulation, of, 'IRF3']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([import, largely, remain, to, be, elucidated])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([that, suppressor, of, cytokine, signaling, 3, '(', 'SOCS3)', inhibits, the, 'IFN-β', signaling, pathway, by, promoting, proteasomal, degradation, of, 'TBK1'])].

[sujeto(['Viral', invasion, into, a, host, is, initially]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([by, the, innate, immune, 'system,', mainly, through, activation, of, the, intracellular, cytosolic, signaling, pathway, and, coordinated, activation, of, interferon, regulatory, factor, 3, '(', 'IRF3)', and, nuclear, factor, kappa, 'B', '(', 'NF-κB)', transcription, factors, that, promote, type, 'I', interferon, gene, induction])].
[sujeto(['The', 'TANK-binding', 'Kinase', 1, '(', 'TBK1)', phosphorylates, and]), verbo([activates]), complemento(['IRF3'])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, 'Optineurin', '(', 'Optn)', dampens, the, antiviral, innate, immune, response, by]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([the, deubiquitinating, enzyme, 'CYLD', to, 'TBK1', in, order, to, inhibit, its, enzymatic, activity])].

[sujeto(['Among', other]), verbo([target]), complemento(['genes,', 'IRF3', controls, the, expression, of, 'IFN-β,', which, triggers, the, activation, of, the, transcription, factor, 'ISGF3', via, the, 'IFNAR'])].
[sujeto(['IRF3', and, 'ISGF3']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported, to, control, many, of, the, same, target, genes, and, 'together,', control, the, antimicrobial, 'innate-immune', 'program;', 'however,', their, respective, contributions, and, specificities, remain, unclear])].
[sujeto(['With', the, use, of, 'ChiP-seq', and, transcriptomic, measurements, in, 'WT', versus, 'ifnar(-/-)', versus, 'ifnar(-/-)irf3(-/-)', macrophages]), verbo([responding]), complemento([to, intracellular, 'dsRNA,', we, confirmed, the, known, 'ISGF3', 'DNA-binding', motif, and, further, specified, a, distinct, 'IRF3', consensus, sequence])].

[sujeto(['To']), verbo([trigger]), complemento([type, 'I', interferon, '(', 'IFN)', 'responses,', pattern, recognition, receptors, activate, signaling, cascades, that, lead, to, transcription, of, 'IFN', and, 'IFN-stimulated', genes, '(', 'ISGs)'])].
[sujeto(['The', promyelocytic, leukemia, '(', 'PML)', protein]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, these, 'responses,', although, its, role, has, not, been, defined])].

[sujeto(['Type', 'I', interferons, '(', 'IFNs-α/β)', play, a, key, role, for, the, antiviral, state, of, 'host,', and, the, porcine, 'arterivirus;', porcine, reproductive, and, respiratory, syndrome, virus, '(', 'PRRSV),']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, 'down-regulate', the, production, of, 'IFNs', during, infection])].
[sujeto(['Non-structural', protein, '(', 'nsp)', 1, of, 'PRRSV']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, identified, as, a, viral, 'IFN', 'antagonist,', and, the, nsp1α, subunit, of, nsp1, has, been, shown, to, degrade, the, 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', and, to, inhibit, the, formation, of, enhanceosome, thus, resulting, in, the, suppression, of, 'IFN', production])].

[sujeto(['Regardless', of, 'CBP', 'degradation,', all, subunits, of, arterivirus, nsp1]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([the, 'IFN-sensitive', response, element, '(', 'ISRE)-promoter', activities])].
[sujeto(['Host', cells]), verbo([activate]), complemento([innate, immune, signaling, pathways, to, defend, against, invading, pathogens])].
[sujeto(['To', survive, within, an, infected, 'host,', viruses]), verbo([have]), complemento([evolved, intricate, strategies, to, counteract, host, immune, responses])].
[sujeto(['Herpesviruses,', including, herpes, simplex, virus, type, 1, '(', 'HSV-1),']), verbo([have]), complemento([large, genomes, and, therefore, have, the, capacity, to, encode, numerous, proteins, that, modulate, host, innate, immune, responses])].
[sujeto(['VP16', was, demonstrated, to, significantly]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['Sendai', virus, '(', 'SeV)-induced', 'IFN-β', 'production,', and, its, transcriptional, activation, domain, was, not, responsible, for, this, inhibition, activity])].
[sujeto(['Additionally,', 'VP16', blocked, the, activation, of, the, 'NF-κB', promoter]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'SeV', or, tumor, necrosis, factor, alpha, treatment, and, expression, of, 'NF-κB-dependent', genes, through, interaction, with, p65])].
[sujeto(['VP16', was, able, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, 'IRF-3', but, not, 'IRF-7', in, 'vivo,', based, on, coimmunoprecipitation, 'analysis,', but, it, did, not, affect, 'IRF-3', 'dimerization,', nuclear, 'translocation,', or, 'DNA', binding, activity])].
[sujeto(['Rather,', 'VP16']), verbo([interacted]), complemento([with, the, 'CREB', binding, protein, '(', 'CBP)', coactivator, and, efficiently, inhibited, the, formation, of, the, transcriptional, complexes, 'IRF-3-CBP', in, the, context, of, 'HSV-1', infection])].
[sujeto(['These', results, illustrate, that, 'VP16', is, able, to, block, the, production, of, 'IFN-β', by]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento(['NF-κB', activation, and, interfering, with, 'IRF-3', to, recruit, its, coactivator, 'CBP,', which, may, be, important, to, the, early, events, leading, to, 'HSV-1', infection])].
[sujeto(['Interferon', '(', 'IFN)', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, protecting, mice, from, viral, 'pathogenesis;', 'reciprocally,', it, mediates, the, deleterious, septic, shock, response, to, bacterial, infection])].
[sujeto(['The', critical, transcription, factor, for, 'IFN', 'induction,', in, both, 'cases,', is, 'IRF-3,', which, is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, 'TLR3', or, 'RIG-I', signaling, in, response, to, virus, infection, and, 'TLR4', signaling, in, response, to, bacterial, infection])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'IRF-3\'s', transcriptional, activity, required, its, 'coactivators,', 'β-catenin', and, 'CBP,', to, be, modified, by, 'HDAC6-mediated', deacetylation, and, protein, kinase, 'C', isozyme, β, '(', 'PKC-β)-mediated', 'phosphorylation,', 'respectively,', so, that, activated, nuclear, 'IRF-3', could, form, a, stable, transcription, initiation, complex, at, the, target, gene, promoters])].
[sujeto(['β-Catenin', bridges, 'IRF-3', and, 'CBP,', and, the, modifications, were]), verbo([required]), complemento([specifically, for, the, interaction, between, 'β-catenin', and, 'CBP', but, not, 'β-catenin', and, 'IRF-3'])].
[sujeto(['Conversely,', they, were, highly, susceptible, to, pathogenesis]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, 'Sendai', virus, infection])].
[sujeto(['Intrinsically', disordered, proteins, are, renowned, for, their, structural, plasticity, when, they, undergo, coupled, folding, and]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, partner, proteins])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([coactivator, binding, domain, of, 'CBP', is, a, remarkable, example, of, this, adaptability, as, it, folds, into, two, different, conformations, depending, on, the, binding, partner])].
[sujeto(['The', three, helices, are, still, folded, in, the, excited, state, but]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, different, packing, from, the, ground, 'state;', the, contact, between, helices, 2, and, 3, found, in, the, ground, state, is, broken, in, the, excited, 'state,', and, a, new, one, is, formed, between, helices, 1, and, 3])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, while, 'NCBD', in, the, ground, state, has, a, structure, similar, to, the, complex, with, the, ligand, 'ACTR,', the, conformation, of, 'NCBD', in, the, excited, state, has, some, similarity, with, that, of, 'NCBD', in, complex, with, the, ligand, 'IRF-3'])].
[sujeto(['The', energy, landscape, of, this, domain, is, thus, proposed, to, resemble, the, 'fold-switching', proteins, that]), verbo([have]), complemento([two, coexisting, native, 'states,', which, may, serve, as, a, starting, point, for, binding, via, conformational, selection])].
[sujeto(['The', activity, of, the, glucocorticoid, receptor, '(', 'GR),', a]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, transcription, factor, belonging, to, subclass, 3, 'C', of, the, 'steroid/thyroid', hormone, receptor, 'superfamily,', is, typically, triggered, by, glucocorticoid, hormones])].
[sujeto(['Apart', from, driving, gene, transcription, via]), verbo([binding]), complemento([onto, glucocorticoid, response, elements, in, regulatory, regions, of, particular, target, 'genes,', 'GR', can, also, inhibit, gene, expression, via, 'transrepression,', a, mechanism, largely, based, on, 'protein:protein', interactions])].
[sujeto(['GR', is, known, to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([the, activity, of, a, growing, list, of, 'immune-regulating', transcription, factors])].
[sujeto(['Although', patience, is, a, virtue, when, it, comes, to, deciphering, the, many, mechanisms, 'GR', uses, to, influence, various, signaling, 'pathways,', the, current, review, is, testimony, of, the, fact, that, groundbreaking, mechanistic, work]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, accumulating, over, the, past, years, and, steadily, continues, to, grow])].
[sujeto(['MicroRNAs', '(', 'miRNAs),', a, family, of, small, 'nonprotein-coding', 'RNAs,', play, a, critical, role, in, posttranscriptional, gene, regulation, by]), verbo([acting]), complemento([as, adaptors, for, the, 'miRNA-induced', silencing, complex, to, inhibit, gene, expression, by, targeting, mRNAs, for, translational, repression, 'and/or', cleavage])].
[sujeto(['MiR-155-5p', is, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, both, activated, 'B-', and, 'T-cells', and, in, 'monocytes/macrophages'])].
[sujeto(['Given', that, the, pathologies]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'miR-155-5p', result, from, the, 'over-expression', of, this, miRNA, it, may, be, possible, to, therapeutically, attenuate, 'miR-155-5p', levels, in, the, treatment, of, several, pathological, processes])].
[sujeto(['Perturbation', of, the, endoplasmic, reticulum, '(', 'ER)', results, in, a]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([stress, response, called, the, unfolded, protein, response, '(', 'UPR)'])].
[sujeto(['Macrophages', undergoing, a, 'UPR']), verbo([respond]), complemento([to, 'LPS', with, 'log-fold', increased, production, of, 'IFN-beta,', a, cytokine, with, diverse, roles, in, innate, and, adaptive, immunity])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'thapsigargin-induced', 'ER', stress, augmented, recruitment, of, 'IFN', regulatory, 'factor-3,', 'CREB', binding, 'protein/p300,', and, transcriptional, machinery, to, the, murine, ifnb1, promoter, during, 'LPS', stimulation])].
[sujeto(['Although', full, synergistic, 'IFN-beta', production]), verbo([requires]), complemento(['X-box', binding, protein, 1, '(', 'XBP-1),', this, 'UPR-regulated', transcription, factor, did, not, appreciably, bind, the, ifnb1, promoter])].
[sujeto(['However,', 'XBP-1']), verbo([bound]), complemento([a, conserved, site, 6.1, kb, downstream, of, 'ifnb1,', along, with, 'IFN', regulatory, 'factor-3', and, 'CREB', binding, protein, only, during, concomitant, 'UPR', and, 'LPS', stimulation])].
[sujeto(['XBP-1', physically, associates, with, 'p300,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([a, mechanism, of, multimolecular, assembly, at, the, +, 6.1, kb, site])].
[sujeto(['Luciferase', reporter, assays]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, this, +, 6, kb, region, functions, as, an, 'XBP-1-dependent', enhancer, of, ifnb1, promoter, activity])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([have]), complemento([broader, mechanistic, implications, for, the, pathogenesis, of, diseases, involving, 'ER', stress, and, type, 'I', 'IFN,', including, viral, 'infection,', 'ischemia-reperfusion', 'injury,', protein, 'misfolding,', and, inflammatory, diseases])].
[sujeto(['Nsp1', did, not, block, phosphorylation, and]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([translocation, of, 'IRF3', but, inhibited, 'IRF3', association, with, 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', in, the, nucleus])].
[sujeto(['While', 'IRF3', was, 'stable,', 'CBP', was, 'degraded,', and, 'CBP', degradation, was, 'proteasome-dependent,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, 'CBP', degradation, is, not, due, to, the, protease, activity, of, 'Nsp1', but, an, intermediary, is, involved])].
[sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'Nsp1-mediated', 'CBP', degradation, inhibits, the, recruitment, of, 'CBP', for, enhanceosome, 'assembly,', leading, to, the, block, of, 'IFN', response])].
[sujeto(['Host', cells]), verbo([respond]), complemento([to, viral, infections, by, synthesizing, and, producing, antiviral, molecules, such, as, type, 'I', interferons, '(', 'IFN)'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Kaposi', 'sarcoma-associated', herpesvirus, '(', 'KSHV)', encodes, multiple, proteins]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([during, the, lytic, replication, cycle, that, alter, the, antiviral, response, of, the, host])].
[sujeto(['Considering', that, in, 'Kaposi', sarcoma, lesions, and, primary, effusion, lymphoma, cells, 'KSHV', is, latent, in, the, vast, majority, of, 'cells,', we, were, interested, in, determining, whether, latently]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([viral, proteins, have, the, ability, to, modulate, 'IFN', synthesis])].
[sujeto(['The', 'latency-associated']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([antigen, '(', 'LANA-1)', is, a, large, nuclear, protein, that, plays, a, role, in, the, establishment, and, maintenance, of, latent, 'KSHV', episome, in, the, nucleus, of, infected, cells])].
[sujeto(['LANA-1', is, also, described, to]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([the, cellular, transcription])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'LANA-1', inhibits, 'IFN-beta', transcription, and, synthesis, by, competing, with, the, binding, of, interferon, regulatory, 'factor-3', '(', 'IRF3)', to, the, 'IFNB', promoter])].
[sujeto(['Using', mutants, of, 'LANA-1,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, the, central, acidic, repeated, region, as, the, domain, essential, for, interfering, with, the, binding, of, 'IRF3', to, the, positive, regulatory, domains, 'I-III', of, the, 'IFNB', promoter])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([localization, of, 'LANA-1', proved, essential, for, 'IFN-beta', inhibition])].

[sujeto(['Co-expression', of, 'Tax,', but, not, the, 'Tax', mutant, unable, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, 'CBP,', significantly, inhibited, the, reporter, gene, expression, directed, by, 'IFN-stimulated', regulatory, 'elements,', despite, that, the, formation, of, 'DNA-binding', 'ISGF3', complex, was, unaffected])].

[sujeto(['Consistently,', 'GST', 'pull-down', assay, showed, that, 'Tax', 'dose-dependently']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([binding, of, 'STAT2', to, p300])].

[sujeto(['Upon', 'infection,', host, cell, 'IRF-3', is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, phosphorylation, at, its, seven, 'C-terminal', 'Ser/Thr', 'residues:', '(', 385, ')', 'SSLENTVDLHISNSHPLSLTS(405)'])].

[sujeto(['Using', purified, 'proteins,', we, show, that, 'CBP', '(', amino, acid, residues, 2067, -, 2112, ')']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([directly, with, 'IRF-3', '(', 173, -, 427, ')', and, six, of, its, 'single-site', mutants, to, form, 'heterodimers,', but, when, 'CBP', interacts, with, 'IRF-3', 'S396D,', oligomerization, is, evident])].
[sujeto(['CBP', also]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([in, vitro, with, 'IRF-3', 'double-site', mutants, to, form, different, levels, of, oligomerization])].
[sujeto(['Among', all, the, 'single-site', 'mutants,', 'IRF-3', 'S396D', showed, the, strongest]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'CBP'])].
[sujeto(['Although', 'IRF-3', 'S386D', alone, did, not]), verbo([interact]), complemento([as, strongly, with, 'CBP', as, did, other, 'mutants,', it, strengthened, the, interaction, and, oligomerization, of, 'IRF-3', 'S396D', with, 'CBP'])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', it, appears, that, 'Ser385', and, 'Ser386', serve, antagonistic, functions, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento(['IRF-3', phosphoactivation])].
[sujeto(['In', cells, infected, by, 'Sendai', 'virus,', 'IRF3', becomes, 'phosphorylated,', 'homodimerizes,', translocates, to, the, 'nucleus,']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, target, genes, and, activates, transcription, by, interacting, with, 'CBP/p300', 'co-activators'])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, in, 'non-infected', cells, 'IRF3', is, 'post-translationally', modified, by, 'S-glutathionylation'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'virus-infected', 'GRX-1', knockdown, 'cells,', 'phosphorylation,', homodimerization, and]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([translocation, of, 'IRF3', were, not, 'affected,', but, the, transcriptional, activity, of, 'IRF3', and, the, expression, of, 'interferon-beta', '(', 'IFNbeta),', were, severely, reduced])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, findings]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, crucial, role, for, 'S-glutathionylation', and, 'GRX-1', in, controlling, the, activation, of, 'IRF3', and, 'IFNbeta', gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['Interferon-beta', positively]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([gene, 'expression,', predominantly, through, the, 'Janus', 'kinase-signal', transducer, and, activator, of, transcription, '(', 'STAT)', pathway])].
[sujeto(['However,', little, is, known, about, the, mechanisms, used, by, 'interferon-beta', to, negatively]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we, show, that, 'interferon-beta']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['MMP-9', gene, expression, at, the, transcriptional, level])].
[sujeto(['STAT-1,', 'STAT-2', and, interferon, regulatory, factor, 9, ')', ',', the, results, of, our, study, indicate, that, all, three, members, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'interferon-beta', inhibition])].
[sujeto(['Chromatin', immunoprecipitation, assays, demonstrate, that, 'interferon-beta', reduces, recruitment, of, transcriptional, activators, and, 'coactivators,', such, as]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([factor, kappa, 'B', 'p65,', 'Sp1,', 'CREB-binding', protein, and, 'p300,', to, the, 'MMP-9', 'promoter,', and, decreases, the, degree, of, histone, acetylation, at, the, 'MMP-9', promoter])].

[sujeto(['Cytokine-activated', receptors, initiate, intracellular, signaling, by]), verbo([recruiting]), complemento([protein, kinases, that, phosphorylate, the, receptors, on, tyrosine, 'residues,', thus, enabling, docking, of, 'SH2', 'domain-bearing', activating, factors])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, in, response, to, type, 1, interferon, '(', 'IFNalpha),', 'IFNalpha', receptors, recruit, cytoplasmic, 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)'])].
[sujeto(['By']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'IFNalphaR2', within, the, region, where, two, adjacent, proline, boxes, bear, 'phospho-Ser364', and, 'phospho-Ser384,', 'CBP', acetylates, 'IFNalphaR2', on, 'Lys399,', which, in, turn, serves, as, the, docking, site, for, interferon, regulatory, factor, 9, '(', 'IRF9)'])].
[sujeto(['IRF9']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, the, 'acetyl-Lys399', motif, by, means, of, its, 'IRF', homology2, '(', 'IH2)', 'domain,', leading, to, formation, of, the, 'ISGF3', complex, that, includes, 'IRF9,', 'STAT1,', and, 'STAT2'])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([have]), complemento([significant, implications, concerning, the, central, role, of, acetylation, in, cytokine, receptor, signal, transduction])].
[sujeto(['The', transcription, factor, interferon, regulatory, factor, 3, '(', 'IRF-3)']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([genes, in, the, innate, immune, response])].
[sujeto(['IRF-3', is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([through, phosphorylation, by, the, kinases, 'IKK', epsilon, 'and/or', 'TBK1'])].
[sujeto(['The', precise, role, of, the, different, phosphorylation, sites]), verbo([has]), complemento([remained, controversial])].
[sujeto(['Phosphorylation', at, site, 1, 'is,', in, 'turn,']), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'IRF-3', dimerization])].
[sujeto(['The', data, support, a, 'two-step', phosphorylation, model, for, 'IRF-3', activation]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'TBK1'])].
[sujeto(['Protein', kinase, 'C', '(', 'PKC)', isoforms, are, critically]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, regulation, of, innate, immune, responses])].
[sujeto(['Herein,', we, investigated, the, role, of, conventional, 'PKCalpha', in, the, regulation, of, 'IFN-beta', gene, expression]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, the, 'Toll-like', receptor, 3, '(', 'TLR3)', signaling, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Inhibition', of, conventional, 'PKC', '(', 'cPKC)', activity, in, 'monocyte-derived', dendritic, cells, or, 'TLR3-expressing', cells, by, an, 'isoform-specific', 'inhibitor,', 'Gö6976,', selectively]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['IFN-beta', synthesis, induced, by, 'double-stranded', 'RNA', 'polyinosine-polycytidylic', acid])].

[sujeto(['Finally,', we, analyzed, the, involvement, of, cPKCs, in, other, signaling, pathways]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, 'IFN-beta', synthesis])].
[sujeto(['These', experiments, revealed, that, cPKCs, play, a, role, in, the, synthesis, of, 'IFN-beta']), verbo([induced]), complemento([via, both, 'TLR-dependent', and, -, independent, pathways])].
[sujeto(['As', 'such,', viruses]), verbo([have]), complemento([evolved, strategies, to, subvert, this, potent, antiviral, response])].
[sujeto(['Two', closely, related, 'gammaherpesviruses,', 'Kaposi\'s', 'sarcoma-associated', herpesvirus, '(', 'KSHV)', and, rhesus, macaque, rhadinovirus, '(', 'RRV),', are, unique, in, that, they]), verbo([express]), complemento([viral, homologues, to, cellular, interferon, regulatory, factors, '(', 'IRFs),', termed, viral, 'IRFs', '(', 'vIRFs)'])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'RRV', vIRF, 'R6,', when, expressed, 'ectopically,', interacts, with, a, transcriptional, 'coactivator,', 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP),', in, the, nucleus])].

[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento(['R6', within, 'RRV', virion, particles, via, immunoelectron, microscopy, 'and,', 'furthermore,', that, 'virion-associated', 'R6', is, capable, of, inhibiting, the, type, 'I', 'IFN', response, by, preventing, efficient, binding, of, 'IRF3/CBP', complexes, to, the, 'IFN-β', promoter, in, the, context, of, infection])].
[sujeto(['The', presence, of, this, immunomodulatory, protein, in, the, 'RRV', virion]), verbo([provides]), complemento([the, virus, with, an, immediate, mechanism, to, evade, the, host, 'IFN', 'response,', thus, enabling, the, virus, to, effectively, establish, an, infection, within, the, host])].

[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, delineate, the, immunomodulatory, mechanism, of, an, 'RRV', vIRF, and, its, ability, to, assist, the, virus, in, rapid, immune, evasion, by, being, prepackaged, within, the, 'virion,', thus]), verbo([providing]), complemento(['evidence,', for, the, first, 'time,', of, a, 'virion-associated', vIRF])].

[sujeto(['To', 'date,', known, 'counter-strategies']), verbo([involve]), complemento([the, use, of, 'viral-encoded', proteins, that, often, employ, mimicry, mechanisms, to, block, or, redirect, the, host, response, to, benefit, the, virus])].

[sujeto(['To', characterize, the, mechanisms, underlying, apoptosis]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, viral, 'infection,', transcriptional, activation, of, genes, encoding, members, of, the, '\'', 'BH3-only\'', family, of, proteins, was, analysed, during, the, course, of, virus, infection])].
[sujeto(['Among', these, 'genes,', only, 'NOXA', is, transcriptionally]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, vesicular, stomatitis, virus, '(', 'VSV),', sendai, virus, '(', 'SV),', measles, 'virus,', herpes, simplex, 'virus,', or, dsRNA, and, required, for, efficient, apoptosis, of, cells])].
[sujeto(['Transcriptional', activation, of, 'NOXA', by, 'VSV', or, 'SV', is, independent, of, 'p53,', but]), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, presence, of, interferon, regulatory, factor, 1, '(', 'IRF-1),', 'IRF-3', and, 'cAMP-responsive', element, binding, protein, '(', 'CREB)'])].
[sujeto(['Binding', to, and, transactivation, of, the, 'NOXA', promoter, by, each, of, these, transcription, factors, is, governed, by, 'post-translational', modification]), verbo([involving]), complemento([different, pathways, for, each, factor])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', 'SV', infection]), verbo([activates]), complemento(['IRF-3', and, 'CREB', by, phosphorylation, triggered, by, 'Toll', like, receptor, 3, 'signalling,', and, a, pathway, involving, 'calcium-independent', phopholipase, 'A2,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['In', addition, transactivation]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'IRF-1', during, viral, infection, correlates, with, a, 10, kDa, increase, in, its, molecular, 'weight,', suggesting, a, covalent, linkage, with, a, previously, unknown, regulatory, polypeptide])].
[sujeto(['Members', of, the, 'IFN', regulatory, factor, '(', 'IRF)', family]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([gene, expression, critical, to, immune, 'response,', 'hemopoiesis,', and, proliferation])].
[sujeto(['The', distinct, properties, result, from, differences, in]), verbo([regulated]), complemento(['expression,', response, to, activating, 'signals,', and, interaction, with, 'DNA', regulatory, elements])].
[sujeto(['IRF-3', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([ubiquitously, and, is, activated, by, serine, phosphorylation, in, response, to, viral, infection, or, 'TLR', signaling])].
[sujeto(['Evidence', indicates, that, the, kinases, 'TANK-binding', kinase, 1, and, inhibitor, of, 'NF-kappaB', 'kinase-epsilon', specifically, phosphorylate, and, thereby]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['IRF-3'])].
[sujeto(['We', evaluated, the, contribution, of, another, member, of, the, 'IRF', 'family,', 'IRF-5,', during, viral, infection, since, prior, studies]), verbo([provided]), complemento([varied, results])].
[sujeto(['Analysis', of, 'phosphorylation,']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['translocation,', 'dimerization,', binding, to, 'CREB-binding', 'protein,', recognition, of, 'DNA,', and, induction, of, gene, expression, were, used, comparatively, with, 'IRF-3', as, a, measure, of, 'IRF-5', activation])].
[sujeto(['IRF-5', was, not]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, viral, 'infection;', 'however,', expression, of, 'TANK-binding', kinase, 1, or, inhibitor, of, 'NF-kappaB', 'kinase-epsilon', did, provide, clear, activation, of, 'IRF-5'])].
[sujeto(['However,', similar, to, the, biological, effects, of, 'IRF-3', 'activation,', a, constitutively, active, mutation, of, 'IRF-5']), verbo([promoted]), complemento([apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['The', apoptosis, was]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, expression, of, 'Bcl-x(L)', but, not, a, 'dominant-negative', mutation, of, the, 'Fas-associated', death, domain])].
[sujeto(['These', studies, support, the, distinct, activation, profiles, of, 'IRF-3', in, comparison, to, 'IRF-5,', but]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, potential, shared, biological, effect])].
[sujeto(['Virus', infection, results, in, the, phosphorylation, of, 'IRF-3', by, 'IkappaB', kinase, epsilon, and, 'TANK-binding', kinase, 1, ',']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, its, dimerization, and, association, with, the, coactivators, 'CREB-binding', 'protein/p300'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'IRF-3', holocomplex, translocates, to, the, 'nucleus,', where, it]), verbo([induces]), complemento(['IFN-beta'])].
[sujeto(['Using', bacterial, 'two-hybrid', 'screening,', we, isolated, molecules, that]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'IRF-3'])].
[sujeto(['A', 'GST', 'pull-down', assay]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, one, of, the, autoinhibition, domains, of, 'IRF-3', and, the, 'peptidyl-prolyl', isomerase, domain, of, cyclophilin, 'B', are, required, for, the, binding])].
[sujeto(['A', knockdown, of, cyclophilin, 'B', expression, by, 'RNA', interference, resulted, in, the, suppression, of, 'virus-induced', 'IRF-3', 'phosphorylation,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, the, inhibition, of, the, subsequent, 'dimerization,', association, with, 'CREB-binding', 'protein,', binding, to, the, target, 'DNA', 'element,', and, induction, of, 'IFN-beta'])].
[sujeto(['Genes', containing, an, interferon, '(', 'IFN)-stimulated', response, element, '(', 'ISRE)', can, be, divided, into, two, groups, according, to, their, inducibility, by, 'IFN', and, virus, 'infection:', one]), verbo([induced]), complemento([only, by, 'IFN', and, the, other, induced, by, both, 'IFN', and, virus, infection])].
[sujeto(['The', 'IRF7', gene, includes, two, 'IFN', responsive, 'elements,', an, 'IRF-binding', element, '(', 'IRFE)', in, the, promoter, region, and, an, 'ISRE', in, the, first, 'intron,', and, is]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, the, 'IFN-triggered', 'Jak-STAT', pathway, by, binding, of, the, 'IFN-stimulated', gene, factor, 3, '(', 'ISGF3)', complex, to, the, 'ISRE'])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, demonstrate, that, 'IRF3', and, 'IRF7,', which, with, the, coactivators, 'CREB-binding', protein, and, 'P300', form, the, 'virus-activated', factor, '(', 'VAF)', complex, upon, 'Sendai', virus, 'infection,']), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, the, 'IRF7', 'ISRE', and, 'IRFE', and, can, directly, activate, 'IRF7', transcription])].
[sujeto(['In', cells, transiently]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['IRF7', 'or/and', 'IRF3,', the, 'VAF', level, and, binding, of, 'VAF', are, clearly, increased, after, 'Sendai', virus, infection])].
[sujeto(['Studies', with, 'Jak1', kinase, inactive, 293, cells, that, were, stably, transfected, with, a, 'Jak1', kinase, dead, dominant, negative, 'construct,', and, the, mutant, cell, lines, 'SAN', '(', 'IFNalpha-/beta-),', 'U2A', '(', 'IRF9-),', 'U4A', '(', 'Jak1-),', and, 'DKO', '(', 'IRF1-/IRF2-)', show, that, the, 'IRF7', transcription]), verbo([activated]), complemento([directly, by, 'VAF', is, distinct, from, and, independent, of, the, 'IFN', signaling, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', 'IRF7', transcription, is, autoregulated, by]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, the, 'IRF7-containing', 'VAF', to, its, own, 'ISRE', and, 'IRFE'])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([prevents]), complemento([induction, of, 'alpha/beta', interferons, '(', 'IFN)', in, cell, culture, and, in, vivo, via, the, action, of, the, viral, 'ML', protein])].
[sujeto(['Upon', 'activation,', 'IRF3', forms, homodimers, and, accumulates, in, the, nucleus, where, it]), verbo([binds]), complemento([the, transcriptional, coactivator, 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)'])].
[sujeto(['Further', biochemical, analysis, revealed, that, 'ML']), verbo([acts]), complemento([by, blocking, 'IRF3', dimerization, and, association, with, 'CBP'])].
[sujeto(['Surprisingly,', 'however,', 'ML', did, not, interfere, with, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([transport, of, 'IRF3'])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', the, action, of, 'ML', differs, strikingly, from, that, of, 'FLUAV', 'NS1', that]), verbo([prevents]), complemento(['IFN', induction, by, retaining, 'IRF3', in, the, cytoplasm])].
[sujeto(['Interferon', regulatory, 'factor-1', '(', 'IRF-1)', is, a, transcriptional, regulator, that]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([apoptosis, during, mammary, gland, involution, and, 'p53-independent', apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, shown, that, rapid, cell, surface, tamoxifen, '(', 'Tam)', signaling, promotes, apoptosis, in, normal, human, mammary, epithelial, cells, that, were, acutely, damaged, by, expression, of, human, papillomavirus, 'type-16', 'E6', protein, '(', *, 'HMEC-E6)'])].
[sujeto(['Apoptosis', was]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, recruitment, of, 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', to, the, 'gamma-activating', sequence, '(', 'GAS)', element, of, the, 'IRF-1', 'promoter,', induction, of, 'IRF-1', and, 'caspase-1/-3', activation])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, growth, 'factor-depleted,', reconstituted, 'ECM', '(', 'rECM),', similar, to, 'Tam,']), verbo([promotes]), complemento([apoptosis, in, *, 'HMEC-E6', cells, through, induction, of, 'IRF-1'])].
[sujeto(['These', observations, demonstrate, that, 'IRF-1']), verbo([promotes]), complemento(['rECM-mediated', apoptosis, and, provide, evidence, that, both, rECM, and, rapid, 'Tam', signaling, transcriptionally, activate, 'IRF-1', through, recruitment, of, 'CBP', to, the, 'IRF-1', 'GAS', promoter, complex])].
[sujeto(['The', signaling, pathways]), verbo([mediating]), complemento([viral, 'IRF-3', activation, are, only, poorly, defined])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, the, 'Rho', 'GTPase', 'Rac1', is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([upon, virus, infection, and, controls, 'IRF-3', phosphorylation, and, activity])].
[sujeto(['Inhibition', of, 'Rac1']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, reduced, 'IFN', beta, promoter, activity, and, to, enhanced, virus, production])].
[sujeto(['As', a, downstream, mediator, of, 'Rac', signaling, towards, 'IRF-3,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, the, kinase, 'p21-activated', kinase, '(', 'PAK1)'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', both, 'Rac1', and, 'PAK1']), verbo([regulate]), complemento([the, recently, described, 'IRF-3', 'activators,', 'I', kappa, 'B', 'kinase-', and, 'TANK-binding', 'kinase-1,', establishing, a, first, canonical, 'virus-induced', 'IRF-3', activating, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Maximal', activation, of, murine, 'infection-A4', '(', 'IFNA4)', gene, transcription, following, viral, infection]), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, presence, of, four, cooperating, 'DNA', sequences, '(', denoted, 'A', to, 'D),', which, make, up, the, virus, responsive, element, 'VRE-A4'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'B,', 'C,', and, 'D', 'modules,', when, 'tandemized,', form]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, for, the, 'virus-induced', factor, '(', 'VIF),', a, multiprotein, complex, that, is, detected, early, after, viral, infection, in, the, nuclei, of, mouse, 'L929', cells])].
[sujeto(['We', now, demonstrate, that, 'IFN', regulatory, 'factor-3', '(', 'IRF-3)', is, a, component, of, 'VIF', and, that, 'VIF', is, different, from, the, previously, identified, 'virus-activated', complexes, containing, 'IRF-3', and, coactivators, of, 'transcription,', such, as, 'CREB']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'CBP)', or, p300])].
[sujeto(['Consistently,', 'DNase', 'I', footprinting, experiments, and, 'EMSA', performed, with]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([amounts, of, recombinant, 'GST-IRF-3(DBD)', fusion, proteins, demonstrate, that, cooperativity, between, the, modules, facilitate, the, binding, of, 'IRF-3', and, recruitment, of, transcription, coactivators, on, the, 'IFNA4', promoter])].
[sujeto(['These', results, indicate, that, 'VIF', differentially]), verbo([recognizes]), complemento([the, 'virus-responsive', modules, of, 'VRE-A4', and, further, actualize, our, previous, model, concerning, the, differential, expression, of, murine, 'IFNA', genes])].
[sujeto(['An', apoptotic, cellular, defense, mechanism, is]), verbo([triggered]), complemento([in, response, to, viral, dsRNA, generated, during, the, course, of, infection, by, many, 'DNA', and, 'RNA', viruses])].
[sujeto(['We', demonstrate, that, apoptosis]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, dsRNA, or, a, paramyxovirus, is, independent, of, the, action, of, interferon, as, it, can, proceed, in, a, variety, of, cell, lines, and, primary, cells, deficient, in, an, interferon, response])].
[sujeto(['Initiation', of, apoptosis, appears, to, be]), verbo([triggered]), complemento([by, activation, of, a, cellular, transcription, 'factor,', the, 'dsRNA-activated', factor, '(', 'DRAF1)'])].
[sujeto(['DRAF1', is, composed, of, interferon, regulatory, factor, 3, '(', 'IRF-3)', and, the, transcriptional, coactivators, 'CREB']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'CBP)', or, p300])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, activation, of, 'IRF-3', in, the, absence, of, viral, infection, stimulates, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', a, negative, interfering, mutant, blocks, both]), verbo([target]), complemento([gene, induction, and, 'apoptosis,', demonstrating, a, requirement, for, gene, expression, by, 'IRF-3/DRAF1', to, promote, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['IRF-3/DRAF1']), verbo([target]), complemento([gene, expression, is, also, induced, in, response, to, a, distinct, apoptotic, 'stimulus,', the, 'DNA', damaging, agent, etoposide])].
[sujeto(['The', activity, of, the, p53, tumor, suppressor, does, not, appear, to, be]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'IRF-3/DRAF1-mediated', apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Using', coexpression, 'analysis,', the, human, 'IFNB,', 'IFNA1,', and, 'RANTES', promoters, were]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([by, 'IRF-3', 'coexpression,', whereas, the, 'IFNA4,', 'IFNA7,', and, 'IFNA14', promoters, were, preferentially, induced, by, 'IRF-7', only])].
[sujeto(['Chimeric', proteins, containing, combinations, of, different, 'IRF-7', and, 'IRF-3', domains, were, also, 'tested,', and, the, results]), verbo([provided]), complemento([evidence, of, distinct, 'DNA', binding, properties, of, 'IRF-3', and, 'IRF-7,', as, well, as, a, preferential, association, of, 'IRF-3', with, the, 'CREB', binding, protein, '(', 'CBP)', coactivator])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', some, of, these, fusion, proteins]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, supraphysiological, levels, of, 'IFN', promoter, activation])].
[sujeto(['DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, selection, studies, demonstrated, that, 'IRF-3', and, 'IRF-7', bound, to, the, 5, '\'', -, 'GAAANNGAAANN-3\'', consensus, motif, found, in, many, 'virus-inducible', 'genes;', 'however,', a, single, nucleotide, substitution, in, either, of, the, 'GAAA', 'half-site', motifs, eliminated, 'IRF-3', binding, and, transactivation, activity, but, did, not, affect, 'IRF-7', interaction, or, transactivation, activity])].
[sujeto(['These', studies, demonstrate, that, 'IRF-3', possesses, a, restricted, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, specificity, and, interacts, with, 'CBP,', whereas, 'IRF-7', has, a, broader, 'DNA', binding, specificity, that, contributes, to, its, capacity, to, stimulate, 'delayed-type', 'IFN', gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([an, explanation, for, the, differential, regulation, of, 'IFN-alpha/beta', gene, expression, by, 'IRF-3', and, 'IRF-7', and, suggest, that, these, factors, have, complementary, rather, than, redundant, roles, in, the, activation, of, the, 'IFN-alpha/beta', genes])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([cloned, and, sequenced, 1398, bp, of, the, rat, 'HFE', gene, promoter, region])].
[sujeto(['The', alignment, of, the, rat, promoter, 'HFE', sequence, with, the, 'HFE', promoter, sequence, from, human, and, mouse, detected, several, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([sequences, present, at, orthologous, or, heterologous, positions, in, the, three, species])].
[sujeto(['Subsequent', analysis, of, the]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([promoter, sequences, identified, the, presence, of, 10, novel, transcription, elements, present, in, the, promoter, regions, of, the, 'human,', mouse, and, rat, 'HFE', genes, '(', 'GATA,', 'NF-IL6,', 'AP1,', 'AP2,', 'CREB,', 'PEA3,', 'gamma-IRE,', 'GFI1,', 'HNF-3beta,', 'HFH2)'])].
[sujeto(['Different', gel, retardation, analyses, performed, with, 'rat-liver']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([extracts, have, confirmed, the, presence, of, factors, binding, to, some, of, these, transcription, elements])].
[sujeto(['Knowledge', of, the, identified]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([elements, in, the, 'HFE', promoter, from, 'human,', mouse, and, rat, provides, the, basis, for, subsequent, 'in-vitro', or, 'in-vivo', studies, leading, to, identification, of, the, detailed, mechanisms, involved, in, the, regulation, of, the, iron, metabolism, and, the, design, of, potential, future, alternative, therapies])].
[sujeto(['The', 'IRF-3', gene, is, constitutively]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, many, tissues, and, cell, 'types,', and, neither, virus, infection, nor, 'IFN', treatment, enhances, its, transcription])].
[sujeto(['In', infected, 'cells,', 'however,', 'IRF-3', protein, is, phosphorylated, at, the, carboxyl, 'terminus,', which, facilitates, its]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, the, 'CBP/p300', coactivator])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we, demonstrate, that, overexpression, of, 'IRF-3', significantly]), verbo([enhances]), complemento(['virus-mediated', transcription, of, the, 'IFNA', and, 'IFNB', genes, in, infected, cells, as, well, as, 'IFN', synthesis])].
[sujeto(['IRF-3-mediated', activation, of, 'IFN', genes, depends, in, part, on, 'carboxyl-terminal', phosphorylation, of, a, cluster, of, 'Ser/Thr', 'residues,', because, a, mutant, with, 'Ser/Thr', to, 'Ala', substitutions]), verbo([activates]), complemento([the, 'IFN', promoter, less, efficiently])].
[sujeto(['However,', overexpression, of, 'IRF-3', in, human, 2, 'FTGH', cells, alone, results, in, the, induction, of, an, antiviral, 'state,', which, depends, on, functional, 'IFN', 'signaling,', because, 'IRF-3', does, not]), verbo([induce]), complemento([an, antiviral, state, in, mutant, 2, 'FTGH', cells, defective, in, either, 'JAK-1', or, p48, 'functions;', also, no, antiviral, effect, of, 'IRF-3', could, be, demonstrated, in, 'Vero', cells, that, lack, the, 'IFNA', and, 'IFNB', genes])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([finding]), complemento([indicates, that, the, observed, antiviral, activity, of, 'IRF-3', in, 2, 'FTGH', cells, results, mainly, from, the, induction, of, 'IFNs'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'E1A', protein]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['IRF-3-mediated', stimulation, of, the, 'IFNA4', promoter, in, transient, expression, 'assays;', this, inhibition, could, be, reversed, partially, by, overexpression, of, 'CBP/p300', and, was, not, demonstrated, with, the, mutant, of, 'E1A', that, does, not, bind, p300])].
[sujeto(['These', results, identify, 'IRF-3', and, 'CBP/p300', as, integral, components, of, the, 'virus-induced', complex, that]), verbo([stimulates]), complemento([type, 1, 'IFN', gene, transcription])].
[sujeto(['The', observation, that, adenovirus, 'E1A', antagonizes, 'IRF-3']), verbo([mediated]), complemento([activation, suggests, that, 'E1A', and, 'IRF-3', may, compete, for, binding, to, 'CBP/p300', and, implicates, a, novel, mechanism, by, which, adenovirus, may, overcome, the, antiviral, effects, of, the, 'IFN', pathway])].
[sujeto(['Cells']), verbo([respond]), complemento([to, viral, infection, or, 'double-stranded', 'RNA', with, the, transcriptional, induction, of, a, subset, of, 'alpha/beta', 'interferon-stimulated', genes, by, a, pathway, distinct, from, the, interferon, signal, pathway])].
[sujeto(['The', transcriptional, induction, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([through, a, 'DNA', sequence, containing, the, 'alpha/beta', 'interferon-stimulated', response, element, '(', 'ISRE)'])].
[sujeto(['We', previously, identified, a, novel, transcription, 'factor,', designated, 'double-stranded', 'RNA-activated', factor, 1, '(', 'DRAF1),', that]), verbo([recognizes]), complemento([this, response, element])].
[sujeto(['Two', of, the, components, of, 'DRAF1']), verbo([have]), complemento([now, been, identified, as, interferon, regulatory, factor, 3, '(', 'IRF-3)', and, the, transcriptional, coactivator, 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)/p300'])].
[sujeto(['Translocation', of, 'IRF-3', is, accompanied, by, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, serine, and, threonine, phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', antibodies, to, the, 'IRF-3,', 'CBP,', and, p300, molecules, react, with, 'DRAF1']), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, the, 'ISRE', target, site, of, induced, genes])].
[sujeto(['The', cellular, response, that]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, 'DRAF1', activation, and, specific, gene, expression, may, serve, to, increase, host, survival, during, viral, infection])].
[sujeto(['CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', and, p300, contain]), verbo([modular]), complemento([domains, that, mediate, 'protein-protein', interactions, with, a, wide, variety, of, nuclear, factors])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, the, pointed, '(', 'PNT)', domain, of, 'Ets-2']), verbo([mediates]), complemento([its, interaction, with, the, 'CBP', 'SID,', and, describe, the, effects, of, mutations, in, the, 'SID', on, binding, of, 'Ets-2,', 'E1A,', and, 'SRC1'])].
[sujeto(['In', vitro]), verbo([binding]), complemento([studies, indicate, that, 'SRC1,', 'Ets-2', and, 'E1A', display, mutually, exclusive, binding, to, the, 'CBP', 'SID'])].
[sujeto(['Deletion', mutants, of, 'E1A', and, 'Ets-2', lacking, the]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([motif, were, unable, to, bind, the, 'CBP', 'SID'])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', a, peptide, corresponding, to, this, sequence, competed, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'full-length', 'SRC1,', 'Ets-2,', and, 'E1A', proteins, to, the, 'CBP', 'SID'])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', a, 'leucine-rich', amphipathic, 'alpha-helix']), verbo([mediates]), complemento([mutually, exclusive, interactions, of, functionally, diverse, nuclear, proteins, with, 'CBP'])].
[sujeto(['Interferon', regulatory, factors, '(', 'IRF)', 3, and, 7, in, mammals, are, known, to, be, crucial, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([the, type, 'I', interferon, '(', 'IFN)', response, to, viral, infection, as, part, of, transcriptional, complexes, binding, to, 'IRF-binding', elements, '(', 'IRF-Es)', and, interferon, stimulatory, response, elements, '(', 'ISREs)', within, 'IFN', and, 'interferon-stimulated', genes, '(', 'ISGs)'])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, sequencing, and, characterization, of, 'full-length', cDNA, homologues, of, rainbow, trout, '(', 'rt)IRF7', 'and,', for, the, first, time, in, 'fish,', 'IRF3'])].
[sujeto(['RtIRF7', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, 2055, 'bp,', with, a, 102, bp, 5, '\'', -, 'UTR', and, a, 705, bp, 3, '\'', -, 'UTR'])].
[sujeto(['The', open, reading, frames, '(', 'ORFs)']), verbo([translate]), complemento([into, 464, amino, acid, and, 415, amino, acid, 'proteins,', 'respectively,', each, possessing, a, putative, 'DNA-binding', domain, '(', 'DBD)', containing, a, tryptophan, 'cluster,', which, is, characteristic, of, all, 'IRF', family, members])].
[sujeto(['The', presence, of, putative, 'IRF', association, domain, '(', 'IAD)s,', 'serine-rich', 'C', terminal, domains, '(', poorly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([in, trout, 'IRF3),', and, phylogenetic, analysis, places, the, two, genes, in, the, 'IRF3', subfamily])].
[sujeto(['Both', genes, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, upregulated, by, poly, 'I:C,', type, 'I', recombinant, rainbow, trout, '(', 'r)', 'IFN', '(', second, 'isoform,', type, 'I', 'rIFN),', type, 'II', rIFN, '(', 'rIFNgamma),', 'LPS,', and, 'rIL-1beta', in, the, trout, macrophage, cell, 'line,', 'RTS-11'])].
[sujeto(['Poly', 'I:C', and, type, 'I', rIFN, also]), verbo([induced]), complemento(['IRF3', and, 'IRF7', expression, in, a, trout, fibroblast, cell, line, '(', 'RTG-2)'])].
[sujeto(['Transient', transfection, of, 'RTG-2', cells, with, each, 'IRF', fused, to, 'GFP', revealed, a, predominant, cytoplasmic, distribution]), verbo([found]), complemento([most, intensely, around, the, nucleus, 'and,', to, a, lesser, 'extent,', within, cell, nuclei])].
[sujeto(['Transient', transfection, of, rtIRF3, in, the, 'Mx-1-luciferase', reporter, cell, 'line,', 'RTG-P1,', revealed, a, modest]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, luciferase, activity, relative, to, the, vehicle, 'control,', which, was, lost, in, cells, 'over-expressing', a, 'DBD-truncated', form, of, rtIRF3])].
[sujeto(['Both', 'full-length', and, 'DBD-truncated', forms, of, rtIRF7]), verbo([increased]), complemento([reporter, activity, relative, to, the, 'control,', although, to, a, 'non-significant', extent])].
[sujeto(['Electromobility', shift, assays, '(', 'EMSAs)', did, not]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, specific, interaction, between, each, 'IRF', and, the, 'ISRE', element, found, in, the, 'Mx-1', 'promoter,', although, the, 'Mx-1', 'ISRE', bound, specifically, to, endogenous, transcriptional, complexes])].
[sujeto(['A', growing, body, of, evidence, shows, that, 'IRF7', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, a, wide, variety, of, pathologic, conditions, in, addition, to, 'infections;', 'however,', the, detailed, mechanism, of, 'IRF7', transactivation, remains, elusive])].
[sujeto(['IRF3', and, 'IRF7', are, closely, related, homologs, with, high, sequence, similarity, in, their, 'C-terminal', 'regions,', and, both, proteins, are]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, phosphorylation, of, a, specific, serine, cluster, '(', 'SC)'])].
[sujeto(['The', model, structure]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, the, identification, of, a, 'tripod-helix', structure, containing, the, 'SC'])].
[sujeto(['Inducible', 'IκB', kinase]), verbo([binds]), complemento([a, 'tripod-helix', structure])].
[sujeto(['A', histone, acetyltransferase, 'P300']), verbo([binds]), complemento([the, liberated, helix])].
[sujeto(['The', difference, in, the, 'P300']), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, explains, why, the, domain, arrangement, of, 'IRF7', is, inverted, relative, to, that, of, 'IRF3'])].
[sujeto(['Human', respiratory, syncytial, virus, '(', 'RSV),', a]), verbo([leading]), complemento([cause, of, respiratory, tract, infections, in, 'infants,', inhibits, type, 'I', interferon, '(', 'IFN)-dependent', 'signalling,', as, well, as, 'IFN', synthesis])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'NS1', protein, inhibits, 'IRF-3-dependent', gene, transcription, in, constitutively, active, 'IRF-3', overexpressing, 'cells,', demonstrating, that, 'NS1', directly, targets, 'IRF-3'])].
[sujeto(['Our', data, also, demonstrate, that, 'NS1', associates, with, 'IRF-3', and, its, transcriptional, coactivator, 'CBP,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, disrupted, association, of, 'IRF-3', to, 'CBP', and, subsequent, reduced, binding, of, 'IRF-3', to, the, 'IFN-β', promoter, without, blocking, 'viral-induced', 'IRF-3', 'phosphorylation,', nuclear, translocation, and, 'dimerization,', thereby, identifying, a, novel, molecular, mechanism, by, which, 'RSV', inhibits, 'IFN-β', synthesis])].
[sujeto(['The', transcription, factor, 'IRF-3', is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, microbial, invasions, and, produces, a, variety, of, cytokines, including, 'type-I', interferon])].
[sujeto(['Upon', microbial, 'infection,', 'IRF-3', is, phosphorylated, at, its, 'C-terminal', regulatory, 'domain,', then, 'oligomerized,', translocated, into, the, 'nucleus,', and, here, it]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, 'CBP/p300'])].
[sujeto(['Although', a, number, of, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported, investigating, the, activation, mechanism, of, 'IRF-3,', there, are, a, number, of, unresolved, 'issues,', especially, on, the, phosphorylation, 'sites,', the, oligomerization, process, and, the, binding, mechanism, with, 'CBP/p300'])].
[sujeto(['The', paper, also]), verbo([reports]), complemento([the, crystal, structure, of, the, active, form, of, the, phosphorylated, 'IRF-3', 'RD'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', the, phosphorylation, of, 'Ser386', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, essential, for, its, dimerization, and, binding, with, 'CBP/p300', using, mutational, analysis, and, mass, spectrometry])].
[sujeto(['Differential', expression, of, the, human, interferon, 'A', '(', 'IFN-A)', gene, cluster, is]), verbo([modulated]), complemento([following, paramyxovirus, infection, by, the, relative, amounts, of, active, interferon, regulatory, factor, 3, '(', 'IRF-3)', and, 'IRF-7'])].
[sujeto(['IRF-3', expression]), verbo([activates]), complemento([predominantly, 'IFN-A1', and, 'IFN-B,', while, 'IRF-7', expression, induces, multiple, 'IFN-A', genes])].
[sujeto(['IRF-3']), verbo([binds]), complemento([the, 'C', module, of, 'IFN-A1,', while, other, 'IFN-A', gene, promoters, are, responsive, to, the, binding, of, 'IRF-7', to, the, 'B', and, 'D', modules])].
[sujeto(['Nucleotide', substitutions, in, the, 'C', modules, of, other, 'IFN-A', genes, disrupt, 'IRF-3-mediated', 'transcription,', whereas, a, 'G/A', substitution, in, the, 'D', modules]), verbo([enhances]), complemento(['IRF7-mediated', expression])].
[sujeto(['Chromatin', immunoprecipitation, experiments]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, transient, binding, of, both, 'IRF-3', and, 'IRF-7,', accompanied, by, 'CBP/p300', recruitment, to, the, endogenous, 'IFN-A', gene, 'promoters,', is, associated, with, transcriptional, 'activation,', whereas, a, biphasic, recruitment, of, 'IRF-3', and, 'CBP/p300', represses, 'IFN-A', gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['This', regulatory, mechanism, contributes, to, differential, expression, of, 'IFN-A', genes, and, may, be, critical, for, alpha, interferon, production, in, different, cell, types, by, 'RIG-I-dependent', 'signals,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, innate, antiviral, immune, responses])].
[sujeto(['A']), verbo([conserved]), complemento([herpesviral, 'kinase,', designated, 'ORF36', in, murine, 'gamma-herpesvirus', 68, '(', 'MHV-68),', plays, multiple, vital, roles, in, the, viral, life, cycle])].
[sujeto(['ORF36', specifically]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, the, activated, form, of, interferon, regulatory, factor, 3, '(', 'IRF-3)', in, the, 'nucleus,', inhibiting, 'IRF-3', interaction, with, the, cotranscriptional, activator, 'CBP', and, thereby, suppressing, the, recruitment, of, 'RNA', polymerase, 'II', to, the, interferon, beta, promoter])].
[sujeto(['The', 'anti-IFN', function, of, 'ORF36', is]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([among, herpesvirus, 'subfamilies,', although, the, conserved, kinase, activity, is, not, absolutely, required, for, this, function])].
[sujeto(['MHV-68', lacking, 'ORF36']), verbo([induces]), complemento([a, greater, interferon, response, and, is, attenuated, in, vitro, and, in, 'vivo,', where, acute, viral, infection, in, the, lung, and, latency, in, the, spleen, are, compromised])].
[sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, herpesviruses, have, evolved, within, their, conserved, kinase, an, 'anti-IFN', activity, critical, for, evasion, of, host, immunity, and, for, persistence])].
[sujeto(['The', 'BGLF4', protein, kinase, of, 'Epstein-Barr', virus, '(', 'EBV)', is, a, member, of, the]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([family, of, herpesvirus, protein, kinases, 'which,', to, some, 'extent,', have, a, function, similar, to, that, of, the, cellular, 'cyclin-dependent', kinase, in, regulating, multiple, cellular, and, viral, substrates])].
[sujeto(['In', a, yeast, 'two-hybrid', screening, 'assay,', a, splicing, variant, of, interferon, '(', 'IFN)', regulatory, factor, 3, '(', 'IRF3)', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, interact, with, the, 'BGLF4', protein])].
[sujeto(['Using', reporter, 'assays,', we, show, that, 'BGLF4', effectively]), verbo([suppresses]), complemento([the, activities, of, the, 'poly(I:C)-stimulated', 'IFN-beta', promoter, and, 'IRF3-responsive', element])].
[sujeto(['In', searching, for, a, possible, 'mechanism,', 'BGLF4', was, shown, not, to, affect, the, 'dimerization,']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['translocation,', or, 'CBP', recruitment, of, 'IRF3', upon, 'poly(I:C)', treatment])].
[sujeto(['Notably,', 'BGLF4', reduces, the, amount, of, active, 'IRF3']), verbo([recruited]), complemento([to, the, 'IRF3-responsive', element, containing, the, 'IFN-beta', promoter, region, in, a, chromatin, immunoprecipitation, assay])].
[sujeto(['Most', 'importantly,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, three, 'proline-dependent', phosphorylation, sites, at, 'Ser123,', 'Ser173,', and, 'Thr180,', which, cluster, in, a, region, between, the, 'DNA', binding, and, 'IRF', association, domains, of, 'IRF3,', contribute, additively, to, the, 'BGLF4-mediated', repression, of, 'IRF3(5D)', transactivation, activity])].
[sujeto(['IRF3', signaling, is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, reactivated, 'EBV-positive', 'NA', 'cells,', and, the, knockdown, of, 'BGLF4', further, stimulates, 'IRF3-responsive', reporter, activity])].
[sujeto(['The', data, presented, here, thus]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, novel, mechanism, by, which, herpesviral, protein, kinases, suppress, host, innate, immune, responses, and, facilitate, virus, replication])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, identity, of, the, phosphoacceptor, 'site(s)']), verbo([targeted]), complemento([by, these, two, kinases, remains, unclear])].
[sujeto(['Using', a, biological, assay, based, on, the, 'IRF-3-mediated', production, of, antiviral, 'cytokines,', we, demonstrate, here, that, all, 'Ser/Thr', clusters, of, 'IRF-3', are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, its, optimal, transactivation, capacity])].
[sujeto(['In', vitro, kinase, assays, using, 'full-length', 'His-IRF-3', as, a, substrate, combined, with, mass, spectrometry, analysis, revealed, that, serine, 402, and, serine, 396, are, directly]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([by, 'TBK1'])].
[sujeto(['Analysis', of, 'Ser/Thr-to-Ala', mutants, revealed, that, the, 'S396A', 'mutation,', located, in, cluster, 'II,', abolished, 'IRF-3', 'homodimerization,', 'CBP', 'association,', and]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([accumulation])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', mutation, of, serine, 339, ',', which, is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'IRF-3', 'stability,', also, abrogated, 'CBP', association, and, dimerization, without, affecting, gene, transactivation, as, long, as, serine, 396, remained, available, for, phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['Complementation', of, 'IRF-3-knockout', mouse, embryonic, fibroblasts, also, revealed, a, compensatory, mechanism, of, serine, 339, and, serine, 396, in, the, ability, of, 'IRF-3', to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([expression, of, the, 'interferon-stimulated', genes, 'ISG56', and, 'ISG54'])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([lead]), complemento([us, to, reconsider, the, current, model, of, 'IRF-3', activation])].
[sujeto(['Transcriptional', activation, of, the, 'interferon-beta', '(', 'IFN-beta)', gene]), verbo([requires]), complemento([assembly, of, an, enhanceosome, containing, 'ATF-2/c-Jun,', 'IRF-3/IRF-7,', and, 'NFkappaB'])].
[sujeto(['These', factors]), verbo([bind]), complemento([cooperatively, to, the, 'IFN-beta', enhancer, and, recruit, coactivators, and, 'chromatin-remodeling', proteins, to, the, 'IFN-beta', promoter])].
[sujeto(['We', describe, here, a, crystal, structure, of, the, 'DNA-binding', domains, of, 'IRF-3,', 'IRF-7,', and, 'NFkappaB,']), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, one, half, of, the, 'enhancer,', and, use, a, previously, described, structure, of, the, remaining, half, to, assemble, a, complete, picture, of, enhanceosome, architecture, in, the, vicinity, of, the, 'DNA'])].
[sujeto(['Association', of, eight, proteins, with, the, enhancer, creates, a, continuous, surface, for]), verbo([recognizing]), complemento([a, composite, 'DNA-binding', element])].
[sujeto(['Paucity', of, local, 'protein-protein', contacts]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, cooperative, occupancy, of, the, enhancer, comes, from, both, 'binding-induced', changes, in, 'DNA', conformation, and, interactions, with, additional, components, such, as, 'CBP'])].
[sujeto(['Activation', of, these, proteins, in, the, cytoplasm, is]), verbo([triggered]), complemento([by, phosphorylation, of, serine, and, threonine, residues, in, a, 'C-terminal', autoinhibitory, 'region,', which, stimulates, 'dimerization,', transport, into, the, 'nucleus,', assembly, with, the, coactivator, 'CBP/p300', and, initiation, of, transcription])].
[sujeto(['The', crystal, structure, of, the, transactivation, domain, of, pseudophosphorylated, human, 'IRF5', strikingly]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([a, dimer, in, which, the, bulk, of, intersubunit, interactions, involve, a, highly, extended, 'C-terminal', region])].
[sujeto(['The', corresponding, region]), verbo([has]), complemento([previously, been, shown, to, block, 'CBP/p300', binding, to, unphosphorylated, 'IRF3'])].
[sujeto(['Mutation', of, key, interface, residues, supports, the, observed, dimer, as, the, physiologically]), verbo([activated]), complemento([state, of, 'IRF5', and, 'IRF3'])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', phosphorylation, is, likely, to]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['IRF5', and, other, family, members, by, triggering, conformational, rearrangements, that, switch, the, 'C-terminal', segment, from, an, autoinihibitory, to, a, dimerization, role])].
[sujeto(['Virus-induced', activation, of, the, beta, interferon, '(', 'IFN-beta)', gene]), verbo([requires]), complemento([orderly, recruitment, of, 'chromatin-remodeling', complexes, and, 'time-regulated', acetylation, of, histone, residues, 'K8H4', and, 'K14H3', on, the, promoter, region])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, shown, that, transcription, factor, 'Yin', 'Yang', 1, '(', 'YY1)', binds, the, murine, 'IFN-beta', promoter, at, two, sites, '(', -, 122, and, -, 90, ')', regulating, promoter, transcriptional, capacity, with, a, dual, 'activator/repressor', role])].
[sujeto(['In', this, work, we, demonstrate, that, both, 'YY1', -, 122, and, -, 90, sites, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'CBP', recruitment, and, 'K8H4/K14H3', acetylation, to, take, place, on, the, 'IFN-beta', promoter, region, after, virus, infection])].
[sujeto(['A', single, point, mutation, introduced, at, either, one, of, these, two, sites]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento(['YY1', binding, completely, disrupted, 'CBP', recruitment, and, 'K8H4/K14H3', acetylation, independently, of, 'HMGI', or, 'IRF3', binding, to, the, promoter])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, demonstrated, that, 'YY1', represses, the, transcriptional, capacity, of, the, 'IFN-beta', promoter, through, its, -, 90, site, via, histone, deacetylation])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, demonstrate, 'that,', in, 'vivo,', the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'YY1', to, the, -, 90, site, is, constant, all, through, virus, infection, whereas, the, binding, of, 'YY1', to, the, -, 122, site, is, activated, after, infection])].
[sujeto(['We', discuss, here, the, capacity, of, 'YY1', to, either, repress, '(', through, histone, deacetylase, 'recruitment)', or]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['(', through, 'CBP', 'recruitment)', 'IFN-beta', gene, expression, according, to, the, occupancy, of, either, only, its, -, 90, site, or, both, its, -, 122, and, -, 90, sites])].
[sujeto(['The', 'interferon-beta', promoter]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, studied, extensively, as, a, model, system, for, combinatorial, transcriptional, regulation])].
[sujeto(['It', remains, 'unclear,', 'however,', why, most, other, combinations, of, 'AP-1,', 'IRF', and, 'Rel', proteins, fail, to]), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, 'interferon-beta', gene])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([explored, how, different, 'IRFs', may, cooperate, with, other, factors, to, activate, transcription])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', the, activity, of, 'IRF-3', and, 'IRF-7', was, strongly, affected, by, promoter, 'context,', with, 'IRF-7', preferentially, being]), verbo([recruited]), complemento([to, the, natural, 'interferon-beta', promoter])].
[sujeto(['Maximal', synergy]), verbo([required]), complemento(['IRF-3', and, 'IRF-7', but, not, 'IRF-1,', and, was, strongly, dependent, on, the, presence, of, 'p300/CBP,', even, when, these, coactivators, only, modestly, affected, the, activity, of, each, factor, by, itself])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, specificity, in, activation, of, the, 'interferon-beta', gene, depends, on, a, unique, promoter, context, and, on, the, role, played, by, coactivators, as, architectural, factors])].
[sujeto(['Interleukin-12', receptor, beta1, '(', 'IL12RB1)', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([on, a, variety, of, immune, 'cells,', including, 'T', and, natural, killer, '(', 'NK)', cells, and, 'macrophages,', and, is, involved, in, innate, and, adaptive, immune, responses])].

[sujeto(['To']), verbo([reveal]), complemento([the, regulatory, mechanisms, governing, 'IL12RB1', gene, 'expression,', we, analyzed, the, transcriptional, regulatory, region, of, the, mouse, 'IL12RB1', gene])].

[sujeto(['Consistently,', 'IL-15,', as, a, histone, deacetylase, 'inhibitor,', synergistically]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['IL12RB1', gene, expression, and, promoter, activation, by, 'IFN-gamma', through, increased, protein, binding, to, 'ETS/PU'])].

[sujeto(['Thus,', 'IL-15']), verbo([induces]), complemento([chromatin, remodeling, of, the, 'IL12RB1', gene, 'promoter,', increasing, 'IL12RB1', mRNA, expression, in, synergy, with, 'IFN-gamma', through, the, recruitment, of, 'PU'])].
[sujeto(['In', response, to, lipopolysaccharide, '(', 'LPS)', 'exposure,', macrophages]), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, transcription, of, a, large, number, of, 'pro-inflammatory', genes, by, way, of, signaling, pathways, downstream, of, the, 'LPS', 'receptor,', 'Toll-Like', 'Receptor', 4])].
[sujeto(['Many', of, these, genes, are]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([sequentially, in, 'time,', with, early, synthesis, events, resulting, in, the, secretion, of, soluble, factors, that, drive, the, transcription, of, genes, expressed, later, in, the, activation, cycle])].
[sujeto(['In', this, study, we, show, that, human, 'blood-derived', macrophages, pretreated, with, oxidized, low, density, lipoprotein, '(', 'OxLDL)', fail, to]), verbo([transcribe]), complemento([and, secrete, interferon, beta, '(', 'IFNbeta)', immediately, following, 'LPS', stimulation])].
[sujeto(['As', 'such,', the, normal, downstream, activation, of, 'Stat1', is, 'blocked,', and, numerous, 'IFNbeta/Stat1-activated', 'genes,', including, the, chemokines, 'IP10', and, 'ITAC,', are, weakly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([or, not, expressed, at, all, in, these, cells])].

[sujeto(['These', 'IRF3', activities]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, be, essential, for, the, initiation, of, transcription, of, the, 'IFNbeta', 'gene,', and, the, loss, of, these, activities, presumably, accounts, for, the, lack, of, 'LPS-induced', 'IFN', beta, transcription, seen, in, the, 'OxLDL', 'pre-treated', cells])].
[sujeto(['Double-stranded', 'RNA', of, viral, origin, and, enzymatically, synthesized, poly, 'I:C']), verbo([act]), complemento([as, agonists, of, 'TLR3', and, induce, immune, responses])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([designed, and, synthesized, 'double-stranded', synthetic, oligoribonucleotides, '(', 'dsORNs)', which, act, as, agonists, of, 'TLR3'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, the, results, of, studies, of, dsORNs, containing, varying, lengths, and, compositions, of, alignment, and, oligo, 'I/oligo', 'C', segments])].
[sujeto([dsORNs, of, 50, -, mer, length, with, a, 15, -, mer, alignment, segment, and, a, 35, -, mer, oligo, 'I/oligo', 'C', segment, form, stable, duplexes, under, physiological, conditions, and]), verbo([induce]), complemento(['TLR3-mediated', immune, responses])].

[sujeto(['Here,', we, describe, altered, sorting, of, sortilin, in, adipocytes, deficient, for, the, 'σ1B-containing', 'AP-1', 'complex,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, the, inhibition, of, adipogenesis])].
[sujeto(['The', 'AP-1', complex]), verbo([mediates]), complemento([protein, sorting, between, the, 'trans-Golgi', network, and, endosomes])].
[sujeto(['Vertebrates']), verbo([express]), complemento([three, 'AP1', σ1, subunit, isoforms, -, 'σ1A,', σ1B, and, σ1C, '(', also, known, as, 'AP1S1,', 'AP1S2', and, 'AP1S3,', 'respectively)'])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, sortilin, is, overexpressed, in, adipose, tissue, from, 'σ1B(-/-)', 'mice,', and, that, its, overexpression, in, 'wild-type', cells, is, sufficient, to]), verbo([suppress]), complemento([adipogenesis])].
[sujeto(['σ1B-specific']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, sortilin, requires, the, sortilin, 'DxxD-x12-DSxxxL', motif])].
[sujeto([σ1B, deficiency, does, not]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, a, block, of, sortilin, transport, out, of, a, specific, 'organelle,', but, the, fraction, that, reaches, lysosomes, is, reduced])].

[sujeto(['DLK1', and, sortilin, expression, are, not]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, the, brain, tissue, of, 'σ1B(-/-)', 'mice,', although, this, is, the, tissue, with, the, highest, expression, of, σ1B, and, sortilin])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', 'adipose-tissue-specific', and, 'σ1B-dependent', routes, for, the, transport, of, sortilin, exist, and, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, regulation, of, adipogenesis, and, 'adipose-tissue', mass])].
[sujeto(['MEDNIK', '(', mental, 'retardation,', 'enteropathy,', 'deafness,', 'neuropathy,', 'ichthyosis,', and, 'keratodermia)', syndrome]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, recently, described, as, a, new, disorder, of, copper, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['MEDNIK', syndrome, is]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutation, of, the, 'AP1S1', 'gene,', which, codes, for, the, σ1A, subunit, of, adaptor, protein, complex, 1, ',', and, directs, intracellular, trafficking, of, copper, pumps, 'ATP7A', and, 'ATP7B'])].
[sujeto(['Adaptor', protein, complexes]), verbo([regulate]), complemento(['clathrin-coated', vesicle, 'assembly,', protein, cargo, 'sorting,', and, vesicular, trafficking, between, organelles, in, eukaryotic, cells])].
[sujeto(['A', growing, number, of, diseases]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, associated, with, mutations, in, genes, coding, for, adaptor, protein, complexes, subunits, and, we, propose, for, them, the, term, 'adaptinopathies,', as, a, new, organic, category, of, disorders, of, intracellular, 'trafficking,', which, offers, the, opportunity, to, dissect, the, mechanisms, involved, in, the, crosstalk, between, the, 'Golgi', apparatus, and, the, other, organelles])].

[sujeto(['MEDNIK', syndrome, was, first]), verbo([reported]), complemento([in, a, few, 'French-Canadian', families, sharing, common, 'ancestors,', presenting, a, complex, neurocutaneous, 'phenotype,', but, its, pathogenesis, is, not, completely, understood])].

[sujeto(['CD8(+)', 'T', cells, in, chronic, viral, infections, such, as, 'HIV', develop, functional, defects, including]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'interleukin-2', '(', 'IL-2)', secretion, and, decreased, proliferative, potential, that, are, collectively, termed, '\'', 'exhaustion\''])].
[sujeto(['Exhausted', 'T', cells]), verbo([express]), complemento([increased, amounts, of, multiple, inhibitory, 'receptors,', such, as, programmed, 'death-1', '(', 'PD-1),', that, contribute, to, impaired, 'virus-specific', 'T', cell, function])].
[sujeto(['It', is, not, known, whether, 'PD-1', also]), verbo([acts]), complemento([by, upregulating, genes, in, exhausted, 'T', cells, that, impair, their, function])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', inhibitory, receptors, can]), verbo([cause]), complemento(['T', cell, exhaustion, by, upregulating, 'genes--such', as, 'BATF--that', inhibit, 'T', cell, function])].
[sujeto(['Such', genes, may]), verbo([provide]), complemento([new, therapeutic, opportunities, to, improve, 'T', cell, immunity, to, 'HIV'])].
[sujeto(['The', renatured, 'BLV', 'TaxH6']), verbo([activates]), complemento([the, 'BLV', 'LTR', when, introduced, into, 'HeLa', cells, by, scrape, loading])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', the, purified, 'BLV', 'TaxH6']), verbo([enhances]), complemento([binding, of, members, of, the, 'CREB/ATF', family, of, bZip, proteins, to, 'CRE', motifs, by, interacting, with, their, bZip, domains, in, vitro])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'BLV', 'Tax', interacts, directly, with, 'CREB/ATF-like', factors, to, activate, viral, mRNA, transcription])].
[sujeto(['Apoptosis']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, postulated, to, play, an, important, role, during, feline, infectious, peritonitis, virus, '(', 'FIPV)', 'infection;', 'however,', its, mechanism, is, not, well, characterized])].
[sujeto([131, genes, from, apoptosis, cluster, '(', 80, 'down-regulated', and, 51, 'up-regulated)', along, with]), verbo([increase]), complemento([of, 'apoptosis,', 'p53,', p38, 'MAPK,', 'VEGF', and, 'chemokines/cytokines', signaling, pathways, were, probably, involved, in, apoptosis, process])].
[sujeto(['The', family, members, 'Batf,', 'Batf2', and, 'Batf3', belong, to, a, class, of, transcription, factors, containing, basic, leucine, zipper, domains, that]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([various, immunological, functions, and, control, the, development, and, differentiation, of, immune, cells])].

[sujeto(['Hence,', 'Batf2', could, be, used, as, a, biomarker, and, a, potential, host, directed, drug]), verbo([target]), complemento([in, tuberculosis])].

[sujeto(['Basic', leucine, zipper, transcription, factor, 'ATF-like', '(', 'BATF),', 'BATF2', and, 'BATF3', belong, to, the, activator, protein, 1, '(', 'AP-1)', family, of, transcription, 'factors,', which]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([numerous, cellular, processes])].
[sujeto(['Initially,', 'BATF', family, members, were, thought, to, function, only, as, inhibitors, of, 'AP-1-driven', 'transcription,', but, recent, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([uncovered, that, these, factors, have, 'unique,', 'non-redundant', and, positive, transcriptional, activities, in, dendritic, 'cells,', 'B', cells, and, 'T', cells])].
[sujeto(['The', question, of, how, 'BATF', and, 'BATF3', -, which, lack, a, transcriptional, activation, 'domain,', unlike, the, 'AP-1', factors, 'FOS', and, 'JUN', -, can, exert, unique, positive, transcriptional, specificity]), verbo([has]), complemento([now, been, answered, by, the, discovery, that, 'BATF', molecules, interact, with, members, of, the, 'interferon-regulatory', factor, '(', 'IRF)', family])].

[sujeto(['The', 'SARI', '(', suppressor, of, 'AP-1,']), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'IFN)', 'gene,', which, is, also, called, 'BATF2,', is, associated, with, the, risk, of, several, kinds, of, 'cancer,', and, loss, of, 'SARI', expression, is, frequently, detected, in, aggressive, and, metastatic, cancer])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, loss, of, 'SARI', expression, initiates, 'epithelial-mesenchymal', transition, '(', 'EMT),', which, is, visualized, by, repression, of, 'E-cadherin', and, 'up-regulation', of, vimentin, in, lung, adenocarcinoma, cell, lines, and, in, clinical, lung, adenocarcinoma, specimens])].

[sujeto(['The', 'AP1', transcription, factor, 'Batf3', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, homeostatic, development, of, 'CD8α(+)', classical, dendritic, cells, that, prime, 'CD8', 'T-cell', responses, against, intracellular, pathogens])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, identify, an, 'alternative,', 'Batf3-independent', pathway, in, mice, for, 'CD8α(+)', dendritic, cell, development, operating, during, infection, with, intracellular, pathogens, and]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, the, cytokines, interleukin, '(', 'IL)-12', and, 'interferon-γ'])].
[sujeto(['This', alternative, pathway, results, from, molecular, compensation, for, 'Batf3']), verbo([provided]), complemento([by, the, related, 'AP1', factors, 'Batf,', which, also, functions, in, 'T', and, 'B', 'cells,', and, 'Batf2', induced, by, cytokines, in, response, to, infection])].
[sujeto(['Compensation', among, 'BATF', factors, is, based, on, the, shared, capacity, of, their, leucine, zipper, domains, to]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'non-AP1', factors, such, as, 'IRF4', and, 'IRF8', to, mediate, cooperative, gene, activation])].
[sujeto(['Polyhydroxyalkanoate', '(', 'PHA)', synthesis, regulatory, protein, 'PhaR', contains, a, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([domain, '(', 'DBD)', and, a, 'PHA', granule, binding, domain, '(', 'GBD),', it, anchors, to, the, promoter, region, of, 'PHA', 'granule-associated', protein, '(', 'PhaP)', to, repress, phaP, expression])].
