[sujeto(['Results', showed, that, 'bFos,', bJun, and, bATF2]), verbo([bound]), complemento([tightly, in, pairs, to, allow, strong, expression, of, 'β-galactosidase', in, different, expression, levels])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'BATF2', expression, was, significantly, reduced, in, most, 'HCC', tumorous, 'tissues,', when, compared, with, nontumorous, 'tissues,', as, well, as, in, the, five, 'HCC', cell, lines])].
[sujeto(['Consistent', with, these, 'results,', the, immunohistochemistry, revealed, that]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['BATF2', expression, was, present, in, 63, of, the, 114, cases, and, was, significantly, correlated, with, age, '(', p, =, 0.006, ')', ',', tumor, size, '(', p, =, 0.046, ')', and, tumor, differentiation, '(', p, =, 0.03, ')'])].
[sujeto(['All', the, data, support, the, hypothesis, that, 'BATF2', plays, an, important, role, in, the, progression, of, 'HCC', and, that, it, may, work, as, a, candidate, tumor, suppressor, and, a, prognostic, marker, as, well, as, a, potential]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, treatment])].
[sujeto(['Recent', work, concluded, that, the, 'TPCs', function, as, a, 'PI(3,5)P2']), verbo([activated]), complemento([channels, regulated, by, 'mTORC1,', but, not, by, 'NAADP'])].
[sujeto(['Cytoplasmic', 'Mg(2+)', specifically]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['TPC2', outward, 'current,', whereas, lysosomal, 'Mg(2+)', partially, inhibited, both, outward, and, inward, currents, in, a, lysosomal, lumen, 'pH-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Under', controlled, 'Mg(2+),', 'TPC2', is, readily]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, 'NAADP', with, channel, properties, identical, to, those, in, response, to, 'PI(3,5)P2'])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 'TPC2', is, robustly]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'P38', and, 'JNK'])].
[sujeto(['Notably,', 'NAADP-mediated', 'Ca(2+)']), verbo([release]), complemento([in, intact, cells, is, regulated, by, 'Mg(2+),', 'PI(3,5)P2,', and, 'P38/JNK', 'kinases,', thus, paralleling, regulation, of, 'TPC2', currents])].
[sujeto(['The', extracellular, 'signal-regulated', protein, 'kinase,', 'ERK2,', fully]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, phosphorylation, and, without, a, 'His(6)', 'tag,', shows, little, tendency, to, dimerize, with, or, without, either, calcium, or, magnesium, ions, when, analyzed, by, light, scattering, or, analytical, ultracentrifugation])].
[sujeto(['Analysis', of, sedimentation, velocity, data, for, a, 15, μM, solution, of, 'ERK2', with, an]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([van, 'Holde-Weischet', method, determined, the, sedimentation, coefficient, '(', 's)', to, be, '~3'])].
[sujeto([22, 'S', for]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['ERK2', with, or, without, 10, mM, 'MgCl(2)'])].
[sujeto(['ERK2']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, proposed, to, homodimerize, and, bind, only, to, cytoplasmic, but, not, nuclear, proteins, '[', 'Casar,', 'B'])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', 'ERK2']), verbo([binds]), complemento(['PEA-15', as, a, monomer])].
[sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([strong, evidence, that, 'ERK2', is, monomeric, under, physiological, conditions])].
[sujeto(['Neutrophil', adhesion]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([a, number, of, processes, involved, in, the, pathogenesis, of, inflammatory, diseases, including, rheumatoid, arthritis])].
[sujeto(['Neutrophil', destructive, potential, can, be]), verbo([modulated]), complemento([by, 'adhesion,', allowing, alteration, of, inflammatory, cell, behaviour, while, preserving, antimicrobial, defences])].
[sujeto(['Tumour', necrosis, 'factor-alpha', '(', 'TNF', 'alpha)']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([neutrophil, binding, of, different, diameter, 'ACLB', 'equally,', by, almost, 'four-fold,', and, independently, of, bead, size])].
[sujeto(['Adhesion', of, neutrophils, to, 'ACLB']), verbo([caused]), complemento([a, 'size-dependent', generation, and, release, of, 'O(2)(-)', and, also, potentiated, 'TNF', 'alpha-induced', 'O(2)(-)', release])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', tyrosine, phosphorylation, and, an, intact, cytoskeleton, were, essential, for, 'adhesion-', and, 'cytokine-induced', 'O(2)(-)']), verbo([release]), complemento([from, neutrophils])].
[sujeto(['Inhibition', of, 'adhesion-', and, 'cytokine-induced', 'O(2)(-)']), verbo([release]), complemento([by, 4, -, 'amino-5-(4-chlorophenyl)-7-(t-butyl)pyrazol[3,4-d]pyrimidine', '(', 'PP2)', indicated, that, a, 'Src-family', tyrosine, kinase, was, the, principal, regulatory, pathway, mediating, this, response, in, 'neutrophils,', a, distal, role, for, p38, 'MAPK', was, revealed, by, use, of, 'SB203580'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, activation, of, the, key, regulatory, enzyme, 'c-Fgr', is, achieved, following, ligation, of, a, critical, threshold, of, integrins, following, binding, of, large, '(', &, 'gt;3', 'microM)', 'ACLB'])].
[sujeto(['Extracellular']), verbo([regulated]), complemento([protein, kinase, 2, '(', 'ERK2)', is, a, eukaryotic, protein, kinase, whose, activity, is, regulated, by, mitogenic, stimuli])].
[sujeto(['To']), verbo([gain]), complemento([insight, into, the, catalytic, properties, of, 'ERK2', and, to, complement, 'structure-function', 'studies,', we, undertook, a, 'pre-steady', state, kinetic, analysis, of, the, enzyme])].
[sujeto(['To', do, 'this,', 'ERK2', was, quantitatively]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, 'MAPKK1', in, vitro, by, monitoring, the, stoichiometry, and, site, specificity, of, phosphorylation, using, a, combination, of, protein, mass, 'spectrometry,', tryptic, peptide, 'analysis,', and, '(', 32, ')', 'P', radiolabeling])].
[sujeto(['The', 'pre-steady', state, burst, is, consistent, with, two, partially, 'rate-limiting', enzymatic, 'steps,', which]), verbo([have]), complemento([the, following, rate, 'constants:', 'k(2)', =, 109, +, /, -, 9, 's(-1)', and, 'k(3)', =, 56, +, /, -, 4, 's(-1)'])].
[sujeto(['Single-turnover', experiments]), verbo([provided]), complemento([an, independent, determination, of, 'k(2)', '(', 106, +, /, -, 25, 's(-1))'])].
[sujeto(['The', observed, catalytic, constant, '(', 'k(cat)(obs))', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, sensitive, to, the, concentration, of, 'ERK2'])].
[sujeto(['The', data, fit, a, model, in, which, 'ERK2', monomers, form, dimers, and]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, both, the, monomeric, and, dimeric, forms, of, 'ERK2', are, active, with, catalytic, constants, '(', 'k(cat))', of, 25, and, 37, 's(-1),', respectively])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', the, model]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, in, the, presence, of, saturating, concentrations, of, both, magnesium, and, substrates, 'ERK2', subunits, dissociate, with, a, dissociation, constant, '(', 'K(d))', of, 32, +, /, -, 16, nM])].
[sujeto(['Extracellular']), verbo([regulated]), complemento([protein, kinase, 2, '(', 'ERK2)', is, a, eukaryotic, protein, kinase, whose, activity, is, regulated, by, phorbol, 'esters,', 'serum,', and, growth, 'factors,', and, displays, enhanced, activity, in, several, human, tumors])].
[sujeto(['Now', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([kinetic, evidence, that, 'ERK2', must, bind, two, divalent, magnesium, ions, to, facilitate, catalysis, at, a, physiologically, relevant, 'rate,', because, a, second, magnesium, ion, promotes, both, 'MgATP2-', binding, and, phosphoryl, transfer])].
[sujeto(['No']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'ATP4-', '(', 0, -, 2.5, 'mM)', by, 'ERK2', '(', 65, 'microM)', can, be, detected, using, isothermal, titration, calorimetry, at, 27, degrees, 'C,', pH, 8.0, ',', and, an, ionic, strength, of, 0.15, 'M', '(', 'KCl),', suggesting, that, the, 'complex,', 'MgATP2-,', is, the, true, substrate, for, 'ERK2'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', 5, -, iodotubericidin]), verbo([binds]), complemento(['ERK2', tightly, '(', 'K(d)', =, 1, 'microM)', and, displays, a, competitive, inhibition, pattern, toward, 'MgATP2-', and, a, mixed, pattern, toward, free, 'Mg2+,', suggesting, that, the, binding, of, 'Mg2+', before, 'MgATP2-', is, not, compulsory])].

[sujeto(['ATF2', is, a, subfamily, member, of, 'AP-1', and]), verbo([has]), complemento([an, important, role, in, cellular, stress, responses])].

[sujeto(['DNA', damage, '(', single, or, 'double-strand', 'breaks)']), verbo([triggers]), complemento([adapted, cellular, responses])].

[sujeto(['This', model, qualitatively, agrees, with, most, experimental, 'observations,', including, experiments]), verbo([involving]), complemento([mutations])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', it]), verbo([provides]), complemento([some, predictions])].
[sujeto(['The', skeleton]), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, an, endocrine, organ, that, regulates, energy, metabolism, and, calcium, and, phosphorous, homeostasis, through, the, secretion, of, osteocalcin, '(', 'Oc)', and, fibroblast, growth, factor, 23, '(', 'FGF23)'])].

[sujeto(['Herein,', we, show, that, impaired, osteoblast, function, is, associated, with, a, strong]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, body, weight, and, adiposity, '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.01, ')'])].
[sujeto(['The', differences, in, adiposity, were, not, associated, with, diminished, caloric, 'intake,', but, rather, reflected, 20, '%']), verbo([increased]), complemento([energy, expenditure, and, the, 'up-regulation', of, uncoupling, 'protein-1', '(', 'Ucp1)', in, white, adipose, tissue, '(', 'WAT)', and, brown, adipose, tissue, '(', 'BAT)', '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')'])].
[sujeto(['These', alterations, in, lipid, metabolism, and, energy, expenditure, were, correlated, with, a]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, the, blood, levels, of, neuropeptide, 'Y', '(', 'NPY)', '(', 40, '%', 'lower)', rather, than, changes, in, the, serum, levels, of, 'insulin,', 'Oc,', or, 'FGF23'])].

[sujeto([p38, 'MAPKs']), verbo([regulate]), complemento([migration, and, invasion])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, mechanisms]), verbo([involved]), complemento([are, only, partially, known])].
[sujeto(['We', had, previously, identified, fibulin, 3, ',', which, plays, a, role, in, 'migration,', 'invasion,', and, 'tumorigenesis,', as, a, gene]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, p38α])].

[sujeto(['We', demonstrate, a, prompt, mitochondrial, dysfunction, followed, by, nerve, cell]), verbo([loss]), complemento([after, exposure, to, 'TNF-α'])].
[sujeto(['These', studies, may]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, the, immune, system, can, rapidly, and, adversely, affect, brain, function, and, that, 'TNF-α', signaling, may, be, a, target, for, neuroprotection])].
[sujeto(['Current', research, on, 'Parkinson\'s', disease, '(', 'PD)', pathogenesis]), verbo([requires]), complemento([relevant, animal, models, that, mimic, the, gradual, and, progressive, development, of, neuronal, dysfunction, and, degeneration, that, characterizes, the, disease])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, 'En1', mutant, mice, might, be, a, promising, candidate, 'PD', model])].
[sujeto(['Indeed,', a, mouse, that, lacks, one, 'En1', allele, exhibits]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([mitochondrial, complex, 'I', activity, and, progressive, midbrain, dopamine, neuron, degeneration, in, 'adulthood,', both, features, associated, with, 'PD'])].
[sujeto(['Several', weeks, before, a, significant]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, dopaminergic, neurons, in, the, substantia, nigra, could, be, 'detected,', we, found, that, striatal, terminals, expressing, high, levels, of, dopaminergic, neuron, markers, 'TH,', 'VMAT2,', and, 'DAT', were, dystrophic, and, swollen])].
[sujeto(['Using', in, vivo, 'electrochemistry,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, nigrostriatal, terminals, in, the, dorsal, striatum, were, severely, deficient, in, dopamine, release, and, reuptake])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings, support, a, progressive, retrograde, degeneration, of, 'En1(+/-)', nigrostriatal, 'neurons,', akin, to, what, is]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([to, occur, in, 'PD'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, using, the, 'En1(+/-)', mice, as, a, model, will, provide, further, key, insights, into, 'PD', 'pathogenesis,', and, propose, that, axon, terminal, integrity, and, function, can, be, utilized, to, estimate, dopaminergic, neuron, health, and, efficacy, of, experimental, 'PD', therapies])].
[sujeto(['Inhibition', of, dynamin, related, protein, 1, '(', 'Drp1)', results, in, reduced, 'ROS', levels, and, transcriptional, activity, of, 'NF-κB']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, diminished, proliferation, and, 'CD95L-dependent', 'activation-induced', cell, death, '(', 'AICD)'])].
[sujeto(['Upon', stimulation, 'Drp1', is, 'S-nitrosylated,', which, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, oxidative, 'signalling,', 'AICD', and, cytokine, production])].
[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', we, describe, a, novel, signalling, pathway, that, links, 'TCR-induced', nitric, oxide]), verbo([release]), complemento([to, mitochondrial, fission, and, oxidative, signalling])].
[sujeto(['Angiopoietin-1', '(', 'Ang1)', is, a, ligand, for, the, receptor, tyrosine, kinase, 'Tie2', and]), verbo([has]), complemento([key, roles, in, the, development, of, the, vascular, system, and, vascular, protection])].
[sujeto(['In', a, screen, to, define, signalling, pathways]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'Ang1', in, endothelial, cells, we, found, the, 'RNA-binding', protein, 'hnRNP-K', to, be, phosphorylated, in, response, to, 'Ang1'])].
[sujeto(['The', ligand]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([both, tyrosine, phosphorylation, of, 'hnRNP-K', and, recruitment, of, the, tyrosine, kinase, 'Src', to, the, 'RNA-binding', protein])].
[sujeto(['In', endothelial, cells, 'hnRNP-K', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([bound, to, mRNA, encoding, the, mitochondrial, protein, uncoupling, 'protein-2', '(', 'UCP2)'])].
[sujeto(['Ang1', stimulation, of, cells, resulted, in, the]), verbo([release]), complemento([of, 'UCP2', mRNA, from, 'hnRNP-K'])].
[sujeto(['Using', in, vitro, assays, we, confirmed, direct]), verbo([binding]), complemento([between, 'hnRNP-K', and, 'UCP2', mRNA])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore', 'Src']), verbo([induced]), complemento([phosphorylation, of, purified, 'hnRNP-K', and, prevented, 'UCP2', mRNA, binding])].

[sujeto(['Consistent', with, the, known, effects, of, 'UCP2', to]), verbo([suppress]), complemento([generation, of, reactive, oxygen, 'species,', 'Ang1', limited, 'ROS', production, in, endothelium, stimulated, with, tumour, necrosis, 'factor-α'])].

[sujeto(['Although', the, results, of, several, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([underscored, the, regulatory, effect, of, 'H1-histamine', receptors, in, cell, proliferation, of, some, cancer, cell, 'types,', its, effect, in, prostate, cancers, remains, unclear])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([therefore, studied, the, effect, of, terfenadine, '(', an, 'H1-histamine', receptor, 'antagonist)', in, prostate, cancer, cell, lines])].
[sujeto(['Terfenadine']), verbo([induced]), complemento([the, cleavage, of, 'Mcl-1', cleavage, into, a, 'pro-apoptotic', 28, -, kDa, fragment, and, 'up-regulation', of, 'Bak,', resulting, in, the, loss, of, mitochondrial, membrane, potential, '(', 'ΔΨm)', and, the, release, of, cytochrome, c, and, 'apoptosis-inducing', factor, into, the, cytosol])].

[sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, tumors]), verbo([maintain]), complemento([energy, production, under, nutrient, deprivation, through, the, function, of, 'HSP90', chaperones, compartmentalized, in, mitochondria])].
[sujeto(['Using', cancer, cell, 'lines,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, mitochondrial, 'HSP90', 'proteins,', including, tumor, necrosis, factor, 'receptor-associated', 'protein-1', '(', 'TRAP-1),', dampen, the, activation, of, the, 'nutrient-sensing', 'AMPK', and, its, substrate, 'UNC-51-like', kinase, '(', 'ULK1),', preserve, cytoskeletal, 'dynamics,', and, release, the, cell, motility, effector, focal, adhesion, kinase, '(', 'FAK)', from, inhibition, by, the, autophagy, initiator, 'FIP200'])].

[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, showed, that, 'OSW-1', effectively, killed, leukemia, cells, at, subnanomolar, concentrations, through, a, unique, mechanism, by]), verbo([causing]), complemento([a, 'time-dependent', elevation, of, cytosolic, 'Ca(2+)', prior, to, induction, of, apoptosis])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, that, induction, of, 'ER', stress, with, either, thapsigargin, or, tunicamycin, in, mouse, embryonic, fibroblasts, leads, to, 'up-regulation', of, 'Mfn2', mRNA, and, protein, levels, with, no, change, in, the, expression, of, the, mitochondrial, shaping, factors, 'Mfn1,', 'Opa1,', 'Drp1,', and, 'Fis1'])].

[sujeto(['Human', immunodeficiency, 'virus-associated', neurological, disease, '(', 'HAND)', still]), verbo([causes]), complemento([significant, 'morbidity,', despite, success, reducing, viral, loads, with, combination, antiretroviral, therapy])].

[sujeto(['This', posed, the, conundrum, of, what, factor, was, responsible, for]), verbo([recognizing]), complemento([these, triplets, to, promote, translation, 'termination?', 'Recent', data, indicates, that, in, fact, no, protein, is, required, to, recognize, 'AGA/AGG'])].
[sujeto(['On', encountering, either, of, these, '\'', 'hungry\'', codons, at, the, end, of, an, open, reading, 'frame,', instead, of]), verbo([requiring]), complemento([a, novel, or, modified, release, 'factor,', human, mitoribosomes, employ, -, 1, frameshifting, to, reposition, a, standard, 'UAG', codon, in, the, 'A-site,', indicating, that, only, the, universal, 'UAA', and, 'UAG', are, used, as, stop, codons])].
[sujeto(['This', renders, a, single, mitochondrial]), verbo([release]), complemento(['factor,', 'mtRF1a,', previously, shown, to, be, capable, of, terminating, 11, of, the, 13, open, reading, frames, encoded, by, the, mitochondrial, 'genome,', to, be, sufficient, to, release, all, nascent, human, mitochondrial, gene, products, from, the, mitoribosome])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, demonstrate, in, primary, cerebral, 'ECs', with, a, clinically, relevant, model, of, elevated, 'd-glucose', that, 'Akt1', and, the, 'post-translational', modification, and, subcellular, trafficking, of, the, forkhead, transcription, factor, 'FoxO3a', are, critical, for, early, apoptotic, membrane, signaling, and, subsequent, degradation, of]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['DNA'])].

[sujeto(['Translation', termination, is, accomplished, by, proteins, of, the, 'Class', 'I']), verbo([release]), complemento([factor, family, '(', 'RF)', that, recognize, stop, codons, and, catalyze, the, ribosomal, release, of, the, newly, synthesized, peptide])].
[sujeto(['Bacteria']), verbo([have]), complemento([two, canonical, 'RFs:', 'RF1', recognizes, 'UAA', and, 'UAG,', 'RF2', recognizes, 'UAA', and, 'UGA'])].
[sujeto(['Despite', that, these, two]), verbo([release]), complemento([factor, proteins, are, sufficient, for, de, facto, translation, 'termination,', the, eukaryotic, organellar, 'RF', protein, 'family,', which, has, evolved, from, bacterial, release, 'factors,', has, expanded, 'considerably,', comprising, multiple, 'subfamilies,', most, of, which, have, not, been, functionally, characterized, or, formally, classified])].
[sujeto(['We', document, the, 'origin,', phylogenetic, distribution, and, sequence, structure, features, of, the, mitochondrial, and, plastidial]), verbo([release]), complemento(['factors:', 'mtRF1a,', 'mtRF1,', 'mtRF2a,', 'mtRF2b,', 'mtRF2c,', 'ICT1,', 'C12orf65,', 'pRF1,', and, 'pRF2,', and, review, published, relevant, experimental, data])].
[sujeto(['The', canonical]), verbo([release]), complemento([factors, '(', 'mtRF1a,', 'mtRF2a,', 'pRF1,', and, 'pRF2)', and, 'ICT1', are, derived, from, bacterial, 'ancestors,', whereas, the, others, have, resulted, from, gene, duplications, of, another, release, factor])].
[sujeto(['These', new, 'RF', family, members]), verbo([have]), complemento([all, lost, one, or, more, specific, motifs, relevant, for, bona, fide, release, factor, function, but, are, mostly, targeted, to, the, same, organelle, as, their, ancestor])].
[sujeto(['We', also, characterize, the, subset, of, canonical]), verbo([release]), complemento([factor, proteins, that, bear, nonclassical, 'PxT/SPF', tripeptide, motifs, and, provide, a, 'molecular-model-based', rationale, for, their, retained, ability, to, recognize, stop, codons])].
[sujeto(['Although', the, 'RF', presence, in, an, organelle, and, its, stop, codon, usage, tend, to, 'coevolve,', we]), verbo([find]), complemento([three, taxa, that, encode, an, 'RF2', without, using, 'UGA', stop, 'codons,', and, one, reverse, 'scenario,', where, mamiellales, green, algae, use, 'UGA', stop, codons, in, their, mitochondria, without, having, a, mitochondrial, type, 'RF2'])].
[sujeto(['For', the, 'latter,', we, put, forward, a, &, 'quot;stop-codon', 'reinvention&quot;', hypothesis, that]), verbo([involves]), complemento([the, retargeting, of, the, plastid, release, factor, to, the, mitochondrion])].
[sujeto([mtRF1, is, a, vertebrate, mitochondrial, protein, with, an, unknown, function, that, arose, from, a, duplication, of, the, mitochondrial]), verbo([release]), complemento([factor, mtRF1a])].
[sujeto(['To', elucidate, the, function, of, 'mtRF1,', we, determined, the, positions, that, are]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([among, mtRF1, sequences, but, that, are, different, in, their, mtRF1a, paralogs])].
[sujeto(['We', subsequently, modeled, the, 3, 'D', structure, of, mtRF1a, and, mtRF1]), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, the, 'ribosome,', highlighting, the, structural, implications, of, these, differences, to, derive, a, hypothesis, for, the, function, of, mtRF1])].
[sujeto(['Our', model, 'predicts,', in, agreement, with, the, experimental, 'data,', that, the, 3, 'D', structure, of, mtRF1a, allows, it, to]), verbo([recognize]), complemento([the, stop, codons, 'UAA', and, 'UAG', in, the, 'A-site', of, the, ribosome])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', we, show, that, mtRF1, likely, can, only]), verbo([bind]), complemento([the, ribosome, when, the, 'A-site', is, devoid, of, mRNA])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', while, mtRF1a, will, adopt, its, catalytic, 'conformation,', in, which, it, functions, as, a, 'peptidyl-tRNA', hydrolase, in, the, 'ribosome,', only, upon]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, a, stop, codon, in, the, 'A-site,', mtRF1, appears, specifically, adapted, to, assume, this, 'extended,', 'peptidyl-tRNA', hydrolyzing, conformation, in, the, absence, of, mRNA, in, the, 'A-site'])].
[sujeto(['We', predict, that, mtRF1, specifically]), verbo([recognizes]), complemento([ribosomes, with, an, empty, 'A-site', and, is, able, to, function, as, a, 'peptidyl-tRNA', hydrolase, in, those, situations])].
[sujeto(['Stalled', ribosomes, with, empty, 'A-sites', that, still, contain, a, tRNA]), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, a, peptide, chain, can, result, from, the, translation, of, 'truncated,', 'stop-codon', less, mRNAs])].
[sujeto(['We', investigated, the, genetic, basis, for, a, global, and, uniform]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, mitochondrial, translation, in, fibroblasts, from, patients, in, two, unrelated, pedigrees, who, developed, 'Leigh', 'syndrome,', optic, 'atrophy,', and, ophthalmoplegia])].

[sujeto(['C12orf65', belongs, to, a, family, of, four, mitochondrial, class, 'I', peptide]), verbo([release]), complemento(['factors,', which, also, includes, 'mtRF1a,', 'mtRF1,', and, 'Ict1,', all, characterized, by, the, presence, of, a, 'GGQ', motif, at, the, active, site])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, it, might, play, a, role, in, recycling, abortive, 'peptidyl-tRNA', 'species,', released, from, the, ribosome, during, the, elongation, phase, of, translation])].
[sujeto(['Vertebrate', mitochondria, use, stop, codons, 'UAA', and, 'UAG', decoded, by, the]), verbo([release]), complemento([factor, '(', 'RF)', 'MTRF1L', and, two, reassigned, arginine, 'codons,', 'AGA', and, 'AGG'])].

[sujeto(['MTRF1', differs, from, other, 'RFs', by, having, insertions, in, the, two, external, loops, important, for, stop, codon, recognition, '(', tip, of, helix, alpha5, and, recognition, 'loop)', and, by, having, key, substitutions, that, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, stop, codon, interactions, in, eubacterial, 'RF/ribosome', structures])].

[sujeto(['The', telomeres, are, nucleoprotein, complexes, essential, for]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento([the, genomic, integrity, of, linear, chromosomes])].
[sujeto(['Six', telomere, localizing, proteins, form, a, complex, named, &, 'quot;shelterin/telosome&quot;', to, cooperatively]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([telomere, length, and, protect, chromosomal, ends, from, 'DNA', damage, and, repair, responses])].

[sujeto(['To']), verbo([gain]), complemento([further, insights, into, the, functional, role, of, 'lasp-2,', we, identified, two, additional, binding, partners, of, 'lasp-2:', the, integral, focal, adhesion, proteins, vinculin, and, paxillin])].

[sujeto(['Dilated', cardiomyopathy, '(', 'DCM)', is, a, major]), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, morbidity, and, mortality])].

[sujeto(['Hic-5', and, paxillin, exhibit, structural, homology, and, share]), verbo([interacting]), complemento(['factors,', 'however,', diverse, functions, are, suggested, for, them])].

[sujeto(['Thus,', it, was, demonstrated, that, 'Hic-5', and, 'GIT1']), verbo([interact]), complemento([functionally, in, addition, to, showing, a, physical, association])].
[sujeto(['The', localization, of, proteins, to, particular, intracellular, compartments, often]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([their, functions])].
[sujeto(['Zyxin', is, a, 'LIM', protein]), verbo([found]), complemento([prominently, at, sites, of, cell, 'adhesion,', faintly, in, leading, 'lamellipodia,', and, transiently, in, cell, nuclei])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([performed, a, domain, analysis, to, identify, regions, in, zyxin, that, are, responsible, for, targeting, it, to, different, subcellular, locations])].
[sujeto(['The', 'N-terminal', 'proline-rich', region, of, 'zyxin,', which, harbors]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, for, 'alpha-actinin', and, members, of, the, 'Ena/VASP', 'family,', concentrates, in, lamellipodial, extensions, and, weakly, in, focal, adhesions])].

[sujeto([miRNAs, and, their]), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, were, assessed, using, 'real-time', polymerase, chain, reaction, '(', 'qRT-PCR),', and, protein, levels, were, assessed, by, 'Western', blotting])].
[sujeto(['Increased', protein, expression, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([for, both, 'KRAS', '(', 4, ',', 312.2, 'luminance/area)', and, 'MAP3K3', '(', 7, ',', 461.7, 'luminance/area),', while, the, 'ERK5', protein, was, more, abundant, in, the, samples, from, patients, with, prostate, larger, than, 60, grams, '(', 'p=0'])].
[sujeto(['The', overexpression, of, 'miR-143', and, 'miR-145', in, 'BPH', samples]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([an, association, with, the, pathogenesis, of, the, 'disease;', 'additionally,', the, latter, miRNA, may, act, through, the, inhibition, of, 'MAP4K4'])].
[sujeto(['The', mammalian, striatin, family, consists, of, three, 'proteins,', 'striatin,', 'S/G2']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['autoantigen,', and, zinedin])].
[sujeto(['Striatin', family, members]), verbo([have]), complemento([no, intrinsic, catalytic, 'activity,', but, rather, function, as, scaffolding, proteins])].
[sujeto(['Remarkably,', they, organize, multiple, 'diverse,', large, signaling, complexes, that]), verbo([participate]), complemento([in, a, variety, of, cellular, processes])].
[sujeto(['Recently,', there]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, a, great, increase, in, functional, and, mechanistic, studies, aimed, at, identifying, and, understanding, the, roles, of, 'STRIPAK', and, 'STRIPAK-like', complexes, in, cellular, processes, of, multiple, organisms])].
[sujeto(['These', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, novel, 'STRIPAK', and, 'STRIPAK-like', complexes, and, have, explored, their, roles, in, specific, signaling, pathways])].
[sujeto(['Together,', the, results, of, these, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([sparked, increased, interest, in, striatin, family, complexes, because, they, have, revealed, roles, in, 'signaling,', cell, cycle, 'control,', 'apoptosis,', vesicular, 'trafficking,', 'Golgi', 'assembly,', cell, 'polarity,', cell, 'migration,', neural, and, vascular, 'development,', and, cardiac, function])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 'STRIPAK', complexes]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, connected, to, clinical, 'conditions,', including, cardiac, 'disease,', 'diabetes,', 'autism,', and, cerebral, cavernous, malformation])].
[sujeto(['Adipose', tissue, lipogenesis, is, paradoxically, impaired, in, human, 'obesity,']), verbo([promoting]), complemento([ectopic, triglyceride, '(', 'TG)', 'deposition,', 'lipotoxicity,', and, insulin, resistance])].
[sujeto(['We', previously, identified, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, kinase, kinase, kinase, 4, '(', 'Map4k4),', a, sterile, 20, protein, kinase]), verbo([reported]), complemento([to, be, upstream, of, 'c-Jun', 'NH2-terminal', kinase, '(', 'JNK)', 'signaling,', as, a, novel, negative, regulator, of, 'insulin-stimulated', glucose, transport, in, adipocytes])].
[sujeto(['We', further]), verbo([report]), complemento([here, the, surprising, finding, that, 'Map4k4', suppresses, adipocyte, lipogenesis, independently, of, 'JNK'])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', while, 'Map4k4', silencing, in, adipocytes]), verbo([enhances]), complemento([the, expression, of, lipogenic, 'enzymes,', concomitant, with, increased, conversion, of, '(', 14, ')', 'C-glucose', and, '(', 14, ')', 'C-acetate', into, 'TGs', and, fatty, 'acids,', 'JNK1', and, 'JNK2', depletion, causes, the, opposite, effects])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', high, expression, of, 'Map4k4', fails, to]), verbo([activate]), complemento([endogenous, 'JNK,', while, 'Map4k4', depletion, does, not, attenuate, 'JNK', activation, by, tumor, necrosis, factor, α])].
[sujeto(['Map4k4', silencing, in, cultured, adipocytes, elevates, both, the, total, protein, expression, and, cleavage, of, 'sterol-regulated', element]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['protein-1', '(', 'Srebp-1)', in, a, 'rapamycin-sensitive', 'manner,', consistent, with, 'Map4k4', signaling, via, mechanistic, target, of, rapamycin, complex, 1, '(', 'mTORC1)'])].
[sujeto(['We', show, 'Map4k4', depletion]), verbo([requires]), complemento(['Srebp-1', upregulation, to, increase, lipogenesis, and, further, show, that, 'Map4k4', promotes, 'AMP-protein', kinase, '(', 'AMPK)', signaling, and, the, phosphorylation, of, mTORC1, binding, partner, raptor, '(', 'Ser792)', to, inhibit, mTORC1])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, indicate, that, 'Map4k4']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([adipose, lipogenesis, by, suppression, of, 'Srebp-1', in, an, 'AMPK-', and, 'mTOR-dependent', but, 'JNK-independent', mechanism])].
[sujeto(['Galactosylated', trimethyl, 'chitosan-cysteine', '(', 'GTC)', nanoparticles, '(', 'NPs)', were, developed, for, oral, delivery, of, a, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, kinase, kinase, kinase, 4, '(', 'Map4k4)', siRNA, '(', 'siMap4k4)', to, the]), verbo([activated]), complemento([macrophages, for, treatment, of, dextran, sulfate, sodium, '(', 'DSS)-induced', ulcerative, colitis, '(', 'UC)'])].
[sujeto(['The', types, of, crosslinkers]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'GTC', 'NPs', significantly, affected, their, physicochemical, characteristics])].
[sujeto(['Cellular', uptake, of, 'GTC/TPP', 'NPs', in]), verbo([activated]), complemento([macrophages, was, significantly, enhanced, compared, to, trimethyl, 'chitosan-cysteine', '(', 'TC)/TPP', 'NPs', owing, to, galactose, 'receptor-mediated', endocytosis])].
[sujeto(['The', 'in&nbsp;vitro', and, 'in&nbsp;vivo', gene, knockdown, measurement, showed, that, siMap4k4, loaded, 'GTC/TPP', 'NPs', effectively]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['TNF-α', 'production,', which, remarkably, outperformed, siMap4k4, loaded, 'TC/TPP', 'NPs'])].
[sujeto(['Compared', to, 'TC/TPP', 'NPs,', 'GTC/TPP', 'NPs', more, efficiently]), verbo([promoted]), complemento([the, distribution, of, siRNA, in, ulcerative, colon, following, oral, administration])].
[sujeto(['Daily', oral, administration, of, 'GTC/TPP', 'NPs', containing, siMap4k4, significantly, improved, 'DSS-induced', body, weight, 'loss,', colon, length, 'shortening,', and]), verbo([increase]), complemento([of, myeloperoxidase, activity])].
[sujeto(['This', study, would]), verbo([provide]), complemento([an, effective, approach, for, oral, siRNA, delivery, in, the, treatment, of, inflammatory, bowel, diseases])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, small, interfering, 'RNA', '(', 'siRNA)-based', silencing, of, the, 'Ste20-like', 'mitogen-activated', protein, 4, kinase, 4, '(', 'Map4k4)', in, 'C2C12', myoblasts, markedly]), verbo([enhances]), complemento([expression, of, myogenic, differentiation, 'genes,', myoblast, 'fusion,', and, myotube, diameter])].
[sujeto(['Expression', of, a, 'Map4k4', 'kinase-inactive', mutant]), verbo([enhances]), complemento([myotube, 'formation,', suggesting, that, the, kinase, activity, of, 'Map4k4', is, essential, for, its, inhibition, of, muscle, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['Map4k4', regulation, of, myogenesis, is, unlikely, to, be]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, classic, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'MAPK)', signaling, 'pathways,', because, no, significant, difference, in, phosphorylation, of, extracellular, 'signal-regulated', kinase, '(', 'ERK),', 'p38,', or, 'c-Jun', 'N-terminal', kinase, '(', 'JNK)', is, observed, in, 'Map4k4-silenced', cells])].

[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'Myf5', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, enhancement, of, myotube, formation, in, 'Map4k4-silenced', 'cells,', while, 'Myf5', overexpression, rescues, 'Map4k4-mediated', inhibition, of, myogenic, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['These', results, demonstrate, that, 'Map4k4', is, a, novel, suppressor, of, skeletal, muscle, 'differentiation,']), verbo([acting]), complemento([through, a, 'Myf5-dependent', mechanism])].
[sujeto(['Mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, kinase, kinase, kinase, 4, '(', 'MAP4K4)', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, all, 'diabetes-relevant', tissues, and, mediates, 'cytokine-induced', insulin, resistance])].
[sujeto(['Subjects', '(', 'N', =, 1, ',', 769, ')', were]), verbo([recruited]), complemento([from, the, 'Tübingen', 'Family', '(', 'TÜF)', study, for, type, 2, diabetes, and, genotyped, for, tagging, 'SNPs'])].
[sujeto(['SNPs', rs6543087, and, rs11674694, were, also, nominally, associated, with]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([insulin, sensitivity])].
[sujeto(['This', 'variation\'s', impact, on, insulin, sensitivity, may, be, more, important, since, its, effect, on, insulin]), verbo([release]), complemento([vanishes, with, increasing, 'BMI'])].
[sujeto(['The', results, of, 'real-time', quantitative, 'PCR', and, 'Western', blotting, analysis, revealed, an]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([expression, of, 'MAP4K4', in, lung, adenocarcinomas, relative, to, adjacent, 'non-tumorous', lung, tissues, at, both, transcriptional, and, translational, levels])].
[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', our, results, demonstrate, that, elevated, 'MAP4K4', expression, is, closely, associated, with, lung, adenocarcinoma, progression, and]), verbo([has]), complemento([an, independent, prognostic, value, in, predicting, overall, survival, for, patients, with, lung, adenocarcinoma])].
[sujeto([miRNAs]), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, important, for, pancreas, 'development,', 'β-cell', 'proliferation,', insulin, 'secretion,', and, exocytosis])].
[sujeto(['Previously,', we, documented, that, 'microRNA-30d', '(', 'miR-30d),', one, of, miRNAs, 'up-regulated', by, 'glucose,']), verbo([induces]), complemento([insulin, gene, expression, in, pancreatic, 'β-cells'])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, induction, of, insulin, production, by, overexpression, of, 'miR-30d', is, associated, with, increased, expression, of, 'MafA,', a, 'β-cell-specific', transcription, factor])].
[sujeto(['Of', 'interest,', overexpression, of, 'miR-30d']), verbo([prevented]), complemento([the, reduction, in, both, 'MafA', and, insulin, receptor, substrate, 2, '(', 'IRS2)', with, 'TNF-α', exposure])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', we, identified, that, 'mitogen-activated', protein, 4, kinase, 4, '(', 'MAP4K4),', a, 'TNF-α-activated', 'kinase,', is, a, direct]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, 'miR-30d'])].

[sujeto(['Our', data, support, the, notion, that, 'miR-30d', plays, multiple, roles, in]), verbo([activating]), complemento([insulin, transcription, and, protecting, 'β-cell', functions, from, impaired, by, proinflammatory, cytokines, and, underscore, the, concept, that, 'miR-30d', may, represent, a, novel, pharmacological, target, for, diabetes, intervention])].
[sujeto(['This', overexpression, was, significantly, associated, with, larger, tumor, 'size,']), verbo([increased]), complemento([histologic, 'grade,', advanced, tumor, 'stage,', and, intrahepatic, 'metastasis,', as, well, as, worse, overall, survival, and, higher, early, recurrence, rate])].
[sujeto(['Knockdown', of, the, 'MAP4K4', expression, reduced, cell, 'proliferation,', blocked, cell, cycle, at, 'S', 'phase,', and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Obesity', and, type, 2, diabetes, present, partially, overlapping, phenotypes, with, systemic, inflammation, as, a, common, 'feature,', raising, the, hypothesis, that, elevated, cytokine, levels, may, contribute, to, peripheral, insulin, resistance, as, well, as, the]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([beta, cell, functional, mass, observed, in, type, 2, diabetes])].
[sujeto(['In', healthy, 'humans,', 'TNF-alpha', infusion]), verbo([induces]), complemento([skeletal, muscle, insulin, resistance])].
[sujeto(['Prior', exposure, to, 'TNF-alpha', for, 24, h]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['glucose-stimulated', insulin, secretion, from, primary, beta, cells])].
[sujeto(['This', is, associated, with, a]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, 'glucose-stimulated', phosphorylation, of, key, proteins, in, the, insulin, signaling, pathway, including, 'Akt,', 'AS160,', and, other, 'Akt', 'substrates,', 'ERK', as, well, as, the, insulin, receptor])].
[sujeto(['Strikingly,', 'TNF-alpha', treatment]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['IRS-2', protein, level, by, 46, +, /, -, 7, '%', versus, 'control,', although, mRNA, expression, was, unchanged])].
[sujeto(['While', 'TNF-alpha', treatment]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['MAP4K4', mRNA, expression, by, 33, +, /, -, 5, '%', ',', knockdown, of, 'MAP4K4', by, 'siRNA-protected', beta, cells, against, the, detrimental, effects, of, 'TNF-alpha', on, both, insulin, secretion, and, signaling])].
[sujeto(['We', thus, identify, 'MAP4K4', as, a, key, upstream, mediator, of, 'TNF-alpha', action, on, the, beta, 'cell,', making, it, a, potential, therapeutic]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, preservation, of, beta, cell, function, in, type, 2, diabetes])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, transformative, therapeutic, potential, of, short, interfering, 'RNA', '(', 'siRNA)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, stymied, by, a, key, 'obstacle-safe', delivery, to, specified, target, cells, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['Macrophages', are, particularly, attractive]), verbo([targets]), complemento([for, 'RNA', interference, therapy, because, they, promote, pathogenic, inflammatory, responses, in, diseases, such, as, rheumatoid, 'arthritis,', 'atherosclerosis,', inflammatory, bowel, disease, and, diabetes])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, engineering, of, 'beta1,3-D-glucan-encapsulated', siRNA, particles, '(', 'GeRPs)', as, efficient, oral, delivery, vehicles, that, potently, silence, genes, in, mouse, macrophages, in, vitro, and, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', silencing, 'Map4k4', in, macrophages, in, vivo, protected, mice, from, 'lipopolysaccharide-induced', lethality, by]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento(['Tnf-alpha', and, 'interleukin-1beta', production])].
[sujeto(['The', number, of, preadipocytes, able, to, differentiate, to, adipose, cells, was, negatively, correlated, with, both, 'BMI', and, adipocyte, cell, size, of, the, 'donors,', whereas, the, number, of, 'CD133-positive', cells, was, positively, correlated, with, 'BMI,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([an, impaired, differentiation, of, preadipocytes, in, obesity])].
[sujeto(['Cultured', 'preadipocytes,', like, freshly, isolated, mature, 'adipocytes,', from, obese, individuals, had, an]), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, 'mitogen-activated', protein, 4, kinase, 4, '(', 'MAP4K4),', which, is, known, to, inhibit, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', 'receptor-gamma', induction])].
[sujeto(['TNF-alpha,', but, not, 'IL-6', or, 'resistin,']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['Wnt10b,', completely, inhibited, the, normal, differentiation, of, the, 'preadipocytes,', and, instead, induced, a, proinflammatory, and, 'macrophage-like', phenotype, of, the, cells])].
[sujeto(['The', apparent, number, of, preadipocytes, in, the, abdominal, subcutaneous, tissue, that, can, undergo, differentiation, is, reduced, in, obesity, with, enlarged, fat, 'cells,', possibly, because, of]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['MAP4K4', levels])].
[sujeto(['TNF-alpha']), verbo([promoted]), complemento([a, 'macrophage-like', phenotype, of, the, 'preadipocytes,', including, several, macrophage, markers])].
[sujeto(['To', decipher, pathways, impacted, by, 'Ral,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([generated, null, and, hypomorph, alleles, of, the, 'Drosophila', melanogaster, 'Ral', gene])].
[sujeto(['Reduced', 'Ral', expression, in, cells, of, the, sensory, organ, lineage, had, no, effect, on, cell, division, but]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, postmitotic, 'cell-specific', apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Genetic', epistasis, and, immunofluorescence, in, differentiating, sensory, organs]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, 'Ral', activity, suppresses, 'c-Jun', 'N-terminal', kinase, '(', 'JNK)', activation, and, induces, p38, 'mitogen-activated', protein, '(', 'MAP)', kinase, activation])].
[sujeto(['HPK1/GCK-like', kinase, '(', 'HGK),', a, 'MAP', kinase, kinase, kinase, kinase, that, can, drive, 'JNK', 'activation,', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([as, an, 'exocyst-associated', protein, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['The', exocyst, is, a, 'Ral', 'effector,', and, the, epistasis, between, mutants, of, 'Ral', and, of, 'msn,', the, fly, ortholog, of, 'HGK,']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([the, functional, relevance, of, an, 'exocyst/HGK', interaction])].
[sujeto(['Genetic', analysis, also, showed, that, the, exocyst, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, execution, of, 'Ral', function, in, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, in, 'Drosophila', 'Ral', counters, apoptotic, programs, to, support, cell, fate, determination, by]), verbo([acting]), complemento([as, a, negative, regulator, of, 'JNK', activity, and, a, positive, activator, of, p38, 'MAP', kinase])].
[sujeto(['Cell', motility, is, a, complex, biological, 'process,']), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'development,', 'inflammation,', 'homeostasis,', and, pathological, processes, such, as, the, invasion, and, metastatic, spread, of, cancer])].
[sujeto(['A', library, of, 10, ',', 996, small, interfering, 'RNAs', '(']), verbo([targeting]), complemento([5, ',', 234, human, 'genes)', was, screened, for, their, ability, to, block, the, migration, of, a, highly, motile, ovarian, carcinoma, cell, 'line,', 'SKOV-3,', by, using, a, 384, -, well, 'wound-healing', assay, coupled, with, automated, microscopy, and, wound, quantification])].
[sujeto(['Further', studies, of, the, promigratory, role, of, 'MAP4K4', showed, that, the, knockdown, of, this, transcript]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, migration, of, multiple, carcinoma, cell, 'lines,', indicating, a, broad, role, in, cell, motility, and, potently, suppressed, the, invasion, of, 'SKOV-3', cells, in, vitro])].
[sujeto(['The', effect, of, 'MAP4K4', on, cellular, migration, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, mediated, through, 'c-Jun', 'N-terminal', 'kinase,', independent, of, 'AP1', activation, and, downstream, transcription])].
[sujeto(['Accordingly,', small, molecule, inhibition, of, 'c-Jun', 'N-terminal', kinase]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['SKOV-3', cell, 'migration,', underscoring, the, potential, therapeutic, utility, of, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, pathway, inhibition, in, cancer, progression])].
[sujeto(['The', yeast, 'serine/threonine', kinase, 'STE20']), verbo([activates]), complemento([a, signaling, cascade, that, includes, 'STE11', '(', 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, kinase, 'kinase),', 'STE7', '(', 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, 'kinase),', and, 'FUS3/KSS1', '(', 'mitogen-activated', protein, 'kinase)', in, response, to, signals, from, both, 'Cdc42', and, the, heterotrimeric, 'G', proteins, associated, with, transmembrane, pheromone, receptors])].
[sujeto(['Using', degenerate, polymerase, chain, 'reaction,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([isolated, a, human, cDNA, encoding, a, protein, kinase, homologous, to, 'STE20'])].
[sujeto(['This', protein, 'kinase,', designated, 'HPK/GCK-like', kinase, '(', 'HGK),']), verbo([has]), complemento([nucleotide, sequences, that, encode, an, open, reading, frame, of, 1165, amino, acids, with, 11, kinase, subdomains])].
[sujeto(['HGK', was, a, 'serine/threonine', protein, kinase, that, specifically]), verbo([activated]), complemento([the, 'c-Jun', 'N-terminal', kinase, '(', 'JNK)', signaling, pathway, when, transfected, into, 293, 'T', 'cells,', but, it, did, not, stimulate, either, the, extracellular, 'signal-regulated', kinase, or, p38, kinase, pathway])].
[sujeto(['HGK', also]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['AP-1-mediated', transcriptional, activity, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['HGK-induced', 'JNK', activation, was]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, the, 'dominant-negative', 'MKK4', and, 'MKK7', mutants])].
[sujeto(['The', 'dominant-negative', mutant, of, 'TAK1,', but, not, 'MEKK1', or, 'MAPK', upstream, kinase, '(', 'MUK),', strongly]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['HGK-induced', 'JNK', activation])].
[sujeto(['TNF-alpha']), verbo([activated]), complemento(['HGK', in, 293, 'T', 'cells,', as, well, as, the, 'dominant-negative', 'HGK', 'mutants,', inhibited, 'TNF-alpha-induced', 'JNK', activation])].
[sujeto(['These', results, indicate, that, 'HGK,', a, novel, activator, of, the, 'JNK', 'pathway,', may, function, through, 'TAK1,', and, that, the, 'HGK', -, -, &, 'gt;', 'TAK1', -, -, &, 'gt;', 'MKK4,', 'MKK7', -, -, &, 'gt;', 'JNK', kinase, cascade, may]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([the, 'TNF-alpha', signaling, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, mice, with, a, 'T-cell-specific', conditional, knockout, of, 'HGK', '(', 'T-HGK', 'cKO)', develop, systemic, inflammation, and, insulin, resistance])].
[sujeto(['HGK', directly, phosphorylates, 'TRAF2,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, its, lysosomal, degradation, and, subsequent, inhibition, of, 'IL-6', production])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', leptin, receptor, deficiency, in, 'T', cells]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['Th17', differentiation, and, improves, the, insulin, sensitivity, in, 'T-HGK', cKO, 'mice,', which, suggests, that, leptin, cooperates, with, 'IL-6', to, promote, 'Th17', differentiation])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', 'HGK', deficiency]), verbo([induces]), complemento(['TRAF2/IL-6', 'upregulation,', leading, to, 'IL-6/leptin-induced', 'Th17', differentiation, in, adipose, tissue, and, subsequent, insulin, resistance])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([provide]), complemento([insight, into, the, reciprocal, regulation, between, the, immune, system, and, the, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['To', investigate, the, effects, of, 'RNA', interference]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([hepatocyte, progenitor, 'kinase-like', kinase, '(', 'HGK)', in, the, invasion, and, adhesion, of, hepatocellular, carcinoma, '(', 'HCC)', cell, line, 'HepG2'])].
[sujeto(['The', expressions, of, matrix, metalloproteinase, '(', 'MMP)-2,', 'MMP-9', and]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([factor, '(', 'NF)-κB', were, detected, by, 'Western', blotting, assay])].
[sujeto(['The', real, time, 'RT-PCR', and, 'Western', blotting, assay, showed, that, cells, transfected, with, retrovirus]), verbo([mediating]), complemento(['RNAi', targeting, of, 'HGK', '(', 'RV-shHGK)-1', vector, had, the, strongest, inhibition, of, 'HGK', 'protein,', with, an, inhibition, rate, of, 76, '%', ',', and, this, vector, was, used, to, generate, recombinant, retrovirus, 'RV-shHGK-1'])].
[sujeto(['Cell', adhesion, assay, and, 'MTT', assay]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, cell, adhesion, and, growth, of, the, cells, infected, with, 'RV-shHGK-1', were, significantly, lower, than, those, of, the, control, cells, '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')'])].
[sujeto(['The', expressions, of, 'MMP-2,', 'MMP-9', and, 'NF-κB', were]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([in, 'HepG2', cells, infected, with, 'RV-shHGK-1'])].
[sujeto(['Down-regulation', of, 'HGK', can, obviously]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([the, migration, and, invasion, of, 'HepG2', cells, in, vitro])].
[sujeto(['HGK', may, be, a, new, therapeutic]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, treatment, of, 'HCC'])].
[sujeto(['Constitutive', activation, of, 'RhoA-dependent', 'RhoA', kinase, '(', 'ROCK)', signalling, is, known, to]), verbo([promote]), complemento([cellular, transformation, and, the, 'ROCK', inhibitor, 'Y-27632', has, the, ability, to, suppress, focus, formation, of, 'RhoA', transformed, 'NIH3T3', cells])].
[sujeto(['Sixty-four', novel, structural, analogues, of, 'Y27632', were, synthesised, and, tested, for, their, ability, to, persistently]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([the, transformation, of, 'NIH3T3', cells, by, 'Rho', guanidine, exchange, factor, 16, '(', 'ARHGEF16)', or, 'Ras'])].
[sujeto(['Four', 'Y27632', analogues]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([transformed, focus, formation, that, persisted, when, the, compound, was, withdrawn])].
[sujeto(['In', vitro, kinase, inhibitor, profiling, indicated, that, these, compounds, had, reduced, activity, against, 'ROCK', compared, with, 'Y27632,']), verbo([targeting]), complemento([instead, 'Aurora', 'A', '(', 'AURKA),', p38, '(', 'MAPK14)', and, 'Hgk', '(', 'MAP4K4)'])].
[sujeto(['Dye', transfer, analysis, showed, they]), verbo([increased]), complemento([gap, junction, intercellular, communication, '(', 'GJIC)', between, transformed, and, 'non-transformed', cells])].
[sujeto(['These', data, are, the, first, to]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, transient, blockade, of, specific, kinases, can, induce, a, persistent, inhibition, of, 'non-contact', inhibited, transformed, colony, formation, and, can, also, remove, 'pre-formed', colonies])].

[sujeto(['Selection', of, kinase, inhibitors, with, this, property, may, thus]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, novel, strategy, for, cancer, chemoprevention])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([cloned, a, novel, splice, variant, of, 'HGK', from, a, human, tumor, line, and, have, further, identified, a, complex, family, of, 'HGK', splice, variants])].
[sujeto(['We', showed, 'HGK', to, be, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, most, tumor, cell, lines, relative, to, normal, tissue])].

[sujeto(['Expression', of, an, inactive, mutant, of, 'HGK', also]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, 'anchorage-independent', growth, of, cells, yet, had, no, effect, on, proliferation, in, monolayer, culture])].

[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([an, 'RNA', 'interference-based', screen, of, protein, kinases, expressed, in, adipocytes, and, identify, four, negative, regulators, of, 'insulin-responsive', glucose, 'transport:', the, protein, kinases, 'PCTAIRE-1', '(', 'PCTK1),', 'PFTAIRE-1', '(', 'PFTK1),', 'IkappaB', kinase, 'alpha,', and, 'MAP4K4/NIK'])].
[sujeto(['We', characterized, one, of, these, 'hits,', 'MAP4K4/NIK,', and]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, it, is, unique, among, 'mitogen-activated', protein, '(', 'MAP)', kinases, expressed, in, cultured, adipocytes, in, attenuating, hexose, transport])].
[sujeto(['Remarkably,', 'MAP4K4/NIK']), verbo([suppresses]), complemento([expression, of, the, adipogenic, transcription, factors, 'C/EBPalpha,', 'C/EBPbeta,', and, 'PPARgamma', and, of, 'GLUT4', itself, in, these, cells])].
[sujeto(['RNA', 'interference-mediated', depletion, of, 'MAP4K4/NIK', early, in, differentiation]), verbo([enhances]), complemento([adipogenesis, and, triglyceride, 'deposition,', and, even, in, fully, differentiated, adipocytes, its, loss, 'up-regulates', 'GLUT4'])].
[sujeto(['Conversely,', conditions, that]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([adipogenesis, such, as, 'TNF-alpha', treatment, or, depletion, of, 'PPARgamma', markedly, 'up-regulate', 'MAP4K4/NIK', expression, in, cultured, adipocytes])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'TNF-alpha', signaling, to, 'down-regulate', 'GLUT4', is, impaired, in, the, absence, of, 'MAP4K4/NIK,', indicating, that, 'MAP4K4', expression, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, optimal, 'TNF-alpha', action])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, 'MAP4K4/NIK-dependent', signaling, pathway, that, potently, inhibits, 'PPARgamma-responsive', gene, 'expression,', 'adipogenesis,', and, 'insulin-stimulated', glucose, transport])].
[sujeto(['Nck-interacting', 'kinase-like', 'embryo-specific', kinase, '(', 'NESK)', is, a, protein, kinase, that, is, predominantly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, skeletal, muscle, during, the, late, stages, of, mouse, embryogenesis])].
[sujeto(['NESK', belongs, to, the, germinal, center, kinase, '(', 'GCK)', family, and, selectively]), verbo([activates]), complemento([the, 'c-Jun', 'N-terminal', kinase, '(', 'JNK)', pathway, when, overexpressed, in, cultured, cells])].
[sujeto(['Some', members, of, the, 'GCK', family]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, be, proteolytically, cleaved, and, activated, during, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'NESK', is, also, proteolytically, cleaved, during, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Treatment', of, 'NESK-transfected', 'HeLa', cells, with, 'TNF-alpha', in, the, presence, of, cycloheximide, or, with, staurosporine]), verbo([induced]), complemento([proteolytic, cleavage, of, 'NESK'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'N-terminal', fragment, had, less, kinase, activity, than, the, 'full-length', 'NESK', and, did, not]), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, 'JNK', pathway])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', the, 'C-terminal', fragment]), verbo([activated]), complemento([the, 'JNK', pathway, more, strongly, than, the, 'full-length', 'NESK', and, promoted, 'TNF-alpha-induced', apoptotic, cell, death])].
[sujeto(['Misshapen/NIKs-related', kinase, '(', 'MINK)', is, a, member, of, the, germinal, center, family, of, kinases, that, are, homologous, to, the, yeast, sterile, 20, '(', 'Ste20)', kinases, and]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([a, wide, variety, of, cellular, 'processes,', including, cell, 'morphology,', cytoskeletal, 'rearrangement,', and, survival])].
[sujeto([hMINK, beta, is, ubiquitously]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, most, tissues, with, at, least, five, alternatively, spliced, isoforms])].
[sujeto(['Similar', to, 'Nck']), verbo([interacting]), complemento([kinase, '(', 'NIK)', and, 'Traf2', and, 'Nck-interacting', kinase, '(', 'TNIK),', hMINK, beta, moderately, activates, 'c-Jun', 'N-terminal', kinase, '(', 'JNK)', and, associates, with, 'Nck', via, the, intermediate, domain, in, the, yeast, 'two-hybrid', system, and, in, a, glutathione, 'S-transferase', '(', 'GST)', 'pull-down', assay])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', overexpression, of, the, kinase, domain, deleted, and, 'kinase-inactive', mutants, of, hMINK, beta, in, human, fibrosarcoma, 'HT1080', cells]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([cell, 'spreading,', actin, stress, fiber, 'formation,', and, adhesion, to, extracellular, 'matrix,', as, well, as, decreased, cell, motility, and, cell, invasion])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', these, mutants, also]), verbo([promoted]), complemento(['cell-cell', adhesion, in, human, breast, carcinoma, 'MCF7', 'cells,', evidenced, with, cell, growth, in, clusters, and, increased, membrane, localization, of, 'beta-catenin,', a, multifunctional, protein, involved, in, 'E-cadherin-mediated', cell, adhesion])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', hMINK, beta, protein, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, colocalize, with, the, 'Golgi', 'apparatus,', implicating, that, hMINK, beta, might, exert, its, 'functions,', at, least, in, 'part,', through, the, modulation, of, intracellular, protein, transport])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, hMINK, beta, plays, an, important, role, in, cytoskeleton, 'reorganization,', cell, 'adhesion,', and, cell, motility])].
[sujeto(['To', better, understand, vascular, abnormality, through, the, molecular, alterations, resulting, from, 'HHE', accumulation, in, aging, 'processes,', we, set, out, to, determine, whether, 'up-regulation', of, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'MAPK)', by, 'HHE', is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([through, nuclear, factor, kappa, 'B', '(', 'NF-kappaB)', activation, in, endothelial, cells])].
[sujeto(['HHE']), verbo([induced]), complemento(['NF-kappaB', activation, by, inhibitor, of, kappaB, '(', 'IkappaB)', phosphorylation, via, the, 'IkappaB', kinase, '(', 'IKK)/NF-kappaB', inducing, kinase, '(', 'NIK)', pathway])].
[sujeto(['HHE']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, activity, of, p38, 'MAPK', and, extracellular, signal, regulated, kinase, '(', 'ERK),', but, not, 'c-jun', 'NH(2)-terminal', 'kinase,', indicating, that, p38, 'MAPK', and, 'ERK', are, closely, involved, in, 'HHE-induced', 'NF-kappaB', transactivation])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, strongly]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'HHE', induces, 'NF-kappaB', activation, through, 'IKK/NIK', pathway, 'and/or', p38, 'MAPK', and, 'ERK', activation, associated, with, oxidative, stress, in, endothelial, cells])].
[sujeto(['Promoter', analysis, of, the, 'QR', gene, in, oltipraztreated, cells]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([the, involvement, of, both, the, 'AP-1', and, 'NF-kappaB', elements, in, the, response])].
[sujeto(['Oltipraz', treatment, of, both, 'HCT116', and, 'HT29', cells, results, in, the, induction, of, proteins]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, both, pathways, of, 'NF-kappaB', 'activation,', including, 'p65,', 'IkappaB', kinase, alpha, '(', 'IKKalpha),', 'IkappaB', kinase, beta, '(', 'IKKbeta),', and, 'NF-kappaB-inducing', kinase, '(', 'NIK)'])].
[sujeto(['IkappaBalpha', total, protein, levels, were, 'unchanged,', but, phosphorylation, of, the, inhibitor, was, also]), verbo([induced]), complemento([in, both, lines])].
[sujeto(['Electrophoretic', mobility, shift, assay, '(', 'EMSA)', analysis, confirmed, induction, of, protein]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, a, consensus, 'NF-kappaB', 'element,', and, transcriptional, activation, was, further, confirmed, using, a, reporter, construct])].
[sujeto(['Transcriptional', activation, of, 'QR', was]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner, by, 'dominant-negative', 'NF-kappaB', in, both, cell, lines])].
[sujeto(['The', molecular, mechanism, that]), verbo([triggers]), complemento(['IKK', activation, in, response, to, oltipraz, was, also, examined, using, inhibitory, constructs, of, 'NIK', and, 'mitogen-activated', protein, 'kinase/extracellular', 'signal-regulated', kinase, kinase, kinase, 3, '(', 'MEKK3)'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, both, 'MEKK3', and, 'NIK', exert, effects, on, 'IKKalpha/beta', 'activation,', but, through, different, pathways])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', the, 'receptor-interacting', protein, '(', 'RIP)', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, interact, strongly, with, 'MEKK3', during, 'oltipraz-induced', 'NF-kappaB', 'signaling,', implying, a, role, for, tumor, necrosis, factor, receptor, signaling, in, the, action, of, oltipraz])].
[sujeto(['RANTES', '(', short, for, &, 'quot;regulated', upon, 'activation,', normal, 'T', cell]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([and, 'secreted&quot;)', is, a, chemoattractant, cytokine, '(', 'chemokine)', important, in, the, infiltration, of, 'T', lymphocytes, and, monocytes])].
[sujeto([pylori]), verbo([induced]), complemento(['RANTES', mRNA, expression, and, an, increase, in, luciferase, activity, in, cells, which, were, transfected, with, a, luciferase, reporter, construct, derived, from, the, 'RANTES', 'promoter,', in, gastric, epithelial, 'cells,', indicating, that, the, induction, of, 'RANTES', production, occurred, at, the, transcriptional, level])].
[sujeto(['Transfection', of, 'kinase-deficient', mutants, of, 'I', kappa, 'B', kinase, '(', 'IKK)', and, 'NF-kappa', 'B-inducing', kinase, '(', 'NIK)']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['H'])].

[sujeto(['The', nucleating, activity, of, the, 'Arp2/3', complex]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([the, assembly, of, branched, actin, filaments, that, drive, plasma, membrane, protrusion, in, migrating, cells])].
[sujeto(['Arp2/3', complex]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'nucleation-promoting', factors, of, the, 'WASP', and, 'WAVE', families, was, previously, thought, to, be, sufficient, to, increase, nucleating, activity])].
[sujeto(['We', show, in, mammary, carcinoma, cells, that, mutant, 'Arp2', lacking, phosphorylation, assembled, with, endogenous, subunits, and, dominantly]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([actin, filament, assembly, and, membrane, protrusion])].
[sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'Nck-interacting', kinase, '(', 'NIK),', a, 'MAP4K4,', binds, and, directly, phosphorylates, the, 'Arp2', 'subunit,', which, increases, the, nucleating, activity, of, the, 'Arp2/3', complex])].
[sujeto(['In', 'cells,', 'NIK', kinase, activity, was, necessary, for]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['Arp2', phosphorylation, and, plasma, membrane, protrusion, in, response, to, epidermal, growth, factor])].
[sujeto(['NIK', is, the, first, kinase, shown, to, phosphorylate, and]), verbo([increase]), complemento([the, activity, of, the, 'Arp2/3', 'complex,', and, our, findings, suggest, that, it, integrates, growth, factor, regulation, of, actin, filament, dynamics])].
[sujeto(['We', demonstrate, that, p38, 'MAP', kinase, and, a, 'p38-interacting', protein, '(', 'p38IP)', are, critically]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, downregulation, of, 'E-cadherin', during, gastrulation])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, p38IP]), verbo([binds]), complemento([directly, to, p38, and, is, required, for, p38, activation, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', both, p38, and, p38IP, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'E-cadherin', downregulation, during, gastrulation])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', p38]), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['E-cadherin', protein, expression, downstream, from, 'NCK-interacting', kinase, '(', 'NIK)', and, independently, of, the, regulation, of, transcription, by, 'Fibroblast', 'Growth', 'Factor', '(', 'Fgf)', signaling, and, 'Snail'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, demonstrated, that, nuclear, 'factor-inducing', kinase, '(', 'NIK)', plays, a, crucial, role, in, osteopontin, '(', 'OPN)-induced', 'mitogen-activated', protein, 'kinase/I', kappa, 'B', alpha, 'kinase-dependent', nuclear, factor, kappa, 'B', '(', 'NF', kappa, 'B)-mediated', promatrix, 'metalloproteinase-9', activation, '(', 'Rangaswami,', 'H'])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, molecular, 'mechanism(s)', by, which, 'OPN']), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['NIK/MEKK1-dependent', activating, 'protein-1', '(', 'AP-1)-mediated', promatrix, 'metalloproteinase-9', activation, and, whether, 'JNK1', plays, any, role, in, regulating, both, these, pathways, that, control, the, cell, motility, are, not, well, defined])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'OPN', induces, alpha, v, beta3, 'integrin-mediated', 'MEKK1', phosphorylation, and, 'MEKK1-dependent', 'JNK1', phosphorylation, and, activation])].
[sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'NIK']), verbo([enhances]), complemento(['OPN-induced', 'c-Jun', 'expression,', whereas, overexpressed, 'NIK', had, no, role, in, 'OPN-induced', 'JNK1', phosphorylation, and, activation])].
[sujeto(['OPN']), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([both, 'NIK', and, 'MEKK1-dependent', 'c-Jun', 'expression,', leading, to, 'AP-1', 'activation,', whereas, 'NIK-dependent', 'AP-1', activation, is, independent, of, 'JNK1'])].

[sujeto(['OPN']), verbo([stimulates]), complemento([tumor, 'growth,', and, the, levels, of, 'c-Jun,', 'AP-1,', urokinase, type, plasminogen, 'activator,', and, 'MMP-9', were, higher, in, 'OPN-induced', tumor, compared, with, control])].
[sujeto(['To', our, knowledge, this, is, first]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'OPN', induces, 'NIK/MEKK1-mediated', 'JNK1-dependent/independent', 'AP-1-mediated', 'pro-MMP-9', activation, and, regulates, the, negative, crosstalk, between, 'NIK/ERK1/2', and, 'MEKK1/JNK1', pathways, that, ultimately, controls, the, cell, 'motility,', 'invasiveness,', and, tumor, growth])].
[sujeto(['Through', interactions, with, molecular, partners, at, cell, 'junctions,', they]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, connection, between, the, 'ECM', and, the, cytoskeleton, and, regulate, many, aspects, of, cell, behavior])].
[sujeto(['A', number, of, 'integrin-associated', molecules]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, 'identified;', 'however,', in, many, 'cases,', their, function, and, role, in, the, animal, remain, to, be, clarified])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, the, 'Nck-interacting', kinase, '(', 'NIK),', a, member, of, the, 'STE20/germinal', center, kinase, '(', 'GCK)', 'family,', as, a, partner, for, the, beta1A, integrin, cytoplasmic, domain])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, 'NIK', is, expressed, in, the, nervous, system, and, other, tissues, in, mouse, embryos, and, colocalizes, with, actin, and, beta1, integrin, in, cellular, protrusions, in, transfected, cells])].
[sujeto(['To', demonstrate, the, functional, significance, of, this, 'interaction,', we, used, 'Caenorhabditis', 'elegans,', since, it]), verbo([has]), complemento([only, one, beta, '(', 'PAT-3)', integrin, 'chain,', two, alpha, '(', 'INA-1', and, 'PAT-2)', integrin, 'chains,', and, a, 'well-conserved', 'NIK', ortholog, '(', 'MIG-15)'])].
[sujeto(['Neuronal-specific', 'RNA', interference, against, 'mig-15', or, 'pat-3']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, similar, axonal, 'defects,', thus, showing, that, both, 'mig-15', and, 'pat-3', act, cell, autonomously, in, neurons])].

[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', cumin, essential, oil, '(', 'CuEO)', extracted, from, seeds, was, employed, to, investigate, the, 'anti-inflammatory', effects, in, 'lipopolysaccharide-', '(', 'LPS-)']), verbo([stimulated]), complemento(['RAW', 264.7, cells, and, the, underlying, mechanisms])].

[sujeto(['JNK', activity, was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([after, 3, h, of, palmitate, and, high, glucose, exposure, associated, with, increased, expression, of, 'ER', and, mitochondrial, stress, markers])].
[sujeto(['JNK1', shRNA]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['INS1', cells, showed, increased, apoptosis, and, cleaved, caspase, 9, and, 3, compared, to, 'non-sense', shRNA, expressing, control, 'INS1', cells, when, exposed, to, palmitate, and, high, glucose, associated, with, increased, 'CHOP', 'expression,', 'ROS', formation, and, 'Puma', mRNA, expression])].

[sujeto(['However,', the, widely, used, molecular, mechanics, 'Poisson-Boltzmann', surface, area, '(', 'MM/PBSA)', method, for]), verbo([binding]), complemento([energy, calculation, does, not, explicitly, take, account, of, water, molecules, that, mediate, key, 'protein-ligand', interactions])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([developed, a, protocol, to, include, water, molecules, that, mediate, 'ligand-protein', interactions, as, part, of, the, protein, structure, in, calculation, of, 'MM/PBSA', binding, energies, '(', a, method, we, refer, to, as, 'water-MM/PBSA)', for, a, series, of, 'JNK3', kinase, inhibitors])].
[sujeto(['Improved', correlation, between, 'water-MM/PBSA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([energies, and, experimental, 'IC50', values, was, obtained, compared, to, that, obtained, from, classical, 'MM/PBSA', binding, energy])].

[sujeto(['Although', arrestins]), verbo([bind]), complemento([dozens, of, 'non-receptor', 'partners,', the, interaction, sites, for, most, signaling, proteins, remain, unknown])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, identification, of, 'arrestin-3', elements, involved, in, binding, 'MAP', kinase, 'JNK3α2'])].
[sujeto(['Using', purified, 'JNK3α2', and, 'MBP', fusions, containing, separated, 'arrestin-3', domains, and, peptides, exposed, on, the, 'non-receptor-binding', surface, of, 'arrestin-3', we, showed, that, both, domains]), verbo([bind]), complemento(['JNK3α2', and, identified, one, element, on, the, 'N-domain', and, two, on, the, 'C-domain', that, directly, interact, with, 'JNK3α2'])].

[sujeto(['The', identification, of, elements]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'protein-protein', interactions, paves, the, way, to, targeted, redesign, of, signaling, proteins, to, modulate, cell, signaling, in, desired, ways])].
[sujeto(['The', tools, and, methods, developed, here, to, elucidate, the, molecular, mechanism, of, 'arrestin-3', interactions, with, 'JNK3α2', are, suitable, for, mapping, of, 'arrestin-3', sites]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, interactions, with, other, partners])].

[sujeto(['All', four, vertebrate, arrestin, subtypes]), verbo([bind]), complemento(['JNK3,', but, only, 'arrestin-3', serves, as, a, 'scaffold,', promoting, 'JNK3', activation, in, intact, cells])].

[sujeto(['In', all, 'cases,', 'arrestin-3']), verbo([acts]), complemento([by, bringing, the, kinases, 'together:', 'JNK', phosphorylation, shows, biphasic, dependence, on, 'arrestin-3,', being, enhanced, at, lower, and, suppressed, at, supraoptimal, concentrations])].

[sujeto(['Mitogen-activated', protein, '(', 'MAP)', kinases, are, 'proline-directed,', 'serine/threonine', kinases, that]), verbo([respond]), complemento([to, a, variety, of, extracellular, signals])].

[sujeto(['Recognition', of, viral, nucleic, acids]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, type, 'I', and, type, 'III', 'IFN', gene, expression, and, activation, of, host, antiviral, responses])].

[sujeto(['P38', 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'MAPK)', is, a, 'pro-apoptotic', and, 'pro-inflammatory', protein, that, is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, response, to, cellular, stress])].
[sujeto(['While', p38, is, known, to, be]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, response, to, cerebral, 'ischemia,', the, precise, role, of, p38, and, its, isoforms, in, 'ischemia-induced', neuronal, apoptosis, remains, unclear])].

[sujeto(['Off-target', interactions, of, a, popular, immunosuppressant, 'Cyclosporine', 'A', '(', 'CSA)', with, several, proteins, besides, its, molecular, 'target,', cyclophilin, 'A,', are, implicated, in, the, activation, of, signaling, pathways, that]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, numerous, side, effects, of, this, drug])].
[sujeto(['Using', structural, human, proteome, and, a, novel, algorithm, for, inverse, ligand]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['prediction,', 'ILbind,', we, determined, a, comprehensive, set, of, 100, +, putative, partners, of, 'CSA'])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([on, a, quantitative, study, of, small, molecule, binding, kinetics, on, protein, microarrays, with, 'plasmonic-based', electrochemical, impedance, microscopy, '(', 'P-EIM)'])].
[sujeto(['Using', 'P-EIM,', we, measured]), verbo([binding]), complemento([kinetics, and, affinity, between, small, molecule, drugs, '(', imatinib, and, 'SB202190)', and, their, target, proteins, '(', kinases, 'Abl1', and, 'p38-α)'])].
