[sujeto(['Our', observations]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, mechanism, by, which, 'IL-1alpha', or, 'IL-1beta', induces, 'IL-6', may, be, mediated, through, increases, in, 'LYT-10', mRNA, and, protein, levels, as, well, as, increases, in, expression, of, other, transcription, factors, '(', 'NFkappaB1,', 'p65,', and, 'NF-IL6),', in, addition, to, the, known, ability, of, 'IL-1', to, 'post-translationally', activate, 'NF-kappaB'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, a, novel, human, gene, on, chromosome, 10, q24, located, contiguously, to, the, 3, '\'', end, of, the, 'NFKB2/lyt-10', gene, in, a, tail, to, tail, arrangement])].
[sujeto(['Northern', blot, analysis, of, a, panel, of, 'RNAs', from, normal, human, tissues, using, the, 'PSD', cDNA, as, probe, revealed, the, presence, of, three, different, 'tissue-specific', transcripts, of, approximately, 4.3, ',', 2.3, ',', and, 1.8, 'kb,', the, longest, of, which, is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([only, in, brain])].
[sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'PSD', gene, may, code, for, a, protein, related, to, a, recently, identified, protein, family, containing, both, the, 'Sec7', and, the, 'PH', domains, thought, to, be, involved, in, signaling, transduction, processes])].
[sujeto(['Rearrangements', of, the, 'NFKB-2', locus]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, the, production, of, 3, '\'', truncated, 'NFKB-2', proteins, are, recurrently, found, in, lymphoid, 'neoplasms,', particularly, cutaneous, lymphomas])].
[sujeto(['Such', mutant, 'NFKB-2', proteins]), verbo([have]), complemento([lost, the, ability, to, repress, transcription, that, is, typical, of, 'NFKB-2', subunit, 'p52,', and, function, as, constitutive, transcriptional, activators])].
[sujeto(['To', verify, whether, the, expression, of, abnormal, 'NFKB-2', proteins, can]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, malignant, transformations, in, mammalian, 'cells,', we, transfected, human, lymphoblastoid, cell, lines, and, murine, fibroblasts, '(', 'Balb/3T3)', with, expression, vectors, carrying, the, cDNAs, coding, for, normal, 'NFKB-2p52,', 'Lyt-10C', alpha, or, 'LB40', 'proteins,', which, are, representative, of, the, abnormal, types, found, in, lymphoma, cases])].
[sujeto(['The', expression, of, both, normal, and, mutant, 'NFKB-2', proteins]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, lethal, effect, on, lymphoblastoid, cells, and, a, cytotoxic, effect, was, also, observed, in, murine, fibroblasts])].
[sujeto(['The', fibroblast, cell, lines]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['Lyt-10C', alpha, or, 'LB40,', but, not, those, expressing, normal, 'NFKB-2p52,', were, capable, of, forming, colonies, in, soft, agar])].
[sujeto(['Injection', of, the, 'Lyt-10C', 'alpha-transfected', 'Balb', cells, in, 'SCID', mice]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, tumor, formation, in, all, of, the, 'animals,', whereas, no, tumors, were, observed, in, the, mice, injected, with, control, or, 'NFKB-2p52-transfected', 'cells,', thus, indicating, that, abnormal, 'NFKB-2', protein, expression, is, tumorigenic, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, show, that, mutant, 'NFKB-2', proteins, can]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, the, transformed, 'phenotype,', and, support, the, hypothesis, that, alterations, in, 'NFKB-2', genes, may, play, a, role, in, lymphomagenesis])].
[sujeto(['NF-kappa', 'B', transcription, factors]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([the, expression, of, a, variety, of, genes, involved, in, immune, responses, and, cell, growth])].
[sujeto(['Three', 'NF-kappa', 'B', 'proteins,', 'p65/RelA,', 'RelB,', and, 'c-rel/Rel,']), verbo([have]), complemento([high, transactivating, potential, in, addition, to, their, 'DNA', binding, activity])].
[sujeto(['Two', 'subunits,', 'NF-kappa', 'B1p50', and, 'NF-kappa', 'B2p52,', coded, respectively, by, the, 'NFKB1', and, 'NFKB2', 'genes,', may, only]), verbo([have]), complemento(['DNA', binding, activity])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', p50, and, p52, subunits, are]), verbo([translated]), complemento([as, 'precursors,', respectively, p105, and, 'p100,', which, can, be, processed, into, the, mature, active, forms, by, the, removal, of, their, 'carboxy-terminal', ankyrin, domain])].
[sujeto(['The', five, proteins, share, a, homologous, 'amino-terminal', domain, '(', rel, 'domain)']), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'DNA', 'binding,', 'dimerization,', nuclear, 'transport,', and, binding, of, regulatory, subunits])].
[sujeto(['All', members, form, 'homo-', and, heterodimeric, complexes, with, different, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([specificity, and, transactivating, potential])].
[sujeto(['Structural', alterations, of, some, members, of, the, 'NF-kappa', 'B', gene, family]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, observed, in, lymphoid, malignancies])].
[sujeto(['In', 'particular,', the, 'NFKB2', 'gene,', localized, on, chromosome, 10, 'q24,', represents, a, candidate, 'proto-oncogene,', since, it]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, found, rearranged, in, certain, types, of, lymphoma, and, more, commonly, in, cutaneous, lymphoma])].
[sujeto(['Rearrangements', cluster, within, the, 'carboxy-terminal', ankyrin, domain, of, the, 'NFKB2', gene]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, the, production, of, 'carboxy-terminally', truncated, proteins, 'which,', in, some, 'cases,', are, fused, to, heterologous, protein, domains])].
[sujeto(['Experimental', data, showed, that, these, abnormal, proteins, are, constitutively, localized, in, the, 'nucleus,']), verbo([have]), complemento([lost, the, transcriptional, repressor, functions, typical, of, normal, 'NF-kappa', 'B2p52', and, may, be, capable, of, transactivation, activity])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, abnormal, 'NFKB2', proteins, may, contribute, to, lymphomagenesis, by, altering, the, 'NF-kappa', 'B', 'system,', both, quantitatively, and, 'qualitatively,', and, leading, to, the, activation, of, specific, subsets, of, kappa, 'B-controlled', genes])].
[sujeto(['Clonal', rearrangements, of, 'Ig', genes, or, oncogenes, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, 25, of, the, 52, 'CBCLs'])].
[sujeto(['Overall,', our, data, indicate, that, '(', 1, ')', clonal, rearrangement, of, 'Ig', genes, is, frequently, undetectable, by, means, of, 'Southern', blot, in, 'CBCLs', '(', 60, '%', ')', ;, '(', 2, ')', genetic, lesions, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, a, limited, but, significant, fraction, of, primary, 'CLs', showing, a, molecular, marker, of, clonality, '(', 13, /, 62, ;, 20, '%', ')', ;, and, '(', 3, ')', rearrangements, of, the, 'bcl-1,', 'bcl-2,', or, 'bcl-6', 'loci,', associated, with, specific, subsets, of, nodal, lymphoid, 'neoplasias,', are, rarely, observed, in, 'CBCLs'])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', our, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'tal-1', gene, deletions, may, play, a, pathogenetic, role, in, 'non-acute', 'T-cell', malignancies, and, 'that,', in, the, context, of, lymphoid, 'malignancies,', 'CLs', may, represent, a, favorable, target, for, the, possible, oncogenic, potential, of, the, 'NFKB2/lyt-10', gene])].
[sujeto(['In', order, to, clarify, the, transcriptional, regulation, of, the, 'NFKB2', gene, '(', 'lyt-10,', 'NF-kappa', 'Bp100),', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([characterized, the, structure, and, function, of, its, promoter, regions])].
[sujeto(['Consensus']), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, for, transcription, 'factors,', including, 'SP1,', 'AP1', and, putative, 'NF-kappa', 'B', '(', kappa, 'B', 'sites),', were, found, upstream, of, each, exon])].
[sujeto(['In', 'particular,', six, kappa, 'B', sites, were, 'identified,', all, but, one, of, them, capable, of]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['NF-kappa', 'B', complexes, in, vitro])].
[sujeto(['Transfection', in, 'HeLa', cells, of, plasmids, containing, 'P1', and, 'P2', sequences, linked, to, a, chloramphenicol, acetyltransferase, reporter, gene, indicated, that, both, 'P1', and, 'P2', can]), verbo([act]), complemento([independently, as, promoters])].

[sujeto(['In', our, analysis, four, cases, of, 'CBCL', were]), verbo([found]), complemento([rearranged, for, 'bcl-2', and, two, for, the, 'bcl-1', locus])].

[sujeto(['No', rearrangements, of, 'c-myc', oncogene, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, 'CBCL'])].
[sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, in, primary, 'CBCL', 'bcl-2', oncogenes, and, 'bcl-1', locus, are, rarely, involved])].
[sujeto(['The', occurrence, of, p53, mutation, in, a, patient, affected, by, mycosis, fungoides, in, tumoral, stage, may, represent, an, involvement, of, p53, gene, in, tumor, progression, of, 'CTCL,', a]), verbo([finding]), complemento([observed, in, several, types, of, human, cancer])].
[sujeto(['The', 'NFKB2', gene, represents, a, candidate, 'proto-oncogene,', since, it]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, found, to, be, involved, in, a, chromosomal, translocation, 't(10;14)(q24;q32)', in, one, case, of, 'B-cell', lymphoma, and, in, gene, rearrangements, in, various, types, of, lymphoid, malignancies])].
[sujeto(['To', elucidate, the, structural, and, functional, consequences, of, 'NFKB2', 'rearrangements,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, molecular, characterization, of, three, novel, rearranged, 'NFKB2', genes, in, lymphoid, tumors])].
[sujeto(['In', one, case, of, multiple, myeloma, '(', 'MM),', cloning, and, sequencing, analysis, of, reciprocal, breakpoint, sites, showed, that, they, occurred, within, intron, 15, of, the, 'NFKB2', gene, and]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, the, complete, deletion, of, the, 3, '\'', portion, of, the, gene, coding, for, the, ankyrin, domain])].
[sujeto(['Fluorescent', in, situ, hybridization, '(', 'FISH)', analysis, showed, that, the, novel, regions]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, 'NFKB2', rearrangement, originated, from, chromosome, 7, 'q34,', thus, implying, the, occurrence, of, a, 't(7;10)(q34;q24)', reciprocal, chromosomal, translocation])].
[sujeto(['In', one, case, of, 'T-cell', cutaneous, lymphoma, '(', 'CTCL)', and, in, one, of, 'B-cell', chronic, lymphocytic, leukemia, '(', 'B-CLL),', 'NFKB2', rearrangements, 'occurred,', 'respectively,', within, exons, 18, and, 20, of, the, gene, and]), verbo([involved]), complemento([recombinations, with, distinct, regions, of, chromosome, 10, q24])].
[sujeto(['Molecular', analysis]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, these, rearrangements, may, occur, as, a, consequence, of, small, internal, chromosomal, deletions])].
[sujeto(['In', both, of, these, 'cases,', the, rearrangements]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, specific, 'carboxy-terminal', truncations, of, 'NFKB2', generating, abnormal, transcripts, that, coded, for, proteins, lacking, portions, of, the, ankyrin, domain])].
[sujeto(['These', proteins, localize, in, the, 'nucleus,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([their, constitutive, activation, in, vivo])].

[sujeto(['NF-kappa', 'B', is, an, inducible, transcription, factor, that]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, expression, of, numerous, genes, involved, in, immune, and, inflammation, responses, and, in, cellular, growth, control])].
[sujeto(['This', heterodimeric, protein, was, thought, to, be, primarily, responsible, for, transcriptional, regulation, of]), verbo([target]), complemento([genes])].
[sujeto(['However,', recent, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([led, to, the, identification, of, other, kappa, 'B', binding, proteins, such, as, 'c-Rel,', 'RelB', and, p52, '(', 'NFKB2/lyt-10)', although, their, role, in, gene, regulation, has, been, less, clear])].
[sujeto(['Here,', using, gel, mobility, shift, assays, as, well, as, a, highly, sensitive, 'DNA-protein', crosslinking, 'assay,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, for, the, existence, of, multiple, tumor, necrosis, factor, '(', 'TNF)-', inducible, kappa, 'B', binding, complexes, containing, various, members, of, the, 'NF-kappa', 'B/Rel', 'family,', namely, p50, and, p65, as, well, as, the, 'c-Rel', and, p52, oncoproteins])].

[sujeto(['The', 'NFKB-2', gene, is, a, candidate, 'proto-oncogene', since, it, is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'lymphoma-associated', chromosomal, aberrations])].
[sujeto(['In', order, to]), verbo([gain]), complemento([insight, into, the, physiological, function, and, role, in, tumorigenesis, of, 'NFKB-2,', we, have, analysed, its, mechanism, of, expression, and, role, in, transcriptional, regulation])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento(['that,', contrary, to, previous, 'studies,', a, single, 3.2, kb, mRNA, species, and, its, 100, kD, '(', 'p100)', primary, translation, product, is, detectable, in, all, cell, types, tested])].
[sujeto(['NFKB-2', p52, differs, from, 'NFKB-1p50', in, its, differential, affinity, for, kappa, 'B', 'sequences:', by, itself, it]), verbo([binds]), complemento(['H2/HLA-kappa', 'B', sites, more, efficiently, than, 'HIV/IgK-kappa', 'B', 'sites,', while, it, can, bind, both, sites, efficiently, when, complexed, with, 'Rel-A(p65)'])].
[sujeto(['Transient', 'co-transfection', of, expression, and, reporter, plasmids, in, cells, devoid, of, endogenous, 'NF-kappa', 'B', activity, showed, that, p52]), verbo([has]), complemento([no, intrinsic, transcriptional, activation, 'capabilities:', it, can, stimulate, 'Rel-A(p65)-driven', transcription, by, formation, of, 'p65/p52', 'heterodimers,', 'whereas,', 'overexpressed,', it, 'down-regulates', 'p65-dependent', transcription, by, formation, of, inactive, 'p52/p52', homodimers])].

[sujeto(['NF-kappa', 'B', is, an, important, transcription, factor]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([expression, of, genes, involved, in, immune, 'function,', 'inflammation,', and, cellular, growth, control])].

[sujeto(['Here,', we, uncovered, a, role, of, the, 'p97-Npl4-Ufd1', complex, in]), verbo([mediating]), complemento(['p100-to-p52', processing, and, therefore, positively, regulating, the, alternative, 'NF-κB', pathway])].

[sujeto(['Here', we, show, specific]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'GMDP', to, recombinant, 'YB-1', protein, and, subcellular, colocalization, of, 'YB-1', and, 'GMDP'])].

[sujeto(['Our', 'systems-level', analyses, identified, a, duration, code, that, instructs, stimulus, specific, crosstalk, between, 'TLR4-activated', canonical, 'NF-κB', pathway, and, 'lymphotoxin-β', receptor, '(', 'LTβR)']), verbo([induced]), complemento(['non-canonical', 'NF-κB', signaling])].

[sujeto(['In', 'sum,', our, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, signal, integration, via, the, pleiotropic, 'NF-κB', system, enables, tissue, microenvironment, derived, cues, in, calibrating, physiological, responses])].
[sujeto(['Pyruvate', dehydrogenase, kinase, 4, '(', 'PDK4),', a, mammalian, mitochondrial, serine, kinase]), verbo([has]), complemento([emerged, as, an, interesting, candidate, for, diabetes, therapy])].

[sujeto(['This', research, outlines, the, utilization, of, bioinformatics, tools, such, as, 'Interweaver,', 'ClustalW', and, 'Protein', 'Structure', 'Visualizer,', in, order, to, predict, proteins, that, potentially]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'PDK4', and, possibly, regulate, its, activity])].

[sujeto(['These', amino, acids, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, located, in, the, region, of, 'PDK4', which, is, known, to, bind, protein, substrates, of, 'PDK4', and, may, be, accessible, to, other, proteins, as, well])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, were, very, interesting, as, 'PDK4']), verbo([has]), complemento([not, previously, been, associated, with, apoptosis, and, this, could, be, the, link, between, apoptosis, and, insulin, resistance])].
[sujeto(['The', results, showed, that, these, factors]), verbo([induced]), complemento([apoptosis, in, a, concentration, dependent, manner, and, suppressed, 'PDK4', mRNA, levels])].

[sujeto(['Ser/Thr', kinase, 'NIK', '(', 'NF-κB-inducing', 'kinase)']), verbo([mediates]), complemento([the, activation, of, the, noncanonical, 'NF-κB2', 'pathway,', and, it, plays, an, important, role, in, regulating, immune, cell, development, and, liver, homeostasis])].
[sujeto(['NIK', levels, are, extremely, low, in, quiescent, cells, due, to, 'ubiquitin/proteasome-mediated', 'degradation,', and, cytokines]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento(['NIK', activation, through, increasing, 'NIK', 'stability;', 'however,', regulation, of, 'NIK', stability, is, not, fully, understood])].
[sujeto(['The', 'U-box', domain, contains, ubiquitin, 'E3', ligase, activity, that]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([ubiquitination, of, 'CHIP-bound', partners])].

[sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'CHIP/TRAF3/NIK', interactions, recruit, 'NIK', to, 'E3', ligase, complexes, for, ubiquitination, and, 'degradation,', thus, maintaining, 'NIK', at, low, levels])].
[sujeto(['The', 'IgM', 'FcR', '(', 'FcμR)']), verbo([promotes]), complemento(['B', cell, 'survival,', but, the, molecular, mechanism, remains, largely, unknown])].
[sujeto(['We', show, using, 'FcμR(-/-)', and, 'wild-type', mice, that, 'FcμR', specifically]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['B', cell, survival, induced, by, 'BCR', 'cross-linking', with, 'F(ab\')2-anti-IgM', 'Abs', while, having, no, effect, on, survival, when, the, 'B', cells, were, activated, by, 'CD40', ligation, or, 'LPS', stimulation])].

[sujeto(['Mouse', models, of, 'Helicobacter-induced', gastric, cancer, and, 'colitis-associated', colorectal, cancer]), verbo([have]), complemento([demonstrated, that, classical, 'NF-κB', signalling, is, an, important, regulator, of, these, processes])].

[sujeto(['Besides', its, action, as, an, 'oncoprotein,', 'Bcl-3']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, have, both, proinflammatory, and, 'anti-inflammatory', functions, depending, on, the, 'cell-type', affected])].
[sujeto([45, :, 1059, -, 1068, ']']), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'Bcl-3', inhibits, the, production, of, the, proinflammatory, chemokines, 'CXCL9', and, 'CXCL10', in, 'keratinocytes,', thereby, restricting, the, influx, of, 'CD8(+)', effector, 'T', cells, in, a, mouse, model, of, allergic, contact, dermatitis])].

[sujeto(['Bcl-3']), verbo([has]), complemento([tumorigenic, 'potential,', is, critical, in, host, defense, of, 'pathogens,', and, has, been, reported, to, ameliorate, or, exacerbate, 'inflammation,', depending, on, disease, model])].

[sujeto(['We', confirm, previous, findings, that, mutations, near, the, 'C-terminus', of, 'NFKB2']), verbo([cause]), complemento([combined, endocrine, and, immunodeficiencies])].
[sujeto(['The', lack, of, an, observable, endocrine, phenotype, in, 'Lym1', mice]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, the, endocrine, component, of, 'DAVID', syndrome, is, either, not, due, to, a, direct, role, of, 'NFKB', pathways, on, pituitary, 'development,', or, else, that, human, and, mouse, pituitary, development, differ, in, its, requirements, for, 'NFKB', pathway, function])].
[sujeto(['BAFF,', an, activator, of, the, noncanonical, 'NFκB', 'pathway,']), verbo([provides]), complemento([critical, survival, signals, during, 'B', cell, maturation, and, contributes, to, 'B', cell, proliferation])].

[sujeto(['Our', studies, emphasize, the, importance, of, p100, in, determining, distinct, 'NFκB', network, states, during, 'B', cell, 'biology,', which]), verbo([causes]), complemento(['BAFF', to, have, 'context-dependent', functional, consequences])].
[sujeto(['Using', 'mass-spectrometry-based', quantitative, analysis, of, noncanonical, 'LTβR-induced', 'signaling,', we, demonstrate, that, stimulation]), verbo([induces]), complemento([simultaneous, processing, of, both, p100, and, p105])].
[sujeto(['The', precursors, not, only, form, 'hetero-oligomers', but, also]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, the, 'ATPase', 'VCP/p97,', and, their, induced, proteolysis, strictly, depends, on, the, signal, response, domain, '(', 'SRD)', of, 'p100,', suggesting, that, the, 'SRD-targeting', proteolytic, machinery, acts, in, cis, and, in, trans])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([developed, quantitative, mathematical, models, that, describe, the, dynamics, of, the, system, and, predict, that, 'p100-p105', complexes, are, signal, responsive])].
[sujeto(['Bcl-3', is, an, atypical, member, of, the, 'IκB', family, that]), verbo([modulates]), complemento([transcription, in, the, nucleus, via, association, with, p50, '(', 'NF-κB1)', or, p52, '(', 'NF-κB2)', homodimers])].
[sujeto(['Bcl-3-deficient', 'T', cells, failed, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([disease, in, 'T', cell, 'transfer-induced', colitis, and, experimental, autoimmune, encephalomyelitis])].
[sujeto(['The', protection, against, disease, correlated, with, a]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, 'Th1', cells, that, produced, the, cytokines, 'IFN-γ', and, 'GM-CSF', and, an, increase, in, 'Th17', cells])].
[sujeto(['Although', differentiation, into, 'Th1', cells, was, not, impaired, in, the, absence, of, 'Bcl-3,', differentiated, 'Th1', cells, converted, to, 'less-pathogenic', 'Th17-like', 'cells,', in, part, via, mechanisms]), verbo([involving]), complemento([expression, of, the, 'RORγt', transcription, factor])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', 'Bcl-3', constrained, 'Th1', cell, plasticity, and]), verbo([promoted]), complemento([pathogenicity, by, blocking, conversion, to, 'Th17-like', 'cells,', revealing, a, unique, type, of, regulation, that, shapes, adaptive, immunity])].
[sujeto(['There', are, two, types, of, 'IκB', 'inhibitors:', the, prototypical, 'IκBs', '(', 'IκBα,', 'IκBβ,', and, 'IκBε),', which, form, 'low-molecular-weight', '(', 'MW)', 'IκB:NF-κB', complexes, that, are, highly, 'stable,', and, the, precursor, 'IκBs', '(', 'p105/IκBγ', and, 'p100/IκBδ),', which, form, 'high-MW', 'assemblies,', thereby]), verbo([suppressing]), complemento([the, activity, of, nearly, half, the, cellular, 'NF-κB', '[', 'Savinova', 'OV,', 'Hoffmann', 'A,', 'Ghosh', 'G', '(', 2009, ')', 'Mol', 'Cell', 34, '(', 5, ')', :, 591, -, 602, ']'])].

[sujeto(['The', unique, ability, of, 'p100/IκBδ', to, stably]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, all, 'NF-κB', subunits, by, forming, kappaBsomes, demonstrates, its, importance, in, sequestering, 'NF-κB', subunits, and, releasing, them, as, dictated, by, specific, stimuli, for, developmental, programs])].
[sujeto(['Nuclear', factor, κB]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([various, genes, involved, in, the, immune, 'response,', 'inflammation,', cell, 'survival,', and, development])].
[sujeto(['A', precursor, of, the, 'NF-κB2', '(', 'p52)', 'subunit,', 'p100,', contains, ankyrin, repeats, in, its, 'C-terminal', portion, and]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, found, to, act, as, a, cytoplasmic, inhibitor, of, 'RelA', in, the, canonical, pathway, of, 'NF-κB', activation])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, demonstrate, that, p100, also]), verbo([suppresses]), complemento(['c-Rel', function, in, dendritic, cells])].
[sujeto(['Expression', of, the, p19, and, p40, subunits, of, 'IL-23,', a, 'c-Rel-dependent', 'cytokine,', was]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([in, 'p100-deficient', 'cells,', although, expression, of, a, 'RelA-dependent', 'cytokine,', 'TNF-α,', was, reduced])].
[sujeto(['Nuclear', translocation, of, 'c-Rel', was]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([in, 'p100-deficient', cells])].

[sujeto(['The', capacity, of, dendritic, cells, '(', 'DC)', to]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([adaptive, immunity, is, controlled, by, their, maturation, state, and, lifespan])].
[sujeto(['Although', 'TNF', is, a, 'well-known', maturation, and, survival, factor, for, 'DC,', the, role, of, the, two, 'TNFR,', 'TNFR1', and, 'TNFR2,', in]), verbo([mediating]), complemento([these, effects, is, poorly, understood])].
[sujeto(['Activation', of, 'TNFR1,', but, not, 'TNFR2,', efficiently]), verbo([induced]), complemento(['DC', 'maturation,', as, defined, by, enhanced, expression, of, cell, surface, maturation, markers, '(', 'CD83,', 'CD86,', and, 'HLA-DR)', as, well, as, enhanced, 'T', cell, stimulatory, capacity])].

[sujeto(['We', further, show, differential, activation, of, 'NF-κB', signaling, pathways, by, the, 'TNFR:', 'TNFR1']), verbo([activated]), complemento([both, the, p65, and, p52, 'pathways,', whereas, 'TNFR2', triggered, 'p52,', but, not, 'p65,', activation])].
[sujeto(['However,', cell, death, protection, through, both, 'TNFR', was]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([through, the, 'Bcl-2/Bcl-xL', pathway])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, data, show, that, 'TNFR1,', but, not, 'TNFR2,', signaling]), verbo([induces]), complemento(['DC', 'maturation,', whereas, 'DC', survival, can, be, mediated, independently, through, both, 'TNFR'])].
[sujeto(['These', data, indicate, differential, but, partly, overlapping, responses, through, 'TNFR1', and, 'TNFR2', in, both, inflammatory, and, conventional, 'DC,', and, they, demonstrate, that, 'DC', maturation, and, 'DC', survival, can, be]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([through, independent, signaling, pathways])].
[sujeto(['Highly', active, antiretroviral, therapy, '(', 'HAART)', is, very, effective, in]), verbo([suppressing]), complemento(['HIV-1', replication, and, restoring, immune, functions, in, 'HIV-infected', individuals])].
[sujeto(['The', &, 'quot;shock-and-kill&quot;', strategy, was, recently, proposed, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([latent, 'HIV', expression, in, the, presence, of, 'HAART'])].
[sujeto(['Recent', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, the, protein, kinase, 'C', '(', 'PKC)', agonists, are, highly, potent, in, inducing, latent, 'HIV', expression, from, the, viral, reservoirs, in, vitro, and, ex, vivo, and, in, protecting, primary, 'CD4(+)', 'T', cells, from, 'HIV', infection, through, 'down-modulation', of, their, 'HIV', coreceptor, expression])].
[sujeto(['There', are, two, major, pathways]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, induction, of, 'NF-κB', subunits])].
[sujeto(['The', classical, '(', or, 'canonical)', pathway, typically]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, the, induction, of, 'RelA', or, 'c-Rel', containing, 'complexes,', and, involves, the, degradation, of, 'IκBα', in, a, manner, dependent, on, 'IκB', kinase, '(', 'IKK)', β, and, the, 'IKK', regulatory, subunit, 'NEMO'])].
[sujeto(['The', alternative, '(', or, 'non-canonical)', 'pathway,']), verbo([involves]), complemento([the, inducible, processing, of, p100, to, 'p52,', leading, to, the, induction, of, 'NF-κB2(p52)/RelB', containing, 'complexes,', and, is, dependent, on, 'IKKα', and, 'NF-κB', inducing, kinase, '(', 'NIK)'])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, demonstrate, that, in, primary, human, 'fibroblasts,', the, alternative, 'NF-κB', pathway, subunits, 'NF-κB2', and, 'RelB']), verbo([have]), complemento(['multiple,', but, 'distinct,', effects, on, the, expression, of, key, regulators, of, the, cell, 'cycle,', reactive, oxygen, species, '(', 'ROS)', generation, and, protein, stability])].
[sujeto(['Specifically,', following, siRNA, 'knockdown,', quantitative, 'PCR,', western, blot, analyses, and, chromatin, immunoprecipitation, '(', 'ChIP)', show, that, 'NF-κB2']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'CDK4', and, 'CDK6,', while, 'RelB,', through, the, regulation, of, genes, such, as, 'PSMA5', and, 'ANAPC1,', regulates, the, stability, of, p21WAF1, and, the, tumour, suppressor, p53])].
[sujeto(['These', combine, to]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([the, activity, of, the, retinoblastoma, 'protein,', 'Rb,', leading, to, induction, of, polycomb, protein, 'EZH2', expression])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', our, 'ChIP', analysis, demonstrates, that, 'EZH2', is, also, a, direct, 'NF-κB']), verbo([target]), complemento([gene])].

[sujeto(['We', show, that, this, pathway]), verbo([provides]), complemento([the, major, route, of, crosstalk, between, the, alternative, 'NF-κB', pathway, and, 'p53,', a, consequence, of, which, is, to, suppress, cell, senescence])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', we]), verbo([find]), complemento([that, activation, of, 'NF-κB', also, induces, 'EZH2', expression, in, 'CD40L', stimulated, cells, from, 'Chronic', 'Lymphocytic', 'Leukemia', patients])].
[sujeto(['We', therefore, propose, that, this, pathway]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, mechanism, through, which, microenvironment, induced, 'NF-κB', can, inhibit, tumor, suppressor, function, and, promote, tumorigenesis])].
[sujeto(['Endothelial', dysfunction]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, the, pathogenesis, of, diverse, pathologies, ranging, from, vascular, and, immune, diseases, to, cancer])].
[sujeto(['While', 'HUVEC', '(', macrovascular, 'cells)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, largely, used, in, the, 'past,', 'here,', we, documented, an, 'NF-κB', gene, signature, in, 'TNFα-stimulated', microvascular, endothelial, cells, 'HMEC', often, used, in, tumor, angiogenesis, studies])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', since, 'TNF-α', is, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'tumors,', we, further, applied, the, 'NF-κB', gene, signature, documented, in, 'TNFα-stimulated', endothelial, cells, to, human, breast, tumors])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([a, significant, positive, correlation, between, 'TNF', and, the, majority, '(', 85, '%', ')', of, the, identified, endothelial, 'TNF-induced', genes, in, a, 'well-defined', series, of, 96, '(', 48, 'ERα', positive, and, 48, 'ERα', 'negative)', breast, tumors])].
[sujeto(['Taken', together, these, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([the, potential, use, of, this, 'NF-κB', gene, signature, in, analyzing, the, role, of, 'TNF-α', in, the, endothelial, 'dysfunction,', as, well, as, in, breast, tumors, independently, of, the, presence, of, 'ERα'])].
[sujeto(['Nuclear', 'factor-kappa', 'B', '(', 'NF-kappaB)', activation]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, recognised, as, an, important, mechanism, in, the, development, of, cancers])].
[sujeto(['Normal', oesophageal, squamous, cells]), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['p50/105,', 'p52/p100', and, 'RelA', in, 5, '%', ',', 79, '%', and, 10, '%', of, the, tissues, in, 'cytoplasm,', 'respectively;', 'however,', only, 'p52/p100', was, expressed, in, the, nuclei, '(', 12, '%', ')'])].
[sujeto(['The', cancer, tissues]), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['p50/105,', 'p52/p100', and, 'RelA', in, 93, '%', ',', 95, '%', and, 95, '%', in, cytoplasm, 'and/or', 'nuclei,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['IKKepsilon', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, cytoplasm, in, 50, '%', of, the, normal, squamous, tissues, and, 84, '%', of, the, cancer, tissues])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([increased]), complemento([nuclear, expressions, of, 'p50/105,', 'p52/p100', and, 'RelA', as, well, as, increased, cytoplasmic, expression, of, 'IKKepsilon', in, the, 'ESCC', tissues, compared, to, the, normal, squamous, cells, suggested, that, 'over-expression', of, these, proteins, may, be, related, to, activation, of, the, 'NF-kappaB', pathway, and, might, play, a, role, in, the, development, of, 'ESCC'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'NF-kappaB', signaling, pathways]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, critical, role, in, the, development, and, progression, of, various, cancers])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, demonstrated, that, the, small, cell, lung, cancer, cell, line, '(', 'SCLC)', 'H69']), verbo([expressed]), complemento([a, unique, 'NF-kappaB', profile, as, compared, to, other, cancer, cell, lines])].
[sujeto(['The', 'p105/p50,', 'p100/p52,', 'c-Rel,', and, 'RelB', protein, and, mRNA, transcripts, were, absent, in, 'H69', cells, but, these, cells]), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['RelA/p65'])].
[sujeto(['The', treatment, also]), verbo([induced]), complemento([the, nuclear, translocation, of, 'RelB', without, the, processing, of, p100, to, p52])].
[sujeto(['Blocking', 'RelB', expression]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([the, increase, in, the, expression, of, beta1, integrin, and, the, attachment, of, 'H69'])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', the, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'RelB', was, responsible, for, the, 'LPS-mediated', attachment, and, may, play, an, important, role, in, the, progression, of, some, cancers])].
[sujeto(['Activation', of]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['factor-kappa', 'B', '(', 'NF-kappaB)', signaling, is, considered, an, important, mechanism, in, the, development, of, prostate, cancers])].
[sujeto(['A', recent, study, revealed, that, 'IkappaB', kinase, epsilon, '(', 'IKKepsilon),', an, activator, of, 'NF-kappaB,', was, overexpressed, in, breast, cancers, and]), verbo([acted]), complemento([as, an, oncogene])].
[sujeto(['Expression', of, 'NF-kappaB', members]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, in, prostate, cancer, 'tissues,', but, expression, of, 'IKKepsilon', has, not, yet, been, studied, in, prostate, cancers])].
[sujeto(['In', the, 'TMA,', 'IKKepsilon', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, basal, 'cells,', but, not, in, alveolar, cells, in, normal, prostate, glands])].
[sujeto(['IKKepsilon', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 60.0, '%', of, prostate, intraepithelial, neoplasm, '(', 'PIN)', and, 70.1, '%', of, the, prostate, cancers, in, the, cytoplasm])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([increased]), complemento([cytoplasmic, expression, of, 'IKKepsilon', as, well, as, the, increased, nuclear, expressions, of, 'p50/105,', 'p52/p100', and, 'RelA', in, the, prostate, cancers, compared, to, normal, alveolar, cells, suggested, that, overexpression, of, these, proteins, may, be, related, to, activation, of, the, 'NF-kappaB', pathway, and, might, play, a, role, in, tumorigenesis, of, prostate, cancers])].
[sujeto(['In', a, biochemical, characterization, of, endogenous, cytoplasmic, and, purified, recombinant, 'proteins,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, p105, and, p100, assemble, into, 'high-molecular-weight', complexes, that, contribute, to, the, regulation, of, all, 'NF-kappaB', isoforms])].
[sujeto(['Unlike', the, classical, inhibitors, 'IkappaBalpha,', -, 'beta,', and, -, 'epsilon,', 'high-molecular-weight', complexes, of, p105, and, p100, proteins]), verbo([bind]), complemento(['NF-kappaB', subunits, in, two, 'modes:', through, direct, dimerization, of, 'Rel', homology, 'domain-containing', 'NF-kappaB', polypeptides, and, through, interactions, of, the, p105, and, p100, ankyrin, repeats, with, preformed, 'NF-kappaB', 'dimers,', thereby, mediating, the, bona, fide, 'IkappaB', 'activities,', 'IkappaBgamma', and, 'IkappaBdelta'])].
[sujeto(['Our', biochemical, evidence]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([an, assembly, pathway, in, which, kinetic, mechanisms, control, 'NF-kappaB', dimer, formation, via, processing, and, assembly, of, large, complexes, that, contain, 'IkappaB', activities])].
[sujeto(['The', 'NF-kappaB', family, member, 'RelB']), verbo([has]), complemento([many, properties, not, shared, by, other, family, members, such, as, restricted, subunit, association, and, lack, of, regulation, by, the, classical, 'IkappaB', proteins])].
[sujeto(['RelB', stabilizes, itself, by, directly]), verbo([interacting]), complemento([with, 'p100,', 'p105,', and, their, processed, products])].
[sujeto(['Although', the, 'C-terminal', ankyrin, repeat, domain, of, p105, is, not]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, 'RelB-p105', complex, 'formation,', all, domains, and, flexible, regions, of, each, protein, are, engaged, in, the, 'RelB-p100', complex])].
[sujeto(['The', 'N-terminal', domain, of, 'p100/p52']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'RelB', but, not, 'RelA'])].
[sujeto(['The', transcriptional, activation, domain, of, 'RelB,', but, not, 'RelA,', directly]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, the, processing, region, of, p100])].
[sujeto(['These', unique, 'protein-protein', contacts, explain, why, 'RelB', prefers, p52, as, its, dimeric, partner, for, transcriptional, activity, and, is]), verbo([retained]), complemento([in, the, cytoplasm, as, an, inhibited, complex, by, p100])].
[sujeto(['The', 'NF-kappaB', signaling, pathway]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, activity, of, multiple, dimeric, transcription, factors, that, are, generated, from, five, distinct, monomers])].
[sujeto(['The', availabilities, of, specific, dimers, are]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([during, cell, differentiation, and, organ, development, and, determine, the, 'cell\'s', responsiveness, to, inflammatory, or, developmental, signals])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, the, cellular, processes, that, generate, different, 'NF-kappaB', dimers, are, highly, connected, through, multiple, 'cross-regulatory', mechanisms])].
[sujeto(['First,', we]), verbo([find]), complemento([that, 'steady-state', expression, of, 'RelB', is, regulated, by, the, canonical, pathway, and, constitutive, 'RelA', activity])].
[sujeto(['Recently,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, 'LPS', inhibits, both, spontaneous, and, 'drug-induced', apoptosis, in, mature, 'B', 'lymphocytes,', through, cytosolic, retention, of, 'Bax,', a, proapoptotic, protein, of, the, 'Bcl-2', 'family,', by, preventing, its, translocation, to, mitochondria])].
[sujeto(['Research', within, the, last, few, years]), verbo([has]), complemento([revealed, that, members, of, the, 'NF-kappaB', transcription, factor, regulate, cell, viability, by, activating, genes, involved, in, 'mitochondrion-dependent', apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'report,', we, examined, the, effect, of, sustained, 'LPS', stimulation, on, cytosolic, and]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([proteins, of, the, 'IkappaB/NF-kappaB', family, to, determine, which, 'NF-kappaB', 'pathway,', canonical, '(', 'classical)', or, noncanonical, '(', 'alternative),', is, activated, by, this, agent, in, mature, 'B', cells])].
[sujeto(['Immunoblotting', analyses, showed, that, 'LPS']), verbo([induced]), complemento([a, 'time-dependent', degradation, of, the, 'NF-kappaB', inhibitors, 'IkappaBbeta', and, 'IkappaBepsilon', '(', preferentially, to, isoform, 'IkappaBalpha),', via, 'IkappaB', kinase, beta])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we, observed, that, 'LPS']), verbo([triggered]), complemento([the, processing, of, 'NF-kappaB', p105, to, p50, and, that, of, 'NF-kappaB', p100, to, p52, in, parallel, with, nuclear, translocation, of, active, p50, and, 'p52,', as, 'NF-kappaBp50/RelA', and, 'NF-kappaBp52/RelB', 'heterodimers,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, sustained, stimulation, with, 'LPS', can, activate, 'NF-kappaB', through, both, classical, and, alternative, pathways])].
[sujeto(['Unloading', of, the, rodent, heart]), verbo([activates]), complemento([the, fetal, gene, 'program,', decreases, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptor, alpha, '(', 'PPARalpha)', and, 'PPARalpha-regulated', gene, expression, '(', 'MCAD),', and, induces, cardiomyocyte, atrophy])].
[sujeto(['NF-kappaB']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, fetal, gene, program, and, 'PPARalpha-regulated', gene, expression, during, cardiac, hypertrophy, and, induces, atrophy, in, skeletal, muscle])].
[sujeto(['In']), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, function, 'experiments,', we, transplanted, hearts, of, 'p105/p50', knockout, mice, into, wildtype, mice, and, compared, changes, in, gene, expression, and, cardiomyocyte, size, with, wildtype, hearts, transplanted, into, wildtype, mice])].
[sujeto(['Total', and, 'phospho-IKKbeta', levels, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, the, transplanted, heart, seven, days, after, surgery])].
[sujeto(['The', activation, of, 'IKKbeta', was, paralleled, by]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['DNA', binding, activity, of, p65, and, 'p105/p50'])].
[sujeto(['Mechanical', unloading]), verbo([induced]), complemento([myosin, heavy, chain, beta, expression, and, decreased, cardiomyocyte, size, in, hearts, of, both, wildtype, and, 'p105/p050', knockout, animals])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', the, downregulation, of, 'PPARalpha', and, 'MCAD', was, significantly, attenuated, or]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([in, the, hearts, of, 'p105/p50', knockout, mice])].
[sujeto(['The', 'IKKbeta/p65/p50', pathway, is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, the, unloaded, rodent, heart, and, a, likely, regulator, for, the, downregulation, of, 'PPARalpha', and, 'PPARalpha-regulated', gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['The', past, two, decades]), verbo([have]), complemento([led, to, a, tremendous, work, on, the, transcription, factor, 'NF-kappaB', and, its, molecular, mechanisms, of, activation])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([translocation, of, 'NF-kappaB', is, controlled, by, two, main, 'pathways:', the, classical, and, the, alternative, 'NF-kappaB', pathways])].
[sujeto(['The', classical, 'NF-kappaB', pathway]), verbo([activates]), complemento([the, 'IKK', complex, that, controls, the, inducible, degradation, of, most, 'IkappaB', family, members, that, are, 'IkappaBalpha,', 'IkappaBbeta,', 'IkappaBvarepsilon', and, p105])].
[sujeto(['The', alternative, 'NF-kappaB', pathway]), verbo([induces]), complemento([p100, processing, and, p52, generation, through, the, activation, of, at, least, two, 'kinases,', which, are, 'NIK', and, 'IKKalpha'])].
[sujeto(['Genetic', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, 'IKKgamma', is, dispensable, for, the, alternative, 'pathway,', which, suggests, the, existence, of, an, alternative, 'IKKalpha-containing', complex])].
[sujeto(['It', is, noteworthy, that, activation, of, particular, p52, heterodimers, like, 'p52/RelB']), verbo([requires]), complemento([solely, the, alternative, pathway, while, activation, of, 'p52/p65', or, 'p52/c-Rel', involves, a, &, 'quot;hybrid', 'pathway&quot;'])].
[sujeto(['Among', 'others,', 'LTbetaR,', 'BAFF-R,', 'CD40', and, 'RANK']), verbo([have]), complemento([the, ability, to, induce, the, alternative, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Recent', studies, revealed, that, the, 'lymphotoxin/lymphotoxin', beta, receptor, '(', 'LT)/LTbetaR', system]), verbo([activates]), complemento([the, noncanonical, nuclear, 'factor-kappaB', '(', 'NF-kappaB)', signaling, pathway, involving, 'I', kappa, 'B', kinase, 1, /, 'I', kappa, 'B', kinase, alpha, '(', 'IKK1/IKKalpha)', and, 'NF-kappaB-inducing', kinase, '(', 'NIK)', to, direct, processing, of, the, nfkappab2, protein, p100, to, yield, 'RelB:p52', complexes])].
[sujeto(['Our', studies, revealed, that, mice, deficient, in, either, p50, or, p52]), verbo([have]), complemento([defects, in, the, formation, of, inguinal, lymph, nodes, '(', 'LNs),', but, that, the, complete, defect, in, lymph, node, formation, and, splenic, microarchitecture, seen, in, 'LT-deficient', mice, is, recapitulated, only, in, mice, deficient, in, both, p50, and, p52])].
[sujeto(['Biochemically,', we]), verbo([find]), complemento([not, only, that, both, 'p50-', and, 'p52-containing', 'NF-kappaB', activities, are, induced, by, 'LTbetaR', 'signaling,', but, that, the, induction, of, 'NF-kappaB-containing', complexes, by, 'LTbetaR', engagement, is, perturbed, in, single, knockouts])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', the, 'LTbetaR', can, additionally]), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, less, 'well-characterized', 'p52:RelA', and, 'p50:RelB', 'pathways,', which, play, pivotal, roles, in, vivo, for, the, development, and, organization, of, lymphoid, structures])].
[sujeto(['Our', 'genetic,', 'cellular,', and, molecular, evidence, points, toward, a, model, of, 'LT-mediated', 'NF-kappaB', regulation, in, which, 'p105/p50', and, 'p100/p52']), verbo([have]), complemento([distinct, and, coordinating, molecular, specificities, but, differ, in, the, upstream, signaling, pathways, that, regulate, them])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, shown, that, functional, components, of, the, 'NF-kappaB', signaling, pathway, are, 'up-regulated', and, sequestered, in, the, cytoplasm, of, human, papillomavirus, 16, '(', 'HPV16)-transformed', cell, lines, leading, to, a, reduced, activity, of, 'NF-kappaB'])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', p100, and, p105, proteins, were, predominantly, cytoplasmic, and]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([in, keratinocytes, expressing, 'E7', and, 'E6,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['A', predominantly, cytoplasmic, localization, of, 'E7', protein, was, also, detected, in, all, keratinocytes]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['E7'])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'HPV16', 'E6', and, 'E7', proteins, modulate, the, expression, and, the, subcellular, localization, of, p100, and, p105, 'NF-kappaB', precursors])].
[sujeto(['The', p100, polypeptide]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, proposed, to, serve, as, a, precursor, of, 'p52,', which, corresponds, to, the, 'N-terminal', half, of, p100])].
[sujeto(['While', p52, functions, as, a, 'Rel', transcription, 'factor,', the, larger, p100, protein]), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, a, cytoplasmic, inhibitor, of, select, 'NF-kappa', 'B/Rel', transcription, factor, complexes])].
[sujeto(['Because', of, their, distinct, 'functions,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([studied, the, biochemical, basis, for, the, production, of, these, two, 'nfkb2-derived', gene, products])].
[sujeto(['Like', the, p50, product, of, the, nfkb1, 'gene,', p52, is, principally, generated, in, a, cotranslational, manner]), verbo([involving]), complemento([proteolytic, processing, by, the, proteasome])].
[sujeto(['Using', 'p100/p105', chimeras, containing, different, segments, of, the, nfkb1, and, nfkb2, 'genes,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([found, that, diminished, p52, processing, is, a, property, conferred, by, peptide, sequences, located, downstream, of, the, 'GRR,', flanking, the, site, of, p52, processing])].
[sujeto(['Stimulation', of, highly, purified, primary, 'T', lymphocytes, through, 'CD2', and, 'CD28', adhesion, molecules]), verbo([induces]), complemento([a, 'long-term', 'proliferation,', dependent, on, persistent, autocrine, secretion, of, interleukin, 2, '(', 'IL-2),', high, and, prolonged, expression, of, inducible, 'CD25/IL-2', receptor, alpha, chain, '(', 'IL-2Ralpha),', and, secretion, of, growth, factors, such, as, the, 'granulocyte-macrophage', 'colony-stimulating', factor, '(', 'GM-CSF)'])].
[sujeto(['CD28', costimulation, appears, to]), verbo([activate]), complemento([cytokine, gene, expression, through, conserved, 'kappaB-related', 'CD28', response, '(', 'CD28RE)', or, cytokine, 1, '(', 'CK-1)', elements, in, addition, to, canonical, 'NF-kappaB-binding', sites])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, 'CD2+CD28', stimulation, specifically, 'induces,', at, maximal, 'T', cell, proliferation, 'phase,', sustained]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([overexpression, of, 'NFKB2', p52, and, 'c-Rel', subunits, which, might, rely, on, 'long-lasting', processing, of, p100, precursor, for, p52, and, increased, neosynthesis, of, 'c-Rel'])].
[sujeto(['Conversely,', these, subunits, do, not, appear, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, the, 'IL-2Ralpha', kappaB, site])].
[sujeto(['Proteolytic', degradation, of, the, 'C-terminal', region, of, 'NF-(kappa)B', precursors, to, their, active, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([forms, represents, an, important, regulatory, step, in, the, activation, of, 'NF-(kappa)B'])].
[sujeto(['NF-(kappa)B2(p100)', is]), verbo([found]), complemento([ubiquitously, in, the, 'cytoplasm;', 'however,', the, site, and, mechanism, of, processing, to, p52, have, not, previously, been, defined])].
[sujeto(['We', show, by, deletion, mapping, that, processing, of, 'NF-(kappa)B2(p100)', terminates, at, alanine, 405, to, generate, p52, and, is]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([by, specific, inhibitors, of, the, multicatalytic, proteinase, complex])].
[sujeto(['Although', the, 'C-terminal', 'I(kappa)B-like', domain, of, 'NF-(kappa)B2(p100)', was, constitutively, 'phosphorylated,', disruption, of, this, phosphorylation, by, mutagenesis, demonstrated, that, it, was, not]), verbo([required]), complemento([as, a, signal, to, mediate, processing])].
[sujeto(['The', level, of, processing, of, 'NF-(kappa)B2(p100)', was, much, lower, than, that, of, 'NF-(kappa)B1(p105)', and, differed, from, that, of, 'I(kappa)B-alpha,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([differential, control, of, processing, of, 'NF-(kappa)B/I(kappa)B', family, members])].
[sujeto(['NFKB1', spans, 156, kb, and]), verbo([has]), complemento([24, exons, with, introns, varying, between, 40, ',', 0, and, 323, bp, in, length])].
[sujeto(['Although', 'NFKB2,', which, encodes, p100, and, 'p52,', also]), verbo([has]), complemento([24, exons, and, has, a, comparable, 'exon-intron', 'structure,', it, is, 20, times, shorter, '(', 8, 'kb;', 'Fracchiola', et, al])].
[sujeto(['Tax', protein, of, 'HTLV-1']), verbo([triggers]), complemento([transcriptional, activation, through, 'enhancers,', 'NF-kappa', 'B', binding, 'site,', 21, -, bp, 'enhancer,', and, serum, response, element])].
[sujeto(['Previously,', we, demonstrated]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'Tax', to, transcription, factors, 'NF-kappa', 'B1', p105, and, p50])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'Tax', enhances, expression, of, 'NF-kappa', 'B2', at, the, mRNA, level, and, 'proteins;', the, effect, was, more, apparent, on, the, p52, expression, than, on, its, precursor, 'p100,', suggesting, 'post-translational', regulation])].
[sujeto(['Consistent', with, these, 'observations,', 'HTLV-1-infected', 'T-cell', lines]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([higher, levels, of, p52])].
[sujeto(['Tax']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, the, protein, products, p52, and, p100, which, inhibits, 'NF-kappa', 'B', proteins, forming, cytoplasmic, 'complexes;', the, binding, to, p100, was, preferential, over, 'NF-kappa', 'B1', p105])].
[sujeto(['However,', 'Tax', did, not]), verbo([induce]), complemento([efficient, dissociation, of, the, cytoplasmic, complexes, 'p100/c-Rel', or, 'p100/p65,', and, thus, did, not, induce, nuclear, translocation, of, 'c-Rel', or, p65])].
[sujeto(['These', results, indicate, that, 'HTLV-1', 'Tax']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'NF-kappa', 'B2', p100, and, p52, and, upregulate, the, 'NF-kappa', 'B', 'function,', but, their, contribution, to, 'Tax-mediated', transcriptional, regulation, differs, from, those, of, 'NF-kappa', 'B1'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, shown, that, after, 'DNA-damage,', the, p52, 'NF-kB', subunit, can, function, cooperatively, with, the, p53, tumor, suppressor, to, both, repress, and, induce, 'Skp2', expression])].
[sujeto([&, 'nbsp;', 'However,', the, wider, role, and, activation, of, p52, after, 'DNA-damage']), verbo([has]), complemento([not, been, determined])].
[sujeto([&, 'nbsp;', 'Activation', of, 'NF-kB', in, response, to, 'DNA', break, inducers, can, be]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'ATM', '(', ataxia, telangiectasia, 'mutated)-dependent', phosphorylation, of, 'NEMO', '(', 'NF-kB', essential, 'modulator),', resulting, in, 'IKKβ', mediated, induction, of, the, classical, 'NF-kB', 'pathway,', leading, to, the, induction, of, 'RelA(p65)/p50', dimers])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, 'DNA', damage, also]), verbo([induces]), complemento([p100, '(', 'NF-kB2)', processing, to, generate, active, p52])].
[sujeto([&, 'nbsp;', 'Moreover,', we, identify, a, 'post-DNA', 'damage,', positive, feedback, loop, of, p52, activation, through, induction, of, 'NF-kB2', gene, 'expression,']), verbo([involving]), complemento([both, the, classical, and, alternative, 'NF-kB', pathways])].
[sujeto(['Gene', expression, and, chromatin, immunoprecipitation, analyses, indicated, 'DNA', damage]), verbo([induced]), complemento([p52, dimer, recruitment, on, 'multiple,', p53, dependent, and, 'independent,', target, genes, associated, with, promoting, cell, cycle, arrest, and, cell, death])].
[sujeto(['The', oncogenic, 'Epstein-Barr', virus, '(', 'EBV)-encoded', latent, infection, membrane, protein, 1, '(', 'LMP1)', constitutively]), verbo([activates]), complemento([the, '\'', 'canonical\'', 'NF-kappaB', pathway, that, involves, the, phosphorylation, and, degradation, of, 'IkappaBalpha', downstream, of, the, 'IkappaB', kinases, '(', 'IKKs)'])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, show, that, 'LMP1', also]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([the, 'proteasome-mediated', proteolysis, of, p100, 'NF-kappaB2', resulting, in, the, generation, of, active, 'p52,', which, translocates, to, the, nucleus, in, complex, with, the, p65, and, 'RelB', 'NF-kappaB', subunits])].
[sujeto(['LMP1-induced', 'NF-kappaB', transactivation, is, reduced, in, 'nf-kb2(-/-)', mouse, embryo, 'fibroblasts,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, p100, processing, contributes, to, 'LMP1-mediated', 'NF-kappaB', transcriptional, effects])].
[sujeto(['This', pathway, is, likely, to, operate, in, 'vivo,', as, the, expression, of, 'LMP1', in, primary, 'EBV-positive', 'Hodgkin\'s', lymphoma, and, nasopharyngeal, carcinoma, biopsies, correlates, with, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([accumulation, of, p52])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', while, the, ability, of, 'LMP1', to]), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, canonical, 'NF-kappaB', pathway, is, impaired, in, cells, lacking, 'IKKgamma/NEMO,', the, regulatory, subunit, of, the, 'IKK', 'complex,', p100, processing, remains, unaffected])].
[sujeto(['As', a, 'result,']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([translocation, of, 'p52,', but, not, 'p65,', occurs, in, the, absence, of, 'IKKgamma'])].
[sujeto(['These', data, point, to, the, existence, of, a, novel, signalling, pathway, that]), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['NF-kappaB', in, 'LMP1-expressing', 'cells,', and, may, thereby, play, a, role, in, both, oncogenic, transformation, and, the, establishment, of, persistent, 'EBV', infection])].
[sujeto(['Ligands', which]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento([p100, processing, to, p52, have, not, been, defined])].

[sujeto(['Portions', of, hearts, were, 'homogenized,', protein, concentrations, determined, and, extracts, assayed, for, 'NF-κB', activation, '(', 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento(['activity)', using, electrophoretic, mobility, shift, assays, '(', 'EMSA)'])].
[sujeto(['Visual', examination, of, 'EMSA', autoradiographs, revealed, an]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['NF-κB', activation, in, the, hearts, from, exercised, animals, when, compared, with, 'non-running', controls])].
[sujeto(['Subsequent', supershift, analyses, using, antibodies, specific, for, 'NF-κB', subunits, showed, the, higher, intensity, exercise, was, associated, with, p65, '(', 'RelA)', in, the]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['NF-κB', complex, while, the, 'NF-κB', complex, in, hearts, from, animals, exercised, at, the, lower, intensity, was, comprised, primarily, of, p50])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([exercise, is, capable, of, activating, myocardial, 'NF-κB', and, that, a, threshold, for, the, activation, of, specific, 'NF-κB', subunits, may, exist])].
[sujeto(['Signaling', from, the, 'BCR', and, 'B', cell]), verbo([activating]), complemento([factor, receptor, '(', 'BAFF-R', or, 'BR3)', differentially, regulates, apoptosis, within, early, transitional, '(', 'T1)', and, late, transitional, '(', 'T2;', 'CD21(int)-T2)', 'B', cells, during, selection, processes, to, generate, mature, 'B', lymphocytes])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, demonstrate, that, 'BCR', signaling]), verbo([induced]), complemento([more, 'long-term', 'c-Rel', activation, in, 'T2', and, mature, than, in, 'T1', 'B', cells, leading, to, increased, expression, of, 'anti-apoptotic', genes, as, well, as, prosurvival, 'BAFF-R', and, its, downstream, substrate, p100, '(', 'NF-kappaB2)'])].
[sujeto(['Sustained', 'c-Rel', activation]), verbo([required]), complemento([de, novo, 'c-Rel', gene, transcription, and, translation, via, 'Btk-dependent', mechanisms])].
[sujeto(['Like', 'T1', 'cells,', mature, 'B', cells, from, 'Btk-', and, 'c-Rel-deficient', mice, also, failed, to]), verbo([activate]), complemento([these, genes])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, gain, of, survival, potential, within, transitional, 'B', cells, is, dependent, on, the, ability, to, produce, a, 'long-term', 'c-Rel', 'response,', which, plays, a, critical, role, in, 'T2', 'B', cell, survival, and, differentiation, in, vivo, by, inducing, 'anti-apoptotic', 'genes,', 'BAFF-R', and, 'NF-kappaB2,', an, essential, component, for, 'BAFF-R', survival, signaling])].

[sujeto(['Thus,', 'NF-κB2/p100', deficiency]), verbo([caused]), complemento([a, predominant, 'B-cell-intrinsic', 'TI-2', defect, that, could, largely, be, attributed, to, impaired, proliferation, of, plasmablasts])].
[sujeto(['Studies', in, postmenopausal, women]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, estrogen, reduces, circulating, sclerostin, 'levels,', but, effects, of, estrogen, on, skeletal, sclerostin, mRNA, levels, are, unknown])].
[sujeto(['Consistent', with, studies, in, mice, showing, that, ovariectomy]), verbo([increased]), complemento([nuclear, 'factor-κB', '(', 'NF-κB)', 'activation,', we, found, that, estrogen, treatment, was, associated, with, a, significant, reduction, in, inflammatory, genes, as, a, group, '(', 'P='])].

[sujeto(['Transcription', factors, of, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([factor, kappaB, '(', 'NF-κB)', family, arise, through, the, combinatorial, association, of, five, distinct, 'Rel', subunits, into, functional, dimers])].
[sujeto(['We', previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, the, 'RelB', homodimer, could, be, forced, to, assemble, through, domain, swapping, in, vitro])].

[sujeto(['The', genes, 'HLA', complex, 'P5', '(', 'HCP5),', spermatogenesis, associated, 2, '(', 'SPATA2),', tumour, necrosis, factor, 'alpha-induced', protein, 3, '(', 'TNFAIP3),', 'TNFAIP3-interacting', protein, 1, '(', 'TNIP1)', and, the, component, of, oligomeric, 'Golgi', complex, 6, '(', 'COG6)', were]), verbo([reported]), complemento([to, be, associated, with, psoriasis, in, western, populations, by, 'genome-wide', association, studies])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', the, data]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, 'HCP5,', 'TNIP1', and, 'TNFAIP3', may, play, a, role, in, common, pathogenic, of, psoriasis, in, 'Chinese', and, confer, risk, factors, for, psoriasis, in, various, ethnic, populations])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([potential, makers, for, 'diagnosing,', treating, and, preventing, the, psoriasis])].
[sujeto(['Hepatitis', 'E', virus, '(', 'HEV)', is, one, of, the, primary, causative, agents, of, acute, 'hepatitis,', and, represents, a, major]), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, severe, public, health, problems, in, developing, countries])].
[sujeto(['These', cells, were, then]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([with, 'TNF-α', and, the, nucleus, translocation, of, the, p65, 'NF-κB', subunit, was, assessed, using, western, blot, and, laser, confocal, microscopy])].
[sujeto(['DNA-binding', activity, of, p65, was, also, examined, using, electrophoretic, mobility, shift, assay, '(', 'EMSA),', and, the, suppression, of, 'NF-κB']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, were, detected, using, 'real-time', 'RT-PCR', and, 'ELISA'])].
[sujeto(['These', results, enabled, us, to, identify, the]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([phosphorylation, levels, of, 'IKBα'])].
[sujeto(['Reducing', the, levels, of, 'A20', with, siRNAs, significantly]), verbo([enhances]), complemento([luciferase, activation, of, 'NF-κB'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'HEV', 'ORF3']), verbo([regulated]), complemento(['A20', primarily, via, activating, transcription, factor, 6, '(', 'ATF6),', involved, in, unfolded, protein, response, '(', 'UPR),', resulting, in, the, degradation, or, inactivation, of, the, receptor, interacting, protein, 1, '(', 'RIP1),', a, major, upstream, activator, of, 'IKB', kinase, compounds, '(', 'IKKs)'])].
[sujeto(['The', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, genotype, 1, 'HEV,', through, 'ORF3,', may, transiently, activate, 'NF-κB', through, 'UPR', in, early, 'stage,', and, subsequently, inhibit, 'TNF-α-induced', 'NF-κB', signaling, in, late, phase, so, as, to, create, a, favorable, virus, replication, environment])].

[sujeto(['A', gender, bias, was, observed, for, 'SNPs', in, the, 'HLA-locus,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento(['female-specific', alleles, have, an, increase, risk, for, 'MG'])].
[sujeto(['Pathway-based', analyses, that, combine, information, across, multiple, genes, into, a, limited, number, of, molecular, networks]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, found, to, be, a, powerful, approach])].
[sujeto(['Both', regulatory, 'T-cell', '(', 'Treg)', differentiation, and, 'NF-κB', signaling, pathway]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, have, relevance, to, 'MG', pathophysiology])].
[sujeto(['NF-κB', is, an, important, regulator, of, immunity, and, 'inflammation,', and, its, activation, pathway]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, studied, extensively])].
[sujeto(['The', mechanisms, that, downregulate, the, activity, of, 'NF-κB']), verbo([have]), complemento([also, received, a, lot, of, 'attention,', particularly, since, its, activity, needs, to, be, terminated, to, prevent, chronic, inflammation, and, subsequent, tissue, damage])].
[sujeto(['The', 'COMMD', family]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, identified, as, a, new, group, of, proteins, involved, in, 'NF-κB', termination])].

[sujeto(['In', this, 'review,', we, describe, the, mechanisms, and, proteins]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, termination, of, canonical, 'NF-κB', 'signaling,', with, a, specific, focus, on, the, role, of, the, 'COMMD', family, in, the, 'down-modulation', of, 'NF-κB'])].

[sujeto(['Systemic', lupus, erythematosus, '(', 'SLE)', is, the, most, common, systemic, autoimmune, disease, which, likely]), verbo([involves]), complemento([complex, interactions, between, genes, and, the, environment])].

[sujeto(['These', genes, span, an, array, of, functions, that]), verbo([involve]), complemento([antigen, presentation, '(', 'HLA-Cw6,', 'ERAP1,', 'ERAP2,', 'MICA),', the, 'IL-23', axis, '(', 'IL12Bp40,', 'IL23Ap19,', 'IL23R,', 'JAK2,', 'TYK2),', 'T-cell', development, and, 'T-cells', polarization, '(', 'RUNX1,', 'RUNX3,', 'STAT3,', 'TAGAP,', 'IL4,', 'IL13),', innate, immunity, '(', 'CARD14,', 'c-REL,', 'TRAF3IP2,', 'DDX58,', 'IFIH1),', and, negative, regulators, of, immune, responses, '(', 'TNIP1,', 'TNFAIP3,', 'NFKBIA,', 'ZC3H12C,', 'IL36RN,', 'SOCS1)'])].

[sujeto(['This', is, particularly, the, case, for, those, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, innate, immunity, and, negative, regulation, of, immune, specific, pathways])].

[sujeto(['These', novel, genetic, findings, also, open, opportunities, to, explore, novel, therapeutic]), verbo([targets]), complemento([and, potentially, the, development, of, personalized, 'medicine,', as, well, as, discover, new, biology, of, human, skin, disease])].
[sujeto(['Psoriasis', is, a, 'chronic,', inflammatory, skin, disease]), verbo([involving]), complemento([both, environmental, and, genetic, factors])].
[sujeto(['According', to, 'genome-wide', association, studies, '(', 'GWAS),', the, 'TNIP1', 'gene,', which, encodes, the, 'TNF-α-induced', protein, 3, -]), verbo([interacting]), complemento([protein, 1, '(', 'TNIP1),', is, strongly, linked, to, the, susceptibility, of, psoriasis])].
[sujeto(['TNIP1', is, a, widely]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([ubiquitin, sensor, that, binds, to, the, 'ubiquitin-editing', protein, 'A20', and, restricts, 'TNF-', and, 'TLR-induced', signals])].
[sujeto(['In', our, 'study,', 'TNIP1', expression]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([in, specimens, of, epidermis, affected, by, psoriasis])].
[sujeto(['Based', on, previous, studies]), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([a, role, for, 'TNIP1', in, modulating, cancer, cell, 'growth,', we, investigated, its, role, in, keratinocyte, 'proliferation,', which, is, clearly, abnormal, in, psoriasis])].
[sujeto(['Blocking', 'TNIP1', expression]), verbo([increased]), complemento([keratinocyte, 'proliferation,', while, overexpression, of, 'TNIP1', decreased, keratinocyte, proliferation])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', we, showed, that, 'TNIP1', signaling, might]), verbo([involve]), complemento([extracellular, 'signal-regulated', 'kinase1/2', '(', 'Erk1/2)', and, 'CCAAT/enhancer-binding', protein, β, '(', 'C/EBPβ)', activity])].
[sujeto(['Intradermal', injection, of, 'TNIP1', shRNA, in, 'BALB/c', mice]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, exaggerated, psoriatic, conditions, in, imiquimod, '(', 'IMQ)-induced', 'psoriasis-like', dermatitis])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, indicate, that, 'TNIP1']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, protective, role, in, psoriasis, and, therefore, could, be, a, promising, therapeutic, target])].
[sujeto(['Genome-wide', association, studies, '(', 'GWASs)']), verbo([have]), complemento([reproducibly, associated, '∼40', susceptibility, loci, with, psoriasis])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, missing, heritability, is, evident, and, the, contributions, of, coding, variants]), verbo([have]), complemento([not, yet, been, systematically, evaluated])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([increase]), complemento([the, number, of, genetic, risk, factors, for, psoriasis, and, highlight, new, and, plausible, biological, pathways, in, psoriasis])].
[sujeto(['Psoriasis', is, clinically, 'heterogeneous,', and, symptoms, can, vary, from, mild, almost, cosmetic, symptoms, to, severe, disease]), verbo([requiring]), complemento([systemic, therapy])].
[sujeto(['Herein', we, explored, the, genetic, background, in, two, polarized, cohorts, of, carefully, phenotyped, patients, with, 'long-term', 'follow-up:', consistent, mild, phenotype, '(', 'n=696)', and, severe, disease, course]), verbo([requiring]), complemento([systemic, therapy, '(', 'n=715)'])].
[sujeto(['All', patients, were, treated, at, the, same, dermatology, department]), verbo([ensuring]), complemento([homogenous, assessment])].
[sujeto(['No', protective, gene, was, identified, in, the, mild, 'cohort,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, current, screens, have, primarily, identified, psoriasis, variants, associated, with, a, more, severe, phenotype])].
[sujeto(['Epigenetic', mechanisms, might, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, regulation, of, interindividual, lipid, level, variability, and, thus, may, contribute, to, the, cardiovascular, risk, profile])].

[sujeto(['Binding', of, 'NifL', to, 'NifA']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([the, 'ATPase', activity, of, 'NifA,', and, this, interaction, is, controlled, by, the, 'amino-terminal', 'GAF', domain, of, 'NifA', that, binds, 2, -, oxoglutarate])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([several, findings, indicating, that, these, two, genes, are, differentially, regulated, by, the, nature, of, the, nitrogen, source])].

[sujeto(['Removal', of, 'Lnk2', in, almost, its, entirety, '(', 'ProTΔ146-167)', drastically, reduces, the, enhancement, of, thrombin, generation, by, cofactor, 'Va', from, &, 'gt;3,000-fold', to, 60, -, fold, because, of, a, significant]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, the, rate, of, activation, in, the, absence, of, cofactor])].
[sujeto(['Deletion', of, 'Lnk2', mimics, the, action, of, cofactor, 'Va', and, offers, insights, into, how, prothrombin, is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([at, the, molecular, level])].
[sujeto(['The', crystal, structure, of, 'ProTΔ146-167']), verbo([reveals]), complemento([a, contorted, architecture, where, the, domains, are, not, vertically, 'stacked,', 'kringle-1', comes, within, 9, 'Å', of, the, protease, 'domain,', and, the, 'Gla-domain', primed, for, membrane, binding, comes, in, contact, with, 'kringle-2'])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, broaden, our, molecular, understanding, of, a, key, reaction, of, the, blood, coagulation, cascade, where, cofactor, 'Va']), verbo([enhances]), complemento([activation, of, prothrombin, by, factor, 'Xa', by, compressing, 'Lnk2', and, morphing, prothrombin, into, a, conformation, similar, to, the, structure, of, 'ProTΔ146-167'])].

[sujeto(['Herein', we, show, that, 'Smad3(-/-)', mice]), verbo([have]), complemento([increased, 'ROS', levels, in, skeletal, 'muscle,', and, inactivation, of, 'Mstn', in, these, mice, partially, ablates, the, oxidative, stress])].

[sujeto(['Consequently,', 'TNF-α,', nicotinamide, adenine, dinucleotide, phosphate, 'oxidase,', and, xanthine, oxidase, levels, were, 'up-regulated,', which]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, an, increase, in, 'ROS', production, in, 'Smad3(-/-)', skeletal, muscle])].
[sujeto(['The', exaggerated, 'ROS', in, the, 'Smad3(-/-)', muscle, potentiated]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'C/EBP', homology, protein, transcription, factor, to, 'MuRF1', 'promoter,', resulting, in, enhanced, 'MuRF1', levels, leading, to, muscle, atrophy])].
[sujeto(['Hypoxia']), verbo([induces]), complemento([a, loss, of, skeletal, muscle, mass, and, alters, myogenesis, in, 'vitro,', but, whether, it, affects, muscle, regeneration, in, vivo, following, injury, remains, to, be, elucidated])].
[sujeto(['Hypoxia', impaired, the, formation, and, growth, of, new, myofibers, and]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([the, loss, of, muscle, mass, during, the, first, 7, &, 'nbsp;days', of, 'regeneration,', but, did, not, affect, the, final, recovery, of, muscle, mass, at, 28, &, 'nbsp;days'])].
[sujeto(['The', impaired, regeneration, under, hypoxic, conditions, was, associated, with, a, blunted, activation, of, mechanical]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, '(', 'mTOR)', signaling, as, assessed, by, 'p70(S6K)', and, '4E-BP1', phosphorylation, that, was, independent, of, 'Akt', activation])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, mTOR, activity, with, hypoxia, was, consistent, with, the, increase, in, 'AMP-activated', protein, kinase, 'activity,', but, not, related, to, the, change, in, regulated, in, development, and, 'DNA', response, 1, protein, content])].
[sujeto(['Hypoxia']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, mRNA, levels, of, the, atrogene, muscle, ring, 'finger-1', after, 7, &, 'nbsp;days', of, 'regeneration,', though, muscle, atrophy, 'F', box, transcript, levels, remained, unchanged])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'MyoD', and, myogenin, mRNA, expression, with, regeneration, was, attenuated, at, 7, &, 'nbsp;days', with, hypoxia])].
[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', our, results, support, the, notion, that, the]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([loss, of, muscle, mass, observed, after, 1, &, 'nbsp;week', of, regeneration, under, hypoxic, conditions, could, mainly, result, from, the, impaired, formation, and, growth, of, new, fibers, resulting, from, a, reduction, in, protein, synthesis, and, satellite, cell, activity])].
[sujeto(['Muscle', ring, 'finger-1', '(', 'MuRF1)', is, a, 'muscle-specific', 'E3', ubiquitin, ligase, that]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, the, regulation, of, cardiac, mass, through, its, control, of, the, ubiquitin, proteasome, system])].
[sujeto(['While', it]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, suggested, that, 'MuRF1', is, required, for, cardiac, 'atrophy,', a, resting, cardiac, phenotype, has, not, been, reported, in, mice, with, a, null, deletion, '[', knockout, '(', 'KO)]', of, 'MuRF1'])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'MuRF1', 'KO', mice, have, significantly, larger, hearts, than, 'age-matched', 'wild-type', '(', 'WT)', littermates, at, '≥', 6, mo, of, age, and, that, loss, of, cardiac, mass, can, occur, in, the, absence, of, 'MuRF1'])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, cardiac, size, in, 'MuRF1', 'KO', mice, was, related, to, a, decrease, in, proteasome, activity, and, an, increase, in, 'Akt', signaling, relative, to, 'WT', mice])].
[sujeto(['Dex', treatment]), verbo([induced]), complemento([a, significant, loss, of, cardiac, mass, in, 'MuRF1', 'KO,', but, not, 'WT,', mice])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'Dex', treatment, resulted, in, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, proteasome, activity, in, 'KO,', but, a, decrease, in, 'WT,', mice])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', 'Akt/mammalian']), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, signaling, decreased, in, 'MuRF1', 'KO', mice, and, increased, in, 'WT', mice, in, response, to, 'Dex', treatment])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, demonstrate, that, 'MuRF1', plays, an, important, role, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([cardiac, size, through, alterations, in, protein, turnover, and, that, 'MuRF1', is, not, required, to, induce, cardiac, atrophy])].
[sujeto(['There', are, some, pieces, of, evidence, that, these, enzymes, are, also]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, regulation, of, gene, expression, in, skeletal, muscle, under, some, specific, conditions, '(', i])].
[sujeto(['In', the, study, using, the, conventional, simulation, model, of, the, gravitational, unloading, '(', rat, hindlimb, suspension, according, to, 'Ilyin', and, 'Novikov', modified, by, 'Morey-Holton)', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, from, the, 3, rd, day, till, 14, th, day, of, unloading, the, content, of, 'MuRF-1', and, 'MuRF-2', in, the, nuclear, fraction, 4, -, 5, fold, increased, in, unloaded, soleus, as, compared, to, the, control, values])].

[sujeto(['Despite', the, adverse, clinical, impact, of, 'cancer-induced', muscle, 'wasting,', pathways]), verbo([causing]), complemento([cachexia, are, 'controversial,', and, clinically, reliable, therapies, are, not, available])].
[sujeto(['A']), verbo([trigger]), complemento([of, muscle, protein, loss, is, the, 'Jak/Stat', 'pathway,', and, 'indeed,', we, found, that, conditioned, medium, from, 'C26', colon, carcinoma, '(', 'C26)', or, 'Lewis', lung, carcinoma, cells, activates, 'Stat3', '(', 'p-Stat3)', in, 'C2C12', myotubes])].
[sujeto(['We', identified, two, proteolytic, pathways, that, are]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, muscle, by, 'p-Stat3;', one, is, activation, of, 'caspase-3,', and, the, other, is, 'p-Stat3', to, 'myostatin,', 'MAFbx/Atrogin-1,', and, 'MuRF-1', via, 'CAAT/enhancer-binding', protein, δ, '(', 'C/EBPδ)'])].
[sujeto(['Using', sequential, deletions, of, the, 'caspase-3', promoter, and, 'CHIP', 'assays,', we, determined, that, 'Stat3', activation]), verbo([increases]), complemento(['caspase-3', expression, in, 'C2C12', cells])].
[sujeto(['Caspase-3', expression, and, proteolytic, activity, were]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([by, 'p-Stat3', in, muscles, of, 'tumor-bearing', mice])].
[sujeto(['In', mice, with, cachexia]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, 'Lewis', lung, carcinoma, or, 'C26', 'tumors,', 'knock-out', of, 'p-Stat3', in, muscle, or, with, a, small, chemical, inhibitor, of, 'p-Stat3', suppressed, muscle, mass, 'losses,', improved, protein, synthesis, and, degradation, in, 'muscle,', and, increased, body, weight, and, grip, strength])].
[sujeto(['Activation', of, 'p-Stat3']), verbo([stimulates]), complemento([a, pathway, from, 'C/EBPδ', to, myostatin, and, expression, of, 'MAFbx/Atrogin-1', and, increases, the, 'ubiquitin-proteasome', system])].
[sujeto(['Indeed,', 'C/EBPδ', 'KO']), verbo([decreases]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'MAFbx/Atrogin-1', and, 'myostatin,', while, increasing, muscle, mass, and, grip, strength])].
[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', cancer]), verbo([stimulates]), complemento(['p-Stat3', in, 'muscle,', activating, protein, loss, by, stimulating, 'caspase-3,', 'myostatin,', and, the, 'ubiquitin-proteasome', system])].
[sujeto(['These', results, could]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, novel, strategies, for, preventing, 'cancer-induced', muscle, wasting])].
[sujeto(['The', clinical, significance, of, diaphragm, weakness, in, critically, ill, patients, is, 'evident:', it, prolongs, ventilator, 'dependency,', and]), verbo([increases]), complemento([morbidity, and, duration, of, hospital, stay])].
[sujeto(['We', hypothesized, that, diaphragm, muscle, fibers, of, mechanically, ventilated, critically, ill, patients, display, atrophy, and, contractile, 'weakness,', and, that, the, 'ubiquitin-proteasome', pathway, is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, the, diaphragm])].
[sujeto(['This', study]), verbo([provides]), complemento([rationale, for, the, development, of, treatment, strategies, that, target, the, contractility, of, diaphragm, fibers, to, facilitate, weaning])].
[sujeto(['Rikkunshito', '(', 'RKT),', a, traditional, 'Japanese', herbal, 'medicine,', is, widely, used, for, the, treatment, for, patients, with, gastrointestinal, symptoms, and, known, to]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento([ghrelin, secretion])].
[sujeto(['After', 'BLM', 'administration,', mice, were]), verbo([provided]), complemento([with, either, 'RKT', or, distilled, water, on, a, daily, basis])].
[sujeto(['Skeletal', muscle, weights, were]), verbo([retained]), complemento([in, the, 'RKT-treated', 'mice,', in, conjunction, with, reduced, expressions, of, 'MuRF-1', and, 'atrogin-1', in, the, lysates, of, skeletal, muscle, found, in, lung, fibrosis])].
[sujeto(['Rikkunshito', administration, did, not]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([the, degree, of, loss, of, body, weight, or, food, intake, reduction, in, either, 'ghrelin-deficient', mice, or, growth, hormone, secretagogue, 'receptor-deficient', mice])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, indicate, that, 'RKT', administration, exerts, protective, effects, on, pulmonary, cachexia, by, ameliorating, skeletal, muscle, wasting, and, food, intake, reduction, as]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, the, ghrelin, system, 'and,', 'thus,', highlight, 'RKT', as, a, potential, therapeutic, agent, for, the, management, of, lung, fibrosis])].
[sujeto(['Skeletal', muscle, atrophy, is, a, pathological, condition, characterized, by, the]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, strength, and, muscle, 'mass,', an, increase, in, myosin, heavy, chain, '(', 'MHC)', degradation, and, increase, in, the, expression, of, two, 'muscle-specific', ubiquitin, 'ligases:', 'atrogin-1', and, 'MuRF-1'])].
[sujeto(['Angiotensin', 'II', '(', 'AngII)']), verbo([induces]), complemento([muscle, atrophy])].
[sujeto(['We', assessed, the, effects, of, 'Ang-(1-7)', on, the, skeletal, muscle, atrophy]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'AngII'])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, show, that, 'Ang-(1-7),', through, 'Mas,']), verbo([prevents]), complemento([the, effects, induced, by, 'AngII', in, muscle, 'gastrocnemius:', the, decrease, in, the, fibre, 'diameter,', muscle, strength, and, 'MHC', levels, and, the, increase, in, 'atrogin-1', and, 'MuRF-1'])].
