[sujeto(['Ang-(1-7)']), verbo([induces]), complemento(['AKT', phosphorylation, in, 'myotubes;', 'additionally,', we, demonstrated, that, the, inhibition, of, 'AKT', with, 'MK-2206', decreases, the, 'anti-atrophic', effects, of, 'Ang-(1-7)'])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', we, demonstrate, for, the, first, time, that, 'Ang-(1-7)', counteracts, the, skeletal, muscle, atrophy]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'AngII', through, a, mechanism, dependent, on, the, 'Mas', 'receptor,', which, involves, 'AKT', activity])].
[sujeto(['Western', blotting, was, used, for, determining, insulin, receptor, substrate, 1, '(', 'IRS-1)', and, 'AMR-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'AMPK)']), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, reciprocal, regulation, of, anabolic, and, catabolic, 'pathways,', as, well, as, 'E3-ligase', 'MURF-1,', and, elongation, factor, eEF2])].
[sujeto(['Functioning', of, the, 'IGF-1-dependent', 'IRS-1', signaling, pathway, was]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, the, recovery, period, only])].
[sujeto(['Though', the, content, of, ubiquitinligase, 'MURF-1', showed, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([after, 'flight,', on, completion, of, the, recovery, period, it, did, not, exceed, the, 'pre-flight', level, unambiguously])].
[sujeto(['Skeletal', muscle]), verbo([loss]), complemento([results, from, elevated, levels, of, protein, degradation, and, prevention, of, 'obesity-related', sarcopenic, muscle, loss, will, depend, on, strategies, that, target, pathways, involved, in, protein, degradation])].
[sujeto(['An', extract, from, 'Artemisia', 'dracunculus,', termed, 'PMI', 5011, ',', improves, insulin, signaling, and]), verbo([increases]), complemento([skeletal, muscle, myofiber, size, in, a, rodent, model, of, 'obesity-related', insulin, resistance])].
[sujeto(['Although', 'MuRF-1', ubiquitin, ligase, gene, expression, is, consistently, 'down-regulated', in, skeletal, 'muscle,', 'atrogin-1,', 'Fbxo40,', and, 'Traf6', expression, is, differentially]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'PMI', 5011])].

[sujeto(['The', aim, of, this, study, was, to, evaluate, the, effects, of, resistance, exercise, on, the, mRNA, expression, of, muscle, mammalian]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, '(', 'mTOR),', 'muscle-specific', 'RING', 'finger-1', '(', 'MuRF-1),', and, muscle, atrophy, 'F-box', '(', 'MAFbx)', in, the, presence, or, absence, of, whey, protein, ingestion])].
[sujeto(['We', hypothesized, that, resistance, exercise, in, combination, with, whey, protein, ingestion, alters, the, gene, expression, of, proteins, related, to, muscle, protein, synthesis, '(', 'mTOR)', 'and/or', degradation, '(', 'MuRF-1', and, 'MAFbx),', thus, affecting, muscle, weight]), verbo([gain]), complemento([in, rats])].
[sujeto(['Exercise', consisted, of]), verbo([inducing]), complemento([the, animals, to, perform, sets, of, jumps, for, 8, wk])].
[sujeto(['Whey', protein, exercised, rats, exhibited, higher, body, and, muscle, weight]), verbo([gain]), complemento([compared, with, 'control-exercised', rats, '(', 'P', =, 0.032, ')'])].
[sujeto(['The', expression, of, mTOR, was, reduced, by, exercise, but]), verbo([increased]), complemento([when, whey, protein, was, consumed, as, a, dietary, protein, '(', 'P', =, 0.005, ')'])].
[sujeto(['A', reduction, in, 'MAFbx', gene, transcription]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, whey, protein, and, the, interaction, between, exercise, and, whey, protein, ingestion, on, mTOR, gene, expression, contributed, significantly, to, differences, in, body, and, muscle, weight, gain])].
[sujeto(['Unfortunately,', 'DOX', can]), verbo([induce]), complemento([myopathy, in, both, cardiac, and, skeletal, 'muscle,', which, limits, its, clinical, use])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', exercise, training]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, protect, against, 'DOX-mediated', cardiac, and, skeletal, muscle, myopathy])].
[sujeto(['These', experiments, tested, the, hypothesis, that, 'short-term', exercise, training, protects, against, acute, 'DOX-induced', muscle, 'toxicity,', in, 'part,', due, to]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['forkhead-box', 'O', '(', 'FoxO)', transcription, of, atrophy, genes])].
[sujeto(['Our', data, demonstrate, that, 'DOX', administration, amplified, 'FoxO1', and, 'FoxO3', mRNA, expression, and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([transcription, of, 'FoxO', target, genes, '[', i])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', exercise, training, protected, against, 'DOX-induced']), verbo([increases]), complemento([of, 'FoxO1', and, 'MuRF-1', in, cardiac, muscle, and, also, prevented, the, rise, of, 'FoxO3,', 'MuRF-1,', and, 'BNIP3', in, soleus, muscle])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', our, results, indicate, that, exercise]), verbo([increased]), complemento([peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', 'receptor-gamma', 'coactivator-1', alpha, '(', 'PGC-1α)', in, both, the, heart, and, soleus, muscles])].
[sujeto(['This', is, important, because]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['PGC-1α', expression, is, known, to, suppress, 'FoxO', activity, resulting, in, reduced, expression, of, 'FoxO', target, genes])].
[sujeto(['Muscle-specific', 'RING', 'finger-1', '(', 'MuRF-1),', a, ubiquitin, ligase, and, key, regulator, of, 'proteasome-dependent', protein, 'degradation,', is, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([during, skeletal, muscle, atrophy])].
[sujeto(['The', transcription, factor, forkhead, box, 'O3', '(', 'FoxO3)']), verbo([induces]), complemento(['MuRF-1', 'expression,', but, the, direct, role, of, other, major, 'atrophy-related', transcription, 'factors,', such, as, 'SMAD3,', is, largely, unknown])].
[sujeto(['In', cultured, myotubes, or, human, embryonic, kidney, 'cells,', 'MuRF-1', mRNA, content, and, promoter, activity, were]), verbo([increased]), complemento([by, 'FoxO3', but, not, by, 'SMAD3', overexpression])].
[sujeto(['However,', 'FoxO3', and, 'SMAD3', coexpression, synergistically]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['MuRF-1', mRNA, and, promoter, activity])].
[sujeto(['Mutation', of, the, 'SMAD-binding', element, '(', 'SBE)', in, the, proximal, 'MuRF-1', promoter, or, overexpression, of, a, 'SMAD3', 'DNA-binding', mutant, attenuated, 'FoxO3-dependent', 'MuRF-1', promoter, 'activation,', showing, that, 'SMAD']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'DNA', is, required, for, optimal, activation, of, 'FoxO3-induced', transcription, of, 'MuRF-1'])].
[sujeto(['Using', chromatin, 'immunoprecipitation,', 'SMAD3', 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([increased, 'FoxO3', abundance, and, 'SBE', mutation, reduced, 'FoxO3', abundance, on, the, 'MuRF-1', promoter])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'SMAD3', overexpression, 'dose-dependently']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['FoxO3', protein, 'content,', and, coexpression, of, 'FoxO3', and, 'SMAD3', synergistically, increased, 'FoxO-dependent', gene, transcription, '[', assessed, with, a, 'FoxO', response, element, '(', 'FRE)-driven', 'reporter]'])].
[sujeto(['Collectively,', these, results, show, that, 'SMAD3']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([transcription, of, 'MuRF-1', by, increasing, 'FoxO3', binding, at, a, conserved, 'FRE-SBE', motif, within, the, proximal, promoter, 'region,', and, by, increasing, 'FoxO3', protein, content, and, transcriptional, activity])].
[sujeto(['These', data, are, the, first, to, indicate, that, two, major, transcription, factors]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([protein, 'degradation,', 'FoxO3', and, 'SMAD3,', converge, to, coordinately, and, directly, regulate, transcription, of, 'MuRF-1'])].
[sujeto(['The', mass, and, the, protein, 'content,', as, well, as, the, rate, of, protein, 'synthesis,', were]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([in, the, soleus, from, 'LPHC-fed', rats])].
[sujeto(['The', availability, of, amino, acids, was, 'diminished,', since, the, levels, of, various, essential, amino, acids, were]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([in, the, plasma, of, 'LPHC-fed', rats])].
[sujeto(['Soleus', muscles, from, 'LPHC-fed', rats, showed]), verbo([increased]), complemento([insulin, 'sensitivity,', with, increased, levels, of, insulin, receptor, and, phosphorylation, levels, of, 'AKT,', which, probably, explains, the, inhibition, of, both, the, 'caspase-3', activity, and, the, 'ubiquitin-proteasome', system])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', the]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([rate, of, protein, synthesis, may, be, the, driving, factor, to, the, lower, muscle, mass, gain, in, growing, rats, fed, the, 'LPHC', diet])].
[sujeto(['β-Hydroxy-β-methylbutyrate', '(', 'HMB)']), verbo([prevents]), complemento([deleterious, muscle, responses, under, pathological, 'conditions,', including, 'tumor-', and, chronic, steroid, 'therapy-related', muscle, losses])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, investigated, the, hypothesis, that, 'HMB', may]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([the, balance, between, protein, synthesis, and, degradation, in, the, 'PI3K/Akt-mediated', mammalian, target, of, rapamycin, '(', 'mTOR)', and, 'FoxO1/FoxO3a-dependent', mechanisms, in, differentiated, 'C2C12', muscle, cells])].
[sujeto(['β-Hydroxy-β-methylbutyrate', also, 'up-regulated', 'FoxO1', and, 'FoxO3a', 'phosphorylation,', and, these, changes, were]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, 'LY294002'])].
[sujeto(['Regulation', of, muscle, mass, depends, on, the, balance, between, synthesis, and, degradation, of, 'proteins,', which, is, under, the, control, of, different, signalling, pathways]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'hormonal,', neural, and, nutritional, stimuli])].
[sujeto(['Such', stimuli, are, altered, in, several, 'pathologies,', including, 'COPD', '(', chronic, obstructive, pulmonary, 'disease),', 'diabetes,', 'AIDS', and, cancer, '(', 'cachexia),', as, well, as, in, some, conditions, such, as, immobilization, and, aging, '(', 'sarcopenia),']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, muscle, 'atrophy,', which, represents, a, significant, contribution, to, patient, morbidity])].
[sujeto(['The', 'KKS', '(', 'kallikrein-kinin', 'system)', is, composed, of, the, enzymes, 'kallikreins,', which, generate, active, peptides, called, kinins, that]), verbo([activate]), complemento([two, 'G-protein-coupled', 'receptors,', namely, 'B1', and, 'B2,', which, are, expressed, in, a, variety, of, tissues])].
[sujeto(['Owing', to, such, pleiotropic, actions, of, the, 'KKS', by, local, modulatory, events, and, the, probable, 'fine-tuning', of, associated, signalling, cascades]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, skeletal, muscle, catabolic, disorders, '[', for, 'example,', 'NF-κB', '(', nuclear, factor, 'κB)', and, 'PI3K', '(', phosphoinositide, 3, -, 'kinase)/Akt', 'pathways],', we, hypothesized, that, 'KKS', might, contribute, to, the, modulation, of, intracellular, responses, in, atrophying, skeletal, muscle])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, show, that, kinin, 'B1', receptor, activation]), verbo([induced]), complemento([a, decrease, in, the, diameter, of, 'C2C12', 'myotubes,', activation, of, 'NF-κB,', a, decrease, in, 'Akt', phosphorylation, 'levels,', and, an, increase, in, the, mRNA, levels, of, the, ubiquitin, 'E3', ligases, 'atrogin-1', and, 'MuRF-1', '(', muscle, 'RING-finger', 'protein-1)'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'vivo,', we, observed, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, kinin, 'B1', receptor, mRNA, levels, in, an, 'androgen-sensitive', model, of, muscle, atrophy])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', knockout, of, the, kinin, 'B1', receptor, in, mice]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, an, impairment, in, 'MuRF-1', mRNA, expression, after, induction, of, 'LA', '(', levator, 'ani)', muscle, atrophy])].
[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', using, pharmacological, and, 'gene-ablation', 'tools,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([obtained, evidence, that, the, kinin, 'B1', receptor, plays, a, significant, role, in, the, regulation, of, skeletal, muscle, proteolysis, in, the, 'LA', muscle, atrophy, model])].
[sujeto(['The', mechanisms, of, muscle, wasting, and]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([mobility, have, a, major, functional, effect, in, rheumatoid, 'arthritis,', but, they, have, been, poorly, studied])].
[sujeto(['Animal', body, 'weight,', gastrocnemius, muscle, 'weight,', and, relative, muscle, weight]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([20, '%', ',', 30, '%', ',', and, 20, '%', ',', 'respectively,', in, the, 'CIA', rats])].
[sujeto(['There', was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, 'MuRF-1', in, the, 'IM', '(', 1.9, -, 'fold)', and, 'CIA', '(', 3.1, -, 'fold)', groups, and, of, myogenin, in, the, muscles, of, the, 'CIA', animals, '(', 1.7, -, 'fold),', while, 'MyoD', expression, was, decreased, in, the, 'IM', '(', 20, '%', ')', rats])].
[sujeto(['This', study, demonstrated, that, the, development, of, experimental, arthritis, is, associated, with]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['mobility,', body, 'weight,', and, muscle, loss])].
[sujeto(['Both', 'IM', and, 'CIA', animal, models, presented, muscle, 'atrophy,', but, while, proteolysis, and, the, regeneration, pathways, were]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, the, 'CIA', 'model,', there, was, no, activation, of, regeneration, in, the, 'IM', model])].
[sujeto(['We', can, assume, that, muscle, atrophy, in, experimental, arthritis, is, associated, with, the, disease, itself, and, not, simply, with]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([mobility])].
[sujeto(['Progressive', cardiac, hypertrophy, owing, to, pathological, 'stimuli,', such, as, pressure, 'overload,', is, frequently, associated, with, the, development, of, heart, 'failure,', a, major]), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, morbidity, and, mortality, worldwide])].
[sujeto(['Growing', evidence]), verbo([has]), complemento([shown, that, miRNAs, are, extensively, involved, in, the, pathogenesis, of, cardiac, hypertrophy])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we, examined, the, hypothesis, that, the, 'miR-19a/b', family]), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, a, key, regulator, of, cardiac, hypertrophy, and, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Forced', overexpression, of, 'miR-19a/b', was, sufficient, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([hypertrophy, in, rat, neonatal, cardiomyocytes])].
[sujeto(['Luciferase', assays, revealed, that, 'miR-19a/b', directly]), verbo([target]), complemento([the, 'anti-hypertrophic', genes, 'atrogin-1', and, 'MuRF-1', '(', muscle, 'RING-finger', 'protein-1)'])].
[sujeto(['The', endogenous, expressions, of, the]), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, were, 'down-regulated', by, 'miR-19a/b'])].
[sujeto(['Pro-hypertrophic', 'calcineurin/NFAT', '(']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([factor, of, activated, 'T-cells)', signalling, was, elevated, markedly, in, the, presence, of, 'miR-19b,', and, the, calcineurin, inhibitor, 'CsA', '(', cyclosporin, 'A)', and, the, 'PKC', '(', protein, kinase, 'C)', inhibitor, 'GF10923X', significantly, attenuated, the, 'miR-19b-mediated', increase, in, cell, size, and, expression, of, hypertrophic, markers])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'miR-19b']), verbo([led]), complemento([to, increased, cell, survival, through, 'up-regulation', of, the, 'NFAT', target, gene, encoding, 'α-crystallin-B', and, repression, of, the, 'pro-apoptotic', gene, 'Bim', '(', 'Bcl-2-interacting', mediator, of, cell, 'death)', under, 'ER', '(', endoplasmic, 'reticulum)', stress, conditions])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', the, results, of, the, present, study, demonstrate, that, the, 'miR-19a/b', family]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([phenotypes, of, cardiomyocytes, via, suppression, of, multiple, direct, target, genes])].
[sujeto(['PGC-1α', and, 'VEGF', expression]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')', after, acute, 'RE', in, the, 'untrained,', but, not, the, trained, state])].
[sujeto(['Exercise']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')', p70S6K, phosphorylation, both, before, and, after, 'training,', yet, this, increase, tended, to, be, more, prominent, for, 'AE+RE', than, 'RE', before, training])].
[sujeto(['Prolonged', immobilization, '(', 'IM)', results, in, skeletal, muscle, atrophy, accompanied, by]), verbo([increased]), complemento([reactive, oxygen, species, '(', 'ROS)', 'generation,', 'inflammation,', and, protein, degradation])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, biological, consequence, of, remobilizing, such, muscle]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, studied, only, sparsely])].
[sujeto(['Muscle', to, body, weight, ratios, of, three, major, leg, muscles, were, significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([as, a, result, of, 'IM'])].
[sujeto(['Two', 'ubiquitin-proteasome', pathway, 'enzymes,', muscle, atrophy, 'F-box', '(', 'MAFb', or, 'atrogin-1)', and, muscle, ring, 'finger-1', '(', 'MuRF-1),', were, upregulated, with, 'IM', and]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([at, high, levels, during, 'RM'])].

[sujeto(['IM']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([mitochondrial, transcription, factor, 'A', and, 'cytochrome-c', content, by, 57, '%', and, 63, '%', '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.01, ')', ',', 'respectively,', and, 'cytochrome-c', oxidase, activity, by, 58, '%', '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')'])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['factor-κB', '(', 'NF-κB)', pathway, activation, was, observed, only, after, 'RM,', but, not, after, 'IM', alone])].
[sujeto(['These', data, indicate, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'ROS', generation, during, the, initial, phase, of, muscle, 'RM', that, could, activate, the, 'NF-κB', 'pathway,', and, elicit, inflammation, and, oxidative, stress])].
[sujeto(['Body', 'weight,', tumor, 'volume,', gastrocnemius, muscle, and, epididymal, adipose, 'mass,', serum, metabolic, markers, and, 'cytokines,', and, the, expression, of]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['factor-κB', and, two, 'E3', ubiquitin, 'ligases,', 'atrogin-1', and, 'MuRF-1,', were, measured])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', all, treatments, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([tumor, necrosis, factor, alpha, levels, as, compared, to, those, observed, in, the, healthy, control, animals, '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.001, ')'])].
[sujeto(['Insulin', levels, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, the, placebo, group, as, compared, to, those, in, the, healthy, control, group, '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')', ',', which, were, reduced, in, all, the, treatment, groups, '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')'])].
[sujeto(['Moderate', exercise, training, improves, energetic, 'metabolism,', tissue, perfusion, and]), verbo([induces]), complemento([cardiac, and, skeletal, muscle, remodeling])].
[sujeto(['Sildenafil,', a, potent, 'phosphodiesterase-5', inhibitor, used, to, treat, erectile, 'dysfunction,', reduces, infarct, size, and]), verbo([increases]), complemento([tissue, oxygenation, in, experimental, models, of, cardiovascular, disease])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([evaluated, the, effects, of, prolonged, moderate, exercise, training, and, a, repeat, administration, of, sildenafil, on, the, rat, gastrocnemius, and, cardiac, muscles])].
[sujeto(['Physical', exercise, did, not]), verbo([induce]), complemento([cardiac, 'hypertrophy,', whereas, it, increased, mRNA, levels, of, the, 'PGC-1α,', 'HIF-1α', and, 'VEGF', 'genes,', which, are, involved, in, mitochondrial, biogenesis, and, 'angiogenesis,', and, reduced, mRNA, levels, of, 'FoxO3a,', 'MuRF-1', and, 'Atrogin-1'])].
[sujeto(['Sildenafil', 'dose-dependently']), verbo([promoted]), complemento([both, 'angiogenesis,', as, shown, by, increased, capillary, 'density,', and, muscle, 'atrophy,', as, shown, by, muscle, fibre, size])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([report]), complemento([may, impact, on, the, use, of, sildenafil, as, a, substance, able, to, influence, sports, performance])].
[sujeto(['Small', clinical, studies]), verbo([suggest]), complemento(['MuRF-1', and, 'atrogin-1', expression, in, the, quadriceps, muscle, is, also, increased, in, stable, patients, with, 'Chronic', 'Obstructive', 'Pulmonary', 'Disease', compared, to, controls])].
[sujeto(['However,', it, remains, unclear, whether, these, ligases]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, role, in, maintaining, a, 'muscle-wasted', state, in, 'COPD', patients])].
[sujeto(['This', does, not, exclude, the, possibility, of, transient]), verbo([increases]), complemento([in, ubiquitin, ligases, during, acute, catabolic, episodes])].
[sujeto(['The', 'RING', domain, is, a]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([zinc, finger, 'motif,', which, serves, as, a, 'protein-protein', interaction, interface])].
[sujeto(['Searches', of, a, human, heart]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([sequence, tag, data, base, for, genes, encoding, the, 'RING', domain, identified, a, novel, 'cDNA,', named, striated, muscle, 'RING', zinc, finger, protein, '(', 'SMRZ)'])].
[sujeto(['Northern', blots, demonstrated, that, 'SMRZ', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([exclusively, in, striated, muscle])].
[sujeto(['In', the, cardiovascular, 'system,', 'SMRZ', is, more, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, fetal, heart, than, in, the, adult, heart, '(', slightly, higher, expression, in, the, ventricle, than, in, the, 'atrium),', suggesting, that, 'SMRZ', is, developmentally, regulated])].
[sujeto(['SMRZ', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, interact, with, 'SMT3b,', a, 'ubiquitin-like', 'protein,', through, the, 'SMRZ-RING', domain])].
[sujeto(['This', interaction, was, abolished, by, mutagenesis, of]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['RING', domain, residues])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'SMRZ', may, play, an, important, role, in, striated, muscle, cell, embryonic, development, and, perhaps, in, cell, cycle, regulation])].
[sujeto(['The', mitochondrial, transcription, termination, factor, '(', 'MTERF)', family, is, a, group, of, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['DNA-binding', proteins, composed, of, four, key, 'members,', 'MTERF1-4'])].
[sujeto(['To', 'date,', several, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([investigated, the, binding, sites, of, 'MTERF1', on, mitochondrial, genome, and, the, regulation, of, mitochondrial, gene, 'transcription,', but, the, more, intricate, connection, between, mitochondrial, genes, transcription, 'regulation,', mitochondrial, oxidative, phosphorylation, '(', 'OXPHOS),', and, cell, proliferation, is, still, poorly, understood])].
[sujeto(['Over-expression', of, 'MTERF1']), verbo([increased]), complemento([mitochondrial, oxidative, phosphorylation, activity, and, promoted, 'ATP', 'synthesis,', cyclin, 'D1', 'expression,', and, cell, 'proliferation,', while, its, knockdown, inhibited, 'ATP', 'synthesis,', decreased, cyclin, 'D1', 'expression,', and, slowed, the, cell, growth])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, 'MTERF1', may, promote, cell, proliferation, by, regulating, oxidative, phosphorylation, activity, in, 'HeLa', cells])].
[sujeto(['Ultimately,', these, findings, create, a, foundation, for, further, and, more, conclusive, studies, on, the, physiological, functions, of, 'MTERF', family, by]), verbo([providing]), complemento([novel, insights, into, the, potential, mechanisms, underlying, cell, proliferation, regulation])].
[sujeto(['Mitochondrial', transcription, termination, factor, 1, ',', 'MTERF1,']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, to, couple, rRNA, gene, transcription, initiation, with, termination, and, is, therefore, thought, to, be, a, key, regulator, of, mammalian, mitochondrial, ribosome, biogenesis])].
[sujeto(['The', prevailing, model, is, based, on, a, series, of, observations, published, over, the, last, two, 'decades,', but, no, 'in&nbsp;vivo', evidence, exists, to, show, that, 'MTERF1']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([transcription, of, the, 'heavy-strand', region, of, mtDNA, containing, the, rRNA, genes])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, demonstrate, that, knockout, of, 'Mterf1', in, mice]), verbo([has]), complemento([no, effect, on, mitochondrial, rRNA, levels, or, mitochondrial, translation])].
[sujeto(['Instead,']), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'Mterf1', influences, transcription, initiation, at, the, 'light-strand', 'promoter,', resulting, in, a, decrease, 'of&nbsp;de', novo, transcription, manifested, as, reduced, 7, 'S&nbsp;RNA', levels])].
[sujeto(['Based', on, these, 'observations,', we]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'MTERF1', does, not, regulate, 'heavy-strand', 'transcription,', but, rather, acts, to, block, transcription, on, the, opposite, strand, of, mtDNA, to, prevent, transcription, interference, at, the, 'light-strand', promoter])].
[sujeto(['The', structure, of, the, mitochondrial, transcription, termination, factor, '(', 'MTERF1)']), verbo([provides]), complemento([novel, insight, into, the, mechanism, of, 'binding,', recognition, of, the, termination, sequence, and, the, conformational, changes, involved, in, mediating, termination])].
[sujeto(['Besides', its, functional, 'implications,', this, structure]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, framework, to, understand, the, consequences, of, numerous, diseases, associated, with, mitochondrial, 'DNA', mutations])].
[sujeto([',', 2010, ')']), verbo([reports]), complemento([a, novel, 'DNA-binding', fold, in, mitochondrial, transcription, termination, factor, 1, '(', 'MTERF1),', which, causes, unwinding, and, base, eversion, at, its, target, mtDNA, sequence])].
[sujeto(['To', characterize, the, organization, of, 'mtDNA-protein', complexes, '(', known, as, 'nucleoids)', in, 'vivo,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([probed, the, mtDNA, surface, exposure, using, 'site-specific', 'DNA', methyltransferases, targeted, to, the, mitochondria])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([observed, that, 'DNA', methyltransferases, have, different, accessibility, to, different, sites, on, the, mtDNA, based, on, the, levels, of, protein, occupancy])].
[sujeto(['We', focused, our, studies, on, selected, regions, of, mtDNA, that, are, believed, to, be, major, regulatory, regions]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, transcription, and, replication])].
[sujeto(['The', transcription, termination, region, '(', 'TERM)', within, the, 'tRNA(Leu(UUR))', gene, was, consistently, and, strongly, protected, from, 'methylation,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([frequent, and, high, affinity, binding, of, mitochondrial, transcription, termination, factor, 1, '(', 'mTERF1)', to, the, site])].
[sujeto(['Manipulations', aiming, at]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([or, decreasing, the, levels, of, the, mitochondrial, transcription, factor, 'A', '(', 'TFAM)', led, to, decreased, in, vivo, 'methylation,', whereas, manipulations, that, stimulated, mtDNA, replication, led, to, increased, methylation])].
[sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, map, of, human, mtDNA, accessibility, and, demonstrate, that, nucleoids, are, dynamically, associated, with, proteins])].
[sujeto(['The', mammalian, 'MTERF', family, of, proteins]), verbo([has]), complemento([four, 'members,', named, 'MTERF1', to, 'MTERF4,', which, were, identified, in, homology, searches, using, the, mitochondrial, transcription, termination, 'factor,', mTERF, '(', here, denoted, 'MTERF1)', as, query])].
[sujeto(['MTERF1', and, 'MTERF3', are, known, to]), verbo([participate]), complemento([in, the, control, of, mitochondrial, 'DNA', 'transcription,', but, the, function, of, the, other, two, proteins, is, not, known])].
[sujeto(['Edman', degradation, of, 'MTERF2', isolated, from, stably, transfected, 'HeLa', cells, demonstrates, that, mature, 'MTERF2', lacks, a]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([peptide, '(', amino, acids, 1, -, 35, ')', present, in, the, precursor, form, of, the, protein])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, work]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, basic, biochemical, characterization, of, 'MTERF2,', paving, the, way, for, future, functional, studies])].
[sujeto(['Members', of, the, 'so-called', mitochondrial, transcription, termination, factor, '(', 'mTERF)', family, are]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, metazoans, and, plants, and, regulate, organellar, gene, expression, at, different, levels])].
[sujeto(['Bacterial', 'one-hybrid', 'screening,', electrophoretic, mobility, shift, 'assays,', and, coimmunoprecipitation, experiments]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, specific, interaction, between, mTERF6, and, an, 'RNA', sequence, in, the, chloroplast, isoleucine, transfer, 'RNA', gene, '(', trnI])].
[sujeto(['In', 'vitro,', recombinant, mTERF6]), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, its, plastid, 'DNA', target, site, can, terminate, transcription])].
[sujeto(['However,', it, is, clear, that, mTERF6, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, maturation, of, trnI])].
[sujeto(['Mitochondrial', transcription, termination, factor, 4, ',', 'MTERF4,', a, member, of, the, 'MTERF', 'family,']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, the, regulation, of, mitochondrial, translation, by, targeting, 'NSUN4', to, the, large, mitochondrial, ribosome])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([a, novel, role, for, 'MTERF4', in, regulating, mitochondrial, dysfunction, induced, by, 'MPP(+)'])].
[sujeto(['We', observed, that, knockdown, of, 'MTERF4', in, 'SH-SY5Y', cells, resulted, in]), verbo([increased]), complemento([mitochondrial, 'DNA', transcription, levels, and, decreased, mitochondrial, 'DNA', translation, levels])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', after, treatment, with, 2, &, 'nbsp;mM', 'MPP(+)', for, 24, &, 'nbsp;h,', the, expression, levels, of, 'MTERF4', were]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([compared, to, 'wide-type', 'SH-SY5Y', cells])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', after, exposure, to, 2, &, 'nbsp;mM', 'MPP(+)', for, 24, &, 'nbsp;h,', knockdown, of, 'MTERF4', in, 'SH-SY5Y', cells, worsened, the, mitochondrial, dysfunction]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'MPP(+),', including, increased, reactive, oxygen, 'species,', accumulated, cleaved, 'PARP-1,', decreased, mitochondrial, membrane, potential, and, depressed, mitochondrial, complexes])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', overexpression, of, 'MTERF4', in, 'SH-SY5Y', cells, partially, alleviated, the, mitochondrial, dysfunction]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'MPP(+)'])].
[sujeto(['Based', on, these, 'findings,', we]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, main, function, of, 'MTERF4', is, regulating, mtDNA, 'expression,', and, it, is, the, crucial, factor, in, the, mechanism, of, mitochondrial, dysfunction, in, 'SH-SY5Y', cells, induced, by, 'MPP(+)'])].
[sujeto(['MTERF4', probably, is, the]), verbo([triggering]), complemento([of, the, pathogenesis, of, 'Parkinson\'s', disease, induced, by, environmental, toxin])].
[sujeto(['The', molecular, chaperone, heat, shock, protein101, '(', 'HSP101)', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, acquired, thermotolerance, in, plants, and, other, organisms])].
[sujeto(['To', identify, factors, that]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'HSP101', or, that, are, involved, in, 'thermotolerance,', we, screened, for, extragenic, suppressors, of, a, 'dominant-negative', allele, of, 'Arabidopsis', thaliana, 'HSP101,', 'hot1-4'])].
[sujeto(['Missense', '(', 'shot1-1)', and, 'T-DNA', insertion, '(', 'shot1-2)', mutants]), verbo([suppress]), complemento([the, 'hot1-4', 'heat-hypersensitive', phenotype])].

[sujeto(['Microarray', analysis]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([altered, mitochondrial, function, 'and/or', retrograde, signaling, in, 'shot1-2', increases, transcripts, of, other, 'HSPs', and, alters, expression, of, 'redox-related', genes])].
[sujeto(['Reduced', oxidative, damage, is, the, likely]), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, shot1, 'thermotolerance,', indicating, 'HSP101', repairs, protein, oxidative, damage, 'and/or', reduced, oxidative, damage, allows, recovery, in, the, absence, of, 'HSP101'])].
[sujeto(['Changes', in, 'organelle-encoded', transcripts, in, shot1, demonstrate, that, 'SHOT1', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, organelle, gene, regulation])].
[sujeto(['The', heat, tolerance, of, shot1, emphasizes, the, importance, of, mitochondria, in, stress, 'tolerance,', and, defining, its, function, may]), verbo([provide]), complemento([insights, into, control, of, oxidative, damage, for, engineering, 'stress-resistant', plants])].
[sujeto(['In', mammalian, 'cells,', a, family, of, mitochondrial, transcription, termination, factors, '(', 'MTERFs)']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([mitochondrial, gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['Mitochondrial', transcription, termination, factor, 3, '(', 'MTERF3)', is, the, most]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([member, of, the, 'MTERF', family, and, a, negative, regulator, of, mammalian, mitochondrial, 'DNA', transcription])].
[sujeto(['To', create, a, specific, polyclonal, antibody, against, human, 'MTERF3', '(', 'hMTERF3),', we, first, cloned, hMTERF3, into, prokaryotic, expression, vector, 'pGEX-4T-1,', and, 'GST-hMTERF3', was, efficiently]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'Escherichia', coli, after, induction, by, 'IPTG'])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['GST-tagged', hMTERF3, fusion, protein, was, purified, by, passive, 'electro-elution', process, and, then, used, to, immunize, 'BALB/c', 'mice,', we, obtained, 'anti-GST-hMTERF3', polyclonal, antibody, purified, by, protein, 'A', column, and, determined, the, sensitivity, and, specificity, of, the, antibody, against, human, 'MTERF3', by, 'enzyme-linked', immunosorbent, assay, and, 'Western', blot, assay])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', the, 'full-length', hMTERF3, protein]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, human, embryonic, kidney, 293, 'T', cells, was, detected, by, 'anti-GST-hMTERF3', in, western, blot, analysis, and, immunofluorescence, staining])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, results, demonstrate, the, functionality, of, the, mouse, 'anti-GST-hMTERF3', polyclonal, antibody, which, will]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, useful, tool, for, further, characterization, of, hMTERF3])].
[sujeto(['For', 'TFB1M', and, 'TFB2M,', the, mRNA, expression, was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, the, 'R-leg', after, 10, days, of, 'training,', but, not, in, the, 'NR-leg'])].
[sujeto(['This', study, further, establishes, that, 'TFAM', protein, levels, are, higher, in, conditions, with]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([oxidative, capacity])].
[sujeto(['The', mRNA, levels, of, 'TFB1M', and, 'TFB2M', are, influenced, by, endurance, 'training,', possibly]), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([a, role, for, these, factors, in, the, regulation, of, 'exercise-induced', mitochondrial, biogenesis])].
[sujeto(['As', a, consequence, of, this, 'mutation,', 'plastid-specific', rRNA, levels]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([and, protein, synthesis, in, plastids, of, soldat10, is, attenuated])].
[sujeto(['This', disruption, of, chloroplast, homeostasis, in, soldat10, seedlings, affects, communication, between, chloroplasts, and, the, nucleus, and]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, changes, in, the, 'steady-state', concentration, of, nuclear, gene, transcripts])].
[sujeto(['Even', though, 'soldat10/flu', seedlings, overaccumulate, the, photosensitizer, protochlorophyllide, in, the, dark, and]), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, expression, of, '(', 1, ')', 'O(2)-responsive', genes, after, a, 'dark-to-light', shift, they, do, not, show, a, '(', 1, ')', 'O(2)-dependent', cell, death, response])].
[sujeto(['Disturbance', of, chloroplast, homeostasis, in, emerging, 'soldat10/flu', seedlings, seems, to, antagonize, a, subsequent, '(', 1, ')', 'O(2)-mediated', cell, death, response, without]), verbo([suppressing]), complemento(['(', 1, ')', 'O(2)-dependent', retrograde, signaling])].
[sujeto(['The', results, of, this, work]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([the, unexpected, complexity, of, what, is, commonly, referred, to, as, '\'', plastid, 'signaling\''])].
[sujeto(['Each', organelle]), verbo([has]), complemento([multiple, copies, of, a, covalently, closed, circular, 'DNA', genome, '(', 'mtDNA)'])].
[sujeto(['Thus', the, majority, of, respiratory, proteins, and, all, of, the, other, gene, products, necessary, for, the, myriad, mitochondrial, functions, are, derived, from]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([genes])].
[sujeto(['Transcription', of, mtDNA]), verbo([requires]), complemento([a, small, number, of, 'nucleus-encoded', proteins, including, a, single, 'RNA', polymerase, '(', 'POLRMT),', auxiliary, factors, necessary, for, promoter, recognition, '(', 'TFB1M,', 'TFB2M)', and, activation, '(', 'Tfam),', and, a, termination, factor, '(', 'mTERF)'])].
[sujeto(['Nucleomitochondrial', interactions, depend, on, the, interplay, between, transcription, factors, '(', 'NRF-1,', 'NRF-2,', 'PPARalpha,', 'ERRalpha,', 'Sp1,', and, 'others)', and, members, of, the, 'PGC-1', family, of]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([coactivators, '(', 'PGC-1alpha,', 'PGC-1beta,', and, 'PRC)'])].
[sujeto(['The', transcription, factors]), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, that, specify, the, respiratory, 'chain,', the, mitochondrial, 'transcription,', translation, and, replication, 'machinery,', and, protein, import, and, assembly, apparatus, among, others])].
[sujeto(['These', factors, are, in, turn]), verbo([activated]), complemento([directly, or, indirectly, by, 'PGC-1', family, coactivators, whose, differential, expression, is, controlled, by, an, array, of, environmental, signals, including, 'temperature,', energy, 'deprivation,', and, availability, of, nutrients, and, growth, factors])].
[sujeto(['These', transcriptional, paradigms]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, basic, framework, for, understanding, the, integration, of, mitochondrial, biogenesis, and, function, with, signaling, events, that, dictate, 'cell-', and, 'tissue-specific', energetic, properties])].
[sujeto(['The', mammalian, mitochondrial, transcription, termination, factor, mTERF]), verbo([binds]), complemento([with, high, affinity, to, a, site, within, the, 'tRNA(Leu(UUR))', gene, and, regulates, the, amount, of, read, through, transcription, from, the, ribosomal, 'DNA', into, the, remaining, genes, of, the, major, coding, strand, of, mitochondrial, 'DNA', '(', 'mtDNA)'])].
[sujeto(['Electrophoretic', mobility, shift, assays, '(', 'EMSA)', and, 'SELEX,', using, mitochondrial, protein, extracts, from, cells]), verbo([induced]), complemento([to, overexpress, 'mTERF,', revealed, 'novel,', weaker, 'mTERF-binding', 'sites,', clustered, in, several, regions, of, 'mtDNA,', notably, in, the, major, 'non-coding', region, '(', 'NCR)'])].
[sujeto(['Such']), verbo([binding]), complemento([in, vivo, was, supported, by, mtDNA, immunoprecipitation])].
[sujeto(['The', strength, of, pausing, was]), verbo([modulated]), complemento([by, the, expression, level, of, mTERF])].
[sujeto([mTERF, overexpression, also, affected, replication, pausing, in, other, regions, of, the, genome, in, which, mTERF]), verbo([binding]), complemento([was, found])].

[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'work,', addition, of, mTERF, to, a, 'HeLa', cell, mitochondrial, 'lysate-based', reaction, mixture, containing, an, artificial, rDNA, template, did, indeed, specifically]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento([rDNA, transcription])].
[sujeto(['This', stimulation]), verbo([required]), complemento([that, mTERF, be, simultaneously, bound, to, the, rDNA, transcription, termination, and, initiation, sites, in, the, same, 'molecule,', thus, forming, a, loop])].
[sujeto(['Most', 'significantly,', a, double]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, mTERF, to, the, rDNA, 'molecule,', with, resulting, loop, 'formation,', was, also, shown, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['These', results, strongly]), verbo([suggest]), complemento(['that,', to, satisfy, the, need, for, high, rate, of, rDNA, 'transcription,', human, mitochondrial, rRNA, synthesis, involves, 'mTERF-mediated', rDNA, looping, that, promotes, recycling, of, the, transcription, machinery])].
[sujeto(['The', 'full-length', mTERFL, cDNA]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, isolated, and, the, genomic, structure, determined])].

[sujeto(['Here', we, present, evidence, that, 'TAB2', and, 'TAB3', are, receptors, that]), verbo([bind]), complemento([preferentially, to, lysine, 63, -, linked, polyubiquitin, chains, through, a, highly, conserved, zinc, finger, '(', 'ZnF)', domain])].

[sujeto(['We', also, show, that, 'TAB2']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, polyubiquitinated, 'RIP', following, 'TNFalpha', stimulation])].
[sujeto(['These', results, indicate, that, polyubiquitin]), verbo([binding]), complemento([domains, represent, a, new, class, of, signaling, domains, that, regulate, protein, kinase, activity, through, a, nonproteolytic, mechanism])].
[sujeto(['The', antiapoptotic, properties, of, the, inhibitor, of, apoptosis, '(', 'IAP)', family, of, proteins]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, linked, to, caspase, inhibition])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, described, an, alternative, mechanism, of, 'XIAP', inhibition, of, apoptosis, that, depends, on, the, selective, activation, of, 'JNK1'])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, two, other, members, of, the, 'IAP', 'family,', 'NAIP', and, 'ML-IAP,', both, activate, 'JNK1'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'MAP3', 'kinase,', 'TAK1,', appears, to, be, an, essential, component, of, this, antiapoptotic, pathway, since, 'IAP-mediated', activation, of, 'JNK1,', as, well, as, protection, against, 'TNF-alpha-', and, 'ICE-induced', 'apoptosis,', is]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([when, catalytically, inactive, 'TAK1', is, expressed])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'XIAP,', 'NAIP,', and, 'JNK1']), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, 'TAK1'])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'XIAP\'s', antiapoptotic, activity, is, achieved, by, two, separate, 'mechanisms:', one, requiring, 'TAK1-dependent', 'JNK1', activation, and, the, second, involving, caspase, inhibition])].
[sujeto(['Inhibitor', of, 'Apoptosis', 'Proteins', '(', 'IAPs)', are, the]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, extensive, research, in, the, field, of, cancer, therapy, since, they, regulate, apoptosis, and, cell, survival])].
[sujeto(['Smac-mimetics,', the, most, promising, 'IAP-targeting', compounds, specifically]), verbo([recognize]), complemento([the, 'IAP-BIR3', domain, and, promote, 'apoptosis,', competing, with, caspases, for, 'IAP', binding])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'Smac-mimetics', interfere, with, the, 'NF-κB', survival, 'pathway,']), verbo([inducing]), complemento([cIAP1, and, cIAP2, degradation, through, an, 'auto-ubiquitination', process])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, that, the, 'XIAP-BIR1', '(', 'X-BIR1)', domain, is, involved, in, the, interaction, with, 'TAB1,', an, upstream, adaptor, for, 'TAK1', kinase, 'activation,', which, in, turn, couples, with, the, 'NF-κB', survival, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, crystal, structure, of, the, human, 'X-BIR1', domain, in, the, absence, and, in, the, presence, of, 'NF023,', as, a, starting, concept, for, the, design, of, novel, 'BIR1-specific', compounds, acting, synergistically, with, existing, 'pro-apoptotic', drugs, in, cancer, therapy])].
[sujeto(['Defects', in, apoptosis, regulation, are, one, main]), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, cancer, development, and, may, result, from, overexpression, of, 'anti-apoptotic', proteins, such, as, inhibitor, of, apoptosis, proteins, '(', 'IAPs)'])].
[sujeto(['IAPs', are, cell, death, regulators, 'that,', among, other, 'functions,']), verbo([bind]), complemento(['caspases,', and, interfere, with, apoptotic, signaling, via, death, receptors, or, intrinsic, cell, death, pathways])].
[sujeto(['All', 'IAPs', share, one, to, three, common, 'structures,', the, so, called, 'baculovirus-IAP-repeat', '(', 'BIR)-domains', that, allow, them, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([caspases, and, other, proteins])].
[sujeto(['A', natural, inhibitor, of, 'XIAP', is, 'SMAC/Diablo,', which, is]), verbo([released]), complemento([from, mitochondria, in, apoptotic, cells, and, displaces, bound, caspases, from, the, 'BIR2/BIR3', domains, of, 'XIAP', thereby, reactivating, cell, death, execution])].
[sujeto(['The', central, 'apoptosis-inhibitory', function, of, 'XIAP', and, its, overexpression, in, many, different, types, of, advanced, cancers]), verbo([have]), complemento([led, to, significant, efforts, to, identify, therapeutics, that, neutralize, its, 'anti-apoptotic', effect])].
[sujeto(['These', &, 'quot;SMAC-mimetics&quot;', either, specifically]), verbo([induce]), complemento([apoptosis, in, cancer, cells, or, act, as, 'drug-sensitizers'])].
[sujeto(['AMP-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'AMPK)']), verbo([promotes]), complemento([glucose, 'transport,', maintains, 'ATP', 'stores,', and, prevents, injury, and, apoptosis, during, ischemia])].
[sujeto(['AMPK']), verbo([has]), complemento([several, direct, molecular, targets, in, the, heart, but, also, may, interact, with, other, 'stress-signaling', pathways])].
[sujeto(['In', isolated, heart, 'muscles,', the, 'AMPK', activator, 5, -, 'aminoimidazole-4-carboxy-amide-1-beta-D-ribofuranoside', '(', 'AICAR)']), verbo([increased]), complemento([p38, 'MAPK', activation])].
[sujeto(['In', 'AMPK-deficient', mouse, 'hearts,']), verbo([expressing]), complemento([a, 'kinase-dead', '(', 'KD)', alpha2, catalytic, 'subunit,', p38, 'MAPK', activation, was, markedly, reduced, during, 'low-flow', ischemia, '(', 2.3, -, versus, 7, -, fold, in, 'wild-type', 'hearts,', 'P&lt;0'])].
[sujeto(['Ischemia']), verbo([increased]), complemento([p38, 'MAPK', recruitment, to, transforming, growth, 'factor-beta-activated', protein, kinase, 1, -, binding, protein, 1, '(', 'TAB1),', a, scaffold, protein, that, promotes, p38, 'MAPK', autophosphorylation])].
[sujeto([p38, 'MAPK', recruitment, to, 'TAB1/AMPK', complexes]), verbo([required]), complemento(['AMPK', activation, and, was, reduced, in, ischemic, 'AMPK-deficient', transgenic, mouse, hearts])].
[sujeto(['The', potential, role, of, p38, 'MAPK', in]), verbo([mediating]), complemento([the, downstream, action, of, 'AMPK', to, promote, glucose, transport, was, also, assessed])].
[sujeto(['The', p38, 'MAPK', inhibitor, 'SB203580', partially]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([both, 'AICAR-', and, 'hypoxia-stimulated', glucose, uptake, and, 'GLUT4', translocation])].
[sujeto(['Activation', of, p38, 'MAPK', by, anisomycin, also]), verbo([increased]), complemento([glucose, transport, in, heart, muscles])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', 'AMPK']), verbo([has]), complemento([an, important, role, in, promoting, p38, 'MAPK', activation, in, the, ischemic, heart, by, inducing, p38, 'MAPK', autophosphorylation, through, interaction, with, the, scaffold, protein, 'TAB1'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, shown, that, transforming, growth, 'factor-beta(1)', '(', 'TGF-beta(1))-induced', apoptosis, in, 'FaO', hepatoma, cells, is, mediated, by, cytochrome, c, 'release,', apoptosome, 'formation,', and, caspase, activation])].
[sujeto(['Although', 'TGF-beta(1)']), verbo([acts]), complemento([via, the, 'SMAD', signaling, pathway, to, initiate, de, novo, gene, 'transcription,', little, is, known, about, the, downstream, gene, targets, that, are, involved, in, the, regulation, of, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Jun,', 'ATF3,', 'TAB1,', and, 'TANK),']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, their, 'up-regulation', may, be, in, response, to, secondary, necrosis])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', we, identified, an, early, response, set, of, nine, 'down-regulated', genes, that, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, antioxidant, defense])].

[sujeto(['Primary', cultures, of, guinea, pig, gastric, mucosal, cells]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([the, 'Toll-like', receptor, 4, and, were, sensitive, to, 'H'])].

[sujeto([1, endotoxin, 'unit/ml', '(', &, 'gt;1', 'ng/ml)']), verbo([activated]), complemento(['caspase-8,', stimulated, cytochrome, c, release, from, 'mitochondria,', and, subsequently, activated, 'caspases-9', and, -, 3, ',', leading, to, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Epidermal', growth, factor, blocked, all, of, these, apoptotic, processes, and]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['apoptosis,', whereas, it, did, not, modify, the, phosphorylation, of, 'TAK1,', 'TAB1,', and, 'JNK2'])].
[sujeto(['A', comparatively, specific, inhibitor, of, 'caspase-8', or, -, 9, blocked, 'apoptosis,', whereas, cytochrome, c]), verbo([release]), complemento([was, prevented, only, with, a, 'caspase-8-like', inhibitor])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'caspase-8', and, mitochondria, may, play, crucial, roles, in, 'H'])].
[sujeto([pylori, 'LPS-induced', apoptosis, and, that, this, accelerated, apoptosis, may, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, abnormal, cell, turnover, of, 'H'])].
[sujeto(['We', show, here, that, 'X-linked', inhibitor, of, apoptosis, protein, '(', 'xIAP)', is, essential, for, the, ability, of, 'TGF-beta', to]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento([nuclear, 'factor-kappaB', '(', 'NF-kappaB)', in, metastatic, 4, 'T1', breast, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['Indeed', whereas, 'TGF-beta']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['NF-kappaB', activity, in, normal, mammary, epithelial, 'cells,', those, engineered, to, overexpress, xIAP, demonstrated, activation, of, 'NF-kappaB', when, stimulated, with, 'TGF-beta'])].
[sujeto(['Mechanistically', xIAP, '(', 'i)']), verbo([interacted]), complemento([physically, with, the, 'TGF-beta', type, 'I', 'receptor,', '(', 'ii)', mediated, the, ubiquitination, of, 'TGF-beta-activated', kinase, 1, '(', 'TAK1),', and, '(', 'iii)', facilitated, the, formation, of, complexes, between, 'TAK1-binding', protein, 1, '(', 'TAB1)', and, 'IkappaB', kinase, beta, that, enabled, 'TGF-beta', to, activate, 'p65/RelA', and, to, induce, the, expression, of, prometastatic, '(', i])].
[sujeto(['We', further, observed, that]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento([the, 'E3', ubiquitin, ligase, function, of, xIAP, or, expressing, a, mutant, ubiquitin, protein, '(', i])].
[sujeto(['Functionally', xIAP, deficiency, dramatically, reduced, the, coupling, of, 'TGF-beta', to, 'Smad2/3', in, 'NMuMG', cells, as, well, as]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([their, expression, of, mesenchymal, markers, in, response, to, 'TGF-beta'])].
[sujeto(['Collectively', our, findings]), verbo([have]), complemento([defined, a, novel, role, for, xIAP, in, mediating, oncogenic, signaling, by, 'TGF-beta', in, breast, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', understanding, the, molecular, mechanisms, that]), verbo([mediate]), complemento(['TNFα-induced', cellular, responses, is, a, crucial, issue])].
[sujeto(['It', is, generally, accepted, that, global, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([activity, of, the, 'NF-κB', avian, reticuloendotheliosis, viral, '(', 'v-rel)', oncogene, related, 'B', '(', 'RelB)', subunit, is, not, induced, upon, 'TNFα', treatment, in, 'fibroblasts,', despite, its, 'TNFα-induced', nuclear, accumulation])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, demonstrate, that, 'RelB', plays, a, critical, role, in]), verbo([promoting]), complemento([fibroblast, migration, upon, prolonged, 'TNFα', treatment])].
[sujeto(['We', identified, the, two, kinases, 'IκB', kinase, α, '(', 'IKKα)', and, 'IκB', kinase, β, '(', 'IKKβ)', as, 'RelB']), verbo([interacting]), complemento([partners, whose, activation, by, 'TNFα', promotes, 'RelB', phosphorylation, at, serine, 472])].
[sujeto(['Once', phosphorylated, on, serine, 472, ',']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['RelB', dissociates, from, its, interaction, with, the, inhibitory, protein, 'IκBα', and, binds, to, the, promoter, of, critical, 'migration-associated', 'genes,', such, as, the, matrix, metallopeptidase, 3, '(', 'MMP3)'])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([provide]), complemento([new, insights, into, the, regulation, of, 'RelB', activity, and, reveal, a, novel, link, between, selective, 'NF-κB', target, gene, expression, and, cellular, response, in, response, to, 'TNFα'])].
[sujeto(['There', are, two, major, pathways]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, induction, of, 'NF-κB', subunits])].
[sujeto(['The', classical, '(', or, 'canonical)', pathway, typically]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, the, induction, of, 'RelA', or, 'c-Rel', containing, 'complexes,', and, involves, the, degradation, of, 'IκBα', in, a, manner, dependent, on, 'IκB', kinase, '(', 'IKK)', β, and, the, 'IKK', regulatory, subunit, 'NEMO'])].
[sujeto(['The', alternative, '(', or, 'non-canonical)', 'pathway,']), verbo([involves]), complemento([the, inducible, processing, of, p100, to, 'p52,', leading, to, the, induction, of, 'NF-κB2(p52)/RelB', containing, 'complexes,', and, is, dependent, on, 'IKKα', and, 'NF-κB', inducing, kinase, '(', 'NIK)'])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, demonstrate, that, in, primary, human, 'fibroblasts,', the, alternative, 'NF-κB', pathway, subunits, 'NF-κB2', and, 'RelB']), verbo([have]), complemento(['multiple,', but, 'distinct,', effects, on, the, expression, of, key, regulators, of, the, cell, 'cycle,', reactive, oxygen, species, '(', 'ROS)', generation, and, protein, stability])].
[sujeto(['Specifically,', following, siRNA, 'knockdown,', quantitative, 'PCR,', western, blot, analyses, and, chromatin, immunoprecipitation, '(', 'ChIP)', show, that, 'NF-κB2']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'CDK4', and, 'CDK6,', while, 'RelB,', through, the, regulation, of, genes, such, as, 'PSMA5', and, 'ANAPC1,', regulates, the, stability, of, p21WAF1, and, the, tumour, suppressor, p53])].
[sujeto(['These', combine, to]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([the, activity, of, the, retinoblastoma, 'protein,', 'Rb,', leading, to, induction, of, polycomb, protein, 'EZH2', expression])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', our, 'ChIP', analysis, demonstrates, that, 'EZH2', is, also, a, direct, 'NF-κB']), verbo([target]), complemento([gene])].
[sujeto(['Microarray', analysis, revealed, that, in, 'fibroblasts,', 'EZH2', antagonizes, a, subset, of, p53]), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, previously, associated, with, the, senescent, cell, 'phenotype,', including, 'DEK', and, 'RacGAP1'])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, this, pathway]), verbo([provides]), complemento([the, major, route, of, crosstalk, between, the, alternative, 'NF-κB', pathway, and, 'p53,', a, consequence, of, which, is, to, suppress, cell, senescence])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', we]), verbo([find]), complemento([that, activation, of, 'NF-κB', also, induces, 'EZH2', expression, in, 'CD40L', stimulated, cells, from, 'Chronic', 'Lymphocytic', 'Leukemia', patients])].
[sujeto(['We', therefore, propose, that, this, pathway]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, mechanism, through, which, microenvironment, induced, 'NF-κB', can, inhibit, tumor, suppressor, function, and, promote, tumorigenesis])].
[sujeto(['The', immunosuppressive, cytokines, transforming, growth, factor, β1, '(', 'TGFβ1)', and, 'interleukin-10', '(', 'IL-10)']), verbo([regulate]), complemento([a, variety, of, biological, processes, including, 'differentiation,', 'proliferation,', tissue, 'repair,', 'tumorigenesis,', 'inflammation,', and, host, defense])].
[sujeto(['Aberrant', expression, of, 'TGFβ1', and, 'IL-10']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, associated, with, many, types, of, autoimmune, and, inflammatory, 'disorders,', as, well, as, with, many, types, of, cancer, and, leukemia])].
[sujeto(['Patients', with, cutaneous, 'T', cell, lymphoma, '(', 'CTCL)']), verbo([have]), complemento([high, levels, of, malignant, 'CD4+', 'T', cells, expressing, 'IL-10', and, 'TGFβ1', that, suppress, the, immune, system, and, diminish, the, antitumor, responses])].
[sujeto(['However,', while, the, transcriptional, regulation, of, 'pro-inflammatory', and, 'anti-apoptotic', genes, by, 'NFκB']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, studied, 'extensively,', much, less, is, known, about, the, 'NFκB', regulation, of, immunosuppressive, genes])].
[sujeto(['So,', we, suppose, that, 'NF-κB', pathway, is, active, in, mastitis, individuals, as, a, result, of, the]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([inhibition, of, miRNAs])].
[sujeto(['While', in, healthy, 'ones,', the, 'NF-κB', pathway, is, 'inactive,', because, of, the, miRNAs]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([inhibition, action])].
[sujeto(['Progesterone', '(', 'P4)contributes', to, the, maintenance, of, human, 'pregnancy,', in, part, by]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento([activity, of, the, human, 'pro-labor', genes, 'CRH', and, 'cyclooxygenase-2', '(', 'COX-2)'])].

[sujeto(['We', investigated, the, role, of, 'P4', receptor, '(', 'PR)', in, the, regulation, of]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([activity, of, 'v-rel', avian, reticuloendotheliosis, viral, oncogene, homolog, 'B', '(', 'RelB)/NF-κB2', 'and,', in, 'turn,', expression, of, placental, 'CRH', and, 'COX-2'])].
[sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'PR-A']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([transcription, of, 'CRH', and, 'COX-2,', which, was, further, downregulated, by, treatment, with, 'P4', or, 17, 'α-hydroxyprogesterone', caproate])].

[sujeto(['Characterization', of, these, pathways, may, identify, potential, drug]), verbo([targets]), complemento([for, prevention, of, preterm, birth])].
[sujeto(['The', 'inhibitor-κB', 'kinase-nuclear', 'factor-κB', '(', 'IKK-NF-κB)', and, epidermal, growth, factor, 'receptor-activator', 'protein-1', '(', 'EGFR-AP1)', pathways, are, often, 'co-activated', and]), verbo([promote]), complemento([malignant, 'behavior,', but, the, underlying, basis, for, this, relationship, is, unclear])].

[sujeto(['We', observed, that, 'IKKα', and, 'IKKβ', exhibit]), verbo([increased]), complemento([protein, 'expression,', nuclear, 'localization,', and, phosphorylation, in, 'HNSCC', tissues, and, cell, lines])].

[sujeto(['Importantly,', 'IKKα', and, 'IKKβ', together]), verbo([promoted]), complemento([the, expression, and, activity, of, transforming, growth, factor, 'α,', 'EGFR', and, 'AP1', transcription, factors, 'cJun,', 'JunB', and, 'Fra1'])].

[sujeto(['Mutations', of, 'NF-κB', and, 'AP1-binding', sites, abolished, or]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['IKK-induced', 'interleukin-8', '(', 'IL-8)', promoter, activity])].
[sujeto(['Compounds', such, as, wedelactone, with, dual, 'IKK', inhibitory, activity, and, geldanomycins, that, block, 'IKKα/β', and, 'EGFR', pathways, were, more, active, than, 'IKKβ-specific', inhibitors, in]), verbo([suppressing]), complemento(['NF-κB', activation, and, proliferation, and, inducing, cell, death])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, 'IKKα', and, 'IKKβ', cooperatively]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['NF-κB', and, 'EGFR/AP1', networks, of, signaling, pathways, and, contribute, to, the, malignant, phenotype, and, the, intrinsic, or, acquired, therapeutic, resistance, of, 'HNSCC'])].
[sujeto(['NF-κB', integrates, inflammation, and, carcinogenesis, and]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, expression, of, a, variety, of, genes, in, response, to, 'immunity,', 'inflammation,', and, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['IκBα']), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, an, inhibitor, of, 'NF-κB', through, forming, an, inactive, 'NF-κB/IκBα', complex])].
[sujeto(['Pokemon', is, a, ubiquitous, transcription, factor]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, different, signaling, 'pathways,', playing, a, pivotal, role, in, cell, 'proliferation,', 'anti-apoptosis,', embryonic, 'development,', and, maintenance])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, p65, and, 'IκBα', are, both, novel, regulatory, targets, of, 'Pokemon'])].
[sujeto(['Ectopic', expression, of, 'Pokemon', in, immortalized, liver, cells, 'HL7702']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([p65, and, 'IκBα', 'expression,', whereas, silencing, of, 'Pokemon', in, hepatocellular, carcinoma, cells, 'QGY7703', reduced, cellular, p65, levels])].
[sujeto(['ChIP', assay, and]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([mutagenesis, revealed, that, 'Pokemon', directly, binds, to, the, element, of, -, 434, to, -, 430, bp, in, p65, promoter, and, of, -, 453, to, -, 448, bp, in, 'IκBα', promoter, and, stimulates, luciferase, reporter, gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['Co-transfection', of, 'Pokemon', with, p65, or, 'IκBα', 'promoter-reporter', notably]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([their, promoter, activity])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'Pokemon', activates, the, expression, of, both, p65, and, 'IκBα', by, 'sequence-specific', binding, to, their, promoters, and, plays, a, dual, role, in, regulating, 'NF-κB', signaling])].
[sujeto(['Members', of, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['factor-κB', '(', 'NF-κB)', family, of, transcription, factors, regulate, a, variety, of, molecules, involved, in, host, defense, against, pathogens])].
[sujeto(['Since', the, discovery, of, the, five, members, of, the, 'NF-κB', transcription, factor, 'family,', 'RelA,', 'c-Rel,', 'RelB,', p50, and, 'p52,', considerable, progress]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, made, toward, better, understanding, how, the, different, 'NF-κB', 'homo-', and, heterodimers, regulate, such, distinct, subsets, of, target, genes])].
[sujeto(['All', of, the, 'NF-κB', molecules, are]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, various, infectious, 'stimuli;', 'however,', there, are, still, open, questions, related, to, the, selective, functions, of, individual, 'NF-κB', family, members, during, a, coordinated, immune, response, to, infection])].
[sujeto(['Diverse', parasites, such, as, 'Toxoplasma', 'gondii,', 'Leishmania', 'donovani,', 'Leishmania', 'major,', and, 'Trichuris', muris]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported, to, activate, 'NF-κB', signaling, 'cascades,', and, a, number, of, distinct, 'parasite-derived', molecules, may, actively, interfere, with, the, pathways, that, lead, to, 'NF-κB', activation])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'review,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([an, overview, on, the, role, of, 'NF-κB', activation, in, leishmaniasis, and, discuss, how, individual, 'NF-κB', family, members, might, perform, their, distinct, and, 'non-overlapping', functions, in, the, regulation, of, protective, immunity, to, 'Leishmania', infection])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, observed, that, the, expression, of, 'Bfl-1,', an, antiapoptotic, protein, of, the, 'Bcl-2', 'family,', is, restricted, to, 'HTLV-1-infected', 'T-cell', lines, and, to, 'T-cells']), verbo([expressing]), complemento([both, 'Tax', and, 'HBZ', proteins])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', we, demonstrated, that, 'Tax', cooperated, with, 'c-Jun', or, 'JunD,', but, not, 'JunB,', transcription, factors, of, the, 'AP-1', family, to]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento(['bfl-1', gene, activation])].
[sujeto(['By', 'contrast,', 'HBZ']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['c-Jun-induced', 'bfl-1', gene, 'activation,', whereas, it, increased, 'JunD-induced', 'bfl-1', gene, activation])].
[sujeto(['We', identified, one, 'NF-κB,']), verbo([targeted]), complemento([by, 'RelA,', 'c-Rel,', 'RelB,', 'p105/p50,', and, 'p100/p52,', and, two, 'AP-1,', targeted, by, both, 'c-Jun', and, 'JunD,', binding, sites, in, the, 'bfl-1', promoter, of, 'T-cells', expressing, both, 'Tax', and, 'HBZ'])].

[sujeto(['This', is, associated, with, activation, of, the, transcription, factor]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([factor, kappa, 'B', '(', 'NFκB)'])].

[sujeto(['Patient\'s', fibroblasts, and, 'COS-7', cells, transfected, with, wildtype, or, mutant, 'VDRs', were, studied, for, 'ligand-binding', 'capacity,', transactivation, activity, using, two, gene, promoters, '[', 'CYP-24,', a, classical, 1, ',', 25, '(', 'OH)2D3-responsive', 'gene,', and, 'relB,', a, critical, 'NF-kappaB', component, for, regulation, of, dendritic, cell, 'differentiation],', 'VDR-RXR', heterodimers, association, to, 'CYP', 24, 'VDREs', by, gel, mobility, shift, 'assays,', and, 'co-activator']), verbo([binding]), complemento([by, 'Glutathione-S-transferase', 'pull-down', assays])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([the, first, clinical, association, between, 'HVDRR,', total, 'alopecia,', and, early, 'childhood-onset', type, 1, diabetes])].
[sujeto(['A', member, of, the, 'Paramyxoviridae', family, of, 'RNA', 'viruses,', respiratory, syncytial, virus, '(', 'RSV),', is, a]), verbo([leading]), complemento([cause, of, epidemic, respiratory, tract, infection, in, children])].
[sujeto(['In', 'children,', 'RSV', primarily, replicates, in, the, airway, 'mucosa,', a, process, that, alters, epithelial, cell, chemokine, 'expression,', thereby]), verbo([inducing]), complemento([airway, inflammation])].
[sujeto(['RSV', infection]), verbo([induces]), complemento([a, time, dependent, increase, of, 'NIK', mRNA, and, protein, expression, that, peaks, 12, to, 24, h, after, viral, exposure])].

[sujeto(['Western', immunoblot, and, microaffinity, 'DNA', 'pull-down', assays, showed, a, parallel]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, nuclear, translocation, and, 'DNA', binding, of, the, 'NF-kappaB2-Rel', 'B', complex])].
[sujeto(['Together,', these, data, indicate, that, 'RSV', infection, rapidly]), verbo([activates]), complemento([the, noncanonical, 'NF-kappaB', activation, pathway, prior, to, the, more, potent, canonical, pathway, activation])].

[sujeto(['The', process, of, spermatogenesis]), verbo([requires]), complemento([a, delicate, balance, of, proapoptotic, and, antiapoptotic, signaling, to, maintain, optimal, sperm, output])].
[sujeto(['A', major, transcription, factor, known, to]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([numerous, 'apoptosis-related', genes, is, 'NF-kappaB'])].

[sujeto(['B', lymphocytes, can, be]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, many, different, stimuli])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([compared, the, contribution, of, the, type, 1, '(', 'p50-dependent)', and, type, 2, '(', 'p52-dependent)', 'NF-kappaB', activation, pathways, to, cell, 'survival,', 'proliferation,', homotypic, 'aggregation,', and, specific, gene, regulation, of, murine, primary, 'B', lymphocytes])].

[sujeto(['To', investigate, the, mechanism, of, 'c-rel-induced', proliferation, and, cell, cycle, progression, in, 'B', 'lymphocytes,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([compared, signaling, events, elicited, through, the, 'BCR', in, 'c-rel-/-', and, 'wild-type', 'B', cells])].

[sujeto(['Here,', we, use, the, 'bcl-xL', transgene, to, correct, the, viability, of, 'c-rel-deficient', 'B', 'cells,', and, show, that, the, inhibition, of, apoptosis, does, not, necessarily]), verbo([confer]), complemento([hyperproliferation, of, 'B', cells, activated, through, the, 'BCR'])].

[sujeto(['Nuclear', 'Factor-kB', '(', 'NF-kB),', is, a, transcription, factor, composed, of, dimeric, complexes, of, p50, '(', 'NF-kB1)', or, p52, '(', 'NF-kB2)', usually, associated, with, members, of, the, 'Rel', family, '(', 'p65,', 'c-Rel,', 'Rel', 'B)', which]), verbo([have]), complemento([potent, transactivation, domains])].
