[sujeto(['An', 'ELISA-based', 'NF-κB', family, transcription, factor, activity, assay, was, performed, to, quantify, the, κB, 'DNA-binding', activity, in]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([extracts, from, 'CLL', 'B-cells'])].
[sujeto(['RelA', was]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, almost, all, the, patients, detected, while, 'RelB', activity, was, induced, in, part, of, samples])].
[sujeto(['The', average, 'RelA', activity, in, 'CLL', 'B-cells', was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([compared, to, that, in, normal, 'B', cells, while, the, average, 'RelB', activity, was, similar, to, that, of, normal, 'B', cells])].
[sujeto(['When', the, cells, from, 'RelA+/RelB⁻', group, were, 'co-cultured', with, bone, marrow, stromal, cells, '(', 'hBMSCs),', the, frequencies, of, cell, death, of, 'CLL', 'B-cells', were]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([compared, to, that, of, the, cells, cultured, 'alone,', while, the, frequencies, of, cell, death, of, 'RelA⁺/RelB⁻', 'CLL', 'B-cells', were, higher, than, that, of, 'CLL', 'B-cells', from, 'RelA⁺/RelB⁺', group, when, 'co-cultured', with, hBMSCs])].
[sujeto(['RelA', and, 'RelB', expression, in, 'CLL-B', cells, from, the, 'RelA⁺/RelB⁻', group, was]), verbo([induced]), complemento([after, 'co-cultured', with, hBMSCs, for, 48, h])].
[sujeto(['RelB', was, reduced, in, the, cytoplasm, and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, the, nucleus, in, 'CLL-B', cells, from, the, 'RelA+/RelB+', group])].
[sujeto(['The', alternative, 'NF-κB', was, indeed]), verbo([activated]), complemento([and, presented, heterogeneous, in, 'CLL', 'B-cells', from, 'BM'])].
[sujeto(['Activation', of, 'RelB', combined, with, 'RelA', activity, could]), verbo([provide]), complemento([the, survival, advantage, to, 'CLL', 'B-cells', from, 'BM'])].
[sujeto(['LT']), verbo([stimulates]), complemento(['LTβR', in, 'Peyer\'s', patches, '(', 'PP)', to, activate, 'NF-κB', via, the, noncanonical, pathway])].
[sujeto(['TNFα,', 'IL-1β,', and, bacterial, products]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento([the, inflammatory, canonical, 'NF-κB', pathway, producing, 'p65/p50', and, 'c-Rel/p50'])].
[sujeto(['PN']), verbo([decreases]), complemento(['LTβR,', 'MAdCAM-1,', and, chemokines, in, 'PP', and, lowers, small, intestinal, 'IgA', compared, with, chow])].
[sujeto(['Exogenous', 'LTβR', stimulation, during, 'PN']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['p50,', 'p52,', 'Rel', 'B,', 'MAdCAM-1,', 'IL-4,', and, 'IL-10', in, 'PP,', but, not, 'p65,', 'CCL19,', 'CCL20,', or, 'CCL25', compared, with, 'PN'])].
[sujeto(['Lack', of, enteral, stimulation, during, 'PN']), verbo([decreases]), complemento([both, canonical, and, noncanonical, 'NF-κB', pathways, in, 'PP'])].
[sujeto(['LTβR', blockade]), verbo([decreases]), complemento([the, noncanonical, 'NF-κB', 'activity,', 'MAdCAM-1,', 'chemokines,', and, cytokines, without, effect, on, the, canonical, 'NF-κB', activity, in, 'PP'])].
[sujeto(['All', the, three, effector, cell, populations]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['Akt1/PKBalpha', through, the, engagement, of, this, molecule])].
[sujeto(['Upon']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, leukemic, cells, expressing, 'NKG2D', ligands, '(', 'NKG2DL),', including, chronic, lymphocytic, leukemias, treated, with, transretinoic, 'acid,', most, γδT, '(', &, 'gt;60%)', and, half, 'CD8(+)', αβT, cells, '(', about, 50, '%', ')', received, a, survival, 'signal,', at, variance, with, the, majority, of, 'NK', cells, '(', &, 'gt;80%)', that, underwent, apoptosis, by, day, 5])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', oligomerization, of, 'NKG2D', in, γδT, or, 'CD8(+)', αβT, 'cells,']), verbo([led]), complemento([to, a, significant, rise, in, 'nuclear/cytoplasmic', ratio, of, both, 'NF-kBp52', and, 'RelB,', the, two, 'NF-kB', subunits, mainly, involved, in, the, transcription, of, antiapoptotic, proteins, of, the, 'Bcl', family])].
[sujeto(['Indeed,', the, ratio, between, the, antiapoptotic, protein, 'Bcl-2', or, 'Bcl-x(L)', and, the, proapoptotic, protein, 'Bax', raised, in, γδT, or, 'CD8(+)', αβT, cells, following, 'NKG2D', engagement, by, specific, monoclonal, antibodies, or, by, 'NKG2DL']), verbo([expressing]), complemento([leukemic, cells])].
[sujeto(['Conversely,']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([translocation, of, 'NF-kBp52', or, 'RelB', did, not, 'increase,', nor, the, 'Bcl-2/Bax', or, the, 'Bcl-x(L)', /, 'Bax', ratios, changed, 'significantly,', in, 'NK', cells, upon, oligomerizaton, of, 'NKG2D'])].
[sujeto(['Of', 'note,', transcripts, for, α5, 'importin,', responsible, for]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([translocation, of, 'NF-kBp52/Rel', 'B', 'heterodimer,', are, significantly, higher, in, γδT, and, 'CD8(+)', αβT, cells, than, in, 'NK', cells])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['factor-kappaB', '(', 'NF-KB)/RelB', transcription, factor, plays, an, essential, role, in, development, of, some, dendritic, cell, '(', 'DC)', subsets, in, mice])].
[sujeto(['In', 'LTC,', 'DC', differentiate, from, hematopoietic, progenitors]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([within, the, stromal, cell, matrix])].
[sujeto(['Expression', and, function, of, 'RelB', in, development, of, 'LTC-DC']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, 'investigated,', with, a, view, to, assessing, the, relationship, between, 'DC', produced, in, this, system, and, other, known, subsets, of, 'DC'])].
[sujeto(['RelB', expression, by, 'LTC-DC', was, confirmed, by, detection, of, protein, by, 'Western', 'blotting,', 'RNA', by, reverse, transcription, polymerase, chain, 'reaction,', and]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([protein, with, 'DNA-binding', function, in, electrophoretic, mobility, shift, assays])].
[sujeto(['A', critical, role, for, 'RelB', in, 'DC', differentiation, from, spleen, progenitors, was, 'confirmed,', because, antisense, 'RelB', oligonucleotides, specifically, and, completely]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([production, of, large, differentiated, myeloid, 'DC', in, 'LTC'])].
[sujeto(['Further', investigation, using, 'RelB(-/-)', mice, revealed, that, 'RelB', expression, by, stromal, cells, rather, than, hematopoietic, cells, was]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, production, of, 'LTC-DC'])].
[sujeto(['This', was, evidenced, by, a, combination, of, 'factors,', including, 1, ')', inability, to, generate, productive, 'LTC', from, 'RelB(-/-)', 'mice;', 2, ')', presence, of, 'DC', precursors, in, 'RelB(-/-)', bone, marrow, and, 'spleen,', which, could, produce, 'DC', in, stromal, 'cocultures;', and, 3, ')']), verbo([increased]), complemento([myeloid, precursor, frequency, among, 'RelB(-/-)', spleen, cells, over, 'RelB(+/+)', control, cell, populations])].
[sujeto(['Specific', development, of, fully, 'differentiated,', but, immature, myeloid, 'CD11c(+)CD11b(+)MHC-CII(-)CD8alpha(-)CD40(-)', 'DC', in, spleen, 'LTC', is, dependent, on, expression, of]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['NF-kappaB/Rel-B'])].
[sujeto(['Altogether', these, data, confirm, the, importance, of, splenic, stromal, cells, in, myelopoiesis]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, development, of, immature, 'DC', as, produced, in, 'LTC'])].
[sujeto(['NF-kappaB', plays, a, major, role, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([the, immune, system])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', alterations, in, 'NF-kappaB', activity]), verbo([have]), complemento([profound, effects, on, many, 'immunopathologies,', including, 'inflammation,', 'autoimmunity,', and, lymphoid, neoplasia])].
[sujeto(['We', investigated, the, effects, of, estrogen, '(', 17, 'beta-estradiol)', on, 'NF-kappaB', in, 'C57BL/6', mice, since, estrogen, is, a, natural, immunomodulator, and, we]), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, reported, that, estrogen, 'up-regulates', several, 'NF-kappaB-regulated', proteins, '(', inducible, 'NO', 'synthase,', 'IFN-gamma,', and, 'MCP-1)'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, in, vivo, estrogen, treatment, had, differential, effects, on, 'NF-kappaB', family, members])].
[sujeto(['Estrogen', profoundly, blocked, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([translocation, of, 'p65,', 'c-Rel,', and, 'Rel-B,', partially, blocked, 'p52,', but, permitted, translocation, of, p50])].
[sujeto(['Despite', blockade, of, both, the, classical, '(', 'p65/p50)', and, alternative, '(', 'RelB/p52)', 'NF-kappaB', activation, 'pathways,', estrogen]), verbo([induced]), complemento([constitutive, 'NF-kappaB', activity, and, increased, the, levels, of, cytokines, regulated, by, 'NF-kappaB', '(', 'IL-1', 'alpha,', 'IL-1', 'beta,', 'IL-10,', and, 'IFN-gamma)'])].
[sujeto(['Studies']), verbo([involving]), complemento([a, 'NF-kappaB', inhibitor, confirmed, a, positive, regulatory, role, of, 'NF-kappaB', on, these, cytokines])].
[sujeto(['Remarkably,', estrogen, selectively]), verbo([induced]), complemento(['B', cell, lymphoma, 3, '(', 'Bcl-3),', which, is, known, to, associate, with, p50, to, confer, transactivation, 'capabilities,', thereby, providing, a, potential, link, between, observed, p50, 'DNA-binding', activity, and, estrogen, 'up-regulation', of, 'NF-kappaB', transcriptional, activity])].
[sujeto(['Chromatin', immunoprecipitation, assays, confirmed, that, 'Bcl-3']), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, the, promoter, of, the, 'NF-kappaB-regulated', inducible, 'NO', synthase, gene, in, cells, from, 'estrogen-treated', mice])].
[sujeto(['Estrogen', appeared, to]), verbo([act]), complemento([at, the, posttranscriptional, level, to, 'up-regulate', 'Bcl-3', because, mRNA, levels, in, splenocytes, from, 'placebo-', and, 'estrogen-treated', mice, were, comparable])].
[sujeto(['The', novel, findings, of, differential, regulation, of, 'NF-kappaB', proteins, by, estrogen]), verbo([provide]), complemento([fresh, insight, into, potential, mechanisms, by, which, estrogen, can, regulate, 'NF-kappaB-dependent', immunological, events])].
[sujeto(['We', hypothesized, that, signaling, through, protein, kinase, 'C', '(', 'PKC)', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, differentiation, of, 'HL-60', promyeloblasts, into, 'DCs', upon, stimulation, with, calcium, ionophore, 'A23187'])].
[sujeto(['We', noted, that, blasts, cultured, in, 'media,', 'Bis-1,', or, 'Bis-1', then, 'A23187', did, not, develop, the, morphologic, and, phenotypic, 'DC', 'characteristics,', 'up-regulate', 'Rel', 'B,', or]), verbo([activate]), complemento([allogeneic, 'T-cells'])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, 'PKC', blockade, inhibits, 'morphologic,', 'phenotypic,', and, functional, differentiation, of, 'HL-60', promyeloblasts, into, 'antigen-presenting', 'DCs'])].
[sujeto(['Distinct', 'Rel/NF-kappaB', proteins, are, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([postnatally, in, the, subventricular, zone, and, in, the, rostral, migratory, stream])].
[sujeto(['In', 'particular,', 'Rel', 'A', and, p50, are]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, radial, glial, 'cells,', in, migrating, neuron, precursors, and, in, a, population, belonging, to, the, astrocytic, lineage])].
[sujeto(['Rel', 'B,', on, the, other, 'hand,', is, only]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, migrating, neuron, 'precursors,', whereas, 'c-Rel', is, present, in, a, few, cells, located, at, the, edges, of, the, rostral, migratory, stream])].
[sujeto(['The', selective, expression, of, 'NF-kappaB', members, in, the, postnatal, subventricular, zone, and, rostral, migratory, stream, and, their, persistence, into, adulthood, in, regions, of, ongoing, neurogenesis]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([possible, mechanisms, linking, 'NF-kappaB', expression, with, cell, proliferation, and, migration])].
[sujeto(['Their', presence, in, actively, proliferating, progenitor, 'cells,', detected, by, 'BrdU', 'staining,', further]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, 'NF-kappaB', may, be, part, of, a, signaling, pathway, that, is, important, for, neurogenesis])].
[sujeto(['In', vivo, experiments]), verbo([have]), complemento([implicated, murine, 3, '\'', 'enhancers,', hs3B, 'and/or', 'hs4,', in, class, switching, and, somatic, hypermutation])].
[sujeto(['We', previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, murine, hs4, was, regulated, by, 'NF-kappaB,', octamer, binding, 'proteins,', and, 'Pax5', '(', 'B', 'cell-specific', activator, 'protein)'])].
[sujeto(['In', this, study, we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, human, hs4, is, regulated, differently])].
[sujeto(['EMSAs', and, 'Western', analysis, of, normal, 'B', cells, before, and, after, stimulation, with, 'anti-IgM', plus, 'anti-CD40', showed, the, same, complex]), verbo([binding]), complemento([pattern, formed, by, 'NF-kappaB,', 'Oct-1,', and, 'Oct-2', '(', but, not, by, 'Pax5)'])].
[sujeto(['A', similar, 'EMSA', pattern, was, detected, in, mature, human, 'B', cell, lines, '(', 'BL-2,', 'Ramos,', and, 'HS-Sultan)', and, in, diffuse, large, 'B', cell, lymphoma, cell, 'lines,', although, yin, yang, 1, protein, '(', 'YY1)']), verbo([binding]), complemento([was, also, observed])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([confirmed, the, in, vivo, association, of, these, transcription, factors, with, hs4, in, 'B', cells, by, chromatin, immunoprecipitation, assays])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([confirmed, by, endogenous, coimmunoprecipitation, an, association, of, 'YY1', with, 'Rel-B,', but, not, with, other, 'NF-kappaB', family, members])].
[sujeto(['Transient', transfection, assays, showed, robust, hs4, enhancer, activity, in, the, mature, 'B', cell, 'lines,', which, was, dependent, on, synergistic, interactions, between, 'NF-kappaB', and, octamer]), verbo([binding]), complemento([proteins])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', human, hs4, enhancer, activity]), verbo([required]), complemento(['Oct-2', and, correlated, with, expression, of, 'Oct', coactivator, from, 'B', cells, '(', 'OCA-B)'])].
[sujeto(['We', showed, that, 'BCG', could]), verbo([promote]), complemento([cord, blood, 'monocyte-derived', 'DC', maturation, by, 'up-regulation', of, 'CD80,', 'CD83,', 'CD86,', 'CD40,', and, 'MHC', class, 'II', molecules, and, 'down-regulation', of, mannose, receptor])].
[sujeto(['BCG', was, able, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([similar, levels, of, tumor, necrosis, 'factor-alpha', and, 'IL-10', but, no, bioactive, 'IL-12p70', production, from, cord, blood, 'DCs', as, from, adult, blood, 'DCs'])].
[sujeto(['Functionally', 'BCG-treated', cord, blood, 'DCs', had, higher, ability, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([mixed, lymphocyte, reaction, than, 'non-BCG-treated', cord, blood, 'DCs'])].
[sujeto(['Both', 'non-BCG-treated', and, 'BCG-treated', cord, blood, 'DCs', efficiently]), verbo([induced]), complemento([a, high, level, of, 'IL-10,', medium, level, of, 'interferon-gamma,', but, little, 'IL-4', production, by, cord, blood, naïve, 'CD4+', 'T', cells])].
[sujeto(['During', the, 'BCG-induced', maturation, process, of, cord, blood, 'DCs,']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([transcription, factor, 'Rel-B', was, 'up-regulated', and, cytosolic, 'Rel-B', 'down-regulated', with, cytosolic, 'IkappaB', alpha, and, beta, degradation])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'BCG', can, promote, cord, blood, 'monocyte-derived', 'DC', 'maturation,', and, that, the, mechanism, is, through, the, 'up-regulation', of, nuclear, 'Rel-B', secondary, to, the, degradation, of, cytosolic, 'IkappaB', alpha, and, beta])].
[sujeto(['The', chemokine, monocyte, chemoattractant, 'protein-1', '(', 'MCP-1)', is, secreted, by, human, glomerular, mesangial, cells, in, response, to, 'interleukin-1', '(', 'IL-1)', and]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, central, role, in, amplifying, the, inflammatory, response, during, glomerulonephritis])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, mechanism, by, which, 'IL-1']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([its, transcription, is, not, understood])].
[sujeto(['Specific', members, of, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([factor, 'kappaB/rel', '(', 'NF-kappaB)', proteins, may, regulate, 'MCP-1', expression, in, a, 'stimulus-', and, 'tissue-specific', manner])].
[sujeto(['Electrophoretic', mobility, shift, assays, and, 'Western', blot, analysis, characterized, the, members, of, the, 'NF-kappaB', family, that]), verbo([bound]), complemento([the, two, 'NF-kappaB', sites, of, the, 'MCP-1', enhancer, '(', 'A1', and, 'A2)', in, vitro])].
[sujeto(['IL-1']), verbo([induced]), complemento(['c-rel', to, form, a, complex, with, 'p65,', which, bound, the, 'MCP-1', 'A2', site, but, not, the, 'A1', or, 'IL-6', 'NF-kappaB', sites, in, vitro])].
[sujeto(['This', study, demonstrates, for, the, first, time, that, the, 'c-rel', oncoprotein, can]), verbo([enhance]), complemento(['MCP-1', transcription, in, mesangial, cells, and, suggests, that, it, may, have, an, important, role, in, amplifying, gene, expression, in, the, inflamed, glomerulus])].
[sujeto(['Hybrid', recombinases, based, on]), verbo([activated]), complemento([catalytic, domains, derived, from, the, 'resolvase/invertase', family, of, serine, recombinases, fused, to, 'Cys2-His2', 'zinc-finger', or, 'TAL', effector, 'DNA-binding', domains, are, a, class, of, reagents, capable, of, achieving, this])].
[sujeto(['The', utility, of, these, 'enzymes,', 'however,']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, constrained, by, their, low, overall, targeting, 'specificity,', largely, due, to, the, formation, of, 'side-product', homodimers, capable, of, inducing, 'off-target', modifications])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, these]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([recombinases, demonstrate, substantially, improved, targeting, specificity, in, mammalian, cells, and, achieve, rates, of, 'site-specific', integration, similar, to, those, previously, reported, for, 'site-specific', nucleases])].
[sujeto(['Additionally,', we, show, that]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([recombinases, exhibit, low, toxicity, and, promote, the, delivery, of, the, human, coagulation, factor, 'IX', and, 'α-galactosidase', genes, into, endogenous, genomic, loci, with, high, specificity])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, general, means, for, improving, hybrid, recombinase, specificity, by, protein, engineering, and, illustrate, the, potential, of, these, enzymes, for, basic, research, and, therapeutic, applications])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, previously, that, induction, of, heme, 'oxygenase-1', '(', 'HO-1)', protects, 'OA', cartilage, against, inflammatory, and, degradative, responses])].
[sujeto(['HO-1', was]), verbo([induced]), complemento([with, cobalt, protoporphyrin, 'IX', '(', 'CoPP)', and, by, transduction, with, 'LV-HO-1'])].
[sujeto(['In', osteoblasts]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([with, interleukin, '(', 'IL)-1β,', 'CoPP', enhanced, 'mineralization,', the, expression, of, a, number, of, markers, of, osteoblast, differentiation, such, as, 'Runx2,', bone, morphogenetic, 'protein-2,', 'osteocalcin,', and, collagen, 1, 'A1', and, 1, 'A2,', as, well, as, the, ratio, 'osteoprotegerin/receptor', activator, of, nuclear, 'factor-κB', ligand])].
[sujeto(['The', activity, of, 'senescence-associated', 'β-galactosidase', and, the, expression, of, the, senescence, marker, 'caveolin-1', were, significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([after, 'HO-1', induction])].
[sujeto(['The', inhibition, of]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['factor-κB', activation, induced, by, 'IL-1β', in, 'OA', osteoblasts, may, contribute, to, some, 'HO-1', effects])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, 'HO-1', decreases, the, production, of, relevant, inflammatory, and, catabolic, mediators, that, participate, in, 'OA', pathophysiology, thus, eliciting, protective, effects, in, 'OA', osteoblasts])].
[sujeto(['Multiple', gene, transfer, might, permit, modulation, of, concurrent, biochemical, pathways]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, acute, lung, graft, rejection])].
[sujeto(['In', group, 'V', cotransfection]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([endogenous, interleukin, 2, but, not, interferon, gamma, and, tumor, necrosis, factor, alpha])].
[sujeto(['Recipient', intramuscular, cotransfection, of, transforming, growth, factor, beta1, and, interleukin, 10]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([interleukin, 2, expression, and, provided, a, synergistic, effect, that, reduced, acute, lung, graft, rejection])].
[sujeto(['Linearizing', supercoiled, 'CpG-reduced', pDNA, did, not, significantly]), verbo([increase]), complemento([levels, of, circulating, gene, product, beyond, levels, supercoiled, 'CpG-reduced', pDNA, could, achieve])].
[sujeto(['Linearizing', supercoiled, 'CpG-replete', pDNA, vectors, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, compared, to, their, supercoiled, 'CpG-replete', 'analogs,', but, the, increase, was, 'short-lived', or, subtherapeutic])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, a, clinically, acceptable, 'hydrodynamics-based', approach, targeting, the, liver, combined, with, 'CpG-reduced', pDNA, vectors, may, represent, a, viable, option, for, individuals, with, 'hemophilia,', a, lysosomal, storage, 'disease,', or, other, disease, in, which, prolonged, depot, expression, of, a, therapeutic, protein, from, the, liver, is, desirable])].
[sujeto(['To', 'date,', no, baseline, data, on, 'health-related', 'quality-of-life', '(', 'HR-QoL)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported, in, males, affected, with, this, condition])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', 38, males, with, 'AFD', completed, 'Medical', 'Outcomes', 'Study', 'Short', 'Form,', 'EuroQoL', questionnaires, and, an, 'AFD-specific', questionnaire, prior, to, the, start, of, a, trial]), verbo([involving]), complemento([replacement, therapy, with, 'alpha-galactosidase'])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento(['therefore,', that, the, scope, for, improvement, in, 'HR-QoL', as, a, result, of, treatment, with, an, appropriate, agent, is, extremely, large])].
[sujeto(['Skeletal', muscle, is, a, privileged]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, 'long-term', 'rAAV-mediated', gene, transfer, in, 'mouse,', 'rat,', dog, and, 'non-human', primates])].
[sujeto(['Intramuscular', injections, of, rAAV, encoding, human, factor, 'IX', in, hemophilia, 'B', patients]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, 'initiated,', based, on, promising, results, gathered, in, affected, dogs])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, intramuscular, rAAV, administration, in, rats, resulted, in, restricted, transduction, essentially, along, the, myofibers, axis, with, poor, lateral, diffusion])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, the, transduction, rate, might, be, limited, by, the, ability, of, the, virus, to, reach, sites, distant, from, the, injection, point])].
[sujeto(['We', tested, whether, 'hyaluronidase,', an, enzyme, which, dissociates, the, extracellular, 'matrix,', could]), verbo([enhance]), complemento([vector, diffusion, when, injected, in, the, rat, muscle, before, administration, of, rAAV, encoding, either, 'nuclear-localized', 'beta-galactosidase', '(', 'rAAVCMVnlsLacZ)', or, the, human, 'alpha-1-antitrypsin', '(', 'rAAVCMVhAAT)', under, the, control, of, the, cytomegalovirus, 'immediate--early', promoter, '(', 'CMV)'])].
[sujeto(['The', results, showed, that, pretreatment, of, the, rat, anterior, tibialis, muscle, with, hyaluronidase, resulted, 'in:', '(', 1, ')', a, larger, diffusion, of, the, virus, indicated, by, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, the, area, containing, 'LacZ-transduced', 'fibers,', and, '(', 2, ')', a, 'two-', to, 'three-fold', increase, of, transduction, efficiency, measured, by, the, number, of, 'LacZ-positive', fibers, or, by, the, hAAT, serum, concentration])].
[sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, hyaluronidase, was, well, tolerated, and, was, not, associated, with, 'short-', or, 'long-term', toxicity, evaluated, by, morphological, studies])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', in, our, experimental, 'conditions,', hyaluronidase, did, not]), verbo([promote]), complemento([rAAV, dissemination, to, other, organs, as, assessed, by, 'PCR', to, detect, vector, sequences])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, pretreatment, of, skeletal, muscle, by, 'hyaluronidase,', a, clinically, available, 'reagent,', was, harmless, and, resulted, in, a, consistent, and, significant]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, rAAV, diffusion, and, transduction, levels])].

[sujeto(['There', is, considerable, interest, in, fXIa, as, a, therapeutic]), verbo([target]), complemento([because, it, contributes, to, 'thrombosis,', while, serving, a, relatively, minor, role, in, hemostasis])].
[sujeto(['FXI/XIa']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, distinctly, different, structure, than, other, plasma, coagulation, proteases])].
[sujeto(['The', 'A3', domain, contains, a]), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, '(', 'exosite)', that, largely, determines, affinity, and, specificity, for, the, substrate, fIX])].

[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, investigated, the, contribution, of, the, 'NH2-terminal', 'EGF-domain', '(', 'EGF1)', of, 'FIXa', to, the, recognition, specificity, of, intrinsic, tenase, by, constructing, an, 'EGF1', deletion, mutant, of, 'FIXa', '(', 'FIXa-desEGF1)', and, characterising, the, properties, of, the, mutant, in, 'kinetic,', direct]), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, 'FRET', assays])].

[sujeto(['Factor', 'IX-binding', protein, '(', 'AHP', 'IX-bp),', a, 'Ca2+-', and, 'Zn2+-binding', protein, from, the, venom, of, 'Agkistrodon', 'Halys', 'Pallas', was]), verbo([reported]), complemento([to, bind, specifically, with, factor, 'IX', in, a, 'Zn2+-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([purified, 'AHP', 'IX-bp', by, a, simple, 'two-step', of, chromatography, procedure, and, found, that, 'AHP', 'IX-bp', also, binds, factor, 'Xa', '(', 'FXa)', with, high, 'binding-affinity', in, a, 'Mg2+-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Although', 'Mg2+', ions]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, significantly, low, 'binding-affinity', for, 'apo-AHP', 'IX-bp', as, determined, by, isothermal, titration, 'calorimetry,', they, can, induce, the, binding, of, 'apo-AHP', 'IX-bp', with, 'FXa', even, in, the, absence, of, 'Ca2+', as, determined, by, native, 'PAGE', and, surface, plasmon, resonance])].
[sujeto(['Mg2+', ions, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([to, maintain, in, vivo, function, of, 'FX', 'Gla', domain, for, its, recognition, of, 'AHP', 'IX-bp'])].
[sujeto(['Both', 'Ca2+', and, 'Zn2+', ions, fail, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([the, binding, between, 'apo-AHP', 'IX-bp', and, 'FXa'])].
[sujeto(['Different', 'proteins,', even, without, sequence, 'similarity,', still, can, contain, similar, surface, regions]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'protein-protein', interactions, with, common, target])].
[sujeto(['Molecular', 'mimicry,', defined, as, the, process, in, which, structural, properties, of, one, molecule, are, simulated, by, the, dissimilar, 'molecules,', is, implicated, in, several, biologically, important, 'processes,', including, autoimmune, and, allergic, 'reactions,']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, some, ligands, to, common, 'receptor,', and, interactions, in, cell, signaling])].
[sujeto(['We', hypothesize, that, identification, of, structurally, and, chemically, similar, surface, regions, of, two, protein, molecules, capable, of]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, the, same, target, will, allow, us, to, identify, sites, involved, in, 'cross-reactivity', including, determinants, of, the, molecular, mimicry])].
[sujeto(['This', approach, uses, a, variation, of, 'Maximal', 'Common', 'Subgraph', '(', 'MCS)', 'isomorphism,', where, an, association, graph, is, constructed, based, on, the, 'surface-exposed', residues, of, the, two, molecules, and, the, matching, regions, are]), verbo([found]), complemento([based, on, the, maximum, cliques, in, the, association, graph])].
[sujeto(['Testing', the, proposed, method, on, the]), verbo([targets]), complemento([of, autoantibody, involved, in, antiphopholipid, syndrome, '(', 'APS)--beta2-GPI,', 'PC,', 'thrombin,', factor, 'IX,', factor, 'X,', and, plasmin, allowed, identifying, potential, epitopes, for, antibody, that, can, inhibit, coagulation, proteases])].
[sujeto(['Application', of, this, method, to, the, 'Activated', 'Protein', 'C', and, factor, 'VII', 'Gla-domains', revealed, surface, regions]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'EPCR', and, plasma, membrane, 'binding,', consistent, with, known, experimental, results])].
[sujeto(['Analysis', of, major, pollen, allergen, that, can]), verbo([cause]), complemento([food, allergies, through, 'cross-reactivity', found, known, epitopes, involved, in, 'cross-reactivity', and, also, revealed, additional, surface, regions, that, can, complement, the, list, of, epitopes])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, proposed, 'graph-theoretical', approach, can, identify, determinants, of, 'cross-reactivity', and, molecular, mimicry])].
[sujeto(['Murine', hepatocyte]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['factor-3alpha', '(', 'HNF-3alpha)', protein, is, a, member, of, a, large, family, of, developmentally, regulated, transcription, factors, that, share, homology, in, the, winged, 'helix/fork', head, 'DNA', binding, domain, and, participate, in, embryonic, pattern, formation])].
[sujeto(['HNF-3alpha', also]), verbo([mediates]), complemento(['cell-specific', transcription, of, genes, important, for, the, function, of, 'hepatocytes,', 'intestinal,', pancreatic, and, bronchiolar, epithelium])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, determined, that, -, 520, nucleotides, upstream, of, the, rat, 'HNF-3alpha', gene, were, sufficient, to, elicit, 'hepatoma-specific', expression, in, transfection, assays, and, reported, on, a, novel, 'HNF-3alpha', expression, pattern, in, the, renal, pelvis, urothelium, of, the, embryonic, and, adult, kidney])].
[sujeto(['We', also, showed, that, retinoic, acid]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([activation, of, the, 'HNF-3alpha', gene, required, -, 4, kb, of, the, 'HNF-3alpha', promoter, region, in, 'F9', teratocarcinoma, transfections])].
[sujeto(['In', order, to, determine, regulatory, sequences]), verbo([mediating]), complemento([the, 'HNF-3alpha', cellular, expression, pattern, in, developing, mouse, 'embryos,', we, created, transgenic, mice, bearing, the, -, 4, kb, 'HNF-3alpha', promoter, region, driving, expression, of, the, 'beta-galactosidase', transgene])].

[sujeto(['Treatment', of, mouse, teratocarcinoma, 'F9', cells, with, 'all-trans-retinoic', acid, '(', 'RA)']), verbo([causes]), complemento([a, 9, -, fold, increase, in, 'steady-state', levels, of, mRNA, for, 'UDP-Gal:beta-D-Gal', 'alpha1,3-galactosyltransferase', '(', 'alpha1,3GT)', beginning, at, 36, h])].

[sujeto(['Differentiation', also, results, in]), verbo([increased]), complemento([secretion, of, soluble, 'alpha1,3GT', activity, into, the, growth, media])].
[sujeto(['Differentiation', of, 'F9', cells, is, accompanied, by, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'alpha-galactosylation', of, membrane, glycoproteins, and, a, decrease, in, expression, of, the, 'stage-specific', embryonic, 'antigen,', 'SSEA-1', '(', also, known, as, the, 'Lewis', 'X', antigen, or, 'LeX),', which, has, the, structure, 'Galbeta1-4(Fucalpha1-3)GlcNAcbeta1-R'])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([used, the, 'F9', teratocarcinoma, cells, as, a, model, to, study, developmental, regulation, of, glycosyltransferase, activities, which, are, responsible, for, the, biosynthesis, of, beta, 1, -, 6, 'GlcNAc-branched', 'N-', and, 'O-linked', oligosaccharides, and, polylactosamine])].
[sujeto(['Growth', of, 'F9', cells, in, the, presence, of, 10, '(', -, 6, ')', 'M', 'RA', for, 4, days]), verbo([increased]), complemento([core, 2, 'GlcNAc', transferase, and, 'GlcNAc', transferase, 'V', activities, by, 13, -, and, 6, -, 'fold,', 'respectively,', whereas, the, activities, of, 'GlcNAc', transferase, 'I,', beta, 1, -, 3, 'GlcNAc', transferase, '(', 'i),', beta, 1, -, 4, 'Gal', 'transferase,', and, beta, 1, -, 3, 'Gal', transferase, increased, 2, -, 4, -, fold])].
[sujeto(['Induction', of, glycosyltransferase, activities, by, 'RA', was, 'dose-dependent', and, showed, a, biphasic, response, with, approximately, half, of, the]), verbo([increase]), complemento([observed, 3, days, after, 'RA', treatment, and, the, remainder, occurred, by, day, 4])].
[sujeto(['These', observations]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, differentiation, of, 'F9', cells, is, closely, associated, with, induction, of, multiple, glycosyltransferase, 'activities,', with, most, pronounced, increases, in, 'GlcNAc', transferase, 'V', and, 2, '\'', ',', 5, '\'', -, tetradenylate, '(', core, 2, ')', 'GlcNAc', transferase])].

[sujeto([dimeric, 'Lex)', was, also]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, 'RA-treated', cells])].

[sujeto(['The', antigenic, determinant, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, involve, an, 'alpha-galactosyl', 'residue,', since, 'alpha-galactosidase', from, coffee, 'bean,', but, not, other, glycosidases, abolished, the, antigenic, activity, of, the, large, glycan, isolated, from, 'F9', and, 'OTT6050', cells])].
[sujeto(['Coagulation']), verbo([involves]), complemento([the, sequential, activation, of, serine, proteases, and, regulators, in, order, to, yield, stable, blood, clots, while, maintaining, hemostasis])].
[sujeto(['Five', coagulation, serine, 'proteases-factor', 'VII', '(', 'F7),', factor, 'IX', '(', 'F9),', factor, 'X', '(', 'F10),', protein, 'C', '(', 'PROC),', and, thrombin, '(', 'F2)-exhibit', high, sequence, similarities, and, all]), verbo([require]), complemento([vitamin, 'K'])].

[sujeto(['High-affinity,', specific, factor, 'IX/IXa']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, platelets, is, mediated, at, least, in, part, by, amino, acids, '(', 'G4-Q11)', exposed, on, the, surface, of, the, 'gamma-carboxyglutamic', acid, '(', 'Gla)', domain])].

[sujeto(['Each', of, these, peptides, '(', 'G4-Q11,', 'S3-L6,', and, 'F9-Q11)']), verbo([acted]), complemento([alone, to, inhibit, factor, 'IXa', binding, to, approximately, 50, '%', of, the, 500, -, 600, 'sites/platelet', with, 'Ki', values, of, 2.9, nM, '(', 'G4-Q11),', 24, nM, '(', 'S3-L6),', and, 240, nM, '(', 'F9-Q11),', compared, with, native, factor, 'IXa', '(', 'Ki', approximately, 2.5, 'nM)'])].
[sujeto(['Although', both, factor, 'IX', and, the, 'Gla', peptide, '(', 'G4-Q11)', displaced, 100, '%', of]), verbo([bound]), complemento([factor, 'IX', and, approximately, 50, '%', of, bound, factor, 'IXa,', factor, 'IX', was, ineffective, '(', at, &, 'gt;', 1000, -, fold, molar, 'excess)', and, the, 'Gla', domain, peptide, '(', 'G4-Q11)', was, relatively, ineffective, '(', 'Ki', =, 165, 'microM)', in, inhibiting, platelet, 'receptor-mediated', factor, 'X', activation, by, factor, 'IXa'])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, the, 'Gla', domain, '(', 'G4-Q11)', of, factor, 'IXa', contains, two, conformationally, constrained, loop, structures, that]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([binding, of, factor, 'IX/IXa', to, a, shared, site, on, activated, human, platelets, which, is, separate, and, distinct, from, the, site, used, by, the, 'enzyme,', factor, 'IXa,', for, assembly, of, the, factor, 'X', activating, complex])].
[sujeto(['The', presence, of, faint, 'MspI-like', fragments, in, 'HpaII', digests, of, fetal, testes, as, well, as, fetal, ovary, prior, to, the, onset, of, meiosis]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, 'DNA', of, primordial, germ, cells, is, unmethylated, in, both, sexes])].
[sujeto(['Our', observations, of, meiotic, germ, cells]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, female, germ, cells, remain, 'unmethylated,', but, that, methylation, in, male, germ, cells, occurs, 'postnatally,', prior, to, or, during, the, early, stages, of, spermatogenesis])].
[sujeto(['In', any, 'event,', the, striking, sex, difference, in, methylation, status, of, endogenous, 'single-copy', genes, in, meiotic, germ, cells, could]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, molecular, basis, for, parental, imprinting, of, the, mammalian, genome])].
[sujeto(['Equilibrium', dialysis, studies, revealed, that, the, 1, -, 42, peptide]), verbo([bound]), complemento([three, 'Ca(II)', ions, 'noncooperatively,', whereas, fragment, 1, binds, seven, 'Ca(II)', ions, in, a, positive, cooperative, manner])].
[sujeto(['Ca(II)-promoted', conformational, changes, are, observed, by, comparison, of, electrophoretic, mobility, changes, in, the, presence, of]), verbo([increasing]), complemento(['Ca(II)', concentrations])].
[sujeto(['The', radiolabeled, 1, -, 45, peptide, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, comigrate, with, phospholipid, vesicles, on, gel, permeation, chromatography, in, the, presence, of, 'Ca(II)'])].
[sujeto(['Fragment', 1, was, shown, to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([this, 'Ca(II)-dependent', phospholipid, binding, of, 1, -, 45, ',', demonstrating, that, the, 1, -, 45, peptide, does, possess, the, necessary, 'phospholipid-binding', structure])].
[sujeto([29, ',', was]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([from, binding, fragment, 1, by, the, 1, -, 42, peptide])].
[sujeto(['Crystal', structures, of, factor, '(', 'F)', 'VIIa/soluble', tissue, factor, '(', 'TF),', obtained, under, high, 'Mg(2+)', '(', 50, mM, 'Mg(2+)/5mM', 'Ca(2+)),']), verbo([have]), complemento([three, of, seven, 'Ca(2+)', sites, in, the, 'γ-carboxyglutamic', acid, '(', 'Gla)', domain, replaced, by, 'Mg(2+)', at, positions, 1, ',', 4, ',', and, 7])].
[sujeto(['We', now]), verbo([report]), complemento([structures, under, low, 'Mg(2+)', '(', 2.5, mM, 'Mg(2+)/5mM', 'Ca(2+))', as, well, as, under, high, 'Ca(2+)', '(', 5, mM, 'Mg(2+)/45', mM, 'Ca(2+))'])].
[sujeto(['Conversely,', under, low, 'Mg(2+),', reexamination, of, the, structure, of, 'Gla', domain, of]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['Protein', 'C', '(', 'APC)', complexed, with, soluble, endothelial, 'Protein', 'C', receptor, '(', 'sEPCR)', has, position, 4, occupied, by, 'Ca(2+)', and, positions, 1, and, 7, by, 'Mg(2+)'])].

[sujeto(['In', biological, 'studies,', 'Mg(2+)']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([phospholipid, binding, to, 'FVIIa', and, 'APC', at, physiological, 'Ca(2+)'])].

[sujeto(['Since', 'APC', and, 'FVIIa']), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, sEPCR, involving, similar, 'interactions,', we, conclude, that, under, the, 'low-Mg(2+)', 'condition,', sEPCR, binding, to, 'APC-Gla', '(', or, 'FVIIa-Gla)', replaces, 'Mg4', by, 'Ca4', with, an, attendant, conformational, change, in, the, 'Gla', domain, 'ω-loop'])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', since, phospholipid, and, sEPCR]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, 'FVIIa', or, 'APC', via, the, 'ω-loop,', we, predict, that, phospholipid, binding, also, induces, the, functional, 'Ca4', conformation, in, this, loop])].
[sujeto(['Cumulatively,', the, data, illustrate, that, 'Mg(2+)', and, 'Ca(2+)']), verbo([act]), complemento([in, concert, to, promote, coagulation, and, anticoagulation])].
[sujeto(['Factor', 'IX']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, collagen, type, 'IV,', but, this, binding, has, no, known, consequence])].

[sujeto(['We', obtained, the, 'full-length', cDNA, of, 'rFIX,', which]), verbo([has]), complemento([2668, 'nucleotides,', predicting, an, open, reading, frame, of, 1383, nucleotides, corresponding, to, 461, amino, acids])].

[sujeto(['By', using, the, in, vitro, selection, method, 'SELEX', against, the, complex, mixture, of, 'GLA', proteins, and, utilizing, methods, to, deconvolute, the, resulting, 'ligands,', we, were, able, to, successfully, generate, 2, '\'', -, ribo, 'purine,', 2, '\'', -, fluoro, pyrimidine, aptamers, to, various, individual]), verbo([targets]), complemento([in, the, 'GLA', protein, proteome, that, ranged, in, concentration, from, 10, nM, to, 1.4, microM, in, plasma])].

[sujeto(['By', using, this, 'DeSELEX', 'approach,', we, were, able, to, shift, the, selection, toward, other, sequences, and, to, less, abundant, protein]), verbo([targets]), complemento([and, obtained, an, aptamer, to, 'Factor', 'IX', '(', 'FIX)'])].
[sujeto(['We', also, demonstrate, that, by, using, an, 'RNA', library, that, is, focused, around, a, 'proteome,', purified, protein]), verbo([targets]), complemento([can, then, be, used, to, rapidly, generate, aptamers, to, the, protein, targets, that, are, rare, in, the, initial, mixture, such, as, 'Factor', 'VII', '(', 'FVII)', and, 'Factor', 'X', '(', 'FX)'])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', for, all, four, proteins]), verbo([targeted]), complemento(['(', 'FII,', 'FVII,', 'FIX,', and, 'FX),', aptamers, were, identified, that, could, inhibit, the, individual, 'protein\'s', activitity, in, coagulation, assays])].
[sujeto(['We', previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, the, first, epidermal, growth, 'factor-like', '(', 'EGF1)', domain, in, factor, 'X', '(', 'FX)', or, factor, 'IX', '(', 'FIX)', plays, an, important, role, in, the, factor, 'VIIa/tissue', factor, '(', 'FVIIa/TF)-induced', coagulation])].
[sujeto(['To', assess, the, role, of, 'gamma-carboxyglutamic', acid, '(', 'Gla)', domains, of, 'FX', and, 'FIX', in, 'FVIIa/TF']), verbo([induced]), complemento(['coagulation,', we, studied, four, new, and, two, previously, described, replacement, 'mutants:', 'FX(PCGla)', and, 'FIX(PCGla)', '(', 'Gla', domain, replaced, with, that, of, protein, 'C),', 'FX(PCEGF1)', and, 'FIX(PCEGF1)', '(', 'EGF1', domain, replaced, with, that, of, protein, 'C),', as, well, as, 'FX(PCGla/EGF1)', and, 'FIX(PCGla/EGF1)', '(', both, 'Gla', and, 'EGF1', domains, replaced, with, those, of, protein, 'C)'])].
[sujeto(['Molecular', models]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, alternate, interactions, exist, for, the, 'Gla', domain, of, protein, 'C', such, that, it, is, comparable, with, 'FIX', but, not, 'FX', in, its, binding, to, 'FVIIa/TF'])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', a, 'seven-residue', insertion, in, the, 'EGF1', domain, of, protein, 'C']), verbo([prevents]), complemento([its, interaction, with, 'FVIIa/TF'])].
[sujeto(['Cumulatively,', our, data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, molecular, framework, demonstrating, that, the, 'Gla', and, 'EGF1', domains, of, 'FX', interact, more, strongly, with, 'FVIIa/TF', than, the, corresponding, domains, in, 'FIX'])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, factor, 'IX', to, cell, membranes, requires, a, structured, 'N-terminal', 'omega-loop', conformation, that, exposes, hydrophobic, residues, for, a, highly, regulated, interaction, with, a, phospholipid])].

[sujeto(['In', order, to, understand, how, these, lipids, are, transported, within, the, 'retina,', expression, and, localization, of, the, main, proteins, known, to, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, systemic, lipid, transport, was, determined])].
[sujeto(['The', presence, and, specific, localization, of, these, 'well-known', lipid, transport, proteins]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, retina, employs, an, internal, lipid, transport, mechanism, that, involves, processing, and, maturation, of, 'HDL-like', particles])].
[sujeto(['The', high, density, lipoprotein, '(', 'HDL)', receptor, 'Scavenger', 'Receptor', 'BII', '(', 'SR-BII)', is, encoded, by, an, alternatively, spliced, mRNA, from, the, 'SR-BI', gene, and, is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, various, tissues])].
[sujeto(['SR-BII', protein, differs, from, 'SR-BI', only, in, the, 'carboxyl-terminal', cytoplasmic, 'tail,', 'which,', as, we, showed, 'previously,', must, contain, a, signal, that]), verbo([confers]), complemento([predominant, intracellular, expression, and, rapid, endocytosis, of, 'HDL'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, 'SR-BII', mediates, 'HDL', endocytosis, through, 'aclathrin-dependent,', 'caveolae-independent', pathway])].
[sujeto(['Two', candidate, amino, acid, motifs, were, identified, in, the, tail, that, could]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([association, with, 'clathrin-containing', endocytic, 'vesicles:', a, putative, dileucine, motif, at, position, 492, -, 493, and, an, overlapping, 'tyrosine-based', 'YXXZ', motif, starting, at, position, 489])].
[sujeto(['Although', substitution, of, tyrosine, at, position, 489, with, alanine, or, histidine, did, not, affect, 'endocytosis,', substitution, 'L492A', resulted, in]), verbo([increased]), complemento([surface, binding, of, 'HDL', and, reduced, 'HDL', particle, endocytosis])].
[sujeto(['No', other, regions, in, the, 'carboxyl-terminal', tail, appeared, to, contain, motifs]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'HDL', endocytosis])].
[sujeto(['These', results, demonstrated, that, 'SR-BII', differs, from, 'SR-BI', in, subcellular, localization, and, trafficking, and]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, two, isoforms, differ, in, the, manner, in, which, they, target, ligands, intracellularly])].
[sujeto(['Scavenger', receptor, class, 'B', type, 'I', '(', 'SR-BI)']), verbo([binds]), complemento(['HDL', and, mediates, selective, uptake, of, cholesterol, ester, and, cellular, efflux, of, cholesterol, to, 'HDL'])].
[sujeto(['The', role, of, 'SR-BI', in, atherosclerosis]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, well, established, in, murine, models, but, it, remains, unclear, whether, 'SR-BI', plays, an, equally, important, role, in, atherosclerosis, in, humans])].
[sujeto(['SR-BI', expression, was]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([in, macrophages, after, hypoxia, '(', p, &, 'lt;', 0.005, ')'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', 'SR-BI', expression, was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([by, exposure, to, mmLDL, '(', p, &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')'])].
[sujeto(['In', both, 'groups,', 'SR-BI', expression, was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([by, exposure, to, mmLDL, '(', p, &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')'])].
[sujeto(['All', three, isoforms, were, also]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, human, atherosclerotic, plaque])].
[sujeto(['Compared', to, the, other, 'isoforms,', the, novel, 'SR-BIII', isoform, was, predicted, to]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, unique, intracellular, 'C-terminal', domain, containing, 53, amino, acids])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, 'SR-BI', is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, proatherogenic, stimuli, in, humans])].
[sujeto(['However,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([no, differences, between, subjects, with, atherosclerosis, and, healthy, controls])].
[sujeto(['This', indicates, that, altered, 'SR-BI', expression, is, not, a, common]), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, atherosclerosis])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we, identified, 'SR-BIII', as, a, novel, isoform]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, human, macrophages, and, in, human, atherosclerotic, plaques])].
[sujeto(['To', identify, host, factors]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, mycobacterial, entry, and, survival, within, 'macrophages,', we, performed, a, genomewide, 'RNA', interference, screen, in, 'Drosophila', 'macrophage-like', 'cells,', using, 'Mycobacterium', fortuitum])].
[sujeto(['We', identified, factors]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, general, 'phagocytosis,', as, well, as, those, needed, specifically, for, mycobacterial, infection])].
[sujeto(['One', specific, 'factor,', 'Peste', '(', 'Pes),', is, a, 'CD36', family, member]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, uptake, of, 'mycobacteria,', but, not, 'Escherichia', coli, or, 'Staphylococcus', aureus])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', mammalian, class, 'B', scavenger, receptors, '(', 'SRs)']), verbo([conferred]), complemento([uptake, of, bacteria, into, nonphagocytic, 'cells,', with, 'SR-BI', and, 'SR-BII', uniquely, mediating, uptake, of, 'M'])].
[sujeto(['fortuitum,', which]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([a, conserved, role, for, class, 'B', 'SRs', in, pattern, recognition, and, innate, immunity])].
[sujeto(['Clinical', monitoring, of, 'organ-transplant', recipients]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, administration, of, cyclosporine, '(', 'CsA)', may, increase, the, risk, of, atherosclerosis, when, compared, with, the, general, population])].
[sujeto(['The', effect, of, 'CsA', on, the, mRNA, expression, of, macrophage, scavenger, receptor, genes, including, 'CD36,', 'CD68,', scavenger, receptor, '(', 'SR)-A,', 'SR-BII,', and, 'lectin-like', oxidized, 'low-density', lipoprotein, receptor, '(', 'LOX-1);', the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([hormone, 'receptors,', including, 'peroxisome-proliferator', activated, receptor, '(', 'PPAR)gamma', and, 'liver-X-receptor', '(', 'LXR)alpha;', and, the, cholesterol, efflux, pump, 'ABCA1', were, investigated, as, markers, of, atherosclerotic, progression])].
[sujeto(['Immunoblotting', studies, demonstrated, that, the, protein, expression, of, 'CD36', was, unchanged, or, 'increased,', 'PPARgamma', was, 'unchanged,', and, 'ABCA1', was, unchanged, or]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([at, 4, and, 8, hours])].
[sujeto(['Four', of, the, five, variants]), verbo([causing]), complemento([amino, acid, 'replacements,', 'G2S,', 'S229G,', 'R484W,', and, 'G499R,', are, likely, to, affect, protein, structure, and, function])].
[sujeto(['Such', tight, haplotype, network, and, the, unusual, geographic, partitioning, of, this, 'diversity,', high, not, only, in, 'Africa', but, in, 'East', 'Asia', as, 'well,']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([its, recent, origin, and, possible, effect, of, selection])].
[sujeto(['Scavenger', receptor, class, 'B,', type, 'I', '(', 'SR-BI)']), verbo([mediates]), complemento([selective, uptake, of, high, density, lipoprotein, '(', 'HDL)', lipids])].
[sujeto(['Our', group, previously, identified, an, alternative, mRNA, splicing, variant, of, 'SR-BI,', named, 'SR-BII,', with, an, entirely, 'different,', yet, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([cytoplasmic, 'C', terminus])].
[sujeto(['Whereas', 'SR-BI', was, mainly, '(', approximately, 70, '%', ')', localized, on, the, surface, of, transfected, 'Chinese', hamster, ovary, 'cells,', as, determined, by, 'biotinylation,', 'HDL']), verbo([binding]), complemento([at, 4, degrees, 'C,', and, studies, of, enhanced, green, fluorescent, 'protein-tagged', 'SR-BI/II', fusion, 'proteins,', the, majority, of, 'SR-BII', '(', approximately, 80, -, 90, '%', ')', was, expressed, intracellularly])].
[sujeto(['The', cellular, distribution, of, 'SR-BI', was, not, affected, by, deletion, of, the, 'C', 'terminus,', which]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, the, distinct, 'C', terminus, of, 'SR-BII', is, responsible, for, its, intracellular, expression])].
[sujeto(['Relative', to, their, levels, of, expression, at, the, cell, 'surface,', 'however,', both, isoforms]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([selective, uptake, with, similar, efficiency])].
[sujeto(['These', results, do, not, support, a, model, that, selective, lipid, uptake, by, 'SR-BI']), verbo([requires]), complemento(['receptor/ligand', recycling, within, the, cell])].
[sujeto(['This', study]), verbo([has]), complemento([examined, the, 'dimeric/oligomeric', forms, of, scavenger, receptor, class, 'B', type, 'I', '(', 'SR-BI)', and, its, alternatively, spliced, 'form,', 'SR-BII,', in, a, diverse, group, of, cells, and, 'tissues:', i])].
[sujeto(['Using', both, biochemical, and, morphological, 'techniques,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([seen, that, these, dimeric, and, higher, order, oligomeric, forms, of, 'SR-BI', expression, are, strongly, associated, with, both, functional, and, morphological, expression, of, the, selective, 'HDL', cholesteryl, ester, uptake, pathway])].
[sujeto(['In', a, separate, 'study,', cotransfection, of, 'HEK293', cells, with, cMyc, and, 'V5', 'epitope-tagged', 'SR-BI', permitted, coprecipitation, and, quantitative, coimmunocytochemical, measurements, at, the, electron, microscope, 'level,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, much, of, the, newly, expressed, 'SR-BI', protein, in, stimulated, cells, dimerizes, and, that, the, 'SR-BI', dimers, are, localized, to, the, cell, surface, and, specifically, to, microvillar, or, double, membraned, intracellular, channels])].
[sujeto(['These', combined, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'SR-BI', 'self-association', represents, an, integral, step, in, the, selective, cholesteryl, ester, uptake, process])].
[sujeto(['To', further, elucidate, the, role, of, scavenger, receptor, class, 'B', type, 'I', '(', 'SR-BI)', in, reverse, cholesterol, transport, and, in, 'atherogenesis,', we, performed, studies, in, the, 'rabbit,', an, animal, model, displaying, a, lipoprotein, profile, similar, to, that, of, 'human,']), verbo([expressing]), complemento([cholesteryl, ester, transfer, protein, in, plasma, and, having, been, demonstrated, to, be, susceptible, to, atherosclerosis])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([the, highest, expression, of, 'SR-BI', in, adrenal, 'gland,', 'liver,', and, proximal, 'intestine;', lesser, expression, was, found, in, appendix, and, spleen])].
[sujeto(['An']), verbo([increasing]), complemento([portal, to, central, vein, gradient, of, expression, was, found, within, the, hepatic, lobule])].
[sujeto(['Although', studies, in, recombinant, cells, indicate, that, scavenger, receptor, class, 'B,', type, 'I', '(', 'SR-BI)', can]), verbo([promote]), complemento([cholesterol, 'efflux,', investigations, in, transgenic, mice, overexpressing, or, deficient, in, 'SR-BI', endorse, its, physiological, function, as, selectively, sequestering, cholesteryl, esters, from, 'high-density', lipoproteins, '(', 'HDLs)'])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, identify, several, putative, signalling, motifs, in, the, 'C-terminus', of, human, 'SR-BII,', which, are, absent, from, 'SR-BI,', and, hypothesize, that, these, motifs]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, signalling, molecules, to, mobilize, stored, cholesteryl, esters, 'and/or', promote, the, efflux, of, intracellular, free, cholesterol])].
[sujeto(['\'', 'Pull-down\'', assays, using, a, panel, of, tagged, 'SH3', '(', 'Src', homology, 3, ')', domains, showed, that, cytoplasmic, 'SR-BII,', but, not, cytoplasmic, 'SR-BI,']), verbo([bound]), complemento([the, 'SH3', domain, of, phospholipase, 'C-gamma1;', this, interaction, was, 'not,', 'however,', detected, under, more, physiological, conditions])].
[sujeto(['Specific', 'anti-peptide', antisera, identified, 'SR-BII', in, human, 'monocyte/macrophage', 'THP-1', cells, 'and,', in, recombinant, 'cells,', revealed, receptor, localization, to, 'caveolae,', a, plasma, membrane, microdomain, that, concentrates, 'signal-transducer', molecules, and]), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, a, conduit, for, cholesterol, flux, between, cells, and, lipoproteins])].
[sujeto(['Consistent', with, its, caveolar, 'localization,', expression, of, human, 'SR-BII', in, recombinant, 'Chinese', hamster, ovary, cells, '(', 'CHO-SR-BII)', was, associated, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['HDL-mediated', cholesterol, efflux])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, although, human, 'SR-BII', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([by, 'macrophages,', contains, cytoplasmic, signalling, motifs, and, localizes, to, 'caveolae,', its, ability, to, stimulate, cholesterol, efflux, does, not, reflect, enhanced, hydrolysis, of, stored, cholesteryl, esters])].
[sujeto(['A', polyclonal, antiserum, raised, against, 'SR-BI', significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['cell-association', of, '[', 3, 'H]CE-HDL3', in, 'HUH-7', and, 'WRL-68'])].
[sujeto(['The', present, findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, capacity, for, selective, cholesteryl, 'ester-uptake', from, high, density, lipoprotein, by, malignant, and, normal, epithelial, cells, from, the, liver, depends, on, expression, of, the, scavenger, receptor, class, 'B,', type, 'I'])].
[sujeto(['As', human, choriocarcinoma, cells, display, many, of, the, biochemical, and, morphological, characteristics]), verbo([reported]), complemento([for, in, utero, invasive, trophoblast, cells, we, have, studied, cholesterol, supply, from, high, density, lipoproteins, '(', 'HDL)', to, these, cells])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, pronounced, capacity, for, specific, cell, association, of, '[', 3, 'H]CE-HDL3', and, selective, '[', 3, 'H]CE-uptake', in, excess, of, 'HDL3-holoparticle', 'association,', and, 'cAMP-mediated']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([cell, association, of, '[', 3, 'H]CE-HDL3', in, 'JAr', and, 'Jeg3', suggested, the, scavenger, receptor, class, 'B,', type, 'I', '(', 'SR-BI)', to, be, responsible, for, this, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Adenovirus-mediated', overexpression, of, 'SR-BI', in, all, three, choriocarcinoma, cell, lines, resulted, in, an]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([capacity, for, cell, association, of, '[', 3, 'H]CE-HDL3', '(', 20, -, fold, in, 'BeWo;', fivefold, in, 'JAr', and, 'Jeg3)'])].
[sujeto(['The', fact, that, exogenous, 'HDL3', remarkably]), verbo([increases]), complemento([proliferation, in, 'JAr', and, 'Jeg3', supports, the, notion, that, selective, 'CE-uptake', and, subsequent, intracellular, generation, of, cholesterol, is, coupled, to, cellular, growth])].
[sujeto(['The', scavenger, receptor, '(', 'SR)', 'CD36', and, integrin, alphavbeta5]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, participate, in, 'POS', binding, and, internalization, by, 'RPE', cells])].
[sujeto(['The', objective, of, the, current, study, was, to, determine, whether, 'RPE', cells]), verbo([express]), complemento(['SRs', other, than, 'CD36'])].
[sujeto(['Primary', cultures, of, human, 'RPE', cells]), verbo([express]), complemento([both, mRNA, and, protein, for, 'SR-BI', and, 'SR-', 'BII'])].
[sujeto(['The', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, these, 'SRs', may, play, a, role, in, 'POS', lipid, binding, and, uptake, by, 'RPE', cells, in, the, eye])].
[sujeto(['Results', showed, that, intestinal, cells]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([only, the, 'SR-BI', isoform, with, little, or, no, expression, of, the, 'SR-BII', variant])].

[sujeto(['The', localization, of, 'SR-BI', in, the, jejunum, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, different, from, that, observed, in, the, duodenum])].

[sujeto(['The', localization, of, 'SR-BI', on, the, apical, surface, of, the, proximal, intestine, is, consistent, with, the, hypothesis, of, its, possible, role, in, dietary, cholesterol, 'absorption,', whereas, 'SR-BI', present, on, the, basolateral, surface, of, the, distal, intestine]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([its, possible, involvement, in, intestinal, lipoprotein, uptake])].
[sujeto(['Scavenger', receptors]), verbo([bind]), complemento([and, internalize, modified, 'low-density', lipoprotein, '(', 'LDL)', and, 'high-density', lipoprotein, '(', 'HDL)'])].
[sujeto(['Because', the, expression, of, scavenger, receptors, is, not, 'down-regulated', by, 'cholesterol,', macrophages, '(', 'Mphi)']), verbo([expressing]), complemento([scavenger, receptors, can, internalize, substantial, quantities, of, cholesteryl, ester, from, oxidized, 'LDL', and, 'HDL,', leading, to, foam, cell, formation])].
[sujeto(['Mphi']), verbo([express]), complemento([several, different, classes, of, the, growing, scavenger, receptor, family, on, their, cell, surface, and, their, relative, contribution, to, 'Mphi', cholesterol, physiology, and, atherogenesis, is, the, subject, of, intense, investigation])].
[sujeto(['Caveolae', are, initial, acceptor, sites, for, cholesteryl, esters, and, these, findings, indicate, a, possible, role, for, caveolae, and, 'SR-BI', in, 'Mphi-selective', lipid, uptake, and, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento(['Mphi', cholesterol, flux, in, the, vascular, wall])].
[sujeto(['The', scavenger, receptor, class, 'B,', type, 'I', '(', 'SR-BI),']), verbo([binds]), complemento([high, density, lipoprotein, '(', 'HDL)', and, mediates, selective, uptake, of, cholesteryl, ester, from, 'HDL', and, 'HDL-dependent', cholesterol, efflux, from, cells])].
[sujeto(['The', translation, products, predicted, from, 'human,', 'bovine,', 'mouse,', 'hamster,', and, rat, cDNAs, exhibit, a, high, degree, of, sequence, similarity, within, the, 'SR-BII', 'C-terminal', domain, '(', 62, -, 67, '%', identity, when, compared, with, the, human, 'sequence),']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, this, variant, is, biologically, important])].
[sujeto(['Subcellular', fractionation, of, transfected, 'Chinese', hamster, ovary, cells, showed, that, 'SR-BII,', like, 'SR-BI,', is, enriched, in, 'caveolae,', indicating, that, the, altered, cytoplasmic, tail, does, not, affect]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([of, the, receptor])].
[sujeto(['SR-BII']), verbo([mediated]), complemento([both, selective, cellular, uptake, of, cholesteryl, ether, from, 'HDL', as, well, as, 'HDL-dependent', cholesterol, efflux, from, 'cells,', although, with, approximately, 4, -, fold, lower, efficiency, than, 'SR-BI'])].
[sujeto(['These', studies, show, that, 'SR-BII,', an, 'HDL', receptor, isoform, containing, a, distinctly, different, cytoplasmic, 'tail,']), verbo([mediates]), complemento([selective, lipid, transfer, between, 'HDL', and, 'cells,', but, with, a, lower, efficiency, than, the, previously, characterized, variant])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, show, 'that,', among, human, peripheral, blood, 'cells,', 'SCARB2', is, most, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, plasmacytoid, dendritic, cells, '(', 'pDCs),', and, its, expression, is, further, upregulated, by, 'CpG', oligodeoxynucleotide, stimulation])].
[sujeto(['Detailed', studies]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, 'SCARB2', localizes, in, late, 'endosome/lysosome', of, 'pDCs,', and, knockdown, of, 'SCARB2', does, not, affect, 'CpG', oligodeoxynucleotide, uptake, but, results, in, the, retention, of, 'TLR9', in, the, endoplasmic, reticulum, and, an, impaired, nuclear, translocation, of, 'IFN', regulatory, factor, 7])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'SCARB2', regulates, 'TLR9-dependent', 'IFN-I', production, of, pDCs, by, mediating, endosomal, translocation, of, 'TLR9', and, nuclear, translocation, of, 'IFN', regulatory, factor, 7])].
[sujeto(['Gaucher', disease, is, an, autosomal, recessive, disorder]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, deficiency, of, the, enzyme, glucocerebrosidase])].
[sujeto(['MicroRNAs', '(', 'miRNAs)', are, small, 'non-coding', 'RNAs']), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, many, biological, processes, and, diseases])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([several, miRNAs, that, either, 'up-', or, 'down-regulated', glucocerebrosidase, activity])].
[sujeto(['In', 'follow-up', 'assays,', we, confirmed, that, one, specific, miRNA, '(', 'miR-127-5p)', 'down-regulated', both, glucocerebrosidase, activity, and, protein, levels, by, 'down-regulation', of, 'LIMP-2,', the, receptor]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, proper, trafficking, of, glucocerebrosidase, from, the, endoplasmic, reticulum, to, the, lysosome])].
[sujeto(['Two', other, 'miRNAs,', 'miR-16-5p', and, 'miR-195-5p,', were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, 'up-regulate', glucocerebrosidase, activity, by, greater, than, 40, '%', and, to, enhance, expression, and, protein, levels, of, the, enzyme])].
[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', we, show, that, miRNAs, can, alter, glucocerebrosidase, activity, in, patient, 'cells,', indicating, that, miRNAs, can, potentially]), verbo([act]), complemento([as, modifiers, in, 'Gaucher', disease])].
[sujeto(['The', lysosomal, integral, membrane, protein, 'type-2', '(', 'LIMP-2/SCARB2)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, identified, as, a, receptor, for, enterovirus, 71, uptake, and, 'mannose-6-phosphate-independent', lysosomal, trafficking, of, the, acid, hydrolase, 'β-glucocerebrosidase'])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, 'LIMP-2', undergoes, proteolytic, cleavage]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, lysosomal, cysteine, proteases])].
[sujeto(['Heterologous', expression, and, in, vitro, studies]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'cathepsin-F', is, mainly, responsible, for, the, lysosomal, processing, of, 'wild-type', 'LIMP-2'])].
[sujeto(['Mutations', in, the, gene, encoding, 'cathepsin-F', '(', 'CTSF)']), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, been, associated, with, 'type-B-Kufs-disease,', an, adult, form, of, neuronal, 'ceroid-lipofuscinosis'])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, 'LIMP-2', represents, an, in, vivo, substrate, of, 'cathepsin-F', with, relevance, for, understanding, the, pathophysiology, of, 'type-B-Kufs-disease'])].
[sujeto(['Loss', of, 'GC', activity]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, accumulation, of, its, substrate, glucosylceramide, and, 'α-synuclein'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'LIMP-2-deficient', brains, a, significant, reduction, in, 'GC', activity]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, lipid, 'storage,', disturbed, 'autophagic/lysosomal', 'function,', and, 'α-synuclein', accumulation, mediating, neurotoxicity, of, dopaminergic, '(', 'DA)', 'neurons,', apoptotic, cell, 'death,', and, inflammation])].
[sujeto(['Heterologous', expression, of, 'LIMP-2', accelerated, clearance, of, overexpressed, 'α-synuclein,', possibly, through]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([lysosomal, 'GC', activity])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', we]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, manipulating, 'LIMP-2', expression, to, increase, lysosomal, 'GC', activity, is, a, promising, strategy, for, the, treatment, of, synucleinopathies])].
[sujeto(['The', acid, 'β-glucosidase', '(', glucocerbrosidase, '(', 'GCase))']), verbo([binding]), complemento([sequence, to, 'LIMP-2', '(', lysosomal, integral, membrane, protein, 2, ')', ',', the, receptor, for, intracellular, 'GCase', trafficking, to, the, 'lysosome,', has, been, identified])].
[sujeto(['Heterologous', expression, of, deletion, 'constructs,', the, available, 'GCase', crystal, 'structures,', and]), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, 'co-localization', of, identified, peptides, or, mutant, 'GCases', were, used, to, identify, and, characterize, a, highly, conserved, 11, -, amino, acid, 'sequence,', 'DSPIIVDITKD,', within, human, 'GCase'])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'LIMP-2', is, not, dependent, upon, a, single, amino, 'acid,', but, the, interactions, of, 'GCase', with, 'LIMP-2', are, heavily, influenced, by, 'Asp(399)', and, the, 'di-isoleucines,', 'Ile(402)', and, 'Ile(403)'])].
[sujeto(['A', single, alanine, substitution, at, any, of, these]), verbo([decreases]), complemento(['GCase', binding, to, 'LIMP-2', and, alters, its, 'pH-dependent', binding, as, well, as, diminishing, the, trafficking, of, 'GCase', to, the, lysosome, and, significantly, increasing, 'GCase', secretion])].
[sujeto(['Enterovirus', 71, also]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, 'LIMP-2', '(', also, known, as, 'SCARB2)', on, the, external, surface, of, the, plasma, membrane])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, 'LIMP-2/SCARB2']), verbo([binding]), complemento([sequences, for, enterovirus, 71, and, 'GCase', are, not, 'similar,', indicating, that, 'LIMP-2/SCARB2', may, have, multiple, or, overlapping, binding, sites, with, differing, specificities])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([have]), complemento([therapeutic, implications, for, the, production, of, 'GCase', and, the, distribution, of, this, enzyme, that, is, delivered, to, various, organs])].
[sujeto(['Mice', with, deficiency, of, 'Limp-2', '(', the, murine, 'homologue)', develop, tubular, proteinuria, but, not, focal, and, segmental, glomerulosclerosis, and, they]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, defect, in, macrophage, function])].

[sujeto(['It']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([an, important, role, for, 'Limp-2', in, mediating, the, inflammatory, response])].
[sujeto(['Lysosomes']), verbo([require]), complemento([the, presence, of, many, specialized, proteins, to, facilitate, their, roles, in, cellular, maintenance])].
[sujeto(['One', such, protein, that]), verbo([has]), complemento([proven, to, be, an, important, player, in, the, lysosomal, field, is, lysosomal, integral, membrane, 'protein-2', '(', 'LIMP-2),', encoded, by, the, gene, 'SCARB2'])].

[sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([have]), complemento([suggested, that, protection, from, apoptosis, is, achieved, by, autocrine, production, of, 'interleukin-4', '(', 'IL-4)', through, 'up-regulation', of, 'anti-apoptotic', mediators])].

[sujeto(['We', show, that, this, 'protein,', with, important, roles, in, cell, death, counteraction, and, mitotic, progression, 'control,', is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, the, 'IL-4', pathway, in, colon, rectal, cancer, stem, cells, '(', 'CR-CSC)'])].
[sujeto(['Hence,', the, presence, of, 'IL-4']), verbo([increases]), complemento([survivin, levels, in, our, model, while, cytokine, neutralization, has, opposing, effects])].
[sujeto(['Treatment', with, cytokine, neutralizing, agent, or, with, 'leflunomide,', 'Stat6', 'inhibitor,']), verbo([have]), complemento([similar, consequences, on, survivin, 'localization,', increasing, its, nuclear, 'pool,', an, observation, known, to, be, correlated, with, a, good, prognosis, in, colon, cancer, patients])].
[sujeto(['These', results, demonstrate, that, 'IL-4,', through, activation, of, the, 'STAT-6', signaling, 'pathway,', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, survivin, expression, levels, as, well, as, its, localization])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, shed, more, light, on, the, molecular, mechanisms]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'IL-4-mediated', chemoresistance])].
[sujeto(['In', order, to, identify, recurrent, chromosomal, regions, of]), verbo([gain]), complemento([and, 'loss,', and, thereby, novel, gene, targets, of, potential, importance, for, 'MPNST', development, 'and/or', 'progression,', we, have, analyzed, 'DNA', copy, number, changes, in, seven, 'high-grade', 'MPNSTs', using, 'microarray-based', comparative, genomic, hybridization, '(', array, 'CGH)'])].
[sujeto(['Considerable', more]), verbo([gains]), complemento([than, losses, were, 'observed,', and, the, most, frequent, minimal, recurrent, regions, of, gain, included, 1, q24])].
[sujeto(['The', gene, lysyl, 'oxidase-like', 2, '(', 'LOXL2)', was, identified, as, a, candidate]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, the, 8, p23])].

[sujeto(['Although', no, clear, correlations, between, the, expression, level, and, patient, outcome, were, 'observed,', the, genes, 'TOP2A,', 'ETV4', and, 'BIRC5', are, interesting, candidate]), verbo([targets]), complemento([for, the, 17, q, gain, associated, with, poor, survival])].
[sujeto(['Wilson', disease, '(', 'WD)', is, an, 'autosomal-recessive', copper, overload, disorder]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutations, in, the, 'copper-transporting', adenosine, triphosphatase, '(', 'ATPase)', 'ATP7B'])].
[sujeto(['No', clear, 'genotype-phenotype', correlation]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, established])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', variants, in, modifier, genes, could]), verbo([have]), complemento([an, impact, on, 'WD', manifestation, and, severity])].

[sujeto(['Survivin', is, an, oncofetal, protein]), verbo([involved]), complemento([both, in, inhibiting, of, apoptosis, and, in, cell, cycle, regulation])].
[sujeto(['Drugs']), verbo([targeting]), complemento([receptor, tyrosine, kinase, 'FLT3', are, of, particular, interest, since, activating, 'FLT3-internal', tandem, duplication, '(', 'ITD)', mutations, abundantly, occur, in, fatal, acute, myeloid, leukemias, '(', 'AMLs)'])].
[sujeto(['Imidazoacridinone', 'C-1311,', a, 'DNA-reactive', inhibitor, of, topoisomerase, 'II,']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, previously, shown, to, be, a, potent, and, selective, inhibitor, of, recombinant, 'FLT3'])].

[sujeto(['Survivin', localization, was, both]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([and, cytoplasmic, with, a, higher, expression, of, nuclear, survivin])].

[sujeto(['Transfection', of, cells, with, survivin, siRNA]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([elevation, of, survivin, protein, by, very, low, dose, radiation, and, the, subsequent, 'radio-adaptive', response, in, 'SA-NH', cells])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'survivin-mediated', 'radio-adaptive', response, is, dependent, upon, the, ability, of, cells, to, activate, 'NFκB'])].
[sujeto(['In', a, previous, 'study,', we, showed, that, multidrug, resistance, '(', 'MDR)']), verbo([involves]), complemento([the, overexpression, of, 'MDR1', and, survivin, in, 'vincristine-resistant', 'RPMI8226/VCR', cells])].

[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', the, inhibition, of, 'ERK1/2,', 'Akt,', or, 'NF-κB', by, inhibitors, reversed, the, 'drug-resistance', of, 'RPMI8226/VCR', cells, via, the, suppression, of, survivin, 'expression,', but, did, not, affect, 'MDR1', 'expression;', 'RNA', silencing, of, survivin, expression, completely, reversed, vincristine, 'resistance,', while, 'MDR1', silencing, only, weakly]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([vincristine, resistance, in, 'RPMI8226/VCR', cells])].

[sujeto(['Survivin', is, an, 'inhibitor-of-apoptosis', protein, with, key, roles, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([cell, 'division,', proliferation, and, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', high, expression, of, 'Survivin']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, associated, with, poor, clinical, outcome, in, 'AML'])].

[sujeto(['Survivin', is, a, biomarker, of, cancer, known, for, its, 'anti-apoptotic', and, 'cell-cycle']), verbo([regulating]), complemento([properties])].

[sujeto(['To', 'conclude,', detection, of, survivin, in, blood]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, simple, test, to, improve, diagnostic, and, to, increase, predictability, for, 'RA'])].
[sujeto(['Signal', transducer, and, activator, of, transcription, 3, '(', 'STAT3)', is, constitutively]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, human, cancers])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', 'STAT3', is, a, therapeutic]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, cancer, drug, discovery])].
[sujeto(['We', previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, natural, products, inhibited, constitutively, activated, 'STAT3', in, human, prostate, tumor, cells])].
[sujeto(['Ginkgetin']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([both, inducible, and, constitutively, activated, 'STAT3', and, blocked, the, nuclear, translocation, of, 'p-STAT3', in, 'DU-145', prostate, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', ginkgetin, selectively]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, growth, of, prostate, tumor, cells, stimulated, with, activated, 'STAT3'])].
[sujeto(['Ginkgetin']), verbo([induced]), complemento(['STAT3', dephosphorylation, at, 'Try705', and, inhibited, its, localization, to, the, 'nucleus,', leading, to, the, inhibition, of, expression, of, 'STAT3', target, genes, such, as, cell, 'survival-related', genes, '(', cyclin, 'D1', and, 'survivin)', and, 'anti-apoptotic', proteins, '(', 'Bcl-2', and, 'Bcl-xL)'])].

[sujeto(['Therefore,', ginkgetin, is, a, good, 'STAT3', inhibitor, and, may, be, a, useful]), verbo([lead]), complemento([molecule, for, development, of, a, therapeutic, 'STAT3', inhibitor])].
[sujeto(['Inhibition', of, 'KSP', function]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, cell, cycle, arrest, at, mitosis, and, ultimately, to, cell, death])].

[sujeto(['The', control, group, was, randomly, selected, from, a, cohort, of, patients, between, 'April', 1997, and, 'December', 2005, who]), verbo([have]), complemento([survived, without, disease, recurrence, after, 'CLM', resection, for, over, 5, years])].

[sujeto(['Administration', of, postoperative, chemotherapy, may]), verbo([prevent]), complemento([early, intrahepatic, recurrence])].
[sujeto(['It', is, the, fourth, major]), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, 'tumor-related', death, and, its, morbidity, is, 'increasing,', and, hence, it, is, imperative, to, develop, effective, forms, of, therapy, for, pancreatic, cancer])].
[sujeto(['According', to, previous, 'literatures,', 'PYY']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, inhibit, tumor, proliferation, in, cellular, and, animal, 'models,', but, there, has, been, limited, research, on, the, detailed, mechanism, of, 'PYY', in, pancreatic, cancer])].
[sujeto(['PYY']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['MiaPaCa-2', cell, 'proliferation,', blocked, it, in, 'G0/G1', 'phase,', increased, the, proportion, of, apoptosis, cells, and, 'caspase-3', 'activity,', and, reduced, the, expression, of, 'survivin,', 'VEGF,', and, 'COX-2'])].

[sujeto(['The', coagulation, protease, factor, 'Xa']), verbo([induces]), complemento([cellular, responses, implicated, in, cardiovascular, and, inflammatory, disease])].
[sujeto(['To', isolate, the, 'EPR-1', cDNA, and, 'gene,', we, surveyed, gene, databases, for]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([sequence, tags, '(', 'ESTs)', that, could, be, derived, from, 'EPR-1'])].
[sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'EPR-1', is, either, highly, 'cell-specific', or, the, published, 'EPR-1', cDNA, includes, sequences, from, clones, derived, from, survivin, messenger, 'RNA'])].
[sujeto(['The', means, by, which, factor, 'Xa']), verbo([mediates]), complemento([its, cellular, effects, requires, further, evaluation])].
[sujeto(['Proinflammatory', effects]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, the, serine, protease, factor, 'Xa', were, investigated, in, 'HUVEC'])].
[sujeto(['Exposure', of, cells, to, factor, 'Xa', '(', 5, -, 80, 'nM)', concentration, dependently]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([the, production, of, 'IL-6,', 'IL-8,', and, monocyte, chemotactic, 'protein-1', '(', 'MCP-1)', and, the, expression, of, 'E-selectin,', 'ICAM-1,', and, 'VCAM-1,', which, was, accompanied, by, polymorphonuclear, leukocyte, adhesion])].

[sujeto(['The', effector, cell, protease, 'receptor-1', '(', 'EPR-1)', seems, not, to, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([since, 'anti-EPR-1', 'Abs', failed, to, inhibit, cytokine, production])].

[sujeto(['Nuclear', factor, one, 'X', '(', 'NFIX)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, play, a, pivotal, role, during, the, development, of, many, regions, of, the, 'brain,', including, the, 'neocortex,', the, hippocampus, and, the, cerebellum])].
[sujeto(['Mechanistically,', 'NFIX']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, promote, neural, stem, cell, differentiation, through, the, activation, of, 'astrocyte-specific', genes, and, via, the, repression, of, genes, central, to, progenitor, cell, 'self-renewal'])].

[sujeto(['Through', the, examination, of, embryonic, and, postnatal, 'Nfix(-/-)', mice, we]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, hydrocephalus, is, first, seen, at, around, postnatal, day, '(', 'P)', 10, in, mice, lacking, 'Nfix,', and, is, fully, penetrant, by, 'P20'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', we, examined, the, subcommissural, organ, '(', 'SCO),', the, 'Sylvian', aqueduct, and, the, ependymal, layer, of, the, lateral, 'ventricles,', regions, that, when, malformed, and, functionally, perturbed]), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, been, implicated, in, the, development, of, hydrocephalus])].
[sujeto(['SOX3', is, a, factor, known, to]), verbo([regulate]), complemento(['SCO', development])].

[sujeto(['Gestational', age, '(', 'GA)', and, birth, weight]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, implicated, in, the, determination, of, 'long-term', health])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, hypothesized, that, changes, in, 'DNA', methylation, may, mediate, these, 'long-term', effects])].

[sujeto(['Analysis', of, serial, methylation, from, birth, to, adolescence]), verbo([provided]), complemento([evidence, for, a, lack, of, persistence, of, methylation, differences, beyond, early, childhood])].

[sujeto(['We', demonstrate, that, 'NFIX']), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, a, regulator, of, lineage, specification, in, the, haematopoietic, system, and, the, expression, of, 'Nfix', was, transcriptionally, downregulated, as, 'B', cells, commit, and, 'differentiate,', whilst, maintained, in, myeloid, progenitor, cells])].
