[sujeto(['The', induction, of, major, histocompatibility, complex, class, 'II', gene, expression, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, three, 'DNA', elements, in, the, promoters, of, these, genes, '(', 'W,', 'X,', and, 'Y', 'boxes)'])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([found, that, transfection, of, either, dbpA, or, dbpB, '(', 'mYB-1)', or, both, inhibits, 'I-A', beta, gene, expression])].

[sujeto(['To', identify, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, adaptive, 'mechanisms,', we, constructed, a, large, population, of, transgenic, 'Arabidopsis', expressing, rice, 'full-length', 'cDNAs,', and, performed, 'gain-of-function', screening, under, 'high-salinity', stress])].

[sujeto(['The', changes, in, the, level, of, these, 'proteins,', which, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, mitochondrial, control, of, 'apoptosis,', correlate, with, changes, in, mitochondrial, membrane, potential])].
[sujeto(['Bu+Clo+Flu+Sor']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([mitochondrial, membrane, potential, by, 60, '%', and, caused, leakage, of, cytochrome, 'c,', second, 'mitochondria-derived', activator, of, caspases, '(', 'SMAC)/direct', 'IAP', 'Binding', protein, with, low, pI, '(', 'DIABLO),', and, 'AIF', from, the, mitochondria, to, the, 'cytoplasm,', caspase, 'activation,', and, cell, 'death,', suggesting, the, activation, of, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Although', our, previous, studies, were, aimed, at, standardizing, the, conditioning, 'regimen,', the, new, findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, patients, with, abnormal, expression, of, 'FLT3', might, further, benefit, from, individualizing, treatment, through, the, addition, of, 'Sor', to, 'Bu+Clo+Flu,', thereby, providing, personalized, pretransplantation, therapy])].
[sujeto(['Levels', of, caspase, 8, '(', 'C8),', 'X-linked', inhibitor, of, apoptosis, protein, '(', 'XIAP),', direct, 'IAP']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, with, low, pI, '(', 'DIABLO),', proliferating, cell, nuclear, antigen, '(', 'PCNA)', and, density, of, cells, immunoreactive, '(', -, 'IR)', for, proliferation, marker, 'Ki-67', were, measured, in, postmortem, samples, of, the, left, orbitofrontal, cortex, '(', 'OFC)', of, subjects, with, 'MDD,', and, 'psychiatrically-normal', comparison, subjects])].
[sujeto(['There', was, significant]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'C8,', a, higher, ratio, of, 'DIABLO', to, 'XIAP,', lower, packing, density, of, 'Ki-67-IR', 'cells,', and, an, unexpected, 'age-dependent', increase, in, 'PCNA', in, subjects, with, 'MDD', vs])].
[sujeto(['Markers', of, cell, vulnerability, to, degeneration, are]), verbo([increased]), complemento([and, density, of, 'Ki67-positive', cells, is, low, 'MDD,', but, accompanied, by, normal, 'XIAP', levels])].
[sujeto(['The', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([increased, vulnerability, to, cell, pathology, in, depression, that, is, insufficient, to, cause, morphologically, conspicuous, cell, death])].
[sujeto(['Four', novel, hit, compounds, were, identified, to, potently]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([cell, growth, in, two, human, melanoma, '(', 'A375', and, 'M14)', and, two, human, prostate, '(', 'PC-3', and, 'DU145)', cancer, cell, lines])].
[sujeto(['The', best, 'compound,', 'UC-112', '[', 5, -, '(', '(', 'benzyloxy)methyl)-7-(pyrrolidin-1-ylmethyl)quinolin-8-ol],']), verbo([has]), complemento(['IC50', values, ranging, from, 0.7, to, 3.4, µM])].
[sujeto(['UC-112', also, potently]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([the, growth, of, 'P-glycoprotein', '(', 'P-gp)-overexpressed', 'multidrug-resistant', cancer, 'cells,', strongly, activates, 'caspase-3/7', and, 'caspase-9', 'activities,', and, selectively, downregulates, survivin, level, at, a, concentration, as, low, as, 1, µM])].
[sujeto(['As', a, single, 'agent,', 'UC-112', strongly]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([tumor, growth, and, reduces, both, 'X', 'chromosome-linked', 'IAP', and, survivin, levels, in, an, 'A375', human, melanoma, xenograft, model, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['XIAP']), verbo([has]), complemento([previously, emerged, as, a, molecular, discriminator, that, is, upregulated, in, 'Type', 'II', and, downregulated, in, 'Type', 'I', apoptotic, signaling])].
[sujeto(['We', demonstrate, that, 'FAIM-L']), verbo([requires]), complemento([sustained, endogenous, levels, of, 'XIAP', to, protect, 'Type', 'II', cells, as, well, as, murine, cortical, neurons, from, 'Fas-induced', apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['FAIM-L']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, the, 'BIR2', domain, of, 'XIAP', through, an, 'IAP-binding', 'motif,', the, mutation, of, which, impairs, the, antiapoptotic, function, of, 'FAIM-L'])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'FAIM-L', inhibits, 'XIAP', 'auto-ubiquitinylation', and, maintains, its, 'stability,', thus, conferring, protection, from, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['In', abnormal, skin, wound, 'healing,', hypertrophic, scars, '(', 'HS)', are, characterized, by, excessive, fibroblast, hypercellularity, and, an, overproduction, of, 'collagen,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, atypical, extracellular, matrix, '(', 'ECM)', remodeling])].
[sujeto(['Although', the, exact, mechanisms, of, 'HS', remain, 'unclear,']), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['HS', fibroblast, '(', 'HSFB)', apoptosis, and, increased, proliferation, are, evident, in, the, development, of, 'HS'])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', the, contribution, of, the, second, 'mitochondria-derived', activator, of, 'caspases/direct', inhibitor, of, apoptosis, protein, '(', 'IAP)-binding', protein, with, a, low, isoelectric, point, '(', 'pI)', '(', 'Smac/DIABLO),', an, 'apoptosis-promoting', protein]), verbo([released]), complemento([from, the, 'mitochondria,', was, investigated, in, human, normal, skin, and, 'HSFB', cultures])].
[sujeto(['The', expression, of, 'Smac/DIABLO', is, usually]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([in, many, malignant, tumors, compared, with, normal, tissues])].
[sujeto(['Of', 'note,', 'adenovirus-mediated', 'Smac/DIABLO', overexpression, in, the, cultured, 'HSFBs', significantly, reduced, cell, 'proliferation,', as, detected, by, the, cell, counting, 'kit-8,', and]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['caspase-3', and, -, 9, 'activity,', as, detected, by, spectrofluorimetry])].

[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', 'Smac/DIABLO']), verbo([decreases]), complemento([the, proliferation, and, increases, the, apoptosis, of, 'HSFBs'])].

[sujeto(['Some', lipids, are, synthesized, inside, 'mitochondria,', while, others]), verbo([have]), complemento([to, be, imported, or, acquired, in, the, form, of, precursors])].
[sujeto([',', limited, in, intensity, and, destined, to, 'resolve)', inflammatory, responses]), verbo([have]), complemento([indeed, been, shown, to, exert, consistent, hepatoprotective, 'effects,', contributing, to, tissue, repair, and, promoting, the, 're-establishment', of, homeostasis])].
[sujeto([',', disproportionate, in, intensity, and, 'permanent)', inflammation, may]), verbo([induce]), complemento([a, massive, loss, of, hepatocytes, and, hence, exacerbate, the, severity, of, various, hepatic, 'conditions,', including, 'ischemia-reperfusion', 'injury,', systemic, metabolic, alterations, '(', e])].

[sujeto(['Presenilin-associated', protein, '(', 'PSAP)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, identified, as, a, mitochondrial, proapoptotic, protein])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, mechanism, by, which, 'PSAP']), verbo([induces]), complemento([apoptosis, remains, unknown])].
[sujeto(['To', this, 'end,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([established, an, inducible, expression, system])].
[sujeto(['Using', this, 'system,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([examined, the, roles, of, 'B-cell', lymphoma, 2, '(', 'Bcl-2)', family, 'proteins,', cytochrome, 'c,', 'Smac', '(', 'Smac/Diablo,', second, 'mitochondria-derived', activator, of, 'caspases/direct', 'IAP', binding, protein, with, low, 'PI),', and, 'Apaf-1', '(', apoptotic, 'protease-activating', 'factor)', in, 'PSAP-induced', apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, demonstrate, that, knockdown, of, 'Apaf-1', abolished, 'PSAP-induced', caspase, activation, and, 'poly(ADP', 'ribose)', polymerase, '(', 'PARP)', 'cleavage,', indicating, that, the, apoptosome, formation]), verbo([triggered]), complemento([by, cytochrome, c, is, crucial, for, 'PSAP-induced', apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['However,', 'interestingly,', our, data, demonstrate, that, overexpression, of, 'Bcl-2', and, 'Bcl-xL', did, not, protect, cells, from, 'PSAP-induced', 'apoptosis,', and, that, knockdown, of, 'Bid,', 'Bax,', and, 'Bak', had, no, effect, on, 'PSAP-induced', cytochrome, c, and, 'Smac', 'release,', indicating, that, 'PSAP-induced', apoptosis, is, not]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'Bcl-2', family, proteins])].
[sujeto(['These', results, strongly]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'PSAP', evokes, mitochondrial, apoptotic, cascades, via, a, novel, mechanism, that, is, not, regulated, by, 'Bcl-2', family, 'proteins,', but, that, both, the, formation, of, cytochrome, 'c-Apaf-1', apoptosome, and, the, presence, of, 'Smac', are, absolutely, required, for, 'PSAP-induced', apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Fas', '(', also, called, 'CD95', or, 'APO-1),', a, member, of, a, subgroup, of, the, tumour, necrosis, factor, receptor, superfamily, that, contain, an, intracellular, death, 'domain,', can, initiate, apoptosis, signalling, and]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, critical, role, in, the, regulation, of, the, immune, system])].
[sujeto(['Fas-induced', apoptosis]), verbo([requires]), complemento([recruitment, and, activation, of, the, initiator, 'caspase,', 'caspase-8', '(', in, humans, also, 'caspase-10),', within, the, 'death-inducing', signalling, complex])].
[sujeto(['In', 'so-called', type, 2, 'cells,', 'however,', killing]), verbo([requires]), complemento([amplification, of, the, caspase, cascade])].
[sujeto(['This', can, be, achieved, through, 'caspase-8-mediated', proteolytic, activation, of, the, 'pro-apoptotic', 'Bcl-2', homology, domain, '(', 'BH)3-only', protein, 'BH3-interacting', domain, death, agonist, '(', 'Bid),', which, then]), verbo([causes]), complemento([mitochondrial, outer, membrane, permeabilisation])].
[sujeto(['This', in, turn]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, mitochondrial, release, of, apoptogenic, 'proteins,', such, as, cytochrome, c, 'and,', pertinent, for, 'Fas', death, receptor, '(', 'DR)-induced', 'apoptosis,', 'Smac/DIABLO', '(', second, 'mitochondria-derived', activator, of, 'caspase/direct', 'IAP', binding, protein, with, low, 'Pi),', an, antagonist, of, 'X-linked', inhibitor, of, apoptosis, '(', 'XIAP),', which, imposes, a, brake, on, effector, caspases])].
[sujeto(['Apoptosis,', via, caspase, 'cascade,', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, tumorigenesis, and, 'progression,', and, 'thus,', altered, 'apoptosis-related', protein, expressions, have, clinical, and, prognostic, significance])].
[sujeto(['Inhibitor', of, apoptosis, protein, '(', 'IAP)-binding', proteins, such, as, 'Grim,', 'Reaper', and, 'HID']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, exert, a, critical, role, in, regulating, caspase, activity, in, species, such, as, 'D'])].
[sujeto(['However,', a, comparable, role, for, the, mammalian, homologue, of, second, 'mitochondrial-derived', activator, of, 'caspase/direct', 'IAP-binding', protein, with, low, pI, '(', 'Smac/DIABLO)']), verbo([has]), complemento([yet, to, be, clearly, established, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['Despite', tremendous, interest, in, recent, years, in, the, use, of, 'so-called', 'Smac', mimetics, to]), verbo([enhance]), complemento([chemotherapeutic, 'potency,', our, understanding, of, the, true, physiologic, nature, of, 'Smac/DIABLO', in, regulating, programmed, cell, death, '(', 'PCD)', remains, elusive])].
[sujeto(['In', order, to, critically, evaluate, the, role, of, 'Smac/DIABLO', in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([mammalian, 'PCD,', deficiency, of, 'caspase-3', was, used, as, a, sensitizing, mutation, in, order, to, reduce, aggregate, levels, of, executioner, caspase, activity])].
[sujeto(['Consistent', with, 'this,', examination, of, both, intrinsic, and, extrinsic, forms, of, 'PCD', in, lines, of, murine, embryonic, fibroblasts, demonstrate, that]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'Smac/DIABLO', alters, both, 'caspase-dependent', and, 'caspase-independent', intrinsic, 'PCD'])].
[sujeto(['Comparative', small, interfering, 'RNA', inhibition, studies, of, 'X-linked', inhibitor, of, 'apoptosis,', cellular, inhibitor, of, apoptosis, '(', 'cIAP)-1,', 'cIAP-2,', 'caspase-6', and, -, 7, in, both, 'wild-type', and, 'Casp3/Diablo', 'DKO', mouse, embryonic, fibroblast, 'lineages,', supports, a, model, in, which, 'Smac/DIABLO']), verbo([acts]), complemento([to, enhance, the, early, phase, executioner, caspase, activity, through, the, modulation, of, inhibitory, interactions, between, specific, 'IAP', family, members, and, executioner, 'caspases-3', and, -, 7])].
[sujeto(['Following', the, apoptotic, permeabilization, of, the, outer, mitochondrial, 'membrane,', the, 'inter-membrane', space, protein, second, 'mitochondria-derived', activator, of, caspases, '(', 'Smac)', is]), verbo([released]), complemento([into, the, cytosol])].
[sujeto(['Smac', efficiently]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([apoptosis, by, antagonizing, 'x-linked', inhibitor, of, apoptosis, protein, '(', 'XIAP),', an, inhibitor, of, 'caspases-9,', -, 3, ',', and, -, 7, ',', via, a, short, 'NH(2)-terminal', inhibitor, of, apoptosis, protein, '(', 'IAP)', binding, motif, '(', 'AVPI)'])].
[sujeto(['Using', 'time-lapse', 'single-cell', imaging, of, 'DLD-1', and, 'HCT-116', colon, cancer, 'cells,', we, here, demonstrate, that, upon, mitochondrial, outer, membrane, permeabilization, physiological, expression, levels, of, 'XIAP', are, sufficient, to, selectively, prolong, the]), verbo([release]), complemento([of, dimeric, but, not, monomeric, 'Smac'])].
[sujeto(['Elevating', the, expression, of, 'XIAP', further, extended, the]), verbo([release]), complemento([duration, of, dimeric, 'Smac', and, resulted, in, the, mitochondrial, retention, of, a, significant, proportion, of, the, 'Smac', pool])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', monomeric, 'Smac', was, always, fully]), verbo([released]), complemento([and, the, release, kinetics, were, not, affected, by, altered, 'XIAP', expression])].
[sujeto(['The', four, residues, at, the, 'amino-terminus', of, mature, 'Smac/DIABLO', are, an, 'IAP']), verbo([binding]), complemento([motif, '(', 'IBM)'])].
[sujeto(['Upon', exit, from, 'mitochondria,', mature, 'Smac']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, inhibitor, of, apoptosis, proteins, '(', 'IAPs),', abrogating, caspase, inhibition])].
[sujeto(['We', used, the, ubiquitin, fusion, model, to]), verbo([express]), complemento([mature, 'Smac', in, the, cytosol])].
[sujeto(['Transiently']), verbo([expressed]), complemento([mature, 'Smac56-239', '(', called, 'Smac56)', and, 'Smac60-239', '(', called, 'Smac60),', which, lacks, the, 'IBM,', interacted, with, 'X-linked', inhibitor, of, apoptosis, protein, '(', 'XIAP)'])].
[sujeto(['However,', stable, expression, produced, wild, type, 'Smac56', that, failed, to, 'homodimerize,']), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'XIAP,', and, potentiate, caspase, activation])].
[sujeto(['Cytosolic', 'Smac60']), verbo([retained]), complemento([these, functions])].
[sujeto(['Cytosolic', 'Smacδ,', which]), verbo([has]), complemento([the, 'IBM', but, lacks, amino, acids, 62, -, 105, ',', homodimerized, and, weakly, interacted, with, 'XIAP,', but, failed, to, potentiate, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'IBM', of, 'Smac', is, a, recognition, point, for, a, posttranslational, 'modification(s)', that, blocks, homodimerization, and, 'IAP', 'interaction,', and, that, amino, acids, 62, -, 105, are, required, for, the, proapoptotic, function, of, 'Smac'])].
[sujeto(['This', anticancer, property, is, linked, to, its, ability, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([apoptotic, cell, death, in, cancer, cells, by, triggering, the, mitochondrial, pathway, of, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Compounds', that, exert, a, direct, action, on, mitochondria, present, promising, experimental, cancer, 'therapeutics,', since, they, may]), verbo([trigger]), complemento([cell, death, under, circumstances, in, which, standard, chemotherapeutics, fail])].
[sujeto(['The', antitumor, efficacy, of, formosanin, 'C']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, observed, in, cultured, cells, and, animal, systems])].
[sujeto(['The', results, of, the, present, study, indicate, that, formosanin, 'C']), verbo([induced]), complemento([apoptosis, of, 'HT-29', cells, characterized, by, exposure, of, 'phosphatidylserine,', accumulation, of, cells, at, the, 'sub-G(1)', 'phase,', fragmentation, of, 'DNA,', and, change, of, nuclear, morphology, in, a, 'time-', and, 'dose-related', manner])].
[sujeto(['The', apoptotic, signaling, cascades, may, proceed, via, proteolytic, activation, of, 'caspase-2,', change, of, mitochondrial, membrane, potential, '(', 'Deltapsi(m)),']), verbo([release]), complemento([of, cytochrome, c, and, second, 'mitochondria-derived', activator, of, 'caspase/direct', 'IAP', binding, protein, with, low, pI, '(', 'Smac/DIABLO),', activation, of, 'caspase-9', and, -, 3, ',', and, cleavage, of, 'poly(ADP-ribose)', polymerase, '(', 'PARP)'])].
[sujeto(['Increase', in, 'apoptosis-inducing', factor, and, endonuclease, 'G', expressions, in, 'nuclei,', and]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'Bax', and, 'Bak', expressions, and, decrease, in, 'Bcl-X(L)', expression, on, mitochondria, were, also, observed, in, formosanin, 'C-treated', 'HT-29', cells])].
[sujeto(['Attenuation', of, formosanin, 'C-induced', change, of, 'Deltapsi(m)', by, 'caspase-2', inhibitor, '(', 'Z-VDVAC)', implies, that, 'caspase-2']), verbo([acts]), complemento([upstream, of, the, mitochondria])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', the, apoptotic, mechanism, of, formosanin, 'C', in, human, colorectal, cancer, 'HT-29', cells]), verbo([involves]), complemento([activation, of, 'caspase-2', and, the, dysfunction, of, mitochondria])].
[sujeto(['X-linked', inhibitor, of, apoptosis, '(', 'XIAP)', is, the, most, potent, member, of, the, inhibitor, of, apoptosis, protein, '(', 'IAP)', 'family,', which, directly]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([apoptosis, by, binding, to, caspases])].
[sujeto(['Antagonists', of, 'XIAP']), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, been, 'identified:', second, 'mitochondria-derived', activator, of, 'caspase/direct', 'IAP-binding', protein, with, low, 'PI', '(', 'Smac/DIABLO)', and, 'XIAP-associated', factor, 1, '(', 'XAF1)'])].
[sujeto(['However,', little, research]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, conducted, on, the, association, between, gastric, cancer, survival, and, the, mechanism, of, apoptosis, involving, 'XIAP', and, its, 'antagonists,', 'Smac/DIABLO', and, 'XAF1'])].
[sujeto(['Transient', forebrain, or, global, ischemia]), verbo([induces]), complemento([delayed, neuronal, death, in, vulnerable, 'CA1', pyramidal, cells, with, many, features, of, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, preconditioning]), verbo([acts]), complemento([via, 'PI3K/Akt', signaling, to, block, the, 'ischemia-induced', cascade, involving, mitochondrial, translocation, of, 'Bad,', assembly, of, 'Bad', with, 'Bcl-x(L),', cleavage, of, 'Bcl-x(L)', to, form, its, prodeath, 'fragment,', 'DeltaN-Bcl-x(L),', activation, of, 'large-conductance', channels, in, the, mitochondrial, outer, 'membrane,', mitochondrial, release, of, cytochrome, c, and, 'Smac/DIABLO', '(', second, 'mitochondria-derived', activator, of, 'caspases/direct', 'IAP-binding', protein, with, low, 'pI),', caspase, 'activation,', and, neuronal, death])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, show, how, preconditioning]), verbo([acts]), complemento([to, prevent, the, release, of, cytochrome, c, and, 'Smac/DIABLO', from, mitochondria, and, to, preserve, the, integrity, of, the, mitochondrial, membrane])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, identification, and, characterization, of, the, 'Drosophila', ortholog, of, human, 'Omi/HtrA2'])].
[sujeto(['DIAP1', was, able, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, both, isoforms, via, its, 'BIR1', and, 'BIR2', domains])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'DIAP1', to, dOmi, also, resulted, in, 'DIAP1-mediated', polyubiquitination, of, 'dOmi,', suggesting, that, 'DIAP1', could, target, dOmi, for, proteasomal, degradation])].
[sujeto(['The', ability, of, 'IAPs', to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, and, ubiquitinate, mitochondrial, proteins, such, as, dOmi, may, be, a, key, conserved, function, to, counterbalance, the, lethal, effects, of, these, proteins, if, accidentally, released, into, the, cytosol])].
[sujeto(['Cerebral', 'ischemia/reperfusion', '(', 'I/R)', injury]), verbo([triggers]), complemento([multiple, and, distinct, but, overlapping, cell, signaling, 'pathways,', which, may, lead, to, cell, survival, or, cell, damage])].
[sujeto(['There', is, overwhelming, evidence, to]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, besides, 'necrosis,', apoptosis, do, contributes, significantly, to, the, cell, death, subsequent, to, 'I/R', injury])].
[sujeto(['Both', extrinsic, and, intrinsic, apoptotic, pathways, play, a, vital, 'role,', and, upon, 'initiation,', these, pathways]), verbo([recruit]), complemento([downstream, apoptotic, molecules, to, execute, cell, death])].
[sujeto(['Caspases', and, 'Bcl-2', family, members, appear, to, be, crucial, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([multiple, apoptotic, cell, death, pathways, initiated, during, 'I/R'])].
[sujeto(['Similarly,', inhibitor, of, apoptosis, family, of, proteins, '(', 'IAPs),', 'mitogen-activated', protein, 'kinases,', and, newly, identified, apoptogenic, 'molecules,', like, second, 'mitochondrial-activated', 'factor/direct', 'IAP-binding', protein, with, low, pI, '(', 'Smac/Diablo),', 'omi/high-temperature', requirement, serine, protease, 'A2', '(', 'Omi/HtrA2),', 'X-linked', mammalian, inhibitor, of, apoptosis, 'protein-associated', factor, 1, ',', and, 'apoptosis-inducing', 'factor,']), verbo([have]), complemento([emerged, as, potent, regulators, of, cellular, 'apoptotic/antiapoptotic', machinery])].
[sujeto(['All', instances, of, cell, 'survival/death', mechanisms]), verbo([triggered]), complemento([during, 'I/R', are, multifaceted, and, 'interlinked,', which, ultimately, decide, the, fate, of, brain, cells])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', apoptotic, 'cross-talk', between, major, subcellular, organelles]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, therapeutic, strategies, should, be, optimally, directed, at, multiple, 'targets/mechanisms', for, better, therapeutic, outcome])].
[sujeto(['Based', on, the, current, 'knowledge,', this, review, briefly, focuses, 'I/R', 'injury-induced', multiple, mechanisms, of, 'apoptosis,']), verbo([involving]), complemento([key, apoptotic, regulators, and, their, emerging, roles, in, orchestrating, cell, death, programme])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([also, highlighted, the, role, of, autophagy, in, modulating, cell, 'survival/death', during, cerebral, ischemia])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', an, attempt]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, made, to, provide, an, encouraging, outlook, on, emerging, therapeutic, approaches, for, cerebral, ischemia])].

[sujeto(['At', 'first,', it, was, supposed, that, survivin, functions, only, as, a, 'homodimer,', but, now, data, indicate, that, many, processes]), verbo([require]), complemento([monomeric, survivin])].

[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, survivin, partly, performs, its, functions, as, a, monomer, and, partly, as, a, dimer])].
[sujeto(['However,', little, is, known, about, whether, and, under, what, conditions, heat, treatment, exerts, tumor, inhibition, effects, on, cervical, 'cancer,', and, the, molecular, mechanisms, behind, these, cellular, responses]), verbo([have]), complemento([yet, to, be, elucidated])].

[sujeto(['Insulin-like', growth, factor, 1, '(', 'IGF-1)']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([5, -, fluorouracil, '(', 5, -, 'Fu)-induced', apoptosis, in, esophageal, carcinoma, 'cells;', 'however,', the, mechanisms, for, 'IGF-1-induced', 5, -, 'Fu', chemoresistance, remain, unknown])].

[sujeto(['Our', results, strongly]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'IGF-1', inhibits, 5, -, 'Fu', induced, apoptosis, through, increasing, survivin, 'levels,', which, prevents, 'Smac/DIABLO', release, and, blocks, the, activation, of, caspases])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['full-length', human, 'Survivin', '(', 'SurF)', and, a, series, of, its, 'mutants,', 'SurΔN7,', 'SurΔN13,', and, 'SurΔN18', with, significant, truncations, of, the, 'N-terminus,', all, of, which, could, still, dimerize, in, solution])].
[sujeto(['Meanwhile,', the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'SurΔN7', to, 'Smac/DIABLO', determined, by, 'ELISA', was, as, efficient, as, the, 'wild-type,', but, that, of, 'SurΔN13', was, significantly, 'reduced,', and, that, of, 'SurΔN18', was, completely, lost])].
[sujeto(['Together,', these, findings]), verbo([provide]), complemento([direct, evidence, that, the, 'N-terminal', sequence, of, 'Survivin', is, not, critical, for, dimer, formation, but, may, contribute, to, correct, folding, and, function, of, 'BIR'])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([expression, rates, of, survivin, in, 'benign,', borderline, and, malignant, ovarian, mucinous, tumors, were, 1, /, 20, ',', 6, /, 15, and, 5, /, 20, ',', 'respectively,', which, presents, a])].
[sujeto(['Mitochondria-mediated', apoptosis, plays, a, central, role, in, animal, development, and, tissue, 'homeostasis,', and, mitochondria, contain, several, 'pro-apoptotic', proteins, that]), verbo([have]), complemento([key, roles, in, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Smac/DIABLO', was, identified, as, a, mitochondrial, protein, that, is]), verbo([released]), complemento([into, the, cytosol, following, apoptotic, 'stimuli,', subsequently, blocking, the, 'anti-apoptotic', activity, of, inhibitor, of, apoptosis, proteins])].
[sujeto(['Through']), verbo([expressed]), complemento([sequence, tag, '(', 'EST)', analysis, we, detected, evidence, for, the, presence, of, a, number, of, 'Xenopus', counterparts, to, mammalian, mitochondrial, 'pro-apoptotic', proteins])].
[sujeto(['EST', and, genome, sequencing]), verbo([provides]), complemento([evidence, for, the, presence, of, endonuclease, 'G,', 'AIF,', 'HtrA/Omi', and, 'Smac/DIABLO', in, 'Xenopus', laevis, and, tropicalis])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, cloning, and, characterization, of, 'X'])].
[sujeto(['In', this, study, degenerate, primers, based, on]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([regions, of, 'human,', mouse, and, an, 'EST', predicted, 'Smac', from, 'X'])].
[sujeto(['The', full, length, cDNA, of, 'Xenopus', 'Smac', contained, a, complete, open, reading, frame, of, 732, 'bp,', encoding, 244, amino, 'acids,', that, when]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([is, observed, to, be, approximately, 27, kDa, in, size])].
[sujeto(['The', protein, sequence, is, 49, '%', identical, and, 71, '%', similar, to, human, 'Smac,', and, includes, the, motifs]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, mitochondrial, 'targeting,', and, 'IAP-binding', '(', 'AIPV)'])].
[sujeto(['Smac', expression, was, detected, throughout, early, development, with, multiple, transcripts, being, detected, by, 'Northern', blot, 'analysis,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([the, presence, of, alternatively, spliced, isoforms])].
[sujeto(['Exogenous', expression, of, 'Xenopus', 'Smac']), verbo([enhances]), complemento(['gamma-irradiation-induced', apoptosis, in, 'HeLa', 'cells,', demonstrating, its, functional, equivalence, with, mammalian, forms])].
[sujeto(['Our', study]), verbo([has]), complemento([identified, the, third, vertebrate, homologue, of, 'Smac/DIABLO,', with, its, structural, and, functional, similarities, to, mammalian, 'Smac/DIABLO', further, illustrating, the, evolutionary, conservation, of, apoptotic, pathways, across, vertebrate, species])].
[sujeto(['Direct', 'IAP']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, with, low, 'pI/second', mitochondrial, activator, of, 'caspases,', 'HtrA2/Omi', and, 'GstPT/eRF3', are, mammalian, proteins, that, bind, via, 'N-terminal', inhibitor, of, apoptosis, protein, '(', 'IAP)', binding, motifs, '(', 'IBMs)', to, the, baculoviral, 'IAP', repeat, '(', 'BIR)', domains, of, 'IAPs'])].
[sujeto(['These', interactions, can]), verbo([prevent]), complemento(['IAPs', from, inhibiting, 'caspases,', or, displace, active, 'caspases,', thereby, promoting, cell, death])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, several, additional, potential, 'IAP', 'antagonists,', including, glutamate, dehydrogenase, '(', 'GdH),', 'Nipsnap', 3, and, 4, ',', 'CLPX,', 'leucine-rich', pentatricopeptide, repeat, 'motif-containing', protein, and, 3, -, hydroxyisobutyrate, dehydrogenase])].
[sujeto(['Whereas', most, of, these, proteins]), verbo([have]), complemento([alanine, at, the, 'N-terminal', 'position,', as, observed, for, previously, described, 'antagonists,', 'GdH', has, an, 'N-terminal', serine, residue, that, is, essential, for, 'X-linked', 'IAP', '(', 'XIAP)', interaction])].
[sujeto(['These', newly, described, 'IAP']), verbo([binding]), complemento([proteins, interact, with, 'XIAP', mainly, via, 'BIR2,', with, binding, eliminated, or, significantly, reduced, by, a, single, point, mutation, '(', 'D214S)', within, this, domain])].
[sujeto(['The', 'anti-apoptotic', proteins, 'Bcl-w', and, 'Bcl-2', and, the, 'pro-apoptotic', protein, 'Bax', may]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([cell, death, or, survival, via, regulation, of, the, mitochondria, including, second, 'mitochondria-derived', activator, of, caspase, '(', 'Smac)/direct', inhibitor, of, apoptosis, protein, '(', 'IAP)-binding', protein, with, low, pI, '(', 'DIABLO)', release])].
[sujeto(['At', 4, h, after, 'low-intensity', 'irradiation,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([widespread, 'bcl-w', overexpression, on, both, the, mRNA, and, protein, levels, in, the, bilateral, cortex, except, the, ring, lesion, region, and, in, subcortical, regions])].
[sujeto(['These', upregulated, 'anti-apoptotic', proteins, combined, with, little, 'Smac/DIABLO']), verbo([release]), complemento([might, be, associated, with, increased, cell, survival, and, thereby, remarkable, morphological, recovery, after, 'low-intensity', irradiation])].
[sujeto(['After', 'high-intensity', 'irradiation,', we, observed]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['bcl-w', and, 'bcl-2', mRNA, with, increased, 'Bcl-2', protein, in, the, cytosolic, 'fraction,', whereas, the, 'Bax', protein, remained, in, scattered, ischaemic, cells, in, the, ring, lesion, and, the, region, at, risk, that, corresponded, with, release, of, 'Smac/DIABLO', from, mitochondria, to, the, cytosol, at, 1, -, 24, h])].
[sujeto(['TRAIL']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, interact, with, the, cell, surface, through, five, distinct, 'receptors,', named, death, receptor, '(', 'DR)', 4, ',', 'DR5,', decoy, receptor, '(', 'Dc)R1,', 'DcR2,', and, osteoprotegrin])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([activates]), complemento([nuclear, factor, '(', 'NF)-kappaB,', 'c-Jun', 'N-terminal', 'kinases,', and, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['The', apoptotic, signals, are]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([through, 'Fas-associated', death, domain, protein, '(', 'FADD)-mediated', recruitment, of, 'caspase-8', and, 'caspase-3'])].
[sujeto(['Additionally,', 'caspase-8', can, cleave, 'Bcl-2', homology, domain, 3, '(', 'BH3)-interfering', domain, death, agonist, '(', 'Bid),', and, the, cleaved, 'Bid', then]), verbo([causes]), complemento([the, release, of, mitochondrial, cytochrome, 'c,', leading, to, the, activation, of, 'pro-caspase-9,', which, can, then, activate, 'pro-caspase-3'])].
[sujeto(['TRAIL-induced', apoptosis, is, negatively]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, numerous, cellular, factors, including, decoy, 'receptors,', cellular, 'FADD-like', interleukin, 1, 'beta-converting', enzyme, '(', 'FLICE)', interacting, protein, '(', 'cFLIP),', cellular, inhibitor, of, apoptosis, protein, '(', 'cIAP),', 'X-linked', 'IAP', '(', 'XIAP),', 'survivin,', and, 'NF-kappaB'])].
[sujeto(['Second', 'mitochondria-derived', activator, of, caspases, '(', 'Smac)?direct', 'IAP']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, with, low, pI, '(', 'DIABLO)', mediates, proapoptotic, signals, through, inaction, of, 'IAP'])].
[sujeto(['XIAP', is, structurally, characterized, by, three, baculovirus, 'IAP', repeat, '(', 'BIR)', domains, that]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([binding, to, and, inhibition, of, caspases, and, a, 'RING', domain, that, confers, ubiquitin, ligase, activity])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, identification, and, characterization, of, a, novel, isoform, of, 'Smac/DIABLO', named, 'Smac3,', which, is, generated, by, alternative, splicing, of, exon, 4])].
[sujeto(['Smac3', contains, an, 'NH2-terminal', mitochondrial]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([sequence, required, for, mitochondrial, targeting, of, 'Smac3', and, an, 'IAP-binding', motif, essential, for, 'Smac3', binding, to, 'XIAP'])].
[sujeto(['Smac3', is]), verbo([released]), complemento([from, mitochondria, into, the, cytosol, in, response, to, apoptotic, 'stimuli,', where, it, interacts, with, the, second, and, third, 'BIR', domains, of, 'XIAP'])].
[sujeto(['Smac3', disrupts, processed, 'caspase-9']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'XIAP,', promotes, 'caspase-3', 'activation,', and, potentiates, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Smac3-accelerated', 'XIAP', destabilization, 'is,', at, least, in, 'part,', attributed, to, its, ability, to]), verbo([enhance]), complemento(['XIAP', ubiquitination])].
[sujeto(['Tumour', necrosis, 'factor-related', 'apoptosis-inducing', ligand, '(', 'TRAIL)']), verbo([has]), complemento([attracted, much, attention, because, of, its, ability, to, kill, tumour, cells])].
[sujeto(['In', dissecting, the, mechanism, underlying, this, synergistic, 'effect,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, treatment, with, etoposide, alone, resulted, in, the, upregulation, of, 'Bax,', while, the, level, of, truncated, 'Bid', '(', 'tBid)', was, unchanged])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', while, treatment, with, 'TRAIL', alone, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, level, of, 'tBid,', the, expression, of, 'Bax', remained, unaffected])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([apoptosis, was, accompanied, by, an, increased, release, of, cytochrome, c, and, second, 'mitochondria-derived', activator, of, 'caspase/direct', 'IAP', binding, protein, with, low, pI, '(', 'DIABLO)', from, 'mitochondria,', leading, to, the, activation, of, cellular, 'caspase-8,', -, 9, ',', -, 3, and, -, 7, ',', as, well, as, poly, 'ADP-ribose', polymerase])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([release, of, cytochrome, c, and, second, 'mitochondria-derived', activator, of, 'caspase/DIABLO', was, inhibited, by, the, general, caspase, inhibitor, 'N-benzyloxycarbonyl-Val-Ala-Asp-fluoromethylketone'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'RT-PCR', and, 'Western', blotting, results, demonstrated, that, the, levels, of, both, mRNA, and, protein, for, death, 'receptor-4,', death, 'receptor-5', and, decoy, 'receptor-2', remained, unchanged, in, response, to, 'etoposide,', indicating, that, the, synergistic, effect, of, 'TRAIL', and, etoposide, is, not, a, result, of]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([the, expression, for, 'TRAIL', 'receptors,', but, rather, is, associated, with, amplification, of, the, mitochondrial, signal, pathway])].
[sujeto(['(', 1, ')', 'Bisphenol', 'A', diglycidyl, ether, '(', 'BADGE)', is, a, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', 'receptor-gamma', '(', 'PPAR-gamma)', 'antagonist,', which, is, able, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([apoptosis, in, tumor, cells, independently, of, 'PPAR-gamma', in, 'caspase-dependent', and, -, independent, manners])].
[sujeto(['Additionally,', 'BADGE']), verbo([promotes]), complemento(['TRAIL-induced', apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['(', 2, ')', 'We']), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'BADGE', activates, via, 'Bax', and, 'caspases-2', and, -, 8, both, the, intrinsic, and, extrinsic, apoptotic, pathways, using, 'Bid', as, a, shunt])].
[sujeto(['(', 3, ')', 'BADGE']), verbo([stimulates]), complemento([the, mitochondrial, release, of, 'apoptosis-inducing', factor, '(', 'AIF),', cytochrome, c, and, second, 'mitochondria-derived', activator, of, 'caspase/direct', 'IAP-binding', protein, with, low, pl, '(', 'Smac/DIABLO)'])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([release]), complemento([of, cytochrome, c, could, not, be, blocked, by, inhibitors, of, 'caspases-3,', -, 8, and, -, 9, indicating, that, 'BADGE', acts, upstream, of, 'caspases-3', and, -, 9, and, does, not, involve, 'caspase-8', to, release, cytochrome, c])].
[sujeto(['(', 4, ')', 'While', the, 'caspase-independent', apoptotic, effect, might, be]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'AIF,', the, sensitizing, effect, of, 'BADGE', against, other, apoptotic, substances, is, most, likely, mediated, by, the, 'X-linked', inhibitor, of, apoptosis, inhibitor, 'Smac/DIABLO'])].
[sujeto(['(', 5, ')', 'Our', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'BADGE', or, 'BADGE', derivatives, could, represent, promising, substances, for, the, treatment, of, neoplasms, improving, the, antitumoral, activity, of, 'TRAIL'])].
[sujeto(['Recent', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, activation, of, the, extrinsic, and, intrinsic, pathways, of, 'caspase-mediated', cell, 'death,', as, well, as, activation, of, the, 'caspase-independent', signaling, pathway, of, apoptosis, in, several, paradigms, of, focal, cerebral, ischemia, by, transient, 'MCAO', to, adult, rats, and, mice])].
[sujeto(['The', extrinsic, pathway, '(', 'cell-death', receptor, 'pathway)', is, initiated, by, activation, of, the, 'Fas', receptor, after]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, the, 'Fas', ligand, '(', 'Fas-L);', increased, 'Fas', and, 'Fas-L', expression, has, been, shown, following, focal, ischemia])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', focal, ischemia, is, greatly, reduced, in, mice]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([mutated, '(', 'nonfunctional)', 'Fas'])].
[sujeto(['Increased', expression, of, 'caspase-1,', -, 3, ',', -, 8, ',', and, -, 9, ',', and, of, cleaved, 'caspase-8,']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, observed, in, the, penumbra])].
[sujeto(['Activation', of, the, intrinsic, '(', 'mitochondrial)', pathway, following, focal, ischemia, is]), verbo([triggered]), complemento([by, 'Bax', translocation, to, and, competition, with, 'Bcl-2', and, other, members, of, the, 'Bcl-2', family, in, the, mitochondria, membrane, that, is, followed, by, cytochrome, c, release, to, the, cytosol])].
[sujeto(['Cytochrome', c]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, 'Apaf-1', and, dATP, and, recruits, and, cleaves, 'pro-caspase-9', in, the, apoptosome])].
[sujeto(['Both', 'caspase-8', and, 'caspase-9']), verbo([activate]), complemento(['caspase-3,', among, other, 'caspases,', which, in, turn, cleave, several, crucial, 'substrates,', including, the, 'DNA-repairing', enzyme, 'poly(ADP-ribose)', polymerase, '(', 'PARP),', into, fragments, of, 89, and, 28, kDa])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'caspase-8', cleaves, 'Bid,', the, truncated, form, of, which]), verbo([has]), complemento([the, capacity, to, translocate, to, the, mitochondria, and, induce, cytochrome, c, release])].
[sujeto(['Recent', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, the, mitochondrial, release, of, other, 'factors;', 'Smac/DIABLO', '(', 'Smac:', second, mitochondrial, activator, of, 'caspases:', 'DIABLO:', direct, 'IAP', binding, protein, with, low, 'pI)', binds, to, and, neutralizes, the, effects, of, the, 'X-linked', inhibitor, of, apoptosis, '(', 'XIAP)'])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', 'apoptosis-inducing', factor, '(', 'AIF)', translocates, to, the, mitochondria, and, the, nucleus, following, focal, ischemia, and, produces, peripheral, chromatin, condensation, and, 'large-scale', 'DNA', 'strands,', thus]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, the, 'caspase-independent', cell, death, pathway, of, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Delineation', of, the, 'pro-apoptotic', and, 'pro-survival', signals, in, the, penumbra, may, not, only]), verbo([increase]), complemento([understanding, of, the, process, but, also, help, to, rationalize, strategies, geared, to, reducing, brain, damage, targeted, at, the, periphery, of, the, infarct, core])].
[sujeto(['The', impact, of, disruption, of, the, 'PI3K', '(', phosphatidylinositol, 3, -, 'kinase)', pathway, on, the, response, of, human, leukemia, cells, to, pharmacological, 'cyclin-dependent', kinase, '(', 'CDK)', inhibitors]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, examined])].
[sujeto(['Exposure', of, 'U937', monocytic, leukemia, cells, to, minimally, toxic, concentrations, of, flavopiridol, '(', 'FP),', 'roscovitine,', or, 'CGP74514A', for, 3, h, in, conjunction, with, the, 'PI3K', inhibitor, 'LY294002', '(', abbreviated, 'LY', in, the, 'article)', resulted, in, a, marked]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, 'Akt', phosphorylation])].
[sujeto([',', within, 3, 'h)', and, striking]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, mitochondrial, damage, '[', e])].
[sujeto(['Apoptosis,']), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'FP/LY,', was, substantially, blocked, by, ectopic, expression, of, 'Bcl-2,', but, to, a, considerably, lesser, extent, by, 'dominant-negative', 'caspase-8'])].
[sujeto(['FP-induced', apoptosis, was, not]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([by, agents, that, inhibited, protein, kinase, '(', 'PK)', 'A', '(', 'H89),', 'PKC', '(', 'GFX),', 'mitogen-activated', protein, '(', 'MAP)/extracellular', 'signal-regulated', kinase, '(', 'ERK)', kinase, '(', 'MEK1/2;', 'U0126),', p38, 'MAP', kinase, '(', 'MAPK;', 'SB202190),', 'm-target', of, rapamycin, '(', 'TOR;', 'rapamycin),', or, 'ataxia-telangiectasia', mutation, '(', 'ATM;', 'caffeine),', whereas, the, 'PI3K', inhibitor, wortmannin, exerted, effects, similar, to, those, of, 'LY'])].
[sujeto(['Cells', exposed, to, 'CDK', inhibitors, +, 'LY', also, exhibited, reduced, phosphorylation, of, glycogen, synthase, kinase, '(', 'GSK)-3,', forkhead, transcription, factor, '(', 'FKHR),', 'p70(S6K),', and, 'ERK,', but]), verbo([increased]), complemento([activation, of, 'p34(cdc2)', and, p38, 'MAPK'])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', cotreatment, with, 'LY', and, 'FP', resulted, in, a, dramatic]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, apoptosis, in, primary, leukemic, blasts, obtained, from, a, patient, with, acute, myeloblastic, leukemia])].
[sujeto(['Together,', these, findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'PI3K/Akt', pathway, plays, a, major, role, in, regulating, the, apoptotic, response, of, human, leukemia, cells, to, pharmacological, 'CDK', inhibitors, and, raise, the, possibility, that, combined, interruption, of, 'CDK-', and, 'PI3K-related', pathways, may, represent, a, novel, therapeutic, strategy, in, hematological, malignancies])].
[sujeto(['These', events, were, accompanied, by]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([activation, of, 'p34(cdc2)', and, a, marked, increase, in, mitochondrial, damage, '(', loss, of, 'DeltaPsim;', cytochrome, c, and, 'Smac/DIABLO', '(', direct, 'IAP', binding, protein, with, low, 'pI)', 'release),', 'poly(ADP-ribose)', polymerase, '(', 'PARP)', 'cleavage,', and, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['In', contrast, to, 'As(2)0(3),', apoptosis]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'PD184352/UCN-01', was, not, blocked, by, the, 'free-radical', scavenger, 'N-acetyl-L-cysteine'])].
[sujeto(['Whereas', exogenous, interleukin, 6, substantially]), verbo([prevented]), complemento(['dexamethasone-induced', lethality, in, 'MM', 'cells,', it, was, unable, to, protect, them, from, 'PD184352/UCN-01-induced', apoptosis, despite, enhancing, 'Akt', activation])].
[sujeto(['Insulinlike', growth, factor, 1, '(', 'IGF-1)', also, failed, to, diminish, apoptosis]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, this, drug, regimen])].
[sujeto(['Together,', these, findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, simultaneous, disruption, of, cell, cycle, and, 'MEK/MAP', kinase, signaling, pathways, provides, a, potent, stimulus, for, mitochondrial, damage, and, apoptosis, in, 'MM', 'cells,', and, also, indicate, that, this, strategy, bypasses, the, block, to, cell, death, conferred, by, several, other, 'well-described', resistance, mechanisms])].
[sujeto(['Defects', in, apoptosis, regulation, are, one, main]), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, cancer, development, and, may, result, from, overexpression, of, 'anti-apoptotic', proteins, such, as, inhibitor, of, apoptosis, proteins, '(', 'IAPs)'])].
[sujeto(['IAPs', are, cell, death, regulators, 'that,', among, other, 'functions,']), verbo([bind]), complemento(['caspases,', and, interfere, with, apoptotic, signaling, via, death, receptors, or, intrinsic, cell, death, pathways])].
[sujeto(['All', 'IAPs', share, one, to, three, common, 'structures,', the, so, called, 'baculovirus-IAP-repeat', '(', 'BIR)-domains', that, allow, them, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([caspases, and, other, proteins])].
[sujeto(['A', natural, inhibitor, of, 'XIAP', is, 'SMAC/Diablo,', which, is]), verbo([released]), complemento([from, mitochondria, in, apoptotic, cells, and, displaces, bound, caspases, from, the, 'BIR2/BIR3', domains, of, 'XIAP', thereby, reactivating, cell, death, execution])].
[sujeto(['The', central, 'apoptosis-inhibitory', function, of, 'XIAP', and, its, overexpression, in, many, different, types, of, advanced, cancers]), verbo([have]), complemento([led, to, significant, efforts, to, identify, therapeutics, that, neutralize, its, 'anti-apoptotic', effect])].
[sujeto(['These', &, 'quot;SMAC-mimetics&quot;', either, specifically]), verbo([induce]), complemento([apoptosis, in, cancer, cells, or, act, as, 'drug-sensitizers'])].
[sujeto(['Identification', of, therapeutic, strategies, that, might]), verbo([enhance]), complemento([the, efficacy, of, 'B-cell', 'lymphoma-2', '(', 'Bcl-2)', inhibitor, 'ABT-737', '[', 'N-{4-[4-(4-chloro-biphenyl-2-ylmethyl)-piperazin-1-yl]-benzoyl}-4-(3-dimethylamino-1-phenylsulfanylmethyl-propylamino)-3-nitro-benzenesulfonamide]', is, of, great, interest, in, many, 'cancers,', including, glioma])].
[sujeto(['Our', recent, study]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, 'Akt', is, a, crucial, mediator, of, apoptosis, sensitivity, in, response, to, 'ABT-737', in, glioma, cell, lines])].
[sujeto(['Because', 'PI3K/Akt', inhibition, would, be, expected, to]), verbo([have]), complemento([many, proapoptotic, 'effects,', we, hypothesized, that, there, may, be, unique, synergy, between, 'PI3K', inhibitors, and, 'Bcl-2', homology, 3, mimetics])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, combined, treatment, with, these, agents, led, to, a, significant, activation, of, 'caspase-8', and, -, 3, ',', 'PARP,', and, cell, 'death,', irrespective, of, 'PTEN', status])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([lethality, observed, with, this, combination, also, appears, dependent, on, the, loss, of, mitochondrial, membrane, potential, and, release, of, cytochrome, 'c,', 'smac/DIABLO,', and, 'apoptosis-inducing', factor, to, the, cytosol])].
[sujeto(['Further', study, revealed, that, the, upregulation, of, 'Noxa,', truncation, of, 'Bid,', and, activation, of, 'Bax', and, 'Bak']), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, these, inhibitors, were, the, key, factors, for, the, synergy])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we, demonstrated, the]), verbo([release]), complemento([of, proapoptotic, proteins, 'Bim', and, 'Bak', from, 'Mcl-1'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([defects, in, chromosome, segregation, leading, to, multinuclear, cells, and, loss, of, 'colony-forming', 'ability,', suggesting, the, potential, use, of, 'NVP-BKM120', as, a, promising, agent, to, improve, the, anticancer, activities, of, 'ABT-737'])].
[sujeto(['The', activity, of, the, 'IAPs', is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, endogenous, 'IAP', antagonists, such, as, 'SMAC', '(', also, termed, 'DIABLO)'])].
[sujeto(['Antagonism', of, 'IAP', proteins, by, 'SMAC', occurs, via]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, the, 'N-terminal', tetrapeptide, '(', 'AVPI)', of, 'SMAC', to, selected, 'BIR', domains, of, the, 'IAPs'])].
[sujeto(['Small', molecule, compounds, that, mimic, the, 'AVPI', motif, of, 'SMAC']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, designed, to, overcome, 'IAP-mediated', apoptosis, resistance, of, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, preclinical, characterization, of, birinapant, '(', 'TL32711),', a, bivalent, 'SMAC-mimetic', compound, currently, in, clinical, trials, for, the, treatment, of, cancer])].
[sujeto(['Birinapant']), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, the, 'BIR3', domains, of, 'cIAP1,', 'cIAP2,', 'XIAP,', and, the, 'BIR', domain, of, 'ML-IAP', in, vitro, and, induced, the, autoubiquitylation, and, proteasomal, degradation, of, cIAP1, and, cIAP2, in, intact, 'cells,', which, resulted, in, formation, of, a, 'RIPK1:caspase-8', 'complex,', 'caspase-8', 'activation,', and, induction, of, tumor, cell, death])].
[sujeto(['Birinapant', preferentially]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([the, 'TRAF2-associated', cIAP1, and, cIAP2, with, subsequent, inhibition, of, 'TNF-induced', 'NF-κB', activation])].
[sujeto(['Tumor', growth, in, multiple, primary, 'patient-derived', xenotransplant, models, was]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, birinapant, at, 'well-tolerated', doses])].
[sujeto(['These', results, support, the, therapeutic, combination, of, birinapant, with, multiple, 'chemotherapies,', in, 'particular,', those, therapies, that, can]), verbo([induce]), complemento(['TNF', secretion])].
[sujeto(['Numerous', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([demonstrated, that, neuronal, cell, death, occurs, via, extrinsic, '(', death, 'receptors)', and, intrinsic, '(', 'mitochondria)', pathways])].
[sujeto(['Radiation']), verbo([induces]), complemento([caspase, activation, fundamentally, via, the, mitochondrial, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Terminal', deoxynucleotidyl, transferase, dUTP, nick, 'end-labeling', '(', 'TUNEL)', demonstrated, that, 'z-VAD-fmk', reduced, the, numbers, of, 'TUNEL-positive', cells, within, the, hypoglossal, 'nucleus,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, intervention, in, the, caspase, cascade, following, radiation, may, have, therapeutic, applications])].
[sujeto(['The', caspase, inhibitor, 'z-VAD-fmk', reduced, the, expression, and, activation, of, 'caspase-3,', 'caspase-8', and, 'caspase-9', in, the, irradiated, 'rats,', indicating, that, caspase, may, be, a, potential, therapeutic]), verbo([target]), complemento([in, the, treatment, of, brain, radiation, injury])].
[sujeto(['The', hypoglossal, nucleus, may, be, used, as, a, model, of, 'radiation-induced', injury, in, the, central, nervous, 'system,']), verbo([providing]), complemento([visual, information, and, displaying, apoptotic, nuclear, morphology])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, outcome]), verbo([has]), complemento([not, improved, significantly, due, to, radioresistance, of, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['LCL161']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['radiation-induced', 'DNA', 'double-stranded', breaks, and, promoted, the, apoptosis, of, 'ESCC', 'cells,', which, could, be, abrogated, by, a, 'pan-caspase', inhibitor, 'z-VAD-FMK'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'LCL161']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, level, of, cIAP1, in, 'ESCC', cells, in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner, and, synthesized, with, irradiation, to, promote, the, activation, of, caspase, 8, and, the, upregulation, of, 'TNFα', expression, in, 'ESCC', cells])].
[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', 'LCL161']), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, a, strong, radiosensitizer, in, human, esophageal, cancer, cells, by, inhibiting, the, expression, of, cIAP1, and, promoting, the, activation, of, caspase, 8, ',', leading, to, enhanced, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['The', 'N-terminal', sequence, of, the, 'Smac/DIABLO', protein, is, known, to, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, binding, to, the, 'BIR3', domain, of, the, 'anti-apoptotic', proteins, 'IAPs,', antagonizing, their, action])].
[sujeto(['Short', peptides, and, peptide, mimetics, based, on, the, first, 4, -, residues, of, 'Smac/DIABLO']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, demonstrated, to, 're-sensitize', resistant, cancer, 'cells,', 'over-expressing', 'IAPs,', to, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['This', novel, approach, afforded, the, rapid, synthesis, of, the]), verbo([target]), complemento([peptide, library, with, high, flexibility, for, the, introduction, of, various, 'C-terminal', 'amide-capping', groups])].
[sujeto(['The', library, members, were, obtained, in, high, yield, '(', &, 'gt;65%)', and, purity, '(', &, 'gt;85%),', upon, nucleophilic]), verbo([release]), complemento([from, the, activated, resin, by, treatment, with, various, amine, nucleophiles])].
[sujeto(['In', vitro, 'caspase-9', activity, reconstitution, assays, of, the, peptides, in, the, presence, of, the, recombinant, 'BIR3-domain', of, human, 'XIAP', '(', 500, 'nM)', revealed, 'N-methylalanyl-tertiarybutylglycinyl-4-(R)-phenoxyprolyl-N-biphenylmethyl', carboxamide, '(', 11, 'a)', to, be, the, most, potent, 'XIAP', 'BIR3', antagonist, of, the, series, synthesized]), verbo([inducing]), complemento([93, '%', recovery, of, 'caspase-9', 'activity,', when, used, at, 1, μM, concentration])].
[sujeto(['Non-melanoma', skin, cancers, '(', 'NMSCs),', one, of, the, most, common, 'neoplasms,']), verbo([cause]), complemento([serious, morbidity, and, mortality])].
[sujeto(['Treatment', of, 'A431', cells, with, fisetin, '(', 5, -, 80, 'μm)', resulted, in, a, significant]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, cell, viability, in, a, 'dose-', and, 'time-dependent', manner])].

[sujeto(['Overall,', these, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, fisetin, could, be, developed, as, a, novel, therapeutic, agent, for, the, management, of, 'NMSCs'])].
[sujeto(['Nuclear', factor, kappa, 'B', '(', 'NF-κB)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, anesthetic, preconditioning, '(', 'APC)', induced, protection, against, anoxia, and, reoxygenation, '(', 'A/R)', injury])].
[sujeto(['The', authors, hypothesized, that, desflurane, preconditioning, would]), verbo([induce]), complemento(['NF-κB', oscillation, and, prevent, endothelial, cells, apoptosis])].

[sujeto(['And', the, oscillation, of, 'NF-κB']), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, desflurane, preconditioning, finally, 'up-regulated', antiapoptotic, proteins, expression, and, protected, endothelial, cells, against, 'A/R'])].
[sujeto(['Their']), verbo([conserved]), complemento([homologues, have, been, identified, in, various, organisms])].
[sujeto(['In', 'human,', eight, 'IAP', members]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, recognized, based, on, baculoviral, 'IAP', repeat, '(', 'BIR)', domains])].
[sujeto(['IAPs', are, functionally, 'non-equivalent', and]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([effector, caspases, through, distinct, mechanisms])].
[sujeto(['GBM', cells, are, highly, resistant, to, apoptosis]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, antitumor, drugs, and, radiotherapy, resulting, in, cancer, progression])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento(['designed,', 'synthesized,', and, evaluated, a, series, of, new, compounds, based, upon, our, previously, reported, bivalent, 'Smac', mimetics])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([led]), complemento([to, the, identification, of, compound, 12, '(', 'SM-1200),', which, binds, to, 'XIAP,', 'cIAP1,', and, cIAP2, with, 'Ki', values, of, 0.5, ',', 3.7, ',', and, 5.4, 'nM,', 'respectively,', inhibits, cell, growth, in, the, 'MDA-MB-231', breast, cancer, and, 'SK-OV-3', ovarian, cancer, cell, lines, with, 'IC50', values, of, 11.0, and, 28.2, 'nM,', respectively])].

[sujeto(['Immune', cells, play, an, important, role, in, shaping, tumor, 'microenvironments;', 'however,', there, is, limited, understanding, of, how, natural, killer, '(', 'NK)', cells, can]), verbo([enhance]), complemento([radiation, effects])].
[sujeto(['Co-culture', did, not]), verbo([induce]), complemento([apoptosis, in, tumor, 'cells,', but, a, 'time-', and, 'dose-dependent', enhancing, effect, was, found, when, 'co-cultured', cells, were, irradiated])].
[sujeto(['A', key, role, for, caspase, activation, via, 'perforin/granzyme', 'B', '(', 'Grz', 'B)', after, 'cell-cell', contact, was, 'determined,', as, the, primary, radiation]), verbo([enhancing]), complemento([effect])].
[sujeto(['The', efficacy, of, 'NK', cell, killing, was, attenuated, by, upregulation, of, 'XIAP', to]), verbo([bind]), complemento(['caspase-3', in, tumor, cells, to, escape, apoptosis])].

[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento(['NK', cells, in, tumor, microenvironment, have, direct, radiosensitization, effect, through, 'Grz', 'B', injection, while, radiation, enhances, 'NK', cytotoxicity, through, triggering, 'Smac', release])].
[sujeto(['As', inhibitor, of, apoptosis, '(', 'IAP)', proteins, can]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([additional, signaling, pathways, beyond, 'apoptosis,', we, investigated, the, effect, of, the, second, mitochondrial, activator, of, caspases, '(', 'Smac)', mimetic, 'BV6,', which, antagonizes, 'IAP', 'proteins,', on, 'non-apoptotic', functions, in, glioblastoma, '(', 'GBM)'])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, identify, 'non-canonical']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['factor-κB', '(', 'NF-κB)', signaling, and, a, tumor, necrosis, 'factor-α', '(', 'TNFα)/TNF', receptor, 1, '(', 'TNFR1)', 'autocrine/paracrine', loop, as, critical, mediators, of, 'BV6-stimulated', migration, and, invasion, of, 'GBM', cells])].
[sujeto(['In', addition, to, 'GBM', cell, 'lines,', 'BV6']), verbo([triggers]), complemento([cell, 'elongation,', migration, and, invasion, in, 'primary,', 'patient-derived', 'GBM', cells, at, 'non-toxic', 'concentrations,', which, do, not, affect, cell, viability, or, 'proliferation,', and, also, increases, infiltrative, tumor, growth, in, vivo, underscoring, the, relevance, of, these, findings])].

[sujeto(['PNAS-4,', a, novel, 'pro-apoptotic', 'gene,', was]), verbo([activated]), complemento([during, the, early, response, to, 'DNA', damage])].
[sujeto(['Previous', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, 'hPNAS-4', can, inhibit, tumor, growth, when, 'over-expressed', in, ovarian, cancer, cells])].

[sujeto(['Preoperative', measurement, of, serum, 'VEGF,', 'survivin,', and, 'Smac/DIABLO', may, be, of, help, in, early, detection, of, serous, ovarian, cancer, and, may]), verbo([provide]), complemento([important, information, about, the, 'patient\'s', outcome, and, prognosis])].
[sujeto(['Targeting', 'angiogenesis,', one, of, the, hallmarks, of, 'carcinogenesis,', using, 'non-toxic', phytochemicals]), verbo([has]), complemento([emerged, as, a, translational, opportunity, for, angioprevention, and, to, control, advanced, stages, of, malignancy])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, showed, that, 'B2G2', '(', 10, -, 40, 'μM)']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([growth, and, induces, death, in, both, 'HUVECs', and, 'HPMECs'])].

[sujeto(['The', inhibitor, of, apoptosis, protein, '(', 'IAP)', family]), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, an, inhibitor, of, apoptosis, pathways])].

[sujeto(['Tumor', necrosis, factor, 'α-related', 'apoptosis-inducing', ligand, '(', 'TRAIL)', is, a, promising, anticancer, agent, with, cancer, 'cell-selective', cell, death]), verbo([inducing]), complemento([effect])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([for, the, first, time, that, 'Medicarpin', '(', 'Med),', a, naturally, occurring, phytoalexin, sensitizes, myeloid, leukemia, cells, to, 'TRAIL-induced', apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Combination', of, 'Med', and, 'TRAIL']), verbo([induced]), complemento([significantly, higher, apoptosis, compared, with, that, of, the, individual, treatments, of, either, agent, alone, through, activation, of, both, the, extrinsic, and, the, intrinsic, cell, death, pathways, characterized, by, the, activation, of, caspases, 8, ',', 9, ',', 3, ',', and, 7])].
[sujeto(['Med', treatment, downregulated, antiapoptotic, proteins, '(', 'Survivin,', 'Bcl2,', 'Bcl-xL,', 'XIAP,', and, 'c-FLIP),', upregulated, 'pro-apoptotic', proteins, '(', 'Bax,', 'Cytochrome', 'C,', 'Smac/Diablo,', 'Bid,', truncated, 'Bid', '(', 'tBid),', 'p-eIF2α,', 'Bip,', and, 'CHOP', '(', 'CCAAT-enhancer']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, homologous, 'protein)),', induced, 'G2/M', 'cell-cycle', 'arrest,', and, increased, the, expression, of, the, functional, 'TRAIL', receptor, 'DR5', through, activation, of, the, 'ROS-JNK-CHOP', pathway])].
[sujeto(['Gain', and]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, function, studies, clearly, indicated, that, 'DR5', expression, was, critical, for, 'Med-induced', 'TRAIL', sensitization])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Med-induced', 'TRAIL', sensitization, did, not]), verbo([involve]), complemento([the, 'NFkB', signaling, pathway, or, redistribution, of, 'DR5', in, lipid, rafts])].
[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', our, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'Med', sensitizes, myeloid, leukemia, cells, to, 'TRAIL-induced', apoptosis, through, the, upregulation, of, 'DR5', through, activation, of, the, 'ROS-JNK-CHOP', pathway])].
[sujeto(['Doxorubicin', '(', 'DOX)', is, a, potent, antitumor, drug, that]), verbo([activates]), complemento([the, 'ubiquitin-proteasome', 'system,', but, unfortunately, it, also, activates, the, 'Nuclear', factor, kappa, 'B', '(', 'NF-кB)', pathway, leading, to, the, promotion, of, tumor, cell, survival])].
[sujeto(['MG132', is, a, drug, that]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['I', kappa, 'B', degradation, by, the, 'proteasome-avoiding', activation, of, 'NF-кB'])].
[sujeto(['Likewise,', employing, both, 'drugs,', we, observed, a]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, tumor, cell, proliferation, and, important, 'caspase-3', 'activation,', as, well, as, mitochondrial, membrane, potential, loss])].

[sujeto(['Crocus', sativus, stigmas, form, rich, source, of, apocarotenoids, like, 'crocin,', picrocrocin, and, saffranal, which, besides, imparting, 'color,', flavour, and, aroma, to, saffron, spice, also]), verbo([have]), complemento([tremendous, pharmacological, properties])].

[sujeto(['Many', genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'carotenoid/apocarotenoid', pathway, were, identified, for, the, first, time, in, this, study, which, includes, 'zeta-carotene', isomerase, and, 'desaturase,', carotenoid, isomerase, and, lycopene, 'epsilon-cyclase'])].
[sujeto(['KEGG', mapping, analysis, indicated, that, pathways]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'ribosome,', carbon, and, starch, and, sucrose, metabolism, were, highly, represented])].
[sujeto(['Differential', expression, analysis, indicated, that, key, 'carotenoid/apocarotenoid', pathway, genes, including, phytoene, 'synthase,', phytoene, desaturase, and, carotenoid, cleavage, dioxygenase, 2, are, enriched, in, stigma, thereby]), verbo([providing]), complemento([molecular, proof, for, stigma, to, be, the, site, of, apocarotenoid, biosynthesis])].
[sujeto(['This', data, would]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, rich, source, for, understanding, the, 'carotenoid/apocarotenoid', metabolism, in, 'Crocus'])].
[sujeto(['The', origin, of, 'tissue-resident', 'macrophages,', crucial, for, homeostasis, and, 'immunity,']), verbo([has]), complemento([remained, controversial, until, recently])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', we, show, that, 'GemC1/Lynkeas', and, 'Mcidas', operate, in, hierarchical, 'order,', upstream, of, 'Foxj1', and, 'c-Myb', transcription, 'factors,', known, regulators, of, ependymal, cell, 'generation,', while, 'Notch', signaling, is]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento([their, function])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'Mcidas', and, 'GemC1/Lynkeas', are, key, players, for, the, generation, of, multiciliated, ependymal, cells, of, the, adult, neurogenic, niche])].
[sujeto(['Chromodomain-helicase', 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 5, '(', 'CHD5)', is, an, important, tumor, suppressor, gene, deleted, from, 1, p36])].
[sujeto(['Treatment', of, 'SY5Y', cells, with, 13, cRA]), verbo([caused]), complemento([upregulation, of, 'CHD5', expression, in, a, 'time-', and, 'dose-dependent', manner, '(', 1, ',', 5, ',', or, 10, μM, for, 7, or, 12, 'days)', and, also, induced, neuronal, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', 13, cRA, treatment, of, 'IMR5,', 'LAN5,', or, 'SK-N-FI']), verbo([induced]), complemento([neither, 'CHD5', expression, nor, neuronal, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', 'NGF', treatment]), verbo([caused]), complemento([upregulation, of, 'CHD5', expression, and, neuronal, differentiation, in, 'SY5Y', cells, transfected, to, express, 'TrkA', '(', 'SY5Y-TrkA)', but, not, in, 'TrkA-null', parental, 'SY5Y', 'cells,', and, both, changes, were, blocked, by, a, 'pan-TRK', inhibitor])].
[sujeto(['Treatment', with, 13, cRA]), verbo([induces]), complemento([neuronal, differentiation, only, in, 'NB', cells, that, upregulate, 'CHD5'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'NGF']), verbo([induced]), complemento(['CHD5', upregulation, and, neuronal, differentiation, only, in, 'TrkA', expressing, cells])].
[sujeto(['Together,', these, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'CHD5', is, downstream, of, 'TrkA,', and, 'CHD5', expression, may, be, crucial, for, neuronal, differentiation, induced, by, either, 13, cRA, or, 'TrkA/NGF', signaling])].
[sujeto(['Great', progress]), verbo([has]), complemento([recently, been, achieved, in, the, understanding, of, the, genomic, alterations, driving, chronic, lymphocytic, leukemia, '(', 'CLL)'])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, genetic, and, functional, characterization, of, somatic, mutations, affecting, the, chromatin, remodeler, 'CHD2,', one, of, the, most, frequently, mutated, genes, in, 'CLL', '(', 5.3, '%', ')', and, in, monoclonal, 'B', lymphocytosis, '(', 'MBL,', 7, '%', ')', ',', a, 'B-cell', expansion, that, can, evolve, to, 'CLL'])].
[sujeto(['Most', of, the, mutations, affecting, 'CHD2,', identified, by, 'whole-exome', sequencing, of, 456, 'CLL', and, 43, 'MBL', 'patients,', are, either, truncating, or, affect]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([residues, in, functional, 'domains,', thus, supporting, a, putative, role, for, 'CHD2', as, a, tumor, suppressor, gene])].
[sujeto(['CHD2', mutants, show, altered]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['distribution,', and, a, chromodomain, helicase, 'DNA', binding, protein, 2, '(', 'CHD2)', mutant, affected, in, its, 'DNA-binding', domain, exhibits, defective, association, with, active, chromatin])].

[sujeto(['Eukaryotic', gene, expression, is, developmentally, 'regulated,', in, part, by, chromatin, 'remodelling,', and, its, dysregulation]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, linked, to, cancer])].
[sujeto(['CHD5', encodes, a, protein, with, chromatin, 'remodelling,', helicase, and, 'DNA-binding', motifs, that, is, preferentially]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, neural, and, testicular, tissues])].
[sujeto(['To', determine, if, 'CHD5', forms, a, similar, 'complex,', we, performed, studies, on]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([extracts, from, 'NBLS,', 'SY5Y', '(', both, with, endogenous, 'CHD5', 'expression),', 'NLF', '(', 'CHD5', 'null)', and, 'NLF', cells, stably, transfected, with, 'CHD5', cDNA, '(', 'wild-type', and, 'V5-histidine-tagged)'])].
[sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento(['CHD5', forms, a, 'NuRD', complex, similar, to, 'CHD4'])].

[sujeto(['To', delineate, the, phenotype, of, early, childhood, epileptic, encephalopathy, due, to, de, novo, mutations, of, 'CHD2,', which, encodes, the, chromodomain, helicase, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 2])].
[sujeto(['The', phenotypic, spectrum, of, 'CHD2', encephalopathy]), verbo([has]), complemento([distinctive, features, of, myoclonic, 'epilepsy,', marked, clinical, 'photosensitivity,', 'atonic-myoclonic-absence,', and, intellectual, disability, ranging, from, mild, to, severe])].
[sujeto(['Recognition', of, this, genetic, entity, will, permit, earlier, diagnosis, and, enable, the, development, of]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([therapies])].
[sujeto(['The', development, and, progression, of, melanoma]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, attributed, to, independent, or, combined, genetic, and, epigenetic, events])].
[sujeto(['There']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, remarkable, progress, in, understanding, melanoma, pathogenesis, in, terms, of, genetic, alterations])].
[sujeto(['However,', recent, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([revealed, a, complex, involvement, of, epigenetic, mechanisms, in, the, regulation, of, gene, 'expression,', including, 'methylation,', chromatin, modification, and, 'remodeling,', and, the, diverse, activities, of, 'non-coding', 'RNAs'])].
[sujeto(['The', roles, of, gene, methylation, and, miRNAs]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, relatively, well, studied, in, 'melanoma,', but, other, studies, have, shown, that, changes, in, chromatin, status, and, in, the, differential, expression, of, long, 'non-coding', 'RNAs', can, lead, to, altered, regulation, of, key, genes])].
[sujeto(['Inactivating', mutations, in, chromodomain, helicase, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 7, '(', 'CHD7)', cause, 'CHARGE', 'syndrome,', a, severe, multiorgan, system, disorder, of, which, 'Isolated', 'gonadotropin-releasing', hormone, '(', 'GnRH)', deficiency, '(', 'IGD)', is, a, minor, feature])].
[sujeto(['Recent']), verbo([reports]), complemento([have, described, predominantly, missense, 'CHD7', alleles, in, 'IGD', 'patients,', but, it, is, unclear, if, these, alleles, are, relevant, to, causality, or, overall, genetic, burden, of, 'Kallmann', syndrome, '(', 'KS)', and, normosmic, form, of, 'IGD'])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, rare, deleterious, 'CHD7', alleles, contribute, to, the, mutational, burden, of, patients, with, both, 'KS', and, normosmic, forms, of, 'IGD', in, the, absence, of, full, 'CHARGE', syndrome])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, '(', 'i)', implicate, a, unique, role, or, preferential, sensitivity, for, 'CHD7', in, the, ontogeny, of, 'GnRH', 'neurons,', '(', 'ii)', reiterate, the, emerging, genetic, complexity, of, this, family, of, 'IGD', 'disorders,', and, '(', 'iii)', demonstrate, how, the, coordinated, use, of, 'well-phenotyped', 'cohorts,', 'families,', and, functional, studies, can, inform, genetic, architecture, and]), verbo([provide]), complemento([insights, into, the, developmental, biology, of, cellular, systems])].
[sujeto(['Chromatin', consists, of, ordered, nucleosomal, arrays, that, are, controlled, by, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([adenosine, triphosphate, '(', 'ATP)-dependent', chromatin, remodeling, complexes])].
[sujeto(['One', such, 'remodeler,', chromodomain, helicase, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 1, '(', 'Chd1),', is, believed, to, play, an, integral, role, in, nucleosomal, 'organization,', as, the, loss, of, 'Chd1', is, known, to, disrupt, chromatin])].
[sujeto(['Using', 'genome-wide', 'approaches,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, loss, of, 'Chd1', significantly, disrupted, nucleosome, arrays, within, the, gene, bodies, of, highly, transcribed, genes])].
[sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'Chd1', is, physically, recruited, to, gene, 'bodies,', and, that, its, occupancy, specifically, corresponds, to, that, of, the, early, elongating, form, of, 'RNA', 'polymerase,', 'RNAPII', 'Ser', 5, -, 'P'])].
[sujeto(['Conversely,', 'RNAPII', 'Ser', 5, -, 'P', occupancy, was, affected, by, the]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'Chd1,', suggesting, that, 'Chd1', is, associated, with, early, transcription, elongation])].
[sujeto(['Surprisingly,', the, occupancy, of, 'RNAPII', 'Ser', 5, -, 'P', was, affected, by, the]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'Chd1', specifically, at, 'intron-containing', genes])].
[sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, deletion, of, the, histone, methyltransferase, for, 'H3K36', '(', 'SET2)', did, not, affect, either, 'Chd1', occupancy, or, nucleosome, organization, 'genome-wide'])].
[sujeto(['Chd1', is, specifically]), verbo([recruited]), complemento([onto, the, gene, bodies, of, highly, transcribed, genes, in, an, 'elongation-dependent', but, 'H3K36me3-independent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Chd1', 'co-localizes', with, the, early, elongating, form, of, 'RNA', 'polymerase,', and, affects, the, occupancy, of, 'RNAPII', only, at, genes, containing, 'introns,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([a, role, in, relieving, 'splicing-related', pausing, of, 'RNAPII'])].
[sujeto(['Truncating', mutations, of, chromodomain, helicase, 'DNA-binding', protein, 8, '(', 'CHD8),', and, of, many, other, genes, with, diverse, 'functions,', are, 'strong-effect', risk, factors, for, autism, spectrum, disorder, '(', 'ASD),']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([multiple, mechanisms, of, pathogenesis])].
[sujeto(['We', explored, the, transcriptional, networks, that, 'CHD8']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([in, neural, progenitor, cells, '(', 'NPCs)', by, reducing, its, expression, and, then, integrating, transcriptome, sequencing, '(', 'RNA', 'sequencing)', with, 'genome-wide', 'CHD8', binding, '(', 'ChIP', 'sequencing)'])].
[sujeto(['Suppressing', 'CHD8', to, levels, comparable, with, the]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, a, single, allele, caused, altered, expression, of, 1, ',', 756, 'genes,', 64.9, '%', of, which, were, 'up-regulated'])].
[sujeto(['CHD8', showed, widespread]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'chromatin,', with, 7, ',', 324, replicated, sites, that, marked, 5, ',', 658, genes])].

[sujeto([',', without, 'CHD8-binding', 'sites)', reflect, pathways]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, brain, 'development,', including, synapse, 'formation,', neuron, 'differentiation,', cell, 'adhesion,', and, axon, 'guidance,', whereas, 'CHD8-bound', genes, are, strongly, associated, with, chromatin, modification, and, transcriptional, regulation])].
[sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([find]), complemento([an, intriguing, enrichment, of, 'cancer-related', gene, sets, among, 'CHD8-bound', genes, '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 10, '(', -, 10, ')', ')'])].
[sujeto(['These', data, indicate, that, heterozygous, disruption, of, 'CHD8', precipitates, a, network, of, 'gene-expression', changes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, neurodevelopmental, pathways, in, which, many, 'ASD-associated', genes, may, converge, on, shared, mechanisms, of, pathogenesis])].
[sujeto(['The', chromodomain, 'helicase/adenosine', triphosphatase, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 1, -, like, gene, '(', 'CHD1L)', is, a, recently, identified, oncogene, localized, at, 1, q21])].
[sujeto(['CHD1L', protein, 'over-expression', in, primary, hepatocellular, carcinoma, is, correlated, with]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([apoptosis, 'inhibition,', reduced, chemosensitivity, and, shortened, patient, survival])].
[sujeto(['CHARGE', syndrome, is, a, rare, human, disorder]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutations, in, the, gene, encoding, chromodomain, helicase, 'DNA', binding, protein, 7, '(', 'CHD7)'])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([a, novel, mouse, model, of, 'CHD7', 'dysfunction,', termed, 'Looper'])].
[sujeto(['Looper', mice, exhibit, many, of, the, clinical, features, of, the, human, 'syndrome,', consistent, with, previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento(['CHARGE', 'models,', including, growth, 'retardation,', facial, 'asymmetry,', vestibular, 'defects,', eye, 'anomalies,', 'hyperactivity,', ossicle, 'malformation,', hearing, loss, and, vestibular, dysfunction])].
[sujeto(['Looper', mice, are, hyperactive, and]), verbo([have]), complemento([vestibular, dysfunction, but, do, not, display, motor, impairment])].
[sujeto(['Heterozygous']), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, function, mutations, in, 'CHD7', '(', chromodomain, helicase, 'DNA-binding', protein, 7, ')', lead, to, 'CHARGE', 'syndrome,', a, complex, developmental, disorder, affecting, craniofacial, 'structures,', cranial, nerves, and, several, organ, systems])].
[sujeto(['So', 'far,', only, few, 'CHD7']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, involved, in, neural, crest, cell, development, have, been, identified, and, the, role, of, 'CHD7', in, neural, crest, cell, guidance, and, the, regulation, of, 'mesenchymal-epithelial', transition, are, unknown])].
[sujeto(['We', identified, 98, differentially]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([genes, between, 'wild-type', and, 'Chd7', '(', 'Whi/Whi)', embryos])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', many, misregulated, genes, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, neural, crest, cell, and, axon, guidance, such, as, semaphorins, and, ephrin, receptors])].

[sujeto(['Chromodomain', 'helicase/ATPase', 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 1, -, like, gene, '(', 'CHD1L)', is, involved, in, malignancies])].

[sujeto(['Nearly', half, of, the, 683, identified, 'DEGs', are]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, brain, '(', 'P', =, 0.003, ')', ',', and, a, significant, number, of, them, are, involved, in, mechanisms, previously, associated, with, 'ASD', such, as, protein, 'synthesis,', cytoskeleton, 'regulation,', cellular, adhesion, and, alternative, 'splicing,', which, validate, the, use, of, 'SHEDs', to, disentangle, the, causes, of, autism])].
[sujeto(['Autistic', patients, also, presented, overexpression, of, genes]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, androgen, receptor, '(', 'AR),', and, 'AR', 'itself,', which, in, turn, interacts, with, 'CHD8', '(', chromodomain, helicase, 'DNA', binding, protein, 8, ')', ',', a, gene, recently, shown, to, be, associated, with, the, cause, of, autism, and, found, to, be, upregulated, in, some, patients, tested, here])].

[sujeto(['Chromodomain', helicase, 'DNA-binding', protein, 5, '(', 'CHD5),', a, member, of, the, 'CHD', 'family,', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, key, cellular, processes, including, chromatin, 'remodeling,', cell, cycle, 'regulation,', and, cellular, adhesion])].
[sujeto(['Recent', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([demonstrated, that, 'CHD5', is, the, product, of, a, novel, tumor, suppressor, gene, and, is, implicated, in, certain, tumor, types])].
