[sujeto(['Chromatin-remodeling', proteins]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, pivotal, role, in, normal, cell, function, and, 'development,', catalyzing, conformational, changes, in, 'DNA', that, ultimately, result, in, changes, in, gene, expression, patterns])].
[sujeto(['CHD3,', 'CHD4', and, 'CHD5', also, contain, two, contiguous, 'PHD', domains, and]), verbo([have]), complemento([an, extended, 'N-terminal', region, that, has, not, previously, been, characterized])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, a, stable, domain, in, the, 'N-terminal', region, of, 'CHD4', and, report, here, the, backbone, and, side, chain, resonance, assignments, for, this, domain, at, pH, 7.5, and, 25, °, 'C', '(', 'BMRB', 'No'])].
[sujeto([and, cardiac, outflow, tract, '(', 'OFT)']), verbo([requires]), complemento([multipotent, neural, crest, cells, '(', 'NCCs)', that, migrate, from, the, neural, tube, to, target, tissue, destinations])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, 'Brahma-related', gene, 1, '(', 'Brg1),', an, 'ATPase', subunit, of, the, 'Brg1/Brahma-associated', factor, '(', 'BAF)', 'chromatin-remodeling', 'complex,', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([in, 'NCCs', to, direct, cardiovascular, development])].
[sujeto(['Brg1']), verbo([suppresses]), complemento([an, apoptosis, 'factor,', 'Apoptosis', 'signal-regulating', kinase, 1, '(', 'Ask1),', and, a, cell, cycle, 'inhibitor,', 'p21(cip1),', to, inhibit, apoptosis, and, promote, proliferation, of, 'NCCs,', thereby, maintaining, a, multipotent, cell, reservoir, at, the, neural, crest])].
[sujeto(['Within', 'NCCs,', 'Brg1', partners, with, chromatin, remodeler, 'Chromodomain-helicase-DNA-binding', protein, 7, '(', 'Chd7)', on, the, 'PlexinA2', promoter, to]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['PlexinA2,', which, encodes, a, receptor, for, semaphorin, to, guide, 'NCCs', into, the, 'OFT'])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([an, important, role, for, 'Brg1', and, its, downstream, pathways, in, the, 'survival,', 'differentiation,', and, migration, of, the, multipotent, 'NCCs', critical, for, mammalian, cardiovascular, development])].
[sujeto(['Mutations', in, the, chromodomain, helicase, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 7, gene, '(', 'CHD7)', lead, to, 'CHARGE', 'syndrome,', an, autosomal, dominant, multiple, malformation, disorder])].
[sujeto(['Proteins']), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, chromatin, remodeling, typically, act, in, multiprotein, complexes])].
[sujeto(['We', previously, demonstrated, that, a, part, of, human, 'CHD7']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, a, part, of, human, 'CHD8,', another, chromodomain, helicase, 'DNA', binding, protein, presumably, being, involved, in, the, pathogenesis, of, neurodevelopmental, '(', 'NDD)', and, autism, spectrum, disorders, '(', 'ASD)'])].
[sujeto(['Because', identification, of, novel, 'CHD7', and, 'CHD8']), verbo([interacting]), complemento([partners, will, provide, further, insights, into, the, pathogenesis, of, 'CHARGE', syndrome, and, 'ASD/NDD,', we, searched, for, additional, associated, polypeptides, using, the, method, of, stable, isotope, labeling, by, amino, acids, in, cell, culture, '(', 'SILAC)', in, combination, with, mass, spectrometry])].
[sujeto(['We', confirmed, the, result, by, 'co-immunoprecipitation', studies, and, showed, a, direct]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, the, 'CHD8', part, by, direct, yeast, two, hybrid, experiments])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', we, characterized, 'FAM124B', as, a, mainly]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([localized, protein, with, a, widespread, expression, in, embryonic, and, adult, mouse, tissues])].

[sujeto([5, and, the, high, expression, of, 'Fam124B', in, the, developing, mouse, 'brain,', we, conclude, that, 'Fam124B', is, a, novel, protein, possibly]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, pathogenesis, of, 'CHARGE', syndrome, and, neurodevelopmental, disorders])].
[sujeto(['About', 80, '%', of, patients, with, a, clinical, 'diagnose,']), verbo([have]), complemento([a, mutation, or, a, deletion, in, the, gene, encoding, chromodomain, helicase, 'DNA-binding', protein, 7, '(', 'CHD7)'])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, genetic, testing, for, 'CHD7', mutation, should, be, considered, in, neonates, with, a, specific, combination, of, several, clinical, symptoms])].

[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([replaced, the, 'six-membered', 2, '\'', ',', 3, '\'', -, ring, by, a, number, of, 'five-membered', and, 'six-membered', heterocyclic, rings, containing, alternative, proton, donor, and, acceptor, 'groups,', to, exploit, the, interaction, with, the, carboxylate, groups, of, 'Asp9', and, 'Asp163', as, well, as, with, several, cationic, residues, present, in, the, vicinity, of, the, 'TMPK(mt)', binding, site])].

[sujeto(['Therefore,', we, hypothesized, that, 'PQQ', can]), verbo([induce]), complemento([mitochondrial, biogenesis, in, mouse, hepatocytes])].
[sujeto(['Exposure', of, mouse, 'Hepa1-6', cells, to, 10, -, 30, microm, 'PQQ', for, 24, -, 48, h, resulted, in]), verbo([increased]), complemento([citrate, synthase, and, cytochrome, c, oxidase, 'activity,', 'Mitotracker', 'staining,', mitochondrial, 'DNA', 'content,', and, cellular, oxygen, respiration])].
[sujeto(['The', induction, of, this, process, occurred, through, the, activation, of, cAMP, response, 'element-binding', protein, '(', 'CREB)', and, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', 'receptor-gamma', 'coactivator-1alpha', '(', 'PGC-1alpha),', a, pathway, known, to]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([mitochondrial, biogenesis])].
[sujeto(['PQQ', exposure]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([phosphorylation, of, 'CREB', at, serine, 133, ',', activated, the, promoter, of, 'PGC-1alpha,', and, increased, 'PGC-1alpha', mRNA, and, protein, expression])].
[sujeto(['PQQ', did, not]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento([mitochondrial, biogenesis, after, small, interfering, 'RNA-mediated', reduction, in, either, 'PGC-1alpha', or, 'CREB', expression])].
[sujeto(['Consistent', with, activation, of, the, 'PGC-1alpha', 'pathway,', 'PQQ']), verbo([increased]), complemento([nuclear, respiratory, factor, activation, '(', 'NRF-1', and, 'NRF-2)', and, 'Tfam,', 'TFB1M,', and, 'TFB2M', mRNA, expression])].
[sujeto(['The', ability, of, 'PQQ', to]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento([mitochondrial, biogenesis, accounts, in, part, for, action, of, this, compound, and, suggests, that, 'PQQ', may, be, beneficial, in, diseases, associated, with, mitochondrial, dysfunction])].
[sujeto(['Small-molecule', inhibitors, of, protein, kinases]), verbo([have]), complemento([contributed, immensely, to, our, understanding, of, biological, signaling, pathways, and, have, been, exploited, therapeutically, for, the, treatment, of, cancers, and, other, disease, states])].
[sujeto(['The', pyridinyl, imidazole, compounds, 'SB', 203580, and, 'SB', 202190, were, identified, as, 'ATP', competitive, antagonists, of, the, p38, 'stress-activated', protein, kinases, and]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, widely, used, to, elucidate, 'p38-dependent', cellular, processes])].
[sujeto(['Unexpectedly,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, inhibitory, activity, of, 'SB', 203580, and, 'SB', 202190, on, 'CREB', phosphorylation, was, independent, of, 'p38,', but, instead, correlated, with, inhibition, of, casein, kinase, 1, '(', 'CK1)', in, vitro])].
[sujeto(['The', inhibition, of, 'CK1-mediated', 'CREB', phosphorylation, by, concentrations, of, pyridinyl, imidazoles, commonly, employed, to]), verbo([suppress]), complemento(['p38,', suggests, that, in, some, cases, conclusions, of, 'p38-dependence', derived, solely, from, the, use, of, these, inhibitors, may, be, invalid])].
[sujeto(['Alpha-ENaC', expression, and, activity, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, a, variety, of, hormones, including, 'beta-adrenergic', agonists, via, the, second, messenger, cAMP])].
[sujeto(['We', evaluated, the, early, intermediate, pathways]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, 'up-regulation', of, 'SGK1', by, 'DbcAMP', and, whether, 'SGK1', is, a, prerequisite, for, induction, of, 'alpha-ENaC', expression])].
[sujeto(['Submandibular', gland, epithelial, '(', 'SMG-C6)', cells, treated, with, 'DbcAMP', '(', 1, 'mM)']), verbo([induced]), complemento([both, 'SGK1', mRNA, and, protein, expression])].
[sujeto(['DbcAMP-stimulated', 'SGK1', mRNA, expression, was]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([by, actinomycin, 'D', and, mRNA, and, protein, expressions, were, attenuated, by, 'PKA', inhibitors, '(', 'H-89', and, 'KT5720)'])].

[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', the, combination, of, 'PKA', inhibitors, with, dominant, negative, 'PI3-K', synergistically]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['DbcAMP-induced', 'Na(+)', transport])].
[sujeto(['Inhibition', of, 'SGK1', expression, by, siRNA]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([but, did, not, obliterate, 'DbcAMP-induced', 'alpha-ENaC', expression])].

[sujeto(['Anti-apoptotic', activity, of, 'Wnt5a', was, not]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, a, 'dickkopf-1', '(', 'DKK),', which, blocks, the, canonical, 'Wnt', pathway])].

[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'Wnt5a']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, nuclear, 'beta-catenin', level, and, treatment, with, imatinib, or, 'ionomycin,', either, of, which, blocks, the, 'beta-catenin', 'pathway,', reduced, the, 'anti-apoptotic', activity, of, 'Wnt5a,', together, suggesting, the, simultaneous, involvement, of, the, 'beta-catenin-mediated', pathway, in, the, 'Wnt5a', 'anti-apoptotic', activity])].
[sujeto(['Based', on, another]), verbo([finding]), complemento([indicating, that, 'Wnt5a', upregulated, 'PKA-mediated', phosphorylation, of, glycogen, synthase, 'kinase-3beta', '(', 'GSK-3beta)', at, serine, 9, that, caused, inactivation, of, 'GSK-3beta', and, subsequently, resulted, in, activation, of, the, 'beta-catenin', 'pathway,', we, have, speculated, that, the, 'Wnt5a', 'anti-apoptotic', activity, may, be, partially, mediated, by, 'PKA-mediated', phosphorylation, of, 'GSK-3beta', and, subsequent, activation, of, the, 'beta-catenin', pathway])].
[sujeto(['As', their, therapeutic, action]), verbo([requires]), complemento([chronic, 'treatment,', adaptive, neuronal, processes, are, suggested, to, be, involved])].
[sujeto(['The', molecular, basis, of, this, are, changes, in, gene, expression]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, transcription, factors, such, as, 'CREB', '(', 'cAMP-response-element-binding', 'protein)'])].
[sujeto(['The', bZip, is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'CREB', dimerization, and, 'DNA-binding,', but, also, contributes, to, 'CREB', transactivation, by, recruiting, the, coactivator, 'TORC', '(', transducer, of, regulated, 'CREB)'])].
[sujeto(['LiCl', '(', 6, mM, or, 'higher)']), verbo([induced]), complemento([an, up, to, 4.7, -, fold, increase, in, 8, -, 'bromo-cAMP-stimulated', 'CRE/CREB-directed', transcription])].

[sujeto(['These', 'results,', unlike, those]), verbo([reported]), complemento([in, other, 'tissues,', demonstrate, that, cardiac, 'CREB', is, not, a, 'multi-signal', target])].
[sujeto(['Members', of, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([hormone, receptor, superfamily, function, as, key, transcriptional, regulators, of, inflammation, and, proliferation, in, cardiovascular, diseases])].

[sujeto(['To', this, 'end,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([created, 'SBP-3XFLAG-PPP1CC1', and, 'SBP-3XFLAG-PPP1CC2', 'knock-in', mouse, embryonic, stem, cell, lines, using, a, 'gene-trap-based', system])].
[sujeto(['Tandem', affinity, purification, using, our, 'knock-in', cell, lines, identified, 11, significant, 'protein-protein', 'interactions,', including, nine, known, 'PP1']), verbo([interacting]), complemento([proteins, and, two, additional, proteins, '(', 'ATP5C1', and, 'DDOST)'])].
[sujeto(['Reciprocal', in, vitro, sedimentation, assays, confirmed, the, interaction, between, 'PPP1CC2', and, 'DDOST', that, may]), verbo([have]), complemento([physiological, implications, in, spermatogenesis])].
[sujeto(['Immunolocalization', studies, revealed, that, 'DDOST', localized, to, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([envelope, in, dissociated, spermatogenic, cells, and, persists, throughout, spermatogenesis])].
[sujeto(['Although', most, patients, receive, a, 'CDG', diagnosis, based, on, abnormal, glycosylation, of, 'transferrin,', this, test, cannot]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, genetic, 'diagnosis;', 'indeed,', many, patients, with, abnormal, transferrin, do, not, have, mutations, in, any, known, 'CDG', genes])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, combined, biochemical, analysis, with, 'whole-exome', sequencing, '(', 'WES)', to, identify, the, genetic, defect, in, an, untyped, 'CDG', 'patient,', and, we]), verbo([found]), complemento([a, 22, bp, deletion, and, a, missense, mutation, in, 'DDOST,', whose, product, is, a, component, of, the, oligosaccharyltransferase, complex, that, transfers, the, glycan, chain, from, a, lipid, carrier, to, nascent, proteins, in, the, endoplasmic, reticulum, lumen])].
[sujeto(['Biochemical', analysis, with, three, biomarkers, revealed, that, 'N-glycosylation', was]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([in, the, 'patient\'s', fibroblasts])].
[sujeto(['Advanced', glycation, end, products, '(', 'AGE)']), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, been, implicated, in, aging, changes, within, different, tissues, of, the, body])].
[sujeto(['The', 'AGE', receptors, 1, ',', 2, and, 3, ',', which, are, encoded, by, 'DDOST,', 'PRKCSH', and, 'LGALS3,', 'respectively,', may, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, pathogenesis, of, diabetic, complications])].
[sujeto(['We', sought, to]), verbo([find]), complemento([out, whether, these, genes, are, associated, with, diabetic, 'nephropathy,', cardiovascular, disease, and, type, 1, diabetes, or, related, quantitative, traits])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([evidence, of, genotype, association, between, diabetic, nephropathy, and, the, 'SNPs', rs2170336, in, 'DDOST', '(', p, =, 0.03, ')', ',', rs311788, in, 'PRKCSH', '(', p, =, 0.04, ')', and, rs311778, in, 'PRKCSH', '(', p, =, 0.02, ')'])].
[sujeto(['No', associations, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([between, the, 'SNPs', and, cardiovascular, 'disease,', blood, 'pressure,', serum, lipid, levels, or, type, 1, diabetes])].
[sujeto(['PARK2', and, 'PINK1', gene, mutations, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, recessive, early, onset, 'Parkinson\'s', disease, '(', 'EOPD)'])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, these, classes, of, proteins, degrade, slowly, and, faithfully]), verbo([maintain]), complemento([their, immunohistochemistry, characteristics, over, at, least, a, 24, -, hr, time, interval, in, devitalized, tissues])].
[sujeto(['DDOST', mRNA, is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([intensely, in, heart, and, 'pancreas,', but, at, lower, levels, in, brain])].
[sujeto(['Dominant', 'loss-of-function', mutations, in, the, gene, encoding, chromodomain, helicase, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 7, '(', 'CHD7),', which, is, an, 'ATP-dependent', chromatin, 'remodeller,', have, been, identified, as, the, cause, of, 'CHARGE', syndrome])].
[sujeto(['The', emerging, picture, from, this, work]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, the, mechanisms, by, which, 'CHD7', 'fine-tunes', gene, expression, are, context, 'specific,', consistent, with, the, pleiotropic, nature, of, 'CHARGE', syndrome])].
[sujeto(['CHARGE', syndrome, is]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, spontaneous, 'loss-of-function', mutations, to, the, 'ATP-dependant', chromatin, remodeller, 'chromodomain-helicase-DNA-binding', protein, 7, '(', 'CHD7)'])].
[sujeto(['Disruption', to, the, neural, crest, lineage]), verbo([has]), complemento([previously, been, emphasised, in, the, aetiology, of, this, developmental, disorder])].
[sujeto(['Conditional', ablation, of, 'Chd7', in, this, lineage, results, in, major, structural, cardiovascular, defects, akin, to, those, seen, in, 'CHARGE', 'patients,', as, well, as, a, striking]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, cardiac, innervation, and, embryonic, lethality])].
[sujeto(['This', work, therefore]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([the, importance, of, 'CHD7', in, the, cardiogenic, mesoderm, for, multiple, processes, during, cardiovascular, development])].
[sujeto(['CHARGE', syndrome, 'MIM', #, 214800, is, an, autosomal, dominant, syndrome]), verbo([involving]), complemento([multiple, congenital, malformations])].
[sujeto(['Mutations', in, the, chromodomain, helicase, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 7, '(', 'CHD7)', gene, have, been, found, in, 65, -, 70, '%', of, 'CHARGE', syndrome, patients])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', this, large, deletion, may]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, mediated, by, 'non-homologous', end, joining])].
[sujeto(['The', mechanism, of, the, deletion, in, the, current, case, differs, from, the, previously]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([mechanisms, underlying, large, deletions, or, complex, genomic, rearrangements, in, the, 'CHD7', 'gene,', and, this, is, the, first, report, of, 'CHD7', deletion, by, this, mechanism, worldwide])].
[sujeto(['Inactivating', mutations, in, chromodomain, helicase, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 7, '(', 'CHD7)', cause, 'CHARGE', 'syndrome,', a, severe, multiorgan, system, disorder, of, which, 'Isolated', 'gonadotropin-releasing', hormone, '(', 'GnRH)', deficiency, '(', 'IGD)', is, a, minor, feature])].
[sujeto(['Recent']), verbo([reports]), complemento([have, described, predominantly, missense, 'CHD7', alleles, in, 'IGD', 'patients,', but, it, is, unclear, if, these, alleles, are, relevant, to, causality, or, overall, genetic, burden, of, 'Kallmann', syndrome, '(', 'KS)', and, normosmic, form, of, 'IGD'])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, rare, deleterious, 'CHD7', alleles, contribute, to, the, mutational, burden, of, patients, with, both, 'KS', and, normosmic, forms, of, 'IGD', in, the, absence, of, full, 'CHARGE', syndrome])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, '(', 'i)', implicate, a, unique, role, or, preferential, sensitivity, for, 'CHD7', in, the, ontogeny, of, 'GnRH', 'neurons,', '(', 'ii)', reiterate, the, emerging, genetic, complexity, of, this, family, of, 'IGD', 'disorders,', and, '(', 'iii)', demonstrate, how, the, coordinated, use, of, 'well-phenotyped', 'cohorts,', 'families,', and, functional, studies, can, inform, genetic, architecture, and]), verbo([provide]), complemento([insights, into, the, developmental, biology, of, cellular, systems])].
[sujeto(['NSCs', are]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([in, a, state, of, reversible, quiescence, and, the, failure, to, maintain, the, quiescent, state, can, result, in, the, premature, depletion, of, the, stem, cell, pool])].
[sujeto(['The', epigenetic, mechanisms, that]), verbo([maintain]), complemento([this, quiescent, state, have, not, been, identified])].
[sujeto(['Using', an, inducible, knockout, mouse, 'model,', we, show, that, the, chromatin, remodeling, factor, 'chromodomain-helicase-DNA-binding', protein, 7, '(', 'CHD7)', is, essential, for]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento(['NSC', quiescence])].
[sujeto(['CHD7', inactivation, in, adult, 'NSCs', results, in, a]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, stem, cell, quiescence, in, the, 'hippocampus,', a, transient, increase, in, cell, 'divisions,', followed, by, a, significant, decline, in, neurogenesis])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'NSC', quiescence, is, associated, with, the, premature, loss, of, 'NSCs', in, 'middle-aged', mice])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, 'CHD7', represses, the, transcription, of, several, positive, regulators, of, cell, cycle, progression, and, is, required, for, full, induction, of, the, 'Notch', target, gene, 'Hes5', in, quiescent, 'NSCs'])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, directly, link, 'CHD7', to, pathways]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'NSC', quiescence, and, identify, the, first, 'chromatin-remodeling', factor, with, a, role, in, 'NSC', quiescence, and, maintenance])].
[sujeto(['As', 'CHD7', 'haplo-insufficiency', is, associated, with, a, range, of, cognitive, disabilities, in, 'CHARGE', 'syndrome,', our, observations, may]), verbo([have]), complemento([implications, for, understanding, the, basis, of, these, deficits])].
[sujeto(['CHARGE', syndrome, is, a, rare, human, disorder]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutations, in, the, gene, encoding, chromodomain, helicase, 'DNA', binding, protein, 7, '(', 'CHD7)'])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([a, novel, mouse, model, of, 'CHD7', 'dysfunction,', termed, 'Looper'])].

[sujeto(['Looper', mice, are, hyperactive, and]), verbo([have]), complemento([vestibular, dysfunction, but, do, not, display, motor, impairment])].
[sujeto(['We', analyzed, roles, of, two, chromatin, 'remodelers,', 'Chromodomain', 'Helicase', 'DNA-binding', protein, 7, '(', 'CHD7)', and, 'SWItch/Sucrose', 'NonFermentable-B', '(', 'SWI/SNF-B),', and, 'Bone', 'Morphogenetic', 'Protein', '(', 'BMP)/Wnt', signaling, in, the, maintenance, of, the, multipotency, of, mouse, trunk, neural, crest, 'cells,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, the, formation, of, mouse, neural, 'crest-derived', stem, cells, '(', mouse, 'NCSCs)'])].
[sujeto(['CHD7', was]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, undifferentiated, neural, crest, cells, and, in, the, dorsal, root, ganglia, '(', 'DRG)', and, sciatic, 'nerve,', typical, tissues, containing, 'NCSCs'])].
[sujeto(['BMP/Wnt', signaling]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'CHD7', and, participated, in, maintaining, the, multipotency, of, neural, crest, cells])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', the, promotion, of, 'CHD7', expression]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([the, multipotency, of, these, cells])].
[sujeto(['The', inhibition, of, 'CHD7', and, 'SWI/SNF-B', expression, significantly]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([the, maintenance, of, the, multipotency, of, these, cells])].

[sujeto(['Thus,', the, present, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, chromatin, remodelers, as, well, as, 'BMP/Wnt', signaling, play, essential, roles, in, the, maintenance, of, the, multipotency, of, mouse, trunk, neural, crest, cells, and, in, the, formation, of, mouse, 'NCSCs'])].
[sujeto(['CHARGE', syndrome, is, a, congenital, disorder]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutation, of, the, chromodomain, helicase, 'DNA', binding, protein, 7, '(', 'CHD7)', gene, and, is, characterized, by, multiple, anomalies, including, ocular, 'coloboma,', heart, 'defects,', choanal, 'atresia,', retarded, growth, and, 'development,', genital, 'and/or', urological, 'abnormalities,', ear, 'anomalies,', and, hearing, loss])].

[sujeto(['About', 80, '%', of, patients, with, a, clinical, 'diagnose,']), verbo([have]), complemento([a, mutation, or, a, deletion, in, the, gene, encoding, chromodomain, helicase, 'DNA-binding', protein, 7, '(', 'CHD7)'])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, genetic, testing, for, 'CHD7', mutation, should, be, considered, in, neonates, with, a, specific, combination, of, several, clinical, symptoms])].
[sujeto(['Ocular', 'coloboma,', heart, 'malformation,', choanal, 'atresia,', retardation, of, growth, 'and/or', 'development,', genital, 'hypoplasia,', and, ear, anomalies, associated, with, deafness, '(', 'CHARGE)', syndrome, is, a, 'rare,', usually, 'sporadic,', autosomal, dominant, 'disorder,']), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutations, within, the, 'CHD7', '(', chromodomain, helicase, 'DNA-binding', protein, 7, ')', 'gene,', in, nearly, 70, '%', of, cases])].

[sujeto(['Somitogenesis', is, a, complex, process, during, early, vertebrate, development]), verbo([involving]), complemento([interactions, between, many, factors, to, form, a, bilateral, somite, series])].
[sujeto(['A', role, for, chromatin, remodelers, in, somitogenesis]), verbo([has]), complemento([not, yet, been, demonstrated])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, investigate, the, function, of, chromodomain, helicase, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 7, '(', 'chd7)', during, zebrafish, somitogenesis])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, 'Chd7', deficiency]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, asymmetric, segmentation, of, the, presomitic, mesoderm, '(', 'PSM),', as, revealed, by, expression, of, the, somitogenesis, 'genes,', 'cdx1a,', 'dlc,', 'her7,', 'mespa,', and, ripply1])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', we, show, that, abrogation, of, 'Chd7', results, in, the]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, asymmetric, expression, of, spaw, in, the, lateral, plate, 'mesoderm,', which, is, consistent, with, more, general, laterality, defects])].
[sujeto(['Based', on, the, observation, that, insufficient, 'Chd7']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, 'left-right', asymmetry, defects, during, 'PSM', 'segmentation,', and, because, 'CHD7', has, been, linked, to, human, spinal, 'deformities,', we, suggest, that, zebrafish, chd7, morphants, may, be, a, good, in, vivo, model, to, examine, the, pathophysiology, of, these, diseases])].
[sujeto(['Mutations', in, the, chromodomain, helicase, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento(['protein-7', '(', 'CHD7)', cause, 'CHARGE', 'syndrome,', which, includes, eye, 'coloboma,', heart, 'malformations,', atresia, of, the, 'choanae,', retardation, of, 'growth/development,', genital, 'anomalies,', and, ear, abnormalities])].
[sujeto(['CHD7', encodes, a, large, protein, that]), verbo([participates]), complemento([in, chromatin, remodeling, and, transcription])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', it]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, hypothesized, that, 'IHH/KS', represents, a, milder, allelic, variant, of, 'CHARGE', 'syndrome,', which, has, been, supported, by, the, identification, of, heterozygous, 'CHD7', mutations, in, both, normosmic, 'IHH', and, 'KS'])].
[sujeto(['Developmental', expression, within, the, hypothalamus, and, the, presence, of, human, mutations, indicate, that, 'CHD7']), verbo([has]), complemento([an, important, role, in, puberty, and, reproduction])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'WDR11', was, recently, identified, by, positional, 'cloning;', and, mutations, in, were, identified, in, 'IHH/KS', 'patients,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([a, role, for, this, gene, in, normal, puberty])].
[sujeto(['CHARGE', is, a, multiple, congenital, anomaly, disorder, and, a, common]), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, pubertal, 'defects,', olfactory, 'dysfunction,', growth, 'delays,', 'deaf-blindness,', balance, disorders, and, congenital, heart, malformations])].
[sujeto(['Mutations', in, 'CHD7,', the, gene, encoding, chromodomain, helicase, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 7, ',', are, present, in, 60, -, 80, '%', of, individuals, with, the, 'CHARGE', syndrome])].
[sujeto(['Mutations', in, 'CHD7']), verbo([have]), complemento([also, been, reported, in, the, 'Kallmann', syndrome, '(', olfactory, 'dysfunction,', delayed, puberty, and, hypogonadotropic, 'hypogonadism)'])].
[sujeto(['CHD7', is, a, positive, regulator, of, neural, stem, cell, proliferation, and, olfactory, sensory, neuron, formation, in, the, olfactory, 'epithelium,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, the, loss, of, 'CHD7', might, also, disrupt, development, of, other, neural, populations])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, female, 'Chd7(Gt/+)', mice, have, delays, in, vaginal, opening, and, estrus, 'onset,', and, erratic, estrus, cycles])].
[sujeto(['Chd7(Gt/+)', mice, also]), verbo([have]), complemento([decreased, circulating, levels, of, luteinizing, hormone, and, 'follicle-stimulating', hormone, but, apparently, normal, responsiveness, to, 'gonadotropin-releasing', hormone, '(', 'GnRH)', agonist, and, antagonist, treatment])].
[sujeto(['GnRH', neurons, in, the, adult, 'Chd7(Gt/+)', hypothalamus, and, embryonic, nasal, region, are, 'diminished,', and, there, is]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([cellular, proliferation, in, the, embryonic, olfactory, placode])].
[sujeto(['Additionally,', 'Chd7', mutant, embryos]), verbo([have]), complemento(['CHD7', 'dosage-dependent', reductions, in, expression, levels, of, 'Fgfr1,', 'Bmp4', and, 'Otx2', in, the, olfactory, placode])].
[sujeto(['Together,', these, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'CHD7', has, critical, roles, in, the, development, and, maintenance, of, 'GnRH', neurons, for, regulating, puberty, and, reproduction])].
[sujeto(['CHARGE', syndrome, is, an, autosomal, dominant, multisystem, disorder]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutation, in, the, 'CHD7', 'gene,', encoding, chromodomain, helicase, 'DNA-binding', protein, 7])].
[sujeto(['Molecular', diagnostic, testing, for, 'CHD7', mutation]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, available, in, a, clinical, setting, since, 2005])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, the, results, from, the, first, 642, unrelated, proband, samples, submitted, for, testing])].
[sujeto(['We', identified, 159, unique, pathogenic, 'mutations,', and, of, 'these,', 134, mutations, were, each, seen, in, a, single, individual, and, 25, mutations, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, two, to, five, individuals, '(', n, =, 69, ')'])].
[sujeto(['Of', the, 203, 'mutations,', only, 9, were, 'missense,', with, 107, 'nonsense,', 69, 'frameshift,', and, 15, 'splice-site', mutations, likely]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, haploinsufficiency, at, the, cellular, level])].
[sujeto(['An', additional, 72, variations, identified, in, the, 642, tested, samples, '(', 11, '%', ')', were, considered, to]), verbo([have]), complemento([unknown, clinical, significance])].
[sujeto(['Copy', number, changes, '(', 'deletion/duplication', of, the, entire, gene, or, 'one/several', 'exons)', were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, account, for, a, very, small, number, of, cases, '(', n, =, 3, ')'])].
[sujeto(['To', our, 'knowledge,', the, efficacy, of, transferring, 'next-generation', sequencing, from, a, research, setting, to, neuromuscular, clinics]), verbo([has]), complemento([never, been, evaluated])].
[sujeto(['To']), verbo([translate]), complemento(['whole-exome', sequencing, '(', 'WES)', to, clinical, practice, for, the, genetic, diagnosis, of, a, large, cohort, of, patients, with, 'limb-girdle', muscular, dystrophy, '(', 'LGMD)', for, whom, 'protein-based', analyses, and, targeted, 'Sanger', sequencing, failed, to, identify, the, genetic, cause, of, their, disorder])].

[sujeto(['We', expand, the, clinical, phenotypes, associated, with, known, myopathy, 'genes,', and, we, stress, the, importance, of, accurate, clinical, examination, and, histopathological, results, for, interpretation, of, 'WES,', with, many, diagnoses]), verbo([requiring]), complemento(['follow-up', review, and, ancillary, investigations, of, biopsy, specimens, or, serum, samples])].
[sujeto(['The', gene, encoding, for, a, protein]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, chromatin, organization])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, on, a, 5.9, years, old, male, of, 'Moroccan', origin, displaying, classic, clinical, features, of, 'CHARGE', syndrome])].
[sujeto(['Using', 'CGH', array, and, 'NGS', analysis, we, detected, a, microdeletion, '(', 184, 'kb)']), verbo([involving]), complemento([the, promoter, region, and, exon, 1, of, 'CHD7', gene, and, the, flanking, 'RAB2', gene])].

[sujeto(['CHARGE', syndrome, is, an, 'autosomal-dominant', disorder]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, multiple, organs])].

[sujeto(['This', review, focuses, on, 'CHARGE', 'syndrome,', a, multiple, anomaly, condition]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutations, in, the, gene, encoding, 'CHD7,', an, 'ATP-dependent', chromatin, remodeling, protein])].
[sujeto(['Current', understanding, of, epigenetic, 'CHD7', functions, and]), verbo([interacting]), complemento([proteins, in, cells, and, tissues, is, also, 'presented,', and, final, emphasis, is, placed, on, challenges, and, major, questions, to, be, answered, with, ongoing, research, efforts])].
[sujeto(['We', ruled, out, the, possibility, of, multiple, deformities]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, genomic, imbalances])].
[sujeto(['The', patient, was, then, clinically, considered, to]), verbo([have]), complemento(['CHARGE', 'syndrome,', an, autosomal, dominant, 'multi-system', disorder, involving, defects, in, multiple, 'organs,', and, 'CHD7', is, the, only, known, gene, associated, with, the, syndrome])].
[sujeto(['Gln972HisfsX22),', a, 'two-nucleotide', deletion]), verbo([causing]), complemento([reading, frame, shift, and, resulting, in, a, truncated, 'CHD7', protein])].

[sujeto(['Unrestrained', p53, activity, during, 'development,', as, occurs, upon]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, the, p53, negative, regulators, 'Mdm2', or, 'Mdmx,', causes, early, embryonic, lethality])].

[sujeto(['The', chromodomain, helicase, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento(['(', 'CHD)', 'protein,', 'Kismet', '(', 'Kis),', is, expressed, in, both, motor, neuron, nuclei, and, postsynaptic, muscle, nuclei, of, the, 'Drosophila', larvae])].

[sujeto(['Surprisingly,', our, studies, of, a, 'knock-in', mutant, mouse, strain, that]), verbo([expresses]), complemento([a, stabilized, and, transcriptionally, dead, variant, of, the, 'tumour-suppressor', protein, p53, '(', 'p53(25,26,53,54)),', along, with, a, 'wild-type', allele, of, p53, '(', also, known, as, 'Trp53),', revealed, 'late-gestational', embryonic, lethality, associated, with, a, host, of, phenotypes, that, are, characteristic, of, 'CHARGE', 'syndrome,', including, 'coloboma,', inner, and, outer, ear, 'malformations,', heart, outflow, tract, defects, and, craniofacial, defects])].

[sujeto(['Furthermore,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'CHD7', can, bind, to, the, p53, 'promoter,', thereby, negatively, regulating, p53, 'expression,', and, that, 'CHD7', loss, in, mouse, neural, crest, cells, or, samples, from, patients, with, 'CHARGE', syndrome, results, in, p53, activation])].
[sujeto(['Strikingly,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, p53, heterozygosity, partially, rescued, the, phenotypes, in, 'Chd7-null', mouse, 'embryos,', demonstrating, that, p53, contributes, to, the, phenotypes, that, result, from, 'CHD7', loss])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', inappropriate, p53, activation, during, development, can]), verbo([promote]), complemento(['CHARGE', 'phenotypes,', supporting, the, idea, that, p53, has, a, critical, role, in, developmental, syndromes, and, providing, important, insight, into, the, mechanisms, underlying, 'CHARGE', syndrome])].
[sujeto(['Mutations', in, 'CHD7,', a, gene, previously, implicated, in, 'CHARGE', '(', 'coloboma,', heart, 'defect,', choanal, 'atresia,', retardation, of, growth, 'and/or', 'development,', genital, 'hypoplasia,', ear, 'anomalies)', 'syndrome,']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported, in, patients, presenting, with, 'Kallmann', syndrome, '(', 'KS)', or, congenital, hypogonadotropic, hypogonadism, '(', 'CHH)'])].
[sujeto(['Most', mutations]), verbo([causing]), complemento(['CHARGE', syndrome, result, in, premature, stop, codons, and, occur, de, 'novo,', but, the, proportion, of, truncating, vs, nontruncating, mutations, in, 'KS', and, 'CHH', patients, is, still, unknown])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([presumably, pathogenic, mutations, in, 'CHD7', in, 24, 'KS', patients, but, not, in, 'CHH', patients])].
[sujeto(['CHARGE', syndrome, is, a, 'rare,', autosomal, dominant, condition]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutations, in, the, 'CHD7', gene])].
[sujeto(['Although', central, nervous, system, defects]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, 'reported,', the, detailed, description, and, analysis, of, these, anomalies, in, 'CHARGE', syndrome, patients, lag, far, behind, the, description, of, 'other,', more, easily, observed, defects])].

[sujeto(['Chromodomain-helicase', 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 5, '(', 'CHD5)', is, an, important, tumor, suppressor, gene, deleted, from, 1, p36])].
[sujeto(['Treatment', of, 'SY5Y', cells, with, 13, cRA]), verbo([caused]), complemento([upregulation, of, 'CHD5', expression, in, a, 'time-', and, 'dose-dependent', manner, '(', 1, ',', 5, ',', or, 10, μM, for, 7, or, 12, 'days)', and, also, induced, neuronal, differentiation])].

[sujeto(['Great', progress]), verbo([has]), complemento([recently, been, achieved, in, the, understanding, of, the, genomic, alterations, driving, chronic, lymphocytic, leukemia, '(', 'CLL)'])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, genetic, and, functional, characterization, of, somatic, mutations, affecting, the, chromatin, remodeler, 'CHD2,', one, of, the, most, frequently, mutated, genes, in, 'CLL', '(', 5.3, '%', ')', and, in, monoclonal, 'B', lymphocytosis, '(', 'MBL,', 7, '%', ')', ',', a, 'B-cell', expansion, that, can, evolve, to, 'CLL'])].

[sujeto(['The', minichromosome, maintenance, complex, '(', 'MCM)', proteins, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, processive, 'DNA', replication, and, are, a, target, of, 'S-phase', checkpoints])].
[sujeto(['Upon', entry, in, 'S', 'phase,', the, helicase, is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([and, opens, the, 'DNA', duplex, to, recruit, 'DNA', polymerases, at, the, replication, fork])].

[sujeto(['In', the, 'brain,', 'α-2', agonists]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, induce, the, phosphorylation, of, cyclic, 'AMP', 'response-element', binding, protein, '(', 'CREB),', a, transcription, factor, necessary, for, neuron, survival])].

[sujeto(['Histologic', analysis, showed, preserved, cytoarchitecture, and]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([neuronal, injury, in, the, treatment, group, when, compared, with, ischemic, controls])].
[sujeto([5, ')']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'B-cell', lymphoma, 2, and, 'brain-derived', neurotrophic, factor, expression, and, protein, kinase, 'B', and, 'CREB', phosphorylation, with, 'α-2a', adrenergic, agonist, pretreatment])].
[sujeto(['This', relationship, was, associated, with, an]), verbo([increased]), complemento([phosphorylation, of, protein, kinase, 'B', and, 'CREB', and, subsequent, 'up-regulation', of, antiapoptotic, factor, 'B-cell', lymphoma, 2, and, 'brain-derived', neurotrophic, factor])].
[sujeto(['We', investigated, whether, 'δ-opioid', receptor, '(', 'DOR)-induced', neuroprotection]), verbo([involves]), complemento([the, 'brain-derived', neurotrophic, factor, '(', 'BDNF)', pathway])].
[sujeto(['The', results, showed, 'that:', '(', 1, ')', 1, -, day, hypoxia, had, no, appreciable, effect, on, 'BDNF', 'expression,', while, 3, -, and, 10, -, day, hypoxia, progressively]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['BDNF', 'expression,', resulting, in, 37.3, '%', reduction, '(', p, &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')', after, 10, -, day, 'exposure;', '(', 2, ')', 'DOR', activation, with, 'UFP-512', '(', 1, 'mg/kg,', i])].
[sujeto([',', 'daily)', partially, reversed, the, 'hypoxia-induced', reduction, of, 'BDNF', expression, in, the, 3, -, or, 10, -, day, exposed, 'cortex;', '(', 3, ')', 'DOR', activation, partially, reversed, the, 'hypoxia-induced', reduction, in, functional, 'TrkB', '(', 140, -, 'kDa)', and, attenuated, 'hypoxia-induced']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, truncated, 'TrkB', '(', 90, -, 'kDa)', in, the, 3, -, or, 10, -, day, hypoxic, 'cortex;', and, '(', 4, ')', prolonged, hypoxia, '(', 10, 'days)', significantly, increased, 'TNF-α', level, and, decreased, 'CD11b', expression, in, the, 'cortex,', which, was, completely, reversed, following, 'DOR', 'activation;', and, '(', 5, ')', there, was, no, significant, change, in, pCREB, and, 'pATF-1', levels, in, the, hypoxic, cortex])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, prolonged, hypoxia, 'down-regulates', 'BDNF-TrkB', signaling]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, an, increase, in, 'TNF-α', in, the, 'cortex,', while, 'DOR', activation, 'up-regulates', 'BDNF-TrkB', signaling, thereby, decreasing, 'TNF-α', levels, in, the, hypoxic, cortex])].
[sujeto(['Cyclic', 'AMP', response, element]), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'CREB)', is, required, for, swim, 'stress-induced', reinstatement, of, cocaine, conditioned, place, preference])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, role, of, 'CREB', in, other, 'stress-induced', reinstatement, models]), verbo([has]), complemento([not, been, examined])].
[sujeto(['To', determine, whether, 'CREB', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([across, different, stressors, we, examined, the, ability, of, restraint, to, elicit, reinstatement, of, 'cocaine-conditioned', place, preference, in, 'wild-type', and, 'CREBαΔ', mutant, mice])].
[sujeto(['While', 'CREB', is, necessary, for, swim, 'stress-elicited', zif268, expression, within, the, nucleus, accubmens, '(', 'NAc)', shell, and, prelimbic, cortex, '(', 'PrL),', 'restraint-stress-elicited', comparable]), verbo([increases]), complemento([in, zif268, expression, within, these, regions, in, both, 'wild-type', and, 'CREBαΔ', mutant, mice])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, not, all, stressors, engage, the, same, circuits, or, molecular, mechanisms, to, elicit, reinstatement, behavior])].
[sujeto(['Owing', to, its, initial, asymptomatic, 'nature,', osteoporosis, is, often, detected, only, after, the, patient]), verbo([has]), complemento([sustained, significant, bone, loss, or, a, fracture])].
[sujeto(['Hence,', anabolic, therapeutics, that]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento([bone, accrual, is, in, high, clinical, demand])].

[sujeto(['PGE(2)', coupling, through, 'EP2']), verbo([activated]), complemento([the, transcription, factor, inducible, cAMP, early, repressor, '(', 'ICER),', whereas, coupling, through, 'EP4', receptors, activated, the, cyclic, 'AMP-responsive', 'element-binding', protein, '(', 'CREB)'])].

[sujeto(['A', novel, half, 'CRE', '(', 167, 'CRE)', and, a, composite, 'NFAT1-AP1-like', site, in, the, 'IL-8', promoter]), verbo([participated]), complemento([in, binding, and, complex, formation, as, confirmed, by, mutagenesis, and, expression, studies])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([developed, a, protein, knockdown, technology, using, hybrid, small, molecules, designed, as, conjugates, of, a, ligand, for, the, target, protein, and, a, ligand, for, ubiquitin, ligase, cellular, inhibitor, of, apoptosis, protein, 1, '(', 'cIAP1)'])].
[sujeto(['However,', this, technology]), verbo([has]), complemento([several, limitations])].

[sujeto(['In', this, 'system,']), verbo([target]), complemento([proteins, are, fused, with, 'HaloTag', to, provide, a, common, binding, site, for, a, degradation, inducer])].
[sujeto(['We', designed, and, synthesized, small, molecules, consisting, of, alkyl, chloride, as, the, 'HaloTag-binding', degradation, 'inducer,', which]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, 'HaloTag,', linked, to, 'BE04', '(', ')', ',', which, binds, to, cIAP1])].
[sujeto(['Using', this, 'system,', we, successfully, knocked, down, 'HaloTag-fused', cAMP, responsive, element]), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 1, '(', 'HaloTag-CREB1)', and, 'HaloTag-fused', 'c-jun', '(', 'HaloTag-c-jun),', which, are, 'ligand-unknown', nuclear, 'proteins,', in, living, cells])].

[sujeto(['These', results, indicate, that, 'CDCA8', is, transcriptionally]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, hESCs, and, cancer, cells])].

[sujeto(['NF-Y']), verbo([binding]), complemento([is, positively, correlated, with, promoter, activities, in, different, cell, types])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', the, 'NF-YA', 'subunit,']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, the, 'promoter,', is, primarily, a, short, isoform, in, hESCs, and, a, long, isoform, in, cancer, 'cells,', indicating, a, different, activation, mechanism, of, the, 'CDCA8', transcription, between, hESCs, and, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['Finally,']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['CDCA8', promoter, activities, by, 'NF-Y', overexpression, and, reduced, 'CDCA8', transcription, by, 'NF-Y', knockdown, further, verified, that, 'NF-Y', is, a, positive, regulator, of, 'CDCA8', transcription])].
[sujeto(['Our', study, unearths, the, molecular, mechanisms, underlying, the, activation, of, 'CDCA8', expression, in, hESCs, and, cancer, 'cells,', which]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, better, understanding, of, its, biological, functions])].
[sujeto(['The', 'cytokine/chemokine', profile, of, serum, samples, before, and, after, surgery, demonstrated, that, interleukin, '(', 'IL)-6', had]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([by, the, greatest, percentage])].
[sujeto(['The', 'EWSR1-CREB1', fusion, gene, detected, in, the, tumor]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, continuous, activation, of, 'CREB1', and, 'IL-6', 'production,', because, the, promoter, region, of, 'IL-6', has, a, 'CREB', binding, site])].
[sujeto(['Very', recently, a, new, designation, of, &, 'quot;Malignant', 'Neuroectodermal', 'Gastrointestinal', 'Tumor&quot;']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, proposed, for, an, aggressive, form, of, neuroectodermal, tumor, with, features, similar, to, that, of, 'Clear', 'Cell', 'Sarcoma', of, 'Soft', 'Tissue,', however, without, a, melanocytic, differentiation])].

[sujeto(['They', occur, mainly, in, young, and, 'middle-aged', 'adults,', and]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, poor, prognosis, with, a, high, rate, of, liver, and, lymphnode, metastases])].

[sujeto(['We', finally]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, this, case, might, be, a, further, evidence, of, a, link, between, these, two, entities])].
[sujeto(['Major', depressive, disorder, is, a, common, chronic, emotional, 'disorder,', and, cyclic, adenosine, monophosphate, response, element]), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 1, '(', 'CREB1)', is, hypothesized, to, play, a, role, in, its, pathogenesis])].

[sujeto(['Calbindin-D28k', '(', 'CB),', one, of, the, major, 'calcium-binding', and, buffering, 'proteins,']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, critical, role, in, preventing, a, neuronal, death, as, well, as, maintaining, calcium, homeostasis])].

[sujeto(['Arginine', vasopressin, '(', 'AVP)', is, a, neurohypophysial, hormone]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([hydromineral, homeostasis])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, the, mRNA, encoding, cAMP, responsive, 'element-binding', 'protein-3', 'like-1', '(', 'CREB3L1),', a, transcription, factor, of, the, 'CREB/activating', transcription, factor, '(', 'ATF)', 'family,']), verbo([increases]), complemento([in, expression, in, parallel, with, 'AVP', expression, in, supraoptic, nuclei, '(', 'SONs)', and, paraventicular, nuclei, '(', 'PVNs)', of, dehydrated, '(', 'DH)', and, 'salt-loaded', '(', 'SL)', 'rats,', compared, with, euhydrated, '(', 'EH)', controls])].

[sujeto(['Recent', evidence, also]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, it, may, act, as, an, agonist, in, brain, tissue])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([reported]), complemento([previously, that, 'TX', enhanced, the, expression, and, function, of, glutamate, transporter, 1, '(', 'GLT-1)', in, rat, 'astrocytes,', an, effect, that, was, mediated, by, 'TGF-α'])].

[sujeto(['cAMP-response-element-binding', protein, '(', 'CREB)', signaling]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, to, be, associated, with, cancer, development, and, poor, clinical, outcome, in, various, types, of, cancer])].
[sujeto(['However,', it, remains, to, be, elucidated, whether, 'CREB', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, breast, cancer, development, and, osteotropism])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, metastatic, 'MDA-MB-231', breast, cancer, cells, exhibited, higher, 'CREB', expression, than, did, 'non-metastatic', 'MCF-7', cells, and, that, 'CREB', expression, was, further, increased, by, several, soluble, factors, linked, to, cancer, 'progression,', such, as, 'IL-1,', 'IGF-1,', and, 'TGF-beta'])].

[sujeto(['TNFalpha', is, an, 'inflammatory-related', cytokine, that]), verbo([has]), complemento([inhibitory, effects, on, 'gonadotropin-', and, 'cAMP-stimulated', steroidogenesis, and, folliculogenesis])].
[sujeto(['Because', ovulation, is, an, inflammatory, reaction, and, 'TNF', specifically]), verbo([induces]), complemento([serum, amyloid, 'A3', '(', 'SAA3)', in, mouse, granulosa, 'cells,', the, effect, of, cAMP, on, 'TNF-induced', 'SAA3', promoter, 'activity,', mRNA, and, protein, was, investigated])].
[sujeto(['TNF']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['SAA3', promoter, 'activity,', 'mRNA,', and, 'protein,', which, were, further, increased, by, cAMP])].

[sujeto(['The', combination, of, 'TNF', and, cAMP]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['C/EBPbeta', protein, above, that, induced, by, 'TNF', or, cAMP, alone])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', cAMP, in, combination, with, 'TNF', specifically]), verbo([induced]), complemento(['C/EBPbeta', 'protein,', leading, to, enhanced, 'SAA3', expression, but, requiring, 'NF-kappaB', in, mouse, granulose, cells])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', like, 'TNF,', 'SAA']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['cAMP-induced', estradiol, accumulation, and, 'CYP19', levels])].
[sujeto(['Neuropeptide', 'Y', '(', 'NPY)', and, 'NPY', receptors, are, widely]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, various, organs, and, cell, types, and, have, been, shown, to, have, pleiotropic, functions])].
[sujeto(['We', now, show, that, undifferentiated, hESCs, primarily]), verbo([express]), complemento(['NPY', and, its, 'Y1', and, 'Y5', receptors])].
[sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([provide]), complemento([compelling, evidence, that, exogenous, 'NPY', supports, the, 'long-term', growth, of, undifferentiated, hESCs, in, the, absence, of, feeder, cell, factors, using, only, knockout, serum, replacement, media])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, indicate, that, both, 'Y1', and, 'Y5', receptors, appear, to, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, 'NPY-mediated', activation, of, 'AKT/protein', kinase, 'B', and, extracellular, 'signal-regulated', kinase, 1, /, 2, '(', 'ERK1/2)', in, hESCs])].

[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([the, first, evidence, that, 'NPY', and, its, 'Y1', and, 'Y5', receptors, have, potential, role, in, maintaining, hESC, 'self-renewal', and, pluripotency])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([confirmed, that, the, 'NO', donor, '(', +, /, -, ')', -, 'S-nitroso-N-acetylpenicillamine', '(', 'SNAP)', stabilizes, the, transactive, form, of, 'hypoxia-inducible', 'factor-1alpha', '(', 'HIF-1alpha),', leading, to, the, induction, of, 'HIF-1alpha', target, genes, such, as, vascular, endothelial, growth, factor, and, carbonic, anhydrase, 9])].
[sujeto(['Activation', of, 'HIF-1alpha', should]), verbo([require]), complemento([inhibition, of, the, dual, system, that, keeps, it, inactive])].
[sujeto(['One', is, 'ubiquitination,', which, is]), verbo([triggered]), complemento([by, hydroxylation, of, 'HIF-1alpha-proline', and, the, subsequent, binding, of, 'E3', ubiquitin, 'ligase,', the, von, 'Hippel', 'Lindau', '(', 'VHL)', protein])].
[sujeto(['The', other, is, hydroxylation, of, 'HIF-1alpha-asparagine,', which, reduces, the, affinity, of, 'HIF-1alpha', for, its, 'coactivator,', cAMP, responsive, element]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['protein/p300'])].
[sujeto(['We', examined, the, effects, of, the, 'NO', donor, 'SNAP', on, proline, and, asparagine, hydroxylation, of, 'HIF-1alpha', peptides, by, measuring, the, activities, of, the, corresponding, 'enzymes,', 'HIF-1alpha-specific', proline, hydroxylase, 2, '(', 'PHD2)', and, the, 'HIF-1alpha-specific', asparagine, 'hydroxylase,', designated, factor]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento(['HIF-1alpha', '(', 'FIH-1),', respectively])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, 'SNAP', did, not, prevent, 'PHD2', from, hydroxylating, the, proline, of, 'HIF-1alpha'])].
[sujeto(['The', fact, that, the, absence, of, cysteine, 520, of, 'HIF-1alpha', abolishes, its, responsiveness, to, 'SNAP']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, this, residue, mediates, the, inhibition, by, 'SNAP', of, the, interaction, between, 'VHL', and, 'HIF-1alpha,', presumably, by, 'S-nitrosylation', of, 'HIF-1alpha'])].
[sujeto(['Un-like', 'PHD2,', asparagine, hydroxylation, by, 'FIH-1', was, directly]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, 'SNAP,', but, again, only, when, reducing, agents, were, limiting])].
[sujeto(['Substitution', of, cysteine, 800, of, 'HIF-1alpha', with, alanine, failed, to, reverse, the, inhibitory, effects, of, 'SNAP', on, asparagine, 'hydroxylation,', implying, that, 'FIH-1,', not, its, substrate, 'HIF-1alpha,', is]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, 'SNAP'])].
[sujeto(['Spinal', muscular, atrophy, '(', 'SMA)', is]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, homozygous, deletion, of, the, 'SMN1', gene, in, approximately, 96, '%', of, cases])].
[sujeto(['Four', percent, of, 'SMA', patients]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, combination, of, the, deletion, or, conversion, on, one, allele, and, an, intragenic, mutation, on, the, second, one])].
[sujeto(['A188S', were]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, two, 'SMAI', patients, and, were, not, detected, previously])].
[sujeto(['Among', our, 'SMA', patients, with, a, 'SMN1', homozygous, 'deletion,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([a, family, with, two, 'patients:', the, son, with, 'SMAII', possesses, 3, 'SMN2', copies, and, the, nearly, asymptomatic, father, has, a, homozygous, deletion, of, 'SMN1', exon, 7, and, carries, 4, 'SMN2', copies])].
[sujeto(['Generally,', our, results, illustrate, that, an]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['SMN2', gene, copy, number, is, associated, with, a, milder, 'SMA', phenotype])].
[sujeto(['In', 'turn,', regulation, of, transcript, abundance, might, be]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, transcription, factors])].

[sujeto(['We', thus]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, signaling, pathways, activated, by, dehydration, in, 'MCNs', mediate, transcription, factor, gene, 'activation,', 'which,', in, 'turn,', regulate, target, genes, that, mediate, 'HNS', remodeling])].
[sujeto(['Spinal', muscular, atrophy, '(', 'SMA)', is, an, autosomal, recessive, hereditary, disorder]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutations, of, the, 'SMN1', gene])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, present, a, case]), verbo([report]), complemento([of, a, father, and, son, suffering, from, 'SMA'])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([son]), complemento([suffers, from, 'SMA', type, 2, ',', with, onset, at, about, 13, months, of, age])].
[sujeto(['The', purpose, of, the, present, paper, was, to, determine, whether, the, brief, exposure, of, neurons, to, antipsychotic, drugs, is, associated, with, the, activation, of, extracellular, 'signal-regulated', kinases, '(', 'ERK)', and, cyclic, adenosine, 3, '\'', ',', 5, '\'', -, monophosphate, '(', 'cAMP)', response, element, '(', 'CRE)']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'CREB)'])].
[sujeto(['The', activation, of, 'ERK-1/2', and, 'CREB', can, be, monitored, by, immunoblotting, with, antibodies, that, specifically]), verbo([recognize]), complemento(['p-ERK-1/2', '(', phosphorylated, on, 'Thr-202', and, 'Tyr-204)', and, 'p-CREB', '(', phosphorylated, on, 'Ser-133)'])].
[sujeto(['In', hippocampal, neuron, cultures, at, 25, days, in, vitro, '(', 'DIV),', the, levels, of, 'ERK', and, 'CREB', phosphorylation, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([after, treatment, with, haloperidol, '(', 50, 'nmol/L)', and, risperidone, '(', 50, 'nmol/L),', except, when, risperidone, was, administered, at, the, 'p-CREB', level])].
[sujeto(['However,', risperidone, also]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, 'p-CREB', level, at, an, insignificant, rate, in, the, same, direction])].
[sujeto(['At', 10, 'DIV,', none, of, the, antipsychotic, drugs, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, level, of, 'ERK', and, 'CREB', phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['Risperidone', significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, level, of, 'ERK-1/2', 'phosphorylation,', but, not, the, level, of, 'CREB', phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', these, results, demonstrate, that, different, antipsychotic, drugs, could]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, different, profiles, of, 'ERK', and, 'CREB', phosphorylation, in, neurons])].
[sujeto(['Lithium']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, demonstrated, to, increase, neurogenesis, in, the, dentate, gyrus, of, rodent, hippocampus])].
[sujeto(['Lithium', chloride, '(', 1, -, 3, 'mM)', produced, a, significant]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, the, number, of, bromodeoxyuridine, '(', 'BrdU)-positive', cells, in, 'high-density', 'cultures,', but, did, not, increase, clonal, size, in, 'low-density', cultures])].

[sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, proposed, that, endothelial, integrity, can, play, an, active, regulatory, role, in, the, extravasation, of, tumor, cells, during, cancer, metastasis])].
[sujeto(['Since', polychlorinated, biphenyls, '(', 'PCBs)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, cause, endothelial, cell, activation, or, injury, and, to, lead, to, various, diseases, that, involve, dysfunction, of, the, vascular, 'endothelium,', the, present, study, was, designed, to, determine, the, cellular, and, molecular, signaling, mechanisms, of, 'PCB-induced', apoptosis, in, human, microvascular, endothelial, cells, '(', 'HMEC-1)'])].

[sujeto(['To', elucidate, the, molecular, signaling, mechanisms, of, 'PCB', 104, -]), verbo([induced]), complemento([apoptotic, cell, death, in, human, microvascular, endothelial, 'cells,', the, present, study, focused, on, the, effects, of, acute, exposure, of, 'PCB', 104, on, the, activation, of, several, transcription, 'factors,', such, as, cAMP, responsive, 'element-binding', protein, '(', 'CREB),', activator, 'protein-1', '(', 'AP-1),', nuclear, 'factor-kappaB', '(', 'NF-kappaB),', and, signal, transducers, and, activators, of, transcription, '(', 'STAT1),', which, have, been, known, to, play, a, pivotal, role, in, the, molecular, signaling, cascades, for, the, induction, of, apoptosis])].

[sujeto(['Determining', how, histone, acetylation, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([is, vital, for, treating, the, many, diseases, associated, with, its, 'misregulation,', including, heart, 'disease,', neurological, 'disorders,', and, cancer])].

[sujeto(['Replica', exchange, molecular, dynamics, simulations, are, performed, on, the, protein, complex, 'pKID-KIX', to, understand, the, effects, of, macromolecular, crowding, on, coupled, folding, and]), verbo([binding]), complemento([events])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, protein, flexibility, has, little, effect, on, the, thermodynamics, of, the, 'pKID-KIX', binding, '(', with, respect, to, 'bulk)', for, repulsive, and, weakly, attractive, 'protein-crowder', interactions])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', the, mechanism, of, coupled, folding, and]), verbo([binding]), complemento([observed, in, bulk, remains, unchanged, under, highly, crowded, conditions, over, a, broad, range, of, 'protein-crowder', interaction, strengths])].
[sujeto(['Also,', strong, 'protein-crowder', attractive, interactions, can, significantly, stabilize, intermediate, states]), verbo([involving]), complemento([partial, contact, between, pKID, and, 'KIX', domains])].
[sujeto(['Rubinstein-Taybi', syndrome, '(', 'RSTS)', is, one, of, the, neurodevelopmental, disorders]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutations, of, epigenetic, genes])].
[sujeto(['To', 'date,', there]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, few, reports, on, the, structural, abnormalities, of, the, brain, in, 'RSTS', patients])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', there, are, no]), verbo([reports]), complemento([on, the, analysis, of, 'CREBBP', mutations, in, 'Korean', 'RSTS', patients])].

[sujeto(['Mutations', in, two, 'genes,', 'CREBBP', and, 'EP300,', encoding, two, homologous, transcriptional, 'co-activators,']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, identified, in, '˜55%', and, '˜3-5%', of, affected, 'individuals,', respectively])].

[sujeto(['Beyond', the, expansion, of, the, 'RSTS-EP300-mutated', 'cohort,', this, study, indicates, that, 'EP300-related', 'RSTS', cases, occur, more, frequently, than, previously, thought, '(', '˜8%', vs, 3, -, 5, '%', ')', ;, 'furthermore,', the, characterization, of, novel, 'EP300', mutations, in, 'RSTS', patients, will]), verbo([enhance]), complemento([the, clinical, practice, and, 'genotype-phenotype', correlations])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, a, 'Moroccan', family, with, two, children, with, 'RSTS', and, apparently, unaffected, parents])].
[sujeto(['This', concept, is, very, important, because, it, complicates, genetic, counseling, of, this, family, who]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, risk, of, recurrence, of, the, mutation, in, subsequent, pregnancies])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([a, girl, with, 'Rubinstein-Taybi', syndrome, '(', 'RSTS)', who, was, found, to, have, copy, number, loss, on, 16, p13])].
[sujeto(['She']), verbo([has]), complemento([developmental, delay, and, other, features, of, 'RSTS', including, downslanting, palpebral, 'fissures,', a, prominent, nose, with, the, nasal, septum, extending, below, the, alae, 'nasi,', broad, thumbs, and, big, 'toes,', postaxial, polydactyly, of, the, right, foot, and, constipation, from, birth])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([the, junction, sequence, across, the, breakpoint, region, for, a, microdeletion, in, 'RSTS'])].
[sujeto(['The', sequencing, results, also, showed, that, the, deletion, was, 81.4, kb]), verbo([involving]), complemento([three, genes, 'DNASE', 1, ',', 'TRAP', 1, ',', and, 'CREBBP'])].
[sujeto(['Rubinstein-Taybi', syndrome, '(', 'RSTS)', is, a, congenital, neurodevelopmental, disorder, defined, by, postnatal, growth, 'deficiency,', characteristic, skeletal, abnormalities, and, mental, retardation, and]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutations, in, the, genes, encoding, for, the, transcriptional, 'co-activators', with, intrinsic, lysine, acetyltransferase, '(', 'KAT)', activity, 'CBP', and, p300])].
[sujeto(['Previous', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, neuronal, histone, acetylation, is, reduced, in, mouse, models, of, 'RSTS'])].
[sujeto(['The', most, severe, defects, were, observed, in, the, lines, carrying, the, whole, deletion, of, the, 'CREBBP', gene, and, the, truncating, 'mutation,', both]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, a, haploinsufficiency, state])].
[sujeto(['The', 'authors\'', results, extend, to, humans, the, seminal, observations, in, 'RSTS', mouse, models, and, point, to, histone, acetylation, 'defects,', mainly]), verbo([involving]), complemento(['H2B', and, 'H2A,', as, relevant, molecular, markers, of, the, disease])].
[sujeto(['Studies', in, mouse, models, for, 'RSTS', first]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([a, direct, role, for, 'CBP', and, histone, acetylation, in, cognition, and, memory])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, took, advantage, of, the, genetic, tools, for, generating, mice, in, which, the, 'CBP', gene, is, specifically, deleted, in, postmitotic, principal, neurons, of, the, forebrain, to, investigate, the, consequences, of, the]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'CBP', in, the, adult, brain])].

[sujeto(['Overall,', our, study]), verbo([provides]), complemento([novel, insights, into, 'RSTS', etiology, and, clarifies, some, of, the, standing, questions, concerning, the, role, of, 'CBP', and, histone, acetylation, in, 'activity-driven', gene, 'expression,', memory, 'formation,', and, neurodegeneration])].
[sujeto(['The', first, case, is, a, 3, -, 'year-old', female, with, an, exonic, deletion, of, the, 'EP300', gene, who]), verbo([has]), complemento([classic, facial, features, of, 'RSTS', without, the, thumb, and, great, toe, 'anomalies,', consistent, with, the, milder, skeletal, phenotype, that, has, been, described, in, other, 'RSTS', cases, with, 'EP300', mutations])].

[sujeto(['Mutant', 'NT2', cells, lacking, the, 'CREB,', 'BROMO', and, 'HAT', domains, '(', 'CB-HAT)', were, highly, proliferative, and, showed, limited, 'differentiation;', while, mutant, 'NT2', cells]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['CREBBP', lacking, the, 'HAT', and, 'CTAD', domains, '(', 'HAT-CT)', are, proliferation, deficient, and, differentiate, rapidly, albeit, generating, an, insufficient, number, of, neurons])].

[sujeto(['The', homeodomain, transcription, 'factor,', 'T-cell', leukemia, 3, '(', 'Tlx3),', functions, as, the, master, neuronal, fate, regulator, by, instructively]), verbo([promoting]), complemento([the, specification, of, glutamatergic, excitatory, neurons, and, suppressing, the, specification, of, 'gamma-aminobutyric', acid, '(', 'GABAergic)', neurons])].

[sujeto(['NF-κB', pathways, are, also]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, cell, 'adhesion,', 'differentiation,', 'proliferation,', 'autophagy,', 'senescence,', and, protection, against, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['The', deregulation, of, 'NF-κB', activity, is]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, a, number, of, disease, 'states,', including, 'cancer,', 'arthritis,', chronic, 'inflammation,', 'asthma,', neurodegenerative, 'diseases,', and, heart, disease])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, mechanism, by, which, 'Sec6']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, 'NF-κB', signaling, pathway, is, unknown])].
[sujeto(['We', demonstrated, that, 'Sec6', knockdown]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, degradation, of, 'IκBα', and, delayed, the, 'nucleus-cytoplasm', translocation, of, p65, in, 'HeLa', cells, transfected, with, 'Sec6', siRNAs, after, treatment, with, tumor, necrosis, factor, alpha, '(', 'TNF-α)'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, p65, and, cAMP, response, element, binding, protein, '(', 'CREB)', binding, protein, '(', 'CBP)', or, p300, decreased, and, 'NF-κB', related, genes, which, were, inhibitors, of, 'NF-κB', alpha, '(', 'IκBα),', 'A20,', 'B', cell, lymphoma, protein, 2, '(', 'Bcl-2),', and, monocyte, chemoattractant, 'protein-1', '(', 'MCP-1)', were, low, in, cells, transfected, with, 'Sec6', siRNAs, in, response, to, 'TNF-α', stimulation])].
[sujeto(['Sec6', knockdown]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, expression, of, p90RSKs, and, the, phosphorylation, of, 'ERK', or, p90RSK1, at, 'Ser380', or, 'IκBα', at, 'Ser32'])].
[sujeto(['The', present, study]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, 'Sec6', regulates, 'NF-κB', transcriptional, activity, via, the, control, of, the, phosphorylation, of, 'IκBα,', 'p90RSK1,', and, 'ERK'])].
[sujeto(['CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', and, p300, are, transcriptional, coactivators]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, numerous, biological, processes, that, affect, cell, 'growth,', 'transformation,', 'differentiation,', and, development])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, of, the, involvement, of, 'homeodomain-interacting', protein, kinase, 2, '(', 'HIPK2)', in, the, regulation, of, 'CBP', activity])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, 'HIPK2']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, and, phosphorylates, several, regions, of, 'CBP'])].
[sujeto(['However,', our, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'HIPK2', activates, 'CBP', mainly, by, counteracting, the, repressive, action, of, cell, cycle, regulatory, domain, 1, '(', 'CRD1),', located, between, amino, acids, 977, and, 1076, ',', independently, of, 'CBP', phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings, thus, highlight, a, complex, regulation, of, 'CBP', activity, by, 'HIPK2,', which, might, be, relevant, for, the, control, of, specific, sets, of]), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, involved, in, cellular, 'proliferation,', differentiation, and, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Mutations', of, the, 'Wnt/β-catenin', signaling, pathway, initiate, the, majority, of, 'CRC', 'cases,', and, we]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, hyperactivation, of, this, pathway, by, butyrate, and, other, 'HDACis', promotes, 'CRC', cell, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Improvement', of, 'CRC', prevention, and, therapy]), verbo([requires]), complemento([a, better, understanding, of, the, alterations, in, 'Wnt', signaling, and, gene, expression, that, underlie, neoplastic, 'progression,', stem, cell, 'fate,', and, the, development, of, resistance, to, butyrate, and, clinically, relevant, 'HDACis'])].
[sujeto(['Detailed', knowledge, of, how, 'CBP-', and, p300]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([colonic, cell, physiology, may, lead, to, new, approaches, for, 'anti-CRC', prevention, and, 'therapeutics,', particularly, with, respect, to, combinatorial, therapy, of, 'CBP/p300', inhibitors, with, 'HDACis'])].
[sujeto(['Intrinsically', disordered, proteins, '(', 'IDPs)', frequently, function, in, protein, interaction, networks, that]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([crucial, cellular, signaling, pathways])].
[sujeto(['Many', 'IDPs', undergo, transitions, from, disordered, conformational, ensembles, to, folded, structures, upon]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, their, cellular, targets])].
[sujeto(['Several', possible]), verbo([binding]), complemento([mechanisms, for, coupled, folding, and, binding, have, been, 'identified:', folding, of, the, 'IDP', after, association, with, the, target, '(', &, 'quot;induced', 'fit&quot;),', or, binding, of, a, prefolded, state, in, the, conformational, ensemble, of, the, 'IDP', to, the, target, protein, '(', &, 'quot;conformational', 'selection&quot;),', or, some, combination, of, these, two, extremes])].
[sujeto(['The', interaction, of, the, intrinsically, disordered, phosphorylated, 'kinase-inducible', domain, '(', 'pKID)', of, the, 'cAMP-response', element]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['(', 'CREB)', protein, with, the, 'KIX', domain, of, a, general, transcriptional, coactivator, 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', provides, an, example, of, the, 'induced-fit', mechanism])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, by, 'NMR', relaxation, dispersion, experiments, that, a, different, intrinsically, disordered, 'ligand,', the, transactivation, domain, of, the, transcription, factor, 'c-Myb,']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'KIX', at, the, same, site, as, pKID, but, via, a, different, binding, mechanism, that, involves, elements, of, conformational, selection, and, induced, fit])].
[sujeto(['In', contrast, to, 'pKID,', the, 'c-Myb', activation, domain]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, strong, propensity, for, spontaneous, helix, formation, in, its, 'N-terminal', 'region,', which, binds, to, 'KIX', in, a, predominantly, folded, conformation])].
[sujeto(['The', 'C-terminal', region, of, 'c-Myb', exhibits, a, much, smaller, helical, propensity, and, likely, folds, via, an, 'induced-fit', process, after]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'KIX'])].
[sujeto(['We', propose, that, the, intrinsic, secondary, structure, propensities, of, pKID, and, 'c-Myb', determine, their]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['mechanisms,', consistent, with, their, functions, as, inducible, and, constitutive, transcriptional, activators])].
[sujeto(['The', 'BCNT', '(', 'Bucentaur)', superfamily, is, classified, by, an, uncharacteristic]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([sequence, of, '∼80', amino, acids, '(', 'aa)', at, the, 'C-terminus,', 'BCNT-C', '(', the, conserved, 'C-terminal', region, of, 'Bcnt/Cfdp1)'])].
[sujeto(['To', characterize, this, mobility, discrepancy, and, the, effects, of, 'post-translational', modifications, '(', 'PTMs),', we]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([various, deleted, 'His-Bcnt', in, 'E'])].
[sujeto([coli, and, 'HEK', cells, and]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, an, acidic, stretch, in, the, 'N-terminal', region, is, a, main, cause, of, the, gel, shift])].
[sujeto(['Exogenous', 'BCNT/CFDP1', constitutively]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'HEK', clones, appears, as, a, doublet, at, 49, and, 47, &, 'nbsp;kDa,', slower, than, the, protein, expressed, in, 'Escherichia', coli, but, faster, than, the, endogenous, protein, on, 'SDS/PAGE'])].
[sujeto(['Together', with, experiments]), verbo([involving]), complemento([treatment, with, phosphatases, and, 'Ser(250)', 'substitutions,', the, results, indicate, that, the, complex, behaviour, of, 'Bcnt/Cfdp1', on, 'SDS/PAGE', is, caused, mainly, by, an, acidic, stretch, in, the, 'N-terminal', region, and, 'Ser(250)', phosphorylation, in, 'BCNT-C'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'Bcnt/Cfdp1', is, acetylated, 'in&nbsp;vitro', by, 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', and, four, lysine, residues, including, 'Lys(268)', in, 'BCNT-C', are, also, acetylated, 'in&nbsp;vivo,']), verbo([revealed]), complemento([a, protein, regulated, at, multiple, levels])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, demonstrate, that, sumoylation, of, 'BMAL1']), verbo([mediates]), complemento([the, rapid, activation, of, 'CLOCK-BMAL1', by, 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', in, nuclear, foci, and, also, the, resetting, of, the, circadian, clock])].
[sujeto(['Under', physiological, 'conditions,', a, bimolecular, fluorescence, 'complementation-based', fluorescence, resonance, energy, transfer, '(', 'BiFC-FRET)', assay, revealed, that, 'CLOCK-BMAL1', rapidly, dimerized, and, formed, a, ternary, complex, with, 'CBP', in, discrete]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([foci, in, response, to, serum, stimuli])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, formation, of, this, ternary, complex, requires, sumoylation, of, 'BMAL1', by, 'SUMO3'])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', molecular, inhibition, of, 'BMAL1', sumoylation, abrogated, acute, 'Per1', transcription, and, severely, dampened, the, circadian, gene, oscillation]), verbo([triggered]), complemento([by, clock, synchronization, stimuli])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, sumoylation, plays, a, critical, role, in, the, spatiotemporal, 'co-activation', of, 'CLOCK-BMAL1', by, 'CBP', for, 'immediate-early', 'Per', induction, and, the, resetting, of, the, circadian, clock])].
[sujeto(['Targeting', mTOR, combined, with, endocrine, therapy]), verbo([has]), complemento([shown, clinical, 'utility;', 'however,', a, negative, feedback, loop, exists, downstream, of, 'PI3K/AKT/mTOR'])].
[sujeto(['AZD5363']), verbo([caused]), complemento([a, 'dose-dependent', decrease, in, proliferation, in, all, cell, lines, tested, '(', 'GI50', &, 'lt;', 500, 'nmol/L)', except, 'HCC1428', and, 'HCC1428-LTED'])].
[sujeto(['AZD5363', resensitized, 'TamR', cells, to, tamoxifen, and]), verbo([acted]), complemento([synergistically, with, fulvestrant])].
[sujeto(['AZD5363']), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['p-AKT/mTOR', targets, leading, to, a, reduction, in, 'ERα-mediated', transcription, in, a, 'context-specific', manner, and, concomitant, decrease, in, recruitment, of, 'ER', and, 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', to, estrogen, response, elements, located, on, the, 'TFF1,', 'PGR,', and, 'GREB1', promoters])].
[sujeto(['These', data, support, the, combination, of, 'AZD5363', with, fulvestrant, as, a, potential, therapy, for, breast, cancer, that, is, sensitive, or, resistant, to, 'E-deprivation', or, tamoxifen, and, that]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['AKT', is, a, determinant, of, 'response,', supporting, the, need, for, clinical, evaluation])].
[sujeto(['CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', is, a, lysine, acetyltransferase, that]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([transcription, by, acetylating, histone, and, 'non-histone', substrates])].
[sujeto(['To', observe, the, effects, of, moxibustion, on, factors, related, with, apoptosis, of, myocardial, cells, after, sports, fatigue, in, mice, as, well, as, the, relationship, among, histone, acetyltransferases, p300, '(', 'p300),', 'CREB']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'CBP)', and, cell, apoptosis, to, discuss, the, role, of, p300, and, 'CBP', in, moxibustion, against, apoptosis, of, myocardial, cells])].

[sujeto(['Serotonin', '(', 5, -, 'HT)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, to, be, involved, in, cancer, progression, by, stimulating, angiogenesis, and, cell, growth])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, examined, the, expression, of, the, serotonin, transporter, '(', 5, -, 'HTT)', and, the, role, of, histone, deacetylases, '(', 'HDACs)', in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([the, 5, -, 'HTT', gene, in, tumor, cells])].
