[sujeto(['Using', a, chromatin, immunoprecipitation, 'assay,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([increased, acetylation, of, histone, 'H4', associated, with, the, 5, -, 'HTT', promoter, in, cells, treated, with, 'TSA'])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 5, -, 'HTT', gene, is, epigenetically, downregulated, by, 'HDAC1', in, several, types, of, cancer])].
[sujeto(['The', 'RNA', polymerase, 'II', core, promoter, is, the, ultimate]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, a, multitude, of, transcription, factors, that, control, transcription, initiation])].
[sujeto(['Core', promoters, encompass, the, 'RNA', start, site, and, consist, of, functional, elements, such, as, the, 'TATA', 'box,', 'initiator,', and, downstream, core, promoter, element, '(', 'DPE),', which]), verbo([confer]), complemento([specific, properties, to, the, core, promoter])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, discovered, that, 'Drosophila', 'Caudal,', which, is, a, master, regulator, of, genes, involved, in, development, and, 'differentiation,', is, a, 'DPE-specific', transcriptional, activator])].
[sujeto(['To', elucidate, the, mechanism, that, enables, 'Caudal', to, preferentially]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['DPE', 'transcription,', we, performed, 'structure-function', analysis])].
[sujeto(['Using', a, systematic, series, of, deletion, mutants, '(', all, containing, the, intact, 'DNA-binding', 'homeodomain)', we, discovered, that, the, 'C-terminal', region, of, 'Caudal', contributes, to, the, preferential, activation, of, the, fushi, tarazu, '(', 'ftz)', 'Caudal']), verbo([target]), complemento([gene])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', the, region, containing, both, the, homeodomain, and, the, 'C', terminus, of, 'Caudal', was, sufficient, to]), verbo([confer]), complemento([core, 'promoter-preferential', activation, to, the, heterologous, 'GAL4', 'DNA-binding', domain])].
[sujeto(['Strikingly,', dCBP]), verbo([conferred]), complemento([the, ability, to, preferentially, activate, the, 'DPE-dependent', ftz, reporter, to, 'mini-Caudal', proteins, that, were, unable, to, preferentially, activate, ftz, transcription, themselves])].
[sujeto(['Due', to, the, 'hyper-activation', of, 'WNT', signaling, in, a, variety, of, cancer, 'types,', there]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, a, strong, drive, to, develop, 'pathway-specific', inhibitors, with, the, eventual, goal, of, providing, a, chemotherapeutic, antagonist, of, 'WNT', signaling, to, cancer, patients])].
[sujeto(['The', canonical, 'WNT', signaling, pathway, initiates, when, 'WNT', ligands]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, 'receptors,', causing, the, nuclear, localization, of, the, 'co-activator', 'β-catenin', '(', 'CTNNB1),', which, leads, to, an, association, of, 'β-catenin', with, a, member, of, the, 'TCF', transcription, factor, family, at, regulatory, regions, of, 'WNT-responsive', genes])].
[sujeto(['The', 'TCF/β-catenin', complex, then]), verbo([recruits]), complemento(['CBP', '(', 'CREBBP)', or, p300, '(', 'EP300),', leading, to, histone, acetylation, and, gene, activation])].
[sujeto(['A', current, model, in, the, field, is, that, 'CBP-driven', expression, of, 'WNT']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, supports, proliferation, whereas, 'p300-driven', expression, of, 'WNT', target, genes, supports, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['The', small, molecule, inhibitor, 'ICG-001']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, 'CBP,', but, not, to, 'p300,', and, competitively, inhibits, the, interaction, of, 'CBP', with, 'β-catenin'])].
[sujeto(['Upon', treatment, of, cancer, 'cells,', this, should, reduce, expression, of, 'CBP-regulated', 'transcription,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, reduced, tumorigenicity, and, enhanced, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([compared, the, 'genome-wide', effects, on, the, transcriptome, after, treatment, with, 'ICG-001', '(', the, specific, 'CBP', 'inhibitor)', versus, 'C646,', a, compound, that, competes, with, 'acetyl-coA', for, the, 'Lys-coA', binding, pocket, of, both, 'CBP', and, p300])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, both, drugs, cause, 'large-scale', changes, in, the, transcriptome, of, 'HCT116', colon, cancer, cells, and, 'PANC1', pancreatic, cancer, cells, and, reverse, some, 'tumor-specific', changes, in, gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['Notably,', 'WNT']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, were, similarly, downregulated, after, treatment, of, 'HCT116', with, 'C646', as, with, 'ICG-001'])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, treatment, with, a, general, 'HAT', inhibitor, causes, similar, effects, on, the, transcriptome, as, does, treatment, with, a, 'CBP-specific', inhibitor, and, that, epigenetic, inhibition, affects, the, 'WNT', pathway, in, 'HCT116', cells, and, the, cholesterol, biosynthesis, pathway, in, 'PANC1', cells])].
[sujeto(['The', discovery, of, functional, crosstalk, between, 'WNT', and]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([factor, κB, '(', 'NF-κB)', signaling, has, established, a, more, complex, role, for, these, two, pathways, in, inflammation, and, cancer])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, 'WNT/β-catenin', signaling, selectively]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([the, expression, of, a, proinflammatory, subset, of, 'IL-1β-induced', 'NF-κB', target, genes])].
[sujeto(['WNT/β-catenin', signaling, does, not, affect]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([translocation, of, the, 'RelA', subunit, of, 'NF-κB', or, its, association, with, 'CBP', '(', also, known, as, 'CREBBP),', but, reduces, 'CBP-mediated', acetylation, and, chromatin, recruitment, of, 'RelA'])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', 'β-catenin', selectively]), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['NF-κB', gene, expression, through, its, negative, effects, on, 'RelA', acetylation])].
[sujeto(['Genome-wide', distribution, of, histone, 'H3K18', and, 'H3K27', 'acetyltransferases,', 'CBP', '(', 'CREBBP)', and, p300, '(', 'EP300),', is, used, to, map, enhancers, and, 'promoters,', but, whether, these, elements, functionally]), verbo([require]), complemento(['CBP/p300', remains, largely, uncertain])].
[sujeto(['ChIP-seq', using, 'CBP-null', cells, as, a, control, revealed, nearby, 'CBP', recruitment, for, 20, '%', of, 'constitutively-expressed', 'genes,', but, 'surprisingly,', 'three-quarters', of, these, genes, were, unaffected, or, slightly]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, dKO, cells])].
[sujeto(['Examining', 'signal-responsive', '(', 'Hypoxia', 'Inducible', 'Factor)', genes, showed, that, 97, '%', were, within, 50, kilobases, of, an, inducible, 'CBP', 'peak,', and, 70, '%', of, these]), verbo([required]), complemento(['CBP/p300', for, full, induction])].
[sujeto(['While', 'CBP/p300', was, needed, for, full, induction, of, some, genes, in, 'single-cells,', for, other, genes, 'CBP/p300']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, probability, of, maximal, expression])].
[sujeto(['Thus,']), verbo([target]), complemento([gene, context, influences, the, transcriptional, requirement, for, 'CBP/p300,', possibly, by, multiple, mechanisms])].
[sujeto(['Many', processes, in, endothelial, cells, including, angiogenic, responses, are]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, microRNAs])].
[sujeto(['However,', there, is, limited, information, available, about, their, complex, 'cross-talk', in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([certain, endothelial, functions])].
[sujeto(['We', here, show, that, 'anti-angiogenic', stimulation, by, transforming, growth, 'factor-beta']), verbo([activates]), complemento([the, 'microRNA-212/132', cluster, by, derepression, of, their, transcriptional, 'co-activator', cAMP, response, 'element-binding', protein, '(', 'CREB)-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', which, is, a, novel, target, of, a, previously, identified, 'pro-angiogenic', miRNA, 'miR-30a-3p', in, endothelial, cells])].
[sujeto(['Surprisingly,', despite, having, the, same, 'seed-sequence,', 'miR-212', and, 'miR-132', exerted, differential, effects, on, endothelial, transcriptome, regulation, and, cellular, functions, with, stronger, endothelial, inhibitory, effects]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, 'miR-212'])].

[sujeto(['Our', results, identify, '(', 'i)', a, novel, 'miRNA-cross-talk']), verbo([involving]), complemento(['miR-30a-3p', and, 'miR-212,', which, led, to, suppression, of, important, endothelial, genes, such, as, 'GAB1', and, 'SIRT1', finally, culminating, in, impaired, endothelial, 'function;', and, '(', 'ii)', microRNAs, may, have, different, biological, roles, despite, having, the, same, seed, sequence])].
[sujeto(['Experience-dependent', gene, transcription, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, nervous, system, development, and, function])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, characterize, the, enhancers, that, function, across, the, genome, to]), verbo([mediate]), complemento(['activity-dependent', transcription, in, mouse, cortical, neurons])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, the, subset, of, enhancers, enriched, for, monomethylation, of, histone, 'H3', 'Lys4', '(', 'H3K4me1)', and, binding, of, the, transcriptional, coactivator, 'CREBBP', '(', also, called, 'CBP)', that, shows, increased, acetylation, of, histone, 'H3', 'Lys27', '(', 'H3K27ac)', after, membrane, depolarization, of, cortical, neurons, functions, to, regulate, 'activity-dependent', transcription])].
[sujeto(['A', subset, of, these, enhancers, appears, to]), verbo([require]), complemento([binding, of, 'FOS,', which, was, previously, thought, to, bind, primarily, to, promoters])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'FOS', functions, at, enhancers, to, control, 'activity-dependent', gene, programs, that, are, critical, for, nervous, system, function, and, provide, a, resource, of, functional, 'cis-regulatory', elements, that, may, give, insight, into, the, genetic, variants, that, contribute, to, brain, development, and, disease])].
[sujeto(['Recent', studies, investigating, 'ligand-mediated', 'Wnt/β-catenin', signaling]), verbo([have]), complemento([highlighted, its, importance, in, pancreatic, cancer, initiation, and, 'progression,', as, well, as, its, potential, as, a, therapeutic, target, in, 'PDAC'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'small-molecule', 'ICG-001']), verbo([binds]), complemento(['cAMP-responsive', element, binding, '(', 'CREB)-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', to, disrupt, its, interaction, with, 'β-catenin', and, inhibit, 'CBP', function, as, a, coactivator, of, 'Wnt/β-catenin-mediated', transcription])].
[sujeto(['Given', its, ability, to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['Wnt/β-catenin-mediated', transcription, in, vitro, and, in, 'vivo,', as, well, as, its, efficacy, in, preclinical, models, of, colorectal, cancer, and, other, 'Wnt-driven', 'diseases,', we, examined, 'ICG-001', and, its, potential, role, as, a, therapeutic, in, 'PDAC'])].
[sujeto(['ICG-001', alone, significantly]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['anchorage-dependent', and, -, independent, growth, of, multiple, 'PDAC', 'lines,', and, augmented, in, vitro, growth, inhibition, when, used, in, combination, with, gemcitabine])].
[sujeto(['ICG-001', had, only, variable, modest, effects, on, 'PDAC', apoptosis, and, instead]), verbo([mediated]), complemento(['PDAC', growth, inhibition, primarily, through, robust, induction, of, 'G₁', 'cell-cycle', arrest])].
[sujeto(['Considerable', evidence, indicates, that, coactivator, of, transcription, and, histone, acetyltransferase, cAMP, response, element]), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'CREB)', binding, protein, '(', 'CBP)', is, critically, required, for, normal, neural, function])].
[sujeto(['CBP', hypofunction]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, severe, psychopathological, symptoms, in, human, and, cognitive, abnormalities, in, genetic, mutant, mice, with, severity, dependent, on, the, neural, locus, and, developmental, time, of, the, gene, inactivation])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', interruption, of, 'CREB', function, in, the, mPFC, also]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, a, deficit, in, auditory, discrimination, of, fearful, stimuli])].
[sujeto(['While', mice, with, deficient, 'CBP/CREB', signaling, in, the, mPFC]), verbo([maintain]), complemento([normal, responses, to, aversive, 'stimuli,', they, exhibit, abnormal, responses, to, similar, but, nonrelevant, stimuli, when, compared, to, control, animals])].
[sujeto(['These', data, indicate, that, improvement, of, fear, memory, accuracy]), verbo([involves]), complemento(['mPFC-dependent', suppression, of, fear, responses, to, nonrelevant, stimuli])].
[sujeto(['Small-molecule', inhibitors, that]), verbo([target]), complemento([bromodomains, outside, of, the, bromodomain, and, 'extra-terminal', '(', 'BET)', 'sub-family', are, lacking])].

[sujeto(['The', crystal, structures, obtained, revealed, two, distinct]), verbo([binding]), complemento([modes])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, while, 'CCR7', and, 'CXCR4', surface, levels, remained, essentially, unaltered, during, the, first, 48, -, 72, h, after, activation, of, 'CD4(+)', 'T', 'cells,', their, in, vitro, chemokinetic, and, directed, migratory, capacity, to, the, respective, 'ligands,', 'CCL19,', 'CCL21,', and, 'CXCL12,', was, substantially, reduced, during, this, time, window])].
[sujeto(['Activated', 'T', cells, recovered, from, this, temporary]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, motility, on, day, 6, post, 'immunization,', coinciding, with, increased, migration, to, the, 'CXCR5', ligand, 'CXCL13'])].

[sujeto(['The', 'SGK', kinases, assume, distinct, roles, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento(['Na', transport, in, both, proximal, and, distal, elements, of, the, kidney, tubule])].
[sujeto(['Future', examination, of, the, molecular, mechanisms, by, which, the, 'SGK', kinases]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([specific, substrates, will, inform, our, understanding, of, how, these, kinases, contribute, to, the, physiology, of, renal, 'Na(+)', transport])].
[sujeto(['Serum-', and, 'glucocorticoid-induced', kinase, '(', 'SGK)', 1]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'NHE', regulatory, factor, 2, '(', 'NHERF2)', and, mediates, activation, of, 'NHE3', by, dexamethasone, '(', 'Dex)', in, cultured, epithelial, cells])].
[sujeto(['In', comparison, to, 'wild-type', 'mice,']), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'SGK1', or, 'NHERF2', significantly, attenuated, regulation, of, 'NHE3', by, 'Dex', but, did, not, completely, obliterate, the, effect])].
[sujeto(['However,', unlike, 'SGK1', or, 'SGK2,', 'SGK3', rapidly]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['NHE3', within, 15, min, of, 'Dex', treatment, in, both, 'PS120', and, 'Caco-2bbe', cells])].
[sujeto(['Activation', of, 'SGK3', and, 'NHE3', by, 'Dex', was, dependent, on, phosphoinositide, 3, -, kinase, '(', 'PI3K)', and, 'phosphoinositide-dependent', kinase, 1, '(', 'PDK1),', and, 'Dex']), verbo([induced]), complemento([translocation, of, 'PDK1', to, endosomes])].
[sujeto(['Our', study, identifies, 'SGK3', as, a, novel, endosomal, kinase, that, acutely]), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['NHE3', in, a, 'PI3K-dependent', mechanism])].
[sujeto(['Mechanisms', of, regulatory, cell, volume]), verbo([increase]), complemento([following, cell, shrinkage, include, accumulation, of, organic, osmolytes, such, as, 'betaine,', 'taurine,', 'sorbitol,', glycerophosphorylcholine, '(', 'GPC)', and, 'myo-inositol'])].
[sujeto(['Myo-inositol', is, taken, up, by, the, 'sodium-myo-inositol-transporter', 'SMIT1', '(', 'SLC5A3)']), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, a, wide, variety, of, cell, types])].
[sujeto(['Hypertonicity']), verbo([induces]), complemento([the, transcription, of, the, 'SMIT1', gene, upon, binding, of, the, transcription, factor, tonicity, enhancer, binding, protein, '(', 'TonEBP)', to, tonicity, responsive, enhancers, '(', 'TonE)', in, the, 'SMIT1', promoter, region])].
[sujeto(['In', this, study, we, show, that, 'SMIT1', is]), verbo([modulated]), complemento([by, the, 'serum-', and, 'glucocorticoid-inducible', kinase, 'SGK1,', a, protein, genomically, 'up-regulated', by, hypertonicity])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'SMIT1', activity, is, due, to, an, elevated, cell, surface, expression, of, the, carrier, while, its, kinetic, properties, remain, unaffected])].
[sujeto(['The', 'SGK', isoforms, 'SGK2,', 'SGK3', and, the, closely, related, protein, kinase, 'B', '(', 'PKB)', are, similarly, capable, of]), verbo([activating]), complemento(['SMIT1', activity])].
[sujeto(['SMIT1-mediated', currents, are]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([by, coexpression, of, the, 'ubiquitin-ligase', 'Nedd4-2,', an, effect, counteracted, by, additional, coexpression, of, 'SGK1'])].
[sujeto(['Serum', and, glucocorticoid]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([kinase, 1, '(', 'SGK1)', has, been, identified, as, a, key, regulatory, protein, that, controls, a, diverse, set, of, cellular, processes, including, sodium, '(', 'Na(+))', 'homeostasis,', 'osmoregulation,', cell, 'survival,', and, cell, proliferation])].
[sujeto(['Two', other, 'SGK', 'isoforms,', 'SGK2', and, 'SGK3,']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, 'identified,', which, differ, most, markedly, from, 'SGK1', in, their, 'NH(2)-terminal', domains])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'SGK1', and, 'SGK3', are, potent, stimulators, of, epithelial, 'Na(+)', channel, '(', 'ENaC)-dependent', 'Na(+)', 'transport,', while, 'SGK2,', which, has, a, short, 'NH(2)', 'terminus,', is, a, weak, stimulator, of, 'ENaC'])].
[sujeto(['Further', characterization, of, the, role, of, the, 'SGK1', 'NH(2)', terminus, revealed, that, its, deletion, does, not, affect, in, vitro, kinase, activity, but, profoundly, limits, the, ability, of, 'SGK1', either, to]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento(['ENaC-dependent', 'Na(+)', transport, or, inhibit, 'Forkhead-dependent', gene, transcription])].

[sujeto(['Moreover,', a, point, mutation, that, reduces, phosphoinositide]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, the, 'NH(2)', terminus, also, reduces, 'SGK1', effects, on, 'Na(+)', transport, and, 'Forkhead', activity])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'NH(2)', 'terminus,', although, not, required, for, 'PI', 3, -, 'kinase-dependent', modulation, of, 'SGK1', catalytic, 'activity,', is, required, for, multiple, 'SGK1', 'functions,', including, stimulation, of, 'ENaC', and, inhibition, of, the, proapoptotic, 'Forkhead', transcription, factor])].
[sujeto(['Together,', these, observations, support, the, idea, that, the, 'NH(2)-terminal', domain]), verbo([acts]), complemento([downstream, of, 'PI', 3, -, 'kinase-dependent', activation, to, target, the, kinase, to, specific, cellular, compartments, 'and/or', 'substrates,', possibly, through, its, interactions, with, a, subset, of, phosphoinositides])].
[sujeto(['The', 'phosphoinositide-dependent', kinase, 'PDK1']), verbo([activates]), complemento([the, 'serum-', and, 'glucocorticoid-inducible', kinase, isoforms, 'SGK1,', 'SGK2,', and, 'SGK3', and, protein, kinase, 'B,', which, in, turn, are, known, to, 'up-regulate', a, variety, of, 'sodium-coupled', transporters])].

[sujeto(['Within', 40, 'min,', 'Wortmannin', treatment, significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['I', '(', 'glc)', by, 39, +, /, -, 10, '%', '(', n, =, 5, ')', ',', 'I', '(', 'phe)', by, 70, +, /, -, 7, '%', '(', n, =, 4, ')', ',', 'I', '(', 'gln)', by, 69, +, /, -, 8, '%', '(', n, =, 4, ')', ',', 'I', '(', 'cys)', by, 67, +, /, -, 8, '%', '(', n, =, 6, ')', ',', and, 'I', '(', 'prol)', by, 79, +, /, -, 12, '%', '(', n, =, 3, ')'])].

[sujeto(['Analysis', of, 'SGK3', expression, showed, that, expression, changes, elicited, by, a, 'context-shock', association, during, consolidation, can, subsequently, be, recapitulated, during, reconsolidation, and, that, the, transcriptional, changes]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, retrieval, depend, on, the, remoteness, of, the, memory])].

[sujeto(['ClC-Ka', and, 'ClC-Kb,', chloride, channels]), verbo([participating]), complemento([in, renal, tubular, 'Cl-', 'transport,', require, the, coexpression, of, barttin, to, become, functional])].
[sujeto(['Mutations', of, the, barttin, gene]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, the, 'Bartter\'s', syndrome, variant, 'BSND,', characterized, by, congenital, deafness, and, severe, renal, salt, wasting])].

[sujeto(['Mutation', in, the, 'serum/glucocorticoid']), verbo([regulated]), complemento([kinase, 3, '(', 'Sgk3,', also, known, as, 'Sgkl', or, 'Cisk)', gene, causes, both, defective, hair, follicle, development, and, altered, hair, cycle, in, mice])].

[sujeto(['Sequence', analysis, revealed, a, single, 'C-to-A', nucleotide, substitution, at, nucleotide, 1382, in, the, 'Sgkl', 'gene,']), verbo([causing]), complemento([a, nonsense, mutation, at, codon, 461])].
[sujeto(['Sgkl', encodes, serum, and, 'glucocorticoid-inducible', 'kinase-like', kinase, '(', 'SGKL),', which, belongs, to, a, subfamily, of, 'serine/threonine', protein, kinases, and]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, suggested, to, have, a, role, downstream, of, lipid, signals, produced, by, activation, of, phosphoinositide, 3, -, kinase, '(', 'PI3K)'])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', we, concluded, that, the, nucleotide, substitution, in, the, 'Sgkl', gene, is, the, causative, mutation, for, defective, hair, growth, in, the, ypc, mutant, mouse, and, that, the, signaling, pathway]), verbo([involving]), complemento(['SGKL', plays, an, essential, role, in, mammalian, hair, development])].
[sujeto(['Serum', and, 'glucocorticoid-inducible', 'kinase-like', kinase, '(', 'SGKL)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, identified, as, a, new, integrator, that, decodes, lipid, signals, produced, by, the, activation, of, phosphoinositide, 3, -, kinase, '(', 'PI3K)'])].

[sujeto(['Serum/glucocorticoid']), verbo([regulated]), complemento([kinase, '(', 'sgk)', belongs, to, a, newly, emerging, subfamily, of, the, 'serine/threonine', protein, kinase, family])].

[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'Lrfn', proteins, are, neuronal, components, with, a, role, in, the, developing, or, mature, vertebrate, nervous, system])].
[sujeto(['Within', the, mammalian, 'genome,', there, are, many, multimember, gene, families, that, encode, membrane, proteins, with, extracellular, leucine, rich, repeats, which, are, thought, to]), verbo([act]), complemento([as, cell, adhesion, or, signalling, molecules])].
[sujeto(['We', previously, showed, that, the, members, of, the, 'NLRR', gene, family, are]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, a, developmentally, restricted, manner, in, the, mouse, with, 'NLRR-1', being, expressed, in, the, developing, myotome])].

[sujeto(['Each', member, of, the, 'FLRT', family]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, 'distinct,', highly, regulated, expression, 'pattern,', as, was, seen, for, the, 'NLRR', family])].

[sujeto(['The', 'CI-MPR', isolated, from, opossum, 'liver,', like, the, 'CI-MPR', from, bovine, 'liver,']), verbo([bound]), complemento([iodinated, human, recombinant, 'IGF-II'])].
[sujeto(['However,', 'Scatchard', analysis, revealed, that, the, opossum, 'CI-MPR']), verbo([bound]), complemento(['IGF-II', with, a, lower, affinity, '(', 'Kd', =, 14.5, 'nM)', than, the, bovine, receptor, '(', 'Kd', =, 0.2, 'nM)'])].
[sujeto(['The', addition, of, excess, 'IGF-II,', but, not, 'IGF-I', or, 'insulin,']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([binding, to, '[', 125, 'I]IGF-II,', indicating, that, the, opossum, 'CI-MPR', exhibits, specificity, for, 'IGF-II'])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, emergence, of, a, high, affinity, 'IGF-II-binding', site, in, the, 'CI-MPR', occurred, in, evolution, before, the, divergence, of, marsupials, and, placental, mammals, from, their, last, common, ancestor])].
[sujeto(['Fluoride', is, a, nucleophilic, reagent, which]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, to, inhibit, a, variety, of, different, enzymes, such, as, 'esterases,', asymmetrical, hydrolases, and, phosphatases])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'report,', we, demonstrate, that, fluoride]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([tyrosine, kinase, activity, of, insulin, receptors, partially, purified, from, rat, skeletal, muscle, and, human, placenta])].
[sujeto(['Fluoride']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([in, a, similar, 'dose-dependent', manner, both, 'beta-subunit', autophosphorylation, and, tyrosine, kinase, activity, for, exogenous, substrates])].
[sujeto(['Fluoride', did, not, complete, with, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, for, 'ATP', or, 'Mn2+'])].
[sujeto(['Fluoride', also]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, autophosphorylation, and, tyrosine, kinase, activity, of, receptors, for, 'insulin-like', growth, factor, 'I', from, human, placenta])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', fluoride]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([tyrosine, kinase, activity, in, the, absence, of, changes, in, the, phosphorylation, of, prephosphorylated, insulin, 'receptors,', and, the, sensitivity, to, fluoride, was, similar, to, the, sensitivity, of, the, unphosphorylated, insulin, receptor])].
[sujeto(['The', effect, of, 'fluoride-on', tyrosine, kinase, activity, was, markedly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([when, insulin, receptors, were, preincubated, with, the, copolymer, of, 'glutamate/tyrosine'])].
[sujeto(['Prior', exposure, of, receptors, to, free, tyrosine, or, phosphotyrosine, also]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([the, inhibitory, effect, of, fluoride])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, protective, effect, of, tyrosine, or, phosphotyrosine, was, maximal, at, low, 'concentrations,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([the, interaction, of, these, compounds, with, the, receptor, itself, rather, than, with, fluoride])].
[sujeto(['These', data, 'suggest:', '(', 'i)', that, fluoride]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([directly, and, slowly, with, the, insulin, 'receptor,', which, causes, inhibition, of, its, phosphotransferase, 'activity;', '(', 'ii)', that, the, binding, site, of, fluoride, is, not, structurally, modified, by, receptor, 'phosphorylation;', and, '(', 'iii)', based, on, the, fact, that, fluoride, inhibits, phosphotransferase, activity, in, the, absence, of, alterations, in, the, binding, of, 'ATP,', 'Mn2+', or, 'insulin,', we, speculate, that, fluoride, binding, might, affect, the, transfer, of, phosphate, from, 'ATP', to, the, tyrosine, residues, of, the, 'beta-subunit', of, the, insulin, receptor, and, to, the, tyrosine, residues, of, exogenous, substrates])].
[sujeto(['The', fetal, parathyroid, glands, and, parathyroid, 'hormone-related', protein, '(', 'PTHrP)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, be, important, regulators, of, fetal, calcium, metabolism, through, their, actions, on, the, placenta, and, bone])].
[sujeto(['However,', 'TxPTx', produced, a, significant]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, the, fractional, excretion, rate, of, total, calcium, and, a, significant, decrease, in, the, excretion, of, adenosine, 3, '\'', ',', 5, '\'', -, cyclic, monophosphate, '(', 'cAMP)', compared, with, intact, fetuses])].
[sujeto(['Infusions', of, 'PTH-(1-34),', 'PTHrP-(1-34),', and, 'PTHrP-(1-141)', into, the, jugular, vein, of, 'TxPTx', fetuses, '(', n, =, 5, ')', at, the, rate, of, 1, 'nmol/h', for, 2, 'h,', after, a, 1, -, nmol, loading, 'dose,', significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, excretion, rate, of, total, calcium, and, increased, the, excretion, rate, of, cAMP, in, fetal, urine])].

[sujeto(['(', 'ABSTRACT', 'TRUNCATED', 'AT', 250, 'WORDS)', 'Five', mutants, of, recombinant, 'insulin-like', growth, 'factor-II', '(', 'rIGF-II)', that]), verbo([bound]), complemento([with, high, affinity, to, either, the, 'IGF-II/cation-independent', mannose, 6, -, phosphate, '(', 'IGF-II/CIM6-P)', or, the, 'IGF-I', receptor, were, prepared, by, 'site-directed', mutagenic, 'procedures,', expressed, as, fusion, proteins, in, the, larva, of, 'Bombyx', mori, or, 'Escherichia', 'coli,', purified, to, 'homogeneity,', 'renatured,', and, characterized, in, terms, of, their, receptor, binding, affinities, and, specificities, as, well, as, their, biological, activities])].

[sujeto(['Phosphate-based', glass, fibres, '(', 'PGF)']), verbo([have]), complemento([the, unique, characteristic, of, being, completely, soluble, in, an, aqueous, 'environment,', releasing, bioactive, and, biocompatible, ions])].
[sujeto(['They']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, proposed, as, tissue, engineering, scaffolds, for, craniofacial, skeletal, muscle, 'regeneration,', where, myoblasts, are, seeded, directly, onto, the, fibres])].
[sujeto(['Studies']), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, these, cells, have, a, preference, in, their, initial, attachment, to, fibres, of, certain, composition, and, 'size,', which, in, turn, control, the, rate, of, degradation])].
[sujeto(['This', study, investigated, the, relationship, between, the, surface, 'properties,', degradation, properties, and, ion]), verbo([release]), complemento(['(', cationic, and, anionic, 'species)', by, altering, the, chemical, composition, of, the, 'PGF'])].
[sujeto(['Contact', angle, measurements, showed, that, polar, interactions, occurring, on, the, glass, surfaces, diminished, with]), verbo([increasing]), complemento(['Fe2O3', content])].
[sujeto(['This', behaviour, was, reflected, in, the, estimated, surface, energies, of, the, 'glasses,', where, the, overall, surface, energy]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([with, increasing, 'Fe2O3', content, due, to, the, decrease, in, polar, or, 'acid/base', component])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, degradation, rate]), verbo([increased]), complemento([with, decreasing, fibre, diameter, '(', comparing, average, diameters, of, 31.6, +, /, -, 6.5, microm, versus, 13.1, +, /, -, 1.3, 'microm)', for, a, given, mass, of, 'fibre,', and, this, is, related, to, the, surface, area, to, volume, ratio])].

[sujeto(['Prostaglandin', 'F', synthase, '(', 'PGFS)']), verbo([has]), complemento([dual, catalytic, 'activities:', formation, of, 'PGF(2)(alpha)', from, 'PGH(2)', by, the, 'PGH(2)', 9, ',', 11, -, endoperoxide, reductase, activity, and, 9, 'alpha,11beta-PGF(2)', '(', 'PGF(2)(alphabeta))', from, 'PGD(2)', by, the, 'PGD(2)', 11, -, ketoreductase, activity, in, the, presence, of, 'NADPH'])].
[sujeto(['Bimatoprost', '(', 'BMP),', which, is, a, highly, effective, ocular, hypotensive, 'agent,', is, a, 'PGF(2)(alpha)', analogue, that]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([both, the, 'PGD(2)', 11, -, ketoreductase, and, 'PGH(2)', 9, ',', 11, -, endoperoxide, reductase, activities, of, 'PGFS'])].
[sujeto(['To', examine, the, catalytic, mechanism, of, 'PGH(2)', 9, ',', 11, -, endoperoxide, 'reductase,', a, crystal, structure, of, 'PGFS[NADPH', +, 'BMP]']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, determined, at, 2.0, 'A', resolution])].
[sujeto(['BMP']), verbo([binds]), complemento([near, the, 'PGD(2)', binding, 'site,', but, the, 'alpha-', and, 'omega-chains', of, 'BMP', are, locate, on, the, 'omega-', and, 'alpha-chains', of, 'PGD(2),', respectively])].
[sujeto(['Consequently,', the]), verbo([bound]), complemento(['BMP', and, 'PGD(2)', direct, their, opposite, faces, of, the, cyclopentane, moieties, toward, the, nicotinamide, ring, of, the, bound, 'NADP'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'alpha-', and, 'omega-chains', of, 'BMP', are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'H-bonding', with, protein, 'residues,', while, the, cyclopentane, moiety, is, surrounded, by, water, molecules, and, is, not, directly, attached, to, either, the, protein, or, the, bound, 'NADPH,', indicating, that, the, cyclopentane, moiety, is, movable, in, the, active, site])].
[sujeto(['Formation', of, 'PGF(2)(alpha)', from, 'PGH(2)', most, likely]), verbo([involves]), complemento([a, direct, hydride, transfer, from, the, bound, 'NADPH', to, the, endoperoxide, of, 'PGH(2)', without, the, participation, of, specific, amino, acid, residues])].
[sujeto(['Human', 'PGFS', is, 3, 'alpha-hydroxysteroid', dehydrogenase, '(', 3, 'alpha-HSD)', type, 'II', and]), verbo([has]), complemento(['PGFS', activity, and, 3, 'alpha-HSD', activity])].
[sujeto(['Human', lung, 'PGFS']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, crystallized, with, the, cofactor, 'NADP(+)', and, the, substrate, 'PGD(2),', and, with, the, cofactor, 'NADPH', and, the, inhibitor, rutin])].
[sujeto(['These', complex, structures]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, determined, at, 1.69, 'A', resolution])].
[sujeto(['PGFS']), verbo([has]), complemento([an, '(', 'alpha/beta)(8)', barrel, structure])].
[sujeto(['The', cofactor, and, substrate, or, inhibitor]), verbo([bind]), complemento([in, a, cavity, at, the, 'C-terminal', end, of, the, barrel])].
[sujeto(['The', cofactor]), verbo([binds]), complemento([deeply, in, the, cavity, and, has, extensive, interactions, with, 'PGFS', through, hydrogen, 'bonds,', whereas, the, substrate, '(', 'PGD(2))', is, located, above, the, bound, cofactor, and, has, little, interaction, with, 'PGFS'])].
[sujeto(['Despite', being, largely, structurally, different, from, 'PGD(2),', rutin, is, located, at, the, same, site, of, 'PGD(2),', and, its, catechol, and, rhamnose, moieties, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, hydrogen, bonds, with, 'PGFS'])].
[sujeto(['The', catalytic, site, of, 'PGFS', contains, the]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['Y55', and, 'H117', residues])].
[sujeto(['The', carbonyl, 'O(11)', of, 'PGD(2)', and, the, hydroxyl, 'O(13)', of, rutin, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, hydrogen, bonds, with, 'Y55', and, 'H117'])].
[sujeto(['Since', the, substrate]), verbo([binding]), complemento([cavity, of, 'PGFS', is, relatively, large, in, comparison, with, those, of, 'AKR1C1', and, 'AKR1C2,', 'PGFS', '(', 'AKR1C3)', could, catalyze, the, reduction, 'and/or', oxidation, reactions, of, various, compounds, over, a, relatively, wide, pH, range])].
[sujeto(['In', the, cyclic, 'female,', the, life, span, of, 'CL', is, characterized, by, luteal, 'development,', 'maintenance,', and, regression]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, complex, interactions, between, luteotrophic, and, luteolytic, mediators])].

[sujeto(['To', identify, microRNAs, that]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([angiogenesis])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, when, 'VEGFA,', 'FLT1', and, 'KDR', expressions, were, considered, 'alone,', only, 'VEGFA', demonstrated, a, significant, association, with, patient, survival])].

[sujeto(['Mouse', bone, 'marrow-derived', 'Lin(-)-Sca-1(+)', endothelial, progenitor, cell, '(', 'EPC)']), verbo([has]), complemento([pluripotent, abilities, such, as, supporting, neovascularization])].
[sujeto(['Vascular', endothelial, growth, factor, '(', 'VEGF)', receptor, 1, '(', 'VEGFR1)', '(', 'Flt1)']), verbo([recognizes]), complemento([various, 'VEGF', isoforms, and, is, critically, implicated, in, a, wide, range, of, physiological, and, pathological, 'settings,', including, vasculogenesis])].
[sujeto(['Mouse', 'EPC']), verbo([expresses]), complemento([two, isoforms, of, 'VEGFR1:', 'mFlt1,', which, transmits, 'ligand-induced', 'signals;', and, 'sFlt1,', which, acts, as, a, negative, regulator, by, sequestering, ligands, of, 'VEGF', receptors])].
[sujeto(['How', the, relative, levels, of, mFlt1, and, sFlt1, are]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([is, not, yet, clear])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, that, tumor, necrosis, factor, superfamily, 15, '(', 'TNFSF15)', '(', also, known, as, 'VEGI', or, 'TL1A),', an, endothelial, 'cell-secreted', 'cytokine,', simultaneously, promotes, mFlt1, degradation, and, 'up-regulates', sFlt1, expression, in, 'EPC,', giving, rise, to, disruption, of, 'VEGF-', or, 'PlGF-induced', activation, of, eNOS, and, 'MAPK', p38, and, effective, inhibition, of, 'VEGF-driven,', 'EPC-supported', vasculogenesis, in, a, murine, 'Matrigel', implant, model])].

[sujeto(['These', findings, indicate, that, 'TNFSF15', is, a, key, component, of, a, molecular, mechanism, that, negatively]), verbo([modulates]), complemento(['EPC-supported', vasculogenesis, through, regulation, of, the, relative, levels, of, mFlt1, and, sFlt1, in, 'EPC'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, reported, that, the, major, isoform, of, 'Flt1/VEGFR-1', expressed, in, 'MDA-MB-231', breast, cancer, cells, was, a, truncated, intracellular, isoform, transcribed, from, intron, 21, '(', i21, 'Flt1)'])].
[sujeto(['This', isoform, upregulated, the, active, form, of, 'Src', and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([breast, cancer, cell, invasiveness])].
[sujeto(['Since', expression, of, the, transmembrane, and, soluble, 'Flt1', isoforms, of, 'HUVEC', is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, 'Notch', 'signaling,', we, wondered, whether, the, expression, of, the, intracellular, isoform, i21, 'Flt1', was, also, dependent, on, 'Notch', activation])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, that, the, expression, of, i21, 'Flt1', in, 'HUVEC', and, 'MDA-MB-231', cells, is, downregulated, by, the, 'γ-secretase', inhibitor, 'DAPT'])].
[sujeto(['In', agreement, with, these, 'findings,', 'HUVEC', and, 'MDA-MB-231', breast, cancer, 'cells,', cultured, on, dishes, coated, with, recombinant, human, 'Dll4', extracellular, 'domain,']), verbo([express]), complemento([higher, levels, of, i21, 'Flt1'])].
[sujeto(['In', cancer, 'cells,', 'Flt1', is, a]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, the, micro, 'RNA', family, 'miR-200'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'MDA-MB-231', breast, cancer, 'cells,', the, truncated, intracellular, isoform, i21, 'Flt1', is, also, negatively]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'miR-200c'])].

[sujeto(['Recently,', a, group, of, microRNAs, '(', 'miRNAs),', the, 'miR-200', family, '(', 'miR-200s)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, found, to, be, deregulated, in, multiple, types, of, 'cancers,', in, which, this, family, of, miRNAs, was, demonstrated, to, play, a, pivotal, role, in, tumor, 'initiation,', 'maintenance,', malignant, metastasis, and, chemotherapy, resistance])].
[sujeto(['By']), verbo([targeting]), complemento([several, central, inducers, of, the, 'epithelial-to-mesenchymal', transition, '(', 'EMT),', e])].
[sujeto(['ZEB1,', 'ZEB2', and, 'SLUG,', 'miR-200s', are, currently]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([as, master, regulators, of, 'EMT,', thereby, suppressing, cancer, invasion, and, metastasis])].
[sujeto(['The', involvement, of, 'miR-200s', in, angiogenesis]), verbo([has]), complemento([also, been, 'reported,', and, they, were, found, to, directly, target, 'VEGF-A,', 'FLT1/VEGFR1', and, 'KDR/VEGFR2,', three, key, components, of, the, 'VEGF', signaling, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', 'miR-200s', also]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([the, 'self-renewal', ability, of, cancer, stem, cells, by, targeting, 'BMI1', and, 'SUZ12'])].
[sujeto(['Aberrant', expression, of, 'miR-200s']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, confer, chemoresistant, properties, to, various, kinds, of, cancers])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', 'miR-200s,', by, playing, critical, and, pleiotropic, roles, in, 'malignancies,', are, promising]), verbo([targets]), complemento([for, cancer, therapy])].

[sujeto(['There', was, a, significant, time, dependent]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, the, secretion, of, 'sFlt-1', and, sEndoglin, in, 'PE', 'cases,', which, was, seen, only, for, 'sFlt-1', in, controls])].

[sujeto(['Impairment', of, uteroplacental, vascular, function, can]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, pregnancy, 'complications,', including, preeclampsia, and, intrauterine, growth, restriction, '(', 'IUGR)'])].
[sujeto(['Potassium', channels]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, recognized, as, regulators, of, vascular, 'proliferation,', 'angiogenesis,', and, secretion, of, vasoactive, 'factors,', and, their, dysfunction, may, underlie, 'pregnancy-related', vascular, diseases])].

[sujeto(['Acute', myeloid, leukemia, '(', 'AML)', is, a, complex, disease]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, deregulation, of, multiple, signaling, pathways])].

[sujeto(['Low', 'PK', levels]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, cellular, glutamine, and, glutamate, 'concentrations,', but, decreased, the, levels, of, seven, amino, acids, including, serine, and, histidine])].
[sujeto(['To', test, for, evolutionary, conservation, of, this, 'PK', 'function,', we, quantified, orthologues, of, the, identified, 'PK']), verbo([targets]), complemento([in, thyroid, follicular, 'adenoma,', a, tumor, characterized, by, high, 'PK', levels, and, low, respiratory, activity])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', 'PK', expression, levels, and, activity, were, important, for]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento([cellular, amino, acid, homeostasis])].

[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, demonstrate, that, this, pathway, forms, a, multienzyme, complex, that, is, associated, with, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([lamina])].
